Ma anyị echeghị na nke ahụ ga-eme anyị
Ihe kachasị njọ ga-eme bụ ụlọ mkpọrọ, amaara m na m nwere ike ịnagide nke ahụ
Naanị ihe m na-echegbu onwe m bụ ihe m na - na-eme ka ezinụlọ m laghachi azụ na United States
Njem ịnyịnya ígwè Paris-na-Moscow maka Disarmament bụ isi ihe kpaliri San Francisco na Moscow Walk for Peace na 1960-1961
N'afọ ndị 1950 na 1960, Dellinger sonyeere ngagharị nnwere onwe na South ma duzie ọtụtụ agụụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'afọ 1956, ya, Dorothy Day, na A
Muste guzobere magazin Liberation dị ka nnọkọ maka ndị na-abụghị Marxist nke yiri Dissent

Dellinger nwere kọntaktị na ọbụbụenyi na ndị dị iche iche dị ka Eleanor Roosevelt, Ho Chi Minh, Martin Luther King Jr, Abbie Hoffman, AJ Muste, Greg Calvert, James Bevel, David McReynolds, na ọtụtụ Black Panthers dị ka Fred Hampton, onye ọ masịrị nke ukwuu
Dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Peace Parade nke Fifth Avenue Vietnam, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ òtù na-emegide agha ma nyere aka mee ka Eze na Bevel banye n'ọkwa ndị ndu na 1960s antiwar movement
N'afọ 1966, Dellinger gara ma North na South Vietnam iji mụta mmetụta nke bọmbụ America
O mechara cheta na ndị nkatọ leghaara njem ya gaa Saigon anya ma lekwasị anya naanị na nleta ya na Hanoi

N'afọ 1968, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwa 'Writers and Editors War Tax Protest', na-ekwe nkwa ịjụ ịkwụ ụtụ isi iji mee mkpesa megide Agha Vietnam, ma mesịa ghọọ onye nkwado nke ọrụ War Tax Resistance, nke na-eme ma na-akwado iguzogide ụtụ isi dị ka ụdị mkpesa megide agha ahụ
Ka itinye aka US na Vietnam na-eto, Dellinger tinyere ụkpụrụ Mahatma Gandhi nke enweghị ime ihe ike na ọrụ ya n'ime mmegide na-eto eto

Otu n'ime isi ihe ndị a bụ ikpe Chicago Seven maka ebubo na Dellinger na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ gbara izu ịgafe ókèala steeti na ebumnuche nke ịkpali ọgba aghara, mgbe ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-emegide agha kwụsịrị 1968 Democratic National Convention na Chicago
Dellinger na ndị ya na ha na-ebo ebubo tụgharịrị ikpe ikpe ahụ n'ụlọ ikpe ka ọ bụrụ ebe a na-akpọsa mba niile maka ikpe agha Vietnam
Na onwa Febụwarị ụbọchị iri na asatọ , n'afọ 1970, a tọhapụrụ ha na ebubo nkwekọrịta, mana a mara ndị a na-ebo ebubo ise, gụnyere Dellinger, ikpe maka ịgafe ókèala steeti iji kpalie ọgba aghara

Nchịkwa nke onye ọka ikpe Julius Hoffman banyere ikpe ahụ, tinyere FBI na-eme ndị ọka iwu na-agbachitere, mere, site n'enyemaka nke Center for Constitutional Rights, na ikpe ndị ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị nke asaa tụgharịrị afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị
Ọ bụ ezie na a kwadoro nkwupụta nlelị ahụ, ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị jụrụ ịma onye ọ bụla ikpe
Dellinger kwuru okwu na onwa Desemba afọ 1971 John Sinclair Freedom Rally na Ann Arbor, Michigan
Na ngwụcha afọ 1970, Dellinger nọrọ afọ abụọ na-akụzi na Goddard College's Adult Degree Program na Vermont College
N'afọ 2001, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ laghachi ka ọ nye adreesị mmalite na klas na-agụsị akwụkwọ nke Goddard's Residential Undergraduate Program

N'afọ 1986, mgbe klas Yale ya nke 1936 nwere nnọkọ nke iri ise ya, Dellinger dere n'akwụkwọ nnọkọ ahụ 'Ụzọ ndụ m na-ada ụda ma ọ bụ nke siri ike, ana m emesi ike na n'ikpeazụ mmadụ enweghị ike ikwu mba maka agha, ime ihe ike, na ikpe na-ezighị ezi ọ gwụla ma mmadụ na-ekwu ee na ndụ, ịhụnanya, na ọchị n'otu oge
N'ihi nraranye ya na ụkpụrụ ndị na-eme udo na maka ije ozi dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuru maka òtù udo, e nyere Dellinger onyinye Peace Abbey Courage of Conscience na Septemba 26, 1992

N'afọ 1996, n'oge Nzukọ Democratic mbụ e mere na Chicago kemgbe 1968, e jidere Dellinger na nwa nwa ya na ndị ọzọ asatọ, gụnyere Bradford Lyttle na nwa Abbie Hoffman bụ Andrew, n'oge ha nọ ọdụ na Chicago's Federal Building
N'afọ 2001, Dellinger duuru otu ndị na-eto eto na-eme ihe ike site na Montpelier, Vermont, gaa Quebec City iji mee mkpesa na nnọkọ nke mere atụmatụ ịmepụta mpaghara azụmahịa n'efu
Dellinger nwụrụ na Montpelier, Vermont, na 2004 mgbe ọ nọrọ ogologo oge na Heaton Woods Nursing Home
David Dennis (amụrụ na 17 Mee 1960) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Sol na SABC 1 TV series Soul City
Dennis rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro TV Charlie Jade, dị ka onye uwe ojii Sew Sew Tukarrs
N'ozuzu, Dennis enweela ọrụ na usoro telivishọn iri na atọ dị iche iche
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri ya, na ihe nkiri egwu
Dennis apụtala n'ihe nkiri asaa, nke a gụnyere Red Dust, 10,000 BC na Disgrace

O meriri onye na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na South African Film and Television Awards, na 2009, maka ọrụ ya dị ka Jacob, n'ihe nkiri The World Unseen Jonathan Curiel, na nyocha ya nke The World Unseen, maka San Francisco Chronicle, kwuru na '
onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa David Dennis
na-enye ụdị arụmọrụ siri ike, na-adọrọ mmasị, nke dị iche iche nke bụ akara nke ihe nkiri ọ bụla na-adọkpụ'
Dennis na-akụzi ime ihe nkiri na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ nke Tshwane

David Kwame Dontoh (a mụrụ n'afọ 1964) ma kpọọ ya Uncle David, 'Ghanaman' na 'Kofi Abranteɛ' (Kofi Gentleman), bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye telivishọn nke pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri obodo na mba ụwa, ejije ihe nkiri, na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ
O nweela mmetụta dị ukwuu na mmepe nke telivishọn na ihe nkiri, ọkachasị n'oge oge ọlaedo nke ihe nkiri na Ghana n'afọ ndi 80s na 90s

Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1980 mgbe ọ hụrụ mgbasa ozi akwụkwọ akụkọ National Film and Television Institute (NAFTI) na-akpọ ndị nwere ike ime ihe nkiri ka ha bịa maka ọzụzụ na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri
Aha ihe nkiri NAFTI mbụ ya bụ 'The Way To Shame' obere nkeji asaa nke Alex Bannerman duziri dịka akụkụ nke nyocha ya na mmepụta ihe nkiri
Alex bụ onye bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke NAFTI n'oge ahụ hụrụ David ma mee ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ndu dịka onye ahụ e bu n'obi abịaghị n'oge ịgba égbè
Ndị nyocha nke ihe nkiri ahụ, ọkachasị Mike Hagan, ghọtara ikike David nwere na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ma mee ka nke a pụta ìhè nye Alex Bannerman na-eto eto
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a chọpụtara ikike ime ihe nkiri nke David mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na 'Gus The Theatre Cat', obere oge nke uri nke T
Eliot dere
Ọ bụ George Andoh Wilson nke Wilson Acting Academy ama ama duziri egwuregwu a
David abụwo onye otu ogologo oge nke ndị na-ahụ maka ihe nkiri nke Ghana National Theatre ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ ma lara ezumike nká na nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 2000
Ya na Maazị Effah Nkrabea Darteh hiwere Ghana Union of Theatre Societies
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere 'Ghana Actors Guild' ma bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Guild
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke 'Ghana Concert Parties Union'
David abụrụla onye isi oche nke kọmitii atụmatụ nke 'Ghana Music Awards' ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ewezuga mmepụta azụmahịa, David Dontoh na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ya 'Golden Kauri' na NGO, 'Kaurifire Arts Foundation'
O guzobela otu ihe nkiri atọ iji kwado ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ndị otu a bụ 'KOZIKOZI Theatre Company', 'Edzikanfo Concert Party' na 'David Dontoh Cultural Ensemble' (DADON CULEN)
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ghana National Film Authority (NFA) nke e guzobere na Disemba afọ 2019
National Film Authority na-enye nlekọta n'ozuzu na njikwa mma maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
A na-edebe nzukọ ọkpụkpụ ahụ ugbu a n'ime ogige nke Bureau of Ghana Languages ma ọ ka nwere ndị ọrụ zuru ezu
N'afọ 2015, ọ malitere DAS Professional Acting Institute na Zenith University College, Ghana
A mụrụ David Dontoh na Gyegyeano, nke dị na Cape Coast na mpaghara etiti Ghana
Nna ya bụ onye nkuzi, onye edemede na onye ọrụ ugbo nwere ọkachamara na ọrụ ugbo akwụkwọ nri na anụ ụlọ
Nne ya - Elizabeth Victoria Ackon Green (Efua Beduwa) - bụ onye na-azụ azụ
Nne na nna ha alụghị di
Nna nna ya (Humphrey Kweku Dontoh) bụ onye ọkụ azụ nke si Gomoa Fete nwere njikọ nna nna ya na obodo Saltpond
O tolitere na Cape Coast, Abakrampa na Winneba - obodo azụmaahịa na ọrụ ugbo n'akụkụ etiti ụsọ oké osimiri Ghana
A nọrọ afọ uto ya n'ime nnukwu ezinụlọ, nke nwanne nna ya na nwanne nne nke ọrụ dị iche iche gbara ya gburugburu
Ọ na-ekwu na ihe ịga nke ọma ya n'ime ihe nkiri sitere na ọnọdụ mmekọrịta kwa ụbọchị gburugburu esemokwu, ihe ọchị na njikọta n'ime nnukwu netwọk ezinụlọ dị mgbagwoju anya nke o toro na ya
Site na nwata, David Dontoh na-eto eto nwere mmasị dị ukwuu na sayensị, ọdịdị ala, akụkọ ihe mere eme, akwụkwọ, uri, nkà ihe ọmụma, nka oge ochie na nke oge a, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma n'afọ1975 ma nwee ike ịkọwapụta ụwa site na ncheta
Ọ gụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ ochie kachasị emetụta Socrates, Plato na Aristotle n'oge ezumike ụlọ akwụkwọ
Na mbụ, David chọrọ ịchụso ọrụ ma ọ bụ dị ka dọkịta ma ọ bụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu mana ọ dara akara nnabata a chọrọ mgbe ule nke isii ya gasịrị
Omume ọjọọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata kpaliri mmasị David na nkà mmụta ọgwụ
Ọ suturu ọnyá nke enyi ya nke ya na ya gara izuru mkpụrụ akị bekee n'ụlọ onye agbata obi ya
Nwatakịrị ahụ merụrụ aka ya na iko gbawara agbaji mgbe ọ na-awụlikwa elu n'elu mgbidi iji gbanahụ njide
David ji obi ike tinye aka ma jiri agịga na eriri ụlọ nkịtị na-adụ ọnyá ahụ na nzuzo
N'ụzọ na-akpali mmasị, ndị dọkịta hụrụ ọrụ ịwa ahụ na-adịghị mma nke ọma nke na ha chere na a manyere ha ịhapụ akwa ahụ ruo mgbe ọnyá ahụ gwọrọ kpamkpam
Ihe omume a dị ịrịba ama mere ka a kpọọ ya 'Dọkịta David' nke mere ka mmasị ya na nkà mmụta ọgwụ dịkwuo elu
Agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị nke David Dontoh bụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche na Cape Coast, Winneba, na Abakrampa na mpaghara etiti Ghana
O mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Apam Senior High School
Ọ gụrụ sayensị, Bekee na uri

N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ mgbe iwu ewu ya malitere ịrị elu na ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri ya n'oge ahụ - Grace Omaboe (Maame Dokono) nke Obra ama ama - gbara ya ume ka ọ nweta nzere na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri mgbe o meriri Best Actor Award n'afọ 1984
Ya mere, David gụrụ Drama na Theatre na School of Performing Arts University of Ghana n'etiti afọ 1985 na 1988 ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na edemede egwuregwu ma nweta diplọma
David Dontoh lụrụ Rebecca Dontoh
Di na nwunye a mụrụ ụmụ atọ, abụọ n'ime ha bụ Jojo na Ewurama
E nwere echiche na ya na Grace Omaboe (Maame Dokono) na-akpa ihe dịka afọ anọ n'oge ha na-anọkọ ọnụ dịka ndị otu ihe nkiri a ma ama 'Obra'
A na-akpọkarị di na nwunye a dịka di na nwunye n'ọtụtụ ihe omume Obra
Kemịkalụ siri ike na nghọta dị n'etiti di na nwunye na ihuenyo apụtawo ìhè mgbe niile nye ndị na-ege ntị
N'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ, David ekwenyeghị maọbụ gọnahụ asịrị banyere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya ha mana ọ na-ekwusi ike na ha abụọ bụ ezigbo enyi ma bụrụ ezigbo enyi n'oge Grace Omaboe na di mbụ ya kewara
Otú ọ dị, Grace Omaboe na-ekwu eziokwu banyere mmekọrịta ha
O kwuputala n'ajụjụ ọnụ na ha abụọ na-akpa nwa oge
Dịka Grace si kwuo, ha hụrụ onwe ha n'anya n'ezie ma tụledị alụmdi na nwunye mana ha kpebiri megide ya n'ihi ọdịiche na-enweghị nkwekọrịta na atụmanya
David chọrọ ka ha nwee ezinụlọ ọnụ mana Grace amụtala ụmụ isii site n'alụmdi na nwunye gara aga
Ọ gafekwara ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nke iri anọ wee mee mkpebi onwe ya ịghara ịmụ nwa ọzọ n'ihi nsogbu ndị nwere ike ime ime n'afọ ndụ ahụ
N'oge ahụ, David bụ nwata n'ime ha abụọ ma nwebeghị ezinụlọ nke ya
Ya mere, di na nwunye ahụ kewara site na nkwenye nke ibe ha mana ha ka bụ ezigbo enyi kemgbe ahụ

E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, David bụkwa onye na-ede uri, onye na-ede edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu (television na ihe nkiri), onye na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-ese ihe, onye na-ese ihe osise, wdg
O deela ọtụtụ abụ ma dee ihe karịrị uri 300 na Fanti, Twi na Bekee
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ghana National Film Authority

David Drake (ihe dị ka 1800 c
1870s), nke a makwaara dị ka 'Dave Pottery' na 'Dave the Potter,' bụ onye America na-akpụ ite na ohu African American nké bi na Edgefield, South Carolina
Drake bìrì ma rụọ ọrụ na Edgefield ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndụ ya niile
Drake mepụtara ite ite nkume alkaline-glazed n'etiti afọ 1820 na afọ 1870
Ónyé Africa America ohu, ọ na-abịakarị aka n'ọrụ ya 'Dave'
A maara ya dị ka onye ọkpụite mbụ e nyèrè ohu iji dee ọrụ ya, n'oge ọtụtụ ndị ohu amaghị akwụkwọ, a machibidoro ha ịgụ na ide, na ndị a na-amaghị aha ha
Drake ji uri dee ọrụ ya, na-ejikarị ụda olu, yana mbinye áká ya
A na-eche na a mụrụ David Drake na ọkara mbụ nke afọ 1800 n'ugbo dị na South Carolina, nke ezinụlọ Drake mèrè ohu
Ihe ndekọ iwu mbụ nke Drake bụ nkọwa sitere na úbọchị irí nà atọ n'ọnwa Juun, 1818, nke na-akọwa 'nwatakịrị nwoke dị ihe dị ka afọ 17 nke a mụrụ' ónyé 'Harvey Drake gburu Eldrid Simkins'
'Ala a mụrụ' na-ezo aka n'onye ohu Africa America nke a mụrụ na United States karịa Africa
N'oge antebellum, Drake bụ otu n'ime ndị ohu Africa America irí asaá na isii a maara na ha rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ite ite iri na abụọ nke Edgefield
Ọ bụ Harvey Drake mere David Drake ohu mbụ
Harvey Drake nwèrè nnukwu azụmahịa ite na onye mmekọ azụmahịa ya Abner Landrum
E kwenyere na a mụrụ Drake n'aka otu n'ime ndị ohu asatọ Landrum si North Carolina wetaara Edgefield
Azụmaahịa ite a, na mpaghara ebe David Drake na-arụ ọrụ, a maara dị ka Pottersville
Landrum bụ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ọbọdọ a na-akpọ The Edgefield Hive A maghị otú Drake si mụta ịgụ na ide
Ndị ọkà mmụta na-eche na ọ bụ Landrum kụziiri ya, onye a maara dị ka ónyé okpukpe ma nwee ike ịkụziri Drake otu esi agụ Bible
N'oge a, a na-ata ndị ohu ahụhụ ka ha gụọ akwụkwọ, ọkachasị na South Carolina
Ọtụtụ steeti ndịda na mbido afọ 1800 gbochiri ndị isi ojii ịgụ na ide, na n'afọ 1830, e wepụtara iwu machibidoro agụmakwụkwọ ha
South Carolina's Negro Act of 1740, machibidoro ịkụziri ndị ohu Afrịka ịgụ na ide, nke a ga-ata ahụhụ site na ịkwụ ụgwọ otu narị pound na ọnwa isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Ihe ọzọ na-edochaghị anya banyere ndụ Drake bụ ụkwụ ya furu efu
N'oge a na-amaghị na ndụ ya, e bepụrụ otu n'ime ụkwụ Drake; a na-eche na Drake tụfuru ụkwụ ya mgbè ónyé nwe ya kụrụ Drake ihe nke ukwuu màkà idepụta ọrụ ya
Ónyé ọkà mmụta Drake bụ Jill Beute Koverman na-ekwu na Drake 'mere ihe karịrị puku iri anọ n'oge ndụ ya'
Iri abụọ n'ime ite na ite Drake nwèrè uri mbụ na arịa iri ise ọzọ na-ekpughe mbinye aka ya, akara ónyé na-eme ya, ụbọchị, na ihe odide ndị ọzọ
Igbe Drake dị bulbous n'ụdị, yiri ọtụtụ arịa e mepụtara na antebellum Edgefield

A maara Drake maka nnukwu arịa ya na nnukwu ite kachasị ukwuu nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ Drake nwèrè galọn US irí anọ (150 l) ma tụọ sentimita irí abụọ na itoolu (74 cm) n'ogologo, na gburugburu nke sentimita irí asatọ na isé (220 )
Otu ihe ịrịba ama nke ọrụ Drake bụ na ite ya kacha obosara n'elu -
N'afọ 2010, akwụkwọ ụmụaka Dave the Potter Artist, Poet, Slave bụ nke Laban Carrick Hill dere ma Bryan Collier sere ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye akụkọ ndụ Drake yana ike ya màkà ịmepụta ite
Ọ meriri Coretta Scott King Award ma bụrụ akwụkwọ Caldecott Honor na 2011
N'afọ 2013, ónyé édémédé Andrea Cheng bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ dị n'etiti Etched in Clay The Life of Dave, Enslaved Potter and Poet na-enye echiche akụkọ ndụ Drake
N'oge ndụ Drake, ite ya ruru ihe dị ka cents irí isé; Otú ọ dị taa, ha na-ere ihe ruru puku dollar iri ise
N'ahịa na ire ere nke oge a, a na-ere ọrụ ya maka ihe karịrị puku dollar iri anọ kwa ihe
David C
Driskell (June 7, 1931 eprel 1, 2020) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ọkà mmụta na ónyé nlekọta; a maara ya maka ọrụ ya n'ịmepụta nka Africa-America dị ka mpaghara ọmụmụ dị iche
N'oge ndụ ya, a kpọtụrụ Driskell aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi ụwa na-ahụ maka nka Africa na America
Driskell nwèrè utu aha nke Distinguished University Professor of Art, Emeritus, na Mahadum Maryland, College Park
A mụrụ David Clyde Driskell na 1931 na Eatonton, Georgia, nwa George Washington Driskell, onye ụkọchukwu Baptist, na Mary Cloud Driskell، ónyé na-elekọta ụlọ
A mụrụ nna nna ya, William Driskell, n'ohu n'afọ 1862, ma kụziere onwé ya ozizi Metọdist, na-aghọ onye ozi
Mgbe David Driskell dị afọ ise, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Appalachia na ọdịda anyanwụ North Carolina, ébé ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọtụtụ afọ na Talladega College na Alabama, ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Mahadum Katọlik na 1962
Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nké nka na Mahadum Howard site na 1963 ruo 1964
N'afọ 1964, o nwèrè fellowship na Netherlands Institute for Art History na The Hague
David C
Driskell Artist and Scholar nke Julie L
McGee, akwụkwọ na-akọwapụta ndụ na ọrụ Driskell, e bipụtara na 2006
N'ime afọ iri asaa ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye na-ahụ maka nka, Driskell nyere onyinye ndị a na-ewere dị ka ntọala na ngalaba nke nka Africa America
Ọ haziri ihe ngosi 35 nke ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe ojii, gụnyere Jacob Lawrence, Romare Bearden, na Elizabeth Catlett
Driskell mepụtara ọrụ nka gụnyere eserese, eserese, collage na printmaking, na-ejikọkarị ha n'ịmepụta ọrụ mgbasa ozi ngwakọta

Ọrụ ya na-esiri ike ịhazi n'ihi ọdịiche nke ọrụ nka ya, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ma n'ụzọ na-enweghị atụ ma n'ihe atụ, yana iji ihe dịgasị iche iche gụnyere ihe osise mmanụ, acrylic, egg tempera, gouache, ink, akara, na collage, na akwụkwọ na ákwà a gbatịrị agbatị na agbatị agbatị
Isiokwu nke ọrụ ya sitere na foto nke ndị na-agụ egwu jazz, chi na ememe ndị Afrịka, ndụ obodo, na ọdịdị ala gburugburu ụlọ ya n'oge ọkọchị na Maine

David Fowler, CBE, FRS (amụrụ n'ubochi mbu n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1950) bụ ónyé British environmental physicist, a ghọtara dị ka ónyé nwéré ikike na mmetọ ikuku
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na micrometeorology, mgbanwe ala na ikuku nke gas na ụmụ irighiri ihe, na mmetụta nke mmetọ na ahịhịa
Fowler nwetara BSc
na physics gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum Nottingham n'afọ 1972, PhD

sochiri ya n'otu mahadum ahụ n'afọ 1976, tupu ọ kwaga Institute of Terrestrial Ecology na Edinburgh (nke e mechara tinye na Centre for Ecology & Hydrology), ébé ọ nọrọ afọ iri anọ sochirinụ nke ọrụ ya
O dere ihe dị ka akwụkwọ narị abụọ na iri ise ndị ọgbọ nyochara
Ewezuga nyocha sayensị, Fowler arụwokwa ọrụ na itinye sayensị ikuku na iwu ọha na eze na UK na Europe
Ọ bụ ónyé otu kọmitii sayensị iri na abụọ, gụnyere Royal Society Global Environmental Research Committee (nke ọ bụ onyeisi óche kemgbe afọ 2011), na Air Quality Expert Group, nkè ọ bụ ónyé otu ad-hoc
Fowler ghọrọ prọfesọ nsọpụrụ nke Mahadum Nottingham n'afọ 1991, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Fellow nke Royal Society of Edinburgh n'afọ 1999, na Fellow nke Real Society of London n'afọ 2002
E nyèrè ya CBE n'afọ 2005 màkà ọrụ na sayensị ikuku
David Gakuru (amụrụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Rwandan na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
N'afọ 2017, o sonyere na asọmupi ụmụ nwoke ndị okenye na 2017 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke emere na Kampala, Uganda
Ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke iri isii na abụọ
N'afọ 2018, o sonyere na ọkara marathon ụmụ nwoke na 2018 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships nke emere na Valencia, Spain
Ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke 109th

David Goldblatt HonFRPS (ụbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1930 na ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ise n'ọnwa June afọ 2018) bụ onye na-ese foto South Africa nke amaara banyere ngosipụta ya nke South Africa n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ógè ịkpa ókè agbụrụ kwụsịrị, o lekwasịrị anya na ọdịdị ala nke mba ahụ
Ihe na-eme ka ọrụ Goldblatt dị iche na nke ndị ọzọ na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ bụ na ọ na-ese foto nke gafere ihe omume ime ihe ike nke ịkpa ókè megide ịkpa ókè ma gosipụta ọnọdụ ndị dugara na ha
Ụdị mkpesa ya nwere aghụghọ nke foto ọdịnala nwere ike ghara inwe '[M]y enweghị mmasị bụ àgwà nke m gbalịrị izere ikpe dị mfe
Nke a mere ka e see foto nke yiri ka ọ na-enweghị isi na nke na-enweghị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mana nke bụ n'ezie ihe dị iche
' O nwere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ aha ya
A mụrụ Goldblatt na Randfontein, Gauteng Province, ọ bụkwa nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke atọ nke Eli na Olga Goldblatt
Nne na nna nna ya si Lithuania bịa South Africa n'ihe dị ka afọ 1893, ebe ha gbapụrụ n'ihi mkpagbu ndị Juu nọ ebe mpaghara ahụ
Nna Goldblatt na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa uwe, ebe nne ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka ihe banyere ụlọ ọrụ uwe, nke Goldblatt chere na ọ nwere ike ịbụ otú ha si zute
Goldblatt gara Krugersdorp High School, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na nzere na azụmahịa
Goldblatt bịdọrọ ise foto ógè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
O nwetara igwefoto izizi ya n'aka nna ya, onye zụrụ ya n'ebe nwanne Goldblatt nọ, onye wetara igwefoto German Contax mebiri emebi n'ụlọ ógè ọ lọtara site n'ịrụ ọrụ na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ

Ọ bụ ezie na foto mbụ ya abụghị ihe ọhụrụ, ọ rịọrọ enyemaka site n'aka onye na-ese foto agbamakwụkwọ 'Ọ ga-etinye ọtụtụ kamera n'olu m ka m wee yie ezigbo ọkachamara, ọrụ m bụ iji hụ na ọ dịghị onye ọbịa nwere ezigbo igwefoto nwetara foto dị mma
Aga m aghara ma ọ bụ gaa ije n'ihu ha n'oge dị oke egwu ka onye isi m wee bụrụ naanị onye mechara nwee foto dị mma
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị n'afọ 1963, ka nkà ya na-etolite, ọ rere ụlọ ahịa uwe nke ọ weghaara mgbe nna ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1962, wee ghọọ onye na-ese foto oge niile
O dere ihe ndị mere na South Africa n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị n'ime afọ 1990s
Otú ọ dị ọ ka na-ese foto ruo ógè ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2018
N'ime afọ ya niile dị ka onye na-ese foto, Goldblatt ahụtụbeghị onwe ya dị ka onye omenkà, ọ naghịkwa ahụ ya ala na a na-ele ya anya dị ka otu
Ọtụtụ ndị kwenyere na ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ karịa ka ọ bụ onye omenkà
Goldblatt nwere ụzọ ọhụrụ maka ihe banyere foto akwụkwọ
O mere ndụ nke ise foto nke okwu ndị karịrị ihe omume nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma dekọọ ọnọdụ ndị dugara na ha
Goldblatt enwebeghị ahụ iru ala na ụwa nka mara mma
Ọ gara n'ebe ngosi ihe nkiri mana ọ kpọrọ nlebara anya ha nyere ya asị na nzuzo
Ọ gbara aha onye na-ese ihe site n'ịkpọ onwe ya onye na-ede foto
O kwuru, sị 'Abụ m onye na-ele anya n'onwe ya ma na-akatọ ọha mmadụ a mụrụ m na ya, na-achọkarị ịnakwere ihe a na-eleghara anya ma ọ bụ ihe a na'adịghị ahụ anya
O doro anya na foto Goldblatt abụghị ebubo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O kwuru na ọ bụghị onye na-eme ngagharị iwe, n'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ndị enyi ya na ndị ọzọ na-ese foto n'oge a
N'aka nke ya, e wedara ya anya ma ghara ịkwanyere ya ùgwù màkà ihe banyere itinye aka na ime ihe ike, nke o kwuru, sị 'Adịghị m njikere imebi ihe m weere dị ka mkpa m
' Kama imepụta foto nke nwere ike 'anwa ime mkpebi ikpe,' Goldblatt họọrọ 'igosi mgbagwoju anya nke ọnọdụ'
Ihe ngosi nke ihe ndị a na-eme kwa ụbọchị na-adịkarị n'ọrụ Goldblatt
Kama ise foto nke ime ihe ike doro anya nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ mpaghara South Africa, ọ họọrọ idepụta ime ihe ike nke oge a nke gosipụtara onwe ya na ndụ nkịtị 'M na-ezere ime ihe ike
Agaghị m ama otu esi ejikwa ya ma ọ bụrụ na abụ m onye na-ese foto n'ihe nkiri ime ihe ike

N'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, Goldblatt n'ọrụ ya The Transported of KwaNdebele dere njem bọs dị ogologo na nke na-adịghị mma ugboro abụọ n'ụbọchị nke ndị ọrụ ojii bi na 'ala' dị iche iche n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Pretoria
Ọnọdụ agbanwebeghị nke ukwuu maka ndị ọrụ site n'afọ 2007 'Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi ebe ahụ ka ga-aga Pretoria site n'okporo ụzọ
Ọ ka bụ njem dị ogologo màkà ihe banyere ha kwa ụbọchị awa abụọ ruo asatọ
Ọ ga-ewe ọtụtụ ọgbọ iji mebie ihe si na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ pụta
N'afọ ndị 1970, Goldblatt dere otu n'ime ụfọdụ ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke gọọmentị South Africa na usoro foto nke ụlọ, ụlọ ahịa na ụdị ụlọ ndị ọzọ dị na Johannesburg, Pageview
Iwu Group Areas Act nke afọ 1950 chụpụrụ ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ n'ihi ndị ọcha South Africa
Goldblatt dere ngosipụta nke ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ nke nguzogide na mkpebi siri ike site na obibi ha na azụmaahịa ha n'agbanyeghị mmebi ahụ
Ógè ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị, Goldblatt gara n'ihu na-ese foto n'ime South Africa, ọkachasị ọdịdị ala ya
N'ọrụ Goldblatt mepụtara n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ọ dịghị ógè ọ na-ese foto na agba
Goldblatt kwuru na 'iji agba eme ihe n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ga-abụ ihe na-ekwesịghị ekwesị
Ọ gaara eme ka ihe mara mma na nke onwe ya dịkwuo mma, ebe foto ojii na nke ọcha na-edekọ nke ọma ihe ndị na-emegiderịta onwe ha nke kọwara oge izizi a
' N'afọ ndị 1990 ọ bịdọrọ ịrụ ọrụ na agba, n'echiche na-agbaso oge dijitalụ
'Ọ hụrụ ọrụ ahụ n'ime agba dị nnọọ ihe na-akpali akpali
n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi na teknụzụ ọhụrụ enyerela m aka ịrụ ọrụ na agba na kọmputa dịka m mere na oji na ọcha n'ime ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị

' Ọ bụ naanị ógè ọ rụchara ọrụ na-emetụta asbestos na-acha anụnụ anụnụ n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Australia, na 'ọrịa na ọnwụ na-esi na ya apụta', ka ọ 'na-arụ ọrụ na agba [n'ihi na] Ị pụghị ime ka ọ na-acha ọcha na oji
Nke a jikọtakwara ya na mmepe ọhụrụ na nyocha dijitalụ na obibi akwụkwọ
Naanị ógè Goldblatt nwere ike iru otu 'omimi' ahụ n'ọrụ agba ya nke o nwetara na foto ojii na ọcha ya ka ọ họọrọ inyocha nke a nke ọma
A na-edebe ọrụ Goldblatt na nnukwu ụlọ ngosi ihe ógè ochie n'ụwa niile
Mmasị n'ọrụ Goldblatt mụbara nke ukwuu ógè ihe ngosi njem nke afọ irí isé n'otu nke ọrụ ya (Barcelona, 2001), na Documenta nke iri na otu (Kassel, 2002)
Nke mbụ, nke meghere na AXA Gallery na New York n'afọ 2001, nyere nkọwa zuru ezu nke ọrụ foto Goldblatt site n'afọ 1948 ruo afọ 1999

Na Documenta, egosiri ọrụ abụọ ọrụ ojii na-acha ọcha na-egosi ndụ na obodo ndị ọcha nke Boksburg n'ebe afọ 1970s na afọ 1980s, yana ihe atụ nke ọrụ agba ógè e mesịrị site na usoro Johannesburg Intersections

Akwụkwọ Goldblatt bụ South Africa The Structure of Things Then, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1998, na-enye nyocha anya miri emi nke mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ihe owuwu South Africa na ike ndị kpụrụ ha, site na mbido mmalite nke mba ahụ ruo n'afọ 1990
Goldblatt edeela ọtụtụ ihe gbasara ihe owuwu na ihe omimi dị n'ime ụlọ anyị bi
Goldblatt sị n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na foto na magazin ndị dị ka Life, Look na Picture Post, nke nyeere ya aka na ihe ndị dị ka ịkọwaputa foto ya

Goldblatt kwukwara na ndị edemede na ndị na-ese nkiri dị ka ndị isi na-emetụta ya, n'etiti ha Jillian Becker, Guy Tillim, Herman Charles Bosman, Nadine Gordimer, Njabulo Ndebele, Ivan Vladislavic na onye na-ede egwuregwu Barney Simon
Herman Charles Bosman nyere aka kpọmkwem ịkpali Goldblatt na edemede foto ya nke abụọ nkè akpọrọ The South African Tatler
Goldblatt nyere aka metụta ọrụ nke onye na-ese foto Santu Mofokeng ka ha na-amụkọ ihe ọnụ mgbè ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ha jikọrọ aka mepụta usoro ihe nkiri na echiche nke foto, nke dugara ha n'ịdị elu na mmetụta n'ime foto ihe nkiri
Ógè o guzobesịrị Ụlọ Ọrụ Foto Ahịa na Johannesburg n'afọ 1989, Goldblatt emeghị onye na-ese foto, na-agba mbọ ma ọ bụ bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ọnụ ụzọ ya
Onye ọ bụla na-enweta ya ógè niile n'agbanyeghị ihe ọ bụla, ọbụlagodi na ndụ ya
Goldblatt nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ise n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2018 na Johannesburg site na ọrịa kansa
O mepụtara foto ruo ógè ọ nwụrụ
Nwunye ya, Lily Goldblatt na ụmụ ya Steven, Brenda na Ronnie; na ụmụ ụmụ abụọ hapụrụ ya
David Gopito (amụrụ na Febụwarị 2, 1946) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Gopito bụ nwa afọ Mutare, Gopito na nwanne ya nwoke, John Gwatirwa gụrụ maka ihe ọkpụkpụ
N'afọ 1969, ọ kwagara Victoria Falls, na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ na Craft Village ruo afọ abụọ
Ugbu a, ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Chitungwiza
David Gresham (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1943, Mbabane, Swaziland) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na South Afrika, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, onye nwalite, na onye redio na telivishọn
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri nke SABC's Springbok Radio, South Africa's Top 20 na SABC TV's, Pop Shop
Ọ bụ onye nwe David Gresham Entertainment Group
Ọrụ ya, malitere n'afọ nke 1960s ma gafee afọ iri ise
Nwa nke nna ya bụ onye Germany, a mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Mbabane, Swaziland
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St Mark's na Mbabane
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, nna ya zigara ya South Afrika ka ọ bụrụ injinia eletromedical
N'achọghị ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka X-ray, kama ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye injinia ụda

Ọ gara nyocha maka Rod Vickers nke LM Radio, ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na Mozambique, maka ọrụ dị ka onye injinia ụda mana ọ dara ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ mana e nyere ya mmeghe maka ọrụ na Herrick Merryl Recording Studios
Gresham nọrọ afọ atọ n'ebe ahụ na-amụta injinia ụda dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ma dekọọ ihe nkiri redio maka SABC ma ọ mepụtara ụda na egwu maka ihe ngosi redio
Ọ laghachiri na LM Radio mere afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị mgbe ọ zutere ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na egwu jazz na Swaziland
Gresham rutere na LM Radio na Jenụwarị 1965, ọnwa isii mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbanwere usoro ya gaa na egwu pop ma gbasaa dị ka ụlọ ọrụ awa 24
Onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ya na onye isi nchịkwa ya bụ David Davies ma soro Darryl Jooste, John Berks, na Evelyn Martin rụọ ọrụ
Ọ ga-agbasa ozi na LM Radio ruo afọ abụọ na ọkara mana ọ chọrọ n'ezie ide ma dekọọ egwu
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ LM Radio, Gresham laghachiri Johannesburg n'afọ 1967 wee sonye na Teal Records dị ka onye na-ese ihe na repertoire (A&R) na onye njikwa nkwalite na World Records
N'otu oge ahụ ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka Teal, a na-enye ya ọnọdụ onwe ya dị ka onye ọbịa nke na SABC's Springbok Radio's 530pm drive show The Record Express
Ihe ngosi redio ahụ ga-emesị gaa na 430pm ma gbanwee aha ya The David Gresham Show ma gbasaa site na elekere anọ nke abalị ruo elekere nke isii
N'afọ 1969, na njem ọ gara London iji gbaa ndị na-egwu egwu ajụjụ ọnụ, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gbaa John Lennon ajụjụ ọnụ
A machibidoro Lennon na Beatles iwu na SABC ruo afọ ise mgbe o kwusịrị okwu ya n'afọ 1966 banyere Iso Ụzọ Kraịst
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Gresham, Lennon rịọrọ mgbaghara maka ihe o kwuru na ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka onye na-akwado Jizọs Kraịst

Mgbe ọ laghachiri Johannesburg, Gresham enweghị ike ịme ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ na SABC Radio ebe ndị na-enyocha ihe na-ewe iwe ugbu a maka nkwupụta Lennon banyere ịbụ onye na-akwado ya, ndị na-ede akwụkwọ kwenyere na mmadụ nwere ike ịbụ naanị onye na-eso ụzọ
N'afọ 1971, a gwara Gresham ka ọ kwado Springbok Radio's Top 20 n'abalị Fraịdee, na-agbasa ọzọ n'ehihie Satọdee dị ka SA Hits Of The Week na 500pm
E mechara kpọọ ihe ngosi Fraịdee South African Top 20 ma ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi ahụ ruo n'afọ 1985 mgbe emechiri ụlọ ọrụ Springbok Radio
Mgbe njedebe nke Springbok Radio gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na-egosi na redio ruo n'afọ 1991
Mgbe telivishọn rutere South Africa na 1975, Gresham gosipụtara ihe ngosi dịgasị iche iche, Sunshine 30, na ọwa nyocha SABC
Mgbe telivishọn malitere n'afọ 1976, ọ gosipụtara ihe ngosi egwu mgbede na Fraịdee a na-akpọ Pop Shop ma ga-akwado ya ruo afọ abụọ
Gresham kpatara esemokwu n'akụkụ ndị na-agbaso omenala nke ndị ọcha South Africa mgbe ọ nọ na Pop Shop, ọ na-egwu vidiyo egwu nke gosipụtara onye na-agụ egwu ojii America na nke mbụ ya na telivishọn
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ ga-akwado ihe ngosi SABC TV Easy Beat ruo afọ abụọ
Gresham hapụrụ Teal Records mgbe ha jụrụ imepụtaghị egwụ o dere
Kama nke ahụ, ọ gara EMI ma mepụta egwu abụọ na ndị omenkà abụọ na Clive Calder A&R Manager na EMI ga-ahapụ ha
N'otu oge ahụ Gresham zutere Mutt Lange site na Calder
Egwú o dere ma mepụta, nke napuru ya $ 150 kwa otu elekere na studio iji dekọọ, bụ Iʹll Walk With You nke onye na-agụ egwu Irish Sean Rennie na abụ ahụ gara n'ihu iru Top 10 chart na South Africa
N'afọ 1972, Gresham na onye mmekọ ya Allan Goldswain guzobere akara ndekọ a na-akpọ Nitty Gritty Records
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara aha ya ugbu a na 1984 mgbe a gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ David Gresham Records
N'oge mbụ ya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-ede jingles maka mgbasa ozi nke nyere akara ahụ ego ọzọ mgbe ụgwọ ọrụ SABC nke Gresham kwụrụ ụgwọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
E nyere Gresham ihe nrite ọla edo n'afọ 2016 site na Midem iji kwanyere ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu ùgwù
Ọ lụrụ Ismay, onye bụbu onye na-agba egwú ma nwee ụmụ atọ, Larry, Leigh na Angela
David Hathorn (amụrụ 21 Mee 1962) bụ onye ọchụnta ego dabere na South Africa na onye isi otu Mondi Group
Hathorn gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hilton College na Mahadum Natal, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke azụmahịa
Ọ bụ onye nyocha Chartered na Chartered Financial Analyst tozuru oke
Hathorn jere ozi na Deloitte & Touche na Johannesburg na 1987
Ọ sonyeere Anglo American na 1989 dị ka onye njikwa ego ngalaba na ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ & International Finance
Na 1991 ọ kwagara Mondi ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ego na mgbe ahụ onye isi njikwa Mondi Europe
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkwa onye isi nke Mondi Group ugbu a
David Huffman (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-ese foto, na ónyé nkụzi
A maara ya maka ọrụ ndị jikọtara akụkọ sayensị na-atọ ụtọ na-elekwasị anya na nyocha ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke njirimara
A mụrụ David Huffman ma zụlite ya na Berkeley, California
Nne ya Dolores Davis bụ ónyé na-eme ihe ike nke kwadoro ihe dị iche iche dị n'ógbè ahụ na 60s, gụnyere Black Panthers bụ ndị o mèrè ọkọlọtọ Free Huey
Huffman gosipụtara akụkọ sayensị n'oge, n'ụdị ihe ngosi telivishọn dịka Star Trek, Astroboy na Shogun Warriors
Huffman gụrụ akwụkwọ na New York na San Francisco na-anata MFA ya na California College of Arts and Crafts
Huffman na-ekwu 'M na-egwupụta ihe omume, ma ọ bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme ma ọ bụ nke ógè a, site na isi mmalite dị iche iche, ebe akụkọ ihe atụ m nke esemokwu, nghọta, egwu na mkpebi jikọtara
ọrụ ọ bụla dị nro na ihe onwunwe, mana ọ na-aga n'ihu na mkparịta ụka

Ọrụ jikọtara ma jikọta ya ihe oyiyi ọdịbendị pop gafee ógè, nyocha nkè ọma na ihe osise, akụkọ sayensị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị njirimara na okwu na-agbanwe agbanwe nke na-ajụ ' ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke agbụrụ, ime ihe ike, na eserese n'onwe ya'
Otu n'ime nsọpụrụ ndị Huffman nwetara bụ

David James (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1972) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri na telivishọn na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma maka imeka onye ọjọọ Koobus Venter na ihe nkiri akụkọ sayensị nke a họpụtara na Oscar n'afọ 2009 District 9

A makwaara ya n'etiti ndị na-ege ntị na South Africa maka ọdịdị ya n'afọ 2004-2006 dịka 'Mad Dog' na ihe nkiri ncha Isidingo, maka ngosipụta ya dịka Joel Joffe na nnukwu ihe nkiri na nke a nabatara nke ọma n'afọ 2010 na 2011 nke Rivonia Trial, yana maka ọrụ ya dịka onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ redio Hermanus Meyer na ihe nkiri Rhythm City
James tolitere na Paarl, Western Cape na ugbo mmanya
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị na-agbaso omenala na ndị na-ekewapụ onwe ha, nna ya bụ nwoke Dutch Reformed, ebe James bụ onye nweere onwe ya
Ya na ezinụlọ ya nwekwara esemokwu n'oge ọ bụ nwata banyere nhọrọ ọrụ ya
Dịka nwa okorobịa, James na ezinụlọ ya mere nkwekọrịta na ọ bụrụ na ọ nata WP-colours ya na egwuregwu, ọ nwere ike ịchụso nhọrọ ọmụmụ ya
Mgbe o mezuru nke a na mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ya na ndị agha, ọ họọrọ ịmụ ime ihe nkiri
Site n'afọ 1995 ruo 2001, James mụrụ ime ihe nkiri, ịbụ abụ, ịgba egwu, na ọjà
Otu n'ime ndị nkuzi ya bụ Joan Brickhill a ma ama, 'nnukwu nwanyị' nke ihe nkiri South Africa na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Tony Award, n'okpuru onye James gụrụ akwụkwọ site n'afọ 1997 ruo 2001
N'oge a, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na-ere ụgbọala, na-asa ụgbọala, na na-ehicha ọdọ mmiri, na ọbụna na-elekọta ndị agadi

N'elu ikpo okwu, ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na mmepụta nke The Picture of Dorian Gray (2002), A Midsummer Night's Dream (2005) na My Fair Lady (2006), na ndị ọzọ, yana na 2007 Fangs, akụkọ na-atọ ọchị banyere onye vampire nke Johannesburg nke tụfuru ezé ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Everybody Else (is Fucking Perfect), ihe ọchị nke afọ 2007 banyere di na nwunye a manyere ịnagide mmekọahụ na ekwesịghị ntụkwasị obi nke di
James apụtala n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na ihe nkwalite ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere mgbasa ozi na nkwalite maka Toys 'R Us, Ford, Compaq, na Cipler Insurance

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn na ncha South Africa, gụnyere ọrụ na Criminal Minds (2000), Snitch (2004), Jozi Street (2004), na Isidingo ogologo oge, ebe site n'afọ 2004 ruo 2006 ọ gosipụtara onye ogbu mmadụ a na-akpọ Mad Dog
James nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro dịka Danie Nel, onye a na-akwụ ụgwọ égbè, na usoro Binnelanders n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 2010, n'egwuregwu Rivonia Trial, James gosipụtara Joel Joffe, onye ọka iwu nọchitere anya Nelson Mandela na ikpe ọjọọ nke afọ 1963 na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke otu aha ahụ
N'afọ 2011, James mere Dieter, otu n'ime ndị na-atọrọ mmadụ n'ụzọ obi ọjọọ, na miniseries Britain Kidnap and Ransom, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Trevor Eve mepụtara
E mere ihe nkiri nke akụkụ atọ banyere onye na-ekwu okwu (Eve) kpamkpam na South Africa ma nweta nyocha dị mma n'ozuzu
O nwekwara obere ọrụ na Strike Back, usoro ọzọ nke Britain nke egosiri na Cinemax, na ihe nkiri Winnie, ihe nkiri dabeere na ndụ Winnie Mandela nke Jennifer Hudson na Terrence Howard gosipụtara
James pụtara dịka Hermanus Meyer, onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ redio, na usoro telivishọn South Africa Rhythm City
Ọ gbara onye ọgba tum tum Danny Boy na ihe nkiri Angus Buchan's Ordinary People, akụkọ onye nkwusa South Africa Angus Buchin, nke e wepụtara n'ọnwa Eprel

N'ọnwa Mee, o nwere ọrụ na egwuregwu mmadụ abụọ, nke dị mkpirikpi ma bụrụ nke a nabatara nke ọma 'Comrade Babble', ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gbasara onye ọchụnta ego South Africa e gburu Brett Kebble
James mere onye ọjọọ a na-akpọ Hermanus Meyer na usoro TV Rhythm City ruo ọtụtụ afọ
James bi ugbu a na Parkview, mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Johannesburg
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ abụọ, na-asọpụta Bekee na Afrikaans
O nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya, Lorraine, onye nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ezumike na Paarl

James enyerela aka n'ịchịkọta ego maka Faces of Hope, otu ọrụ ebere South Africa nke na-akpata ego maka ndị nwere ọrịa na-eyi ndụ egwu na-enweghị mkpuchi ahụike zuru oke ma ọ bụ ego iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka ọgwụgwọ ha
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, e gosipụtara otu isiokwu gbasara ihu nke olileanya na ntinye aka ya na O The Oprah Magazine South African edition
James pụtara dịka onye ọka ikpe a ma ama maka asọmpi February afọ 2010 nke ndị na-eto eto 'High Flyer' na Redhill School na Johannesburg
Na mberede, nke a bụ otu ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye nke onye ya na District 9 Sharlto Copley na onye nduzi Neill Blomkamp gara
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2010 James bụ onye ama ama na Naledi Theatre Awards
David Johns (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye Navajo na-ese ihe si Seba Dalkai, Arizona, United States
A mụrụ ya na Winslow, Arizona, United States
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Johns na nne nne ya nọrọ ọtụtụ awa na-azụ atụrụ n'ala ha
N'ime afọ ndị a, ọ kụziiri ya otu esi akwanyere ala, osisi na anụmanụ ndị na-enyere ndị Navajo aka ibi, ma gwa ya ọtụtụ akụkọ na-akọwa otú ndị Navajo si bịa na ebe agbụrụ ndị mụrụ ya malitere
Johns nwetara ọzụzụ na nka mara mma na Mahadum Northern Arizona, nweta nzere bachelọ n'afọ 1982
N'afọ 1996, e nyere ya nzere Doctorate Honorary na Humane Letters site na Mahadum Northern Arizona
Johns malitere ire foto na ọdịdị ala mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọrụ ya jikọtara ọzụzụ ya na ozizi ọdịnala ọ mụtara mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị na nkà ihe ọmụma ndụ Navajo nke ọ na-ebi ndụ
Nkwekọ nke ihe osise ya na-egosipụta nkwekọrịta na nguzozi a; agba na ọdịdị ọ na-emepụta na-egosipụtụrụ ịma mma nke ala o si bịa
Ihe osise ya na-enweghị atụ na-ejide ihe ndị dị mgbagwoju anya nke ndụ dị ka ìhè anyanwụ n'oge dị iche iche nke ụbọchị ma ọ bụ mmetụta nke oge anọ ọ bụla wetara
N'afọ 1987, onye nkuzi ogologo oge Lovena Ohl na Albert Wareing bịakwutere Johns ka ha see ihe osise na dome nke Concord Place
Ihe osise ahụ kpuchiri ụkwụ iri atọ na isii n'obosara ma rịa elu mita iri ise n'ikuku, ma were ọnwa iri na asatọ iji see ihe
Ihe osise ahụ na-egosi ndị obodo n'akụkụ anọ niile, na-egosi atụmatụ na akara ụmụ amaala, na foto nke ndị isi dị ka Crazy Horse na Quanah Parker
Onye edemede a ma ama N
Scott Momaday dere banyere ọrụ ya na Concord Place, 'David Johns bụ onye na-ahụ ụzọ, ọ na-abịa n'eziokwu site na onyinye ahụ
N'ọrụ nka ya dị ịrịba ama, ọ na-enyere anyị aka ịhụkwa
Onyinye ya ghọrọ onyinye anyị
Nke a bụ mmụọ dị mkpa nke okike
Malite n'afọ 1976, egosila ọrụ David na ngosi ihe ngosi n'ụwa niile, yana ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwe onye gụnyere Navajo Tribal Museum, Window Rock, Arizona (1977); CG

Rein Galleries, Santa Fe, New Mexico (1984); The Concord Place, Phoenix, Arizona (1987); Millicent Rogers Museum, Taos, New Mexico (1993); Palais de Nations, United Nations, Geneva, Switzerland (1999); na Lanning Gallery, Sedona, Arizona (2006)
David bụ osote onye isi oche nke nzuko Diné Hataałii otu nzukọ nke umunwoke na umunwanyi Navajo na-ahụ maka ọgu
David Nthubu Koloane (ụbọchị ịse n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1938 rụọ úbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2019) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
N'ihe osise ya, ihe osise ya na collages ọ nyochara ajụjụ gbasara ikpe na-ezighị ezi nké ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ikike mmadụ
A na-ewere Koloane dị ka 'onye na-ese ihe na ónyé édémédé nwere mmetụta nkè afọ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ' na South Africa
A mụrụ David Koloane n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1938 nà ọbọdọ Alexandra, nké dịpụrụ adịpụ nà Johannesburg nà South Africa
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na nka na ime nka n'oge ezumike ya mgbè ọ na-adịghị arụ ọrụ iji nweta ego màkà ezinụlọ
Site n'afọ 1974 ruo afọ 1977 Koloane gara klas nka na Bill Ainslie Studios, nke mesịrị ghọọ Johannesburg Art Foundation
N'afọ 1977, Koloane bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ụlọ ngosi ojii mbụ na South Africa, nke dị na Johannesburg
Nraranye ya na-arịwanye elu na nka mèrè ka ọ malite ịkụzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị n'obodo, nke mbụ dị ka ọrụ nwa oge, mgbe e mesịrị oge zuru ezu

Ọzọkwa n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, Koloane na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma na-etinye aka n'afọ 1982, ọ kwadoro emume omenala na nka na Botswana, site n'afọ 1986 rụọ afọ 1988 ọ bụ onye nlekọta nke Fuba Art Gallery na Johannesburg n'afọ 1990 ọ haziri ma soro hazie emume Zabalaza na London, England
Tụkwasị na nke a, Koloane gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum London site na 1984 ruo 1985 wee nweta diplọma na ihe ngosi nka

O sonyere na Pachipamwe II Workshop nké afọ 1989 nkè emere na Cyrene Mission na mpụga Bulawayo, Zimbabwe n'akụkụ ndị omenkà ámá àmà gụnyere Joram Mariga, Bernard Matemera, Bill Ainslie, Voti Thebe, Sokari Douglas Camp na Adam Madebe

Koloane nwere ebe ọrụ dịgasị iche iche dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ na-ejikọta ọrụ nkè ya na esemokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya; Ọzọkwa, o nyere aka na katalọgụ dị iche iche, na-ahụ màkà ihe ngosi, so na bọọdụ ndị ọka ikpe ọtụtụ ugboro n'etiti ndị ọzọ na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke National Arts Council, ma bipụta ọtụtụ isiokwu na South Africa na mba ụwa
N'afọ 1998, e nyere Koloane onyinye Prince Claus màkà enyemaka ya na mmepe nka na South Africa
David Kuijers bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa
A mụrụ Kuijers n'ubochí irí atọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1962 na Vanderbijlpark, nso Johannesburg, nkè nné na nnà Dutch kwagara mba ọzọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Art, Music and Ballet na Pretoria wee nweta ihe dị iche nà Graphics mà n'afọ 1980 nata onyinye Painter kacha mma
Mgbè obere oge dị ka onye na-ede ihe ịrịba ama, ọ gụsịrị Graphic Design Diploma na Cape Technikon, na-agụ akwụkwọ na ihe osise
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1989, e nyere ya onyinye Designer / Illustrator merit award
Kuijers rụrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya n'oge dị mkpirikpi dị ka onye na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe osise, mànà ugbu a ọ na-ese foto oge niile
Ọ na-ekere òkè mgbe niile n'ihe ngosi otu ma mechaa ọrụ dị iche iche, ọkachasị acrylic seascapes màkà President Hotel ọhụrụ na watercolours màkà Villa Via Hotel na Volks Hospital
Ọ bi ugbu a na Greyton na Western Cape ya na nwunye ya, nwa nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke abụọ, ebe o nwere ụlọ ọrụ nka nke ya
Mkpúrù èdè íkeDavid Kwaku Ziga bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na ọkpụite
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Afadzato site n'afọ 1965 ruo afọ 1966, ọ bụkwa onye na-elekọta Ọrụ Ziga Pottery na Ceramịk
A mụrụ Ziga na mkpụrụ ụbọchị 20 n'ọnwa Eprel nke afọ 1922 na Have Etoe na Afadzato South District, Volta Region
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Agate E
Prịmarị Skọọl na E
Middle School na Kpando O mechara gaa Achimota College iji mụọ Nka na Ọrụ aka site n'afọ 1940 ruo afọ 1944
N'afọ 1952, o ritere akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị iji mụọ ihe omume ite na ụrọ nke afọ abụọ (2) na North Staffordshire Technical College (nke bụzi Mahadum Staffordshire)
E nyere Ziga aka na ike okpuru ọchịchị Middle School na Akwatia ebe o guzobere otu ite na ụrọ n'etiti afọ 1946 n'ọnwa Julaị 1948
Site na Ọgọọst nke afọ 1948 ruo afọ 1951 ọ kụziri na Achimota College
Mgbe ọ rusiri ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Achimota College, ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ite na ụrọ na Ve Koloenu n'afọ 1951
Ziga ghọrọ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Afadzato site n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1965 ruo mgbe a kwaturu ọchịchị Nkrumah n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 1966
Ihe omume ntụrụndụ ya gụnyere Iawn tennis na ọdịmma ọha na eze

David Lanre Messan (amụrụ 4 Maachị 1983), bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye nchoputa na onye isi nke FirstFounders, [] James Currey Society Scholar, na 2015 Curator nke Lagos Global Shaper nke World Economic Forum[][]
David Lister bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri telivishọn
A mụrụ ya na South Africa, mana o bi na Port Elizabeth ugbu a
David Lister tolitere n'ugbo dị na Mpumalanga Province, South Africa
A zụrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe na Pretoria tupu e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye isi nke ngalaba ihe eji eme ihe na Kansụl nka na Transvaal
Mgbe obere oge dị ka onye na-ese foto na SABC TV, ọ hapụrụ UK wee gụọ akwụkwọ na London Film School 1972-1974
Ọ laghachiri South Africa ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na telivishọn
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2005, ọ kwagara Australia
David bi na Port Elizabeth ugbu a ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nye ụmụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi
David Lurie (amụrụ n'afọ 1951) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa, bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Ttinown
Lurie egosila na United Kingdom, Europe, United States, Australia, South Africa nakwa Middle East
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town n'afọ 1951, Lurie gụrụ akụ na ụba, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum Cape Town, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere BA Honours
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akụzi nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum, tupu ọ kwaga London School of Economics na London n'afọ1980, ebe ọ bịdọrọ nyocha na Ngalaba Mmekọrịta Mba Nile
Site n'afọ 1985, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ akụ na ụba na London
N'afọ 1990, Lurie, onye na-akụziri onwe ya foto, bidokwa ịrụ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nwa oge
Nke a ghọrọ ọrụ oge niile ya n'afọ 1995, ógè e bipụtara akwụkwọ izizi ya Life in the Liberated Zone
David Majak Chan (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2000) bụ onye South Sudan na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere
Majak malitere ọrụ ya na otu Kenya Kakamega Homeboyz
N'afọ 2019, Majak bịanyere aka na Tusker na Kenya, ebe a na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ na-emepụta asambodo ọmụmụ
N'afọ 2021, ọ bịanyere aka na klọb ụgbọ elu kachasị elu nke Sweden bụ Kalmar
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e zigara Majak na IFK Luleå na ngalaba nke atọ nke Sweden
O ruru eru ịnọchite anya Kenya na mba ụwa, ebe ọ biri ebe ahụ ihe karịrị afọ 12
David Alechenu Bonaventure Mark, GCON bụ onye Brigadier General nke ndị agha Naijiria lara ezumike nká na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Senate nke Naịjirịa site na 2007 ruo 2015 ma bụrụkwa Senator maka Benue South Senatorial District Benue State
Ọ bụ onye otu People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Tupu ọrụ ya dị ka onye omeiwu, Mark bụ Gọvanọ ndị agha nke steeti Niger site na 1984 ruo 1986 na Minista nke nkwukọrịta
A mụrụ Mark na Otukpo Benue State n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1948
Ọ gara St
Francis Catholic Practicing School tupu ọ gaa Nigerian Military School
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Nigerian Defence Academy E nyere ya ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke abụọ n'afọ 1970 wee ghọọ onye isi ụgbọ mmiri n'afọ 1971
Ọ bụ Commandant nke Static Communications na 1974, mgbe e mesịrị nwee ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka Onye isi oche nke Abandoned Properties Implementation Committee na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na 1976
Mark bụ onye isi nke ozi nke
nzikọrịta ozi na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ya Naijiria nzikọrịta ozi oke (NITEL) na Nigerian Postal Service (NIPOST)

Dị ka Minista nke nkwukọrịta, a maara Mark mgbe ụfọdụ maka okwu ya na-enweghị isi; n'oge njem njem ụbọchị abụọ nke ụlọ ọrụ na Akure na 1989, ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ union mere mkpesa na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị otu ya enwetabeghị ọganihu kemgbe 1978
Nzaghachi Mark bụ na ndị a na-akwaliteghị nwere ike ịla ezumike nká, nke pụtara na a ga-ahapụ ndị ọrụ na-adịghị arụpụta ihe

Ọ kwadokwara echiche nke ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ maka ndị ohi telivishọn, yana iwu nke iwepụ ụlọ ọrụ telivish ndụ a na-ejighị eme ihe na-ezo aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka inye onyinye na obodo ndị nwere obere iji netwọk ekwentị
A họpụtara Mark ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Senate nke Naịjirịa na June 6, 2007
David Mark gbara ọsọ maka nhọpụta ọzọ na Senate maka Benue South n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011 ma họpụta ya maka oge nke anọ
David Mark kwuru na ntuli aka ahụ gosipụtara mmeri siri ike ya, ma kpọọ ndị na-emegide ya ka ha rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ iji melite Naịjirịa
Mgbe ọ na-eduzi nyocha nke Iwu Naijiria, a kọrọ na Mark gbara ndị ọrụ ibe ya ume ka ha wepụ ọdịmma onwe ha ma lekwasị anya na ọdịmma nke ndị Naijiria
Mgbe UK katọrọ iwu Naịjirịa machibidoro ịlụ di na nwunye, na-eyi egwu ịdọrọ enyemaka mba ọzọ ha, Mark zaghachiri na ha 'kwesịrị ịnọgide na-enyere ha aka'
Mark kpọrọ mba bọọlụ gọọmenti etiti nke Naịjirịa 'ebe nrụrụ aka na mba ahụ,' na-atụ aro na ha nwere ike ịdị mkpa ịgbasa nwa oge iji nye ohere maka iwughachi
Na Septemba 2018 ọ na-atụ anya ịbụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala ma họpụta Zainab Abdulkadir Kure dị ka onye njikwa mkpọsa ya na Abba Ejembi dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere mkpọsa ya
Ọ na-enwe mmasị na golf, tennis, na squash
Ọ bụ onye Idoma Christian, O nwere 4-5 Ndị Nwunye
Mark nwere ụlọ ime obodo nwere helikọpta na helipad
David Kakuta Mulwa (a mụrụ na 9 Eprel 1945) bụ onye Kenya na-ede akwụkwọ, agụmakwụkwọ, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye nkuzi nka ihe nkiri na Kenyatta University's School of Visual and Performing Arts
A mụrụ ya na Mukaa, Machakos County, Kenya, Mulwa gara Mahadum Nairobi
N'ịbụ onye ndị prọfesọ ya gbara ume, ọ gara UCLA na agụmakwụkwọ Rockefeller Foundation ma nweta nzere masta na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1974, Mulwa sonyeere Mahadum Kenyatta, Nairobi,
Mulwa malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Mukaa High School na Kangundo High School, Machakos n'etiti afọ 1968 na 1970
Ọ gara Mahadum Ohio ebe ọ bụ onye enyemaka nkuzi n'qsụsụ Bekee tupu ọ gaa Athens n'etiti afọ 1979 na 1980
Ọ kwagara Mahadum Kenyatta, ebe ọ nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ na anọ
Mulwa na-akụzi ihe nkiri (History of theatre), ihe nkiri, ide egwuregwu, iduzi na ime ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye na-ekpe ikpe na Kenya Drama Festivals Committee, Nairobi, kemgbe afọ 1978 ma na-ejekwa ozi dịka onye otu na kansụl na-achị achị, Kenya Cultural Centre Committee, Nairobi
E nyewo ya ihe nrite Hero site na kansụl na-achị Mahadum Kenyatta nakwa site na Kenya Film Commission ugboro abụọ; na Kalasha Award for lifetime Achievement and Theatre Lifetime Achievement
David Sunsly Mungoshi (30 Septemba 1949 -29 Ọgọst 2020) bụ onye Zimbabwean na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede uri na onye nkuzi
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1949 na Bulawayo, Zimbabwe ma na-asụ Shona, Ndebele na Bekee nke ọma
Ọ mụtara Zulu, nke yiri Ndebele, nke n'oge ahụ a na-ahụghị dịka asụsụ dị iche, n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1970, ọ malitere ịkụzi na St Annes Goto Primary School na Hwedza
Ọ lụrụ ọgụ na mmalite nke ọrụ edemede ya, ebe ụfọdụ kwenyere na ọ na-ede naanị n'ihi na nwanne ya nwoke, onye guzobere Charles Mungoshi, na-ede akwụkwọ, ma ọ bụ na nwanne ya dere ha

N'afọ 1975, ọ debanyere aha maka BA na Bekee na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Rhodesia Mungoshi bụ onye nkuzi maka ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya, ma kụzie na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Mahadum Zimbabwe
Mungoshi bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ma ruo n'afọ 2011 gosipụtara na ihe nkiri ncha Studio 263, yana ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, The Postman, na ihe nkiri Secrets
Ọ biri na Gweru mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká
O meriri na National Arts Merit Awards nke afọ 2010 Outstanding Fiction Book maka The Fading Sun
Ọ bụ nwanne Charles Mungoshi
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 29 ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2020

David de Sousa Nascimento (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 16 Machị 1966), ma ọ bụ naanị Nascimento, bụ onye nkuzi bọọlụ nke Cape Verdean na onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Jọdan
A mụrụ ya na São Vicente, Cape Verde, ọ bụ onye Cape Verde mbụ nwere ikikere UEFA Pro
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ogologo oge dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ ọkachamara na Portugal na Netherlands, ebe ọ gbara ihe karịrị egwuregwu 500
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọkwa njikwa dị iche iche na Netherlands, Mexico na South Africa
David Njoku (/ɪnˈdʒoʊku/ in-JOE-koo; amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1996) bụ onye American football tight end nke Cleveland Browns nke National Football League (NFL)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Miami (FL)
Ndị Browns debara ya na agba nke mbụ nke Ndebanye NFL nke afọ 2017
Njoku bụ otu n'ime ụmụ itoolu ndị nne na nna Naijiria mụrụ bụ ndị kwagara na obodo United States
Ọ gara ụlọakwụkwọ sekondiri Cedar Grove dị na Cedar Grove, New Jersey
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ, o nwere nnabata iri asaa na isii na yaadi otu puku narị asaa na iri itoolu na anọ na touchdowns iri na itoolu
Njoku bụ onye na-enweta bọọlụ atọ, ọ gara Miami (FL)
igwu bọọlụ kọleji maka ọchịchọ sitere na kọleji Boston nke Steeti Ohio na Temple
Njoku mekwara asọmpi na iwuli elu na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, merie asọmpi mba na New Balance Nationals Outdoor n'afọ ikpeazụ ya nke afọ 2014

Mgbe ọ gbasịrị redshirt n'afọ mbụ ya na Miami n'afọ 2014, Njoku gbara bọọlụ ugboro anọ nime ugboro iri na ato a kpọpụtara ya dịka onye ga eso agba bọọlụ n'afọ 2015 ma nwee nnabata ugboro iri abụọ na ise nime yaadi nari atọ na iri isii na abụọ na otu touchdown N'afọ 2016, o nwere nnabata iri anọ na atọ n'ime yaadi nari isii na iri itoolu na asatọ na touchdowns asatọ Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, Njoku kpebiri ịhapụ afọ abụọ fọdụrụnụ ma banye na Nhoputa NFL nke afọ 2017
Ebe e si nweta ya
Njoku natara akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù na NFL Combine ma mechaa ihe niile jikọtara na ọzụzụ ọnọdụ
Na mgbakwunye, ọ gara Miami's Pro Day wee họrọ kwa egwuregwu ịwụli elu, na-awịli elu, shuttle dị mkpirikpi, ịgba ọsọ yaadi iri anọ , igba ọsọ yaadi iri abụọ na ịgba ọsọ haadi iri
Ndị ọkachamara Nhọpụta na ndị nyocha NFL mere atụmatụ na a ga-ahọrọ Njoku na agba nke mbụ nke nhọrọ ahụ

A họpụtara ya dị ka nke atọ kachasị mma na ebe nhọrọ nke Nkọwa egwuregwu ma họpụta ya dị ka njedebe nke abụọ kachasị mma site na ESPN, onye nyocha NFL Mike Mayock, na onye nyocha NFL Bucky BrooksÀtụ Nfl predraftCleveland Browns họọrọ Njoku na agba nke mbụ (onye nke iri abụọ na itoolu n'ozuzu) nke Nhọrọ NFl nke afọ 2017
Ọ bụ onye nke atọ a họpụtara na nhọrọ ahụ
N'ụbọchị nke iri na ise nke ọnwa June afọ 2017, Cleveland Browns bịanyere Njoku aka na nkwekọrịta zuru oke, nke afọ anọ, nde $ 952 nke gụnyere ego mbinye aka nke nde $ 506
N'ụbọchị nke iri n'ọnwa Septemba, Njoku mere mpụta NFL mbụ ya na mmeri 21-18 na Pittsburgh Steelers
O nwere nnata abụọ maka yaadi isi abụọ
na egwuregwu nke izu nke abụọ na mmegide Baltimore Ravens,, o nwere nnata atọ na yaadi iri abụọ na asaa na touchdown mbụ ya na NFL na mmeri 24-10
Ọ mechara afọ ọhụrụ ya na nhọta iri atọ na abụọ na yaadi narị atọ a iri asato na isii na touchdown anọ
N'afọ 2018, Njoku banyere n'oge ahụ dị ka Browns na-amalite na njedebe siri ike
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'egwuregwu iri na isii niile ma bido egwuregwu iri na anọ, na-edekọ nhọta iri ise na isii n'ime yaadị narị isii na iri atọ na itoolu na touchdowns anọ
N'izu nke abụọ nke oge 2019, Njoku dara n'isi ya wee hapụ egwuregwu ahụ megide New York Jets n'ihi mgbagwoju anya
Otú ọ dị, ka e mesịrị n'izu ahụ, e kpughere na Njoku nwere nkwonkwo aka gbajiri agbaji n'otu egwuregwu ahụ
E debere ya na ndị merụrụ ahụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2019
A họpụtara ya ka ọ laghachi site na ndị merụrụ ahụ n'ụbọchị nke iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2019, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na ndị otu ahụ ọzọ
A malitere ya n'ụbọchị nke asaa nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, ndị Browns gosipụtara nhọrọ afọ nke ise na nkwekọrịta Njoku
E debere Njoku na ndị merụrụ ahụ n'ubochi iri na anọ nme ọnwa Septemba afọ 2020, na mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere, otu ụbọchị mgbe o weputara nhota atọ nime yaadi iri ise na touchdown megide Baltimore Ravens
A malitere ya n'ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Ọktoba
N'izu nke ise megide Los Angeles Chargers, Njoku jidere passes asaa nime yaadị otu nari na iri anọ na itoolu ya na touchdown, na akara na-abịa site na nhọrọ yaadị iri asaa na otu na-ịgba ọsọ
Browns ga-aga n'ihu dịkae meriri ha 47-42 na egwuregwu
Browns debere akara ngosi na Njoku n'ubochi asaa nke onwa Machị afọ 2022
N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2022, Njoku bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ, nde $ 5675

David Chidozie Okereke (bụ onye amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1997)
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-anodu n'ihu maka ụlọ ọrụ Serie A Cremonese
O nyere ndị Spezia goolu nke mbụ ya na Serie B n'abali itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2016 na egwuregwu megidere Novara
N'afọ 2018, o nyere goolu iri na enyemaka iri na atọ n'egwuregwu iri atọ na atọ
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2019, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ nke Club Brugge

N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, Okereke sonyeere otu egwuregwu Serie A Venezia nke e buliri elu na mgbazinye ego ogologo oge na ohere nhọrọ iji mee ka nnyefe ahụ bụrụ nke na-adịgide adịgide
N'abali iri abọụ na asatọ n'ime onwa Julaị n'afọ 2022, Okereke sonyeere Cremonese, na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ maka ego a kọrọ na ọ bụ € 10 nde
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2020, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa COVID-19

David Oscar Dogbe (a mụrụ na 16 Eprel 1984) bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
A maara ya maka idu ndị otu GHComedy, nke lụrụ ọgụ iji nweta ọhụhụ na nnabata maka ndị na-eme ihe ọchị na Ghana na-abịanụ
David Oscar mechara kwụsị ọrụ ya na-ime ihe ọchị ka ọ bụrụ onye egwu reggae

Ya na ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu na Ghana, nke bụ, Afriyie Wutah na mba ụwa n'afọ 2014 BEFFTA Awards (UK) Winner for spoken word, Lyric Da Nkechi A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Ghana's Best Comedy Icon na ihe ngosi, 'Stars of the Future', nke Charter House Ghana haziri
A mụrụ David na Koforidua na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana nye Maazị Oscar Yaovi Adukpo na Oriakụ Faustina Mary Asamoah Adukpo
O nwere ụmụnne atọ; ụmụnne nwoke abụọ, Isaac Oscar Ohene Adukpo na Bright Nana Osei Oscar Adukpo na nwanne nwanyị Felicia Mawuena Oscar
David gara Nursery, Primary na Junior High School na Freeman Methodist School na Koforidua
Ọ gara n'ihu na Pope John Senior High School na Junior Seminary ebe ọ gụrụ Visual Arts
N'afọ 2007, David Oscar gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Performing Arts na Mahadum nke Ghana nakwa Bachelor of Fine Arts Program

N'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ ka nọ na mahadum, a họpụtara David ka ọ bụrụ Ghana's Best Comedy Icon mgbe o sonyere na usoro ihe nkiri 'Stars of the Future' nke Charter House Ghana haziri, ebe ọ pụtara n'elu n'ime ihe karịrị otu puku ndị na-eme ihe ọchị na-abịanụ

David Olaniyi Oyedepo (amụrụ na Septemba 27, 1954) bụ onye nkwusa Naijiria, onye edemede Ndị Kraịst, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-ewu ụlọ na onye guzobere Living Faith Church Worldwide, na onye isi Bishọp nke Faith Tabernacle na Ota, Ogun State, Nigeria
A makwaara ụka ahụ dị ka Winners' Chapel International

The Winners' Chapel International network of churches is located in over 300 cities, in all states of Nigeria, and in several cities in 45 African nations, Dubai, the United Kingdom and the United States, Europe, Asia and Canada
A hụla Oyedepo dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Christian charismatic movement na Africa ma kpọọ ya otu n'ime ndị nkwusa kachasị ike na Nigeria
Ọ bụ Chancellor nke Covenant University na Landmark University
Magazin Forbes kpọrọ ya aha n'afọ 2011 dịka pastọ kachasị baa ụba na Naịjirịa
Na Septemba 27, 1954, a mụrụ David Olaniyi Oyedepo na Osogbo, Nigeria, mana ọ bụ onye Omu-Aran, Irepodun Local Government Area nke Kwara State
A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ okpukpe agwakọta
Nna ya, Ibrahim, bụ onye Alakụba na-agwọ ọrịa
Nne ya, Dorcas, bụ onye otu Holy Order of the Cherubim and Seraphim Movement Church (C&S), alaka nke Aladura movement na Nigeria
Ọ bụ nne nne ya zụlitere ya na Osogbo, onye mere ka ọ mata omume ọma nke ndụ Ndị Kraịst site n'ekpere ụtụtụ nke ya na ya gara
Ọ kụzikwaara ya mkpa inye otu ụzọ n'ụzọ iri
Oyedepo gụrụ ihe owuwu na Kwara State Polytechnic Ilorin
O nwetakwara PhD na Human Development na Mahadum Honolulu, Hawaii, US
Oyedepo rụrụ ọrụ obere oge na Federal Ministry of Housing na Ilorin tupu ọ hapụ ọrụ iji lekwasị anya na ọrụ ozi ala ọzọ
N'afọ 1982, ọ lụrụ Florence Abiola Akano (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Faith Oyedepo)
Ha mụtara ụmụ anọ (David Jr, Isaac, Love na Joyce)
Kenneth Copeland họpụtara David Oyedepo Jr na Isaac Oyedepo dịka ndị pastọ na Mee 2007

David Oyedepo Jr bụbu pastọ na London Branch of the Church ya na nwunye ya, Kemi mana ọ bụzi pastọ bi na isi ụlọ ụka nke Ministry (Faith Tabernacle) ebe Isaac Oyedepo pastọ Winners' Chapel International, Maryland, na United States of America ya na nwunye ya Ayomitide
Nwa ya nwanyị mbụ bụ Love lụrụ Stephen Ogah, onye bụkwa onye pastọ na Winners' Chapel
Joyce Priscilla bụ nwa ikpeazụ na nwa nwanyị nke abụọ
Ọ lụrụ Abimbola Abodunrin n'afọ 2020
DODOS bụ atụmatụ nke Covenant University Alumni Association guzobere iji kwalite onyinye na ndụ nke Oyedepo
Malite na 27 Septemba 2012, ụbọchị ọmụmụ Oyedepo, a na-atụ anya na ndị mmadụ gburugburu ụwa na-ejikọta na atụmatụ a ga-egosi ọrụ onyinye nye ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, òtù ma ọ bụ ọha mmadụ n'ozuzu ya
David Oyetokunbo Oyelowo OBE (/oʊˈjɛloʊwoʊ/ oh-YEL-oh-woh; a mụrụ na 1 Eprel 1976) bụ onye Britain na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye mmepụta
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere Critics 'Choice Award, Screen Actors Guild Award, na nhọpụta maka Golden Globe Awards abụọ, Primetime Emmy Awards abụọ, na BAFTA Award
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Order of the British Empire (OBE) maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri
Oyelowo ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka igosi Martin Luther King Jr
na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ Selma (2014) na Peter Snowdin nakwa ihe nkiri HBO (2014), ha abụọ nwetaara ya otuto dị egwu
O nwetakwara otuto maka ọrụ ya dịka Louis Gaines na The Butler (2013), Seretse Khama na A United Kingdom (2016) na Robert Katende nakwa Queen of Katwe (2016)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri Rise of the Planet of the Apes (2011), The Help (2011), Lincoln (2012), Red Tails (2012), na Jack Reacher (2012)
O nyekwara olu maka Agent Alexsandr Kallus nakwa Lucasfilm Animation series Star Wars Rebels (2014–2018)
A mụrụ Oyelowo na 1 Eprel 1976 na Oxford, Oxfordshire, England, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria
Nna ya, Stephen, si Oyo State, Western Nigeria, nne ya si Edo State, Southern Nigeria
A zụlitere ya dịka onye Baptist

O tolitere na ala na Tooting Bec, South London, ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara Lagos, Nigeria, ebe nna ya na-arụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu mba nakwa nne ya na-arụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Oyelowo tolitere na-efe Sidney Poitier na Denzel Washington
Oyelowo gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi 'ụdị ndị agha' nke akpọrọ Lagos State Model College, Meiran
Ha laghachiri London mgbe Oyelowo dị afọ iri na anọ, biri na Islington
Oyelowo bụ omoba (ma ọ bụ ọkpara eze) nke alaeze Awe, akụkụ nke usoro ndị isi Naịjirịa, nna nna ya bụ eze nke 'akụkụ nke Oyo Steeti a na-akpọ Awe'
O kwuru banyere nzụlite ya 'Ọ na-ada ụda karịa ka ọ dị n'ezie

E nwere ọtụtụ ezinụlọ eze na Afrịka,' 'ezinụlọ ndị eze bụ otu dime iri na abụọ na Naịjirịa'; 'ihe anyị na-eche dịka ndị eze na UK dị nnọọ iche na ndị eze na Naịjirịa ọ bụrụ na ị ga-atụba nkume n'ebe ahụ, ị ga-atụta ọkpara eze iri atọ
Ya mere, ọ dị ntakịrị ka ịbụ Prince nke Islington ọ bara uru maka inweta ụbọchị ma eleghị anya ọ bụghị ọtụtụ ihe ọzọ
Mgbe ọ debanyere aha na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na City na Islington College, onye nkụzi ya tụrụ aro ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Oyelowo debara aha otu afọ na ọmụmụ ntọala ime ihe nkiri, na London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art (LAMDA)
Ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ afọ atọ ya n'afọ 1998
Ọ nọkwara nwa oge na National Youth Theatre
N'afọ 2012, Oyelowo pụtara na Middle of Nowhere

Onye edemede na onye nduzi Ava DuVernay bụ onye na-akwado ọrụ ya ma tụlee ịrịọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ahụ, mana tupu ya enwee ike, Oyelowo natara edemede ahụ n'ụzọ dabara adaba site n'aka enyi enyi DuVernay bụ onye nọ ọdụ n'akụkụ ya n'ụgbọelu ma na-atụle itinye ego na ọrụ ahụ
N'otu afọ ahụ, Oyelowo pụtara na Lee Daniels 'The Paperboy, nke sọrọ mpi maka Palme d'Or na 2012 Cannes Film Festival Oyelowo sonyeere Daniels n'afọ sochirinụ na The Butler

N'afọ 2014, Oyelowo guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta onwe ya, Yoruba Saxon Productions nke mepụtara ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara ya gụnyere, Nightingale, Captive, Five Nights in Maine, na nso nso a, A United Kingdom
Ya na DuVernay rụkọrọ ọrụ ọzọ maka Selma (2014), na-eme ka onye na-ahụ maka ikike obodo Martin Luther King Jr
A na-eme ya na Lupita Nyong'o na ihe nkiri nke Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie akwụkwọ akụkọ Americanah

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa na Oyelowo esonyela Peter Rabbit na James Corden, Rose Byrne nakwa Domhnall Gleeson na-ekwughachi ọrụ ha dịka aha aha, Bea na Thomas McGregor maka usoro ya nke a ga-ewepụta na Machị 2021
N'afọ 2020, Oyelowo sonyeere George Clooney na ihe nkiri Netflix The Midnight Sky N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ụlọ ọrụ Yoruba Saxon ya bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mbụ ya na Disney
A na-ewerekwa Oyelowo ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ, nke ga-adabere na 'onye ọrụ ụgbọelu Tuskegee lara ezumike nká nke na-ewere uwe Rocketeer'
Maka ihe ngosi ya nke Martin Luther King Jr
na Selma, Oyelowo natara NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actor in a Motion Picture
O nwetara nhọpụta Golden Globe Award mbụ ya maka Best Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama, ebe ọ na-enwetakwa nhọpụta maka Critics 'Choice Movie Award for Best Actor

Nakwa n'afọ 2014, maka arụmọrụ ya na Nightingale, o nwetara mmeri Critics 'Choice Television Award for Best Actor in a Movie/Miniseries ma a họpụtara ya maka Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Limited Series or Movie, Golden Globe Award for Best Actor – Miniseries or Television Film, NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actor in a Television Movie, Mini-Series or Dramatic Special and a Satellite Award for Best Actor – Miniseries or Television Film
A họpụtara Oyelowo ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Order of the British Empire (OBE) na 2016 New Year Honours maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jessica Oyelowo, onye ọ zutere na LAMDA na onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ anọ
Ha bi na Los Angeles, California
Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, Oyelowo ekwuola na ya kwenyere na Chineke kpọrọ ya ka ọ kpọọ Rev
Martin Luther King Jr
Na-atụgharị uche n'ihe ngosi ya nke Eze na ihe nkiri Selma, Oyelowo kwusiri ike 'Amaara m mgbe niile na iji kpọọ Dr
King, aghaghị m ikwe ka Chineke na-agafe m n'ihi na mgbe ị hụrụ Dr
King na-ekwu okwu ndị ahụ, ị na-ahụ na ọ na-agagharị na ite ya mmanụ
Nwa amaala abụọ, Oyelowo na nwunye ya ghọrọ ụmụ amaala US na 20 Julaị 2016
N'ime nke a, o kwuru, sị 'M mere ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Selma

na ihe nkiri ahụ na-elekwasị anya na ikike ịtụ vootu ma ebiela m ebe a ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ugbu a na ịgagharị ma na-eme ihe nkiri banyere ikike ịtụ vootu na ịgwa ndị mmadụ ka ha mee ntuli aka, ị pụghị ịtụ vootu n'onwe gị bụ obere ihu abụọ
