David Richard bụ onye ọka iwu gburugburu ebe obibi Canada, onye ndọrọndọrọ na onye nnọchi anya mba
ọ bụ United Nations pụrụ iche onye na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibii
David Grant Rosen (ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1959 rụọ úbọchị àtó n'ọnwa Machị 2014) bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town, South Africa, David Rosen gụrụ akwụkwọ na Sea Point Boys High School
Na mbido, o gosipụtara nkwa dị ka onye na-ese ihe ma merie asọmpi iji mepụta ihe ngosi màkà ekwentị mkpanaaka igbu onwé ónyé
E gosipụtara ntinye mmeri ya dị ka mgbasa ozi na bọs obodo Cape Town
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1976, e debara aha ya n'akwụkwọ ruo afọ abụọ na South African 6th Infantry Division
Mgbè otu afọ gasịrị, e zigara ya na Youngsfield Anti-Aircraft Base na Cape Town ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na magazin Battalion dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise
N'afọ 1980-81 ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Cape Technikon School of Art
N'afọ 1982-83 ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na School of Contemporary Art na Cape Town
N'afọ 1983, David Rosen guzobere akara ejiji izizi ya nke a na-akpọ Electric Affair (maka Momentum Clothing)
O mepụtara uwe na-abụghị nke denim, ma ree ya n'etiti agbụrụ n'ahịa ka na-ekewapụ onwé ya
O mekwara uwe elu mbụ ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ihe na-emegide nuklia nke na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ nuklia Koeberg pụta ìhè, na-adịghị ányá site n'ebe ọ bi
N'afọ 1984, o guzobere azụmahịa nke ya, ya na Laurie Dreyer si Chelsea West na Bad Boys Clothing
A na-akpọ akara ahụ 'Affair of State'

N'afọ 1985, gọọmentị na-ahụ màkà ịkpa ókè agbụrụ machibidoro uwe elu ya iwu ma mgbè ọ pụtara n'ihu akwụkwọ akụkọ The Cape Times, ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ Màkà nchekwa weghaara ihe ọ bụla nwere akara ya na akara edemede ákwà màkà ndị mmadụ site na davidá
N'ịbụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na gburugburu ebe obibi okike n'ozuzu ya wutere, David kwagara obodo New York
N'afọ 1986, ya na ónyé mmekọ ya bụ Danny Forman (Forecaster of Boston) guzobere ụlọ ọrụ State NYC na-emepụta ihe ndị dị mma na nkè oge a
Site na 1986 ruo mmalite nkè afọ 1990 David mere aha ya na obodo New York, na-ere nnukwu ụlọ ahịa pụrụ iche na ngalaba dị ka Bloomingdales, Macy's na Patricia Field
Na mbido afọ 2000, David kwagara Boston
Bush
David mepụtara uwe 'WMD Weapons of Mass Deception' iji meghachi omume na esemokwu gbasara ngwá agha Iraq nke nnukwu mbibi
'M na-eme, m na-eme', m na-emekarị' ya na arụmụka gbasara alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị
O kwukwara màkà esemokwu gbasara nlekota na-arịwanye elu na imewe 'Otu Mba Nlekota'
Atụmatụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere 'nweta ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya?', ihe na-atọ ọchị na mgbasa ozi nwere mmiri ara ehi
N'afọ 2008, a chọpụtara na David nwere ọrịa kansa akpa ume ma lụọ ọgụ site na ọgwụgwọ ruo oge ụfọdụ
Mgbè ọ na-agwọ ọrịa na Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, ọ bịdọrọ idekọ akwụkwọ ndekọ anya nke ahụmịhe ahụ gụnyere ime ihe osise nkè Infusion Rooms
Nke a ghọrọ ihe ndabere màkà ihe ngosi mbụ ya 'Hotel Chemo', nchịkọta nke ihe osise na ihe odide
Ọrịa kansa gbanwere echiche nka ya kpamkpam
Site n'afọ 2008 ruo n'oge ọnwụ ya n'afọ 2014, ọ wepụtara uwe elu ole na ole ma lekwasị anya na usoro nka site na eserese ya, ihe osise, ihe ọkpụkpụ na ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
Karịsịa, o lekwasịrị anya na surrealist automatism dị ka ngwá ọrụ ọgwụgwọ
N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, ọ na-achọsi ike ijide oge ụfọdụ n'ịmepụta ihe osise, oge ọ na-akwụsịtụ na naanị màkà nke abụọ ahụ, ihe osise ahụ zuru ezu
O jiri resin chekwaa oge ndị a, nke ọ kpọrọ 'akpụkpọ'
David Swanson (Amụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye America na-emegide agha, onye na-ede blọgụ na onye edemede
Ọ bi na Virginia ugbu a ma bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke World Beyond War
Swanson nwetara nzere Master of Philosophy na Mahadum Virginia n'afọ 1997

David Ejikeme Uzochukwu (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke nke ịrị n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Austria na Naijiria onye na-ese foto nke na-elekwasị anya na foto eserese nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brussels na Berlin
Ọ bụ onye na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị
A mụrụ David Ejikeme Uzochukwu na Innsbruck, Austria, nne ya bụ onye Austria ebe nna ya bụ onye Naijiria
A zụlitere ya na Innsbruck, tupu ọ kwaga Luxembourg na Brussels
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ bi na Vienna na Berlin ebe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ inweta Bachelor of Fine Arts na nkà ihe ọmụma na Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin
Uzochukwu malitere site na ise onwe ya wee gbanwee gaa na-ise foto na okike
Foto ya na-agwakọta ngwucha mmepụta na foto dị omimi, na-enyekarị ihe eserese nke ịnọpụ iche na-adabere n'ahụ ya na ngosipụta anụ ahụ nke anwụrụ ọkụ, ígwé ojii, mmiri, na ọkụ

Ihe oyiyi ya na-egosi, dịka ọmụmaatụ, mbara igwe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke na-aghọ mgbidi, kristal nke na-ese n'etiti ikuku, ájá mgbawa ugwu nke na-aghọ ihe mkpuchi nkasi obi, ma ọ bụ ọbara nke na-aghọ ihe mkpuchi
Ọrụ ya na-egosipụtakarị ihe ndị ọ chọpụtara banyere agbụrụ na queerness
Na Unseen Amsterdam, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ gosipụtara usoro foto nke jiri onyinyo nke ihe ndị e kere eke dị na mmiri, nke nwere nku, ọdụ, ma ọ bụ ezé dị nkọ
N'afọ 2019, Uzochukwu na-ekwu na ọrụ ndị a na-egosipụta 'ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ onye a kpọrọ 'onye ojii', inwe echiche mmegbu nke agbụrụ a na-amanye, ma na-enwe ọganihu n'agbanyeghị nke ahụ'
Ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ ememe nke ndị na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria
Ihe osise ọ bụla na-elekwasị anya na 'ike nkpaghasị' nke ndị nka a na-eji iji kwaa ókèala ma mee ka ihe mee

Ọrụ ya sitere na mkpali nke sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe dịka onye America na-ese foto Gregory Crewdson na onye Kenya-American na-ese ihe Wangechi Mutu, onye ọrụ ya na-ewu eluigwe na ala nke na-ejikọta nwoke na nwanyị, agbụrụ, akụkọ ihe mere eme, na njirimara onwe onye
N'afọ 2016, e gosipụtara usoro ya A Familiar Ruin na BOZAR Center for Fine Arts dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi Dey Your Lane!, nke onye Naijiria Azu Nwagbogu haziri
Uzochukwu malitere ịse foto mgbe ọ dị obere
O jiri igwefoto nne ya na-ese ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ọ malitere ịkekọrịta foto ya n'ọtụtụ ebe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Uzochukwu bụrụ ọkachamara ma bịanye aka na Iconoclast Image na Gallery 8
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, FKA Twigs họpụtara Uzochukwu ka ọ gbaa mkpọsa dị mkpa maka Nike na Mexico

Uzochukwu mepụtara mkpọsa maka ndị ahịa dị ka Adobe Photoshop, The Paris Opera (Opéra National de Paris), Dior, Nike, Iris van Herpen, na World Wildlife Fund, ma soro ndị na-ese ihe dịka FKA Twigs, Ibeyi, Benjamin Clementine, Labrinth, Little Dragon, na Pharell Williams rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ ya EyeEm Photographer of the Year, yana otu n'ime Flickr's inaugural 20under20
N'afọ 2015, o so na mmadụ ole na ole ahọpụtara maka Adobe Photoshop's 25 Under 25 wee nata Canon x Exhibitr Student Photography Award
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya maka CPH LAB 2019/2020, mmemme mmepe talent nke CPH DOX Copenhagen International Documentary Festival

David Vlok bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu nke mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Tim Voster na South African tele-soap a kpọrọ Egoli Place of Gold

David Williams (Nọvemba 21, 1950 Machị 6, 2009) bụ ónyé America na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, ónyé na-agụ egwu, ónyé na'ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka onye a ma ama na-akpọ egwu màkà kpakpando dị ka Madonna na Michael Jackson
Williams tolitere na Newport News, Virginia
Mgbe ọ dị obérè, ndị na-ese egwu jazz dị ka Kenny Burrell na Wes Montgomery nwèrè mmetụta n'ebe ọ nọ
O mechara malite ọrụ egwu ya na Dells
A kwụsịrị ọrụ a mgbè ọ gara ije ozi na Agha Vietnam
Mgbè ọ laghachiri na 1972 ọ kwagara Los Angeles iji sonyere ndị Dells
Williams rụkwara ọrụ na Temptations n'oge ahụ
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ya na ónyé bassist James Jamerson, Jr, guzobere otu R&B Chanson
Chanson gara n'ihu wepụta egwu 1978 'Don't Hold Back' nke rịrị elu ruo No
21, # 11 na No
8 na Hot 100, Dance Club na Hot R&B Songs chaatị
Though he played on a number of tours with Michael Jackson, Madonna and others, Williams remained a behind-the-scenes union session player
Williams died of cardiac arrest on March 6, 2009, in Hampton, Virginia at age 58, three months before Jackson's death, also from cardiac arrest
Ọ bụ nna onye bụbu Lizzie McGuire na Raise Your Voice star Davida Williams, na ónyé na-agụ egwu Dana Williams
David Woodard (amụrụ 6 Eprel 1964, na Santa Barbara, California) bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye edemede America
David Adedeji Adeleke (amụrụ na Nọvemba 21, 1992), nke a maara dị ka Davido, bụ onye America ede-Nigerian na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Davido na-agwakọta ihe ọdịnala Afrịka na pop zuru ụwa ọnụKpọpụta njehie Closing tag Davido bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne ise na nwa nwoke nke abụọ nna ya mụrụ
Ọ gara British International School na Lagos, Nigeria, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ laghachiri United States iji mụọ nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Oakwood dị na Alabama
Davido zụtara ngwá egwu mgbe ọ nọ na Oakwood wee malite ịkụ egwu
Ya na ụmụ nwanne nna ya B-Red na Sina Rambo rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụta egwu KB International Davido hapụrụ Mahadum Oakwood iji gbasoo egwu oge niile wee kwaga London, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na olu ya
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 2011, Davido kwụsịrị ọrụ egwu ya ma kwenye ịsọpụrụ nna ya site na ịdebanye aha na Mahadum Babcock
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2015, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Babcock na nzere na egwu mgbe nna ya kwụrụ mahadum iji malite ngalaba egwu maka klas izizi nke otu nwa akwụkwọ
Davido malitere ịrụ ọrụ na abọm studio mbụ ya Omo Baba Olowo n'afọ 2011
Egwú abọm ahụ bụ ngwakọta nke Afrobeats na hip hop
Davido na Jay Sleek, Maleek Berry, GospelOnDeBeatz, Spellz, Dokta Frabz, Mr
Chidoo, Theory Soundz na Shizzi rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụta abọm ahụ
Omo Baba Olowo gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Naeto C, Sina Rambo, B-Red, Kayswitch, Ice Prince na 2 Face Idibia
Ọ natara nyocha na-adịghị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ egwu, bụ ndị na-enyocha ọdịnaya egwu ya na edemede egwu Davido
Abọm ahụ meriri Best R&B / Pop Album ma nata nhọpụta maka Album nke Afọ na The Headies 2013
A họpụtakwara ya maka Best Album of the Year na 2013 Nigeria Entertainment Awards
E wepụtara egwu nke atọ nke abọm ahụ 'Ekuro' na Jenụwarị 25, 2012
Antwan Smith dekọrọ ma duzie vidio egwu ya na Miami
Onye na-agụ egwu Naịjirịa bụ Aramide wepụtara egwu egwu ahụ
E wepụtara egwu nke anọ nke abọm ahụ 'Overseas' na Mee 6, 2012; a tọhapụrụ nsụgharị nke abụ ahụ na-agwụ agwụ tupu ewepụta ya
E wepụtara egwu GospelOnDeBeatz mepụtara 'All of You' dị ka egwu nke ise nke abọm ahụ na Septemba 28, 2012
Davido gwara Factory 78 TV na ya na GospelOnDeBeatz dekọrọ egwu ahụ mgbe ọ zutere ya n'otu ụlọ ahịa
Na Febụwarị 25, 2013, Davido wepụtara egwu Shizzi mepụtara 'Gobe'
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke abụọ na ndepụta Premium Times nke egwu iri kachasị elu nke afọ 2013
Na nyocha maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard, Charles Mgbolu kwuru na abụ ahụ 'na-atọ ụtọ site na mmalite ruo n'isi'
Vidio egwu nke 'Gobe' bụ nke Godfather Productions dekọrọ na South Africa
Davido kwupụtara na Twitter 'One of a Kind' ga-apụta na May 13, 2013
Ọ bụkwa Shizzi mepụtara egwu a
Vidio nke 'One of a Kind' bụ Tebza nke Godfather Productions dekọrọ ma duzie na South Africa
Ọ na-egosi Afrịka dị n'otu nke nwere ọdịbendị na egwu
A kwadoro 'Skelewu' na vidiyo egwu abụọ
E wepụtara vidiyo egwu mbụ, nke Sesan duziri, na 15 Ọktoba 2013
E bugoro ya na YouTube site na iji akaụntụ parody
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe a tọhapụrụ vidiyo ahụ, Davido kwuru na mmadụ raara ya nye site na iwepụta ya nakwa na ya na Moe Musa, onye nduzi vidio egwu nke UK ga-eme vidiyo ọzọ

Na nkwupụta nke ndị otu ya wepụtara, Sesan kwuru na Davido nwere afọ ojuju na onyinye ya na vidiyo egwu ahụ; o kwukwara na ọ gaghị eto eto ka Davido na ndị njikwa ya wepụta nkwupụta ezighi ezi iji kwatuo akara ya
Moe Musa dekọrọ ma duzie vidiyo egwu nke 'Skelewu' na London, ma wepụta ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2013

Na June 2014, Davido na Mi Casa, Lola Rae, Sarkodie, Diamond Platnumz na Tiwa Savage rụkọrọ ọrụ na 'Africa Rising', abụ nke e ji mee ihe maka mgbasa ozi DStv iji kpalie ndị Afrịka isonye na ọrụ itinye ego na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Vidio egwu nke 'Africa Rising' bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke South Africa bụ Callback Dreams dekọrọ ma duzie
Ndị na-ese egwu ahụ mere egwu ahụ na mmemme mmeghe Africa Rising na Mauritius
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2015, Davido wepụtara egwu ọnyà Meek Mill nyere aka 'Fans Mi'
Ọ na-akwa ndị na-akwado ya emo na ọdịyo na foto ndị dị n'azụ ihe nkiri nke vidiyo ahụ tupu ewepụta ya
E bu ụzọ wepụta abọm iri abụọ nke Davido bụ The Baddest na June 2015 mana e yigharịrị ntọhapụ ya na October 10 n'afọ ahụ
Ụbọchị abụọ tupu ụbọchị a, echedoro album ahụ n'ihi mmasị ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọghị aha na ikesa ya
Davido wepụtara ihe mkpuchi album ahụ na ndepụta egwu na mbido afọ ahụ
The Baddest ga-egosipụta mmepụta site na Shizzi, Del B, Spellz, J Fem, Don Jazzy, Puffy Tee, Uhuru, Kiddominant na Young John
Ọ ga-egosipụtakwa ndị ọbịa dịka P-Square, Don Jazzy, Runtown, Uhuru, DJ Buckz, Akon, Meek mill, Wale na Trey Songz
Na Jenụwarị 2016, Davido kwupụtara na Twitter na ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Sony Music; ọkwa ya zutere mmeghachi omume dị iche iche
Akwụkwọ ndekọ ahụ wepụtara akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi iji gosipụta nkwekọrịta ahụ
Nkwekọrịta ndekọ nke Davido na Sony chọrọ ka ọ wepụta abọm abụọ ma nye ya ohere ijide ikike maka egwu ya na arụmọrụ ya
Davido meriri Best African Act na 2017 MOBO Awards
O wepụtara 'If' na Febụwarị 17, 2017
Ọ bụ Tekno mepụtara ya, onye dere egwu maka Davido
Ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ egwu nke South Africa kwadoro abụ ahụ, na-egosi mbupu nke 200,000 nkeji
'If' meriri Best Pop Single na Song of the Year na The Headies 2018
N'ịtụle maka OkayAfrica, Sabo Kpade kọwara egwu ahụ dị ka 'onye na-ere ọkụ na-adịghị ngwa' nke nwere 'ụda na-adịghị mma nke na-ada ụda ma na-ejideghị ngwá egwu'
E dekọrọ vidiyo egwu nke 'If' na London; ọ bụ Director Q duziri ya ma Tunde Babalola mepụtara ya
Davido jikọtara ya na onye na-emepụta uwe nwoke Orange Culture iji wepụta nchịkọta capsule sitere na 'If'
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Davido chere ebubo nke ịbụ onye otu Black Axe confraternity, ma ọ bụ Aye Cult Group, na ime mmegharị òtù nzuzo na egwu ya na vidiyo onwe ya

Na Septemba 5, 2018, Daily Post kọrọ na otu onye a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ onye òtù nzuzo Black Axe nke ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa jidere kwupụtara na a dọtara ya n'ime otu ahụ na nkwa na ọ ga-ezute onye egwu, Davido
Na Septemba 15, 2018, na mkparịta ụka ya na Vanguard, onye njikwa mba Davido, Asa Asika, gọnahụrụ ihe ọmụma na Davido bụ onye otu nzuzo ọ bụla
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, Information Nigeria kọrọ banyere mkpali nke Davido na-ekerịta vidiyo na akụkọ ya na-emesi ndị Aye Cult Group obi ike n'ihe ya
E wepụtara egwu Chris Brown nyere aka 'Blow My Mind' na Julaị 26, 2019
Ọ bụ Shizzi mepụtara ya ma na mbụ e bu n'obi ka ewepụta ya dị ka onye ndu nke abọm ahụ
'Blow My Mind' nwere okwu banyere nwa agbọghọ nke na-afụ uche Davido n'ụzọ dị mfe
Na Edgar Esteves-directed visuals for 'Blow My Mind', Davido na Chris Brown na-etinye oge dị mma na motel na ndị hụrụ ha n'anya
Vidio a nwetara otu nde mmadụ n'ime awa iri na otu, karịa 'Fever' na 'Come Closer' nke Wizkid iji bụrụ vidiyo egwu Naịjirịa iji nweta mmeri a ngwa ngwa
Ọ ghọkwara vidiyo egwu Naịjirịa iji nweta ọtụtụ nlele n'ime awa iri abụọ na anọ mbụ nke ntọhapụ ya
A tọhapụrụ 'Risky' na Ọktoba 23, 2019
Ọ na-egosi olu ndị ọbịa site n'aka onye na-agụ egwu Jamaica bụ Popcaan, onye gwara Davido ka ọ pụta na egwu ya nke afọ 2018 'Dun Rich'
Vidio egwu nke 'Risky' bụ Meji Alabi duziri ma na-asọpụrụ usoro ihe nkiri mpụ nke telivishọn Top Boy
Na vidiyo ahụ, otu nwanyị so na ndị ọrụ Davido na Popcaan na-agwa ha ndị uwe ojii
Na Eprel 6, 2012, Nigerian Entertainment Today kọrọ na Davido bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado nde -30 na MTN
Nkwekọrịta ahụ kpughere ya dị ka ihu MTN Pulse, mkpọsa ahịa nke ndị ntorobịa Naịjirịa
Na Ọktoba 24, 2013, Pulse Nigeria kọrọ na Guinness Nigeria bịanyere aka na Davido maka nkwekọrịta nkwado
Dị ka akụkụ nke nkwekọrịta ahụ, Ọ rụrụ na Guinness World of More Concert n'akụkụ ndị na-ese ihe gụnyere P-Square, D'banj, Wizkid, Ice Prince, Burna Boy, Olamide, Phyno, Chidinma, Waje na Tiwa Savage
Na Mee 9, 2018, Guardian Life kọrọ na Davido bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Infinix Mobile, onye na-emepụta smartphone dị na Hong Kong
Na Mee 2021, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara site na akara ịkụ nzọ egwuregwu a ma ama 1xBet Na June 11, Martell (cognac) kwupụtara Davido dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọhụrụ ya
Davido na-aga n'ihu na-enye ike ma na-arụ ọrụ na talent na-arị elu dịka Jels Quiah
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, Davido pụtara na egwu UNCTION ya na Jels Quiah n'akụkụ Ice Prince na Walshy Fire
Abụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma ngwa ngwa
Davido nwere ụmụ atọ
O kwere Chioma nkwa ọlụlụ, nne nke nwa ya nke atọ
Ọzọkwa, Stand Strong nke Davido gosipụtara United States Choir The Samples bụ ụda egwu ọzọ sitere na Davido

Davinia Esther Anyakun (amụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1976) bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda na onye ọkachamara na-azụ ahịa na nhazi
Ọ bụ nwanyị omeiwu maka Nakapiripirit District kemgbe afọ 2016
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Yoweri Museveni, onye isi ala Uganda, na-edu
A mụrụ Anyakun na 19 Eprel 1976 na Nakapiripirit District na Karamoja subregion
Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ na Nkoyoyo boarding primary ma nọrọ maka Primary Leaving Examinations na afo 1991
O mechara banye na Kangole Senior Secondary School ma nọrọ maka ule Uganda Certificate of Education na afo 1995
Ọ nọrọ n'ule Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education na afo 1999 site na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mbale
N'afọ 2002, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nchịkwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze site na Makerere Institute for Social Development

Esther Anyukan gara n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya ma na afo 2009 gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma na nlekọta ahụike na Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda ma gbakwunye nzere bachelọ na ịzụta na nhazi na Mahadim Nkumba na afo 2009
Anyukan malitere ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Amudat n'afọ 2004 dị ka onye isi nchịkwa ụlọ ọgwụ nke o mere ruo n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2010 ọ sonyeere International Organization for Migration dị ka onye ọrụ ọrụ

N'afọ 2013, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Agricultural Cooperative Development International / Volunteers in Overseas Cooperative Assistance na United States Agency for International Development dị ka onye nhazi mpaghara ruo n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Uganda maka Nakapiripit District
Anyakun bụ nwanyị omebe iwu maka Nakapiripiriti District
Ọ banyere na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na Mee na afo 2016 na-agba ọsọ na tiketi National Resistance Movement
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
Challa Elma Kapel, nwa ya nwanyị, ghọrọ Miss Tourism Uganda na 2017

Dawamesc bụ wii wii a na-eri eri nke a na-ahụkari na obodo Algeria na ụfọdụ mba ndị Arab ndị ọzọ, nke e ji ihe ndị dị n'elu wii wii jikọta ya na 'suga, oroma juice, cinnamon, cloves, cardamon, nutmeg, musk, pistachios, ya na pine nut'
Ihe a na-eri eri keere òkè n'ịkwalite wii wii na Europ, ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ nkwadebe nke ọgwụ ahụ nke Dr
Jacques-Joseph Moreau hụrụ n'oge njem ya na Northern Afrika, na nke ọ webatara na Paris 'Club des Hashischins
Dawit Seyaum Biratu (amụrụ na 27 Julaị na afọ 1996) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti nke na-ahụ maka 1500 mita
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke anọ na 2015 World Championships wee merie ọlaọcha na 2016 World Indoor Championships
Dawit nwetara ọla nchara na mita 5000 na 2022 World Championships
Dawit nọ na mmemme ọkachamara ya na 2013 World Youth Championships ihe rite ọla ọcha ya na 2014 World junior champion
Dawit Seyaum mere mmetụta mbụ ya na ọkwa mba n'afọ 2013, na-emeri 1500m mba junior title
Oge izizi ya na IAAF Diamond League circuit sochiri n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o setịpụkwara ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya nke 4 1495 nkeji na Doha Diamond League
A họpụtara ya maka nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa na 2013 World Youth Championships in Athletics ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Tigist Gashaw 意 na oge mbụ Ethiopia were ebe abụọ kachasị elu na ihe omume ahụ
Ọ gbanwere ọnọdụ a na 2013 African Junior Championships, na-ewere aha ahụ na nkeji 4 0900 ọtụtụ sekọnd n'ihu Tigist
2018 World Indoor Championships nke e mere na Birmingham enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihi na e wepụrụ ya na okpomọkụ

N'ọnwa Febụwarị na afọ 2022, Dawit setịpụrụ oge kachasị n'ụwa nke 8 2324 maka mita 3000 n'ime ụlọ na Meeting Hauts-de-France Pas-de-Calais na Liévin, na-aghọ nwanyị nke atọ kachasị ọsọ na ihe omume ime ụlọ a n'akụkọ ihe mere eme (naanị ndị obodo ya Dibaba na Gudaf Tsegay gbara ọsọ ọsọ)
Ọ mechara nke ise na ihe omume ahụ na 8 4455 na World Indoor Championships na Belgrade n'ọnwa na-esote
Dawit Yifru (a mụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ onye Ethiopia na-akpọ keyboard na onye nhazi egwu
Dawit bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Board of the Ethiopian Musicians Association
E guzobere mkpakọrịta ahụ na mmalite afọ 2000 iji nyere aka mee ka iwu nwebisiinka mbụ nke mba ahụ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ogologo oge ya na Roha Band, nke na-achịkwa egwu ndị Etiopia nke oge a na mmalite afọ 1980 na afọ 1990
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ ya na ndị otu egwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere Dahelak

Dawn Alison Louise Bowden (amụrụ 14 February 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour Party na Britain na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Chief Whip nke Gọọmenti Welsh na osote onye minista maka nka na egwuregwu kemgbe 2021
Bowden abụrụla onye otu Senedd (MS) maka Merthyr Tydfil na Rhymney kemgbe 2016
Bowden malitere ọrụ ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na National Health Service n'etiti afọ 1979 na 1982, nakwa na Bristol City Council site n'afọ 1982 ruo 1983
Bowden nwere ụmụ abụọ
Sam na Jack
N'afọ 2011, ọ lụrụ Martin; ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ iwu maka Welsh Labour
Àtụ Drakeford Cabinet
Dawn Petula Butler (amụrụ 3 Nọvemba 1969) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour Party nke Britain bụbu onye otu nzuko omeiwu (MP) maka Brent Central kemgbe 2015￼
A họpụtara Butler dị ka MP maka Brent South na ntuli aka izugbe 2005
Ọ jere ozi na gọọmentị Prime Minister Gordon Brown dị ka odeakwụkwọ ndị omeiwu maka ụlọ ọrụ Cabinet na Minista maka ụmụ amaala na-eto eto na njikọ ndị ntorobịa site na 2009 ruo 2010
Ọ tụfuru oche ya na ntuli aka izugbe 2010 nye Sarah Teather (Liberal Democrat)
Ọ laghachiri na nzuko omeiwu dịka MP maka Brent Central na ntuli aka izugbe 2015￼

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ ọhụrụ nke Shadow Minister for Black and Minority Ethnic Communities site n'aka Jeremy Corbyn mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka onye ndu ndị ọrụ, emesịa ghọọ ezigbo enyi Corbyn
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2017, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na frontbench nke ndị mmegide gọọmentị iji votu megide mkpalite nke edemede 50, bụ nke hiwere mkparita uka Brexit
A mụrụ Butler na Forest Gate na East London, nne na nna ya bụ Milo na Ambrozene Butler; o nwere otu nwanne nwanyị na ụmụnne anọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Tom Hood School na Leytonstone na Waltham Forest College, ha abụọ dị na London
Butler bu ụzọ chọọ nhọpụta ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Labour na Hackney South na Shoreditch, ebe ọ gosipụtara na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị niile mana enweghị ịga nke ọma
[citation needed] Butler weputara onwe ya maka nhọpụta maka West Ham na 2005 mana a họrọghị ya

Mgbe Paul Boateng lara ezumike nká ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna Ukwu nke Britain na South Africa, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye ọrụ na Brent South ma nọgide na oche maka pati ya na ntuli aka nke afọ 2005 na ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke mmadụ 11,326
Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii nke atọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu Britain mgbe Diane Abbott na Oona King gasịrị
Mmasị na ọrụ ndị ntorobịa gara n'ihu dị ka otu n'ime mmasị ya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu

N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke All Party Parliamentary Group on Youth Affairs, ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche na-asọpụrụ nke British Youth Council
Mgbe Gordon Brown ghọrọ praịm minista na June 2007, e mere Butler otu n'ime ndị osote oche isii nke Labour Party, na-arụ ọrụ pụrụ iche maka nsogbu ndị ntorobịa
N'afọ 2006, Butler tụụrụ vootu megide nyocha banyere Agha Iraq
O mechara tie vootu megide nyocha ugboro isii ọzọ ruo n'afọ 2016
Ọ kọwara na nke a bụ n'ihi na o kwenyere na ọ ga-abụ ihe na-ezighi ezi ime nchọpụta 'mgbe anyị ka nwere ndị agha na Iraq
Ọ bụrụ na i mere nyocha mgbe ndị agha ka nọ n'ebe ahụ na-eme ike ha niile iji lụọ ọgụ maka mba ahụ, ọ gaara emebi mkpụrụ obi ha
A kpọrọ Butler nwanyị MP nke afọ na 2009 Women in Public Life awards
Mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista maka Ndị Ntorobịa na Mmekọrịta Ndị Ntoropụ, Butler ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ kwuru okwu site na igbe ozi na House of Commons na Disemba 2009

O mechara kwuo na ndị Conservative MPs 'gbalịla ileda m anya n'oge ahụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme', na-akọwapụta na otu onye Tory MP 'nwere nnukwu obi ụtọ n'ịgwa m na 'upskilling' adịghị na akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Bekee'
E wepụrụ mpaghara Butler nke Brent South na ntuli aka 2010
E kewara ókèala ya n'etiti mpaghara abụọ oche ọhụrụ nke Brent Central na Brent North
A họpụtara Butler dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye ọrụ na Brent Central mana Sarah Teather, onye na-agbachitere ndị Liberal Democrat, onye bụbu onye omeiwu maka Brent East nke e wepụrụ na ntuli aka
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, mgbe Sarah Champion gbara arụkwaghịm, a kwalitere Butler ka ọ bụrụ Shadow Cabinet dị ka Shadow Secretary of State for Women and Equalities
Na Febụwarị 2018 ọ họpụtara onye ọchụnta ego Anthony Watson dị ka onye ndụmọdụ LGBT+
Mgbe a họpụtara Keir Starmer dị ka onye ndú nke Labour Party, a họpụtabeghị Butler na kọmitii ọhụrụ Shadow Cabinet ma Marsha de Cordova nọchiri ya
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021, ndị Crown Prosecution Service nyere ndị uwe ojii Cheshire ikike ịkatọ nwoke dị afọ iri asaa si Warrington maka iziga ozi mkparị na Butler
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, a mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ izu isii, kwụsịtụrụ ya ọnwa iri na abụọ
Na Jenụwarị 2009, Butler natara nkwado site n'aka Onye isi ala US Barack Obama
Na mbụ, ọ gọnahụrụ na ọfịs ya dere ya mana o mechara dozie onwe ya ma mee ka o doo anya na ndị ọrụ ya dere nkwado ahụ na nkwenye nke ndị enyemaka Obama, mgbe ahụ Obama bịanyere aka mgbe ha zutere
A chọpụtara na Butler nwere ọrịa kansa ara na Disemba 2021 ma wepụ ya mastectomy

Dawn Faith Mackay (née Mlotshwa, amụrụ 16 Jenụwarị 1982 na KwaMashu, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa) bụ onye edemede, onye egwu, ọkà okwu, onye na-elekọta mmadụ na onye ọbịa nke ihe nkiri TV nke ya akpọrọ Deep & Meaningful
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya na 2008 na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe na mpaghara South Africa ma wepụtala EP mbụ ya na 2015 akpọrọ 'Ndị na-ege ntị nke Otu'
N'afọ 2016, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta TV, MYZIZI Productions, aha ya bụ nwa ya nwanyị Zinhle (Zizi) Grace, onye a mụrụ ihe dị ka ọnwa anọ ma nwụọ mgbe ọ dị ọnwa atọ
na Melbourne, Australia
Ịhụnanya Mackay nke ịbụ abụ malitere na chọọchị nne nne ya, nke dị na South Afriika obodo KwaMashu, bụ ebe Mackay n'onwe ya tolitere
Nne ya zụlitere ịhụnanya a, onye ga-agbawa ndekọ Aretha Franklin, Donnie Hathaway na Kool & The Gang n'isi ụtụtụ na mgbede
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Mackay nwetakwara ike nke egwu na-eme mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ebe ọ na-emepụta ụda ụda maka mgbochi apartheid
N'ịbụ onye nwere mmetụta site na nzụlite ya na ọchịchọ miri emi nke ime mgbanwe, Mackay ararala ọtụtụ ndụ ya iji kpalie ndị na-eto eto ka ha bulie ọnọdụ ha elu
Ọ bụ onye isi South Afriika nke otu n'ime ndị ntorobịa na-agba ọsọ n'ụwa, Oaktree (ntọala) wee rụọ ọrụ na mmekorita ya na Nelson Mandela 's 46664 ịchọta ụzọ eji egwu egwu eme ihe
Mgbe ọ kwagara Australia n'afọ 2009, ọ gbasaa nchụso ikpe ziri ezi, na-arụ ọrụ iji mee ka ndị ntorobịa nwere nsogbu na ndị kwabatara na nso nso a
Mackay edekọla ma soro ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na-emekọ ihe na South Africa (Loyiso Bala, Zakes Bantwini & Ntokozo Mbambo) na Australia ( Evermore, Diafrix )
N'ịbụ onye nakweere ikike ebumpụta ụwa ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede abụ, Mackay na-eji egwu nke ya ugbu a iji ruo na kpalie ndị mmadụ gburugburu ụwa
A na-agwa ya oge niile ka o mee ma ụda olu yana otu ìgwè zuru oke n'ụdị mmemme ọ bụla - agbamakwụkwọ, nnọkọ, ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi ihe nrite
O meela ya na ụfọdụ ebe a na-asọpụrụ ụwa dị ka Sydney Opera House, yana n'akụkụ ndị na-ese ihe nkiri dị ka Yvonne Chaka Chaka
Egwu mbụ ya, 'Messed Up Heart', bụ Jason Heerah (Electric Empire) na Dorian West ( X Factor, Australia's Got Talent ) mepụtara - ma nyere aka mee Mackay onye na-ese ihe 1 na Melbourne na No
7 na Australia na Eserese ReverbNation R&B/Soul
Ihe sochiri ya bụ EP ọ tụrụ anya ya nke ukwuu, 'Ndị na-ege ntị nke Otu', nke Mackay n'onwe ya dere ma mepụta ya

Na ọpụpụ site na ụda ndị na-ejikarị egwu Ndị Kraịst, EP bụ nchịkọta egwu na-emegide nhazi ọkwa mana na-akọwa 'mkpụrụ obi' - na-ejikọta ihe jazz na ozi ọma n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla, na egwu egwu na-eche ihu ma na-ebuli elu
Ọ bụ n'ọnwụ nke nwa ya nwanyị, ọmụmụ nwa ya nwoke, na njem n'etiti ihe omume abụọ a na-agbanwe ndụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ
A kpọkwara ya ka ọ kesaa akụkọ ya dị ka onye na-akpali akpali na onye isi okwu na ọgbakọ, ụka na ụlọ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Oprah Winfrey 's Leadership Academy for Girls
Mackay laghachiri South Africa na 2016 ka o dee ma wepụta akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Dear God, nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere ọnwụ nwa ya nwanyị na otú Mackay si nwetaghachi ụzọ ndụ na olileanya
Isi ọrụ ya na-esote bụ ihe ngosi okwu, akpọrọ Deep & Meaningful, nke ọ bụ onye okike na onye nrụpụta ọrụ
Ihe ngosi a ga-abụ Mackat, ga-egosipụta ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ama ama dị ka ndị ọbịa, ma ga-agafe n'Africa na ụwa niile na BET Africa Channel narị otu na ịrị abụọ na itoolu
Ugbu a, ya na di ya bụ Nic Mackay Australia na nwa ha nwoke, Lwandle Mackay bi na Johannesburg
Àtụ Infobox artist

Dawn Okoro onye amụrụ na 1980, na Houston, bụ onye Naịjirịa na Amerịka na-ese ihe osise nke gbakwasara ụkwụ n'ihe atụ, ya na osise foto na ihe onyonyo, ihe niile a bụ nkpali mmụọ site n'ejiji na omenaala ama ama
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Texas-Austin na 2002 jiri BA na Psychology na Fashion Design wee jirikwa akara iwu ka ọ gụchara na Thurgood Marshall School of Law na Texas Southern University na 2009
Okoro bi ma na aru oru na Austin, Texas, ma egosipụtala ọrụ ya na gburugburu mba United States na mba uwa nile, nke ndi àmà ama nyere ya ikikie
Amụrụ ya nye nne si Amerika na nna si Naịjirịa bụ agbụrụ Igbo, azụlitere Okoro na Lubbock
Okoro esonyela na ngosipụta nke ótú na ngosipụta nke onwe n'ọrụ ya niile
N’afọ 2008, ọrụ nka Dawn rụrụ nke isi ahịrị ya bụ Visjual kollaborativ ihe ngosi nke Miami N’ọnwa Juun 2019, ọ laghachitere dịka onye ngósìpụ̀tà, agbakwunyere Voyager series for humanities
Á gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ tinyere mmadụ iri abụọ na ise sitere na gburugburu ụwa dịka; Seun Kuti, Berla Mundi na Aya Chebbi
Kemgbe afọ 2012, Dawn Okoro kewara oge ya dịka onye na-ese ihe na onye nrụpụta dijitalụ na akụkọ Spektruml Austin
A mụrụ Dawood Olad Al-Seyed n'ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1953, na Marrakech, Morocco
Ọ bụ onye nduzi Morocco, onye odee ihe nkiri, na onye na-ese foto

Dawoud Bey (onye amụrụ David Edward Smikle; n'afọ 1953) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye nkuzi amaara maka nnukwu foto nka ya na foto foto n'okporo ámá, gụnyere ndị Amerịka nọ n'afọ iri na ụma n'ihe gbasara obodo ha, na ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ahụkarị
N'afọ 2017, a kpọrọ Bey onye otu na onye natara MacArthur Fellowship site na John D
na Catherine T
MacArthur Foundation ma a na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime 'ndị na-ese foto kachasị ọhụrụ na nke nwere mmetụta nke ọgbọ ya'

Bey bụ prọfesọ na onye omenkà pụrụ iche na Columbia College Chicago Dị ka The New York Times si kwuo, 'n'ihe yiri ka ọ dị mfe nke ise foto ndị isi ojii na ndụ kwa ụbọchị, [Bey, onye Afrịka-Amerịka,] nyere aka iwebata Ojiị n'ihe gbasara nka dị mma ogologo oge tupu ọ bụrụ ihe na-ewu ewu, ma ọ bụ ọbụna nabata'
A mụrụ David Edward Smikle na New York City's Jamaica, Queens neighbourhood, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Dawoud Bey na mbido afọ 1970
Bey gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Benjamin N
Cardozo High School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Visual Arts na New York site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1978, ma nọrọ afọ abụọ sochirinụ dị ka akụkụ nke CETA-kwado Cultural Council Foundation Artists Project
N'afọ 1990, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BFA na ịse-foto na Empire State College, ma nata MFA ya na Yale University School of Art n'afọ 1993
Bey enwetaghị igwefoto mbụ ya ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ma kwuo rụo mgbe ahụ na ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye egwu
Mmụọ egwu mbụ gụnyere John Coltrane na ihe ndị na-ese foto bụ James Van Der Zee na Roy Decarava
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Bey sonyeere Black Panthers Party ma ree akwụkwọ akụkọ ha na nkuku okporo ámá
Ọ naghị ele ọrụ ya anya dị ka ihe ngosi ọdịnala
Ọ ga-etinye ihe, chetara ha mmegharị ahụ ma nye ha ihe enyemaka mgbe ụfọdụ
N'oge ọrụ ya, Bey esonyewo n'ihe karịrị ebe obibi ndị omenkà iri abụọ, nke nyere ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ na ndị na-eto eto nke ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ

O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwe ya na nke otu gụnyere Dawoud Bey Portraits n'afọ 1975 - rụọ afọ 1995 na Walker Art Center na 1995, Dawoud Bey na Queens Museum of Art na 1998, Dawoud Bey - The Chicago Project na David na Alfred Smart Museum of Art n'afọ 2003, Dawoud Bey (The Chicago Project na Detroit Institute of Arts n'afọ 2004, na Class Pictures, nke Aperture Foundation haziri na anya na mbụ na Addison Gallery of American Art n'afọ 2007, wee gaa na-agagharị na ebe ngosi nka na mba ahụ ruo afọ anọ, gụnyere Contemporary Arts Museum of Indianapolis, Milwae
Dawud Anyabwile (amụrụ na Febụwarị 6, 1965, na Philadelphia ) bụ onye African-American na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị
Ọ bụ onye na-ese onyinyo nke Brotherman Dictator of Discipline comics, na CEO
nke Big City Entertainment
O nwekwara ebe nchekwa ndị na-ese ihe na Auburn Avenue Research Library on African American Culture and History na Atlanta, Georgia
Dawud Anyabwile gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Central High School of Philadelphia
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mason Gross School of Arts na Mahadum Rutgers maka otu afọ (1983–84) nke sochiri ya bu Tyler School of Art na Mahadum Temple maka otu afọ (1985)
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na 1984 site na airbrushing T-shirts na The Gallery Mall of Philadelphia
N'afọ 1989, ya na nwanne ya nwoke bụ Guy A
Sims rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụta ma bipụta Brotherman Dictator of Discipline comic book series n'onwe ha
Guy A
Sims dere ebe Dawud Anyabwile sere ihe osise dị na mbiputa iru na otu nke Brotherman Dictator of Discipline issues
E bipụtara nke mbụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1990 ma bipụta nke ikpeazụ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1996
Anyabwile rụrụ ọrụ maka WanderLust Interactive na New York City na egwuregwu Pink Panther CD Rom na maka MTV na Daria na 1996
Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara California ịrụ ọrụ maka Klasky Csupo na The Wild Thornberrys na Rugrats site na 1999 ruo 2001
N'ikpeazụ, ọ kwagara Atlanta, Georgia ebe ọ nwetara ọkwa onye mmepụta ihe na Turner Studios site na 2005-2013
N'ebe ahụ, o mepụtara storyboards na ọtụtụ ụdị ọrụ ndị ọzọ maka ụdị dịka Cartoon Network, TNT, TBS, Boomerang, Turner Sports, NBA TV na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2015, Anyabwile na nwanne ya nwoke Guy A
Sims na Brian McGee rụkọọrọ nunkụkụ nke otu n'ime usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ maka Brotherman Dictator of Disciple nke a na-akpọ Mkpughe site na Big City Entertainment
O gosikwara Walter Dean Myer's Monster A Graphic Novel na 2015 nke bụ mgbanwe nke akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Walter Dean Myer, Guy A
Sims dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
Daniel Nwosu Jr
(amụrụ na Machị 22, 1994), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Dax (nke a na-akpọkarị DAX), bụ onye Naijiria Canada na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, na onye na-ede egwu
A mụrụ Daniel Nwosu Jr
na Machị 22, 1994, na St
John's, Newfoundland na Labrador nye ndị mbịarambịa Naijiria nke agbụrụ Igbo
O tolitere na Ottawa wee kwaga Wichita ịga mahadum, o mechara kwaga Los Angeles, California
Ọ gara Mahadum Newman, ebe ọ na-eche ndị otu egwuregwu basketball Newman Jets nche
O dere uri na mbụ ma bụrụ onye na-ekwu okwu na-akpali akpali tupu ọ malite ọrụ rap
N'oge ọ nọ na Mahadum Newman, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ, nke o kwuru na ọ bụ ọrụ masịrị ya n'ihi na ọ nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ n'ịrụ gbasara ọrụ rap ya n'oge ezumike ya na ọrụ
Dax kpebiri ide uri ka ya na ndị otu basketball ya nọ na bọs n'afọ 2016
Mgbe ọ masịrị otu n'ime ndị otu ya na uri ahụ, Dax chọpụtara na o nwere nkà maka itinye okwu ọnụ

Ọ malitere iwepụta ma kwalite egwu site na akaụntụ SoundCloud ya na-ahapụ mixtape 2pac Reincarnation Vol 2 As Told By Dax na 2017, Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama maka vidiyo egwu nke egwu ya 'Cash Me Outside' nke gosipụtara Danielle Bregoli
A makwaara ya a mara maka freestyles ya na remixes nke egwu rap a ma ama
O wepụtara egwu mbụ ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2018, nke akpọrọ 'Ọ dị iche ugbu a' nke gosipụtara ndị ọbịa sitere n'aka ndị egwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere OT Genasis na Futuristic
N'afọ sochirinụ, e gosipụtara ya na egwu Hopsin 'I kwesịrị ịmara'

Na ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, ọ gara njem 'It goes up' na Kansas city rap legend Tech N9ne wee mesịa kwupụta njem mbụ ya 'It's Different Now Tour' site na Instagram ma mee atụmatụ ịga njem na October gafee Amerịka na Kánada

N'afọ 2020, o wepụtara EP ọzọ a na-akpọ 'M ga-ekwuru gị ya' nke natara nyocha dị mma n'ozuzu ya, egwu 7 EP ahụ nwekwara egwu esemokwu 'Dear God' nke ọ na-ajụ ajụjụ maka Chineke ka ọ na-eche banyere ịdị adị nke onwe ya na ụwa n'ozuzu ya
Ndị nkatọ toro egwu ahụ maka isiokwu ya na lyricism, vidiyo egwu nke egwu ahụ nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri anọ na YouTube ma gbasaa ihe karịrị nde ugboro iri ise na Spotify
Mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ wepụtara egwu egwu dịka 'Ọsịsọ' na 'A choghi m ndo ọzo' nke gosipụtara Tech N9ne na Trippie Redd n'otu n'otu
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, o wepụtara egwu 'Coronavirus (State Of Emergency),' nke e dere banyere ọrịa COVID-19
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, Dax wepụtara ihe na-esote “Dear God” akporo “Child of God’ nke ọ zara site n’ekele Chineke maka ihe o meere ya
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, Dax kwupụtara abọm studio mbụ ya ma wepụta 'Propaganda' nke gosipụtara Tom Macdonald dị ka onye ndu abọm
Egwu a ruru na #9 na chaatị Rap Digital Song Sales nke Billboard Charts
Ná mmalite Ọktọba 2021, ewepụtara egwu nke atọ nke abọm '40 Days, 40 Nights' nke gosipụtara Nasty C
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2021, ewepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ Pain Paints Paintings site na Living Legends Entertainment
Ọ bụ LexNour Beats na exec mepụtara abọm ahụ
Brittney Boston onye bụkwa onye njikwa ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya
Dayọsis nke Lucera-Troia (Latini) Dayọsisis Lucerina-Troiana), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ Nocera, bụ bishọp Roman Katọlik na Apulia, na ndịda Ịtali, na oche bishọp ya na Lucera katidral
Dayọsis ahụ ruru nhazi ya ugbu a n'afọ 1986, site na ijikọta dayọsis ochie nke Lucera na dayọsis nke Troia, nke oche ya bụ Troia katidral, ugbu a bụ njikọ katidral nke dayọsis ahụ
Omenala obodo ahụ na-achọpụta mmalite nke bishọp nke Lucera na narị afọ nke atọ na Onye Nsọ Bassus
Ndị bishọp abụọ ndị ọzọ e chepụtara echepụta, Johannes na Marcus, pụtara na mbụ na martyrology(Ọmụmụ martyr) e dere na narị afọ nke iri na otu maọbụ nke iri na abụọ, nke a na-ajụkarị ike ya

Popu Gelasius nke Mbụ (492-496) degaara ndị bishọp abụọ nọ n'ógbè ahụ akwụkwọ ozi, na-eme mkpesa banyere mwakpo a wakporo ebe obibi ndị mọnk dị na Fundo Luciano na mpaghara dayọsis nke Lucera nke ndị ụkọchukwu abụọ duziri, ma nye ndị bishọp ndi n'amaghị aha ha iwu ka ha dụọ Lucera (nke a na-akpọghị aha ya) ọdụ ka ọ gaa n'ebe obibi ndị mönk iji hụ na mwakpo a ghara ime
Bishọp mbụ a maara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ Marcus (ihe dịka 743)
Ọ bụ n'afọ 1220, n'okpuru Bishọp Bartolomaeus, ka Frederick nke Abụọ malitere ibi na ndị Saracen Sicilian na Lucera

N'afọ 1391, e mere ka dayọsis nke Lucera mụbaa site na mgbakwunye nke bishọp nke Castel Fiorentino (Farentino), obodo nke ndị Byzantium catapan Basil Mesardonites guzobere n'afo 1015, na ebe ọnwụ Eze Ukwu Frederick nke Abụọ
Mgbe afọ 1409 gasịrị, dayọsis nke Tortiboli - nke e guzobere tupu n'afọ 1236 - jikọtara ya na Lucera
N'afọ 1969, e mere ka aha ahụ (ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị dayọsịs) dịghachi ndụ n'okpuru aha Latini ya Tortibulum
N'afọ 1609, 1687, na 1759, e gosipụtara dayọsis nke Lucera dịka onye nyemaka nke archdayọsis nke Benevento
N'ihe dịka n'afọ 1031, a na-agba akaebe na dayọsis nke Troia dịka onye nọ n'okpuru popu
Popu Paschal nke Abụọ kwadoro nke a n'akwụkwọ ozi nke abalị iri n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1100, na-enye ndị bishọp nke Troia ikikere ka popu doo ha nsọ ruo mgbe ebighị ebi

N'afọ 1127, Count Roger nke Abụọ nke Sicily nyere Popu Honorius nke Abụọ (1124-1130) nnukwu onyinye ọlaedo na ọlaọcha, ma kwe ya nkwa obodo Troia na Montefusco, ma ọbụrụ na popu ga-enye ya ọkọlọtọ na utu aha Duke nke Apulia
N'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1127, Popu Honorius nọ na Troia, ebe o nwere kansụl, ebe ọ chụpụrụ Count Roger na onye ọbụla kwesịrị ịkwado mbọ ya ịghọ Duke nke Apulia
Na abalị ise n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1127, popu nyere Troia akwụkwọ iwu na nnwere onwe
Ọ tụgharịrị ndị isi nke Apulia, na-atụ egwu ịmepụta alaeze Norman na ndịda Ịtali
Na abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1963, dayọsis nke Troia
Katidral nke Troia, nke a raara nye Virgin Maria, bụ nke isi nke iri abụọ, nke ndị isi anọ (nke Archdecọnu, na Archpriest duziri) na-achịkwa
N'afọ 1675, e nwere ndị isi anọ na ndị ụkọchukwu iri na isii
N'afọ 1752, e nwere ndị isi anọ na ndị ụkọchukwu iri na abụọ
Popu Urban nke Abụọ nwere nzukọ ndị isi na Troia na ubochi iri na otu na iri na abuo nke onwa Machị n'afo 1093, ebe ndị bishọp iri ise na ise bịara
Mgbe alaeze Napoleon nke Ịtali nwụsịrị, Nzukọ nke Vienna nyere Ikikere iweghachi steeti ndị popu na alaeze Naples

Ebe ọ bụ na ndị France bi na ya hụrụ ka a kwụsịrị ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ Chọọchị na alaeze ahụ, yana iweghara ọtụtụ ihe onwunwe na akụ Chọọchị, ọ dị mkpa ka Popu Pius nke asaa na Eze Ferdinand nke anọ nwee nkwekọrịta maka iweghachi na inyeghachi
Otú ọ dị, Ferdinand adịghị njikere ịnakwere ọnọdụ tupu Napoleon, nke Naples bụ onye ọchịchị popu
Ọ dịghịkwa njikere ịnabata ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke obere Dayọsisis na alaeze ya; na-agbaso ebumnuche ndị France, ọ chọrọ ka e kpochapụ Dayọsisis iri ise
Mkparịta ụka ogologo, nke zuru ezu, na nke siri ike sochiri
Na abili iri na asaa nke onwa Julaị n'afo 1816, Eze Ferdinand nyere iwu, nke ọ machibidoro ịnata akwụkwọ ọ bụla nke popu, gụnyere na-enweghị nnata nke eze
Nke a pụtara na ndị ụkọchukwu enweghị ike ịnata ehi nke nhọpụta, nsọpụrụ, maobu ntinye na-enweghị ikikere nke eze
N'ikpeazụ, a bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta n'abali iri na isii nke onwa Febụwarị n'afo 1818, Pius nke Asaa kwadoro ya n'abali iri abụọ na ise nke onwa Febụwarụ n'afo 1818
Ferdinand wepụtara nkwekọrịta ahụ dị ka iwu n'abali iri abụọ na otu na onwa Machị n'afo 1818
Nkwughachi nke Dayọsisis nke alaeze ahụ na mpaghara ụka were ihe karịrị afọ atọ
E kwetara ikikere eze nwere ịhọpụta onye ga-abụ onye bishọp, dịka ọ dị na nkwekọrịta nke afọ 1741, dabere na nkwenye popu (Ima okwa)
N'abali iri na asaa nke onwa June n'afo 1818, Pius VII wepụtara bull De Ulteriore nke e weghachiri isi bishọp nke Benevento
E wepụrụ Dayọsisis nke Montecorvino na Vulturaria kpamkpam ma tinye ya na mpaghara Dayọsis nke Lucera
Lucera gara n'ihu dịka onye nnọchi anya Benevento
Dayọsis nke Troia nọ n'okpuru Holy See ozugbo n'afo 1752, ọ nọgidekwara na ya n'okpuru ndokwa ọhụrụ na Alaeze Naples n'afo 1818
N'ịgbaso Nzukọ nke Abụọ nke Vatican, na dịka ụkpụrụ ndị e depụtara na iwu kansụl ahụ si dị, Christus Dominus isi nke iri anọ, Popu Paul VI nyere iwu ka a hazigharịa mpaghara ụka dị na ndịda Ịtali
Iwu 'Eo quod spirituals' nke abali iri na abụọ n'owa Septemba n'afo 1976 mepụtara nzukọ ndị bishọp ọhụrụ na mpaghara a na-akpọ 'Basilicata'
Popu Paul VI nyere iwu ka ndị otu Congregation of Bishops na Vatican Curia, Nzukọ Ndị Bishọp nke Ịtali, na Dayọsisis dị iche iche metụtara nwee mkparịta ụka

N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1979, Popu John Paul nke Abụọ gara n'ihu na nhazi ahụ site n'ịkwalite Dayọsis nke Foggia ka ọ bụrụ achịbishọp, ma kenye mpaghara ụka ọhụrụ ya Dayọsis ndị dị na Siponto, Troia (nke nọ n'okpuru Holy See), Ausculo e Cerignola, Bovino, Lucera, Santo Severino na Vestana
N'abali iri na asato nke onwa Febụwarị n'afo 1984, Vatican na steeti Ịtali bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na nke e dezigharịrị
Dabere na mmezigharị ahụ, e wepụtara usoro Normae n'abali iri na ise n'owa Nọvemba n'afo 1984, nke a sonyeere n'afọ sochirinụ, n'abali ato n'owa June n'afo 1985, site n'ime ka iwu nwee ike
Dabere na nkwekọrịta ahụ, e wepụrụ omume nke inwe otu bishọp na-achịkwa Dayọsis abụọ dị iche iche n'otu oge, aeque personaliter
Vatican gara n'ihu na mkparịta ụka nke malitere n'okpuru Popu John XXIII maka njikọta nke obere Dayọsis, ọkachasị ndị nwere nsogbu ndị ọrụ na ego, n'ime otu Dayọsis jikọtara ọnụ
Na mgbe onwa Septemba gbara abali iri atọ, n'afo 1986, e jikọtara dayọsis nke Troia na Lucera iji guzobe Dayọsis of Lucera-Troia, dịka onye nnọchi anya nke Metropolitan Archdiocese nke Foggia-Bovino
Ma katidral ya na Lucera na katidral ibe ya na Troia nwere ọkwa nke obere basilica
E guzobere ya narị afọ nke anọ
United abali iri atọ nke onwa Septemba n'afo 1986
N'ozuzu, otu ụbọchị bụ oge nke otu ntụgharị nke ụwa (ihe dịka awa 24) ma ọ bụ otu ntụgharị nke nnukwu ihe ndị ọzọ na-enyocha mbara igwe
Na ndụ kwa ụbọchị, okwu ahụ bụ 'ụbọchị' na-ezokarị aka n'ụbọchị anyanwụ, nke bụ ogologo n'etiti ehihie abụọ nke anyanwụ ma ọ bụ oge anyanwụ ruru ebe kachasị elu
Okwu ahụ bụ́ “ụbọchị” nwekwara ike na-ezo aka n’ehihie, bụ́ oge mgbe ebe ahụ na-enweta ìhè anyanwụ kpọmkwem na nke na-apụtachaghị ìhè
N'ụwa, dịka ọnọdụ na-agafe ụbọchị ya, ọ na-ahụ ụtụtụ, ehihie, ehihie, mgbede, na abalị
Mmetụta nke otu ụbọchị dị mkpa maka ọtụtụ usoro ndụ, nke a na-akpọ rhythm circadian
Enwere ike ịhazi ụbọchị na kalenda dị ka ụbọchị, na-abụkarị ọnwa na afọ
Ọtụtụ kalenda 'nhazi nke ụbọchị na-eji ma ọ bụ ma Sun's ( kalenda anyanwụ) ma ọ bụ ọnwa (kalịnda ọnwa) ọnọdụ ikwu na mbara igwe
A na-anabata mmalite nke ụbọchị dịka oge etiti abalị ma ọ bụ etiti abalị, nke edere ka elekere 0 00 ma ọ bụ 12 nke ụtụtụ na elekere 12- ma ọ bụ 24
N'ihi na oge etiti abalị na-adịgasị iche n'etiti ọnọdụ, a na-ahazi mpaghara oge iji kwado iji oge ọkọlọtọ otu

N'ime ngwa a kapịrị ọnụ, a na-agbanwe nkọwa nke otu ụbọchị, dị ka ụbọchị SI (kpọmkwem 86,400 sekọnd) ejiri maka kọmpụta na idobe ụkpụrụ, ngụkọta oge mpaghara nke mgbanwe ụwa nke ụbọchị anyanwụ, yana ụbọchị kpakpando na sidereal
ụbọchị (iji mbara igwe) eji maka mbara igwe
Na mba ụfọdụ, enwere ike ịtọ otu ụbọchị malite na mbụ ma ọ bụ mechaa site na oge nchekwa ìhè, na-eme ka o kwe omume ịnwe ụbọchị obodo 23- ma ọ bụ 25
Okwu a sitere na Old English dæg, ya na cognates ya dị ka dagur na Icelandic, Tag na German, na dag na Norwegian, Danish, Swedish na Dutch - ha niile sitere na mgbọrọgwụ Proto-Germanic * dagaz
Ruo Ọktoba 17, 2015, ụbọchị bụ okwu 205 nke a na-ahụkarị na bekee US, yana nke iri abụọ na iri a na-ahụkarị na Bekee UK
A na-eji ọtụtụ nkọwa nke echiche mmadụ zuru ụwa ọnụ dabere na ọnọdụ, mkpa na ịdị mma
E wezụga ụbọchị nke awa 24 (sekọnd 86,400), a na-eji okwu ụbọchị mee ihe maka ọtụtụ oge dị iche iche dabere na ntụgharị nke ụwa gburugburu axis ya
Otu ihe dị mkpa bụ ụbọchị anyanwụ, nke a kọwara dị ka oge ọ na-ewe maka Sun ịlaghachi na njedebe ya (ebe kachasị elu na mbara igwe)
N'ihi na orbits nke eluigwe adịghị okirikiri zuru oke, yabụ na ihe na-aga n'ọsọ dị iche iche n'ọnọdụ dị iche iche n'okirikiri ha, ụbọchị anyanwụ abụghị otu ogologo oge n'ime afọ orbital
N'ihi na ụwa na-aga n'okporo ụzọ eccentric gburugburu anyanwụ ka ụwa na-agbagharị na axis nwere mmasị, oge a nwere ike ịbụ 79 sekọnd karịa (ma ọ bụ ihe na-erughị) awa 24
N'ime iri afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, nkezi ogologo nke ụbọchị anyanwụ n'ụwa abụrụla ihe dịka 86,400002 sekọnd (awa 24000 000 6) na enwere ugbu a ihe dịka 3652421875 ụbọchị anyanwụ n'otu afọ okpomọkụ
Omenala oge ochie nwere mmalite ụbọchị ọhụrụ na ọbịbịa ma ọ bụ ọdịda anyanwụ na mbara mpaghara (ngụkọta ndị Italy, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ịbụ awa 24 site na ọdịda anyanwụ, ochie)

The kpọmkwem oge nke, na etiti oge n'etiti, abụọ ọwụwa anyanwụ ma ọ bụ ọdịda anyanwụ na-adabere na ala ọnọdụ (longitude na latitude, nakwa dị ka elu), na oge nke afọ (dị ka e gosiri oge ochie hemispherical sundials)
Enwere ike ịkọwa ụbọchị na-adịgide adịgide site na anyanwụ na-agafe na mpaghara meridian, nke na-eme n'ehihie mpaghara (njedebe elu) ma ọ bụ etiti abalị (njedebe dị ala)
The oge na-adabere na ala lonjituudu, na n'ókè dị nta na oge nke afọ

Ọganihu ọzọ na-akọwapụta echiche ụgha nke Sun na-eji ọsọ na-aga n'ihu na mbara igwe; ọsọ bụ otu ihe ahụ dị ka nkezi ọsọ nke ezigbo Sun, ma nke a na-ewepụ mgbanwe dị iche iche n'ime otu afọ ka Ụwa na-agagharị n'akụkụ ya gburugburu anyanwụ (n'ihi ma ọsọ ya na axial tilt)

A malitere ịnakwere mpaghara oge ndị dị otú ahụ n'ihe dị ka n'etiti narị afọ nke 19 mgbe ụgbọ okporo ígwè na-enwe usoro ihe omume mgbe nile malitere iji, na ọtụtụ mba ndị bụ isi nakweere ha ka ọ na-erule 1929
N'ihe dị ka 2015, n'ụwa nile, a na-eji mpaghara 40 dị otú ahụ ugbu a mpaghara etiti, nke akọwapụtara ndị ọzọ niile dị ka nkwụsị, ka a maara dị ka UTC ± 00, nke na-eji Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)
Mgbakọ a na-ahụkarị na-amalite ụbọchị obodo n'etiti abalị nke a dị nso n'oge njedebe ala nke Sun na etiti meridian nke mpaghara oge

Oge nchekwa ụbọchị (DST), nke a na-akpọkwa dị ka oge nchekwa ụbọchị ma ọ bụ naanị oge ìhè (United States, Canada, na Australia), na oge okpomọkụ (United Kingdom, European Union, na ndị ọzọ), bụ omume nke ịga n'ihu elekere (na-emekarị
by one hour) n'oge okpomọkụ nke mere na ọchịchịrị daa n'oge elekere ọzọ
Ihe omume DST na-ahụkarị bụ ịtọ elekere n'ihu otu elekere n'oge opupu ihe ubi ('mmiri n'ihu'), na ịtọghachi elekere azụ n'otu elekere n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ ('daghachi azụ') iji laghachi n'oge ọkọlọtọ
N'ihi ya, e nwere otu ụbọchị na-ewe awa 23 n'oge oyi ma ọ bụ n'oge opupu ihe ubi na otu ụbọchị nke awa 25 n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ

Ụbọchị Sa Mundo ng Elementalia (transl Onye nleta In the World of Elementalia ma ọ bụ The Wanderer in the Land of Elementacia) nke a na-akpọkwa Niko The Journey to Magika in English-speaking countries, bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na Philippines nke mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri

Na ibụ nke Cutting Edge Productions mepụtara, ihe nkiri ahụ na-agba gburugburu Bubuy onye ga-azọpụta nne na nna nna ya ochie ndị a tọọrọ ma kpọga ha na ala a na-amaghị ama a na-akpọ Elementalia, ebe obibi nke ọtụtụ ihe e kere eke dị iche iche sitere na akụkọ ifo Philippines
Ihe mmepụta $ 13 nde (ihe dị ka nde 58) nke ihe karịrị ndị na-eme ihe nkiri 500 na mpaghara na-egosipụta usoro ihe nkiri dijitalụ na-eji teknụzụ 2D na 3D na-enweghị akwụkwọ
Ọ nwere 2D animation maka ihe odide ya na 3D animation for the backdrops
Ndị na-emepụta Dayo nọrọ ọtụtụ ọnwa na-akọwa akụkọ ahụ, ọnọdụ uche, na ngwugwu niile nke ihe nkiri ahụ
Mgbe ha na-ede edemede ahụ, ndị edemede ahụ nyochara akwụkwọ gbasara akụkọ ifo obodo nke Maximo Ramos kpọrọ Creatures of Philippine Lower Mythology
E jiri ya tụnyere mmezu afọ atọ nke ihe nkiri ọdịnala zuru oke, ihe nkiri a bu na uche ka emechaa ya na ime obere afọ abụọ
Ọ bụ Artemio Abad, Jr
na Eric Cabahug dere Dayo ma Robert Quilao duziri ya
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Disemba 25, 2008 dị ka ntinye aka na 34th Metro Manila Film Festival
Dayo Sa Mundo ng Elementalia bụ akụkọ na-enye obi ụtọ nke imeri egwu mmadụ na ịga nke ọma n'ihe isi ike

Atụmatụ ahụ na-agba gburugburu Bubuy (nke Nash Aguas kwuru) onye na-achọ ịzọpụta nne na nna nna ya a tọọrọ n'ala Elementalia, ụwa anwansi na ihe omimi nke nwere ọtụtụ ihe ndị e kere eke nke Philippines na ihe ndị ọzọ a na-eme anwansi

Mgbe ndị enyi klas ya ghọgburu ya ma merie ya n'ọsọ, a manyere Bubuy (Nash Aguas) inye ha nri na-atọ ụtọ mana ọ nweghị ike iwe ha, kama ha na-ama ya aka ịga na ohịa na isi ụtụtụ, nke ọ kwetara na ọ na-achọghị
Bubuy rutere na ulọ na-enwe mwute na nsonaazụ nke ọsọ ahụ ma jụ ịgwa nne na nna ya ochie, Lolo Miong (Noel Trinidad) na Lola Nita (Nova Villa) ihe na-enye ya nsogbu
Mgbe ọ bụ nri abalị, ọ na-arịọ onwe ya mgbaghara 'ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ' n'ụlọ nwa klas ya nakwa na ọ ga-alaghachi n'oge na-adịghị anya, na-asị ha gaa nke ọma
Ọ rutere n'ime ọhịa wee zute ndị mmegbu
Ha nyere ya iwu ka ọ mụnye ọkụ na etiti ọhịa ahụ nke ọma ka ha wee hụ ya na ebe dị anya ma nye ya ọkụ ọkụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-atụ egwu abalị, ọ banyere n'oké ọhịa ma mee ọkụ ọkụ site na ọkụ na ahịhịa kpọrọ nkụ
Na mberede, ọkụ ahụ gbasara ma gbaa osisi Balete ochie ọkụ
Site na mbibi ya, osisi vaịn ahụ chụpụrụ Bubuy n'ụlọ ya ma mee ka a tọọrọ nne na nna ya ochie

Na oké egwu, ọ na-eme ihe ọchị na-arịọ ndị agbata obi ha na-aga n'ụlọ ya maka enyemaka, mana ịhụ na ihe niile yiri ka ọ dị mma na uzọ megidere ihe Bubuy gwara, ha na-ewe iwe maka ikwere na a na-eme ha ihe ọchị
Ọ bụ naanị ndị agbata obi abụọ nwere obiọma kasiri ya obi tupu ha ahapụ ya naanị ya, na-adụ ya ọdụ ka ọ zuru ike
Ka ọ na-ekpe ekpere na ime ụlọ ya, otu manananggal aha ya bụ Anna (Katrina 'Hopia' Legaspi) pụtara na èzí ụlọ ya ma kwuo na ya ga-enyere ya aka ịchọta nne na nna ya furu efu site na enyi ọ maara
Ọ na-emeghe ọnụ ụzọ dị na elu ugwu nke azụ ụlọ ha nke na-eduga ha na 'Elementalia', ụwa nke akụkọ ifo na ihe ndị e kere eke
Ha abụọ banyere na ọnụ ụzọ ahụ ma Anna gakwuuru Lolo Nano (Peque Gallaga), onye nuno
Lolo Nano gwara ya ka ọ were enyo na foto nke nne na nna ya ochie na ụlọ

Nọnọ ahụ gwara Bubuy na Anna na nne na nna ya ochie ka dị ndụ, naanị onye dị ike ọ chọrọ iji merie tupu ọnwa zuru ezu, nke bụ ụbọchị na-esote, ma ọ bụghị ya, ọ ga-ejide ya na mpaghara ha ruo mgbe ebighị ebi
Ya onwe ya ga-arụ ọrụ atọ nweta mmiri dị nsọ site na Siyokoys, jide ọkụ ọkụ, ma wepụta mkpụrụ osisi anọ site na osisi Kapre
Lolo Nano na-enye ya ihe ọ chọrọ
Iji hụ na ọ dị nchebe, a na-enye ya slingshot anwansi nke ga-egbu ihe ọ bụla dị njọ ma Anna kpachapụrụ anya soro ya gaa njem ya
Na uzọ ha, ha zutere Narsi (Michael V), onye Tikbalang nke na-eje ozi Bubuy (mgbe ọ gbasịrị ntutu isi ya) ma nyere ha aka na njem ha niile
Bubuy rụzuru ọrụ ahụ ma lụọ ọgụ megide nnukwu osisi Balete na ndị na-ejere ya ozi na ndị enyi ya na ndị ọzọ nke ndị agha nna Anna
Ha meriri ihe na ihe ọjọọ ma Bubuy mechara laghachi na ụwa mmadụ na nne na nna ya ochie

Ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, a na-ahụ Bubuy ka ọ na-emeri na ọsọ ahụ ma na-azọpụta nwa akwụkwọ ka ọ ghara ịbụ onye ndị na-emegbu ya na-emeso ya site na iji slingshot ya nke Lolo Nano nyere ya
Tupu ọgwụgwụ, ọ na-akụ osisi ọhụrụ ahụ ọkụ dị ka ihe ịrịba ama nke udo na nkwanye ùgwù
O mechara sonyere Anna na ụgbọelu gburugburu Manila, Watching Fireworks na Mall of Asia
ma nwee obi ụtọ na unya ụgbọ elu gburugburu EDSA mgbe ọ na-achụ ụmụnne nne na ụmụnne nna Anna
'Dayo Adedayo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke mbụ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Naịjịrịa azụrụ azụ na Briten
Onye na-ese foto, onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị, na onye edemede
Dayo bụ onye dere Nigeria 20, akwụkwọ a na-edekọ akụkọ maka ọtụtụ ebe dị mkpa na Nigeria
N'ime afọ iri na asaa, 'Dayo agagharịala ma dekọọ steeti iri atọ na isii na Naịjirịa
Adedayo gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Children's Home School, Molete, Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria na Moslem Primary School, Idofe, Oke-Ife, Ijebu Ife, Ogun State, Nigeria
Ọ lere ma nweta asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Ijebu Ife Community Grammar School
Ọ gụrụ Photography Arts na Westminster College na University of Westminster, UK
Ọ bụ onye edemede nke Rivers State Our Proud Heritage, Tour Nigeria, na Lagos State, A Visual Portrait O chebere ihe karịrị nde foto anọ na Naịjirịa
Adedayo malitere dị ka onye na-ese foto mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nke mechara bụrụ onye nweere onwe ya maka Ovation Magazine International tupu ọ banye na foto ihe nkiri
Ọ gara ma dekọọ mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo narị asaa na ịrị asaa na anọ niile dị na Naịjirịa, na-edekọ maka ala, ndị mmadụ, ọdịbendị, ahịhịa, na nri

A na-egosi akara ise foto ya na peeji nke e-Passport nke Naijiria, nakwa na ahụ aja nke ọdụ ụgbọelu mba Lagos na Abuja ma na-achọkwa ahụ aja nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze mma ma na Nigeria ma na mba ofesi
N'afọ 2014, iji cheta mba Naịjirịa, e nyere ya ọrụ imepụta ihe oyiyi maka otu narị naira nke otu narị afọ nke Naịjịrịa
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii nke nwere ọrụ nke ịmepụta foto na usoro ọmụmụ ọrụ pilot maka National Board for Technical Education (NBTE), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka Nigerian Polytechnics

Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ iri na anọ gụnyere; Nigeria, Nigeria 20, Enchanting Nigeria, Nigeria The Magical, Lagos State - The Centre of Excellence, Ogun State - The Gateway State, Owe Yoruba, Nigerian Tourism Development Corporation - Tourism is Life, Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation 37 Years in Pictures, Rivers State - Our Proud Heritage, Tour Nigeria, Lagos State - A visual Portrait, Owe Yoruba 20 na Ogun State - A Visual Portrait
A mụrụ Dayo na Lagos
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ na ezinụlọ ise
Nne ya si Ogun state ebe nna ya si Lagos
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Mayflower School, Ikene
Dayo gụrụ Food Science Technology na Moshood Abiola Polytechnic tupu ya amalite ọrụ ya na 2002

Dayo bu onye nwe ulo akwukwo PayDab School nke di ebe nabo Ibadan na Lagos

Temidayo Israel Abdulai (amụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị 1986) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa, onye ọka iwu, na onye ntorobịa nkwado bụ onye a họpụtara na 26th nke Machị 2022 dị ka onye ndu ndị ntorobịa nke All Progressives Congress

A mụrụ Israel ma zụlite ya na Jebba Street, Oyingbo, Ebute-Metta, Lagos n'ime ezinụlọ Abdulai na Olowogbowo na ezinụlọ Banire na Ibita Ofin Lagos Island dị ka nna nna ya bụ Alhaji BS Abdulai onye nwe Oju Ogunle na Mushin, Lagos mgbe ya ebe nwanne nna nna ya nwanyị, Alhaja Sinatu Banire bụ onye Iya Aro nke Lagos
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 11, nne ya zụlitere ya n'ime mkpọmkpọ nke Lagos Mainland, ebe ọ nọ na-enyere nne ya aka na azụmahịa ya na-erekwa akpụkpọ ụkwụ Africa na uwe n'okporo ụzọ

Ọ malitere akwụkwọ na Methodist Boys High School, Lagos ma nweta ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu site n'aka Gọvanọ Lagos steeti bụ Bola Tinubu ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ ịmụ Iwu na London Metropolitan University n'etiti 2005 na 2009 ma nwetakwa Master's na International Relations site na otu Mahadum ahụ na 2010

Na 12 ọ malitere otu NGO nke na-edu ụmụaka na Naijiria nke akpọrọ General Action against the Violation of Human and Children's Rights nke a mere e jiri họpụta ya n'ụlọ omebe iwu ụmụaka Naijiria mgbe ọ dị afọ 14 ma o sitere n'ọkwa ahụ ruo osote onye isi oche Senate wee ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ọchịchị Presidential Summit nke ụmụaka Naijiria nke o jikwara bụrụ onye ndu ndị nọchite anya ụmụaka Naijiria na nnọkọ pụrụ iche nke United Nations na ụmụaka na New York City ma bụrụkwa onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ kọmishọna na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi otu ụbọchị na Lagos steeti na 2003

Na 2017, Israel kwuputara ọchịchọ ya maka onye isi oche nke Lagos Mainland Local Government, na Lagos n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke All Progressives Congress ma ọ nwetaghi ya n'ihina ndi All Progressives Congress kpebiri iweta nkwekọrịta ndị nwere nkwenye maka ntuli aka ahụ A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-adịgide adịgide na Lagos State Universal Basic Education Board na 2019 site na Lagos steeti Gọvanọ na n'ime March 2022 ka a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi ntorobịa nke APC site na nhọpụta nke ndi nwere nkwenye

Okeniyi (/ˈdaɪoʊ oʊˈkɛniiː/; a mụrụ na June 14, 1988) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria na America, nke a maara nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ Thresh na The Hunger Games na Danny Dyson na Terminator Genisys
A mụrụ Dayo na Jos ma o tolite na Lagos, Nigeria, ma nwee ụmụnne anọ
Nna ya bụ onye ọrụ omenala lara ezumike nká si Nigeria, nne ya bụ onye nkuzi akwụkwọ si Kenya
N'afọ 2003, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Indiana, United States, site na Nigeria ma mesịa kwaga California
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na nkwukọrịta ọhụụ na Mahadum Anderson (Indiana) n'afọ 2009
Tupu a tụnye ya na The Hunger Games, Okeniyi rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ihe nkiri obodo na obere ihe nkiri
Okeniyi pụtara n'afọ 2014 na ihe nkiri Endless Love, gosikwara Danny Dyson na ihe nkiri nke 2015 Terminator Genisys ma pụta ìhè na usoro NBC Shades of Blue
Okeniyi ga-apụta na ihe nkiri Fresh, nke a na-eme atụmatụ igosi n'afọ 2022 Sundance Film Festival
Dayo Oyewusi (amụrụ afọ 1966) bụ onyeNaijiria n'atu badminton
O meriri na asọmpi mba Kenya nke 1991 na mmemme ụmụ nwanyị abụọ jikọrọ Obiageli Olorunsola
Umu nwanyi otu

Delmar Drew Arnaud (amụrụ n'ọnwa Mee ụbọchị irí abụọ na isé, n'afọ 1973), nke a maara dịka Daz Dillinger (nke bụbu Dat Nigga Daz na Daz), bụ onye America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
N'afọ ndị 1990 na Death Row Records, nyere aka na catapult nke West Coast rap na gangsta rap n'ime ndị isi
Ọ bụ otu ọkara nke rap duo tha Dogg Pound, ya na Kurupt
Daz mụtara mmepụta n'aka Dr
Dre na-arụ ọrụ na abọm mbụ nke Dre, The Chronic, n'afọ 1992
Daz mere ihe ndị ọzọ na Snoop Dogg's first solo album Doggystyle na 1993, ma nweta mmepụta ya na 2Pac's All Eyez on Me na 1996
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ Death Row n'ihe dị ka afọ 2000, Daz lekwasịrị anya na ntọhapụ nke ya site na DPG Recordz ya

Nwa nwanne nna nke onye na-eti egwu Snoop Dogg, n'otu aka ahụ si Long Beach, California, Daz bidoro ọrụ ya ógè ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri na itoolu na Death Row Records, nke Marion 'Suge' Knight guzobere, ebe Daz mụtara mmepụta egwu site na Dr
Dre
N'ịbụ onye bịanyere aka na labelụ ahụ ógè ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, ma na-emepụta ma na-eti egwu, Daz na Dr
Dre rụkọrọ ọrụ na West Coast rap's breakthrough album, The Chronic Ka ọ dịgodị, na enyi rapper Kurupt, onye na-akụkwa na The Chronic, ha abụọ guzobere otu rap duo, Tha Dogg Pound
N'afọ 1996, ka asọmpi rap nke mpaghara East na West na usoro ime ihe ike nke Suge Knight n'ụlọ na-akawanye njọ, onye isi na-emepụta Death Row bụ Dr
Dre na-eme ka ọ dị anya na ikuku na-egbu egbu nke studio
Ná mmalite abọm mbụ nke Tha Dogg Pound Dogg Food, nke Daz mepụtara, Dre kwụsịrị imepụta abọm dum na Death Row
N'ikpeazụ na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ naanị na 2Pac, Dre mepụtara naanị egwu atọ - 'California Love', 'California Love (Remix),' na 'Can't C Me' - na abọm mbụ nke 2Pac, All Eyez on Me
Ógè ọ hapụsịrị Death Row Records, Daz ga-emepụta n'ihe banyere ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Kurupt, Soopafly, na B-Legit
N'afọ 2000, Daz wepụtara abọm nke abụọ, RAW, site na labelụ nke ya, DPG
Recordz
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, Daz anọgidewo na-elekwasị anya na nke ya, ntọhapụ indie na ahịa
N'afọ 2001, ógè Death Row ka nwere aha izizi nke ahụ, Daz na Kurupt pụtara ọzọ, ma ọ bụrụ na n'okpuru aha DPG, na abọm nke abụọ, Dillinger & Young Gotti, nke natara nyocha dị iche iche
Mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, Kurupt bịanyere aka na Death Row ọzọ, na-akpali Daz ịkparị ya ugboro ugboro na abụ na ajụjụ ọnụ
N'afọ 2020 Daz jikọtara ya na Queens MC Capone otu ọkara nke Capone-N-Norega n'ihe banyere abọm mmekorita nke akpọrọ 'Guidelines' n'okpuru Empire Distribution
Daza (nke a makwaara dị ka Dazaga) bụ asụsụ Nilo-Saharan nke ndị Daza bi na ugwu Chad na-asụ
A makwaara ndị Daza dị ka Gouran (Gorane) na Chad
Ihe ruru mmadụ 380,000 na-asụ Dazaga, ọkachasị na mpaghara Desert Djurab na mpaghara Borkou, nke a na-akpọ Haya ma ọ bụ Faya-Largeau north-central Chad, isi obodo ndị Dazaga
A na-asụ Dazaga n'Ugwu Tibesti nke Chad (ndị na-ekwu okwu 330,000), n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Niger dị nso na N'guigmi na n'ebe ugwu (ndị ọkà okwu 50,000)
A na-asụkwa ya n'obere ntakịrị na Libya na Sudan, ebe enwere obodo nke ndị na-ekwu okwu 3,000 n'obodo Omdurman
Enwekwara obere obodo ndị si mba ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na Jeddah, Saudi Arabia
Olumba abụọ bụ isi nke asụsụ Dazaga bụ Daza na Kara, mana enwere ọtụtụ olumba ndị ọzọ nwere nghọta, gụnyere Kaga, Kanobo, Taruge na Azza
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Tedaga, nke ndị Teda na-asụ, nke ọzọ n'ime otu ndị Toubou abụọ, bụ ndị bi na ugwu Tibesti nke ugwu Chad na ndịda Libya na nso obodo Sabha
Dazaga bụ asụsụ Nilo-Saharan na onye so na ngalaba Western Saharan nke ngalaba Saharan nke nwekwara asụsụ Kanuri, asụsụ Kanembu na asụsụ Tebu
E kewara Tebu ka ọ bụrụ Tedaga na Dazaga
Alaka ọwụwa anyanwụ Saharan gụnyere asụsụ Zaghawa na asụsụ Berti
Asụsụ ndị a na-asụ na Chad na Niger nwere mmetụta French ebe asụsụ ndị a na'asụ na Libya na Sudan nwere mmetụta Arabic
Asụsụ Dazaga abụghị asụsụ edere ede mana n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, SIL mepụtara orthography
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-asụ Dazaga na-asụsụ abụọ ma ọ bụ ọtụtụ asụsụ n'asụsụ ha tinyere Arabic, French, Zaghawa, Hausa, Zarma, Kanuri ma ọ bụ Tuareg
Ya mere, enwere ọtụtụ mgbazinye site na asụsụ ndị ọzọ dịka Arabic, Hausa ma ọ bụ French

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-agbaziri okwu maka 'ekele' site na Arabic shokran ma tinye ya n'asụsụ ahụ site na -num na-esochi ya na-egosi onye nke abụTebụl ndị na-esonụ nwere okwu sitere na olumba Daza nke a na-asụ na Omdurman, Sudan
Romanization a abụghị ụkpụrụ
Àtụ Languages of ChadÀtụ Languages of NigerÀtụ Saharan languages
Blench (2006) depụtara Dazawa ma ọ bụ Daza dị ka asụsụ Chadic n'ime otu Bole
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ [onye?] na-asụ ya n'obodo nta ole na ole nke Darazo LGA, Bauchi Steeti, Naijiria
Glottolog (2017) depụtara asụsụ ahụ dị ka 'enweghị ihe akaebe'
Newman (2019) depụtara Daza dị ka otu okwu nke Bole
Àtụ West Chadic languages

Dazzie Dee bụ onye American West Coast hip hop rapper na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ nke na-arụkọ ọrụ ma soro ndị na-ese ihe dịka Suga Free, Mausberg, DJ Quik, Ice Cube, Shade Sheist, K-Dee, Kool G Rap, Coolio, Mixmaster Spade, Yo-Yo, Da Lench Mob, na ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ
O wepụtara abọm abụọ naanị ya n'afọ 1996, Where's My Receipt? na The Re-Birth, ya na egwu ndị a ma ama 'Knee Deep', 'Everybody Wants To Be A Gangsta', na 'Where You From?'
A mụrụ Lidell Williams n'ubochí irí atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, Los Angeles, California
Ọ gara ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Washington Preparatory High School n'afọ 1989
Ógè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, Williams zutere Dr
Dre, Sir Jinx na K-Dee
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị otu 107th Street UG / BC Crips set, dị ka Sheppard, onye otu Skool Boyz si kwuo
Ọ bụ Dr
Dre na Sir Jinx mepụtara EP mbụ ya Turn It Loose
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị izizi so na ndekọ Lench Mob, nke Ice Cube guzobere
N'ihi ọdịiche nka, ọ hapụrụ labelụ ahụ iji dekọọ abọm mbụ ya bụ Where's My Receipt wepụtara na Capitol Records na 1995
Mgbe ahụ, o mere mbipụta ọzọ maka abọm ahụ dị ka The Re-Birth na Raging Bull Records na 1996
Ọ bụ DJ Battlecat mepụtara ya ma nwee ndị ọbịa si Ice Cube, Coolio, K-Dee na Tha Chill si Compton's Most Wanted Ọtụtụ ndị na-ewere ya dị ka West Coast classic

Dazzie Dee (nke a maara dị ka Big 'Saccs'), bụ onye na-eti egwu G-funk na onye izizi bụbu onye otu egwu West Coast Lench Mob tinyere Ice Cube, K-Dee, J-Dee, Yo-Yo, Chilly Chill, T-Bone, Shorty na ndị ọzọ
Maka ọdịiche nka, ọ hapụrụ labelụ ahụ iji dekọọ abọm izizi ya bụ Where's My Receipt wepụtara na Capitol Records na 1995
Mgbe ahụ, o mere mbipụta ọzọ maka abọm ahụ dị ka The Re-Birth na Raging Bull Records na 1996

The Killafornia Organization bụ otu egwu Hip hop nke gụnyere South Central Cartel, Compton's Most Wanted, Bonaphyde, Dazzie Dee, Killa, Tray Deee, Hard Times & Wize Guyz
Abọm mbụ ha, Killafornia Organization, bụ nke Killa Cali Records, Thug Records wepụtara n'afọ 1996 ma mepụta ya site na 3 Strikes Prod

Dazzling Mirage bụ ihe nkiri ejije Naịjirịa nke 2014, Tunde Kelani wepụtara ma duzie ya; ọ gosiputara Kemi 'Lala' Akindoju, Kunle Afolayan, Bimbo Manuel, Yomi Fash Lanso, Taiwo Ajai-Lycett na Seun Akindele
Ọ nwekwara ihe ngosi pụrụ iche sitere na Adewale Ayuba, Sean Tizzle, Tunde Babalola na Steve Sodiya
Ọ na-akọ akụkọ gbasara onye na -arịa ọrịa sickle cell na ụdị nsogbu dị iche iche nke mmekọrịta ọha na eze na mmetụta ọ chere ya ihu
A mara ọkwa na Maachi 2012, obere oge ka ahapụchara ihe nkiri nke Maami, na Kelani ga-emegharị Olayinka Abimbola's Dazzling Mirage na nnukwu ihuenyo
Na Jenụwarị 2013, ekwenyela na mmegharị ahụ amalitela

Kelani kwenyere na ihe nkiri ahụ bụ ụzọ o si enye aka n'igosi mmata ọha na eze banyere nsogbu metụtara Udi ọbara dị ka Sickle-Cell Anaemia, na-atụ anya na ndị di na nwunye na-eto eto ga-aṅa ege ntị na mkpa ya

Ọ na-ekwu, sị 'Anyị niile jikọtara ndị na-arịa ọrịa a ma ọ bụ N'ezoghị ọnụ' 'Mụ na ndị na-arịa ọrịa a enwena mmekọrịta onwe, echere m na ọ bụ ọrụ dịịrị m ime ka akụkọ ha pụta ìhè' Kemi Akindoju nwere ule ihuenyo ya na 12 June 2013 na foto isi malitere na 18 Septemba 2013
E kpughere akwụkwọ mmado nkwado nke Dazzling Mirage na 24 June 2013; A na-ewepụtakwa ọhaneze foto mmalite oge niile n'oge ịse foto
E wepụtara ụgbọala na-adọkpụ nke mbụ maka ihe nkiri ahụ nye ọha na eze na 1 Disemba 2013 ma wepụta ụgbọala nke abụọ na 14 February 2014
E wepụtara akwụkwọ mmado izizi, yana ụlọ ụgbọala na-adọkpụ nke atọ na 18 June 2014, tupu ụbọchị 2014 World Sickle-cell Awareness Day
Ahọpụtala Dazzling Mirage na ngalaba 'Ekebe Kachasị Mma' na 2015 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards

De'Angelo Wilson (March 29, 1979 na November 26, 2008) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na ónyé na-ese hip-hop
A mụrụ ya De'Angelo Ke'Shine Hill Wilson na Dayton, Ohio
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Cincinnati na Mahadum Kent State, na Kent, Ohio, ébé ọ gụrụ ihe nkírí
Wilson pụtara na ihe nkírí anọ, gụnyere dị ka DJ Iz na 8 Mile (2002) na dị ka Jesse (afọ 19) na Antwone Fisher (2002)
Ọ pụtakwara na mmepụta telivishọn abụọ
De'Angelo Wilson died by suicide by hanging in Los Angeles in 2008
DeNorval Unthank Jr
(Ọktoba 27, 1929 ruo Nọvemba 2, 2000) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
N'afọ 1951, ọ bụ onye isi ojii mbụ nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'ihe owuwu na Mahadum Oregon (UO)
Unthank rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ikpe dị na Lane County, Oregon; McKenzie Hall (nke bụbu ụlọ UO School of Law); na Kennedy Junior Middle School na Eugene, Oregon
Ọ bụ aha nke Unthank Hall na UO
A mụrụ DeNorval Unthank Jr
na Kansas City, Missouri, na Ọktoba 27, 1929, nye Dr
DeNorval unthank Sr, na Thelma Shipman Unthank

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe amuchara ya, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Pacific Northwest, ebe nna ya jere ozi dị ka otu n'ime ndị dọkịta Afrịka Amerịka mbụ nke Portland, ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Portland Urban League
Na 1946 Unthank Jr
gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Franklin High School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ abụọ na Mahadum Howard tupu ọ laghachi Oregon ịga Mahadum Oregon
Unthank zutere Doris Burgess na 1951 na Mahadum Oregon
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ ọcha, onye otu Gamma Phi Beta sorority
N'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1951, ụfọdụ ndị ikom gbara obe ọkụ n'ala ahịhịa nke sorority, a manyere ya ịhapụ sorority
Mgbe Unthank gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Architecture, ya na Burgess lụrụ na Julaị 7, 1951, na steeti Washington, n'ihi na alụmdi na nwunye agbụrụ bụ iwu na-akwadoghị na Oregon
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1972
Unthank mechara lụọ Jill Coxon
O nwere ụmụ ise Peter, Blaire, Amy, Libby, na Melissa
Unthank nwụrụ na Nọvemba 2, 2000, n'ihi ọrịa kansa akụrụ
Site na 1952 ruo 1955, Unthank na Dick Chambers chepụtara ma wuo ụlọ, onye mechara malite Chambers Construction Co
na Eugene
N'afọ 1955, Unthank malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Wilmsen Endicott Architects
N'afọ 1960, ọ ghọrọ onye mmekọ nke ụlọ ọrụ Wilmsen, Endicott na Unthank, Architects
N'afọ 1968, Unthank sonyeere Otto Poticha na Grant Seder na ụlọ ọrụ Unthank Seder Poticha Architects
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1985, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyekwara Ed Waterbury, otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya
Unthank 'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ụlọ ọha na eze na ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa gburugburu steeti ahụ', gụnyere ụfọdụ na mpaghara Eugene, gụnyere JF
Kennedy Junior High School, na Springfield Thurston High School
Site na 1993 ruo 98, a maara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka Unthank Waterbury
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ na UO site na 1965 ruo 1980

N'afọ 1980, mgbe ọ na-agbaso onyinye iri abụọ nke AIA, a kpọrọ ya Fellow nke American Institute of Architects, 'na-amata ọrụ imewe ya na Lane County Courthouse, UO Law School, Central Oregon Community College campus buildings na Bend, US Consulate Quarters na Fukuoka, Japan, na ọtụtụ ụlọ akụ, ọfịs ndị ọkachamara, na ebe obibi onwe onye gburugburu steeti Oregon'
Na Jụn 2015 a rụnyere aha ya na Lawrence Hall na UO, Mahadum ahụ kwupụtakwara US $5000 kwa afọ 'Faculty Excellence Award' iji kwado nkuzi na nyocha nke ngalaba ụlọ
Na Jụn 2017, Mahadum Oregon sọpụrụ Unthank site n'ịgbanwe aha ụlọ ihi ụra ya, 'Unthank Hall'
A na-akpọbu ụlọ ahụ aha onye isi Ku Klux Klan Frederic Stanley Dunn
Na Mee 2021, Mahadum nke Oregon Board of Trustees, na aro nke Onye isi oche UO Michael Schill, kwadoro ịnyefe aha Unthank Hall na ụlọ obibi ọhụrụ a ga-emeghe n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 2021
Ou De Beers bụ ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa nke na-ahụ maka igwupụta diamond, inweta diamond, ire ahịa diamond, azụmaahịa diamond na ụlọ ọlụ na-emepụta diamond
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na oghere oghere, nnukwu alluvial na igwu ala n'ụsọ oké osimiri
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mba iri atọ na ise ma na-egwupụta ihe na Botswana, Namibia, Ndida Africa, Canada na Australia

Site na mmalite ya na afọ nari iri na asatọ iri asatọ na asatọ ruo mmalite nke narị afọ nke puku iri abụọ na otu, otu De Beers na-achịkwa pacent iri asatọ ruo pacent iri asatọ na ise nke nkesa diamond siri ike ma were ya dị ka onye na-achị onwe ya
Asọmpi emebiwo ikike zuru oke; Otu De Beers ugbu a na-ere ihe dịka pacent iri abụọ na ọọkara nke mmepụta diamond siri ike n'ụwa site na uru site na ụlọ ọrụ ya zuru ụwa ọnụ na azụmaahịa ahịa

Onye ọchụnta ego Britain bụ Cecil Rhodes guzobere ụlọ ọlụ ahụ na afọ narị iri na asatọ ịrị asatọ na asatọ, onye onye isi diamond Ndịda Africa bụ Alfred Beit na ụlọ akụ N M Rothschild & Sons nke dị na London kwadoro

N'afọ nari iri itoolu iri abụọ na isii, a họpụtara Ernest Oppenheimer, onye Germany kwagara Britain na Ndịda Africa bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'ala Anglo American na onye America na-ahụ maka ego J
Morgan, ka ọ bụrụ onye otu De Beers
O wuru ma mee ka ụlọ ọlụ ahụ bụrụ nke ụlọ ọlụ diamond zuru ụwa ọnụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na afọ narị iri itoolu, iri ise na asaa
N'oge a, ọ na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ esemokwu, gụnyere ọnụahịa na omume ntụkwasị obi, a na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ naghị ewepụta diamond ụlọ ọlụ maka mbọ agha Amerịka n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
De Bruyn bụ aha nna nke Dutch na Afrikaans

Sunday Joshua Martins (De General) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ome nto ochi si Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka vidiyo ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-emetụta mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ hapụsịrị skits na-atọ ọchị
Joshua Martin mụrụ na 15 March, 1999 na River State Port Harcourt (Bori camp) Nigeria
O si na Owan East Local Government nke Edo steeti
A zụlitere ya na Port Harcourt, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ebe ahụ
Na 2015, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Joshua kpebiri ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Echiche ahụ sitere n'aka enyi ya bụ onye gwara ya banyere ihe nkiri nkiri ahụ
Ọ bụ mpụta mbụ ya na cinematography na ọrụ ndu
Mgbe e mechara, ọ banyere Mahadum Benin (UNIBEN)
N'afọ 2018, Jọshụa Martins malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ome nto ochi
O kere duo aha ya bụ Dream Comedy na enyi ya aha ya bụ Major
N'afọ 2019, o bipụtara vidiyo “When your guy is a real gee”, ọ bụ nke zuruoha, wee gbasaa na netwọk mmekọrịta
Ọ ghọrọ vidiyo ya kacha ewu ewu nke nwere nlele 10,000 n'oge ahụ
Jọshụa nwere aha otutu “The Bag God”
Jọshụa chọrọ ịbụ ọkàiwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ maghị na ime ihe na nduzi bụ ezi nkà yaỌ mara mma n'ịgba egwu
Ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-agba egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-atọ ọchị na vidiyo dị iche iche nke ndị okike ọdịnaya ama ama mere dịka Ayo Onye Okike wdg
De General alụbeghị di, ọ nweghịkwa mmekọrịta ọ bụla nke ọha mmadụ mara
