Dean Fourie (amụrụ na 15 Disemba 1969), bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Five Fingers for Marseilles, Action Point na Mandela Long Walk to Freedom
N'afọ 1993, o mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya nke a kpọrọ Tropical Heat ebe ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ dị ka 'Guide'
Otú ọ dị, o mere ihe nkiri atọ ọzọ n'otu afọ ahụ, nke gụnyere ihe nkiri TV Daisy de Melker ma rụọ ọrụ 'Rhodes Cecil Cowle'
N'afọ 1996, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Rhodes
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Lance Corporal', ọrụ nkwado
Ọrụ ya kachasị ama na ihe nkiri sinima sitere na Renegade Cowboy na 2014 na mgbe ahụ 2017 blockbuster Five Fingers for Marseilles
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Honest John' na ihe nkiri ikpeazụ nke nwetara nnyocha dị mma ma gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa
E mechara gosipụta ya na ngalaba Discovery na 2017 Toronto International Film Festival
N'ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado 'Ray Reiser'
N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Inspector' na ihe nkiri Action Point
N'afọ 2019, ọ sonyeere ihe nkiri telivishọn Welcome to Murdertown na ọrụ nkwado 'Ken Leighty'
Dean Mitchell (amụrụ n'afọ 1957) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise nke na-arụ ọrụ na mmiri na mmanụ
A kpọtụrụ ndị ọ na-ekwu màkà ha, ndị sitere n'ọdịbendị ndị Africa America, màkà omimi mmetụta uche ha, izere mmetụta dị mfe, na mmetụta zuru oke nkè imewe
A mụrụ Mitchell na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania na 1957, ma zụlite ya na Quincy, Florida
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Columbus College of Art and Design na 1980, Mitchell kwagara Kansas City, Missouri wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Hallmark Cards
Ọ nọgidere na Hallmark màkà afọ atọ sochirinụ wee malite ịbanye na asọmpi nka mbà na nke mbà ụwa
Mgbè Hallmark kwụsịrị ọrụ ya na 1983, o kpebiri ịchụso ise ihe dị ka ọrụ ógè niile

Ihe osise Mitchell abụwo isiokwu nke ọtụtụ isiokwu, a na-anọchite ányá ya na ebe ngosi nka na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkọta, gụnyere Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art, Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, na Saint Louis Art Museum
Ndụ ya bụ isiokwu nke akwụkwọ ihe osise màkà ụmụaka, Against All Odds Artist Dean Mitchell's Story
Mitchell gosikwara stampụ US, dị ka stampụ Louis Armstrong nke 1995 na usoro Jazz Musician
Deana Lawson (1979) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe, onye nkuzi, na onye na-ese foto nke bi na Brooklyn, New York
Ọrụ ya na-emetụta mmekọrịta chiri anya, ezinụlọ, ime mmụọ, mmekọahụ, na ịma mma ndị isi ojii
A na-eto Lawson maka ikike ya ịkọwapụta ihe ndị dị iche iche nke ahụmịhe ndị Afrịka Amerịka 'Ọrụ Lawson na-enyocha mmekọrịta chiri anya, mmekọrịta, mmekọahụ na mmekọrịta
O nwere ọrụ na International Center for Photography collections
E gosipụtara foto ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na galarị gụnyere Museum of Modern Art, Whitney Museum of American Art, na Art Institute of Chicago
Lawson bụ onye mmeri nke Hugo Boss Prize n'afọ 2020 'maka ihe dị ịrịba ama ọ rụzuru na nka nke oge a'
Ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya, The Hugo Boss Prize 2020 Deana Lawson, Centropy na-egosi na Mee 7-Ọktoba 11, 2021 na Solomon R
Guggenheim Museum
A mụrụ Lawson n'afọ 1979 na Rochester, New York
Ọ natara BFA
ya n'afọ 2001 na foto na Mahadum Pennsylvania State, na MFa
ya na foto na Rhode Island School of Design (RISD) n'afọ 2004

Banyere afọ nke abụọ ya na Penn State, Lawson kwuru, sị, 'M rutere n'oge na-adịghị anya ma ọ bụ m ga-aga n'ihu na nzere azụmahịa ma ọ bụ na m ga-awụpụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ahụ na-agagharị ma ghọọ onye na-ese ihe
M wụliri elu ma eleghị anya azụ'
Lawson na di mbụ ya, onye na-ese ihe Aaron Gilbert nwere ụmụ abụọ
Lawson bụ osote prọfesọ nke foto na Mahadum Princeton na Princeton, New Jersey malite n'afọ 2012
N'afọ 2021, a kpọrọ ya Dorothy Krauklis profesọ nke Visual Arts na Mahadum Princeton Lewis Center for the Arts
Ọ kụzikwaara na California Institute of the Arts (CalArts), International Center for Photography, California College of the Arts, na Rhode Island School of Design
Lawson na-ekwu na ọ na-enwe mmasị na foto n'aka ndị na-ese foto n'Afrịka dịka Carrie Mae Weems na Renee Cox
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, Lawson nwere ihe ijuanya na enweghị agụmakwụkwọ gbara ndị na-ese foto na-acha

Nke a mere ka ọ mụtakwuo banyere ndị na-ese ihe ojii, dị ka Lorna Simpson, onye ọrụ ya kpaliri ya ịchụso foto dị ka ihe na-ese foto 'Nanị inwe ihe nlereanya ahụ - ịghọta na ọ bụghị naanị na ọ masịrị m ime foto kamakwa na m nwere ike ime nke a n'ezie, ị maara, ọ dị ezigbo mkpa iji gosipụta onwe m dị ka onye na-ese egwu'
A na-amata foto Lawson nke ọma site na nhazi ha nke ọma, ihe mejupụtara ya, na nlebara anya na akara ọdịbendị ojii
A na-eme foto ya nke ọma, na-ekwusi ike na 'ihe ndị dị ike nke ime ụlọ ojii'
Mgbe ọ na-ezo aka n'ihe ndị ọ na-ekwu maka ya dị ka 'ezinụlọ', ihe nlereanya ya na-abụkarị ndị ọ na'amaghị na-ezute na mberede n'ebe ọha na eze

Na nkwupụta onye na-ese ihe, Lawson dere, sị 'Ọrụ m na-ekwu maka ihe ọmụma nke onwe site na akụkụ miri emi; foto ndị ahụ na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ ndị a ga-esi dee mmekọahụ, ime ihe ike, ezinụlọ, na ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mgbe ụfọdụ n'ụzọ nkịtị, n'ahụ
Dear Affy bụ ihe nkiri ntochi ihunanya nke 2020 nke Samuel Olatunji dere ma duzie ya
Ndị na -eme ihe nkiri a bụ Toyin Abraham, Enyinna Nwigwe, Kehinde Bankole na Odunlade Adekola na -ebute ụzọ
Onye bịara ọhụrụ Bianca Udo mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya site na ihe nkiri a
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na 14 nke ọnwa Febụwarị 2020 dabara na ụbọchị Valentine wee nata nyocha dị iche iche site n'aka ndị nkatọ
Otu nwanyị nka na-anụ ọkụ n'obi nke na-achọ ịlụ nwoke nwere nrọ ya na-ahụ n'anya na-eche ihe mgbochi na ihe ịma aka mberede ihu mgbe ọ tụụrụ ime na mberede ọbụna tupu alụmdi na nwunye ya
Nke a mebiela atụmatụ na atumatu akwadoro ya nke ọma wee malite ọrụ siri ike ịchọ nna nwa
Ọ bụ Allister Sparks dere ma nyochaa usoro ahụ, onye kọwakwara ya
Usoro ahụ so akwụkwọ Sparks, nke akpọrọ Tomorrow Is Another Country
Àtụ Nelson Mandela
Falak bụ nwata nwanyị dị afọ abụọ nke a nabatara na AIIMS Trauma Centre na New Delhi, India, na 18 Jenụwarị 2012, nwere okpokoro isi gbajiri agbaji na akara n'ahụ ya
Otu nwata nwanyị dị afọ iri na ise nke ná ekwụ na ọ bụ nne ya kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Nwa agbọghọ ahụ gwara ndị dọkịta na nwa ọhụrụ ahụ siri n'ihe ndina wee daa
A nabatara ya na okpokoro isi gbajiri agbaji, ogwe aka gbajiri agbaji, akara mmerụ mmadụ n'ahụ ya niile na ntì nke ejiri ígwè na-ekpo ọkụ mara
Ndị dọkịta na-enyocha nwa ọhụrụ ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ ahụmahụ siri ike nakwa na ọbụnadị n'ụlọ ọrụ trauma ha ahụtụbeghị nwa ọhụrụ nọ n'ọnọdụ dị otú ahụ
Baby Falak nwụrụ na 15 Machị 2012, mgbe njide obi, nke atọ ya n'ime ọnwa atọ
N'oge ọnwụ ya, a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-agbake nke ọma n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-arịa ọrịa obi na-adịghị mma
A maghị ọtụtụ ihe gbasara ọmụmụ Falak na ezinụlọ ya na mbụ
N'ezie, ndị nọọsụ nọ na ICU nyekwara ya aha Falak
Otu nwata dị afọ iri na ise na-azọrọ na ọ bụ nne ya kpọgara Falak n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ndị uwe ojii malitere ịchọ nne mụrụ ya
Na 1 Febụwarị 2012, ha kwuru na ha achọtala nne ya, Munni
Na mgbakwunye, a chọpụtara na o nwere ụmụnne abụọ ma kewapụ ya na nne ya n'ihi ndị na-azụ ahịa mmadụ
Ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ghọgburu nne Falak bụ Munni n'alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ bụ ndị mesiri obi ike na ha ga-elekọta ụmụ ya atọ nke ọma
Ụmụ nwanyị ahụ kewara ụmụ ha n'etiti ha
E zigara nwanne nwanyị Falak n'ụlọ ya na Bihar
Ya na nwa ya dị afọ ise si n’otu okenye gaa n’ọzọ, ruo mgbe ya na otu nwata nwoke bi na nwoke lụrụ di
E jidere ụmụ nwanyị ndị a - Lakshmi na Kanti Choudhry
Otu nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na ụma kpọtara nwatakịrị ahụ na Aiims nke kwuru na ya bụ nne ya nakwa na mmerụ ahụ bụ n'ihi ịdakwasị n'àkwà
Mana ọdịdị nke mmerụ ahụ ekwekọghị na nkọwa a na-enye
N'oge ọgwụgwọ ya, ọ butere ọrịa meningitis ma nweekwa nkụchi obi abụọ

Ọ lanarịrị ịwa ahụ ụbụrụ isii, agbakeela site na ọrịa ụbụrụ na 17 Febụwarị, gụnyere ịwa ahụ iji wepụ mmiri nke na-agbakọta n'ime ụbụrụ ya, a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-agbake kpamkpam ma na-atụ anya na a ga-agbapụ ya
Ọ nọ na ventilator ihe karịrị otu ọnwa, ebe ọ nwere nsogbu iku ume, ma nwee nnukwu ọrịa akpa ume, ọbara na ụbụrụ
Ndị dọkịta anwaleela ngwakọta dị iche iche nke ọgwụ nje iji chịkwaa ọrịa ahụ nke gosipụtara nsonaazụ ya ma wepụ nwa ahụ na ventilator ma gbanwee ya n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ na 2 Machị
Nwa ahụ gosipụtara ihe ịrịba ama nke mgbake na ndị dọkịta na-akpọ ya 'nwa ọrụ ebube' mgbe ewepụrụ ya nkwado ndụ n'ime izu ole na ole a nabatara ya
Ndị nọọsụ na-elekọta ya kwuru na ọ nwere ike iku ume n'onwe ya ma welie anya ya, enwerekwa mmegharị n'akụkụ aka
'Ọ na-ebe ákwá ma ndị otu ahụ niile ga-aga ịhụ ihe mere ya
Onye ọ bụla n'ime anyị nwere mmasị na nwa ọhụrụ ahụ ma ugbu a ọ nọkwaghị
Ọ bụ ihe na-akụda mmụọ,' ka otu n'ime ndị nọọsụ kwuru
N'ịbụ ndị nsogbu Falak kpaliri, ọtụtụ ndị India yana ndị nọ na mba ofesi kwere nkwa ịnabata ya mgbe ọ gbakee
Falak nwere nkụchi obi nke atọ n'elekere 9 40 nke abalị na 15 Machị 2012
Mgbalị niile ndị dọkịta mere iji mee ka ọ dịghachi ndụ kụrụ afọ n'ala

Deepak Agrawal, onye enyemaka Prọfesọ nke Neurosurgery na AIIMS Trauma Centre bụ onye na-elekọta ya site n'ụbọchị a nabatara ya n'ebe ahụ, kwuru, sị, 'Ebe ọ bụ na nke ya (Falak) bụ ikpe ahụike na iwu, e mere postmortem
Njide obi ahụ mere n'ihi ọrịa obi, nsogbu nke obi mgbe obi na-akụ ngwa ngwa
O mere na mberede
Ọ na-ehi ụra n'ihe ndina ya mgbe njide obi ahụ mere
' Nne ya lie nwa Falak n'ogige olili Ferozeshah Kotla na 16 Maachị 2012, mgbe ntụziaka nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ọdịmma Ụmụaka
E jidere mmadụ iri na ikpe ahụ tinyere Rajkumar, ana akpo kwá Mohammad Dilshad (ezigbo aha ya) nwoke gbahapụrụ nwa ahụ ya na enyi ya nwanyị dị afọ iri na ụma Lakshmi
Nwa agbọghọ ahụ n'onwe ya bụ onye e metọrọ n'aka nna ya Vijender
Na 13 Machị 2012, e jidere onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ahụ ma a ga-ekpe ya ikpe maka igbu ọchụ na-abụghị igbu ọchụ
A chọpụtakwara ná nwanne Falak dị afọ ise site n'ụlọ onye na-ere ahịa na mpaghara Uttam Nagar nke West Delhi ebe ndị uwe ojii Delhi si Muzaffarpur na Bihar chọtara nwanne ya nwanyị Sanobar
Ndị dọkịta kwuru sị na ya na ndị nọọsụ na-egwuri egwu, n'ihi ya, a kpọpụrụ ya na ICU
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Febụwarị, Falak na nne ya bụ Munni, onye lụrụ nwoke na Rajasthan
Nne ya nọ kita n'ụlọ mgbaba na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọdịmma Ọha na Nirmal Chaya Complex na New Delhi
Ọ si Ebonyi Steeti

N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa iri n'afọ puku abụo na iri na ise (24Ọktoba n'afọ 2015), a họpụtara Debbie dị ka onye nke abụọ n 'Nwa agbọghọ kachasị mma na Naịjirịa nafọ puku abụọ na iri na ise (2015) mgbe ọ na-anọchite anya Ebonyi Steeti
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na asọmpi Miss Universe 2015 na US
Debbie nọchitere anya Naijiria na Miss World 2016

Deborah Anne 'Debbie' Schäfer (amụrụ na 18 Disemba 1966) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọka iwu South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka Minista Mmụta nke Western Cape Provincial na onye otu Western Cape Províncial Parliament maka Democratic Alliance (DA) site na 2014 ruo 2022
Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ na gọọmentị mpaghara, Schäfer jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly site na 2009 ruo 2014
A mụrụ Schäfer na 18 Disemba 1966 na Pietermaritzburg na Natal Province, ọ bụkwa onye German
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Johannesburg, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị
Ha mechara kwaga Cape Town ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bergvliet High School na 1984
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na English na Psychology na Mahadum Cape Town ma, mgbe e mesịrị, na 1990, ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Laws n'otu mahadum ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Mark Schäfer
Ha nwere ụmụ ejima, ha abụọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 2017
Schäfer rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Cape ruo afọ iri na abụọ tupu ọ malite ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka onye kansụl ngalaba
Schäfer sonyeere Democratic Party na 1999
N'afọ 2002, a họpụtara ya na Cape Town City Council dị ka onye kansụl maka ngalaba 62, mpaghara nke gụnyere mpaghara Wynberg na Constantia
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl nke ngalaba 73
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa a ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na National Assembly na ntuli aka nke afọ 2009
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2009, ndị Democratic Alliance wepụtara nkwupụta, nke a họpụtara Schäfer ka ọ bụrụ osote minista ndị uwe ojii
Onye isi ndị omeiwu nke Democratic Alliance bụ Athol Trollip gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ Shadow Cabinet ya na Septemba 2010 wee họpụta Schäfer dị ka osote minista Shadow nke ikpe na mmepe iwu
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ya mgbe onye isi ndị omeiwu a họpụtara ọhụrụ Lindiwe Mazibuko kwupụtara Shadow Cabinet ya na Febụwarị 2012
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ omebe iwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii Ndị Ikpe
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke Western Cape Provincial
Praịm Minista Helen Zille mara ọkwa na nkwupụta sochirinụ na a họpụtara Schäfer dị ka Minista Mmụta nke Provincial
Ọ bụ onye isi oche onye ọka ikpe nke Western Cape bụ Jeanette Traverso ṅụrụ iyi
Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na Mee 2019, onye isi ala a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ Alan Winde kwupụtara na Schäfer ga-anọgide dị ka Minista Mmụta nke Provincial

N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, Schäfer kwupụtara na ọ ga-agba arụkwaghịm dị ka Minista nke Mmụta na dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke mpaghara iji nweta ọrụ na ngalaba iwu na United Kingdom
O kwuru, sị 'Ọ bụ nnukwu ihe ùgwù m ije ozi dị ka Minista Mmụta nke Provincial na Gọọmentị Western Cape n'ime afọ asatọ gara aga
Ekwenyere m na ahapụla m Ngalaba ahụ n'ebe ka mma karịa ka m chọtara ya, enwere m obi ụtọ maka ọrụ anyị rụzuru, ọnụ
Otú ọ dị, adị m njikere ugbu a ịpụ na ndụ ọha
' O kelekwara onye bụbu praịm Zille na praịm Winde maka ịhọpụta ya na kọmitii mpaghara ha
Ọ ga-anọgide na-abụ onye otu DA
N'ụbọchị na-esote, Winde kwupụtara na Minista na-ahụ maka ego na ohere akụ na ụba, David Maynier ga-anọchi Schäfer dị ka Minista na na-ahụ Maka agụmakwụkwọ
Schäfer gbara arụkwaghịm na gọọmentị mpaghara na ndị omeiwu mpaghara na 15 Mee 2022
Àtụ Winde provincial cabinetÀtụ Zille provincial cabinet
Debora Patta (amụrụ na 1 Septemba 1964) bụ onye nta akụkọ mgbasa ozi South Afrika na onye na-emepụta telivishọn na-eme nchọpụta
A mụrụ ya na Southern Rhodesia (nke bụzi Zimbabwe) ma si Calabria, Ịtali
A mụrụ Patta na Southern Rhodesia (nke bụzi Zimbabwe), ebe nna ya bụ onye Ịtali kwagara dị ka onye ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Nna ya si na Rome, Ịtali ma o biri ebe ahụ nwa oge mgbe ọ dị obere
Ezinụlọ ya ndị Ịtali sitere na Praia a Mare na Calabria
Ọ na-ewere Ịtali dị ka ebe obibi ya nke abụọ ma na-aga ebe ahụ mgbe niile
Patta gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Social Sciences na 1984
Ọ kụziri aerobics n'oge dị mkpirikpi mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji
Patta sonyeere Redio 702 dị na Johannesburg dị ka onye nta akụkọ na 1990 wee rụọ ọrụ ya ruo n'ọkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ akụkọ na 1994 na onye nchịkọta ọrụ pụrụ iche na 1997
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2013, Patta laghachiri na Redio 702 dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu na redio
Patta arụwo ọrụ maka etv, ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn mbụ nwere onwe ya n'efu na South Afrika, kemgbe e bidoro ya na 1998
Ọ malitere dị ka onye isi na-ede akwụkwọ na Johannesburg ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi akụkọ nke akụkọ etv
Na 7 Mee 2013, etv na eNCA kwupụtara na Debora Patta agbaala arụkwaghịm 'iji chụsoo ọdịmma ndị ọzọ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi mba ụwa niile'
A kọwawo Patta dị ka 'onye na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ doro anya', 'ruo n'ókè', 'onye na'atụghị egwu' na 'ịbụ olu maka ndị na-enweghị olu'
Patta azaghachila nkatọ nke akụkọ ya site na nkwupụta okwu dịka 'nke pụtara na m na-arụ ọrụ m nke ọma' na 'anyị na-eme nke a n'ihi na anyị nwere ezi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya'
N'ọnwa Eprel nke afọ 1995, Patta lụrụ Mweli Mzizi
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere agbụrụ dị iche iche zutere ibu iro ruo otu afọ, n'ihi ya, ọ tụrụ ya n'anya maka nzaghachi dị mma nke ndị na-ege ntị na ọkwa ya
Ha lụrụ na Jenụwarị 1996 ma ọtụtụ narị ndị ọbịa gụnyere Nelson Mandela bịara agbamakwụkwọ ahụ

Mgbe agbamakwụkwọ ahụ gasịrị, Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ime gwara Mzizi na alụmdi na nwunye ahụ adịghị irè n'ihi na o mejupụtara akwụkwọ chọrọ ka ndị isi ojii kwuo na ha alụghị di ma ọ bụ nwunye
Newsweek kọrọ na mmadụ ole na ole maara ihe a chọrọ na 'ọtụtụ n'ime alụmdi na nwunye mba ahụ nwere ike ịbụ iwu na-akwadoghị n'anya ndị ọchịchị'
A họpụtara Patta dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị FHM 50 kachasị eru n'ụwa site n'aka ndị na-agụ FHM South Afrika n'afọ 2003
Na Junu 2003 ọ lụrụ Lance Levitas
O nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Nwa ya nwanyị nke okenye, Chiara Mzizi, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi YoTV, ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ ndị ntorobịa nke SABC 1 na-agbasa, ọ bụkwa nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town
Ka ọ na-erule 2019, Patta bi na Johannesburg na nwa ya nwanyị nke nta, Ella, na onye mmekọ ya bụ Andrew Levy
Patta enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite

Deborah Adetunbi Egunyomi (amụrụ ya na 10 Disemba 1953) bụ prọfesọ nke agụmakwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu na nke na-abụghị nke iwu kwadoro nke akpọrọ (Continuing and Non-formal Education) na asụsụ bekee na ụlọ Akwụkwọ Mahadum Ibadan, nke dị na Ibadan, Naịjirịa, ebe ọ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi nke Ngalaba Mmụta Ndị Ntorobịa nke akpọrọ Adult Education Department na asụsụ bekee
Ọ bụ bu onye otu nleta nke gọọmentị nke Ekiti steeti guzobere iji kwudobe College of Health Science and Technology nke oma, Ijero-Ekiti
A mụrụ Egunyomi na obodo Ikole-Ekiti nke dị na Ekiti State, Nigeria, Nne na Nna ya bu David na Esther Famoroti

Ọ guru akwụkwọ praịmarị na Metọdist, Ikole-Ekiti, na afọ 1959-1964, o were jee Saint Mary's Girls Grammar School maka agụmakmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'etiti afo 1964 na 1970, na Kwara State College of Education, Ilorin, site na 1974 ruo 1977
O mechara gaa Mahadum Ibadan maka BScEd ya n'etiti 1980 na 1983, tupu ọ nweta MEd na Atụmatụ Mmụta na 1984 na PhD
N'afọ 1986, Egunyomi malitere ije ọrụ nkụzi ya na Mahadum Ibadan dị ka onye nkụzi enyemaka
O sonyere na ọmụmụ ihe maka nguzobe nke ihe ọmụmụ nke Mpuga akpọrọ External Studies Programme na bekee, nke a na akpọ Distance Learning Centre ugbua na Mahadum Ibadan
E mere ya onye nkuzi na afọ 1992, onye nkuzi ukwu na afọ 1995, na kwa zi prọfesọ na afọ 2009

Ọ bụ onye na-anọchite anya onye isi na Ngalaba Mmụta Ndị Ntorobịa akpọrọ Department of Adult Education na asụsụ bekee n'etiti Febụwarị 2010 na Jenụwarị 2012 ma mesịa họpụta ya ọzọ dị ka onye isi nke Ngalaba ahụ na 2014
Dị ka nwanyị prọfesọ mbụ na Ngalaba Mmụta Ndị Ntorobịa, Egunyomi nyere nkuzi nke ise kwa afọ na Mahadum Ibadan na 2 Julaị 2015
Deboarh Egunyomi bu nwunye Adeyemi Egunyomi, onye bu Prọfesọ nke Botany la goru ezumike nká
A mụrụ Deborah Enilo Ajakaiye na afo 1940 na Plateau State na Northern Nigeria, ma bụrụ onye Naijiria geophysicist
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ prọfesọ physics na Africa na ọrụ ya na geophysics ekerewo òkè dị mkpa na Ngwuputa Ngwuputa na Nigeria
A mụrụ Ajakaiye na 1940 na obodo Jos, isi obodo Plateau State na Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwa nke ise n'ime ụmụ nke isii
Nne na nna ya kwenyere na agụmakwụkwọ nha anya nke nwoke na nwanyị ma kesaa ọrụ ụlọ n'etiti ma ụmụ nwoke ma ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1962 ọ gụchara na mahadum Ibadan wee nweta akararị na physics
Ọ nwetara nzere masters na Mahadum Birmingham dị na England, na 1970 nwetara PhD
na geophysics sitere na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello na Nigeria
N'ịbụ onye nwere mmasị na mgbakọ na mwepụ, Ajakaiye na-ekwu na ọ họọrọ ịchụso geophysics n'ihi na o kwenyere na ọ nwere ike inyere obodo ya aka
Ajakaiye ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ prọfesọ physics na Africa na 1980
Ọ kụziri na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello na Mahadum Jos, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke sayensị okike na nke ikpeazụ
Ejila ọrụ ya na geovisualization chọta ma ebe nchekwa mineral na mmiri ala na Nigeria
O mebekwara mapụ ike ndọda nke Nigeria, ya na ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị ya na-arụkọ ọrụ
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, o tinyere oge ya na ọrụ ebere nke Nigeria, CCWA, nke ohibere na 1991
Ajakaiye amatala maka ma ọganihu sayensị ya na enyemaka o nyere mba Nigeria
Nigerian Mining and Geosciences Society kwanyere ya ugwu maka ọrụ ya, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nwetara ihe nrite ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ojii mbụ nke Afrịka a ga-akpọ aha onye otu Geological Society of London
Akwụkwọ na mbipụta
Deborah sitere n'okpuru ọchịchị Ijero na steeti Ekiti, mana amụrụ ma zụlite na Ojota, Lagos steeti
Maka akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Victory Home na Government Girls Science secondary school, Kuje maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndirị ya
Ọ nwetara akwụkwọ nzigharị ya na Fabotas College of Education na Kwara steeti
N'afọ 2016, ọ nabatara na Mahadum Bingham ka ọ mụọ ọgwụ Physiology mana ọ kwụsịrị mgbe ọ nweghịzi ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ya
Ugbu a ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nwa oge na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa IMT na Dubai
Site na afọ 12, Deborah malitere ịzụ ahịa na-ere akwụkwọ akụkọ, beads, vases ifuru na akpa nye ezinụlọ na ndị enyi
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka nwa agbọghọ na-ere ihe n’ebe a na-ere akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
N'afọ 2013, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ ịmebe ihe nke dara
Mgbe ọ ka nọ na mahadum Bingham, ọ meghere ụlọ ahịa azụmaahịa mbụ ya, na ụlọ ezumike dị n'Abuja na-eji ego ọ na-echekwa ego na-enweta ego
Mgbe ahụ, ọ banyere mmekọahụ-usoro ọgwụgwọ na-amalite na-ere aphrodisiac ngwaahịa kpọmkwem ezubere iche maka, ma ọ bụghị nanị na ndị inyom di na nwunye
Ka azụmahịa ya na-eto eto, ọ batara n'ọrụ ugbo wee malite ugbo n'Abuja ịkpa anụ ụlọ, o mepekwara ụlọ ịwụ ndị ọzọ, ebe ịcha mma na ụlọ ahịa nkwalite ahụ
Deborah bụ onye a na-eme ihe ike n'ụlọ mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ma si otú a na-akwado ndị inyom ka ha gbalịsie ike ka ha mee ihe site n'enyemaka nke ngwaahịa ya, dị ka Royal Honey Syrup
Ọ gwakwara ndị inyom lụrụ di na nwunye ka ha na-ekiri ihe ndị na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ mgbe nile, na-edebekwa ọcha nke ọma iji mee ka ohere nke alụmdi na nwunye na-adịgide adịgide
Deborah Bell (afọ 1957, Johannesburg) bụ nwanyí South Africa na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe nke a maara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa
Bell nwetara akara ugo mmụta nka na Mahadum Witwatersrand n'afọ 1975 ma n'afọ 1986 ọ nwetara Masta nke Arts n'otu mahadum ahụ
Ọrụ ya malitere n'afọ 1982 na Bell enweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi naanị ya na nke otu na South Africa na mba ofesi
Site n'afọ 1983 ruo 1989 ọ kụziri ihe na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Mahadum nke South Africa
Ọ gaala ọtụtụ ebe na Africa, North America na Europe ma n'afọ 1986 ọ nọrọ ọnwa abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na Cité Internationale des Artes na Paris
Site n'afọ 1986 ruo afọ 1997 ya na ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa bụ William Kentridge na Robert Hodgins rụkọrọ ọrụ dị iche iche
N'afọ 1997, ha mepụtara usoro ihe oyiyi nke ọrụ Alfred Jarry na William Hogarth
Na njikọ onu, ndị na-ese ihe atọ ahụ emepụtala ọrụ nke ihe nkiri kọmputa
Deborah Bell bụ onye mmeri nke ọtụtụ onyinye, enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na nke onwe ya gburugburu ụwa
Nnọchịanya ndị otu, Rose Korber na-anọchite anya ndị na-ese ihe na Bay Hotel, Cape Town
Deborah Dancy, nke a makwaara dị ka Deborah Muirhead (amụrụ n'afọ 1949), bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-ese nnukwu ihe na mmanụ; ọ bụkwa onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na ónyé na-ese mgbasa ozi
A makwaara ọrụ ya na-agụnye foto dijitalụ
N'afọ 1981, ọ malitere ịkụzi na Mahadum Connecticut, Storrs, ébé ọ kụziri ihe osise ruo afọ iri atọ na ise ruo mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2017
Ọ natala onyinye ndị dị ka John Simon Guggenheim Foundation Fellowship, Women's Studio Workshop Studio Residency Grant, na YADDO fellowship
A mụrụ Dancy na 1949 na Bessemer, Alabama
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị Africa America nke ji ihe nketa na ndị nnà nnà ha kpọrọ ihe
Dancy natara BFA ya na Mahadum Illinois Wesleyan na 1973, yana MS na óbìbì akwụkwọ na MFA na eserese na Mahadim Illinois State na 1976 na 1979, n'otu n'otu
Ihe osise ya 'Seed Travel' pụtara na Stamford Museum na Nature Center
Dancy kụziri ihe osise na Mahadum Connecticut, Storrs rụo afọ irí atọ na ise tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na 2017

Ọrụ Dancy dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè ọtụtụ gallery na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere Museum of Fine Arts Boston, Birmingham Museum of Art na Alabama, na Baltimore Museum of Art
A họpụtakwara Dancy màkà onyinye Connecticut Children's Book Award màkà Illustration màkà The Freedom Business dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé édémédé
Deborah Dancy bụ Ónyé nduzi nka na ónyé na-ese ihe osise nke The Freedom Business, akwụkwọ nke enyi ya, Marilyn Nelson
Deborah Fraser (amụrụ n'abalị iteghtete nke ọnwa June n'afọ 1965 ruo abali iri na ise nke ọnwa ọnwa May afọ 2022) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu ozioma
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1985 dị ka onye na-akwado egwu, ma dekọọ abọm nke ya n'afọ 2000, nke akpọrọ Abanye bayombona, nke nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ahịa ma ree ihe karịrị otu nde na South Africa
Abọm studio nke iri nke Fraser bụ Uhambo (2016),otu egwu kporo ọkụ e mepụtara bụ 'Ngeke ngiyeke ukuthandaza'

O ritere ihe nrite SABC Crown Gospel Music nke mbụ na ngalaba Best Female Artist, n'a ngunye onyinye ndị ọzọ bu ihe nrite SAMA nke egwu ozioma kacha mma, awọd Metro maka egwu bozioma kacha mma, na Kora maka onye egwu ozioma kacha mma
N'afọ 1984, Fraser kwagara Johannesburg wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado ụda olu nyere Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Lucky Dube, Brenda Fassie, Rebecca Malope, Hugh Masekela, Jonas Gwangwa
N'afọ 2000, ewepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya bụ Abanye Bayombona N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma nke abọm mbụ ya, Universal Music bịanyere aka na ya
Na onwa Septemba afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ndị ikpe na Shine gospel show
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, Fraser mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri, Hola Mpinji! na-arụ ọrụ Ebony
Na emume nke iri abụọ na atọ nke South African Music Awards, a họpụtara abọm ya bụ Uhambo maka Best Traditional Faith Album
N'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, ewepụtara abọm studio ya OkaJehova Akanqotshwa
Fraser lụrụ pastọ si Naijiria bụ Sockey Okeke
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2021, Trinity International Bible University nyere Fraser asambodo nkwanye ùgwù na doctorate nke nkà ihe ọmụma n'ihi egwu
Ọ nwụrụ n'abali iri na ise nke onw Mee 2022 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na isii, na Chris Hani Baragwanath Academic Hospital, mgbe ọ riasiri sịrị ọrịa strok
Deborah Grant (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na America a mụrụ na Canada nke amaara màkà ọrụ ya na eserese na collage, ọkachasị màkà usoro ya 'Random Select'
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Harlem, New York
A mụrụ Grant na Toronto, Canada, na 1968, ma nọrọ afọ anọ mbụ nke ndụ ya na Canada
A zụlitere ya na Katọlik ma mgbè ụfọdụ mepụta ụlọ nsọ Katọlik n'ebe ndị a gbahapụrụ agbahapụ nke Brooklyn na nwanne ya nwoke
Grant nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts (BFA) na eserese na Columbia College Chicago na 1996
O nwetara Master of Fine Arts (MFA) site na Tyler School of Art na 1999
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị MFA ya, Grant gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'oge ọkọchị na Skowhagen School of Painting and Sculpture na Skowhogen, Maine
Site na 2002-2003, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na Studio Museum na Harlem
Ọrụ Grant gosipụtara akụkọ ifo na eserese na eserese

N'ịchịkọta ihe oyiyi sitere na isi mmalite dịgasị iche iche, site na ihe ọchị ruo akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe méré eme, ọ na-emepụta akụkọ ihe méré anya nke na-enyocha ọdịdị ọdịbendị, agbụrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Site na mgbawa nke agba na collage na ihe ndị dị mfe nke na-ekwu màkà echiche dị iche iche, Grant na-enyocha n'ime ọrụ ya '[T]echiche nke mgbasa ozi na-aga n'ihu ma ọ bụ ọgba aghara n'azụ uche anyị na ihe na-eme n'ihu anyị
E nyere Deborah Grant ihe nríte William H
Johnson n'afọ 2011
E gosipụtara ọrụ Grant n'ihe ngosi n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere
Deborah Maria Luisa Moore (amụrụ na 27 Ọktoba 1963) bụ ọnye England na-eme ihe nkírí
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye na-eme ihe nkírí Roger Moore na ónyé na-ese ihe nkírí Itali Luisa Mattioli
O mèrè nke mbụ ya na TV dị ka nwatakịrị na The Persuaders! ihe omume 'The Long Goodbye' nke nnà ya na Tony Curtis na-eme ihe nkiri, na mbido ọrụ ya, a na-akpọkarị ya 'Deborah Barrymore'
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkírí ndị dị ka Lionheart (1987), Alien Terminator (1988), 1990 comedy, Bullseye! (n'ihu nna ya), Chaplin (1992), Into the Sun (1992), na South Kensington (2001)
O yikarịrị ka a maara ya nke ọma na UK dị ka ihu nke mkpọsa mgbasa ozi Scottish Widows site na 1986 ruo 1995 mgbè Amanda Lamb nọchiri ya
O mechara were aha Deborah Moore
Ọ pụtara ugboro abụọ na mmepụta James Bond

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ odeakwụkwọ na 1989 biopic Goldeneye The Secret Life of Ian Fleming ma mesịa pụta dị ka ónyé na-elekọta ụgbọ elu na 2002 Bond film, Die Another Day, nke bụ ihe nkírí Bond nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ nke Pierce Brosnan
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri TV nke 1998 Merlin The Quest Begins, n'ihu Jason Connery, nwa nke onye bụbu Bond Sean Connery
Nna nna ya bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Robert Brown, ónyé nna ya na-eme na usoro telivishọn Ivanhoe na ihe nkírí Bond atọ
Deborah Oluwaseun Odeyemi (amụrụ na mkpụrụ ụbochị iri abụọ na-otu n'ọnwa Febụwarị na-afọ 1995) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba ọsọ nke na-agba 100 mita, 200 mita, 4 x 100 mita na sprint medley relay
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 100 mita relay na-afọ 2015 World Championships na Athletics na Beijing, China
Odeyemi nwalere na ọ nwere metenolone anabolic steroid na sample anakọtara na Nigerian Championship na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Julaị na-afọ 2015
A kagbuola nsonaazụ ya site na 2015 World Championships in Athletics ma nye ya mmachibido iwu afọ anọ site na egwuregwu

Deborah Owusu-Bonsu (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1984) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya dị ka Sister Derby bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Ghana, onye egwu na onye nlereanya nke Akan na onye na-eme ihe ngosi na etv Ghana
A mụrụ Deborah Vanessa Owusu-Bonsu na 25 Ọgọstụ 1984, nna Ashanti na nne ya bụ onye Romania
Nne na nna ya abụọ bụ ndị na-anakọta egwu ụwa na nka
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi televishọn, onye nlereanya, onye egwu, onye agụmakwụkwọ na onye na-ese ihe osise

Owusu-Bonsu bụ nwanne nwanyị nke onye egwu hip a ma ama bụ Wanlov the Kubolor onye pụtara na ihe nkiri Coz Ov Moni Owusu-Bonsu gara Kraist the King International School, mgbe ahụ Wesley Girls 'High School

Owusu-Bonsu gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor's Degree na Publishing Studies na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology sochiri Master Degree na Book / Journal Publishing na University of the Arts London
Owusu-Bonsu egosila ọkachamara ya na mmasị ya maka ubi ọ họọrọ site n'ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma maka obere ụlọ ọrụ yana nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na Ghana, United States na United Kingdom
N'afọ 2012, Owusu-Bonsu dekọrọ ma wepụta otu egwu (egwu) nke akpọrọ 'Uncle Obama' na-ezo aka na Barack Obama nke ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn United States CNN kpuchiri
Kemgbe afọ 2012, Owusu-Bonsu bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmemme The Late Nite Celebrity Show nke ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn etv Ghana na-agbasa
O mechakwara ga GHOne Television ebe ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi ya, Gliterrati maka obere oge tupu ọ nyefee Berla Mundi
Ya na onye egwu Medikal na-akpa ruo afọ atọ, tupu ha agbawa na 2018

Deborah Poynton (amụrụ na 1970) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa nkè a maara nkè ọma màkà nnukwu ihe osise ya, nke na-eme ihe n'eziokwu, nke na'ụzọ zuru oke, nke na na-abụkarị nke ndị enyì na ezinụlọ
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town
A mụrụ ya na Durban, South Africa na 1970, nné na nnà ya guzobere ma na-elekọta ụlọ nzukọ na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma nwụọ mgbè ọ bụ nwatakịrị
Poynton tolitere na South Africa, England, Swaziland na United States, na-akwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi dị íchè íchè
Poynton maara site na mbido na ọ chọrọ ịbụ ónyé na-ese ihe
Tupu ọ laghachi South Africa iji see ihe, ọ gàrà Rhode Island School of Design afọ abụọ n'etiti 1987 na 1989, mànà ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ihe osise Poynton na-ekwu màkà omume nke ile ányá, nkè ikpughe 'aghụghọ' n'azụ omume nka ọdịnala, karịa ka ha bụ windo n'ime ụwa na-enweghị isi

Site n'ịmepụta oghere, na-etinye ihe ndị na-ekwekọghị n'etiti ihe ndị yiri ka ọ bụ ihe okike, Poynton na-emepụta esemokwu n'ime ọrụ ya nke e bu n'uche ime ka ónyé na-ekiri ya màrà ihe na-adịghị mma banyere omume nghọta
Ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike ịkọwa ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya dị ka ihe dị adị, usoro ole na ole na-apụ na ọmarịcha ọ na-ahụkarị na ọrụ na-enweghị atụ
Ihe ngosi ya ugbu a, Scenes of a Romantic Nature, na-adabere na njikọ ya na Germany site na ịkọwa ihe osise ala nke ónyé na-ese ihe na Germany bụ Caspar David Friedrich

Ọrụ ya na-ejikọkarị okwu sitere na akụkọ ihe méré eme ọdịnala, site na usoro ihe osise na ọnọdụ nke ihe ndị ọ na-achị, na ihe ngosi nke ndụ nke ógè a iji mepụta mmetụta nke enweghị ike ịchọpụta ihe; n'ụzọ dị otú a, Poynton na-emepụta ọrụ nke na-adọrọ mmasị na ọgụgụ isi
A na-egosipụta àgwà ọrụ ya a na usoro ya Safety & Security, 2006
Site n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Julaị ruo ubochí àtó n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, ọrụ Deborah Poyntonz na-adịbeghị ányà gosipụtara na Drents Museum na Assen
Ihe ngosi akpọrọ Beyond Belief bụ ihe ngosi nka mbụ nke Poynton na Europe
Debbie Shokoya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke a na-egosiputakari mgbe niile na ihe nkiri Yoruba
Aha ya zuru oke bụ Deborah Ajijolajesu Shokoya
Ọ bụ nwa amaala nke steeti Ogun, Ijebu remo kpọmkwem
A mụrụ Debbie ma zụlite ya na steeti Lagos Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na steeti Legas tupu ọ kwaga steeti Oyo ebe ọ gụrụ Public Administration na Polytechnic Ibadan Oyo steeti
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma gosipụta na usoro TV dị iche iche dị ka Tales of Eve , So wrong So wright
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi na TV na onye ọchụnta ego ma mee ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ na TV nke akpọrọ 'Exciting moments with Debbie'
O nwere akara na-elekọta akpụkpọ anụ nke akpọrọ stay Natural site na DBS
A maghị ọnọdụ alụmdi na nwunye ya
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ wepụrụ esemokwu banyere onye na-emeeme ihe nkiri na-eburu ndị mmekọ ndị ọzọ, ọ dọrọ ndị ikom aka na ntị ka ha ghara ịlụ ugboro abụọ ma soro onye mmekọ ha
Deborah katọkwara mmachibido iwu nke okada na steeti Lagos, o kwuru na ọ bụ naanị ụzọ ụfọdụ ga-esi nye ezinụlọ ha nri ma ọ bụ ihe kachasị mma n'ihi okporo ụzọ dị na steeti ahụ
O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Olugbeja olorun na 2020 nke Adebayo Salami (Oga Bello), Muyiwa Ademola, Bimbo Oshin, Olaniyi Afonja (Sanyeri), Biola Adebayo, na Wale Akorede
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ punch, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na-ahọrọ igosi ihe nkiri ịhụnanya ma ọ bụrụhaala na ọ naghị agụnye ịgba ọtọ
Deborah Willis (amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 5, n'afọ 1948) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese ihe ugbua, onye na-ese foto, onye nlekọta foto, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye edemede, na onye nkuzi
N'ime ihe nrite na nsọpụrụ ya, ọ bụ MacArthur Fellow 2000
Ugbu a, ọ bụ Prọfesọ na Onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Foto na ọsise na Tisch School of the Arts nke Mahadum New York
A mụrụ Deborah Willis na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania nye Ruth na Thomas Willis n'ọnwa Febụwarị 5, afọ 1948
Willis bụ nne onye na-ese ihe Hank Willis Thomas
Nna ya bụkwa onye na-ese foto, mmekọrịta ezinụlọ ya pụtara ìhè na ọrụ dịka Daddy's Ties The Tie Quilt II (1992), na Progeny Deborah Willis na Hank Willis Thomas (2009)
Asambodo Wilis gụnyere BFA
na foto site na Philadelphia College of Art n'afọ 1975; MFA
na foto site na Pratt Institute n'afọ 1979; MA
na akụkọ ihe mere eme site na City College nke New York na 1986; na PhD
site na Cultural Studies Program nke Mahadum George Mason na 2001
Willis enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye na nsọpụrụ, gụnyere
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ese foto, Bernice Steinbaum Gallery nọchitere anya Willis na Miami na Charles Guice Contemporary na Berkeley, California
Ihe ngosi ya gụnyere
Na iguafọr Gregorian, Disemba bu onwa iri na abuo, na afo, bu otu onwa n'ime asaa nwere ubochi ruru 31 (iri ato na otu) n'ime hwo
Na mgbe gara-aga, Disemba bula onwa iri, site na afo nwela onwa iri
Afo nwere onwa iri na abuo ubochi kena
Disemba bu kwaa onwa no na azu dị mee kpochie afo nile

Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 30 tupu mgbe afo na agwu

Decolonise the Internet 2020
Goethe-Institut bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ndị Germany na-ahụ maka agụm akwụkwọ n'obodo Germany, mmekọrịta omenala na ọdịnala nke mba Germany na mba ụwa ndị ọzọ
Wikimedia User Group Nigeria (WUGN) bụ otu n’ime ngalaba otu narị, iri isii na ise so n'otu nke Wikimedia Foundation Inc, di na San Francisco, United States nke America

E guzobere ya dị ka Wikimedia Nigeria Foundation Incma bụrụ otu ọrụ akwụghị ụgwọ na-arụ ọrụ n'efu na Nigeria nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịkwalite atụmatụ nkwekọrịta iji ọrụ maọbụ nka, echiche,atụmatụ onye ọzọ rụọ ọrụ na enweghị nsogbu ọbụla dika ebumnuche otu Wikipedia na ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ si kwenye
Igbo Wikimedians User Group (IG Wiki UG) so na otu ndị Wikimedia Foundation User Groups, bụ otu ndị Wikimedi na-agbasi mbọ ike iji kwadoo ọrụ wiki dị iche iche metụtara asụsụ na omenaala Igbo
Na mbido, a hụrụ ịntanetị dị ka ihe dị mkpa maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na nka nhatanha

'N'afọ 2020, n’etiti oke oria ogbo n'ọha zuru ụwa ọnụ nke dị ugbu a, oge eruola ịjụ Onye a na-akọ akụkọ ya na onye na-akọ akụkọ ndị a na ịntanetị? Ma olee otu ọgụgụ isi nke sayensi, Algọridim na Bots na-eme ka echiche anyị banyere ụwa nwee nkewa na megide? Nke a bụ ebe ọrụ Goethe-Institut gbasara 'Decolonise the Internet' na-agbado ụkwụ

Asọmpi edemede 'Decolonise the Internet bụ asọmpi ewubere iji kwado ma gosipụta ọrụ ụmụ nwaanyị Naịjirịa di iche iche na-arụ site na ịdenye maka ha na Wikimidiya iji kwalite ozi na akụkọ banyere ụmụ nwaaanyị na Wikipedia

Tupu oge nnwere onwe, nnukwu ọhịa echekwara, ihe dị ka 96,518 square kilomita (km2) nke ala na-anọchite anya pasentị iri abụo na asaa (27%) nke oke ọhịa na pasentị iri (10%) nke ala niile echekwara dị ka ebe echedoro

Pasentị iri isii na isii (66%) nke ebe nchekwa ọhịa dị na mpaghara Savana nke mba ahụ, pasentị iri abụo (20%) na-ada n'ime mpaghara ọhịa na-ekpo ọkụ na ndịda Naịjirịa na pasentị anọ bụ mmiri dị ọcha na mangroves nke ụsọ oké osimiri ndịda nke mba ahụ

Mgbe Naịjirịa nwetara nnwere onwe ya na (1960) wee ghọọ steeti nwere onwe ya, ọ ketara ogige ntụrụndụ mba asatọ (8) ogige ntorobịa, narị anọ na iri anọ na ise (445) ogige ntụziaka ọhịa, iri na abụọ (12) ogige ntụgharị na iri abụọ na asatọ (28) site n'aka ndị nchịkwa nke ndị na-achị ala maka nchedo na nchekwa nke ụdị dị iche iche nke ọhịa na mba ahụ
N'ụzọ dị mwute, nnukwu mpaghara ndị a e debere n'afọ 1950s adịghịzi
E mebiri ihe nketa a nke ukwuu, e mebiri ọhịa ndị a na-echebe, mebie, banye ma gbanwee ha maka iji ala ndị ọzọ, n'ihi nrụgide na-arịwanye elu nke ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arị elu na mba ahụ
Nigerian Conservation Foundation (NCF) kọrọ na Naịjirịa efunahụla ihe karịrị pasentị iri itoolu na isii (96%) nke oke ọhịa ya na ọnụego mgbukpọ ọhịa dị na 111% kwa afọ
Nsogbu a zuru oke nke mgbukpọ ọhịa, nkwarụ na ntụgharị ala maka ebumnuche ọrụ ugbo na ojiji ndị ọzọ, emetụtala ụdị dị iche iche nke ọhịa na mba ahụ
N'afọ 2005, e gburu 122% nke bụ ihe ya na hekta 11,089,000 (27,400,000 acres) na Naịjirịa
N'agbata afọ 1990 na afọ 2000, Naịjirịa efunahụla nkezi nke 409,700 hekta nke oké ọhịa kwa afọ na-aha ka nkezi nke mgbukpọ ọhịa kwa afọ nke 238%
N'agbata afọ 1990 na afọ 2005, Naịjirịa tụfuru 357% nke oke ọhịa ya n'ozuzu ya, ma ọ bụ ihe dị ka hekta 6,145,000

Mgbukpọ ọhịa nwekwara mmetụta dị ukwuu n'akụkụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke mba ahụ, ọkachasị gbasara nsogbu akụ na ụba, ọrụ ugbo, esemokwu na nke kachasị mkpa, ogo ndụ

Nnyocha e mere site n'afọ 1901 ruo afọ 2005 chịkọtara na e nwere mmụba okpomọkụ na Naịjirịa nke 11 °C, ebe mmụba nke okpomọkụ zuru ụwa ọnụ bụ naanị 074 °C
Otu nnyocha ahụ chọpụtakwara n'otu oge ahụ na mmiri ozuzo na mba ahụ belatara site na 81mm

Ọ bụ ezie na, ọtụtụ n'ime ihe na-akpali mgbukpọ ọhịa sitere na ihe ndị metụtara akụ na ụba, ebe ọ na-eduga n'ọtụtụ nsogbu akụ na ụba na mba na-adịghịzi ike
Tinyere nsogbu akụ na ụba, mgbukpọ ọhịa emeela ka o sie ike nke na ala ahụ enweghị ike ịmepụta ọtụtụ ọrụ ugbo nke bụ akụkụ nke ihe oriri na ndụ nke ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ

Ojiji a na-eji osisi na-agbanye ọkụ maka isi nri dị elu n'ime ime obodo nke mba ahụ ebe ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-elekwasị anya

Naịjirịa kwesịrị ịkwụsị nchọpụta nke mmanụ ala
Ọ dịghịkwa onye ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha kwesịrị ịkwụsị ịchọ mmanụ ọhụrụ, gas, ma ọ bụ mmanụ
Site na nyocha ndị ọzọ, Anyị ga-enwe idei mmiri ndị ọzọ, ọzara ndị ọzọ, okpomọkụ dị elu, na nrụgide mmiri dị elu, ala ndị ọzọ ga-efu na Niger delta
Naịjirịa, dị ka worldometer si kwuo bụ onye na-emepụta Liquid Petroleum Gas(LPG) ma nwee nnukwu nchekwa nke gas sitere n'okike
Otú ọ dị, ọnụ ahịa dị elu nke gas na kerosene emeela ka ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria bi n'ime ime obodo na mpaghara obodo iji jiri osisi sie nri
Ụlọ ọrụ International Energy Agency kwuru; ihe karịrị nde ndị Naijiria 120 na-adabere na nkụ na icheku ọkụ maka mkpa nri ha

World Wildlife Fund (WWF) mekwara nnyocha ma chọpụta na osisi ndị e ji mee ihe dị ka mmanụ isi nri mejupụtara ihe dị ka ọkara osisi ndị e wepụrụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị n'oké ọhịa ahụ, ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ha si mba ndị na-emepe emepe dị ka Naịjirịa

N'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ndị mmadụ na-abata n'obodo ukwu, ọ dị mkpa maka mmepe ngwa ngwa na inye ihe ntụrụndụ ọha na eze dị mkpa dị ka okporo ụzọ, ọdụ ụgbọ elu, ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè, àkwà mmiri, ụlọ akwụkwọ, n'akụkụ ndị a nke mba ahụ nke bụzi ihe iyi egwu maka mpaghara ọhịa ka a na-egbutu osisi na ahịhịa ma ọ bụ gbaa ọkụ iji nweta atụmatụ mmepe ndị a
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọtụtụ ọgbọ mbụ na ọgbọ nke abụọ dị ka Mahadum Calabar bụ mpaghara ọhịa dị ukwuu mana mkpa ọ dị iguzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a mere ka mbibi nke mpaghara ọhịa ndị a

Mgbasawanye nke mgbukpọ ọhịa na steeti Naịjirịa na obodo ya na-eme ka egwu na nsonaazụ ya

Site na nyocha e mere n'etiti afọ 2001 na afọ 2020 site na ọnụego na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Naịjirịa, a chọpụtara na steeti ise kachasị emetụta bụ Edo, Ondo, Cross river, Taraba na Ogun steeti n'otu n'otu na steeti Edo na-akwado oke ọhịa kachasị elu nke 268kha dịka nkezi nke 282kha
Steeti ndị ọzọ metụtara na Naịjirịa gụnyere Delta, Kogi, Osun, Ekiti, na steeti Oyo
Mkpa maka mmanụ koko na nkwụ na Cross River na Ondo State emeela ka mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi na mpaghara a
Ihe ndị na-esonụ bụ ụzọ isi lụso mgbukpọ ọhịa ọgụ na Naịjirịa
Ihe ngwọta ọ bụla maka nsogbu nke mgbukpọ ọhịa na Naịjirịa ga-abụ usoro nke na-etinye ma na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ siri ike n'akụkụ niile metụtara nsogbu ahụ
Mmụta kwesịrị ịgụnye mpaghara nke ike ọzọ, teknụzụ ka mma, njikwa ọhịa, mmepụta akụ na ụba, ọrụ ugbo na nchekwa nke ndị obodo na-adabere na ala
Ngwá ọrụ ike ndị ọzọ gụnyere ike mmiri, ike anyanwụ na ike ifufe
Ike anyanwụ bụ nhọrọ dị ukwuu maka Naijiria ma ga-enwe nsonaazụ pụrụ iche n'ihi ọnọdụ ala ya
Naịjirịa etinyelarị ihe igwe ikuku na ụfọdụ steeti ya mana ka a na-ewere usoro a na ike a ga-emepụta n'ụzọ dị mma na nke dị irè
A na-anabata nke ọ bụla n'ime atụmatụ ndị a n'ụwa niile dị ka ezigbo ụzọ ọzọ maka usoro mmepụta ike ugbu a ma ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gburugburu ebe obibi agbaala ume
Imeziwanye teknụzụ nke stovu nri ga-adị irè karịsịa maka Naịjirịa nke nwere ọtụtụ ezinụlọ ugbu a na-achọ nkụ maka usoro isi nri ha
N'afọ 2005, otu mba, nke a na-akpọ Coalition for Rainforest Nations, mepụtara mmemme iji belata ọnụego mgbukpọ ọhịa nke na-enye aka na ikuku CO2
A haziri mmemme ahụ maka mba niile na-emepe emepe nwere oké ọhịa mmiri ozuzo
Mba ndị na-emepe emepe na-enweta ego mgbe ha mechara nke ọma iji belata ikuku nke mba ha
REDD emeela echiche yiri nke ahụ, Mbelata Mgbukpọ site na Mgbukwu ọhịa na Mgbakọta Ọhịa na Mba Ndị Na-emepe emepe
Na REDD, mba ndị ahụ nwere ike ịnata ego ka ukwuu n'ụdị ego carbon nke enwere ike iji mee ihe na-adịghị ize ndụ na gburugburu ebe obibi

Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa na West Africa na-ekwe nkwa iweghachi nde 4 ma ọ bụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde 10 ala mebiri emebi dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ nke African Forest Landscape Restoration Initiative (AFR100) na ihe ịma aka Bonn

Gọọmentị steeti kwara emeela atụmatụ ịkụ osisi nde 25 iji lụso mgbukpọ ọhịa ọgụ site n'afọ 2047 na mmekorita ya na Nigeria Conservation Foundation (NCF)Ihe omume ahụ amalitela site n'ịkụ mkpụrụ 15,000 na obodo atọ Latayi, Agboro na Koro na mpaghara Pategi nke steeti ahụ

Òtù na-abụghị nke gọọmentị Folliage (Fold for Liberal Age Charity Initiative) na mmekorita ya na Ondo State kwere nkwa ịmalite ịkụ ọtụtụ nde osisi gafee steeti ahụ na isiokwu nke 'Kịa osisi, Zọpụta ndụ'
Ndị isi ụwa gụnyere Naijiria na-ekwe nkwa ịkwụsị mgbukpọ ọhịa site n'afọ 2030 site na iwelite ijeri $ 192 iji kwụsị ma gbanwee osisi furu efu
Dege Feder (a somụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'Ethiopia nke bi na Israel
Ọ bụ onye nhazi egwu na onye njikwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwu Beta, onye egwu na onye na-ese ihe
Feder na-ejikọta ihe osise nke ịgba egwu ọdịnala Etiopia na ịgba egwu nke oge a na nke Israel
A mụrụ Dege Feder na mpaghara Gondar nke Ethiopia
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Israel na 1985 dịka akụkụ nke Operation Moses
Ọ malitere ọrụ ịgba egwu ya dị ka onye na-agba egwu na Ruth Eshel's Eskesta otu egwu Ethiopia ma hazie ọtụtụ n'ime ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ìgwè ahụ
N'afọ 2005, ọ natara nzere BEd ya na Arts Education na Mahadum nke Haifa, kemgbe oge ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ndị otu egwu Beta, nke ndị na-agba egwu Esketa guzobere
Ọ ghọrọ onye njikwa ndị otu ahụ n'afọ 2014
N'afọ 2021, Feder natara 'Ministry of Immigration Prize' maka ihe osise pụrụ iche na onyinye ya nye ọha mmadụ Israel

Site na 1999–2005, Feder so Esketa rụọ ọrụ ndị isi, ma sonye na ebe ndị isi na Israel, dị ka Suzanne Dellal Center for Dance and Theater, na ememme dị iche iche ma na Israel ma na mba ofesi (dịka na Croatia, Ukraine, France, South Africa, New York, Philadelphia, Boston na Chicago)

Feder bụ onye guzobere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwu ndị ntorobịa, nke gụnyere Desta na Tezeta, nke na-eme n'ofe Israel niile, ma rụọ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye nkuzi ịgba egwu ndị ntorobịa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi maka ndị ntorobịa na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
N'afọ 2005, mgbe Feder malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Beta, a kpọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ha rụọ ọrụ na US, Colombia, Poland, Ecuador na Ethiopia
N'afọ 2009, Feder soro Haifa Symphony Orchestra bụọ abụ
N'afọ 2011, ọ malitere ọrụ a na-akpọ 'Degedrum', ya na onye na-eti egwu Elad Neeman, nke ọ na-agba egwu ma na-abụ abụ
Usoro ihe omume ahụ mere njem na US na Israel
N'otu afọ ahụ, o dekọrọ abọm nke egwu mbụ nke e debere na uri n'asụsụ Amharic na Hibru, ya na Lela, otu egwu egwu nke Etiopia ọ tọrọ ntọala, nke raara onwe ya nye ịme egwu ya na ngwá ọdịnala
Feder na-ese ihe ka ukwuu na acrylic na akwa
Ihe osise ya na-ejikọkwa ihe osise na ncheta nke Etiopia, na-ekwusi ike na ihe osise nke ụmụ nwanyị

Degitu Azimeraw Asires (amụrụ na 24 Jenụwarị na afọ 1999) bụ onye Ethiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
N'afọ 2019, ọ meriri na Amsterdam Marathon ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 2 19 26
Ọ nọchiri anya Ethiopia na 2019 African Games ma merie ọlaọcha na ihe omume ọkara marathon nke ụmụ nwanyị
Degue Broadcasting Network (DBN) aka
DBN Television bu ụlọọrụ nke Maazị Osa Sonny Adun guzobere na Naịjirịa na 1986
Ọ malitere mgbasa ozi ya na 1995 otu afọ tupu Gọọmentị Naịjirị ewepụ usoro mgbasa ozi
DBN malitere mgbasa ozi na 1995 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ onwe onye site n'aka onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi a maara nke a na-akpọ Mr Osa Sonny Adun
Ọ malitere ọrụ na Lagos ma mesịa nwee ọrụ na Abuja

Dehlia Victoria Umunna bụ Klinikalụ Prọfesọ nke Iwu na osote daịrektọ nke Instituutu na-ahụ maka iwu mpụ (CJI) n'ụlọakwụkwọ iwu nke Harvard
Prọfesọ Umunna bụ ọkachamara ama ama n’obodo na iwu mpụ, ịgbachitere ndị e boro ebubo mpụ na tiori, mkpochi ọtụtụ mmadụ, yana esemokwu agbụrụ
A mụrụ Umunna na Lọndọn, Ịnglandị, na 1973 site na nna onye Naịjirịa na nne Siera Lionu, o toro na Naịjirịa
O nwere ụmụ nne nwoke abụọ
Umunna natara nzere bachalọ ya na Kọmunikeshọn site na Mahadum nke Steeti Kalifonia , dị na San Bernardino, n'afọ 1995

O nwetara nzere JD ya n'ụlọakwụkwọ iwu nke Mahadum George Washington n'afọ 1998, ebe e nyere ya onyinye JB Shapiro maka Mmasị Ọha, yana nzere mastas na Nchịkọta Ọhaneze site n'ụlọakwụkwọ Harvard Kennedy n'afọ 2011

Mgbe Umunna gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, Umunna sonyeere ndị ọrụ na-agbachitere ọha na eze nke distrikt nke Kolumbia, ebe ọ nọchitere anya ọtụtụ narị ndị na-eto eto na ndị okenye ihe na-esiri ike
N'afọ 2002, ọ Pụraktishọna Na Rezidensi na Mahadum America nke kọleeji nke iwu nke Washington, ebe ọ kuziri ma lekọta ụmụ akwụkwọ na Civil Clinic
Umunna sonyeere ndị ọrụ ụlọakwụkwọ iwu nke Harvard n'afọ 2007 dị ka onye nkuzi gbasara ahụike na Instituutu nke HLS na-ahụ maka iwu mpụ (CJI)
A kwagoro ya n'ọkwa Osote daịrektọ nke CJI site n'aka-Diin Martha Minow n'afọ 2013
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, a họpụtara Umunna dị ka Prọfesọ nke Clinical Law na HLS n'afọ 2015

Ugbu a ọ na-enwe mmasi na nkụzi, ịdụ ọdụ, na ịdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ọdụ, ebe ndị Klaasị nke afọ 2020 n'ụlọakwụkwọ iwu nke Harvard họpụtara ya iji nye okwu nke mbụ n'ime okwu anọ ya e depụtara n'usoro nke nkuzi 'Last lectures' nke ụlọakwụkwọ iwu a

Edemede Umunna bu 'Rethinking the Neighborhood Watch How Lessons from Nigerian Villages Can Creatively Empower Communities to Assist Low-Income, Single Mothers In America,' bụ nke e bitara n'oge na-adibeghị na American University Journal of Gender Social Policy and Law
Deir el-Bahari ma ọ bụ Dayr al-Bahri (Arabic , , lit
'ebe obibi ndị mọnk nke North', Coptic ̆ ̆ ̀, lit
Nke a bụ akụkụ nke Theban Necropolis

Ụlọ nsọ ahụ n'onwe ya nwere ogige ihu na ọnụ ụzọ mbata, nke mgbidi gbara gburugburu n'akụkụ atọ, na mbara ala nke ihe owuwu square buru ibu nke nwere ike ịnọchite anya mkpọmkpọ ebe mbụ nke si na mmiri nke ọgba aghara guzoro na ya
Ka ụlọ nsọ ahụ na-eche ihu n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, o yikarịrị ka a ga-ejikọta ihe owuwu ahụ na ofufe anyanwụ nke Rê na mbilite n'ọnwụ nke eze
Ebe a na-elekwasị anya na Deir el-Bahari bụ Djeser-Djeseru nke pụtara 'Onye Nsọ nke Eziokwu',Ụlọ nsọ Hatshepsut nke ozu
Ọ bụ Senenmut, onye nlekọta eze na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke Hatshepsut chebere ma mejuputa ya, chepụtara ma tinye n'ọrụ, ijere ozi maka ofufe mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na ịsọpụrụ ebube nke Amun
E nwere ala atọ dị larịị nke ruru mita iri itoolu na asaa n'ịdị elu
A na-ejikọta ogige ndị a site na ogologo rampa nke ogige gbara gburugburu
Ọdịdị nke ụlọ nsọ Hatshepsut kwekọrọ n'ụdị Theban oge ochie, na-eji ogidi, ụlọ ikpe, ụlọ nzukọ hypostyle, ogige anyanwụ, ụlọ ụka na ebe nsọ
Thutmose nke Atọ wuru ụlọ nsọ ebe a, raara nye Amun
Achọpụtara na 1961, a kwenyere na ejiri ya mee ihe n'oge ememme mara mma nke ndagwurugwu
A maghị ọtụtụ ihe banyere ihe mgbagwoju anya ahụ, ebe ọ bụ na a gbahapụrụ ya mgbe ọ nwesịrị nnukwu mmebi n'oge mbuze ala na Dynasty nke iri abụọ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e ji ya mee ihe dị ka isi iyi nke ihe owuwu ma n'oge Ndị Kraịst ọ ghọrọ ebe ili ozu ndị Coptic
Nke abụọ, ili 'ihe nzuzo' nke Senenmut - onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye na-elekọta ụlọ nke lekọtara owuwu ụlọ nsọ maka Hatshepsut - malitere n'ime ụlọ ahụ
E bibiri ili Senenmut n'oge ochie, mana ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ndị ahụ ka dị
E bu n'uche ka ọ bụrụ ili buru ibu ma ụzọ ya karịrị 100 yards (92 m) n'ogologo
Otú ọ dị, a rụchabeghị ya ma lie Senenmut n'ebe ahụ
O nwere ili ọzọ, na-adịghị anya na Deir el-Bahari, ebe o nwere ike itinye ozu ya, mana e mebiri ya ma zuo ya ohi
Deirdre Wolhuter bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri a ma ama nke gụnyere, Friend Request, Charlie Jade na Kalahari Harry
A mụrụ ya na Canada dị ka nwa nwanyị nye nna Afrikaans na nne Canadian
N'afọ 1989, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta diplọma ya na okwu na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Cape Town ma mesịa gụsịa akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts n'otu mahadum ahụ
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede Jonathan Pienaar
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri

Ha gụnyere Outpost, King Lear, Circles in a Forest, Macbeth, The Man with the Thirteen Children na The Tempest N'afọ 2006, ọ natara onyinye Micheal Mac Liammoir maka ọrụ ya na egwuregwu Happy Endings Are Extra

Ewezuga ha, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri dịka The Crane Man, How Expensive was the Sugar, Hollywood in My House, Jimmy in Pink, A Pawpaw for My Darling, The Red Phone, Borderline, Master Harold, Boys na Forever

Dekha rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na-enye ọzụzụ na mmepe nke ndị na-azụ atụrụ na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara na nke mba ụwa na mba dị iche iche, gụnyere Cambodia, Jordan, Ethiopia, Somalia, South Africa, Netherlands, Israel, Palestine, Zimbabwe, UK, Uganda na Kenya
Ọ bụkwa onye mmekọ nke na-aza esemokwu ma rụọ ọrụ n'oge gara aga dị ka onye nkuzi na onye nhazi mmụta nke RTC
Enwere ike ịgụ ụfọdụ n'ime nghọta ya na nke ime udo na akwụkwọ 'Mediation and Governance in Fragile Contexts Small Steps to Peace' nke e bipụtara na 2019
Enwere ike ịchọta clkjhps nke ajụjụ ọnụ nke 2010 na 2011 na Dekha n'ịntanetị
N'afọ 2007, e nyere Dekha ihe nrite Right Livelihood Award

Ndị ọka ikpe ahụ kelere ya 'maka igosi n'ọnọdụ agbụrụ na ọ dịbendị dị iche iche otu esi eme ka ọdị iche okpukpe na ndị ọzọ dị n'otu, ọ bụrụ mgbe esemokwu ime ihe ike gasịrị, ma jikọta ọnụ site na usoro mmekorita nke na-eduga n'udo na mmepe'
E nyekwara ya Gernika ́s Peace and Reconciliation Prize na 2008 (Basque Country) na Hessian Peace Prize nke Germany na 2009
Na 7 Julaị 2011, Dekha, di ya Abdinoor, na onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ha nọ na-aga nzukọ udo na Garissa, mgbe ụgbọ ala ha kụrụ ụgbọala
Di ya na onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ya nwụrụ ozugbo
Dekha merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu ma buru ya gaa Nairobi
Ọ nwụrụ obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị n'ụlọ ọgwụ Aga Khan na elekere 1145 nke ụtụtụ, na 14 Julaị 2011
Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na asaa
Ayodele Basil, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Del B, bụ onye Naijiria (onye na-edepụta) onye injinia ụda, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

A maara ya nke ọma maka imepụta egwu Kcee 'Limpopo', nke gara n'ihu ka a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Abụ nke Afọ na mbipụta 2013 nke The Headies N'afọ 2012, o mepụtara egwu 'Shake' nke Flavour N'abania, nke nwetara otuto dị egwu n'etiti ndị nkatọ egwu
A mụrụ Del B na Kano Steeti, Northern Naijiria, nne na nna ya bụ ndị obodo Kwale
Tupu ọ nweta nkwanye ùgwù, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka injinia studio na MidiCorp Studios
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ mepụtara egwu D'banj 'Why Me'
O dekọrọ egwu Kcee nke akpọrọ 'Limpopo' - egwu nke mere ka a họpụta ya na 2013 Headies
O mepụtara egwu abụọ 'Kind Love' na 'On Top Your Matter' site na abọm studio nke Wizkid, Ayo 'On Top Your Matter' nwetara nyocha dị mma n'etiti ndị nkatọ egwu
Ọ malitere na nọmba itoolu na MTV Base Official Naija Top 10 music video chart
O mechara gaa n'ihu n'elu chaatị ruo ọtụtụ izu, na-enweta nkwanye ùgwù Del B ọzọ

E kwuola Del B dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na abọm studio gụnyere Seyi ma ọ bụ Shay nke Seyi Shay; Testify nke Harrysong; Ghetto University nke Runtown; Take Over nke Kcee; The Baddest nke Davido; Blessed and Thankful nke Flavour N'abania; na Ayo nke Wizkid

Del B gosipụtara njirimara ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe mgbe ọ wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Too Proud' na afọ 2012 wee gaa n'ihu ịpụta na egwu akpọrọ 'So Nice', nke DJ Neptune, na afọ 2015
Del B nwere weebụsaịtị na ọnwa Mee afọ 2020 na aha Del B World
Site na weebụsaịtị, ị nwere ike ile ma gee ntị na vidiyo YouTube na abụ ya ugbu a
Gaa na 'Del B Official Website' wwwdelbworldcom
A na-eme atụmatụ na Ayodele Basil nwere ihe ruru $ 650,000
Onye na-elekọta mmadụ nke ọma, Del B alụghị di ugbu a
Ayodele Basil dị afọ iri atọ na anọ
Micheal Abimboye nke Premium Times na-akọwa ụdị mmepụta Del B dị ka ụdị mmepụta nke na-enye onye na-ese ihe ohere iji paịpụ ha ma gosipụta ikike olu ha
Delara Darabi (Persian *) (ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1986 rụọ 1 Mee 2009) bụ nwanyị Iran Gilaki nke a mara ikpe ọnwụ mgbe a mara ya ikpe maka igbu nwa nwanne nna ya na 2003
Ọ bụ ezie na Delara kwuru na mbụ na o mere mpụ ahụ, o mechara kwughachi ma kọwaa na enyi ya nwoke tọrọ ya, Amir Hossein, mere ka ọ ghaa ụgha banyere ihe ahụ merenụ iji chebe ya
Dị ka Delara na ndị ọzọ maara ikpe ahụ si kwuo, Amir Hossein bụ onye gburu ọchụ ahụ n'ịgbalị izu ohi n'aka onye bara ọgaranya nke ezinụlọ Darabi
A kwụgidere ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Rasht n'ubochi nkè mbụ n'ọnwa Mee n'ime afọ 2009
Darabi jere ozi afọ isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka izu ohi n'ụlọ ikpe ọnwụ mgbe a mara ya ikpe (Na Iran, ndị mkpọrọ na-anọkarị n'ụlọ mkpọrọ tupu e gbuo ha)

Nà mbụ ikwetara, mana o mechara kwughachi, na-ekwu na enyi ya nwoke, Amir Hossein, mere ka o kweta ikwupụta site n'ime ka o kwenye na a ga-egbu ya (dịka ọ gaghị anọ n'ọtụtụ ebe, ebe ọ bụ nwata; mana nke a abụghị ikpe na Iran)
Ógè ọ nọ n'ụlọ ikpe ọnwụ, Darabi, ebe ọ zụlitere ịhụnanya maka eserese mgbe ọ dị obere, rụchara ọtụtụ ọrụ nke gosipụtara mkpọrọ ya
N'ụlọ mkpọrọ, o dekwara uri
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya bụ uri akpọrọ 'Ụlọ mkpọrọ', ọrụ akparamaagwa na nkà ihe ọmụma banyere ndụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
E gosipụtara nchịkọta nka ya na ihe ngosi na Tehran site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya na-eme mkpọsa ntọhapụ ya
Onye ọka iwu Darabi, Abdolsamad Khoramshahi, gbara akwụkwọ megide ikpe ahụ, na-arụ ụka na ikpe ya dabere naanị na nkwupụta ya nakwa na ikpe ya atụleghị ihe akaebe dị mkpa
A mụrụ Darabi na obodo Rasht dị n'ebe ugwu, na mpaghara Gilan
A kwụgidere Darabi n'ụtụtụ ubochi nke mbụ n'ọnwa Mee n'afo 2009
Onye ọka iwu Iran-American, Lily Mazahery, onye tinyere ozi ahụ na Twitter, kwupụtara akụkọ banyere ị kwụgbuo ya
Ụlọ ikpe dị ala na Rasht kpere Darabi ikpe, chọpụta na ikpe mara ya ma maa ya ikpe ọnwụ
Onye ọka iwu ya bụ Abdolsamad Khorramshahi
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kwadoro ikpe ahụ
O kwusiri ike na aka ya dị ọcha, ma kwuo na ọ nọ n'okpuru mmetụta nke ọgwụ ọjọọ n'oge izu ohi ahụ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ kwupụtara ma rịọ ikpe na mbụ
Mgbe oruru otú a, onye isi ụlọ ikpe nwere ikike inye iwu ka a kwụsị igbu ya na nyocha nke ikpe ahụ
A kọrọ na enyi nwoke ahụ bụ Amir Hossein enwetala mkpọrọ afọ iri dị ka onye na-akwado mpụ ahụ
Amnesty International ekwuola ọtụtụ okwu n'ihu ọha gbasara Darabi
Darabi bụ onye na-ese ihe ma dee uri ole na ole n'oge ndụ ya
O jiriwo ihe osise ya na uri ya gosipụta mmetụta ya
N'afọ 2008, e nwere ihe ngosi nke eserese ya na Tehran; e mere ihe ngosi yiri nke ahụ na Stockholm n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2007
Darabi nwara igbu onwe ya site n'igbu aka ya n'ubochi iri abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2007
Otú ọ dị, onye ya na ya nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ hụrụ ma kpọọ maka enyemaka
E bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ, ebe a kpọlitere ya
Edere akwụkwọ mkpesa n'ịntanetị iji zọpụta Delara site na igbu ya ma kesaa ya gburugburu ụwa
Arịrịọ ahụ rịọrọ ndị ọchịchị Iran, ọkachasị onye isi ikpe nke mba ahụ, ka ha debe nkwekọrịta na ụkpụrụ mba ụwa ma gbanwee ikpe Delara
Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị ụzọ ndị ọka ikpe nwere ike isi mee nke ahụ, ebe ọ bụ na ezinụlọ onye ahụ chọrọ qisas, ma ọ bụ ntaramahụhụ (ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ) kama diyya, nke bụ ego ọbara
Amnesty International dozigasiri ihe ga eme ka e zigara ndị ọchịchị Iran akwụkwọ ozi iji kwado Darabi

Dị ka otu n'ime ọgbụgba ndụ mba ụwa maka ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị (ICCPR) na nkwekọrịta maka ikike nke nwatakịrị (CRC), Iran abanyela na nkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ịghara igbu ndị mmadụ maka mmejọ ha mere mgbe ha na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ
N'agbanyeghị, kemgbe 1990, Iran egbuola ma ọ dịkarịa ala mmadụ iri na asatọ maka mpụ ha mere mgbe ha dị obere

N'ime afọ 2005 naanị, n'agbanyeghị na Kọmitii UN na-ahụ maka ikike nke nwatakịrị gbara ya ume na Jenụwarị ka ọ kwụsị omume ahụ ozugbo, ọ dịkarịa ala, e gburu ndị omekome asatọ, gụnyere mmadụ abụọ ka na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ n'oge e gburu ha
Tupu Darabi, ogbugbu ikpeazụ e dekọrọ nke onye omekome na-eto eto, Rostam Tajik, bụ n'ubochi irí n'ọnwa Disemba n'ime afọ 2005
Onye isi ụlọ ikpe nyere ikike igbu ya ọnwa abụọ, mana e nyere ndị isi ụlọ mkpọrọ Rasht ikike igbu ya
E gburu Delara Darabi n'elekere 5 00 nke ụtụtụ oge obodo n'ubochi nke mbụ n'ọnwa Mee n'afo 2009 na Rasht Central Prison, na-enweghị ọkwa tupu onye ọka iwu ya na ezinụlọ ya

Naanị nkeji ole na ole tupu a kwụgbuo ya, e kwere ka ọ kpọọ nne na nna ya oku ikpeazụ, ọ rịọkwara ha ka ha zọpụta ya, olu onye na-elekọta ụlọ mkpọrọ na-agwa ndị mụrụ ya na a ga-egbu ya maka mpụ ya ozigbo ozigbo
Déláwè bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Dele ma ọ bụ deleatur (/ˈdiːliː/, /ˌdiːliˈeɪtər/) bụ obelism (ihe nnọchianya na-agụ) nke a na-eji akara maka ihichapụ
A ṅa-ejikarị glyph maka Pfennig eme ihe iji nọchite anya dele na Unicode dị ka akụkụ nke ngọngọ akara ego, na U+20B0 ₰ GERMAN PENNY SIGN
Dele, okwu a na-ahụkarị na Bekee America nke oge a (mgbe ụfọdụ a ṅa-eji ya dị ka ngwaa, dịka
'Dele graff ahụ'), kwekọrọ n'ụdị Latin delere ('ihichapụ')
Otú ọ dị, Oxford English Dictionary na-ekwu maka ojiji mbụ na Bekee nke deleatur (Latin 'ka ehichapụ ya'), ma na-atụ aro na dele na Bekee nwere ike ịbụ mkpirisi maka okwu dị ogologo
Mmalite nke akara ahụ yiri ka ọ bụ mkpụrụedemede ochie D na edemede Kurrent na Sütterlin, dị ka mkpirisi maka dele ma ọ bụ deleatur
Ọ dị nṅọọ ka (ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị otu n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ) na akara maka penny German () nke bụ obere mkpụrụedemede ochie d, maka denarius
Dị ka ọtụtụ mkpụrụedemede na akara ndị e ji aka dee, ọdịdị ya dịgasị iche

A na-eji dele eme ihe na nyocha na idezi, ebe enwere ike ide ya n'elu ederede ahọpụtara n'onwe ya (nke mere na ọ na-adịkarị ka e gbatịrị agbatị), ma ọ bụ n'akụkụ ederede ahọọrọ, nke a ṅa-ejikarị ahịrị eme ihe
Enwere ike ịhazi ederede ma ọ bụ dele n'onwe ya site na brackets ndị gbagọrọ agbagọ n'elu na n'ala, dịka na ihe atụ dị n'elu, iji gosipụta na oghere fọdụrụ mgbe ehichapụ ya ga-emechi
Dị ka mkpa maka mmechi dị otú ahụ nwere ike ịkọwa site na ihe gbara ya gburugburu, Otú ọ dị, a na-ahapụkarị oghere ndị ahụ
Enwere ike iwepụ dele na stet
A na-eji akara Unicode eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka Flourish nke nkwado na Dutch
Dele Jegede (nke a na-akpọ dele jegede) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerika na-ese ihe, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye na-ese ihe osise, onye nlekọta, onye nkatọ nka, onye nchịkwa nka, na onye nkụzi
Jegede bụ Senior Post-Doctoral Fellow na Smithsonian Institution na Washington, DC, (1995)
Ọ kụziri na Spelman College, Atlanta dị ka Visiting Fulbright Scholar (1987-1988), mgbe ọ haziri ihe ngosi ahụ, Art By Metamorphosis

Edepụtara na Kelly na Stanley's 'Nigerian Artists A Who's Who & Bibliography', Jegede bụ Prọfesọ na Onye isi oche nke Ngalaba nka, Mahadum Indiana State, Terre Haute (2002 ruo 2005) na Prọfesọ nke nka na Mahadum Miami na Oxford, Ohio, (2005-2010)
Ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka Prọfesọ Emeritus na Mee 2015
Jegede bụ onye natara Distinguished Africanist Award nke Mahadum Texas
A mụrụ Dele Jegede n'afọ 1945 na Ikere-Ekiti, Ekiti Steeti, Naijiria
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Fine Arts (ya na First Class Hons, na-amụ ihe osise) na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, Naijiria
Jegede malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na Naịjirịa dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na onye na-ese ihe

Onye dịkọrọ ndụ na Josy Ajiboye, onye ọzọ na-ese ihe osise nke lekwasịrị anya na ụdị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, Jegede jiri katọn ya kwuo banyere oke nke ndị nwere ihe ùgwù ma dọta uche na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ozuzu ya

Aderonke Adesanya, onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọkà mmụta nke nka nke oge a nke Africa, na-ewere katọn Jegede dị ka 'ihe osise dị ukwuu nke ọkpụkpụ nke mba' Site n'afọ 1974 ruo n'afọ 1977, ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nka na Daily Times of Nigeria, nke kachasị emetụta kwa ụbọchị na Nigeria
Jegede gara n'ihu na-ebipụta katọn kwa izu na Sunday Times, akwụkwọ nwanne nke Daily Times ruo na ngwụsị afọ 1970 mgbe ọ hapụrụ maka ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Indiana

Obere oge mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 1983, ọ maliteghachiri ihe nkiri ọchị ya kwa izu, Kole Omole, nke gosipụtara nwata nwoke dị afọ ise, onye Jegede si n'aka ya mee ihe aghụghọ na ọchịchị ndị agha
Kjell Knudde na-ekwu na ihe nketa Jegede na mmetụta ya na eserese eserese na Naịjirịa bụ n'ihi na onye na-ese ihe osise katọn katọn katọn na ọchịchị aka ike na nke rụrụ arụ na mba ya
N'afọ 1977, ọ sonyeere ngalaba nke Center for Cultural Studies nke Mahadum Lagos ma hazie ihe omume ọdịbendị na njikọ ya na Second World and Black Festival of Arts and Culture (FESTAC 77)
N'etiti ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Center for Cultural Studies nke Mahadum Lagos bụ Bode Osanyin, onye na-eso ụzọ siri ike nke Bertolt Brecht na onye na-akwado ihe nkiri zuru ezu
E nwekwara Joy Nwosu , Akin Euba, na Lazarus Ekwueme, ndị isi Naijiria n'ihe gbasara egwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Mahadum nke Lagos dị ka Junior Research Fellow na 1977 wee pụọ na 1992 dị ka Director nke Center for Cultural Studies
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike ọ bụghị naanị dị ka ọkà mmụta, kamakwa dị ka onye na-ese ihe, na ụdị nke si n'ụdị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

O webatara satire n'ime eserese ya ma lekwasị anya na isiokwu nke mbubata mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, dịka n'ihe ngosi ya na 1991 na Lagos, isi obodo ọdịbendị na ego nke Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1989, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Society of Nigerian Artists (SNA), na-anọchi Solomon Wangboje, onye bụ onye Naijiria mbụ nwere nzere doctorate na agụmakwụkwọ nka

N'ime afọ atọ Jegede dị ka onye isi ala, Jegede nwetara akwụkwọ iwu maka SNA, mee ka usoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya site na ịmepụta isi nke steeti, hazie nnukwu ihe ngosi, 'Images of the Nigerian Nation,' na katalọgụ na-eso ya nke otu aha ahụ, ma duzie mkpọsa maka nguzobe nke National Gallery of Art
N'afọ 1993, Jegede nabatara ọrụ site na Mahadum Indiana State, Terre Haute wee kwaga ebe ahụ na ezinụlọ ya
O mepụtara ma kụziere ihe ọmụmụ na nka studio na akụkọ ihe mere eme
A nabatara Jegede dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọkà mmụta Afrịka bụ ndị gara n'ihu na-emepụta ntụziaka nke ubi ahụ site na nyocha ndị ọkà mmụta ọhụrụ ha na nchụso nlekọta

Nkatọ ya siri ike banyere nchịkọta Jean Pigozzi, nke a kọwara dị ka nchịkọta kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa nke nka Afrịka nke oge a emeela ka Thomas McEvilley katọọ ya nke ukwuu, onye kwenyere na nkatọ Jegede enweghị ntụkwasị obi n'ihi na ọ nọrọla oge dị ukwuu pụọ na Afrịka
N'aka nke ya, Elizabeth Harney na-ekwusi ike na ọnọdụ McEvilley bụ echiche dị mkpa banyere onye kwesịrị ikwu maka onye Na nkatọ nke ọrụ Jegede, Niyi Osundare na-ahụ Jegede dị ka “

onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agba egwu, na onye na-anụ ọkụ n'obi okwu, nke ọdịbendị dị egwu, dị iche iche, na nke na-akpali akpali nke Ukere na tupu nnwere onwe, tupu oge Pentikọstal [onye] nwere, site na mmalite afọ, ihe niile ọ na-ewe iji bụrụ onye na-ese ihe zuru oke
' N'afọ 2017, Jegede bụ otu n'ime ụmụ amaala a ma ama nke Ogoga nke Ikere-Ekiti, Oba Adejimi Adu, batara na Ikere Hall of Fame

N'afọ 2018, a kpọbatara Jegede na Society of Nigerian Artists Hall of Fame, otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria iri abụọ, gụnyere Ben Enwonwu, Yusuf Grillo, na Demas Nwoko, bụ ndị e nyere nsọpụrụ ahụ na mbipụta mbụ
A na-egosipụta nka Jegede na nchịkọta ọha na eze na nke onwe dị iche iche na Naijiria na United States
Akwụkwọ Jegede gụnyere
Dele Odule (a mụrụ na Nọvemba 23, 1961) bụ onye na-eme ejije na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naijiria

A họpụtara ya na 'Best Supporting Actor (Yoruba) n'afọ 2014 Best of Nollywood Awards maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Kori Koto Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka onye isi oche nke Theatre Arts and Movie Practitioners Association of Nigeria
A mụrụ Odule n'obodo Ile-Ife, Osun Steeti, mana ọ bụ onye Oru Ijebu, na Ijebu North local government dị na Ogun Steeti n'afọ 1961, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O nwere asambodo Grade II site na Teacher's Training College, Oru tupu ọ gaa Mahadum nke Ibadan, Oyo Steeti ebe ọ gụrụ Theatre Arts
Dele malitere ime ejije na otu ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Oloko Theatre Group n'okpuru nduzi nke Mukaila Adebisi
Ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya n'afọ 1986 tupu ọ pụta nnukwu n'ihe ngosi mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Ti Oluwa Ni Ile Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri karịrị narị abụọ
Oladele 'Dele' Abiola Ogunseitan bụ onye na-eme nchọpụta ahụike ọha na eze nke Naijiria bụ onye isi oche nke Mahadum California na Mahadum California, Irvine
Nnyocha ya na-atụle otú mmetọ na-egbu egbu si emetụta ahụike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye otu American Association for the Advancement of Science
A mụrụ Ogunseitan na Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, ebe ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na microbiology
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere masta ya n'afọ 1983, Ogunseitan kwagara United States
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum nke Tennessee dịka nwa akwụkwọ doctoral na-arụ ọrụ na microbiology gburugburu ebe obibi na microbial ecology
O nwetara Master of Public Health na Mahadum California, Berkeley
N'afọ 1998, e mere Ogunseitan Josiah Macy Jr
Foundation Fellow na Marine Biological Laboratory
N'afọ 1992 Ogunseitan sonyeere ngalaba na Mahadum California, Irvine
Nnyocha ya na-atụle nyocha nke ihe ize ndụ na-emebi ahụike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi, gụnyere nsị eletrik
Ogunseitan bụ onye guzobere oche nke Mahadum California, Irvine Department of Population Health & Disease Prevention (2007-2019)
Emere ya onye isi oche nke Mahadum California n'afọ 2019

Ọ na-eje ozi na Advisory Board nke UC Center Sacramento N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara ya dịka Faculty Fellow na Global Environmental Assessment Project na Belfer Center for Science and International Affairs, Kennedy School of Government, Harvard University na Cambridge, Massachusetts
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Ogunseitan na USAID's One Health Workforce-Next Generation project, nke na-achọ iwepụ nsogbu ahụike ọha na eze site na mmemme ọzụzụ maka ndị ọrụ ahụike

Dele Ojo (10 Julaị 1938 - 3 Mee 2018) bụ onye egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria
A na-asọpụrụ ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwu gbasaa ma mee ka ụdị egwu Jùjú mara mma
A mụrụ James Ogundele Ojo na 10 Julaị 1938 n'obodo Ilara-Mokin nke Obasanya na nwunye ya, bụ ndị nne na nna Ndị Kraịst nke mbụ
Nne nne nna ya bụ Osunre, nne na nna nna ya bụ Awoolaye na Ifalooro, ndị si Igbara-oke, bụ ndị na-efe okpukpe Ifa, ma biri na Ilara-Mokin na 1850s
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị St
Michael site na 1944 ruo 1955
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ praịmarị ọhụrụ na 1952, a kụziiri Dele otu esi eji typewriter site na nkwado nke nna ya
N'afọ 1954, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe ọnwa atọ gasịrị tupu e nye ya ọrụ ọzọ dị ka onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ obodo
Ọrụ egwu Ojo malitere mgbe ọ zutere Victor Olaiya onye were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye otu egwu ya
N'afọ 1969, Ojo guzobere otu egwu a na-akpọ 'Dele Ojo & His Star Brothers' mgbe Olaiya kpochapụrụ otu egwu ya
Ojo na ndị otu ya malitere idekọ ma na-eme egwu na nnabata dị ukwuu na ihe ngosi na Ekiti Steeti, Lagos na Osun Steeti
Ha gakwara ọtụtụ obodo na United States of America
Ọ nwụrụ na 3 Mee 2018 n'obodo ya bụ Ilara Mokin na Ondo Steeti mgbe ọ dị afọ 79

Delele bụ nri Zimbabwean, Zambia, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Botswana na Northern South Afrika nke e ji osisi dị n'ógbè ahụ nke otu aha ahụ mee, a na-ejikarị sadza ma ọ bụ phaletšhe ma ọ bụ Vhuswa eri ya
Okwu Bekee maka delele bụ Okra
A na-akpọ kwa Okra 'derere'
A na-akwadebe ya na soda na-eme achịcha ma mara ya nke ọma maka ọdịdị ya na-amị amị
Enwere ike ịcha Delele tupu esi nri, mana ọtụtụ mgbe a na-esi ya ọhụrụ
[citation needed]
Ndị Vha-Venda nke nde South Afrịka na-esi akwụkwọ Corchorus olitorius n'ụzọ yiri nke ahụ
Nri ahụ na Vhuswa (ap ma ọ bụ nri ọka) na-aga nke ọma
Okra bụ ahịhịa na-eto eto, nke nwere ntutu kwa afọ nke ezinụlọ mallow (Malvaceae) ma ọ bụ nri a na-eri eri
Ihe oriri ndị dị mkpa dị mkpa maka ndụ ahụike ma chọọ maka usoro dị iche iche nke biochemical na physiological n'ime ahụ
Vitamins, enzymes, mineral na amino acid bụ ihe ndị ahụ chọrọ iji rụọ ọrụ nke ọma
Mkpụrụ osisi Okra bụ ezigbo ihe na-eweta vitamin C
Akwụkwọ osisi ndị dị ka akwụkwọ okra nwere obere vitamin C ma n'ihi ya, a ghaghị ịgbakwunye ya
Akwụkwọ okra nke osisi dị ka nke a na-akpọ China nwere nnukwu collagen, nke dị mkpa maka ọdịdị nke ahụ mmadụ, ọkachasị mmezi na ọgwụgwọ anụ ahụ
Akpụkpọ ahụ, akwara na akụkụ ndị ọzọ chọrọ nri ma ọ bụ ihe mgbakwunye bara ọgaranya na sulphur compound (MSM) nke dị na collagen ma ọ bụ MSM na-enweghị isi, nke bụ nnu a na-eri eri
Ihe jikọrọ ya na ya bụ Aloe Vera slime ma ọ bụ gel
Ihe mejupụtara kemịkal nke okra ọhịa dịtụ iche na nke Aloe Vera gel n'ihe gbasara vitamin, enzymes, mineral na amino acid
Bush okra nwere ụdị dịgasị iche iche na nke nwere ike ịdị mfe dị ka isi nri ma ọ bụrụ na ejiri ya maka ebumnuche ọgwụgwọ ya na uru akpụkpọ ahụ nwere ike ịbụ isi iyi zuru ezu na ọnụ ala nke collagen
Vitamin C dị mkpa maka ihe ndị na-agwakọta collagen ka ahụ na-amịkọrọ
