N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, magazin ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ ezigbo mmalite na ọtụtụ egwu siri ike
O sonyere na Festival RTP da Canção 2017, na oku nke onye na-ede egwu Rita Redshoes, wee ruo na ngwụcha nke ihe omume ahụ
Deon Lotz (a mụrụ na 20 Julaị 1964) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, telivishọn, na ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma n'ụwa niile maka ọrụ ya na Mandela Long Walk to Freedom and Beauty (Skoonheid)
Ọ pụtara na mmepụta asụsụ Bekee na Afrikaans
A mụrụ Lotz na 20 Julaị 1964 na Cape Town
Ọ bụrụ abụ maka Drakensberg Boys Choir n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Lotz bụ nwa ikpeazụ nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ anọ, nwere nwanne nwoke na nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya na nwanne nwoke nke obere
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Lotz rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Lotz rụrụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi
Taa Lotz bi na Cape Town, na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri oge niile na Mother City, yana ịga Johannesburg maka ọrụ
A maara Lotz dịka onye nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị
N'afọ 2011, o nwere ọrụ dị mkpa na Beauty (Skoonheid), nke Oliver Hermanus duziri, nke ghọrọ South Africa maka Best Foreign Language Film maka 2011 Academy Awards
Beauty meriri Queer Palm Award nakwa 2011 Cannes Film Festival ma bụrụ ihe nkiri Afrikaans mbụ a ga-egosi na Cannes
Lotz natara onyinye Best Actor na 2011 Zurich Film Festival maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2012, a kpọkwara Lotz onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri maka ọrụ ya na Beauty na South African Film and Television Awards
Lotz rụrụ ọrụ Kobie Coetzee na ihe ngosi afọ 2013 Mandela Long Walk to Freedom

Lotz meriri Best Supporting Male na 2013 kykNET Silwerskeemfees (Silver Screen Festival) maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ezinụlọ Afrikaans, Faan se Trein A họpụtara ya maka onyinye SAFTA nke afọ 2015 maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ihe nkiri a
na Boys (2010), na Proteus (2003)
Lotz emeela ihe nkiri telivishọn South Africa, Europe, na North America, gụnyere The Book of Negroes (2015), Wallander (2015), When We Were Black (2014), na Flight of the Storks (2012)
N'afọ 2016, Lotz natara onyinye SAFTA maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma - TV Drama maka ọrụ ya na When We Were Black

Lotz apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri South Africa, gụnyere Liefde, Anna na onye na-eme ihe nkiri South African Sandra Prinsloo; nsụgharị asụsụ Afrikaans nke Anton Chekhov's The Seagull; na Moeder Moed en Haar Kinders, nsụgharị nke Bertolt Brecht's Mother Courage
Lotz meriri ihe nrite Best Supporting Actor maka Die Seemeeu na Moeder Moed en Haar Kinders na 2015 Klein Karoo Nasionale Kunstefees
A họpụtara onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ n'afọ 2008 maka onye na-ese ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na egwuregwu Wrestlers na Fleur du Cap Theatre Awards
Lemvo Jean Abou Bakar Depara, onye a maara dị ka Depara (1928 ruo 1997), bụ onye na-ese foto a mụrụ n'Angola nke rụrụ ọrụ na Democratic Republic of Congo
Depara zụrụ igwefoto vidio mbụ ya iji dekọọ agbamakwụkwọ ya n'afọ 1950; afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, e mere ya onye na-ese foto nke onye na-agụ egwu Zairian Franco
N'afọ 1975, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto na National Assembly of Democratic Republic of Congo
O jikwa ọtụtụ foto nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke Kinshasa n'oge ahụ
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1997, ọ hapụrụ nnukwu ihe ndekọ nke ihe ndị na-enweghị aha; ọtụtụ n'ime ha ka e bipụtaghachiri ma kpọọ aha maka ire ere kemgbe ọnwụ ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ Depara dị na nchịkọta nke Jean Pigozzi

Onye na- esote onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii (nke e gburu aha ya nkenke dịka DIG ) bụ ọkwá dị elu na ndị uwe ojii n'obodo dị iche iche dịka Bangladesh, India, Kenya, Malaysia, Nepal, Pakistan, Nigeria na Sri Lanka
Onye na-esote onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii (DIG) bụ ọkwa dị na ndị uwe ojii India, n'okpuru nnukwu onye isi ndị uwe ojii

Ọ bụ ọkwa ndị ndị uwe ojii India ndị jere ozi nke ọma dịka Superintendent Agadi ndị uwe ojii ma ọ bụ osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii (Nhọrọ ọkwa) wee bulie ya n'ọkwa aNdị isi ọrụ uwe ojii DIG na-eyi ihe ndị bekee kpọrọ Gorget patches na olu akwa ha nke nwere ọchịchịrị na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na akara na-acha ọcha na ya, yiri nke ọkwa SSPs Enweghi ogwụgwụ oke ọnụ ọgụgụ DIG otu steeti nwere ike ịnwe, ọtụtụ steeti nwere ọtụtụ DIG n'ime ha
DIG nọ na Nkewa ịkwụ ụgwọ nke anọ (site na ₹37,400 (US$520) ruo ₹67,000(US$940)) na ụgwọ ọkwa ₹8,900 (US$120)
Na ndị uwe ojii Bangladesh, ọkwa onye na-esote onye isi ndị uwe ojii bụ ọkwa dị mkpa
Ọ bụ ọkwa nke atọ kachasị elu na ike n'uwe ojii
N'ozuzu, DIG n'enye iwu ka ndị uwe ojii nọ nso
Mana oge ụfọdụ onye isi ndị uwe ojii n'enye DIG ibu ọrụ dị mkpa
Iji bụrụ ndị DIG ma karia, ndi isi uwe ojii ga-enwerịrị iru eru nke ule Bangladesh Civil Service (BCS)

Mgbe ahụ ka a ga-ahọpụta ya dịka osote onye isi superintendent ndi uwe ojii, na-esote nke ahụ, agbakwunyereuwe ojii supa mgbe ahụ, a ga-akpali ya ị bụ ndị uwe ojii Supa, wee gbakwunye osote onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii na onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii
Ọ bụrụ na ọ rụọ ọrụ nke ọma dịka ozi ụlọ na- eche, mgbe ahụ, ha nwere ike ịkwalite ya ruo ọkwa gbakwụnyere IOnye is nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii Bangladesh (IGP)
Ọkwa ahụ dị ka ndị isi na-ejide ọkwa nke odeakwụkwọ nkwonkwo na gọọmentị ma ọbụ ọkwa Colonel ma ọ bụ ọgbọ ya na ọrụ ndị agha
Na Obodo Kenya, osote onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii bụ ọkwa kpakpando atọ nke Ọrụ uwe ojii Mba Kenya
Ọ nọ n'okpuru onye isi nyocha ma dịkwa ozugbo n'elu karịa Agadi osote onye isi nyocha ndị uwe oji
Ndị uwe ojii abụọ ji ọkwa a ma na-achịkwa ndị ọrụ uwe ojii Kenya na ndị uwe ojii nhazi n'otu n'otu
Na Obodo Malaysia, onye na-esote onye isi ndị uwe ojii bụ onye nke abụọ kachasị n'ọkwa na ndị uwe ojii Eze Malaysia, ọkwa ya nọ n'okpuru onye isi ndị uwe ojii na kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii
Ndị isi nọ n'ọkwá a na-eyi akara/baajị okpueze onye isi ala dị n'elu kpakpando anọ nwere ise-aka (n'ụdị dayamọnd) gafere baton na kris
Na Obodo Pakistan, osote onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii bụ ọkwa kpakpando atọ nke ọrụ ndị uwe ojii nke ndị obodo Pakistan
Na Sri Lanka, dị ka Iwu ndị uweojii si dị, ọkwa nke Deputy Chiefs General bụ nke abụọ kachasị elu na Sri Lanka Police Force

Otu onye uwe ojii n'ọkwa a bụ maka ndị uwe ojii Range, nke mejupụtara mpaghara ala nke ngalaba abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa nke ndị uwe ojii nyere iwu site na onye nlekọta na-achịkwa mpaghara ndị uwe ojii ole na ole, na-elekọta Asst
Ndị nlekọta, nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii
N’usoro nkebi nke 21 (3) nke Iwu Onye Uweojii ‘Onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii ga-ahụta isonye osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii’

Derartu Tulu NL COL (Oromo , Amharic ደራርቱ ቱሉ; amụrụ na 21 Machị na afọ 1972) bụ onye Etiopia bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge, onye na-asọmpi n'okporo ụzọ, na-agbagharị mba, na okporo ụzọ na-agba ruo n'ebe marathon
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi oche nke Ethiopian Athletics Federation
Derartu tolitere na-elekọta ehi n'obodo nta Bekoji na ugwu ugwu nke Arsi Province, otu obodo ahụ dị ka Kenenisa Bekele
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nne nke Ejegayehu Dibaba, Tirunesh Dibaba na Genzebe Dibaba
Derartu bụ nwanyị Etiopia mbụ na nwanyị ojii Africa mbụ meriri nrite ọla edo nke Olympic, nke ọ meriri na ihe omume 10,000 m na afọ 1992 Barcelona Olympic Games
Asọmpi ahụ, ebe ya na Elana Meyer (South Africa) gbara ọsọ maka agba n'otu n'otu ụzọ n'ihu ndị ọzọ, malitere ọrụ ya

Ọ nọrọ n'èzí na afọ 1993 na afọ 1994 na mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere wee laghachi na asọmpi na afọ 1995 IAAF World Cross Country Championships ebe ọ meriri ọla edo, ebe ọ bịarutere na ọsọ ahụ naanị otu awa tupu mmalite
Ọ tọrọ n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu Athens n'enweghị ụra ruo awa 24
N'otu afọ ahụ, Fernanda Ribeiro meriri ya wee merie ọlaọcha na World Championships 10,000
Na 1996 bụ afọ siri ike nye ya
Na IAAF World Cross Country Championships Derartu tụfuru akpụkpọ ụkwụ ya n'ọsọ ahụ wee lụọ ọgụ iji nweta ọnọdụ nke anọ
O mechikwara nke anọ n'egwuregwu Olympic, ebe ọ na-elekọta mmerụ ahụ
N'afọ 1997, ọ meriri n'asọmpi mba ụwa nke ugboro abụọ, mana o tinyeghị aka na 10,000m World Championships
N'afọ 1998 ọ mụrụ nwa nwanyị, Tsion, mana ọ laghachiri n'afọ 2000 n'ọnọdụ kachasị mma nke ndụ ya
O meriri 10,000m Olympic gold maka oge nke abụọ (naanị nwanyị mere nke a na akụkọ ihe mere eme dị mkpirikpi nke ihe omume ahụ)
O nwetakwara mmeri na IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke ugboro atọ
N'afọ 2001, o mechara merie n'asọmpi 10,000 n'ụwa niile na Edmonton
Nke a bụ nrite ọla edo nke atọ n'ụwa ma ọ bụ Olympic
O nwere ngụkọta nke nrite ụwa na nke Olimpik 5
Mgbanwe ya gaa na marathon nwetara mmeri na London na Tokyo Marathons na afọ 2001
O mechara nke anọ na 2005 World Championships, na-etinye oge kachasị mma ya nke 2 23 30
O nwetakwara mmeri na Portugal Half Marathon na 2000 na 2003, na Lisbon Half Marathon n'afọ 2003
N'afọ 2009, mgbe ọ dị afọ 37, ọ meriri na New York City Marathon, na-emeri ndị dị ka Paula Radcliffe, Lyudmila Petrova na Salina Kosgei

N'afọ 2004, Derartu jụrụ ịbanye na New York Marathon, ebe ọ ga-eche Paula Radcliffe ihu, onye ya na ya nwere nnukwu asọmpi kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ma lekwasị anya n'egwuregwu Olimpik, ebe ọ meriri ọla nchara na 10,000 m n'azụ Xing Huina na nwa nwanne ya nwoke Ejegayehu Dibaba
(Radcliffe emeghịcha)
Derartu gara n'ihu na-agba ọsọ asọmpi na ngwụcha afọ iri atọ ya, ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-asọmpi ochie ya lara ezumike nká
Ọ gwụchara n'asọmpi marathon ikpeazụ ya n'afọ 2011 na Yokohama
A na-echeta ya maka ọsọ ya na 603 nke abụọ ikpeazụ ya na njedebe nke 10,000 m na Sydney Olympics bụ sprint nke ihe edeturu
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) kemgbe 14 Nọvemba na afọ 2018
Tulu bụ nwanne nne nke ụmụnne Dibaba bụ Ō Ejegayehu, Tirunesh na Genzebe Dibaba
Derek Fordjour (amụrụ n'afọ 1974 na Memphis, Tennessee) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe omimi nkè ihe nketa Ghana, onye na-arụ ọrụ na vidiyo / ihe nkiri, ihe ọkpụkpụ na eserese
Fordjour nwetara MFA site na Hunter College, Ed
M na Arts Education site na Mahadum Harvard, na nzèrè BA site na Morehouse College
Fordjour bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ébé gụnyere Contemporary Art Museum St
Louis, Nasher Museum of Art na Whitney Museum of Contemporary Art
Ọ natara ọrụ màkà ọrụ ọha na eze gụnyere ntinye na-adịgide adịgide màkà Metropolitan Transit Authority nke New York City na 145th Street Subway Station na The Whitney Museum Billboard Project
E nyèrè ya 2016 Sugarhill Museum Artist-in-Residence, 2017 Sharpe Walentas Studio Program na New York City, ma kpọọ ya 2018 Deutsche Bank NYFA Fellowship Award
N'afọ 2021, ónyé na-ese ihe nwéré ihe ngosi onwé ya na Pond Society na Shanghai
Ihe osise ya n'ebe ahụ lere anya na gamification nke usoro mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na adịghị ike
N'ihe osise ndị a na-adịbeghị anya, Fordjour tinyere ọkwa nke Financial Times
N'iji akwụkwọ ahụ mee ihe n'ọrụ ya, Fordjour kọwara na Ocula Magazine 'The Financial Times na-eme mgbalị iji mee ka onwe ya dị iche na ọdọ mmiri nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ nwere ụcha ya pụrụ iche
Echiche nke ịkpa iche iche bụ ọchịchọ ịmata onwe gị n'ihu ịbụ ónyé a na-ejikarị eme ihe ma ọ bụ na-agbakọta ọnụ nwere esemokwu nke m na-akọwa
N'oge na-adịbeghị ányá, a họpụtara ya dịka Ónyé isi oche Alex Katz na Cooper Union ma na-eje ozi dị ka Ónyé isi nkatọ na Yale University School of Art

Ọrụ ya pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ọha na eze na nke onwe na United States na mba ofesi, gụnyere The Studio Museum of Harlem, Brooklyn Museum, Perez Museum, Dallas Museum of Art, The Whitney Museum na LACMA
Fordjour bụ ónyé otu Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity
Alpha Phi Alpha nyéré ya ọrụ ịmepụta ihe osise akpọrọ An Experiment in Brotherhood iji cheta ntọala nke fraternity

Derek Johnson, Jr, nke a maara nkè ọma site na aha egwu ya Derek Minor na aha egwu mbụ PRo, (amụrụ na Disemba 16, 1984) bụ onye America Christian hip hop artist, record producer, entrepreneur, actor, na screenwriter
Ya na Doc Watson guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ hip-hop Reflection Music Group (RMG), wee bịanye aka na Reach Records na njikọ aka n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ na 2011
N'afọ 2012, Johnson kwupụtara na ọ gbanwere aha egwu ya site na Pro gaa na Derek Minor
N'afọ 2014, ọ màrà ọkwa na dịka nkwekọrịta abọm abụọ ya na Reach zuru ezu, ọ gaghịzi ebipụta mbipụta site na ákàrà ahụ
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere otu hip-hop RMG
na Reflection, ọ bụkwabu ónyé otu Reach hip-hop 116 Clique
Johnson ewepụtala abọm studio isii na mixtapes isii dị ka onye na-ese egwu, yana otu abọm ụlọ ọrụ nke ọ bụla na ndị otu RMG
na 116 Clique
Abọm studio ya nke abụọ, Redemption, gosipụtara na No
8 na chaatị Gospel Billboard na No
31 na chaatụ Billboard Top Christian
Abọm studio ya nké atọ, Dying to Live, malitere na No
66 na 200, No
1 na chaatị Top Christian, No
2 na chaatụ Gospel Albums, No
7 na chaatọ Top Independent Albums, na No
11 na chaatọn Top Rap
Abọm ya nke anọ, Minorville, nke e wepụtara na 2013 malitere na No
5 na chaatị Rap Albums nke Billboard na No
7 na chaatụ Top Christian
Ọ sonyeere Entertainment One iji wepụta abọm nke ise ya, Empire, nke malitere na No
6 na chaatị Billboard Rap Albums na No
1 na chaatụ Top Christian
Abọm ya nke isii, Reflection, banyere na chaatị Billboard Rap Albums na No
5 na chaatụ Top Christian na No
Otu egwu Reflection bụ 'Change the World' nke gosipụtara Hollyn ruru No
1 na chaatị Hot AC / CHR nke Billboard
A mụrụ Derek Johnson, Jr
na Pontiac, Michigan na Disemba 16, 1984, mana mgbè ọ dị obérè, ya na nné ya kwagara Middle Tennessee
Mmekọrịta ya na nna ya mụrụ ya dị anya, mmekọrịta ya na nna nna ya na-adịwanye njọ
Ọzọkwa, nna nna Johnson bụ ónyé na-eji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe ebe nne ya bụ Onye Kraịst siri ike, nke na-anụ ọkụ n'obi nke nwere usoro ọrụ siri ike na ndụ ụlọ
Johnson kpebiri inyere nne ya aka site n'ịba ọgaranya site na agụmakwụkwọ ma ọ bụ egwu
Derric van Rensburg (amụrụ n'afọ 1952 na Cape Town, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe a ma ama n'ụwa niile

Kemgbe ngosi mbụ ya na Cape Town na 1976 ndị ahịa dị iche iche nke gụnyere ndị ahịa ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche dịka First National Bank, South African Airways, Price Waterhouse Coopers na Mobil enyela van Rensburg ọrụ
A maara ọrụ ya n'ụwa niile ma a na-ahụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe kachasị elu na South Africa
Onye Britain na-ese ihe JJ Adams rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ van Rensburg mgbe ezinụlọ ya si UK kwaga South Africa ma kwuo na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị kasị nwee mmetụta
Emere emume ọrụ van Rensburg n'akwụkwọ tebụl kọfị e bipụtara na 2007 iji kwekọọ na ụbọchị ọmụmụ iri ise na ise nke onye na-ese ihe
Derrick Adams (amụrụ n'afọ 1970) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na nhazi
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Adams na-elekwasị anya na njirimara Black ya, na-ezo aka ugboro ugboro na ụkpụrụ, ihe oyiyi, na isiokwu nke ọdịbendị Black na America
Adams arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ nka mara mmá, na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu ngalaba na Maryland Institute College of Art
A mụrụ Derrick Adams na 1970 na Baltimore, Maryland
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ elementrị n'oge na-adịghị anya, Adams gara Pratt Institute
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1996, Adams nwetara MFA ya na Mahadum Columbia, mechaa akara ugo mmụta ya na 2003

N'afọ 2016, Adams mepụtara ihe ntinye (nke akpọrọ Derrick Adams THE HOLDOUT [[A Social Sculpture with Curated Music Program]]) màkà Aljira Center for Contemporary Art na Newark, NJ, nke gosipụtara nnukwu pyramid nke gbara ụlọ ọrụ redio mgbasa ozi gburugburu
Dị ka Adams si kwuo, pyramids n'ọrụ ya na-ezo aka na ogologo oge nke ọdịbendị ndị isi ojii na isi ọbọdọ ọdịbendị nke ndị isi ojii wuru n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ihe ngosi Adams nke 2016 na Pioneer Works nyochara ìhè odide Black na omenala a ma ámá

N'ịbụ nke akpọrọ Derrick Adams ON, ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere collages, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na lampshades nkè na-akpali ihe odide sitere na ihe nkiri na-ewu ewu na ihe ngosi TV dị ka In Living Color na The Matrix

Studio Museum na Harlem guzobere ihe ngosi Adams nke 2017 Derrick Adams Patrick Kelley, The Journey, nke onye na-ese ihe mepụtara bọọdụ ọnọdụ maka akụkọ ndụ nke ónyé na'emepụta ejiji Patrick Kelley na-atụ aro, onye usoro ya na nhazi ya na-emetụta Adams n'ihe gbásárá iwu njirimara
N'afọ 2017, Adams jiri nchịkọta ihe ochie nke Stony Island Arts Bank (yana ihe sitere na nchịkọta ndị ọzọ), mepụta ihe ngosi onwe onye n'ebe ahụ, Future People
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ gosipụtara vidiyo looping nke gosipụtara ihe oyiyi na ihe ndị sitere n'aka ndị edemede na ndị ọkà okwu ojii
Usoro collages na ngosi ahụ, Orbiting Us #1-#10, gosipụtara ihe ndị Charles Harrison, onye isi ojii mbụ na Sears, Roebuck na Company
Adams jiri ihe ngosi ahụ mee ka ike mmepụta nke ndị isi ojii chepụta ma mepụta ihe ọhụrụ n'ọnọdụ siri ike
Na Museum of Arts and Design na 2018, Adams gosipụtara ọrụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke The Negro Motorist Green Book
N'ịbụ nke akpọrọ Sanctuary, ihe ngosi Adams gosipụtara ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke obere okporo ụzọ nke na-agafe n'okporo ụzọ, na-agagharị na collages nke na-akpali ebe edepụtara na akwụkwọ nduzi
Sanctuary mere emume oge ntụrụndụ na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị Africa America ọbụna n'oge Jim Crow, nke obere ụlọ ndị yiri katọn mmiri ara ehi na-enwu gbaa
N'afọ 2018, Museum of Contemporary Art Denver gosipụtara nyocha nke ọrụ Adams site na 2014-2017, gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, nrụnye, na ọrụ na akwụkwọ

N'ịbụ nke akpọrọ, Derrick Adams Transmission, ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ọrụ atọ 'Future People' (2017), 'Fabrication Station' (2016), na usoro ihe osise 'Boxhead' (2014), na-enyocha 'Ọmụmụ ihe na-aga n'ihu nke Derrick Adams banyere njirimara agbụrụ dịka a na-enyochara ya site na omenala a ma ama ma na-echepụta ya maka ọdịnihu'
E nyere Derrick Adams 2018 Gordon Parks Foundation Fellowship, ma sonye na ihe ngosi mmadụ abụọ, American Family Derrick Adams na Deana Lawson, na Foundation dị ka akụkụ nke onyinye ahụ
Adams na-ekwu banyere ihe ngosi ahụ, 'Mmetụta Parks

na-agafe ihe a na-ahụ anya, n'ime ihe m ji eche na ọ dị mkpa igosi ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ndụ ndị isi ojii America n'ụzọ ndị na-enye ìhè na mgbagwoju anya na ọgaranya nke oge gara aga, ugbu a na ọdịnihu anyị
N'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara ọrụ Adams na Fox TV hit Empire
Ọrụ nka na usoro ahụ na-egosi ndị isi ihe odide, Cookie na Lucious Lyon (nke Taraji P

Henson na Terrence Howard na-eme), ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke nchịkọta ihe dị iche iche, 'Empire x Derrick Adams collection', nke na-akwado Turnaround Arts, mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ na-adabere na nka na Kennedy Center
Nke a abụghị oge mbụ e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi TV America
N'afọ 2017, Issa Rae gụnyere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri HBO ya bụ Insecure
na 2019 MTA (Metropolitan Transportation Authority) nyere Adams ọrụ ịmepụta ihe osise enyo maka Nostrand Avenue Station

Ihe osise a na-egbuke egbuke nwere ogwe 85 nke na-agbasa ogologo nke ikpo okwu ndị a rụzigharịrị ọhụrụ ma gbasaa na àkwà mmiri anọ ọhụrụ ndị na-agagharị agagharị nke jikọtara ọdụ ahụ na mpaghara Crown Heights na Bedford-Stuyvesant nke a na-anọchite anya n'ime ihe osise ahụ
Iji foto, map, na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Adams na-eji ụdị collage ya iji mesie mmekọrịta mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ na gburugburu ebe obibi ha
N'afọ 2020, Adams mepụtara ihe osise maka Ụlọ Ọgwụ Harlem
Derssa (Arabic ) bụ ihe na-ewu ewu na nri Algeria, nke a na-ejikarị galik, cumin, red chili pepper flakes, na mmanụ oliv eme
A na-ejikarị ya na anụ e siri esi maọbụ nke a miri ami, a na-ejikwa ya eme ihe dika marinade maka anụ maọbụ akwụkwọ nri tupu esie nri

Ọ bụ ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ma na-ejikarị ya eme ihe iji gbakwunye ụtọ na nri dị iche iche, A pụkwara iji ya mee ihe dịka ofe maka achịcha maọbụ akwụkwọ nri, maọbụ dịka ihe na-agbasa maka sandwiches maọbụ mkpuchi

Ezigbo usoro nri maka dersa nwere ike ịdịgasị iche site na mpaghara gaa na mpaghara Ozo maọbụ ọbụna site n'ụlọ gaa n'ụlọ ozo, yana ụfọdụ ọdịiche gụnyere ihe ndị ọzọ dịka coriander, mmiri lemon, maọbụ tomato paste
Otú ọ dị, isi ihe ndị e ji mee galik, cumin, chili flakes, ya na mmanụ oliv na-adịkarị n'ọtụtụ ụdị nke ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
A maara Derssa ama maka ụtọ ya siri ike, nke na-esi ísì ụtọ, ọ bụkwa ihe a na-eri n'ọtụtụ Ezinne ụlọ ndị Algeria
A na-asụgharịrị ya mgbe ụfọdụ dịka 'dersa' maọbụ 'dersah', a makwaara ya ama dịka 'harissa' na mpaghara ụfọdụ
Otú ọ dị, ekwesighi ịgbagwoju ya anya na ofe ọkụ nke North Afrika nke a na-akpọkwa harissa, nke a na'iji ihe dị iche iche dịka ose na-acha ọbara ọbara, galik, na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ mee

N'ihe oriri ndị obodo Algeria, a na-emekarị dersa site n'ịgbanye maọbụ na-egwe ọka galik na cumin na ụrọ na osu na odo maọbụ n'ime ihe nhazi nri, wee gwakọta ya na ntụpọ ose na mmanụ oliv ruo mgbe a ga-enweta nkwụsi ike
A na-ahapụkarị dersa ka ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ elekere maọbụ n'otu abalị iji kwe ka ụtọ ahụ gbakọta ọnụ tupu a na-enye ya

Na mgbakwunye na ihe ndị bụ isi nke galik, cumin, chili flakes, na mmanụ oliv, ụfọdụ ọdịiche nke dersa nwere ike ịgụnye ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ maọbụ ihe ndị dịka paprika, coriander, mmiri lemon, maọbụ tomato paste
Ezigbo usoro nri maka dersa nwere ike ịdịgasị iche dabere na mmasị onwe onye maọbụ omenala mpaghara
Deschloroetizolam (nke a makwaara dị ka Etizolam-2) bụ thienotriazolodiazepine nke bụ analog nke etizolam nwere njikọ chiri anya
A na-ere ogige na ahu ndi isi ojii nke dị ka ọgwụ mmepụta
A na-ekewapụta Deschloroetizolam ma na-achịkwa ya dị ka ihe dị ize ndụ na Sweden ka ọ dị na Ọktoba 15, 2015
Désiré Ecaré (April 15, 1939 na Treichville, Côte d'Ivoire - February 16, 2009 na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Ivory Coast
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri Faces of Women na 1985, nke gara n'ihu merie FIPRESCI Prize na Cannes Film Festival
Ugochi Desire Oparanozie (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 17 n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1993) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba bọọlụ n'ọnọdụ onye na-anọ n'ihu na Dijon FCO nakwa Otu bọọlụ mba Naijirịa
Oparanozie malitere ọrụ ya na Bayelsa Queens na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa were kwaga Delta Queens n'afọ 2010
Ọ nọrọ ọnwa abụọ na mbinye ego na Düvenciler Lisesispor na Turkish Women's First Football League n'afọ 2011, tupu ọ laghachite na Delta Queens
N'afọ 2012, o sonyeere Rossiyanka site n'asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Rọshịa, ya na ha gbara egwuregwu anọ na 2012-13 UEFA Champions League, na -enweta otu goolu
Oparanozie sonyeere klọb Bundesliga bụ VfL Wolfsburg maka oge 2013-14 ma bịanye aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Na ọkara mbụ nke oge ahụ, ọ pụtara naanị n'otu egwuregwu, ọ na -agbakarị bọọlụ na otu bọọlụ Wolfsburg nke abụọ
N'oge oyi, mgbe ọkara oge ahụ gachara, ọ hapụrụ Wolfsburg
N'ụbọchị nke 21 n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, Oparanozie bara Ataşehir Belediyespor ka ọ gbaa ọkara nke abụọ nke oge ahụ na Turkish Women's First Football League
Maka 2014 - 15 o banyere Guingamp nke Division 1 Féminine ndị Frans, ebe onye isi otu bọọlụ mba Naijirịa bụ Evelyn Nwabuoku sonyere ya n'oge sochirinụ
Tupu oge 2019-20, e mere Oparanozie onye isi klọb, o were bido ọchịchị ya nke ọma site na imeri Metz n'ụbọchị mmalite nke oge ahụ
N'ụbọchị nke 30 n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020, Dijon FCO kwupụtara na ọ bịanyela aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Guingamp, ndị na-eso ụzọ ya gụrụ ebe nkwụsị ụgbọ ala Oparanozie na Guingamp mgbe ọ nọchara ogologo oge na klọb bọọlụ Frans
Dị ka onye junịọ na mba ụwa, o nyere goolu 2 na 2010 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup nakwa goolu 3 na asọmpi 2012
Oparanozie bụrịị onye otu otu bọọlụ mba Naịjirịa kemgbe afọ 2010, na-esonye n'asọmpi FIFA Women World Cup nke afọ 2011, 2015, n'afọ 2019
N'Eprel afọ 2019, onye nchịkwa Thomas Dennerby họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọhụụ otu bọọlụ nke Naịjirịa, ma too Oparanozie maka 'ọzụzụ na ezi agwa ya'
N'ịgbaso , n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi, o kpọrọ oku maka ịkwụ ụgwọ nha nha n'otu bọọlụ Naịjirịa, na -ekwupụta ndịiche n'ime ego na onyinye ndị otu nwoke nwetara
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị otu Naịjirịa nke African Women's Championship nke afọ 2010 na 2014, afọ 2016 na 2018, meriri asọmpi anọ niile
Ọ nyere goolu dịgasị mkpa na ngwụcha 2014 na 2016

Desiree Ellis (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 1963) bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ South Africa na onye n'agbabu egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ na-azụ ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Banyana Banyana na onye isi nke abụọ nke otu mba ahụ

E nyere ya Confederation of African Football Women's Coach of the Year n'afọ 2018 mgbe ndị otu ya gbara ndị nke abụọ na African Women Cup of Nations ma ruo n'isi ịma aka mmeri nke mbụ ha na Women's World Cup N'oge ọrụ klọb ya, ọ gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye egwuregwu n'anọ n'etiti maka Spurs Ladies n'etiti ndị otu ndị ọzọ
Ellis tolitere na Salt River n'afọ ndị 1970
Nọrọ n'ụlọ nne nne ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dịka nne na nna ya, nna ya Ernest, (nwụrụ, 1989) na nne Natalie na-arụ ọrụ n'ubochi
Enweghị klọb ụmụ nwanyị n'oge ahụ ma ya na ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanne ya na-agba bọọlụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ tụfuru akpa ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, gbanwee uwe ya ma gbaga n'èzí gakwuru ndị otu ya na-eche
Nna ya na-eyi egwu iziga ya ụlọ akwụkwọ n'eyighi akpụkpọukwu n'ihi na ọ mebiela ọtụtụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ ya site na ọgbugba egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ellis mechara chọta klọb ụmụ nwanyị ọzọ (Athlone Celtic bụ klọb mbụ ọ gbara bọọlụ) Spurs Ladies mgbe ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ na ebe a na-egbu anụ na Lansdowne dị ka onye na-agwakọta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ

O nwere mgbe ọ hapụrụ ebe ọrụ ya ma soro klọb ahụ ga njem n'ime ngwụsị izu, ma kwe ndị were ya n'ọrụ nkwa na ọ ga-alọghachi n'oge maka ọrụ mana ụgbọala ndị otu ahụ ji eme njem mebiri n'ụzọ na-nlọta ha nke mere ka ọ ghara ịbịa n'oge
N'ihi ya, a chụrụ Ellis n'ọrụ
Ọ rụkwara ọtụtụ ọrụ nchịkwa n'oge ọrụ egwuregwu ya
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Western Province Women's Football Association site n'afọ 1994 ruo afọ 1995 ma mesịa bụrụ PRO nke otu ahụ site na 1996 ruo 1997
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Chief Librarian na ụlọ ọrụ foto, Touchline n'afọ 2001
Ellis gara maka ule maka ndị otu mba ahụ ma gafee ma gosipụta na egwuregwu mba ụwa mbụ nke otu ahụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ megide Swaziland mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ, na abalị iri atọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 1993 na-mmeri ọkpụ iri na anọ na asataghị ma otu
Ellis nyere goolu pụrụ iche ma tinyere nke ndị egwuregwu abụọ ndị ọzọ

N'oge asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke afọ 1995, South Africa meriri Zimbabwe, Zambia na Angola na nchịkọta, ọkpụ goolu iri asatọ otu, ọkpụ goolu iri na otu asatara ise na ọkpụ goolu isii asatara anọ mana Naịjirịa meriri ha site n'ọkpụ goolu iri na otu asatara abụọ Mgbe South Afrịka kwadoro 2000 African Women's Championship, ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu ahụ ruo onye nke abụọ
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara Ellis tinyere Mercy Akide na Florence Omagbemi maka African Woman Footballer of the Year
E nyere Ellis nkwanye ùgwù maka ọrụ ya na bọọlụ n'otu afọ ahụ mgbe ọ natara Silver Presidential Sports Award
O duru ndị otu ahụ gaa mmeri Cosafa Cup n'afọ 2002
N'ime egwuregwu iri atọ na abụọ ọ gbara na South Africa, o meriri egwuregwu iri abụọ na atọ, merie naanị asaa ma gbaa abụọ
Ọ lara ezumike nká na Eprel 2002 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na asatọ
A pụrụ ịhụ Ellis na TV dị ka onye na-akọwa bọl na onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn egwuregwu nke mpaghara e-TV
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya maka 2010 FIFA World Cup Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Gallo Images dị ka onye ndoziharị foto
A họpụtara Ellis ka ọ bụrụ onye njikwa oge nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị South Africa n'afọ 2016 mgbe Vera Pauw gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe ndị otu ahụ si n'otu egwuregwu ahụ pụta na 2016 Olympics

A họpụtara Ellis ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa na n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2018 ma zụọ ndị otu ahụ, mgbe ahụ ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke iri ise na ngụkọ ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ nke mba ụwa,ma ruo n'ọkwa nke abụọ na Africa Women Cup of Nations, ma ndị mmeri merielanụ ugboro iri na otu bụ Nigeria meriri ha na mgbapụ penariti n'oge ikpeazụ ịma Onye mmeri; n'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, site n'ịpụta dị ndị nke abụ, South Africa meritere imaaka ịmara ndị mmeri na FIFA Women's World Cup nke mbụ ya na 2019
E nyere ya Confederation of African Football Women's Coach of the Year n'afọ 2018

Desmond Dube bụ onye na-agụ egwu na South Africa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'eme ejije na onye na-enye ihe ntụrụndụ
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na The No
1 Ladies' Detective Agency, Hotel Rwanda, Friends Indeed, Suburban Bliss na Joburg Blues
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a zụrụ azụ ma gosipụta na ihe nkiri azụmahịa na nke okporo ámá
N'elu ikpo okwu, ọ bụ onye isi na Jozi Jozi, Peto na egwu Street Sisters, ma gosikwa na egwuregwu Joseph na Amazing Technicolour Dreamcoat
Ọ pụtara na mmepụta ihe nkiri maka Eskom, Siyabonga na AIDS Show
A maara ya nke ọma [onye?] maka ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi 'Amaglugglug' maka SASOL
Dube pụtara na ihe nkiri Inside and Tarzan The Epic Adventures, ma soro Leon Schuster mee ihe nkiri na Panic Mechanic na Millennium Menace
N'afọ 2002, ya na onye a họpụtara na Oscar Armin Mueller-Stahl na Nthati Moshesh nakwa The Long Run, nke Anant Singh mepụtara
Universal Focus nwetara ihe nkiri ahụ, ngalaba pụrụ iche nke Universal Films maka nkesa n'ụwa niile ewezuga Africa
Dube on Monday, otu n'ime ihe ngosi dị iche iche na-atọ ọchị na telivishọn na South Africa, na-agbasa na SABC 3
A na-akpọ ya ihe ngosi telivishọn South Africa nke mbụ na-eme na ngwụsị izu 'beat the Monday blues' nke na-eme ihe ọchị nke na-adọrọ ndị South Africa niile
Otú ọ dị, nyocha ọjọọ sitere n'aka ọtụtụ ndị nkatọ emeela ka a gaa n'ihu na-akpọ oku ka a kagbuo ngosi ahụ
[citation needed]

Dube enwetala onyinye Avanti maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Joburg Blues, nhọpụta Avanti Award maka onye na'ịkwado onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha kyau na Suburban Bliss, onyinye Stellenbosch Festival onye na-akwalite ihe nkiri kacha elu na onye edemede na-ekwe nkwa, na onyinye Loerie maka onyinye kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na SASOL 'Amaglugglug' azụmahịa
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na Hotel Rwanda nke Academy Award-nominated, ya na Nick Nolte na Don Cheadle
N'afọ 2008, Dube pụtara dịka BK n'akụkụ Jill Scott, Anika Noni Rose nakwa Lucian Msamati na The No
1 Ladies' Detective Agency, nke Anthony Minghella duziri

Desmond Elliot (amụrụ Desmond Oluwashola Elliot ; na ubochi nke ano nke onwa Febuwari na afo otu puku na nari iteghete na iri asaa na ano) bụ onye omee, onye ntụzi na onye onye merela ihe nkiri narị abụọ na ọtụtụ ihe onyonyo na ihe nkiri ncha
Ọ meriri onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri na 2nd Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards wee họpụta ya maka onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards
A hoputara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke ụlọ omebe iwu steeti Lagos, Surulere Constituency, na ntuliaka Naịjirịa nke ọnwa Eprel 11
Nna Elliot bụ onye Yoruba si Olowogbowo na Lagos Island, Lagos ebe nne sitere Illah na Oshimili North, Delta State
Ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Air Force praịmarị Skuul ma mechaa gaa St John's Koleji, o gara ha abụọ na Jos
Ọ gụrụ maka akụnụba na Mahadum Lagos Steeti wee gụchaa akwụkwọ n'afọ 2003
Otu enyi metụrụ Elliot mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'ime ihe nkiri ncha dị ka ndị mmadụ kwa ụbọchị, otu oke na ndị nsọ na ndị mmehie
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood, ebe ọ pụtara n'ihe karịrị narị fim abụọ gụnyere umu nwoke ndi aghugho, ndi nwere nde egoYahoo na Atlanta
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya maka nturu ugo ihe nkiri 'African Movie Academy Award' maka 'onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ nkwado' na ihe nkiri 'N;azu uzo emechiri emechi'
Na 2008, Elliot rụkọtara ma duzie ihe nkiri Reloaded nke natara nhọpụta atọ na African Movie Academy Awards na 2009
N'afọ 2009 na 2010, a họpụtara ya maka nturu ugo ihe nkiri kacha mma na nturuugo ihe nkiri nke Naịjirịa

Ọzọkwa na 2010, Elliot gbara asọmpi ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Face of Hope Project, 'ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ, ndị na-abụghị okpukpe, ndị na-abụghị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị guzobere iji nye ndị na-enweghị olileanya olileanya', nke ọ ga-arụ ọrụ na idozi
'amaghị agụ ụmụaka na Naịjirịa na Afrịka niile' ọ ga -apụta
Na 2014, a họpụtara ya maka nturu ugo ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Africa maka 'Onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ nkwado' na ihe nkiri 'Ịchọta ebere'
Elliot kwupụtara ebumnuche ya n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2014 ịzọ oche ụlọ omebe iwu nke Legọs steeti n'okpuru pati All Progressives Congress
Ọ zoro ma merie Surulere constituency n'ubochi nke iri na otu n;onwa Eprel n'afo a turu vootu Naịjirịa n'2015
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, n'oge ngagharị iwe SARS, Desmond katọrọ maka ebubo ebubo ịkwado Anti-Soshal Media Bill na Naịjirịa; ebubo nke ọ gọnarịrị na mbụ mgbe akụkọ mbụ batara na soshal midia

N'ime vidiyo na -agagharị na ịntanetị niile, a hụrụ ya ka ọ na -akatọ ndị ọrụ soshal midia na ndị na -emetụta ya ma na -ekwu na ọ bụrụ na steeti Naịjirịa akwụsịghị soshal midia, soshal midia ga -ebibi steeti Naịjirịa
Ndị Naịjirịa ejighị okwu ya gwurie egwu na soshal midia nke mere na ọ bụ mpako pidgin a na -ewu ewu na Desmond Elliot cause am , nke pụtara na ọ bụ Desmond Elliot kpatara ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ pụtara mgbe ụbọchị ole na ole gasịrị ịrịọ mgbaghara
O kwuru na 'm kwere ka mmetụta uche m dị mma karịa m ma maka nke a ana m arịọ mgbaghara nye onye ọ bụla nkwupụta m na mbụ nwere ike imerụ ahụ
Biko, ghọta na ọbụna ndị kachasị mma n'ime anyị na-emehie
Nke a bụ ihe mere, na-aga n'ihu, ana m arịọ anyị niile gbalịa itinye aka n'ụzọ na-ewuli elu na nsogbu ndị metụtara anyị niile
Ana m ekwe nkwa ime otu ihe ahụ
Ihe mgbu m na-enwe maka ndị otu m, oku maka enyemaka nke m na-aga n'ihu inweta, na mkpa ọ dị ibelata mbibi na ime ihe ike ga-aga n'ihu na-akwalite ihe m na-aru na ọrụ m
Ana m ekele unu niile maka ikwupụta echiche gị, n'ọdịnihu, ana m ekwe nkwa na m ga-enwekwu uche ma mara ihe
Anyị ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ ka Naịjirịa ka mma'
Elliot lụrụ nwanyị ma nwee ụmụ anọ
Ọ na -etinye aka na mmekọrịta ọha na eze maka Globacom

Desmond Elliott (24 Disemba 1930 - 12 Ọgọst 2003) bụ onye nkwusa a ma ama na onye na-ede akwụkwọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ụlọ mbipụta Macmillan tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ịchọta ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta nke ya Arlington Books
N'ime ọrụ nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri isii, ọ bụ ya chọpụtara ọtụtụ ndị edemede gara n'ihu bụrụ ndị ka ere ahịa gụnyere Penny Vincenzi na Jilly Cooper
A mụrụ Desmond Elliott na London n'abalị Krismas nke afọ 1929
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, e debere ya na Royal Masonic Orphanage na Dublin, Ireland mgbe ọ dị afọ iri

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ọma ma nweta agụmakwụkwọ na Trinity College, Dublin, mana o kpebiri ịga England n'afọ 1947 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, na naanị £ 2 na akwụkwọ ozi mmeghe site n'aka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Irish Times
Elliot bu ụzọ rụọ ọrụ dịka nwa nwoke ọfịs maka Macmillan Publishers, tupu ọ banye na Hutchinson (onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ) wee banye Michael Joseph (onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ)
Mgbe Max Reinhardt (onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ) chụrụ ya n'ọrụ, ọ natara ụgwọ £ 1,000 na ọrụ site n'aka Sidney Bernstein, nke ITV Granada - onye nwere echiche nke abụọ
N'iji ụgwọ ọrụ ya fọdụrụnụ, o guzobere dịka onye ọrụ onwe ya n'afọ 1960 wee guzobe akwụkwọ Arlington
Nraranye ya na echiche azụmahịa ya mere ka Elliott bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ikom kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọhịa ya

Elliot bụ isi ihe mere e mepụtara ndepụta nke ndị na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ na-aga nke ọma dịka Candida Lycett Green, Penny Vincenzi nakwa Lynda Lee-Potter Ọ kpọbatakwara Tim Rice na Andrew Lloyd Webber dịka onye ahịa mbụ
N'ịbụ onye ndị dere ya na-akwanyere ùgwù ma hụ ya n'anya, n'okwu Candida Lycett Green, Elliott bụ naanị 'anwansi'
Desmond Elliott biri ndụ ya na verve, na-aṅụ naanị champagne, na-emeso Fortnum & Mason dịka 'cornershop' ya ma na-agafe Atlantic na Concorde
Ọfịs ya dị na Mayfair ma nwee ụlọ na St James na Park Avenue
Tupu ọnwụ ya n'afọ 2003, Desmond Elliott kwuru na a ga-etinye ego ya na ụlọ ọrụ ebere nke ga-akwụ ụgwọ onyinye edemede 'iji mee ka ọrụ nke ndị edemede ọhụrụ baa ụba'
Ya mere, e hiwere Desmond Elliott Prize kwa afọ n'afọ 2007, na-enye ego GB £ 10,000 nye onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ e bipụtara na UK
Elliott gwara onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Sam Llewellyn akwụkwọ akụkọ ya dị mma bụ 'n'etiti ịchụ nta akụ na agbụrụ' na akwụkwọ akụkọ mmeri ga-egosipụta omimi na obosara na akụkọ na-akpali akpali
Desmond Olumuyiwa Majekodunmi bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka gburugburu obodo
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Lekki State Urban Forest and Animal Shelter Initiative (LUFASI), na onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio nke Green Hour na Nigeria Info 993 FM
Majekodunmi bụkwa onye odee, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede edemede
Na mgbakwunye na nke a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo, onye injinia / onye na-emepụta ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agu egwu
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ ya n' ọrụ ugbo na gburugburu
O meriri na Nigerian Silverbird TV 'Man of the Year' na DW German TV network 'Environment Hero'

Mgbalị ya iji kụọ osisi ndị ọzọ ka e ji onyinye sitere n'aka Ministri nke Gburugburu obodo kwado yaỌ bụ onye ọrụ ugbo nwere asambodo nye International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA), Ibadan ma na-arụkwa ọrụ Majekodunmi Agricultural Project (MAP), ugbo nchekwa nke agro forestry dị na Lagos
Ọ bụ nwa nke onye isi ala nke mba mbụ bụ Chiif Moses Majekodunmi na nwunye ya Nora Majekodunmi, onye guzobere ụlọakwụkwọ Corona
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ natara onyinye site n'aka Paschal Dozie mgbe o nyere nkụzi banyere mmepe na-adịgide adịgide ma natalarị ọtụtụ onyinye ndị ọzọ gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe na nchedo gburugburu
Majekodunmi na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche ugbu a nke kọmitii Awareness and Fund Raising nke Nigeria Conservation Foundation (NCF), Lagos, ọ bụkwa onye na-arụ ọrụ ugbo nchekwa

Desmond Mpilo Tutu OMSG CH GCStJ (7 Ọktoba 1931 na 26 Disemba 2021) bụ bishọp Anglican nke South Africa na ọkà mmụta okpukpe, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya dịka onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
Ọ bụ Bishọp nke Johannesburg site n'afọ 1985 ruo afọ 1986 wee bụrụ Achịbishọp of Cape Town site na 1986 ruo 1996, n'ọnọdụ abụọ ahụ bụ onye isi ojii Africa mbụ nwere ọnọdụ ahụ
Na nkà mmụta okpukpe, ọ chọrọ ijikọta echiche sitere na nkà mmụta okpukpe ndị isi ojii na nkà mmụta mmụta okpukpe Africa
A mụrụ Tutu n'ezinụlọ dara ogbenye na Klerksdorp, South Africa
Mgbe ọ banyere n'oge okenye, ọ zụrụ dịka onye nkuzi wee lụọ Nomalizo Leah Tutu, onye ya na ya nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ
N'afọ 1960, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ụkọchukwu Anglican ma n'afọ 1962 ọ kwagara United Kingdom iji mụọ nkà mmụta okpukpe na King's College London
N'afọ 1966, ọ laghachiri n'ebe ndịda Afrịka, na-akụzi na Federal Theological Seminary na Mahadum Botswana, Lesotho na Swaziland
N'afọ 1972, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Theological Education Fund maka Africa, ọnọdụ dị na London mana ọ chọrọ njem njem mgbe niile na kọntinent Afrịka

Laa azụ na ndịda Afrịka n'afọ 1975, ọ rụrụ ọrụ mbụ dịka dean nke St Mary's Cathedral na Johannesburg wee bụrụ Bishop nke Lesotho; site n'afọ 1978 ruo 1985 ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke South African Council of Churches
Ọ pụtara dị ka otu n'ime ndị mmegide a ma ama nke usoro ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke South Africa na ọchịchị ndị ọcha

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-adọ gọọmentị National Party aka ná ntị na iwe megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ga-eduga na ime ihe ike agbụrụ, dịka onye na-eme ihe ike, o kwusiri ike na ngagharị iwe na-abụghị ime ihe ike na nrụgide akụ na ụba mba ọzọ iji weta ikike ntụli aka zuru ụwa ọnụ
Desta Girma Tadesse (amụrụ na Machị 27, 1987) bụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge si na Etiopia
Ihe na a kacha ya mma ya bụ 2 31 44 o nwetara na 2013 Mumbai Marathon
N'afọ 2013, ọ bịakwara n'ọkwa kachasị mma ya na ọkara marathon, na-agwụ mgbe 1 12 01 gasịrị na Rome Marathon
Girma meriri na 2010 na 2011 Madrid Marathon nakwazi 2011 Riga Marathon
Destiny Etiko // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Etiko na Udi, obodo dị kpọmkwem na steeti Enugu, mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria nke ndị igbo nke Naijiria bi
Etiko nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na Enugu Steeti ebe ọ nwetara asambodo mbụ ya na asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African Senior School
Etiko na-achọ inweta akara ugo mmụta mahadum nke laghachiri na steeti Anambra wee tinye akwụkwọ maka ịmụ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe nke dị na Awka
A nabatara Etiko ma nye ya nnabata ma mesịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na Theater Arts

Etiko kọwara n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Vanguard, akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria, na mgbe ọ debanyere aha na Actors Guild nke Naijiria ọ banyere n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria nke a maara dị ka Nollywood na afọ 2011 ma kọwaa ahụmịhe ya mgbe ahụ dị ka ihe siri ike n'ihi na ọ ghaghị ijikọta ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ihe ụlọ akwụkwọ ya chọrọ n'ihi ọ ka ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ n'oge ahụ
Ọrụ Etiko nwetara ihe a ma ama mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Idemili nke Ernest Obi mepụtara na afọ 2012 mana ewepụtaghị ya ruo afọ 2014
Ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ mere ka a họpụta ya na City People Entertainment Awards
Tupu ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Idemili, Etiko apụtala na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ ọ bụ ezie na enwetaghị ọrụ dị mkpa na ha
Noel Christopher Fisher (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ ), nke a maara dị ka Detail, bụ ónyé America bụbu ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-ede egwu si Detroit, Michigan

A maara ya nke ọma maka ịmepụta ọtụtụ egwu egwu, gụnyere 'Sexy Can I' nke Ray J, 'I'm So Paid' nke Akon, 'How to Love' nke Lil Wayne, 'Drunk in Love', '711' nke Beyoncé na 'We Dem Boyz' nke Wiz Khalifa
O weputara abọm studio izizi ya, nke akpọrọ Noel, na Disemba 2015

Na ngwụcha afọ 2005, ọ malitere inweta nkwado na ụlọ ọrụ egwu dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe, mgbe ya na ónyé na-agụ egwu R&B nke America bụ Ray J jikọrọ aka mepụta ọtụtụ n'ime abọm nke atọ ya bụ Raydiation

Kemgbe ahụ ọ gara n'ihu na-emepụta egwu màkà Ray J, ma gbasaa akwụkwọ ya site na iso ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ a ma ama dịka Akon, Pussycat Dolls, Lil Wayne, Beyoncé, Ashanti, Marques Houston, Lady Gaga, Brandy, Shorty Mack, Christina Aguilera, T-Pain, Jennifer Lopez, R
Kelly, Bone Thugs-n-Harmony, na Snoop Dogg
Nkọwa so dee ma mepụta egwu egwu Lil Wayne bụ 'How to Love', màkà abọm Wayne nke afọ 2011 bụ Tha Carter IV
Otu a kwadoro 4 × Platinum site na Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) na Detail mechara bịanye aka na Wayne's Young Money Entertainment, yana Cash Money Records, dị ka ónyé na-emepụta
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o mepụtara egwu 'Drunk In Love' màkà Beyoncé, 'We Dem Boyz' maka Wiz Khalifa na 'I Luh Ya Papi' màkà Jennifer Lopez
Ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ sonyeere Buch, Ackley, na Reyez na-abịa n'ihu na ebubo yiri nkè ahụ, gụnyere Bebe Rexha na Tinashe
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, a na-ejide ya na mgbapụta nke $ 63 nde
E jidere Detail màkà ihe méré n'agbata afọ 2010 na 2018
Na mbido, n'afọ 2011, e boro ya ebubo mwakpo mmekọahụ ma bo ya ebubo ijide nwanyị megide ọchịchọ ya na mwakpo mmekọahụ ya na-esote oriri tupu Grammy n'ụlọ ya na Canyon Country, California
National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences nke United States na-enye onyinye Grammy kwa afọ maka ihe ịga nke ọma dị ịrịba ama na ụlọ ọrụ egwu
E guzobere onyinye ndị ahụ na 1958
Nkọwa nwetara Grammy mbụ ya, mgbe Drunk in Love nke Beyoncé & Jay-Z mere meriri egwu R&B kachasị mma n'oge 57th Annual Grammy Awards

Deterring Democracy bụ akwụkwọ Noam Chomsky bipụtara na 1991, nke na-enyocha ọdịiche dị n'etiti okwu enyemaka na eziokwu nke iwu mba ọzọ nke United States na otu o si emetụta mba dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa

N'ime akwụkwọ ahụ, Chomsky na-enyocha echiche ahụ na US bụ naanị mba nwere ikike karisiri n'ụwa niile nke na-arụ ọrụ iji nọgide n'ọchịchị ya, ọbụna na-eji obi ọjọọ na-eme ihe ike dị ka mbuso agha zuru oke na ịkwatu gọọmentị na-agbaso atumatu akụ na ụba onwe ha
Ọ na-atụlekwa nnukwu ọdịiche dị n'etiti echiche ọha na eze banyere Agha Nzuzo, guzobe echiche American gụrụ akwụkwọ na eziokwu

Akwụkwọ ahụ nwekwara nkatọ e mere maka Soviet Union na steeti ndị ọzọ na-achị ọchịchị Kọmunist, mana isi ihe ya na ya bụ eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ bụ ezie na United States kwuru na ha na'ihi nnwere onwe na Agha Nzuzo, ha ka na na - kwadoro ọchịchị aka ike
Mkpebi Chomsky na-abịa bụ na, n'agbanyeghị nkwupụta US nke ịkwado nnwere onwe, ebumnuche ha n'ezie bụ ịnọgide na na'ebe akụ na ụba na ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ihe odide zuru ezu nke akwụkwọ ahụ dị n'ịntanetị
Detrick Oliver Hughes (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1966) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri na onye na-ese okwu
A maara Hughes maka nkọwa obodo na okwu ndụ a na-enye site na ụdị uri
Nebo Media Group bipụtara akwụkwọ ya kachasị ọhụrụ Unsuitable for Fools na Eprel 21, 2020
A mụrụ Hughes ma zụlite ya na Beaumont, Texas, nke dị nso n'ókè Louisiana
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ na-agba bọọlụ ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na gọọmentị ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na French High School n'afọ 1985 ebe ndị otu bọọlụ ya weghaara òkè nke asọmpi 5A steeti na Odessa's Permian High School n'afọ 1984
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'asụsụ French, Hughes banyere Mahadum Houston na Houston, Texas ebe ọ natara nzere na mgbakọ egọ
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Houston, ọ sonyeere Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity
O mechara nweta nzere Master na nka mma na Mahadum Ashland dị na Ashland, Ohio
'Detroit bu ama ukwu nke kachárá ukwu na Michigan na o bu ochié Nkeji obodo Wayne

Devi Prasad (1921 June 1, 2011) bụ onye India na-ese ihe na onye na-eme udo
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe, Onye na-ese foto, onye nkuzi nka na onye na-ahụ maka udo
Devi Prasad gụrụ akwụkwọ na Shantiniketan nke Rabindranath Tagore nakwa na Sevagram
E mere nnukwu ihe ngosi, The Making of the Modern Indian Artist-Craftsman, na New Delhi na Mee 2010, ebe ọrụ ya na-agafe afọ 65 malite na ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ nka mbụ nke Devi Prasad
A họọrọ ihe osise e mere na Santiniketan na 1938 ma mechie na I gosi nke ụfọdụ ndị ikpeazụ (site na 2003 ruo 2004) nke e mere oge ikpeazụ o ji ụlọ ọrụ ya mee ihe na Delhi
Naman Ahuja, onye haziri ihe ngosi ahụ, bụ onye mmụta na ụlọ ọrụ ya ma dee ọtụtụ ihe banyere onye nkuzi ya na-echeta Prasad dị ka onye nwere ọmịiko, onye na-eche echiche miri emi
Devi Prasad bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye na-eme udo na-a kwalite echiche nke Mahatma Gandhi na Rabindranath Tagore

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mba ụwa na War Resisters' International (WRI) ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ, na-eje ozi n'ọfịs ya na London dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu site na 1962 ruo 1972 tupu oge ya dị ka onyeisi oche site na 1972 ruo 1975
Devi Prasad nwụrụ na Delhi na 1 June 2011
Devika Sumitra Kathrina Vidot (Amụrụ na Takamaka na Nọvemba 1988) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Seychelles
Kemgbe ụbọchị 3 Nọvemba 2020, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke itinye ego, ọchụnta ego na ụlọ ọrụ
Vidot gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na ndekọ ego na ego na Mahadum Manchester na nzere masta na ndekọ ego ọkachamara
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọrụ ego ma nwee ahụmịhe na nyocha
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na Mahadum Seychelles na nchịkwa azụmahịa
Ọrụ ikpeazụ ya bụ maka ụlọ ọrụ dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, a họpụtara Vidot ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka itinye ego, ọchụnta ego na ụlọ ọrụ
Devil in Agbada bụ ihe ihe nkiri Nigeria nke 2021 dere, mmepụta site na Chinneylove Eze na Umaru Elijah duziri ya

sitere na ihe ndị Hollywood
