Ọrụ ahụ gụnyere ịbanye n'ime ụlọ ya nke echekwara nke ukwuu na nke a na-apụghị ịbanye na ya
Devin Allen bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto, onye nta akụkọ foto, na onye na-eme ihe ike nke bi na Baltimore, Maryland
Ọ nwetara nlebara anya mba mgbe ngagharị iwe Freddie Gray n'afọ 2015, mgbe e bipụtara foto ya akpọrọ 'Baltimore Uprising' dị ka foto mkpuchi nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2015 nke magazin Time
E bipụtara foto ya nke ngagharị iwe George Floyd dị ka mkpuchi Time nke ọnwa Juun afọ 2020
A na-edebe foto Allen na nchịkọta Smithsonian nke National Museum of African American History and Culture
Mgbe ọnwụ Freddie Gray gasịrị n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015, Allen, onye toro nkeji ise site n'ebe Freddie Gray zutere ndị uwe ojii, dekọrọ ngagharị iwe ahụ ma tinye foto ya ndị ọzọ na Instagram
N'ime izu atọ nke ngagharị iwe ahụ, Allen sere ihe dị ka foto 10,000

A họọrọ foto Allen sere nke ngagharị iwe ahụ n'ọnwa Eprel 25, afọ 2015 dị ka mkpuchi ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2015 nke magazin Time, na-eme ka Allen bụrụ onye na-ese foto nke atọ a ga-egosipụta na mkpuchi Time
Foto ahụ, nke akpọrọ Baltimore Uprising, na-egosi otu nwoke na-agba ọsọ n'etiti ìgwè ndị uwe ojii na-ebo ndị uwe ojii ebubo
Mgbe Allen bulite foto ahụ site na igwefoto ya na ekwentị ya, o were ya ọtụtụ awa iji ghọta na foto ahụ agbasaala, ebe ọ nọgidere na-ese foto ndị ngagharị iwe ruo mgbe chi jiri n'uhuruchi ahụ

N'afọ 2015, na-agbanye uche mgbasa ozi ya na nso nso a site na magazin Time, Allen malitere 'Through Their Eyes', mmemme ndị ntorobịa nke na-akụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ Baltimore foto, ọkachasị ndị si na mpaghara nwere mmemme agụmakwụkwọ nka na-enweghị ego
Ihe omume ahụ gụnyere inye ụmụ akwụkwọ igwefoto, yana ịhazi ọmụmụ ihe agụmakwụkwọ na ihe ngosi nka nke ọrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2016, e mere ihe ngosi foto Allen 'A Beautiful Ghetto' na Gallery Slought

N'afọ 2017, Allen bipụtara akwụkwọ foto mbụ ya dị ka akwụkwọ tebụl kọfị akpọrọ A Beautiful Ghetto A họpụtara akwụkwọ ahụ maka 49th NAACP Image Awards na ngalaba nke 'Outstanding Literary Work ♡ Debut Author'
A mụrụ Allen ma zụlite ya na West Baltimore
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2020, Allen ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike na obodo Baltimore ma na-ekwu na ebumnuche ya mgbe ọ na-edekọ ihe omume dịka ngagharị iwe bụ ijide n'aka na ọ na-akọ akụkọ ahụ dum
Devis Rogers Epassy Mboka (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1993) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye nche maka klọb Greek Super League OFI
A mụrụ ya na France, ọ na-anọchite anya ndị otu mba Cameroon na mba ụwa
A mụrụ Epassy ma zụlite ya n'obodo Soisy-sous-Montmorency dị n'ebe ugwu France
Epassy sonyere Levadiakos na 14 August 2017 site na Épinal
Na 29 Jenụwarị 2020, Epassy sonyeere Lamia site na Levadiakos na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ
Na 15 Julaị 2021, Epassy kwetara isonyere klọb Greek Super League OFI na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Na 18 Julaị 2021, OFI kwupụtara Epassy mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na klọb ahụ, dị ka ekwenyere na mbụ
A mụrụ ya na France, Epassy bụ onye Cameroon
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ nọchite anya ndị otu mba Cameroon na June 2021
Ọ malitere na Cameroon na 0-0 enyi na enyi ya na Nigeria na 8 June 2021
Devvon Terrell McLeod (amụrụ n'October 6, 1988), bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-eti egwu, ónyé édémédé egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
A maara ya màkà remixes ya na egwu ndị a ma ama n'ịntanetị na YouTube
Ka ọ na-erule Ọktọba 2020, ọwa ya enwetala ihe karịrị ndị debanyere aha 800,000 na ihe karịrị nde vidiyo 170
A mụrụ Devvon Terrell McLeod na Brooklyn, New York City na October 6, 1988
Site na nwata, Terrell chọsiri ike ịghọ onye egwu
Ọ gwara Forbes, 'Dị ka ónyé egwu ọ bụla ọzọ, m na-eme nke a ndụ m niile
Anọ m na kọleji, na-enweta akara ugo mmụta m na usoro ozi kọmputa, achọkwara m na achọghị ịnọdụ n'azụ kọmputa n'ezie ndụ m niile
Mgbè m gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ekpebiri m ịga Mahadum Full Sail màkà akara ugo mmụta m
Nke ahụ dị ka ogige egwu egwu
O mèrè ka eziokwu ahụ sikwuo ike na egwu bụ ihe m chọrọ ime n'oge ndụ m niile
N'afọ 2010, Terrell wepụtara mixtapes abụọ ya na ónyé na-eti egwu Young X nke akpọrọ, April Fools na Download or Die
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012, Terrell wepụtara vidiyo egwu mbụ ya na egwu ya, 'My Senses'
Ọ gàrà n'ihu wee wepụta egwuregwu mbụ ya, The Living Weirdo_o, na Septemba 2014
Abọm ahụ nwetara nkwado site na egwu 'M hụrụ ya n'anya' na '#WCW'
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ Weird Nights ̊ The Intermission, Terrell bulite vidiyo na ọwa ya na-ekwu na ọ ga-akwụsị 'ịme egwu'
Na Machị 24, 2019, Terrell laghachiri na ya na-eme egwu mgbe e mesịrị gbanwee onwe ya mgbe ọ na-emekwa egwu lo-fi
E mechara wepụta egwu 'Take Me Serious' ụbọchị ise ka e mesịrị
O mechara gaa n'ihu ma wepụta egwu dị iche iche site na abọm ya akpọrọ, The Rawe Sound, Vol 1
E wepụtara abọm ahụ na Julaị 26, 2019
A tọhapụrụ ihe ọzọ akpọrọ, The Rawe Sound, Vol
1 Side B na Septemba 2019
Na Mee 2020, Terrell wepụtara egwuregwu nkè isii ya nke akpọrọ, Social Distancing Together N'October 2, 2020, Terrell wepụtara abọm studio nke anọ ya nke akpọrọ, Vol
2 Deja Vu
Abọm ahụ nwetara nkwado abụọ 'Homewrecker' na 'You Trippin'
Dewcells, dewcels ma ọ bụ dew cell bụ ngwá ọrụ eji achọpụta ebe igirigi
Ha nwèrè obere ihe na-ekpo ọkụ nke ihe ngwọta lithium chloride gbárá gbụrụ-gbúrụ
Ka LiCl na-amị mmiri site na ikuku, conduction gafee ihe na-ekpo ọkụ na-abawanye, ọkụ dị na ya na-aba ụba, na okpomọkụ na-ababawanye, na-eme ka mmiri si na nnu
N'okpomọkụ ụfọdụ, mmiri nkè nnu na-amị bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke evaporated (nkwekọ)
N'ime isi dewcell a thermistor composite (ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-atụle okpomọkụ) na-agbanwe nguzogide eletrik na okpomọkụ nkè okpomọkụ mepụtara
Ónyé nhazi ihu na-enye voltaji, na-atụle mmepụta nkè netwọk, ma na-agbakọ ébé igirigi
Dewey Crumpler (amụrụ n'afọ 1949) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na osote prọfesọ na San Francisco Art Institute

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mbà na mbà ụwa, a na-egosikwa ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie Oakland nké California; Triton Museum of Art, Santa Clara, California; na California African American Museum, Los Angeles
Crumpler enwetala onyinye ntọala Flintridge, onyinye National Endowment for the Arts fellowship, na Fleishacker Foundation, onyinye eureka fellowsship
E tinyewo onyinyo dijitalụ nke mgbidi ya na ihe ngosi Tate Modernī nke afọ 2017 Soul of a Nation Art In the Age of Black Power na London
Crumpler tolitere na Hunters Point, mpaghara ndị isi ojii nke San Francisco, wee gaa Balboa High School, ụlọ akwụkwọ magnet nka, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1967
O tinyere aka na Civil Rights activism ma gosipụta ọrụ ya gburugburu ọbọdọ ahụ, mesịa zute ónyé na-ese ihe Emory Douglas nke Black Panther Party
Ya na Douglas so n'òtù ndị na-ese ihe na-ezukọ na ụlọ Evangeline Montgomery

N'ịchọ ndụmọdụ na mural nke 1974 nke San Francisco Unified School District nyèrè iwu, otu nwa okorobịa Crumpler banyere n'okpuru nkụzi Elizabeth Catlett, a gbanwekwara ndụ ya mgbè ọ jikọtara ya na ndị na-ese ihe mural José Clemente Orozco, na Pablo Oːhiggins
Ọtụtụ iri afọ ka e mesịrị, ọ pụtara na panel Honoring Catlett na De Young Museum
Crumpler ghọrọ prọfesọ nke akụkọ ihe méré eme na nka studio na San Francisco Art Institute ébé ụmụ akwụkwọ ya ama ama gụnyere Kehinde Wiley na Ionna Rozeal Brown
Dexter Vines bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na inker, nke a maara maka mmekorita ya na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ dịka Steve McNiven na Ed McGuiness, onye nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha bụ ndị otu 'eDex'
Vines arụọla ọrụ n'ọtụtụ aha ihe nkiri maka Marvel na DC
Ụfọdụ utu aha gụnyere Marvel's big 2007 summer event Civil War, Tangent Comics Power Girl, Superman / Batman, JLA Classified (ha niile na McGuiness), na Wolverine
N'afọ 2012, Vines natara ihe nrite 2012 Inkwell Award for Favorite Small Press And Mainstream-Independent (SPAMI) ink work over another pencil artist
Deyemi Okanlawon bụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, ihe onyonyo, ihe nkiri na onye na-eme olu

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na TV Series Gidi Up na An African City ma gosipụta ya na ihe nkiri, If Tomorrow Comes and Road to Yesterday yana ngosipụta cameo ya n'ọtụtụ vidiyo egwu Naijiria gụnyere No be You nke Waje na Soldier nke Falz The Bahd Guy dere
A mụrụ Okanlawon na Lagos, owuwa ndịda anyanwu nke Nigeria nye onye nna Injinia ụgbọ elu bụ Adeyemi Okanlawon, na Adeyinka Okanlawon onye na-emeputa achịcha na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Taikenny Nursery na Primary School dị na Lagos, na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na International School, Lagos
Ọ gakwara gụọ Chemical Engineering na Mahadum Lagos, Lagos, Nigeria
Onye bụbu onye na-emeputa achịcha na onye isi ahịa na ịre ahịa, o nwetakwara asambodo na omume ihe nkiri , site na New York Film Academy
Okanlawon nwere ahụmịhe izizi ya n'ime ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, mgbe ọ pụtara na egwuregwu 'njedebe nke afọ' mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iteghete, Okanlawon gosipụtara na mgbasa ozi Television nke mba ya na Kunle Bamtefa
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Lagos, Okanlawon ghọrọ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na otu ejije Gf(x) (Ụlọ ọrụ Harvesters), Xtreme Reaction na Snapshots (Convenant Christian Center)
Okanlawon mere ihe nkiri mpụta mbụ ya na ihe nkiri 2010 ZR-7, tupu ya ewepụtara ya na obere ihe nkiri akpọrọ A Grain of Wheat

Ọ gara n'ihu itinye aka na imepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpụmkpụ na site na 2012 ọ nwetagoro mpụtara maka ọtụtụ ngosipụta ya na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi emere maka ịntanetị yana usoro webụ gụnyere Blink, 6 30pm na Knock Knock

Na 2013 ọ gbanwere ọrụ iji lekwasị anya na ịme ihe nkiri oge niile ma gosipụtala ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri ise kpo ọkụ n'ọnụ , ihe nkiri nkwago asatọ kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ wee pụta na mgbasa ozi Televishion OLX na GLO yana vidiyo egwu nke Waje na Aramide

O nwekwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri dịka Greg Odutayo's 'Beyond Blood' nke gosipụtara Joseph Benjamin na Kehinde Bankole na-eme ihe nkiri; Pascal Amanfo's If Tomorrow Never Comes nke gosipụtara Yvonne Nelson, Ishaya Bako's Road To Terday nke gosipụtara Genevieve Nnaji and Majid Michel na No Man's Land nke Pascal Amanfo n'egosiputa Adjetey Anang
Ọ nọ na usoro nke NdaniTV Gidi Up na OC Ukeje, Titilope Sonuga, Somkele Iyamah na Joke Silva
O gosikwara na ihe nkiri TV Taste Of Love, Lekki Wives, An African City na Dowry
Na 2013, o meriri ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na obere ihe nkiri na mmemme ihe nkiri In-Short maka ọrụ ya dị ka di isi mgbaka na ihe nkiri mkpali mmụọ, Blink
Okanlawon lụrụ nwunye na Jenụwarị 2013
Na Julaị 10, 2016, Okanlawon na nwunye ya Damilola nabatara nwa mbụ ha
Dhafer L'Abidine (Arabic , nke a na-akpọkwa Dhaffer L'Abedine, Zafer El-Abedin na Dhafer El Abidine; a mụrụ na 26 Nọvemba 1972) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye na-agba epeleọkpa
O mekwara ihe nkiri na 'The Mark of Cain' dịka Omar Abdullah na A Hologram for the King Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na Tunisia mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ 'Dali' na usoro Tunisia a na-akpọ 'Maktoub'
O mechara sonye na ihe nkiri na mba ndị Arab, ọkachasị na Egypt, UAE na Lebanon gụnyere ihe ngosi na usoro dịka 'Taht Al Saytara', 'Prince of Poets', na 'Arous Beirut'
Hadiza Blell, onye amara aha ọgbọ ya dịka Di'Ja, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Naịjirịa
Ọ bịanyere aka na 'Mavin Records' ugbu a
Na 2009, ọ wepụtara otu egwu nke mbu ya bu 'Rock Steady', nke a hoputara maka 'Best Urban / R & B Single' na 2009 Canadian Redio Muziki Awọdụ'
Ọzọkwa, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọkacha ọhụụ onye egwu na 2008 Biiti Muziki Awọdụ
Di'Ja ebiela na Naịjirịa, Sierra Leone, United Steeti na Canada
Nne ya si ugwu Hausa Naịjirịa ma nna ya si Sierra Leone
Di'Ja nwetara akara ugo mmụta na bayoloji na akparamaagwa
Ọrụ egwu ya malitere na 2008
Na 2012, Di'Ja weputara ọtụtụ otu egwu, gụnyere 'Dan'Iska (Rudebwoy)', 'Hold On (Ba Damuwa)' na 'How Can We Be Friend'
Na Febuwarị 14, 2014, Di'Ja bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu nke Don Jazzy 'Mavin Records'
'Yaro', otu egwu mbụ ya pụtara n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Ọ na-enye olumba Hausa na Krio ịkwanyere Naịjirịa na Sierra Leone ugwu
Na Mee 2014, e gosipụtara Di'Ja na ' Dorobucci ' n'akụkụ ndị ọrụ akara ha Don Jazzy, Dr SID, Tiwa Savage, D'Prince, Korede Bello na Reekado Banks
E gosikwara ya na 'Arise', ya na Don Jazzy na Reekado Banks
Na Disemba 15, 2017, Di'Ja weputara egwu ya Aphrodija, nke gosipụtara ndị egwu ọzọ bụ Tiwa Savage na Reekado Banks
Usoro ntọala dị mfe, nke dịgasị iche na àgwà na ọrụ dabere na ngwá ọrụ ha nwere, mejupụtara obodo ahụ dum
E were ndị obodo n'ọrụ iji wuo modulu ndị ahụ, a na-ejikwa ihe ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ dị ka ụrọ, laterite, brik simenti, osisi chịngọm na nsụgharị loam rụọ ụlọ
Maka ime ka ihe ndị dị ike dị ka osisi, ogidi, mgbaaka mgbaaka na ntọala, a na-eji konkiri
N'ihi nnukwu mgbidi na nnukwu elu nke elu ụlọ, enwere ike ịkwụsị ikuku n'ọtụtụ ụlọ
E chepụtara ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka ebe nzute na mgbanwe maka ndị nwere ọdịbendị na ezinụlọ dị iche iche
Agwaetiti Zhoushan dị na China bụ ebe a na-anwale ọrụ mmegharị obodo, nke onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ bụ Wang Shu duziri
Zhoushan bụ isi obodo China nke ịkụ azụ, ebe ọ dị n'ọnụ ụzọ delta nke Yang Tsé, ma nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị ihe dị ka otu nde mmadụ
Ebumnuche nke ọrụ a, nke malitere n'afọ 2009, bụ iji gbanwee mpaghara ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ụlọ ọrụ, Putuo, ka ọ bụrụ mpaghara njem nleta na omenala
E mere ụlọ ahụ iji nọgide na-enwe mkparịta ụka n'etiti oge a na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe nketa nke mpaghara ahụ
N'ịbụ nke dị n'àgwàetiti dị ihe dị ka mita saịtị narị atọ na ala, ala a họọrọ nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ, ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na ụlọ nkwakọba ihe, nke e wuru n'ime ọtụtụ iri afọ
Kéré mere ebe ngosi nka, ebe mgbasa ozi, ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe na 'ubi okike ọdịbendị' maka mpaghara ahụ
Emere atụmatụ ahụ gburugburu ikpo okwu nke na-agafe saịtị ahụ ruo n'ugwu ahụ, nke dị n'akụkụ saịtị ahụ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ
Nke a ga-arụ ọrụ dị ka ohere mgbanwe n'etiti gburugburu ebe obibi mmadụ mere nke mpaghara mepere emepe na gburugburu ebe obibi karịrị ma gabakwuo
A na-enweta ọkwa kachasị mma nke nkwuwa okwu site na ihe iko dị n'ala ruo n'elu ụlọ
Ìhè anyanwụ na-abanye n'ime ụlọ ma enwere echiche na-akparaghị ókè na saịtị ahụ dum
A na-ahụ ihu ndịda na ọwụwa anyanwụ karịsịa n'oge ọkọchị
Ogwe osisi Bamboo na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onyinyo mpụga nke ọdịdị ha na-adịghị mma
Ogwe osisi na-agbanwe na ihe iko, ya mere a na-egbo mkpa maka nkọwapụta okwu na nchedo anyanwụ
N'afọ 2012, Nhazi Kéré malitere ọrụ ọhụrụ iji wuo ụlọ ọgwụ na Léo
Léo bụ obodo dị na mpaghara Sicily na Burkina Faso nke dị nso n'ókè ya na Ghana, gburugburu kilomita otu narị na iri ịse n'ebe ndịda nke isi obodo, Ouagadougou
Ndị bi na Léo dị puku iri ise, mana ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ ga-ejekwa obodo ndị dị n'ime ime obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu ozi
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ndị ọrụ na enweghị obere ụlọ ọgwụ mpaghara pụtara na ụlọ ọgwụ mpaghara ahụ na-agbasakarị ma na-agbasi mbọ ike ijere obodo dum ozi
Ọrụ ebere “Operieren na Afrika’ kpebiri ịkpata ego iji wuo ụlọ ọgwụ na Léo maka obere ọrụ dị mfe
Ha ga-enye ndị dọkịta na ndị nọọsụ a zụrụ azụ agụmakwụkwọ iji rụọ ọrụ ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ, nke ga-enwe njikọ rụọ mba Germany
Dị ka ọrụ ahụ nwere oke ego,Nhazi Kéré jiri modulu ndị e mere atụmatụ dị ka ntọala maka ọrụ ahụ
Dị ka ọ dị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Gando, e ji ala wuo mgbidi ahụ na elu ụlọ site na tin
A na-ahazi modulu ndị ahụ ka elu ụlọ ha wee gafee, iji nyekwuo ndò
N'oge ikpeazụ nke atụmatụ ahụ, ohere dị n'etiti modulu aghọwo ohere ime ụlọ
“Corridor” nke ohere dị n’etiti ahịrị nke modulu bụ oghere sara mbara, nke mepere emepe, nke nwere oche maka ndị mmadụ iji zuru ike na osisi maka ndò
Kéré bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà atọ ahọpụtara iji mepụta ebe ngosi na-adịgide adịgide na International Red Cross na Red Crescent Museum, nke mepere n'afọ 2012 na Geneva, Switzerland

Onye ọ bụla na-ewu ụlọ na-arụ ọrụ n'otu isiokwu; Gringo Cardia (site na Brazil) lekwasịrị anya na 'ịgbachitere ùgwù mmadụ', Shigeru Ban (site na Japan) lekwasịrị anya na 'ịjụ ọnwụ' na Kéré họọrọ isiokwu 'ịrụgharị njikọ ezinụlọ'
Kéré nyere aka n'ọnụ ụzọ mbata gbara ọchịchịrị, nke mgbidi hemp concrete gbara gburugburu, nke na-agba onye ọbịa ume ịtụle mmetụta egwu na nke ọdachi ezinụlọ n'oge esemokwu
N'etiti akụkụ a nke ihe ngosi ahụ bụ ụlọ elu, nke e jikwa konkiri hemp mee, nke bụ ihe owuwu na-ezo aka na ụlọ ọdịnala maka ezinụlọ nuklia
Ọ na-eme ka ìhè dị ntakịrị ma nwee ala ígwè Corten nke nwere ọdịdị nchara
Ebe a bụ ihe ncheta maka ọdachi dịka ogbugbu Srebrenica
E wuru 'Osisi nke Ozi', nke nwere alaka ígwè, iji bụrụ ihe ncheta nke ọdịiche dị n'etiti okike udo na agha
Njikọ dị n'etiti okike na ezinụlọ bụ obere isiokwu dị mkpa na akụkụ Kéré nke ihe ngosi ahụ
“Ụlọ Ndịàmà” bụ ihe dị iche na ụlọ elu ahụ ebe a na-elekwasị anya n’ihe doro anya na olileanya kama ọchịchịrị na obi nkoropụ
Oghere a na-ekwusi ike na ọrụ dị mkpa akaebe anya na-arụ n'ọrụ enyemaka mmadụ
Kéré enwetala ma nye atụmatụ echiche maka ọrụ na mba niile n'ụwa
E gosipụtara echiche ya na German Architecture Museum na Frankfurt na Expo 2008
Na Yemen, o mere ihe atụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji kwekọọ na mpaghara ihu igwe dị iche iche nke mba ahụ
Kéré mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ na obodo maka mba Pouni dị na Burkina Faso

Site na Ọktọba 2010 ruo Jenụwarị 2011 gosipụtara ihe nlereanya na foto nke ọrụ Kéré na ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'Small Scale, Big Change Architecture Ọhụrụ nke mmekorita ọha na Museum of Modern Art na New York City
Na June 2010, Kéré sonyere na International Congress of Architecture and Society na Pamplona, nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Architecture more for less'
N'afọ 2014 Kéré sonyere na ihe ngosi Sensing Spaces na Royal Academy of Arts
N'afọ 2016, e tinyere ọrụ ya na Alejandro Aravena's Venice Architecture Biennial, nke hiwere isi na usoro iwu ụlọ dị ala, ihe ọdịnala, na ihe ọmụma obodo
Site na Nọvemba 2016 ruo Machị 2017 Kéré gosipụtara ihe ngosi mbụ ya 'Francis Kéré
Radically Simple' na Munich na Architekturmuseum der TU Munich
N'afọ 2017, Serpentine Galleries nyere Kéré ọrụ imepụta Serpentine Pavilion na London
Kéré mere Sarbalé ke, ntinye dị egwu nke nwere ụlọ elu iri na abụọ, maka mmemme nka nke afọ 2019 Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
Diéné Diawara (amụrụ n'afọ 1988) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball na Limoges ABC nke French Ligue Féminine de Basketball
Diawara na-asọ mpi maka otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Mali
Na FIBA Africa Championship maka umunwaayi na afọ 2007 na Senegal, o nyeere ndị otu ya aka imeri asọmpi ahụ, na-eme ka ọ ruo eru maka Basketball na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics
Diawara bụkwa onye kachasị rebounder nke asọmpi ahụ
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị Lamine Diawara na Nare Diawara
Diabaté bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Diallo Javonne French (amụrụ n'afọ 1971 na Kansas City) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese foto
French tolitere na Kansas City, Kansas
Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-agụ egwú mana ọ gbanwere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu mgbe ọ zụrụ igwefoto 8mm n'ụlọ ahịa
Ọ kụziiri onwe ya imepụta ihe nkiri na-emepụta ihe nkiri 8mm na 16mm
Site n'afọ 1994 ruo afọ 1996, French gara Mahadum Clark Atlanta na Atlanta, Georgia
Mgbe ọ nọ na Georgia, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere aka na mmepụta vidiyo egwu maka TLC, Goodie Mob, Outkast, na Xscape
N'afọ 2001, French laghachiri Kansas City wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Amerịka Jazz Museum na mpaghara 18th na Vine nke mere ka ọ nwee mmasị na foto jazz
N'afọ 2006, French dere ma duzie ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke a, nke Kevin na Keisha McGautha gbara
May This Be Love meriri n'ọnọdụ mbụ na Urban Mediamakers Film Festival n'afọ 2007 ma gosipụta ya na usoro BET Lens on Talent n'afọ 2009
E gosipụtara ya na San Francisco Film Festival na Spaghetti Junction Urban Film Festival
Onye a ghọrọ nke Kansas City Film Festival n'afọ 2016, bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na-anwale banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwu ndị Afrịka Amerịka
Ọ na-egosi onye Kansas City bụ Anthony Saunders onye bụ onye na-agụ egwu na-ede egwu
E gosipụtara foto French na ebe ndị dị ka American Jazz Museum, The Box Gallery, Buttonwood Art Space, na kaadị Hallmark
Foto ya, nke a na-ese na oji na ọcha na-enweghị ọkụ ụlọ ọrụ, na-ejide ihe nkiri Jazz nke Kansas City
Onye na-egwu saxophon bụ Bobby Watson gwara French n'otu oge, na ị jidere ihe n'ezie
Ọ bụghị naanị na ọ na-ese foto, ọ na-edekọ ihe French na-ekwu na ọ ga-echeta mgbe niile
French na-eji ihe nkiri ojii na nke ọcha iji mepụta mmetụta nke enweghị oge na fim ya na foto ya na-elekwasị anya na egwu na ịhụnanya ịhụnanya

N'ịbụ onye egwu jazz na-emetụta, French na-ekwu 'na-ese foto ndị egwu jazz n'ime ihe ha, na-emekarị n'ọnọdụ na-enwu gbaa, na-ejighị ọkụ ọkụ, naanị ìhè okike, na-enye m ohere ịghọ akụkụ nke egwu mgbe m na-agbapụ; na-anwa ijide oge dị ọcha nke ngosipụta egwu

Joseph Kirkland (amụrụ n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Eprel, n'afọ 1968), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Diamond D, bụ onye America hip hop MC na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Bronx, New York City, na otu n'ime ndị guzobere Diggin 'na Crates Crew, abbreviated as DITC
N'ịbụ onye tolitere na Forest Houses na Bronx, Diamond D nwere mmetụta site na ndị DJ obodo, DJ Hutch na DJ Supreme
N'oge ọ na-eto eto, ndị DJ abụọ ahụ ga-ahapụ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na turntables ha
Ná mbido nke ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe, Diamond nọrọ ọtụtụ awa na studio Jazzy Jay na Allerton Avenue na Bronx
O nyere Jay otuto n'ihi ịkpali ya ịzụta ihe ngosi ma kụziere ya usoro mmepụta dị iche iche
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke afọ 2017, o kwuru, 'Amụtara m ihe dị ka Pasent iri itoolu na ise nke nkà mmepụta m n'aka ya
Ọ nọkwa n'ihu oge ya
Na mgbakwunye na nkuzi Jazzy Jay, Diamond kwuru na onye otu Brand Nubian bụ Grand Puba bụ mmụọ nsọ ya ịmalite ịkụ egwu
Ngosipụta izizi nke ndị ọbịa na A Tribe Called Quest's The Low End Theory track 'Show Business' nyere aka mee ka ndị mmadụ mara ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe

Iji kwalite ihe ndekọ ya nke afọ 1997 Hatred, Passions and Infidelity, Mercury Records chịkọtara vinyl nkwado a na-akpọ Diamond Jewels nke tinyekwara Stunts, Blunts, na Hip Hop songs 'Best Kept Secret', '*!*! What U Heard', na 'Sally Got A One Track Mind'

Nasibu Abdul Juma Issack (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1989), onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Diamond Platnumz, yana aha nka ndị ọzọ bụ Simba, Chibu Dangote, bụ onye Tanzanian bongo flava na-emepụta egwu, onye na-agba egwu, onye ọrụ ebere na onye ọchụnta ego nke ihe nketa Ha
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Tandale, Dar es Salaam
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke WCB Wasafi Record Label, Zoom Extra, Wasafi Bet na Wasafi Media
Diamond enwetala ọtụtụ ndị na-eso ụzọ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na Central Africa
Ọ ghọrọ onye egwu mbụ sitere n'Afrịka iji nweta ngụkọta nke 1 ijeri YouTube
Mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Universal Music n'afọ 2017, Platnumz wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ ya, A Boy from Tandale (2018)
N'afọ 2021, Diamond na akara ndekọ ya WCB Wasafi banyere na 360 Partnership na Warner Music Group
Ọrụ ya malitere n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa mgbe ọ na-ere uwe
Ọ ga-eji ego ọ nwetara site na azụmahịa uwe dekọọ egwu ma mesịa dekọọ egwu mbụ ya 'Toka Mwanzo', egwu Bongo flava jikọtara ya na R&B
Abụ ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ahịa
E wepụtara egwu ya bụ 'Kamwambie' n'afọ 2010
Abụ ahụ meriri ugboro atọ Tanzania Music Awards
O weputara abọm studio mbụ ya Kamwambie n'otu afọ ahụ n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2014, Platnumz nwetara nhọpụta na BET Awards 2014 maka Best International Act Africa
Platnumz na onye na-ese vidio Director Kenny na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro maka vidiyo egwu ya
A họpụtara vidiyo egwu maka 'Waah', nke Kenny duziri, maka 'Best African Video' na 2021 All Africa Music Awards
N'afọ 2022, o wepụtara egwu 10 ya gbasaa ebe ọ gosipụtara ndị omenkà kachasị elu dịka Zuchu, Adekunle Gold, Focalistic na ọtụtụ ndị omenkọ ndị ọzọ kachasị elu n'Africa
Diamond bụ onye Alakụba
Ya na onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ n'oge gara aga, onye ọchụnta ego si Uganda bụ Zari Hassan, nke bi na South Africa, nwere ụmụ abụọ
Ọ ghọrọ nna nke ugboro atọ ya na onye Tanzania Hamisa Mobetto
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2019, Diamond na onye Kenya na-eme ihe ngosi na onye egwu Tanasha Donna, onye ya na ya mụrụ otu nwa nwoke, amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019
Ha abụọ kewara kemgbe na Tanasha Donna na-efega n'ala nna ya, Kenya
Diamond bụ nwa nwanne nne nke onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri na DJ, Romeo Abdul Jones, nke a maara dị ka Romy Jones
O nwekwara ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, onye egwu Queen Darleen, na onye ọchụnta ego na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Esma Platnumz
N'afọ 2010, ọ kwadoro otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị Tanzania, Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala, Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete
O weputara egwu ndi ozo na akwado CCM, dika 'CCM Tusonge Mbele' ('CCM Let's Move Forward')
Na 23 Jenụwarị 2019, a mara Diamond Platnumz dịka onye nnọchi anya Pepsi Brand na East Africa
Na 13 Septemba 2019, Diamond Platnumz ghọrọ Brand Ambassador nke Parimatch Africa
Na 25 Septemba 2019, a kpọrọ Diamond onye nnọchi anya Nice One Brand Ambassador
Na 4 Machị 2020, a kpughere Diamond Platnumz dịka onye nnọchi anya ọhụrụ nke Coral Paints (Tanzania)
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2021, ọ malitere Wasafibet na mmekorita ya na Odibets - ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu Kenya
Àtụ MTV Europe Music Award for Best African Act
Diana Aviv bụ onye isi azụmaahịa South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke Feeding America na Independent Sector
A mụrụ Aviv nye nna onye Poland gbara ọsọ ndụ ya na ezinụlọ ya gbaga South Africa site na Oké Mgbukpọ
N'ịbụ onye tolitere na Johannesburg, ọ mụtara na mbụ, banyere Nelson Mandela mgbe ọ bụ onye otu ndị ntorobịa nke Habonim
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na King David High School Victory Park na 1968 na Mahadum Witwatersrand na 1974
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ kwagara North America wee debanye aha na Columbia University School of Social Work
Ọ gụrụ ọrụ nlekọta mmadụ na Johannesburg dịka ọ bụ naanị ụzọ iwu kwadoro iji tinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na-ejedebeghi n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'ịgbaso nzere Master ya, Aviv rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-elekọta mmadụ na Southeast Nassau Guidance Center na onye isi nchịkwa nke Alternative to Domestic Violence
Na mmalite 1990s, Aviv ghọrọ osote onye nduzi nke National Jewish Community Relations Advisory Council
E mechara kwalite ya gaa n'ọkwa osote onye isi ala maka amụma ọha na United Jewish Communities
Aviv mechara zute Nelson Mandela na June 1990 ka a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Na 2003, Aviv ghọrọ onye isi ala na onye isi ọrụ (CEO) nke ngalaba nnwere onwe wee nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo 2015 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Feeding America
Ọ nọrọ na Feeding America ruo 2018, mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ihi okwu onwe ya
Aviv wee sonye na ngalaba na Mahadum Indiana – Mahadum Purdue Indianapolis dị ka onye nlekọta nleta pụrụ iche na onye ọbịa site na 2018
Aviv lụrụ Sterling Speirn, ha nwekwara ụmụ abụọ ọnụ
Diana Braynova-Dilova (Bulgarian Диана Брайнова-Дилова; amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1952) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball onye sonyere na 1976 Summer Olimpik na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
(Jennivien) Diana Brebner (Mee 20, 1956 - Eprel 29, 2001) bụ onye na- ede uri Canada
Ọ bụ onye nnata ihe nrite Archibald Lampman
Diana Brebner bụ ada nke ndị mbata Dutch wee tolite na mpaghara Montreal, Quebec
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ottawa, obodo o mere ka ọ bụrụ ebe obibi maka oge ndụ ya fọdụrụnụ
Hendrika Ruger bipụtara mkpokọta uri atọ mbụ nke Brebner na Netherlandic Press
Nchịkọta ya mgbe nwụsịrị, Ọnụ Ụzọ Ámá Ishtar Abụ ikpeazụ na ahọpụtara, bụ Stephanie Bolster deziri ma bipụta ya na 2005
A na-enye ihe nrite Diana Brebner kwa afọ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Arc
Brebner meriri Gerald Lampert Award na 1991 maka Radiant Life Forms, Pat Lowther Award na 1994 maka Golden Lotus, Archibald Lampman Award na 1997 maka Flora & Fauna
Diana Ejaita bụ onye Naijiria-Italian na-ese ihe na onye mmebe textile
A mụrụ Ejaita na Italy
Ọ gụrụ ezigbo nka na France na Germany
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, ọ nọ na Berlin, Germany, na Lagos, Nigeria
N'afọ 2014, Ejaita malitere akara ejiji, nke a na-akpọ WearYourMask, nke sitere na ọdịnala West Africa na ihe nketa Italo-Nigerian ya
N'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara ọrụ Ejaita na ihe ngosi otuKunstgewerbemuseum (Museum of Decorative Arts) nke Berlin, nke a na-akpọ Afro Futures
Fashion - Hair - Design
N'otu afọ ahụ, o gosipụtara Google Doodle na-echeta ụbọchị ọmụmụ 119 nke Funmilayo Ransome-Kuti, onye nkuzi Naijiria na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ejaita emeela mkpuchi anọ maka magazin The New Yorker

Diana Chioma Eneje (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2002), nke a maara dịka Diana Eneje, bụ onye Naijiria na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka ejiji, onye nlereanya, vlogger na onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi ọha na eze, amụrụ ma zụlite na Lagos, ma si Enugu steeti dị na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
A maara ya maka ịpụta na vidiyo egwu Rema Dumebi, Nivea skin-care, Zaron cosmetics, na mkpọsa Hewlett-Packard Pavilion x360
A mụrụ Diana Chioma Eneje na August 19, 2002 na Lagos nye Kingsley Eneje, na Linda Eneje
Mmetụta mbụ ya na ejiji, sitere n'aka ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị Jennifer Eneje, na Doris Eneje, bụ ndị kpaliri mmasị ejiji ya, mgbe ọ na-etolite mgbe ọ dị obere
N'afọ 2016, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ịme ihe ngosi dị ka onye nlereanya dị afọ iri na ụma, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Na 19 Ọgọstụ 2017, ọ malitere ntọala ya, iji kwado ụmụaka na-enweghi nne na nna
Diana malitere vlog ejiji na YouTube n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019
Ọ na-edekọ ejiji, ntutu isi, nri, na ahụmịhe njem ya
Na 19 Ọgọstụ 2019, ọ malitere nchịkọta ntutu isi ya na mmekorita ya na The Shine Cartel
Ọ pụtakwara na vidiyo egwu Rema Dumebi, nke Jonzing World wepụtara, na Mavin Records na 21 Mee 2019, dị ka onye ndu na vidiyo ahụ
Diana emetụtawo Hp, Cadbury, PayPorte, Mango, Stanbic IBTC, Krispy Kreme, Kellogg Tolaram, Infinix, Bolt, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye nnabata n'etiti ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi ọha na eze site na PayPorte, na ncheta afọ isii na 28 Septemba 2020, na nri abalị nke onwe ya na CEO
Na ubochi nke iri na asatọ, 2020, o kwuru banyere ọrụ ya, dị ka onye na-emetụta na Guardian TV, ya na onye na-elekọta Popsicles bụ Emmanuella
Na 19 Ọgọstụ 2021, Swarovski, ụlọ ọrụ ọla na ngwa na Nigeria, kpughere Diana, dị ka ndị na-emetụta akara ya
Diana Ferrus (amụrụ ya na 29 Ọgọst 1953, Worcester, Western Cape ) bụ onye odee South Africa, onye na-ede uri na onye na-akọ akụkọ nke Khoisan agwakọtara na agbụrụ ohu
A na-ebipụta ọrụ ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans na Bekee
Ferrus na-eduga nkuzi nkuzi na Cape Town mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa na Mahadum Western Cape
A maara Ferrus nke ọma maka uri ya banyere Sarah Baartman, nwanyị South Africa nke a kpọgara Obodo Europe n'okpuru ụgha ụgha ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ọchịchọ ịmata ihe
O dere abụ a n'afọ 1998 ka ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Utrecht
Ọtụtụ ndị kwenyere na ewu ewu nke uri a bụ ihe kpatara nlọghachi ozu Bartmann na South Africa
E bipụtara uri ahụ n'ime iwu French
Ferrus bụ onye malitere Afrikaans Skrywersvereniging (ASV), Bush Poets, na Women in Xchains
O nwere ụlọ ọrụ na-ebi akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Diana Ferrus Publishers ma dezie ma bipụta mkpokọta akụkọ gbasara nna na ụmụ nwanyị
Diana Frances maobụ Diana Francis nwere ike izo aka na
Diana Frances, (onye mụrụ Diana Frances Clent) bụ onye Canada na-eme ihe ọchị, onye edemede, na onye njikwa azụmahịa
O dere ma mee ihe ọchị maka ihe nkiri, telivishọn na redio ruo afọ iri atọ, ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ihe nkiri Rock Paper Scissors nke dị na Vancouver
A họpụtala ya maka Gemini Award na onye nke itoolu, Canadian Comedy Awards
Diana Frances Clent si Langley kwaga Maple Ridge, British Columbia, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, mgbe ihe o mechara kọwaa dị ka 'ihe na-akpata ọdachi n'ezinụlọ'
A kuchiri ya, ma soro nwanne nne ya na nwanne nna ya biri mgbe ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Maple Ridge
Ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe ihe nkiri ma na mbụ chụsoo ihe nkiri Shakespearean, mana a na-etinye ya ugboro ugboro na ọrụ na-atọ ọchị ma nwee obi ụtọ na nzaghachi ndị na-ege ntị
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Douglas College
Ka ọ na-abanye n'azụmahịa ntụrụndụ, ọ hapụrụ aha nna ya nke o chere na ọ dị ka 'ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị'
Frances sonyeere Vancouver Theatresports League, ebe ọ mụtara usoro improvisational
Amamihe ya ngwa ngwa mere ka o nweta ọnọdụ na Rock Paper Scissors (RPS) comedy collective
N'afọ 1991, ọ nọchiri onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mmepụta RPS A Twisted Christmas Carol, egwuregwu improvisational dabere na usoro nke Dickens classic
Ọ laghachiri ịbụ akụkụ nke ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ oge ọ bụla nke egwuregwu ahụ ruo 2005, ma mesịa maliteghachi egwuregwu ahụ na 2014
RPS dọtara ndị ahịa ụlọ ọrụ ma chọta ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na-eme ihe ọchị maka nzukọ yana inye ọmụmụ ihe maka mmekọrịta ndị ọrụ
Dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke RPS, a kpọrọ Frances otu n'ime 'Forty Under 40' site na magazin Business in Vancouver na 2003
Frances sokwa ụlọ ọrụ Impolite Company (IMPCO) mee ihe osise, Urban Improv na Canadian Content
N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1997, Frances pụtara na otu egwu egwu egwu I'd Probably Be Famous

O duziri mmepụta nke The Complete Works of William Shakespeare (Abridged) na Jenụwarị 1998, ma mee akụkụ nke egwuregwu ahụ dị ka nọmba abụ na ịgba egwú mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ya nwere ike ịgba egwú
N'afọ 2001 na 2002, ya na RPS rụrụ ọrụ na egwu egwu Blankety Blank The Unknown Musical and Design For Living
N'afọ 2005, Frances malitere ime Leave it to Cleavage, ihe ngosi ọ mepụtara na Ellie Harvie, ebe ndị na-elekọta ụlọ ha na-enye ngwọta oge 1950 maka nonsense nke oge a nke ndị na-ege ntị
A matara ha site na nhọpụta nke afọ 2004 Canadian Comedy Award maka Best Improv Troupe

Arịrịọ maka mmemme telivishọn bịara na ngwụcha afọ 1990 site na mmalite nke The Comedy Network, nke Frances dere ma mee ihe nkiri na usoro nke ihe nkiri Slightly Bent TV (1999) na Sucker Punch (2001 Japon2002) ma dee maka akwụkwọ akụkọ satirical nke afọ 2002 Point Blank
O dere maka CTV's Comedy Inc, ma soro mepụta ma rụọ ọrụ na njem ọchị iji kwado oge nke ise ya
O mechara dee maka This Hour Has 22 Minutes
A họpụtara Frances maka Gemini Award maka ide maka The Hour na George Stroumboulopoulos
Frances emepụtala ihe maka ememme Vancouver na Victoria, a na-ekwukwa na ọ na-eweta ihe ọchị improvisational na Yukon mgbe ọ kwusiri ike na akụkụ improvisational n'ememme comedy nke Nakai na 2003
Ndị na-ahazi ya na ndị na-ege ntị nwere mmasị nke ukwuu nke na e debara aha Frances maka ihe ngosi zuru oke n'afọ ndị sochirinụ wee mechie emume 2007 na Leave it to Cleavage
N'afọ 2004, Frances dere ihe ngosi CBC Radio banyere ụmụ nwanyị na-atọ ọchị

O dere ma pụta n'ọtụtụ ihe omume nke The Debaters na Definitely Not the Opera, nyere aka na ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị The Irrelevant Show, ma jee ozi dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ mmekọrịta ya na ihe ngosi ya bụ Dating Diana

Frances so RPS rụọ ọrụ na njem abụọ maka ndị agha Canada njem otu ọnwa na afọ 1997, na-eleta CFS Alert, Bosnia, Egypt, Israel, na CFB Goose Bay; na njem ụbọchị itoolu nke Afghanistan na afọ 2003, na-eme na Camp Julien na Kabul na Camp Warehouse dị nso
N'afọ 2018 na 2019, ya na Elvira Kurt na Friends and Girls Nite Out gara njem
Frances dere 2018 ACTRA Awards na ihe ngosi Toronto, nke Colin Mochrie kwadoro
Frances bụ onye ọka ikpe na asọmpi telivishọn sketch-comedy Sketch Troop n'akụkụ Harvie na Tim Progosh
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe maka akụkụ Vancouver nke njem obodo iri na abụọ nke Literary Death Match

Diana Francis (amụrụ na 1944 na Lancashire) bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka udo, Quaker, na onye edemede
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford, ma nwee PhD
na Mahadum Bath, nwetara na 1998 na thesis Respect in cross-cultural conflict resolving training
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke International Fellowship of Reconciliation na Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii maka Nkwado Mgbanwe Agha, ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi Swarthmore nke afọ 2015
Francis bụ onye dere
Diana Gandega (amụrụ na abalị abụọ, na ọnwa nke isii, na afọ 1983 na Paris) bụ onye France-Malian na-agba bọọlụ basketball ụmụ nwanyị
Gandega sonyere Mali na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, ebe o nwetara akara 15 na egwuregwu 5, gụnyere akara 8 na egwuregwu mbụ, mmeri 4 na New Zealand
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere Touty Gandega bụkwa onye na-egwu basketball
Àtụ Mali squad - 2009 FIBA Africa Championship for Women
Diana Holland OBE bụ onye otu ọrụ aka nke Britain bụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Unite na Treasurer nke Labour Party
E nyere Holland OBE na 2001 New Year Honours, maka 'ọrụ maka Ohere Ịha nhata n'Ọrụ'

N'afọ 2006, Holland jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii ụmụ nwanyị nke International Transport Workers' Federation, ọ bụkwa onye nhazi mba maka ụmụ nwanyị, agbụrụ na ịha nhata maka Transport and General Workers' Union (TGWU)
TGWU mechara sonye na Unite, Holland wee bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya, ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mkparịta ụka gbasara esemokwu ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala na 2012
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Confederation of Shipbuilding and Engineering Unions
Ka ọ na-erule Julaị 2010, Holland abụwo onye otu Labour Party ruo karịrị afọ 25 na afọ 16 na National Executive Committee, onye kachasị ogologo oge a na-ahọpụta onye otu NEC
Ọ bụ onye otu Islington North CLP
A họpụtara Holland dị ka Treasurer nke Labour Party na Septemba 2010, na-emeri John Prescott
Holland meriri 6896% nke ngụkọta vootu, na 1902% n'ime 50% na ngalaba ndị otu nke kọleji ntuli aka na 4993% n'ime 50%
Ọ lụrụ Joe Irvin, onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị (isi nke Ọfịs ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke 10) nke Praịm Minista Gordon Brown

ana Mary Mitchell (née Coates; 16 Nọvemba 1932 na 8 Jenụwarị 2016) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye edemede nke Zimbabwe, onye bụ onye na-akatọ gọọmentị Ian Smith na Robert Mugabe
Diana Mary Mitchell (née Coates; 16 Nọvemba 1932 na 8 Jenụwarị 2016) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye edemede nke Zimbabwe, onye bụ onye na-akatọ gọọmentị Ian Smith na Robert Mugabe
A mụrụ Mitchell na Salisbury, isi obodo Southern Rhodesia
Nna ya, Elliott Coates, bụ onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na nne ya, Mary Peck, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Alụmdi na nwunye nne na nna ya kwụsịrị na 1932, ya na ndị nne na nna na-azụlite ya biri n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ mgbe nne ya na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ngwá agha
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Eveline Girls High School na Bulawayo, ma mesịa na Mahadum Cape Town na South Africa, ebe ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na asụsụ Shona
Ọ lụrụ onye injinia mmiri bụ Brian Mitchell n'afọ 1956, ha wee nwee ụmụ atọ
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Mitchell malitere na 1966, mgbe ọ mere mkpọsa iji chekwaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara nke gọọmentị mebiri
Mgbasa ozi ahụ mechara gbasaa ka ukwuu iji melite agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụaka ojii
N'afọ 1968, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Centre Party; ọ bụ ezie na ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya na ntuli aka 1974 na maka National Unifying Force (NUF) na ntuliaka 1977
Mgbe Smith kwupụtara Rhodesia na 1970 dị ka mba, Mitchell tinyere aka n'ịhazi mkparịta ụka n'etiti ndị Rhodesian Front nke Smith na ndị na-alụ ọgụ
Na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị nta akụkọ Robert Cary na Willie Musarurwa, ọ chịkọtara ma bipụta nchịkọta akụkọ ndụ nke ndị isi na mmegharị mba, African Nationalist Leaders in Rhodesia Who's Who
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere obi ụtọ na nnwere onwe Zimbabwe ga-eme n'okpuru okwu ndị mba ụwa nabatara na 1980, Mitchell katọrọ mmegide gọọmentị Mugabe na-egbochi mgbasa ozi na mmegide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ya na di ya kwagara Britain n'afọ 2003
Brian nwụrụ n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2011, e nyere ụlọ ọrụ Hoover Institution nnukwu nchịkọta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akwụkwọ Mitchell, nke meghere ha maka ọha na eze, na Mahadum Cape Town
Diana Mkumbo Chilolo (Amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1954) bụ onye omeiwu na National Assembly of Tanzania Ọ bụ onye otu kemgbe afọ 2000
Ọ bụ onye otu Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM)
Diana Esther Nwaiwu (a mụrụ n'ubochi 10 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1973) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-eche goolu n'otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị mba Naịjirịa
O so n'òtù ahụ na mmalite iko mba ụwa nke umu nwanyi FIFA n'afọ 1991 yana iko mba ụwa nke umu nwanyi FIFA afọ 1995
N'ogo klọb, ọ gbaara ndi ọtu Kakanfo Babes bọọlụ na Naịjiria
Diana Page (amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-etinye ihe nkiri sitere na South Africa mana ọ bi na Istanbul, Turkey ugbu a
N'ịchọpụta ahụmịhe nke ịgagharị n'etiti ụlọ abụọ a, ihe osise Page na-emetụta echiche nke ijikọ ụwa ọnụ na ụdị ndụ na-akwagharị akwagharị
Site na ihe eserese, arụmọrụ, ntinye, na vidiyo, Page na-enyocha gburugburu obodo ọ bi dị ka ọnọdụ mmetụta uche yana nke anụ ahụ

N'afọ 2022, ihe ngosi nke Page, Walking on a rim of light, nke gụnyere ihe osise ndị dabeere na foto na mbipụta dijitalụ, gosipụtara na Oliewenhuis Art Museum (Reservoir) site na 24 Febụwarị ruo 10 Eprel 2022
Page nwetara nzere BA Honours site na Mahadum Natal, 1986, HDE site na Machịum Cape Town, 1987, na Master na Fine Arts site na Maazị Rhodes, 1992
Diana Yankey (n'ihe ụfọdụ 'Dinah'; amụrụ na 2 Febụwarị na afọ 1967) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Ghana lara ezumike nká nke bụ ọkachamara na 100 mita hurdles
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na afo 1987 World Championships in Athletics na 1988 Summer Olympics
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro abụọ na African Championships in Athletics ma were ọlaọcha na afọ 1987 All-Africa Games na afo 1988 African Championships na Athletics
Diana Yekinni bụ onye Britain na-eme ihe nkiri nke Naijiria nke a maara nke ọma maka ihe nkiri dịka Ije na Lunchtime Heroes

A makwaara Diana nke ọma maka igosipụta dị ka Genevieve na usoro TV Jenifa's Diary na Funke Akindele N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya na 'Most Promising Actress' na mbipụta 2014 nke Golden Icons Academy Movie Awards
A mụrụ Diana Yekinni ma zụlite ya na South London, England, United Kingdom
Ọ bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na American Academy of Dramatic Arts, Los Angeles ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na ịgba egwu na BRIT School for Performing Arts and Technology
Ọ malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya n'afọ 2009 mgbe ọ pụtara na usoro telivishọn America akpọrọ Medium
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya dị ka Libby na ihe nkiri Ijé na Odele na Mosa
N'afọ 2012, Yekinni sonyere ma merie mbipụta mbụ nke asọmpi GIAMA Screen Icon Search Competition kwa afọ na Houston, US

Ọ kwagara Nigeria n'afọ 2012 ma gosipụta ya na ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri gụnyere A New You, All That Glitters, Saro The Musical, Jenifa's Diary dị ka Genevieve, Lagos Cougars na Lunch Time Heroes
Diane Awerbuck (amuru na 1 Eprel 1974) bu onye ode akwukwo South Afrika
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Ugbo na abalị, meriri 2004 Commonwealth Writers' Prize, akwụkwọ mbụ kacha mma (Afrika na Caribbean), ma bụrụ ndị a họpụtara maka International Dublin Literary Award
Na afọ 2011, nchịkọta akụkọ ya dị mkpirikpi, Cabin Fever, bụ Random House Struik bipụtara
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Ngwọta Ụlọ, bụ Random House Struik bipụtara na August 2012
Edepụtara ya aha maka ihe nrite Caine na afọ 2014, wee merie asọmpi Short Story Day Africa n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ kụziiri ihe na Rustenburg Girls' High School ruo na afọ 2002
Ọ na-enyocha akụkọ ifo maka South Afrikan Sunday Times
A na-ebipụta edemede ya na akụkọ mkpirisi ya mgbe niile ma asụgharịwokwa ọrụ ya na German, Swedish, Mandarin na Russian
Dọkịta ya nọ na akụkọ trauma Mmụọ na Akwụkwọ Ozi Trauma, Warb
Awerbuck na-edekwa dịka 'Frank Owen', ya na onye na-ede akwụkwọ Alex Latimer
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ha nke cowboy-apocalypse South na 2016 (southvsnorthcom)
North bụ na mmepụta

Diane Gashumba MD, MMed (Pediatrics), bụ onye Rwandan na-ahụ maka ụmụaka, onye nchịkwa ahụike, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ na onye nnọchianya Rwandan a họpụtara na alaeze Sweden kemgbe ọnwa June 12, 2021
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ahụike na kọmitii nke Praịm Minista Edouard Ngirente
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ n'ụbọchị 4 Ọktoba 2016
Tupu nke ahụ, site n'ụbọchị 26 Machị 2016 ruo ụbọchị 4 Ọktoba 2016, Gashumba jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọahụ na Nkwalite Ezinụlọ na kọmitii nke Praịm Minista Anastase Murekezi
Diane P
Pozefsky bụ onye ọkachamara na nyocha na Mahadum North Carolina na ngalaba sayensị Kọmputa
Enyere Pozefsky onyinye nturu ugo nke Women in Technology International (WITI) 2011 Hall of Fame Award maka ntinye aka na ngalaba Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ
Pozefsky nwetara AB na mgbakọ na mwepụ etinyere na Mahadum Brown na 1972 yana PhD
sitere na Ngalaba Sayensị Kọmputa na UNC na 1979 n'okpuru nduzi nke Dọkịta Mehdi Jazayeri

Pozefsky sonyeere IBM Corporation, Raleigh, NC, na 1979 dị ka onye so na ngalaba Communication Systems Architecture Department na-arụ ọrụ na nkọwapụta na ngwa nke Systems Network Architecture ( SNA ), nnukwu na mgbagwoju anya atụmatụ-ọgaranya netwọk ije mepụtara na 1970 site na IBM
Yiri n'akụkụ ụfọdụ n'ụdị ntụaka OSI, mana nwere ọtụtụ ndịiche
SNA bụ n'ezie mejupụtara asaa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka IBM afọ iri abụọ na ise wee kpọọ ya onye otu IBM na 1994 iji kwado ọrụ ya na APPN na AnyNet architectures na mmepe
Enyere ya ọrụ netwọk na imewe ngwa maka asọmpi 1998 na 2000
Ndụ ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya na ịkparịta ụka n'Ịntanet na injinịa ngwanrọ, gụnyere
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe, imewe, na architecture na akụkụ abụọ ọ masịworo mmasị na mgbe e mesịrị na ebe a ọrụ na-eme ka mma na ngwakọta tiori na omume
Diane Pozefsky laghachiri na UNC mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na IBM na June 2004
Akwụkwọ Pozefsky gụnyere
Ndị ogworo na US
Diane Tuckman bụ onye America na-ese ihe
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na-ise ihe n'ákwà silk, yana dịka onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gbasara isiokwu ahụ na Jan Janas
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Lanham, Maryland na mpaghara Greater Washington, DC
A mụrụ Tuckman n'Ijipt
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Washington Free Beacon, Tuckman chetara na mgbe ọ bi n'Ijipt dị ka nwatakịrị n'oge WWII, ha na-agba ụmụ agbọghọ ndị Juu égbè n'okporo ámá
Mụ na ezinụlọ m gbapụrụ na 1948 wee gaa France
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ihe na-agbawa obi, ọbụna na France bụ oge siri ike mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, na ike oke tiketi na obere ụlọ
Tuckman kwagara United States na 1958 n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ lụsịrị di

A na-ekwu na Tuckman bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-enyere aka mee ka ihe osise silk na United States site na akwụkwọ ya, na mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ya (Ivy Imports) bụ ụlọ ọrụ US mbụ 'na-ebubata ihe osise French dị mkpa iji see na silk'

Tuckman bụkwa onye guzobere otu Silk Painters International (SPIN), nke bụ otu na-anaghị achọ uru, nke nyere aka ịhazi Nzukọ nke Abụọ nke International Silk Painting Congress na Mahadum George Mason n'afọ 2000
SPIN ugbu a na-ahazi ihe osise silk ugboro abụọ; nke kachasị ọhụrụ emere na 2018 na Gatlinburg, TN
Nzukọ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ndị otu narị ise ugbu a
Tuckman egosila ma hazie ihe ngosi nka silk na gburugburu mpaghara Greater Washington, DC
A na-akpọ ya 'onye ọsụ ụzọ na-ese ihe silk na America, ọ na-akụzi, na-ese, ma na-egosipụta ihe osise silk nke ya, yana ịkwalite ụdị nka site na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ya

Diane Victor, (amụrụ n'afọ 1964, Witbank, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ na South Africa, nke a maara maka nkọwa ya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya banyéré ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke oge a
A mụrụ Victor na Witbank, South Africa
O nwetara nzere BA Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Johannesburg n'afọ 1986
Site na 1990 rụo ugbu a, Victor akụziwo oge ezumike, na-akụzi eserese na obibi akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ dị ichè íchè nke South Africa gụnyere Mahadum Pretoria, Wits Technikon, Pretoria Technikon

Ọrụ Victor na-eji onyinyo ahụ, mgbé mgbè onyinyo onwé ya, iji mepụta akụkọ dị mgbagwoju anya metụtara South Africa nke ógè a na nsogbụ agha zuru ụwa ọnụ, nrụrụ áká na ime ihe ike na ọha na eze, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndụ onwé ónyé
Dị ka Virginia Mackenny si kwuo, ọrụ Victor na-ama ónyé na-ekiri ya aka 'ịkwacha ihe oyiyi ya jupụtara na ya, nke jupụtara na nkọwa zuru ezu, iji chọpụta ọkwa ha na omume
N'ịbụ ndị na-enweghị olileanya ọ bụla nke usoro, ihe oyiyi ndị a na-echetara Breugel ma ọ bụ Bosch n'echiche ha na-enweghị nchekwube banyéré ụwa na mkpokọta nke otu nzuzu n'elu nke ọzọ
Victor gosipụtara eziokwu jupụtara na ikpe na-ezighị ezi, na-ekpughe mgbagwoju anya nke ịdị adị nke oge a
'Ikike ya igosi isiokwu ya na isiokwu ya n'ụzọ nke na ihe niile ma e wezụga ịmanye anyị ka anyị mata ha na-achụpụ anyị n'ime ihe anyị na-enweghị obi ụtọ, ma anyị chọrọ ya ma ọ bụ na anyị achọghị'
Ikike Victor nwèrè ịga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya nke karịrị afọ irí àtó, emeela ka o doo ányá na ọ nọgide na-aga n'ihu na nkà na usoro
Ọ na-emetụtakwa usoro eserese nnwale, dịka a hụrụ ya na ihe osise anwụrụ ọkụ na ihe osisi ntụ
Diankou Sembene, bụ onye Senegal na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dịka 'Maazị Ndiaye' na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya karịrị nke mmadụ bụ Atlantics
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Sembene maka ihe nkiri Atlantics nke Mati Diop duziri dịka ihe nkiri mbụ ya
Mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na telivishọn ZeroZeroZero na obere ihe nkiri Corruption
Dianna Cohen bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ike
Ọ bụ onye isi na onye guzobere Plastic Pollution Coalition, otu nkwado na òtù mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke na-achọ ibelata mmetọ plastik
Cohen toro na Los Angeles
Nna ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nne ya bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọgwụ Los Angeles Free Clinic
Ọ gara UCLA, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe ọmụmụ ihe ndị dị ndụ tupu ọ gbanwee isi ya na nka
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Cohen malitere ịrụ ọrụ na collage, na mbụ na-eji akpa akwụkwọ na-acha nchara nchara, ma mesịa tinye plastik
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya nke usoro akpa ahụ bụ n'afọ 1994
Mgbe afọ asatọ nke iji akpa plastik rụọ ọrụ, Cohen ghọtara na plastik ahụ na-emebi

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 2015, o kwuru, sị Na mbụ enwere m obi ụtọ n'ihi na ọ pụtara na akpa plastik ahụ bụ nke na-adịru nwa oge na nke na-emepụta ihe dị ka anyị, nakwa na ha nwere oge ndụ na-adịghị agwụ agwụ
N'ime nchọpụta banyere isiokwu ahụ, ọ chọpụtara na 'plastic photodegrades ma ọ bụ okpomọkụ-degrades site na ịdọwa, mana ọ naghị apụ
' N'afọ 2009, mgbe ọ matara banyere Great Pacific garbage patch, ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, Julia Cohen, Manuel Maqueda, Daniella Russo na Lisa Boyle guzobere Plastic Pollution Coalition (PPC)
Ọ durula mbọ ndị otu Plastic Pollution Coalition gbalịsiri ike iwepụ ihe a na-eji otu akpa maka biya, mmiri na ihe ọṅụṅụ ndị ọzọ n'ememme egwu na egwu egwu
Cohen enwetala ihe nrite maka ọrụ gburugburu ebe obibi ya
A kpọrọ ya Environmentalist of the Year site na SIMA n'afọ 2019
N'afọ 2016, e nyere ya ihe nrite onyinye nke Snow Angel Award nke Sun Valley Film Festival
Cohen na onye mmekọ ya, Jackson Browne, bi na Los Angeles
Ha bụ ndị na-emepụta ihe na ihe ngosi nke afọ 2020 The Story of Plastic Ọ na-agba ọsọ n'elu mmiri kemgbe afọ 1996
Dianne Stewart (a mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Maachị 4, 1952)
Ọ bụ onye odee South Africa nke biputala akwukwo 40 maka ndi okenye na umuaka
Ọ na-ede n'asụsụ Bekee, a sụgharịkwara akwụkwọ ya abụọ n'asụsụ Africa, gụnyere Xhosa, Zulu, Sotho, na Afrikaans, na asụsụ Europe, gụnyere French, Spanish, na Swedish

==Akwụkwọ akụkọ Ifo Stewart nke Africa gụnyere== Daughter of the Moonlight and Other African Tales (1997), The Zebra's Stripes and Other African Animal Tales (2004), African Myths and Legends (2014), Folktales From Africa (2015), and The Guineafowl's Spots and Other African Bird Tales (2018)
O bipụtakwala akwụkwọ ilu ndị Africa aha ya bụ Wisdom from Africa (2013), akwụkwọ a raara nye Anthony Davey, prọfesọ isiXhosa ya na Mahadum Rhodes
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo ndị a emeela Stewart ka ọ bụrụ “aha ezinụlọ” na ibipụta akụkọ ifo Africa maka ndị na-ege South Africa na-asụ bekee
Akwụkwọ Stewart The Gift of the Sun A Tale from South Africa (1996), nke nwere ihe atụ Jude Daly, meriri ihe nrite Smithsonian Notable Books for Children na 1996
Stewart gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rhodes n'afọ 1973 site na nzere na Psychology na isiXhosa, ma mesịa kuzie isiXhosa; Nne Stewart bụ ọkà okwu Xhosa nke ọma
Maka nzere MA ya na Asụsụ Afrịka na Mahadum Natal, Stewart gụrụ abụ ọrụ Zulu na Xhosa nke nwanyị ime obodo n'ugbo okpete dị n'ụsọ osimiri KwaZulu-Natal
Stewart nwekwara MA na Creative Writing si na Mahadum Cape Town
Stewart bi na Ballito, South Africa, ma o tolitere na Eastern Cape
Diathermancy (site na 'dia' site na 'thermē' okpomọkụ) bụ ihe onwunwe nkè ụfọdụ mmiri nké na-enye ohere ka ìhè si na ha na-enweghị onwé ya na-ekpo ọkụ
N'ihi ya, ihe diathermanous 'na-agafe' site na okpomọkụ
Ọ bụ ónyé Germany na-ahụ màkà physics na chemist Heinrich Gustav Magnus kọwara Diathermancy n'ébé afọ 1800s
Mmiri bụ diathermanous; yá mèrè ikuku ikuku anaghị ékpo ọkụ site na anwụ
Mmiri ikuku n'ekpo ọkụ site na radieshon okpomọkụ nkè ala na-ewepụta, na karịsịa, site na mmiri n'elu ụwa
Mmiri abụghị diathermanous, a na-ekpo ọkụ yá kpọmkwem site na ìhè anyanwụ

Okpomọkụ ikuku na-abịa site na radiation ogologo ógè sitere n'ala na, karịsịa, site na mmiri (oké osimiri, ọdọ mmiri, osimiri), n'ihi na mmiri abụghị ihe na-adịghị na diathermanous ma kpuchie ụzọ atọ n'ụzọ anọ nke elu ụwa
Diathermancy na-akpata ọdịda n'elu mmiri ma ọ bụ mmiri
Nke ahụ bụ n'ihi na mpaghara ndị a na-amịkọrọ okpomọkụ sitere na Anyanwụ ozugbo mànà ọ na-eji nwayọ ma na-ewepụkwa radieshon a na ikuku
Yá mèrè, mmiri oyi nkè oké osimiri nwèrè ihu igwe doro anya, na-enweghị igwe ojii, n'ihi na ọdịda site na ikuku oyi na nké dị arọ na-ezere ma ọ bụ na-egbochi convection n'ihi nde ha bụ usoro dị ichè
Diaw bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Dibi bụ nri ndị obodo Senegal ya na obodo Gambia nke nwere anụ e siri esi (nke na-abụkarị nwa atụrụ) nke a na-eme ka ọ dị ụtọ ma bepụ ya
A na-ejikarị ya na yabasị e siri esi, mustard, ya na achịcha
A na-akpọ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ndị na-enye dibi 'dibiteries'
Ndị na-ere ahịa n'okporo ámá na Senegal na-ejikarị Dibi eme ihe
Ọtụtụ dibiteries na isi obodo Senegal nke Dakar bụ ndị mba ọzọ, ọkachasị site na ndị Hausa nke Naijiria
'Dibi' bụ okwu Wolof nke ana akpokwazi barbecue
Dibi ekwesịghị ịgbagwoju anya na 'dibi Hausa', okwu ndi Senegalese maka suya
A na-esi ma dibi suya n'elu ite maọbụ n'ọkụ ọkụ, mana a naghị ebibi dibi n'ụzọ dị nro dịka suya maọbụ na-etinye dibi marinated na kankankan spice
Enwere ike ịtụ nwa atụrụ zuru oke site na dibiteries ụfọdụ ma were ya dịka nri dị ụtọ
A na-akpọ isi nwa atụrụ dum méchoui
Méchoui bụ ụdị nri Maghrebi nke e webatara na obodo Senegal site na Mauritania
A na-ejikarị ahịhịa ahịhịhịa, ahịhọta nke ndi French, maọbụ tomato na salad lettuce
Diblo Dibala (amụrụ n'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1954), nke a na-akpọkarị Diblo, bụ onye egwu egwu Congolese, nke a maara dị ka 'Machine Gun' maka ọsọ na nkà ya na ụbọ akwara
A mụrụ ya na afo 1954 na Kisangani
Ọ kwagara Kinshasa mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ meriri asọmpi talent nke mere ka ọ kpọọ ụbọ akwara na Franco's TPOK band
Dibala nọgidere n'òtù ahụ naanị obere oge, na-aga n'ihu na-egwuri egwu na Vox Africa, Orchestra Bella Mambo na Bella Bella, nke mbụ ya na Kanda Bongo Man na-egwú
N'afọ 1979, ọ kwagara Brussels, n'afọ 1981 ọ sonyeere òtù Kanda Bongo Man na Paris
Abọm mbụ ha, Iyole (1981), bụ ihe ịga nke ọma
Diblo ghọrọ onye na-achọsi ike na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, na-arụ ọrụ na Pepe Kalle na ọtụtụ ndị egwu soukous ndị ọzọ
N'etiti afọ 1980, o guzobere otu egwu nke ya, Loketo (nke pụtara 'ụgbọ mmiri'), ya na ndị na-agụ egwu Aurlus Mabele na Mav Cacharel
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, òtù ahụ kewara, na afọ 1990 o guzobere otu ọhụrụ, Matchatcha, nke ka na-arụ ọrụ mgbe ọtụtụ mgbanwe ndị ọrụ gasịrị
Shasha Damilola Alesh nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Dice Ailes, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eti egwu
Na ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Chocolate City
A họpụtara ya maka Rookie nke Afọ na The Headies 2016
N'afọ 2016, TooXclusive họọrọ egwu ya 'Miracle' nke atọ na ndepụta ya nke 'Top 10 Songs for the month of Ọktoba'
N'afọ 2017, tooXclusive kpọrọ ya dịka 'otu n'ime ndị nka iri na isii ị chọrọ ịma

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Naịjirịa na kọleji lagooz, Republic of Benin, na Ghana wee kwaga Canada ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum York wee malite ọrụ egwu ya tupu ọ laghachi Naịjirịa mgbe nkwekọrịta ndekọ ya na Chocolate City na afọ 2014
Ọ malitere dị ka ukwe ụka, ọ malitekwara na Hyce- age, coker, Millie na reihnard mgbe ọ nọ na labelụ ahụ
O nwetara nkwanye ùgwù na afọ 2016 maka egwu ya nke CKay mepụtara 'Miracle' nke gosipụtara Lil Kesh
Na 21 Disemba na afọ 2016, Dice Ailes soro ndị dị ka WSTRN, Krept na Konan, Migos n'akụkụ Lil Kesh na 'Beat FM Xmas concert' afọ 2016 na Lagos
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Tush Magazine, Dice Ailes kọwara ụdị egwu ya dị ka 'Afro-pop RnB'
N'okwu ya
O kwukwara n'afọ 2018 na ọ bụghị abụ 'Otedola' iji nweta ego n'aka onye ijeri Femi Otedola ma ọ bụ bịaruo ezinụlọ ya nso
O kwuru 'Ihe ọ bụla ị na-eme, ndị mmadụ ga-enwe obi abụọ na echiche ha mgbe niile, mana emeghị m abụ ahụ iji nweta ego n'aka Otedola ma ọ bụ ịbịaru ezinụlọ ya nso
Naanị ihe na-atọ m ụtọ
N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, mgbe m wepụtara egwu ahụ, ezutere m Otedola ma nye m nnukwu ego
Mụ na ndị ezinụlọ m nọ nso ma ana m akpọ ya na ekwentị mgbe ọ bụla m chọrọ
Emeghị m atụmatụ maka ihe ndị a niile dị ka ụfọdụ ndị kwuru
' N'afọ 2020, otu onye na-akwado ya mara Dice aka maka ịghara itinye olu ya maka okwu ndina n'ike nke na-eme na Naịjirịa
Onye ọbụ abụ ahụ zara na ọ bụghị onye Naijiria, nke a butere esemokwu na Twitter ka ndị na-akwado ya kwere nkwa ịgọnahụ onye ọbụ abụ ahụ

Dichloralphenazone bụ ngwakọta 1 2 nke antipyrine na chloral hydrate
Na njikọta ya na paracetamol na isometheptene, ọ bụ ihe na-arụ ọrụ na ọgwụ maka isi ọwụwa na isi ọwụụ, gụnyere Epidrin na Midrin
A na-ahụkarị nkwarụ na ọgwụ a ma na-adụ ọdụ ịkpachara anya, dịka ọmụmaatụ mgbe ị na-anya ụgbọala

Dick Cruikshanks bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na 1874, o wee nwụọ na Machị 3, 1947
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe nkiri ise dị mkpirikpi nke e mere na 1917, atọ n'ime ha bu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Africa mere ya
Richard Ma ọ bụ Dick Sheppard nwere ike izo aka na
Àtụ Infobox award
Maria Dickin guzobere PDSA Dickin Medal n'afọ 1943 na United Kingdom iji sọpụrụ ọrụ ụmụ anụmanụ na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ bụ ihe nrite ọla nchara, nke nwere okwu 'For Gallantry' yana 'We Also Serve' n'ime okpueze laurel, nke e buuru n'eriri nwere agba akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, na-acha nchara nchara, nakwa anụnụ anụnụ
A na-enye ya ụmụ anụmanụ ndị gosipụtara 'nkà pụrụ iche maọbụ ndị tinyere uchu mgbe ha na-eje ozi maọbụ ndị e jikọtara ya na ngalaba ọ bụla nke ndị agha ma ọ bụ ndị na-ahụ maka nchekwa obodo'
A na-akpọkarị onyinye ahụ 'Victoria Cross nke ụmụ anụmanụ'
Maria Dickin bụ onye guzobere People's Dispensary for Sick Animals (PDSA), ọrụ ebere maka ahụike ụmụ anụmanụ nke Britain
O guzobere ihe nrite ahụ maka anụmanụ ọ bụla na-egosipụta obi ike ma tinye uchu doro anya n'ọrụ mgbe ha na-eje ozi nyere ndị agha nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ mberede obodo

E nyere ihe nrite ahụ ugboro 54 n'etiti afọ 1943 na 1949 nye nduru 32, nkịta 18, ịnyịnya 3, na nwamba nke ụgbọ mmiri iji nabata omume obi ike ma ọ bụ itinye uchu n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na esemokwu ndị ọzọ na-esote
E weghachiri inye ihe nrite ahụ n'afọ 2000
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007, ndị natara ihe nrite ahụ n'
mbụ ọnụọgụ ha dị 1e liri 2 n'ogige PDSA Animal Cemetery dị na Ilford, Essex,wetara n nsọpụrndị ụ agha zuru oke na ngwụcha ọrụ enyemaka nke National Lottery iji weghachitogege i ili ahụ
Ndị mbụ natara onyinye ahụ, na Disemba 1943, bụ nduru atọ na-arụ ọrụ na Royal Air Force bụ ndị nyere aka n'inweghachi ndị ọrụ ụgbọelu site na ụgbọelu ndị a tụfuru
Onye natara ya n'oge kachasị dị nso bụ Hertz,
ntụaka Germany nwere obere aja nke jere ozi na RAF Police na Afghanistan
As of February 2022[update], enyeela ihe nrite Dickin Medal ugboro 74 gụnyere otu nke nkwanye ùgwù emere n'afọ 2014 maka anụmanụ niile rụrụ ọrụ na Agha Mba Ụwa nke Izizi
Dickson Nnamdi Iroegbu bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Ọ duziri ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood

N'afọ 2005, na mbipụta mbụ nke African Movie Academy Awards, Iroegbu ritere ihe nrite atọ maka ihe nkiri ya a kpọrọ The Mayors, nke gụnyere ihe nrite maka Best Picture, Best Screenplay na Best Director
Ihe nrite African Movie Academy
Didi Akinyelure bụ onye nta akụkọ nwetara ihe nrite bụ nwaafọ Briten na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nwetara nzere bachelọ na kemịkal injinịarịn na Mahadum nke Nottingham
N'afọ 2018, Didi natara Special Excellence Alumni Laureate Award nke Mahadum nke Nottingham
Didi bụ ihu nke ihe ngosi ụtụtụ nke CNBC Africa a kpọrọ Open Exchange, West Africa
Didi Akinyelure bụ onye nta akụkọ nwetara ihe nrite bụ nwaafọ Briten na Naijiria
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, Didi natara Special Excellence Alumni Laureate Award nke Mahadum nke Nottingham
E depụtara akụkọ ya banyere azụmaahịa ụmụ nwanyị na ndepụta nke World Bank Women Entrepreneurship reporting category mmemme nrite One World Media n'afọ 2018
E dere maka ya na magazin Forbes Africa ma tinye ya na ndepụta nke ndị nta akụkọ azụmahịa kachasị nwee mmetụta n'ụwa
Ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego Midia, mepụtara ihe omume nke telivishọn ya, nke a kpọrọ A Place in Africa, ihe ngosi TV nke Afrịka gbaa gburugburu
Akinyelure malitekwara ụlọ ọrụ REAP, na-emepụta ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi, njikwa aha na usoro nkwukọrịta
Didi ewuola ọmarịcha ọrụ dịka Onye Nlekọta Ihe Omume na Ọkà Okwu
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, ọ chịrị mkparịta ụka dị elu ya na ndị oke uche na United Nations na Geneva
Ndị a gụnyere Dame Wendy Hall, Nobel Laureate, Prof
Carlo Rubbia na Prof
Jurgen Schmidhuber
N'afọ 2018, ọ chịrị mkparịta ụka nke United Nations na Sir Roger Penrose na Nobel Laureate Jacques Dubochet
O dozikwara otu paneel n'ọgbakọ ndị isi ala Afrịka, ma hazikwaa oriri abalị ihe onyinye nrite ndị Africa CEO
O lebara anya na ndị na - ahụ maka achụmnta ego na London Business School Africa Summit na ihe ngosi Future Energy Africa na ọgbakọ na Cape Town, Saụt Afrịka

Onye isi oche nke Africa Construction Week na Munik,Jamini, haziri ndi otu paneel minista na Africa Oil Week na Cape Town, otu paneel na Access Bank International Women Day Conference, WimBiz, na Africa Women Innovation and Entrepreneurship Forum

O hazikwara Africa Summit nke Mahadum nke Nottingham, Future Energy Exhibition and Conference, West Africa Property Investment Summit, the ‘Lagos at 50’ International Conference nakwazị ‘Lagos Kano Economic Summit’
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2017, United Nations kpọrọ Didi ka ọ gbaa ndị bịara nnọkọ mkparịta ụka na UN Convention to Combat Desertification in Ordos, China ajụjụ ọnụ
Didi a gbala ndị a ma ama n’ọchịchị na ndị isi azụmaahịa ụwa ajụjụ ọnụ
Tupu ọ bido ọrụ nta akụkọ, Akinyelure rụrụ ọrụ na Barclays Wealth na Lọndọn
Didier Amevi Ahadsi (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1970) bụ onye Togo na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ebe ngosi nka dị iche iche n'ụwa niile
N'ike mmụọ nsọ ya sitere na omume okpukpe voodoo, ọdịnala Afrịka, mmetụta nke oge a, na usoro akụkọ onwe onye nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị
A mụrụ Didier Ahadsi na Vogan, Togo
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Afrịka nke ndị Ewe ma ya na ụmụnne ya nwoke atọ na ụmụnne ya nwanyị anọ tolitere
Ọrụ ugbo, okpukpe voodoo na okpukpe Ndị Kraịst metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi ya
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa okorobịa, Ahadsi malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akụ panel na onye na-akụ ihe
Ọ rụziri autobodies ma mesịa jikọta nkà ọkachamara ya na okike ya ma mepụta ihe oyiyi ígwè na-egosi ihe nkiri nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị na ebe obibi ya na Lomé
Site na ọrụ ya, Ahadsi mepụtara ihe nkiri ịkwaemo, ọnwụ, mkpasu na mkpali
Ahadsi sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ ọdịnala Afrịka, dị ka okpukpe Voodoo ma ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ nkwekọrịta
Didier Ahadsi na-emepụta ihe nka site na akụkụ ụgbọ ala ochie
