Didier Kamanzi, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Rwanda
Otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu na ihe nkiri Rwandan, a maara Kamanzi nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Cwasa, Rwassibo na Catherine
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye egwuregwu na otu egwuregwu rugby nke mba Rwanda
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1994 na obodo Burundi dịka nwa nke atọ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne isii
Mgbe mgbukpọ agbụrụ nke Rwanda gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Rwanda n'afọ 1994 wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eche nche maka klọb abalị dị n'ógbè ahụ ruo ọnwa ole na ole
Ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịla onye na-eche nche na klọb abalị, ọ nwetara onyinye ịnwale ihe nkiri
Ọ gara nyocha ma nweta ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2015, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nrite ihe nkiri Rwandan

Didier Florent Ouénangaré (1953 - 2006) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Central African Republic, nke a maara nke ọma maka mmekọrịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Cameroon bụ Bassek Ba Kobhio na The Silence of the Forest, nke e wetara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Étienne Goyémidé
A mụrụ Ouénangaré na Bambari
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị maka ihe nkiri na Abidjan na Ivory Coast, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rennes
Silence of the Forest bụ ọrụ nke Ouénangaré chepụtara, onye gakwuuru Bassek Ba Kobhio iji nyere aka chọta ego
E dere ya na French na Sango, ma mee ya na Central African Republic na Gabon

Ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere Gonaba, onye Afrịka gụrụ akwụkwọ na Europe, onye kpebiri ịlaghachi n'ala nna ya, mana ọ na-aghọtawanye na ọ gaghị ekwe omume ịpụ n'etiti echiche na ịghọta ụzọ ndụ nke ndị Baka, 'ndị ọhịa' bụ ndị ọ na-akpọ 'pygmies'
Ouénangaré nwụrụ na 29 Septemba 2006
Odoh Diego Okenyodo (amụrụ n'ubochi abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1974) bụ ónyé edemede Naijiria, ónyé na-ahụ màkà ọgwụ, ónyé na'ihe gbasara uri na ónyé nta akụkọ, ónyé guzobere Akweya TV Ltd na Isu Media Ltd
Odoh bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Kaduna Writers' League, KWL
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị nduzi nke Splendors Of Dawn Poetry Foundation
O so dezie Camouflage Best of contemporary writing from Nigeria, anthology of new Nigerian writers
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ gụnyere ọrụ nke ndị edemede Naijiria a ma ama n'ogè a dịka Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie na Helon Habila
A mụrụ ya n'ubochi abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba 1974 na St
Theresa's Hospital, Otukpo, Benue State, Nigeria, Okenyodo gàrà Mahadum Ahmadu Bello (ABU) Zaria ébé ọ duziri otu ndị édémédé a maara dị ka Creative Writers' Club
N'ihi ọrụ ya na klọb ahụ, ndị agha nke Major General Mamman Kontagora, ónyé nchịkwa agha nke a kpọchiri na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1995 mgbè esemokwu ime ihe ike na mahadum ahụ gasịrị
E weghachiri Okenyodo n'afọ 2001, mgbè afọ atọ nke ịlụ ọgụ megide ndị isi mahadum n'ụlọ ikpe na n'akụkụ dị íchè íchè, gụnyere 'Oputa Panel' a ma ama
N'oge ọ na-anọghị na mahadum, ọ na-ebi ndụ n'ihe odide ya na ihe ngosi akwụkwọ
N'ọnwa Septemba 1999, Weekly Trust tinyere ya n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ n'efu, nke gosipụtara mmalite nke ọrụ ogologo ógè na-arụ ọrụ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ
Na mbido na ABU Zaria, Okenyodo nyèrè áká ma dezie ụfọdụ magazin campus
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Juun 2001, Okenyodo, yá nà ndị ọrụ ibe ya bụ Sumaila Umaisha, Aba Ejembi, Jerome Ajayi, guzobere Njikọ Ndị édémédé Kaduna

Ọzọkwa ónyé isi oche nke Kaduna Writers' League site na mmalite ruo n'afọ 2006, Okenyodo duziri ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke After the curfew, nchịkọta nke ihe odide ndị e kere eke sitere na nchịkọta afọ ise nke League nke akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu a maara dị ka Crocodile
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke Association of Nigerian Authors (ANA) n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2003, na-eje ozi ruo ọnwa Nọvemba 2007
N'ọnwa Disemba 2010, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi óche nke kọmitii nhazi mpaghara nke mgbakọ ncheta afọ iri atọ nke otu ahụ a haziri ka e mee na Abuja n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2011
Okenyodo bụ ónyé otu Nigerian Institute of Public Relations (NIPR), Abuja, na-eje ozi na kọmitii mgbasa ozi na mmekọrịta ọha na eze
N'afọ 2006, Odoh Diego Okenyodo si Kaduna kwaga ọrụ na Alliance for Credible Elections nke dị na Abuja dị ka ónyé nhazi mgbasa ozi
Site na njikọ nke òtù ndị obodo, ọ nwetara ọrụ na Centre for Democracy and Development (CDD) dị ka ónyé isi mmemme na-ahụ màkà nkwurịta okwu nke nzukọ ahụ

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2009, na-achọ ahụmịhe nke ngalaba onwé, ọ kwagara na CMC Connect Burson-Marsteller (Perception Managers) iji duzie ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọha na eze nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasawanye ahịa nke dị na Abuja
Ọ bụ ónyé isi nchịkwa nkè Isu Media Ltd ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Abuja
Odoh so na British Council / Lancaster University's Crossing Borders literary mentorship program n'afọ 2005 na InWent's Measuring Democracy, Governance and Human Rights course na Namibia (2008)
Akwụkwọ uri ya, nke akpọrọ A Poem to its Creator, ka Hybun Publications International wepụtara n'ọnwa Machị 2009 na nnukwu otuto
'A pụrụ ịkọwa nyocha uri nke Okeniodo dị ka eclectic ka ọ na-eji uri eme ihe iji kwuo okwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, dọọ áká ná ntị ma kọwaa uri n'onwe ya, 'otu ónyé nkatọ na-ekwu maka nchịkọta ahụ
Ónyé ọzọ na-ekwu, sị 'Ka ị na-agafe uri Okenyodoz, a na-akụ gị n'ọnọdụ'
Nri na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mmalite nke oke ibu
Nhọrọ onwe onye, mgbasa ozi nri, omenala mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mmetụta ọdịbendị, yana nnweta nri na ọnụahịa niile na-arụ ọrụ na ikọwa ihe na ole onye ọ bụla na-eri
Ike nri bụ nri dị maka oriri mmadụ, nke a na-egosipụtakarị na kilocalories kwa onye kwa ụbọchị
Ọ na-enye oke oke nke ngụkọta nke nri a na-eri n'ihi na ọ na-egosipụta ma nri a na na-eri na nri furu efu
Ihe oriri na-enye onye ọ bụla dịgasị iche iche n'etiti mpaghara na mba dị iche iche
Ọ gbanwekwara nke ukwuu ka oge na-aga
Site na mbido afọ 1970 ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1990, nkezi calorie dị na onye ọ bụla kwa ụbọchị (ọnụ ọgụgụ nri a zụrụ) amụbaala na akụkụ ụwa niile ma e wezụga Eastern Europe na akụkụ Africa
United States nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu na calorie 3654 kilogram kwa onye na 1996
Nke a mụbara na ihu na 2002 ruo 3770

Na ime ngwụcha afọ 1990, ndị Europe nwere calorie 3394 kilogram maka onye ọ bụla, n'ógbè ndị na-emepe emepe nke Eshia, e nwere calorie 2648 kilogram maka onye otu, na mpaghara Sahara Africa, ndị mmadụ nwere calorie 2176 kilogram maka onye
Dieter Aschenborn (15 Nọvemba 1915 na Okahandja, Namibia - September 2002 na Windhoek, Namibia) bụ onye Namibia na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye na-ese anụmanụ bụ Hans Aschenborn
Mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, ya na ezinụlọ ya si Namibia (n'oge ahụ South West Africa) kwaga Stellenbosch na South Africa
Obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Kiel, Germany
Dieter Aschenborn mechara laghachi South Africa ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Aschenborn ghọrọ onye mbụ na-elekọta ogige ntụrụndụ Etosha National Park ruo n'afọ 1952
N'ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ, o mepụtara ihe osise akpụkpọ anụ ya nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na ndịda Afrịka
Ọ kwagara Windhoek ma nwee ike site ugbu a gaa n'ihu na-ebi ndụ kpamkpam site na nka ya
A maara Aschenborn karịsịa dị ka onye na-ese anụmanụ nke anụ ọhịa Afrịka
O mekwara onwe ya aha site na eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọkachasị ihe ndị e ji osisi rụọ, nke ya na mgbidi ya na-achọ ọtụtụ ụlọ ọha na eze na Namibia mma
O mekwara stampụ nke Namibia
Ọ na-ese ihe na akpụkpọ anụ na akpụkpọ ụkwụ
Nwa Dieter bụ Uli Aschenborn bụkwa onye na-ese ihe
Dieye Ma ọ bụ Dièye bụ aha nna nke nwere ike ịpụta
Diezani K
Alison-Madueke (onye a mụrụ n'abali isii n'ọnwa iri abụọ n'afọ 1960) bụ otu onye ndọrọ ọchichi nke mba Nigerian bụkwara nwanyi mbụ bụ onye isi (President of OPEC)
Aghọpụtara ya na Nzukọ 166th nke ndi OPEC Vienna n'abali 27 n'ọnwa iri n'otu n'afọ 2014 Ọ bụrụ onye isi n'ahụ maka Ụgbọ Njem na 26 July 2007
Ezigara ya na 'Mines and Steel Development' na 2008, aghọpụtara ya dika onye isi 'Minister of Petroleum Resources' na April 2010
A mụrụ Diezani K
Agama na Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria
Nna ya bụ Chief Frederick Abiye Agama
O gụrụ Architecture na England nakwa Howard University nke di na United States Ọ gụchara bachelor's degree na Howard n'abali asatọ n'ọnwa iri n'abụọ n'afọ 1992
Ọ lọtara Nigeria bido ọrụ na Shell Petroleum Development Corporation n'otu afọ a
N'afọ 2002, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cambridge Judge Business School ebe O nwetara MBA degree Na nlọta ya na Naijiria,A ghọpụtara Diezani Alison-Madueke ka ọ bụrụ Ọnye Isi ndi Shell n'afọ 2006
Ọ bụ Nwanyi mbụ bụ onye isi Shell as an Executive Director na Naijiria

Kemgbe afọ 1999 ọlụrụ Admiral Allison Madueke (onye nke lagoro ezumikenka), onye bụbula 'Chief of Naval Staff' nakwa Governor ndi Imo na Anambra State Onwere ụmụ Nwoke abụọ Chimezie Madueke n' Ugonna Madueke Na ọnwa Itoolu n'afọ 2011 ndi Nigerian Defence Academy, nyere Alison-Madueke 'honorary Doctorate degree' na Management Sciences na Kaduna
N'ọnwa Itoolu n'afọ 2008, ndi Ntụ biara itụrụ Alison-Madueke na nwa ya Nwoke Chimezie Madueke n'ụlọ ya n' Abuja
Diezani Alison-Madueke ejideela ọkwa atọ pụtara ihie na gọvamenti nke elu n'obodo Nigerian

Aghọpụtara ya dika onye isi Ụgbọ Njem n'ọnwa asaa n'afọ 2007 N'ọnwa iri na abụọ n'afọ 2008, aghọpụtara ya dika 'Minister of Mines and Steel Development' Mgbe onye na-esota onye Isi ala bụ Goodluck Jonathan mrchara bụrụ onye isia ala n'ọnwa abụọ n'afọ 2010, ọ gbanwere ọkwa ọchichi gọvamenti n'abali iri n'asaa n'ọnwa atọ n'afọ 2010, ma kpọbata ndi ọhụrụ n'abali isii n'ọnwa anọ n'afọ 2010 ghọpụta Alison-Madueke dika Minister for Petroleum Resources
Dika onye na-ahu maka Mmanụ na-agba n'ala, Alison-Madueke kpebiri na ya ga-agbanwe 'Nigeria's oil and gas industry' ka ọ baara ndi ala Naijiria uru

N'Ọnwa anọ n'afọ 2010, onye Isi ala Goodluck Jonathan bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ Iwu ndi Naijiria, bụ nke kpebiri ikwalite Nkwekọrita Ọrụ n'etiti Ndi aụmahia Naijiria - mmeghachi omume nke ndị ọrụ ala ọzọ
Otu n'ime usoro kachasị arụmụka ndị e mere n'okpuru Alison-Madueke bụ atụmatụ gọọmentị iji wepụ ihe enyemaka nke obodo na ọnụahịa mmanụ

Alison-Madueke kwadoro njedebe nke nkwado 'n'ihi na ọ na-enye nnukwu ego ego na ndị gọọmenti, na-akwado ndị bara ọgaranya, [ma] na-agba ume ka a ghara ịrụ ọrụ, nrụrụ aka na ntụgharị nke ụkọ ihe onwunwe ọha na eze site na itinye ego na ngwá ọrụ dị egwu'
Alison-Madueke bụ nwanyị mbụ na-ejide ọnọdụ nke Minista Petroleum Resources na Nigeria, na October 2010, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-eduga mba mba na ogbako OPEC kwa afọ
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka ndị ọrụ ụgbọ njem, na nwanyị mbụ a ga-ahọpụta na ụlọ Shell Petroleum Development Company Nigeria
Na 27 November 2014, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke OPEC
N'ọrụ ya n'etiti n'ìgwè ndị nwoke, Alison-Madueke kwuru na ọ dọrọ ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ aka ná ntị na Shell ka ha 'gbanwee ụdị echiche ha'
Otu PBS NewsHour nke kwuru na ndị isi American na British na-ekwu na onye bụbu Minista Diezani Alison-Madueke nwere ike ịhazi ihe dịka ijeri $ 6 (N12 trillion) site na akụ na ụba Nigeria
E boro ya ebubo na ọ ga-akpata $ 20 ijeri na-efu site na ụlọọrụ Petroleum
Onye isi ochichi Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Sanusi, kwughachiri okwu a n'oge onu ogugu nke PBS na 2 December 2015

Sanusi kwenyere na a chụru ya n´ọrụ ya na Central Bank of Nigeria n'ihi na o mere ka ọha mara n' Ijeri Dollars Abụọ '$2 billion dollaras' furu na Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) n'okpuru
Alison Madueke kwuru na Sanusi boro ya ebubo a Ị ji megwara ya maka n´ ọ nyereghị ya aka nweta ọkwa dika onye isi ndi African Development Bank (AfDB) ma kpochapụ ebubo ya
E boro ya ebubo na ọ na-akwụ ụgwọ ọtụtụ nde Naira maka ọrụ mana ọ naghị akwụghachi ụgwọ ma na-etinye ego na-ezighị ezi

nakwa na ịlafu ọtụtụ ijeri naira na-ekwesịghị ekwesị na ọdụ ụgbọeluE boro ya ebubo na ọ na-akwụ ụgwọ ọtụtụ nde Naira maka ọrụ mana ọ naghị akwụghachi ụgwọ ma na-etinye ego na-ezighị ezi nakwa na ịlafu ọtụtụ ijeri naira na-ekwesịghị ekwesị na ọdụ ụgbọelu

N'October 2009, Senate nke Naijiria kpọpụrụ Diezani Alison-Madueke ma kwadoro ikpe maka ịnyefe otu ijeri naira n'ọkara 12 n'ime akaụntụ nzuzo nke otu ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị ọnụ na-enweghị usoro kwesịrị ekwesị na imebi nkwekọrịta
Ndi Economic and Financial Crimes Commission nke Naijiria kpọpụrụ ya Ụlọ Ikpe maka Ịkwụsị Ego'/Money Laundering'
Na 2 October 2015, Reuters kọrọ na United Kingdom National Crime Agency (NCA) nọ na London jidere Alison-Madueke, tinyere mmadụ anọ ọzọ na-enyo enyo maka mmebi iwu na mmebi iwu
Otú ọ dị, onye na-ekwuchitere ọnụ ndị uweojii ekweghị na ọ maara ihe merenụ
Ndị ezinụlọ ya na gọvamenti Naijiria kwadoro na e jidere ya na London, ọ bụ ezie na NCA jụrụ ikwu okwu banyere ikpe ahụ

Nakwa na Nigeria, n'ụlọ ya na Asokoro, Abuja ndị na-akpata nrụrụ aka na Ngalaba na-ahụ maka Nchịkwa Ụba na Ego nke Ndị Naijiria nke a na-akpọ Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, gbara aka na ebe obibi ya awa ole na ole mgbe e jidere ya na London
Na 28 August 2017, otu ụlọikpe gọọmenti etiti Naijiria ijeri naira asaa na ụfọ nke pụtara nde dollar iri abụọ n'otu ($ 21 million) site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ akụ na Alison-Madueke
Na Mee 11, 2021, nde $ 153 (nde euro 140) sitere n'aka Diezani Alison-Madueke
Na 80 nke ụlọ ya
Oge ọ ka-anọ n'ọchichi, Alison-Madueke mere ka aghọta na ọ na-anara Ọgwụ maka ọrịa kansa na United Kingdom
Digi + Phonics bụ otu ndị na-emepụta hip hop nke Africa America, nke ndị na-emepụta ihe ndekọ dị na California bụ Tae Beast, Sounwave, Dave Free na Willie B
Ha na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka ndị isi na-emepụta ihe n'ime ụlọ banyere akara ndekọ Carson, Top Dawg Entertainment

Digi + Phonics na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na ọrụ sitere n'aka ndị niile so na hip hop supergroup Black Hippy, ndị bịanyere aka na Top Dawg ma mejupụtara ndị egwu Kendrick Lamar, Jay Rock, Schoolboy Q, na Ab-Soul
Ihe ndị ha kacha mara amara tinyekwara 'Bitch Don't Kill My Vibe' nke Kendrick Lamar, 'There He Go' nke Schoolboy Q, na 'Terrorist Threats' nke Ab-Soul
Ha na-emekọ egwu ọnụ ma na-etinye aka na ọrụ ndị Top Dawg Entertainment wepụtara
Mmadụ anọ niile so n'otu ahụ, Tae Beast, Willie B, Sounwave na Dave Free, tolitere na gburugburu Los Angeles, California
Ha niile bidoro dị ka ndị na-emepụta naanị ha tupu ha na ndị otu Black Hippy Kendrick Lamar, Jay Rock, ScHoolboy Q na Ab-Soul rụọ ọrụ
Top Dawg Entertainment bidoro ịbịanye aka na ndị na-emepụta ihe anọ ahụ iji bụrụ ndị na-emepụta ihe n'ime ụlọ banyere akara ndekọ ahụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya ógè ha bịanyere aka, Sounwave na Dave Free nọ na studio, mgbe Dave Free kwuru, 'Anyị kwesịrị ijikọ ndị na-emepụta anyị niile ọnụ ma mee otu Voltron nke mmepụta
' O chere na ha niile nwere nnukwu àgwà dị iche iche banyere mmepụta ha nke ga-adabara nke ọma
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012, Complex kpọrọ otu ahụ otu n'ime 'Top 25 New Producers to Watch Out For'
Na Julaị 2013, BET kpọrọ Digi + Phonics dị ka otu, dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto iri kachasị elu na-eto eto na-arị elu
Ndị otu a rụkwara ọrụ na ScHoolboy Q's major label debut album Oxymoron
TaeBeast bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Los Angeles, California
Ndị dị ka J Dilla, RZA na Kanye West na-emetụta ya
Mark Anthony Spears, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Sounwave, bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ America si Compton, California
Sounwave kwuru na 'Up Jumps da Boogie' nke Timbaland bụ egwu hip hop izizi ọ gere ntị
Site na ógè ọ dị afọ iri, ọ bidoro iji igwe egwu Korg mee ka egwu dị mfe
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na igwe egwu anọ wee gaa na MTV Music Generator maka PlayStation
Ógè o jiri nke ahụ mee ihe ruo oge ụfọdụ, ya na onye na-eti egwu Bishop Lamont si Carson, California, na egwu ọ mepụtara n'ihi ya na MTV Music Generator natara ntinye redio mpaghara
N'afọ 2005, onye nchoputa Top Dawg Entertainment bụ Terrence 'Punch' Henderson chọpụtara Sounwave na mbụ, onye mere ka ya na onye isi TDE, Anthony 'Top Dawg' Tiffith zute
Anthony 'Top Dawg' Tiffith enweghị mmasị na mbụ na Sounwave, Otú ọ dị, ọ nọgidesiri ike ma na-eme ka ọrụ ya dị mma nke mechara 'na-afụpụ' Tiffith
Digimon (デジモン Dejimon?), bu áhá nke nta maka Mmuo Orunotù (Digital Monster' デジタルモンスター dejitaru monsutā?), bu nlélé orü nwere anime, manga, egwugwu, egwuregwu nlélé, na áká egwuregwu na nka ndi ozor
Mmuo nor na ihe nka bu anumanu nke ichichẹ ná bi na 'Uwa Orunotu', uwá bu ejimá shi orunotu níle nor nàlà
DigitalMania bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụtakes egwuregwu vidio nke mbụ na Obodo Tunisia
N'ịbụ nke Walid Sultan Midani, onye isi oche n'ezie, guzobere na afo 2012, DigitalMania bụ ọkachamara na mmepe nke egwuregwu multiplatfom (Facebook, iOS, Android,Ọpụpụ ọzọ
Ihe nchọpụta ihe dijitalụ (DOI) bụ njirimara na-adịgide adịgide ma ọ bụ njikwa ejiri akọwapụta ihe dị iche iche, nke International Organisation for Standardization (ISO) kwadoro
DOI bụ mmejuputa usoro njikwa; ha dabara na sistemụ URI (Uniform Resource Identifier)
A na-eji ha eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe iji chọpụta ozi agụmakwụkwọ, ọkachamara na gọọmentị, dị ka isiokwu akwụkwọ akụkọ, akụkọ nyocha, usoro data, na mbipụta gọọmentị
Ejikwala DOI iji chọpụta ụdị akụrụngwa ozi ndị ọzọ, dị ka vidiyo azụmahịa
Dignified Mobile Toilets (DMT) bụ usoro ụlọ mposi ọha na eze na-agagharị agagharị nke Isaac Durojaiye mepụtara n'afọ 1992

A maara ya site n'okwu 'azụmahịa na-eme ihe ọchị bụ azụmahịa siri ike!'; ọ bụ nke mbụ na Naịjirịa, nke e bu ụzọ chepụta dị ka ihe ngwọta iji nye mmadụ nkasi obi n'oge oriri, ihe omume na nnọkọ ndị ọzọ
A na-arụpụta ụlọ mposi ndị na-agagharị agagharị na Naịjirịa, ma na-akwụ ụgwọ ma ọ bụ na-ere na Naịjirịa na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka
Mgbe e bidoro ya, DMT bu n'uche ibelata ụkọ ụlọ mposi ọha na eze na imeziwanye ịdị ọcha karịsịa n'etiti ndị bi n'obodo Lagos
DMT na-eme atụmatụ iji ihe mkpofu mmadụ mee ihe na gas
Digo (Chidigo) bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Digo nke Kenya na Tanzania na-asụ n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke East Africa n'etiti Mombasa na Tanga
E mere atụmatụ na ndị agbụrụ Digo dị ihe dị ka 360,000 (Mwalonya et al
2004), ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere ike ịbụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ ahụ
Ndị okenye niile na-asụ Digo na-asụsụ abụọ na Swahili, asụsụ East Africa
Asụsụ abụọ ahụ nwere njikọ chiri anya, Digo nwekwara ọtụtụ okwu e si n'asụsụ Swahili dị nso gbaziri
Nkewa na nkewa nke Digo na-enye ezigbo ọmụmaatụ maka ihe isi ike nke ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-eche ihu mgbe ụfọdụ n'iche asụsụ na olumba dị iche iche
Ọtụtụ ndị ọchịchị nke oge a na-eso Nọọsụ na Hinnebusch (1993) n'ịkewa Digo dị ka olumba nke Mijikenda, otu n'ime asụsụ ndị mejupụtara otu Sabaki nke Northeast Coast Bantu
Olumba asụsụ Mijikenda na-aghọta nke ọma n'agbanyeghị na a na-ewerekarị ha dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche
Digo bụ onye otu mpaghara ndịda Mijikenda, yana ndị agbata obi ya Duruma na Rabai nwere mmekọrịta chiri anya
Otú ọ dị, ndị na-ekwu okwu na-eche na ọ dị nnọọ iche na olumba Mijikenda ndị ọzọ iji kwesị ịdepụta ederede na akwụkwọ nke ya
Ndị na-asụ Digo na-amata ọtụtụ ụdị aha ma ọ bụ olumba nke asụsụ ha
Ndị a bụ

Dii (/ˈdaɪaɪ/; Ancient Greek Δίοι, ) o bụ agbụrụ Thracian nwere onwe ya, ndị na-eji mma agha, ndị bi n'etiti ala ugwu nke Ugwu Rhodope na Thrace, na karịsịa n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nestos, site na isi iyi ruo na ndagwurugwu Nestos
Ha na-esokarị n'òtù ndị agha a haziri ahazi dị ka ndị mercenaries ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo
Thucydides kwupụtara na ha bụ ndị agha kachasị n'agha n'ime ndị agha Sitalkes
Ọ bụ zi ezie na a na-akọwakarị ha dị ka ndị na-eji mma agha, ha meriri ndị agha ịnyịnya nke Theban site na iji usoro peltast, n'ihi ya, ha nwere nkà n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke agha

Dikeledi Rosemary Direko (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1985) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa si Free State onye jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe afọ 2019
Direko bụ onye otu African National Congress
A mụrụ Direko na 28 Eprel, na afọ 1985
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Phehello Senior Secondary School
O nwetara Project Management Programme (NQF Level 4) na Health Advance Institute ma nwee diplọma na njikwa mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Direko nọ ugbu a [mgbe?] na-amụ maka diplọma na iwu na nchịkwa gọọmentị ime obodo na Mahadum Fort Hare

Direko bụ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka ngalaba Sipho Mutsi nke African National Congress Youth League site na afo 2005 ruo na afọ 2008 ma jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ alaka maka otu afọ site na afo 2008 ruo na afọ 2009
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara Lejweleputswa nke otu ndị ntorobịa nke ANC site na afo 2009 ruo na afọ 2011
Site na afo 2014 ruo afọ 2015, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke ANC Youth League
Na African National Congress, ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka alaka nke ANC Sipho Mutsi site na afo 2008 ruo na afy 2011
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onyeisi oche alaka ma jee ozi ruo n'afọ 2014
A họpụtara Direko ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ANC Lejweleputswa Regional Executive Committee na National Executive Committee nke ANC Youth League n'afọ 2015
Direko guzoro dị ka onye omeiwu ANC site na Free State na ntuli aka 2019 ma mesịa bụrụ onye a họpụtara na National Assembly ma ṅụọ iyi na 22 Mee 2019
Direko bụ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance na Traditional Affairs
Dikeledi Rebecca Tsotetsi (amụrụ n'abali atọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị sị mba South Afrika si Gauteng
Ọ nọchitere anya otu African National Congress (ANC) na National Assembly site n'afọ 2009 ruo 2019 ma bụrụ onye isi obodo Emfuleni Local Municipality site na 2006 ruo 2008
Onye na-arụsi ọrụ pụtara ihe n'oge gara aga n'òtù na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, Tsotetsi malitere ọrụ iwu ya dị ka onye otu Gauteng Provincial Legislature site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2006
Ọ hapụrụ oche ya na ọnwa Machị afọ 2006 mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi obodo Emfuleni, mana, n'ụzọ na-ese okwu, pati nke ya manyere ya ịhapụ ọrụ ahụ na Mee 2008
O mechara rụọ ọrụ nwa oge na National Council of Provinces ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na National Assembly n'afọ 2009
O nwetaghị nhọpụta ọzọ n'oche ya na mgbakọ ahụ na ntuli aka 2019
A mụrụ Tsotetsi n'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1956
N'afọ ndị 1980, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ọkachasị dị ka odeakwụkwọ maka Kọmitii Nkwado Ndị Nne na Nna
O mechara bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Federation of Transvaal Women na, site n'afọ 1995, dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke alaka mpaghara nke otu Ụmụ Nwanyị nke otu ANC
Ọ bụ onye otu South African Communist Party kemgbe afọ 1995

O nwere nzere bachelọ na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nzere okpu abụọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na nzere masta na sayensụ mmepe, ha niile mechara mgbe njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị n'afọ 1994
Na ntuliaka nke afọ 1999, a họpụtara Tsotetsi bụ nke mbụ ya na ndị omeiwu nke Gauteng Provincial, na-anọchite anya otú ANC
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'oche ya na ntuli aka nke afọ 2004 ma ọ rụọkwa ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi mpaghara site n'afọ 2005 ruo 2006, mgbe ọ hapụrụ ndị omeiwu

Tsotetsi gbara arụkwaghịm na omeiwu nke mpaghara na ọnwa Machị nke afọ 2006 iji guzoro na ntuli aka ime obodo nke ọnwa ahụ dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi obodo nke ANC na Emfuleni Local Municipality na Gauteng's Vaal Triangle

A ṅụrụ ya iyi n'ọfịs mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ya na ndị isi otu na mpaghara ahụ nwere esemokwu n'etiti afọ 2007, mgbe Tsotetsi chụpụrụ ndị otu atọ nke kọmitii onye isi obodo ya, òtù ANC batara ma manye ya iweghachi ha
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ụlọ nta akụkọ Mail na Guardian kwupụtara na ọ kpọrọ ndị uwe ojii mgbe onye isi oche mpaghara ANC Simon Mofokeng na onye ọzọ bakwuru ya n'ụlọ ya iji, na akụkọ ya, menye ya egwu
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, ANC nyere Tsotetsi iwu ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm dị ka onye isi obodo ma ọ bụ chere mkpebi nke enweghị ntụkwasị obi site n'aka pati nke ya, n'ihi na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ nke ọma

Dị ka Sowetan si kwuo, ntụziaka ahụ kpatara 'mmekọrịta' n'etiti alaka otu ANC dị n'ógbè ahụ na ndị isi pati dị elu, ọtụtụ alaka dị n'ebe ahụ na-azọrọ na a lekwasịrị Tsotetsi (na onye njikwa obodo ya, onye a kwụsịtụrụ) anya n'ihi na ọ na-eme nchọpụta banyere nrụrụ aka site n'aka ndị ọrụ otu ANC
Ọ dịkarịa ala ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke alaka iri anọ na atọ nke otu ANC dị n'ógbè ahụ mere mkpebi ndị na-ekwenyeghị na mkpebi iwepụ Tsotetsi, ọgụ aka malitere na nzukọ ụfọdụ
Ndị mmegide Pan Africanist Congress katọkwara mkpebi ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ndị na ama Democratic Alliance aka nabatara ya
Ndị isi mpaghara nke otu ANC kwuru na a ga-ebufe Tsotetsi n'ọkwa ọzọ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ Kwupụtara otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị na ọ ka na-echere ntụziaka ndị ọzọ site na pati ahụ
N'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2008, e nyefere Tsotetsi nyefee ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ onye ANC na Gauteng caucus nke National Council of Provinces, ụlọ elu nke South African Parliament
O mejupụtara oghere na-enweghị isi nke sitere na arụkwaghịm nke Sicelo Shiceka, onye a họpụtara na kansụl
Na ntuli aka ọzọ na afọ 2009, a họpụtara Tsotetsi ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ANC na National Assembly, ụlọ omebe iwu dị ala, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi na mpaghara Gauteng

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ n'oche ahụ, na-enweta nhọpụta ọzọ na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, ma n'oge nke abụọ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya otu na Kọmitii Portfolio na Telecommunications na Postal Services
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2019, e wepụrụ ya na ndepụta nke otu ANC ma, n'ọnọdụ iri anọ na ndepụta mpaghara nke Gauteng, ọ nwetaghị nhọpụta ọzọ
Tsotetsi nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ ma bụrụkwa nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Saul Tsotetsi
Onye a ma ama na ANC, di ya bụbu onye mkpọrọ nke Robben Island, onye ọrụ ubi maka Kansụl Chọọchị South Africa, na onye otu ndị isi otu ANC na Evaton na Vaal Triangle
Ya na ndị enyi ya abụọ nwụrụ na Sebokeng na ọnwa Machị nke afọ 1992 dị ka ndị uwe ojii si kwuo, e gburu ya mgbe grenade aka o ji gbawara
Ọnọdụ ọnwụ ya edoghị anya na ụfọdụ ndị na-akwado otu ANC lere ya anya dị ka ogbugbu nwere ike ịbụ site n'aka ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ maka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Dilip K
Biswas bụ onye India na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Central Pollution Control Board na Delhi Pollution Control Committee

Ọ bụ onye otu panel nke na-eme nnyocha gburugburu ebe obibi na Silent Valley ma nyochaa ike nke ọrụ hydro-electric na mpaghara ahụ, n'ikpeazụ na-atụ aro megide ọrụ ahụ, na-eduga na nkwupụta nke Silent Valley dị ka ogige ntụrụndụ

Ọ bụ onye edemede nke mmejuputa usoro mmepe dị ọcha na Eshia na Pacific Okwu, nsogbu, na ohere, akụkọ nke United Nations bipụtara dị ka ntụziaka maka mmejuputa Clean Development Mechanism (CDM), nke Kyoto Protocol nyere iwu
A na-akọkwa onyinye ya n'azụ idepụta iwu nchịkwa gburugburu ebe obibi na Lucknow, isi obodo nke steeti India nke Uttar Pradesh
Gọọmenti India nyere ya nsọpụrụ nkịtị nke anọ kachasị elu nke Padma Shri, na 2007, maka ntinye aka ya na sayensị na teknụzụ

Dil Humphrey-Umezulike, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Dilomprizulike (amụrụ n'afọ 1960 na Enugu, Nigeria) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge a na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ, arụmọrụ na eserese nke nakweere moniker 'The Junkman From Africa'
Ọ gụrụ nka na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka, Nigeria, ma nwee MFA na Mahadum nke Dundee, Scotland
N'ime ọrụ ya, ọ na-emegharị ma na-agbanwe ikpo uwe ochie na ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ahụ n'okporo ámá obodo, na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe ngosi nke na-egosipụta ọnọdụ na-enweghị ikike nke ọtụtụ ndị Africa
O kere 'Junkyard Museum of Awkward Things', ebe a na-akpụ ihe okpukpu nke e wuru site na ihe ndị a chọtara, na Lagos ma mekwaa oyiri ya maka Oriel Mostyn Gallery na Llandudno, Wales
Dilomprizulike na-akọwa ntinye Wear and Tea ya n'okwu ndị a
Ejiji na Iwe mmiri dị ka echiche na-anwa ikpughe ihe ndị a na-elegharakarị anya na ndị a na-eleda anya nke ndụ obodo Afrịka na obodo nke na-emetụta ya n'ụzọ dị ukwuu
Ọnọdụ dịpụrụ adịpụ nke onye Afrịka n'obodo ya na-aghọ ọdachi
E nwere ọgụ n'ime ya, nghọta nke ibi ndụ na nsogbu nke mmepeanya a manyere amanye
Ọ pụghịzi ịlaghachi azụ iji bulite iberibe ọdịbendị nna ya mebiri emebi; ọ nweghikwa ihe zuru oke iji soro ụwa ndị ọcha
N'afọ 2005, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Africa Remix na Hayward Gallery nke London
Ọ bụkwa onye bi na Gasworks Gallery mgbe ọ na-akwadebe ihe maka Victoria na Albert Museum
N'afọ 2010, o mepụtara Busy Street maka Herzliya Museum of Contemporary Art na Israel
Akụkụ ahụ, nke e ji ihe mkpofu obodo mee, bụ ntụgharị uche na ọha mmadụ na-azụ ahịa nke Israel
Asụsụ ndị Dima, bụ ndị bi n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Osimiri Omo n'ebe ugwu ọdọ mmiri Turkana, dị ka Vittorio Bottego kọwara na njem ọ gara Etiopia na 1897
A na-eji naanị ọnụọgụ ole na ole mara ya, bụ ndị na-adịghị ka asụsụ ọzọ
A na-edekọ ọnụọgụ Dima 1 Xia 10
Dime ma ọ bụ Dima bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na mpaghara ugwu nke Selamago district na mpaghara ndịda mba, mba na ndị mmadụ nke Etiopia, na gburugburu Ugwu Smith
Dime kewara n'ime opekata mpe olumba abụọ, nke gụnyere Us'a na Gerfa
O nwere suffixes ikpe isii na mgbakwunye na nhọpụta na-enweghị akara
Ọ bụ suffix karịrị akarị, mana ọ na-eji prefixes maka ngosipụta na mmụgharị
N'usoro ụda olu, ọ bụ ihe kwesịrị ịrịba ama n'etiti asụsụ Omotic maka inwe fọnịm velar na uvular fricative
Usoro okwu bụ isi bụ SOV (isiokwu–ihe – ngwaa), dịka n’asụsụ Omotic ndị ọzọ, n’ezie dịka n’asụsụ niile nke isi mpaghara Asụsụ Etiopia
Asụsụ ahụ, yana ndị Dime n'onwe ha, a kọrọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ha belatara na narị afọ nke 20 n'ihi predation sitere n'aka ndị agbata obi ha bụ Bodi, ha abụọ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ịla n'iyi

Dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Etiopia si kwuo, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ nke afọ 1994 kọrọ na mmadụ 6293 na-asụ asụsụ Dime na Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples' Region naanị; na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị afọ 2007, naanị ndị 574 na-asụrụ ya na Etiopia niile
Ọzọkwa, n'ihi na asụsụ Dime ka enweghị usoro ederede ma ọ nweghị ụlọ akwụkwọ mpaghara iji kwalite ojiji nke asụsụ ahụ, ọ na-eyi egwu karịa
Dimi Mint Abba (Arabic; iri abụọ na ise nọwa Disemba 1958 - nọ nwa June 2011) bụ otu n'ime ndị egwu a ma ama na Mauritania
A mụrụ ya Loula Bint Siddaty Ould Abba na Tidikdja Mauritania na 1958, n'ime ezinụlọ dị ala ('iggawin') bụ ọkachamara na omenala griot
Nne na nna Dimi bụ ndị na-agụ egwú (a gwara nna ya ka ọ dee abụ mba Mauritania), ọ malitekwara ịkpọ egwu mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọrụ ọkachamara ya malitere na 1976, mgbe ọ bụrụ abụ na redio wee sọọ mpi, n'afọ sochirinụ, na asọmpi Umm Kulthum na Tunis

Egwú mmeri ya 'Sawt Elfan' ('Art's Plume') nwere okwu 'Art's Feather is a balsam, a weapon and a guide enlightening the spirit of men', nke a nwere ike ịkọwa ka ọ pụtara na ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa karịa ndị agha na ọha mmadụ
Ntọala mbụ ya na mba ụwa bụ na akara ndekọ World Circuit, na-agbaso aro sitere n'aka Ali Farka Touré
Na abọm a, di ya Khalifa Ould Eide na ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ sonyeere ya
O mechara dee egwu Mauritania a ma ama na nke a ma ama dị ka 'Hailala' na 'Koumba bay bay'
Ọ nwụrụ na June 4, 2011, na Casablanca, Morocco mgbe ihe mberede mere na Aioun ụbọchị iri tupu mgbe ọ na-abụ abụ maka ọha na eze Sahrawi
Dimi n'oge ndụ ya gara mba Afrịka n'ọtụtụ ebe, Europe na (1989) na (2006) n'otu n'otu, United States (US) na (1993), Australia na (2009)
Diminas Dagogo bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Rivers State, Nigeria nke a maara nke ọma maka ejiji ya na ọrụ mmetụta pụrụ iche na ihe nkiri Nollywood
Ọ natara nhọpụta ihe nrite AMVCA abụọ maka ọrụ ya na Stigma (2013), nke gosipụtara Hilda Dokubo
Dagogo bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt ma biri ugbu a na Berlin / Germany
Dina Tala'at Sayed Muhammad (Arabic دينا طلعت Cid محمد, IPA ˈtāɑĺ́́tɑ ˈsæ dir mæˈħæmmæd]; amụrụ na April 12, 1964) bụ onye Ijipt na-agba egwú afọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A kpọrọ ya 'Onye na-agba egwú ikpeazụ nke Ijipt' site na magazin America Newsweek
O nwere nzere masta na nkà ihe ọmụma
A mụrụ Dina na Rom, Ịtali
Nna ya bụ onye nta akụkọ maka Middle East News Agency na Rome
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Dina dara mbà n'obi mgbe onye ọ na-achọ ịlụ gbụrụ onwe ya nke mere ka ọ nwaa igbu onwe ya
O nwetara nzere masta na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum Ain Shams na nkwenye nke nna ya
O nwere nwanne nwanyị, Rita, onye bụ onye na-agụ egwú na 1980s tupu ọ laa ezumike nká ma kpebie iyi niqab
Alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya biri na ịgba alụkwaghịm na 1998
Ọ lụrụ onye nduzi Sameh El Bagoury, nna nwa ya nwoke Ali
Mgbe El Bagoury nwụsịrị site na akpụ ụbụrụ na 2001, ọ lụrụ Hossam Abol Fotouh na nzuzo
A nụrụ na ọ ga-ala ezumike nká, mana ọ laghachiri n'ọrụ ya
Ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Ijipt bụ Wael Abo Hussein ugbu a
Dina malitere ọrụ ya na mbido afọ 1970 na Reda Dance Troupe
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-agba egwu n'onwe ya n'afọ ndị 1980 ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama
N'afọ ndị 1990 ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka egwu ya na họtel dị ka Cairo Sheraton ebe ọ wụrụ ndị Ijipt akpata oyi n'ahụ site n'ịgbanahụ ejiji ọdịnala maka uwe mkpụmkpụ na bikini
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-agba egwú afọ, Dina na-agba egwu maka ọrụ onwe onye yana mmemme ọha
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2007, a na-akwụ ya ụgwọ ihe dị ka £7,000 iji pụta na agbamakwụkwọ
Ọ gara mba dị iche iche iji kụzie ogbako na ime ihe nkiri, nke gụnyere Brazil na 2005 na Australia na 2010
N'afọ 2011, o wepụtara akụkọ ndụ ya, Huriati Fi Al Raqs (My Freedom in Dancing)
N'ihi mgbanwe ọchịchị nke Ijipt nke afọ 2011, ọ rere nke ọma na Ijipt, mana mbipụta asụsụ French Ma liberté de danser (2011) gara nke ọma
Dina Amer bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt-American, onye edemede, onye mmepụta na onye nta akụkọ
A mụrụ Amer ma zuokwa ya na United States
Ọrụ ndị amer bu ndi The New York Times, CNN, na VICE biputarala
N'afọ 2011, ọ natara onyinye Kahlil Gibran Spirit of Humanity Award site na Arab American Institute Foundation (AAIF) maka mkpesa omere banyere Arab Spring na Egypt

N'afọ 2016, ọkpesara banyere ịzụ ahịa mmadụ nke ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ nke agha obodo Siria na akụ na ụba dị n'okpuru ala nke ihe mgbochi iwu na-akwadoghị nke Egypt gaza maka mmemme Vice News Black Market Dispatches
Maka ihe nkiri ya Cain na Abel, nke ya na Omar Mullick dere, a kpọrọ ya na Sundance Screenwriters' Lab na Jenụwarị 2022
Dina Danish (amụrụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Amsterdam
A mụrụ Danish na Paris, o toro na Cairo ma nweta nzere BA na Mahadum America dị na Cairo na MFA na California College of the Arts
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na Rijksakademie van beeldende kunsten
Ọrụ nka nke Danish na-ejikọta echiche nke itinye aka na nka na asụsụ sitere na gburugburu ụwa na usoro nke ihe ọchị, nkọwa na-ezighi ezi, ntụgharị na-ekwesịghị ekwesị na nkwenkwe ụgha

Ọrụ ya, gbasara mgbasa ozi dị iche iche nke gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, foto na vidiyo, apụtala na ngosi na Stedelijk Museum Schiedam, De Appel Art Centre na Amsterdam, San Francisco Museum of Modern Art na Kunsthall Oslo
N'ọrụ ya, Danish na-eji asụsụ na nhazi, na-etinye ọchị na nghọtahie
Ọ na-enyocha isiokwu nke ọrụ ya, na-aga n'ihu na-enyochaa ojiji nke ịta Ihe site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a na ihe nkiri Egypt
Ọ natara ihe nrite Barclay Simpson Award na 2008, illy Present Future Prize na 2011 na Artissima 18, na Celeste Prize na 2012
Ọ pụtara na ndepụta dị mkpirikpi maka 2016 Abraaj Group Art Prize
A na-arụ ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke De Nederlandsche Bank, Nomas Foundation, San Francisco Museum of Modern Art na Museum of Modern Arts

Ihe ngosi onwe onye nke Danish gụnyere Sports Memorabilia, Signed and Everything, (2018); The Poet Who Wanted to be Buried Under a Pinball Machine, (2016), ma na Stigter van Doesburg, Amsterdam, The Netherlands; A Place in the Sun, Nile Sunset Annex, Cairo, Egypt (2016); Dictated But Not Read, Supplement Gallery, London (2015); Be A Pinball, SpazioA, Pistoia, Italy (2015); Double Bubble, Galerie Barbara Seiler, Zurich (2013); Time, Pter, Zurich, Back Play, Time, Matter, Pia (2011)

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi otu na Kunsthall Oslo, Contemporary Image Collective (CIC) na Cairo na mmekorita ya na Kunsthalle Bern, na Annet Gelink, Amsterdam, ọ rụkwara Kurt Schwittersā Ursonata na Cairo Pavilion nke Amsterdam Biennial

Tinyete nke a, Danish bụ onye na-ese ihe na Rijksakademie van Beeldende Kunsten na Amsterdam site na 2009 ruo 2010; Fondazione Spinola Banna Per LīArte, Turin, 2011; na PiST///, Istanbul, 2012; ma na-etinye ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya fọdụrụ na Amsterdam
N'afọ 2012, Dina Danish mepụtara ọrụ a na-akpọ Back In X Minutes, ebe o kwere nkwa ịmepụta ihe osise iri atọ na ise na-eṅomi Post-It notes
Ihe edeturu Post-It ọ bụla na-agụ Back in x minute(s), dabere na mbipụta (x=from 1-35)
Echiche ya n'azụ ọrụ a bụ igosipụta eziokwu nke igwe n'ụwa anyị, nke na-eme ka ọtụtụ otu ụdị Post-its
Dina kwuru na ọ chọrọ ime ọtụtụ Post-its yiri ibe ya n'ihi na ọ bụghị igwe, ya mere, a ga-enwe obere ọdịiche na ibe ọ bụla na usoro ahụ
N'afọ 2016, Dina Danish so Jean-Baptiste Maitre rụkọọ ọrụ na usoro a na-akpọ The Admirer na The Admired
Ọrụ ahụ na-abanye n'ụzọ ihe ndị e ji mee ihe na ihe ngosi ha

Admirer na The Admired na-amụ otú a na-ahapụkarị ihe ndị sitere na ọdịbendị mba ọzọ n'ihe ngosi nka dị mkpa na otu ihe ngosi nke ihe ngosi si bụrụ ihe mbụ ndị na-ege ntị na-ahụ mgbe ha na-ekiri ihe ngosi
Danish na Maitre mere nnyocha na mmepe sara mbara mgbe ha na-arụ ọrụ na usoro a
Ha malitere imekọ ihe ọnụ mgbe ha ghọtara mmasị dị n'otu ụzọ a na-egosi ma hazie ụdị n'ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị iche iche
E meela ihe ngosi ahụ na Tyson na Cologne na Institute of Art History na Mahadum Ludwig Maximilian na Munich
Dina Recanati (onye amụrụ Diane Hettena; 1928 - 5 June 2021) bụ onye Israel na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na onye na-eme eserese
A mụrụ Diane Hettena na Cairo, Egypt
N'afọ 1946, ọ lụrụ Raphael Recanati na Tel Aviv, Mandatory Palestine
Recanati mepụtara ihe owuwu, ihe osise silkscreen, ihe ndị e sere ese, na tapestries
Recanati nwụrụ na Herzliya Pituah mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na ato
Dindga McCannon, amụrụ na Julaị 31, 1947, bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe, onye na-ese eriri, ónyé na'ahụ màkà mgbidi, ónyé nkụzi na ónyé na-eme ihe osise
A mụrụ McCannon ma zụlite ya na Harlem ma bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe mgbè ọ dị afọ iri
Ọ na-akụziri onwe ya ma na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ doro anya
Ọ na-akpọ onwe ya onye na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi, ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí mgbasa ozi, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na 'ịgwakọta nka m dị mma 'ọzụzụ' na ọrụ ọdịnala ụmụ nwanyị nke nne m, Lottie K
Porter na nne nne ya Hattie Kilgo kụziiri m ịkwa akwa, beading, embroidery na quilting n'ime ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka ArtQuilts'
Dindga McCannon abụwo onye na-ese ihe ruo afọ 55
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ, na onye na-ese ihe osise, Dindga na-ewere onwe ya dị ka ihe na-emepụta ejiji na ónyé na'ahụ maka mgbidi na onye na na-ebi akwụkwọ
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ndụ ụmụ nwanyị, foto, na akụkọ ihe mere eme
N'ịzaghachi ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'ụwa nka, ndị na-ese ihe na 1960s na 1970s mepụtara otu dị ka ụzọ isi lụso mmegbu ọgụ
N'afọ 1960, McCannon bụ ónyé otu Weusi Artist Collective
Nke a bụ otu McCannon si nwee mmasị na Black Arts Movement
Weusi Collective nwèrè mmasị n'ịmepụta nka nke na-akpali isiokwu na akara ndị Afrịka, yana igosi mpako ojii nke oge a
N'afọ 1971, ọ kwadoro nzukọ mbụ nke Where We At nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-ese ihe n'ụlọ ya, nke tolitere n'otu n'ime ihe ngosi mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị isi ojii na-eme ihe nkírí na New York City

N'afọ 2015 ọ bụ ónyé ngosi na Art of Justice Articulating an Ethos and Aesthetic of the Movement conference na Mahadum New York nke Caribbean Cultural Center African Diaspora Institute gosipụtara na mmekorita ya na Ngalaba nke Art na Public Policy, Mahadum Nueva York; Institute of African American Affairs, Mahadim New York; na Institute for Research in African American Studies, Mahaduma Columbia
A na-etinye onyinyo ya na ihe ngosi 1972 Some Living American Women Artists nkè Mary Beth Edelson
McCannon nwèrè akwa (nke akpọrọ 'Yekk's Song') na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2020, e rere ihe osise mmanụ McCannon, 'The Last Farewell' maka $ 161,000 dị ka akụkụ nke usoro mmebi ego nke Johnson Publishing Company
Ọrụ a bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta onwe ha, nke gụnyekwara ọrụ Henry Ossawa Tanner na Carrie Mae Weems
Dindo Yogo, ezigbo aha ya bụ Théodore Dindo Mabeli, (December 30, 1955 na Lokutu - August 23, 2000) bụ onye Congo na-agụ egwu na onye egwu
A na-akpọkwa ya La Voix Cassée (The Broken Voice)
N'afọ 1978, Dindo Yogo sonyeere Papa Wemba's Viva La Musica

N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1981, ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya atọ ndị ọzọ - onye na-akpọ egwu Popolipo Zanguila, na ndị na-eti egwu ibe ya Djuna Djanana na 'Espérant' Kisangani Djenga -Dindo Yogo hapụrụ ndị otu Papa Wemba (nke bụ n'onwe ya ụdị nke sitere na Zaiko Langa Langa, ma ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ na-enweghị isi nke ndị otu a maara dị ka Clan Langa Langa)
Mmadụ anọ ahụ sitere na Viva La Musica sonyeere ndị egwu atọ kwụsịrị Zaiko Langa Langa -Evoloko Jocker, Djo Mali na Bozi Boziana - na-etolite Langa Langa Stars
Ha guzobere otu ahụ n'okpuru nkwado nke onye na-ahụ maka egwu Verckys Kiamuangana 305–306
A kọwara Langa Langa Stars n'afọ 1988 dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị kachasị arụpụta ihe n'ime Zaiko niile

' 204 Ha bụ ndị a ma ama na àgwà nke olu Dindo Yogo na-emeri' ka a chọpụtara, dịka ọmụmaatụ na egwu ha 'Fleur Bakutu', mana usoro ndị otu ahụ nwere ọtụtụ kpakpando guzosiri ike, nke a maara dị ka ndị isi sept patrons (ndị isi asaa), gosipụtara na ọ bụ ọdịda, mmetụta nke ọdịda ya ka njọ site n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na Verckys nọgidere na-enwe nkwekọrịta nwe ngwá ọrụ ndị otu ahụ maka afọ anọ mbụ ya 310-311
N'afọ 1984, Dindo Yogo mere njem ọzọ, na nke ugbu a na Zaiko Langa Langa, na-eso Popolipo onye mere otu mgbanwe ahụ n'ọnwa Machị 1983 310–311 N'oge ya na Zaiko, ọ dekwara ọtụtụ abọm naanị ya
N'afọ 1988, mgbe Zaiko kewara n'ime Zaiko Langa Langa Familia Dei, n'okpuru Bimi Ombale, na Zaiko Langa Langa Nkolo Mboka, n'okpuru N'Yoka Longo, Dindo Yogo họọrọ isonyere ndị otu ikpeazụ 346
N'afọ 1991, ọ hapụrụ otu egwu ahụ, wee gaa naanị ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2000
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2000, mgbe ọ dara na Kinshasa site na ogologo ọrịa Ọ lụrụ nwaanyị ugboro abụọ, ma mụọ ọtụtụ ụmụ

Graeme Ewens, na-ede akụkọ ọnwụ ya na The Guardian, tụlere Yogo dị ka 'otu [n'ime] ndị na-abụ abụ na-akpali ndị nọ n'afọ ndụ niile, ndị nọ n'ọkwá na agbụrụ ya na olu ya na-eme mkpesa, nke na-ama jijiji, nke a maara dị ka voix cassé
Dineo Ranaka (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 16 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1983) bụ onye redio South Africa, onye na-egosi telivishọn, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, DJ na onye na-emepụta TV

Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-azụ redio na 5fm wee sonye na Yfm dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe ngosi redio ma mesịa soro onye na-akwado ihe nkiri redio ehihie a ma ama n'ehihie a na-akpọ 'Essential Rush' ya na Chilli M ama ama tupu ọ malite ọrụ ngosi ahụ mgbe Chilli M gachara
Ihe ngosi ya 'Dineo Live on Drive', nwetara ọmarịcha ama ama ya na South Africa wee mee ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-eduga na Redio na mba ahụ
Ọ kwadoro Club 808 (ihe ngosi egwu na eTV) yana Moeti 'Mo Flava' Tiki ma ha abụọ ghọrọ ọkacha mmasị dịka ha mere prime rime redio na igwe onyonyo n'otu oge
Otu n'ime ihe ngosi ya bụ ịbụ onye na-eweta ihe ngosi na All Access wee mechaa webata ihe ngosi egwuregwu egwu na etv afọ mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Club808
Ọrụ telivishọn ndị ọzọ ama ama nke ọ rụrụ gụnyere ihe ngosi na Scandal, Gaz lam na Gomora

Mgbe ọ hapụrụ yfm, maka ihe ọ kọwara dị ka 'nkwụsị site na redio', ọ laghachiri obere oge ma mee ihe ngosi ngwụsị izu na Highveld Stereo ugbu a 947 mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ihi omenala nhazi nke o kwuru na ọ naghị eche na ọ dabara nke ọma
O mechara laghachi na Radio obere oge ọzọ mgbe ọ sonyeere Cliff Central mana ọ pụghị ịnọ ogologo oge ma hapụ ngwa ngwa ụlọ ọrụ redio ịntanetị
Ọ bụ onye na-elekọta The Bridge ugbu a, ihe ngosi n'etiti ụtụtụ na Metro fm n'akụkụ Somizi na Lerato Kganyago, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi chaatị Metro fm Top 40 a ma ama ruo afọ 2
Dineo Seshee Bopape bụ ome nka na-eme ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi South Africa
site n'iji ihe ngosi video nnwale , ụda, ihe ndị a chọtara, foto na nrụnye ọkpụkpụ, ihe osise ya 'na-etinye aka na echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ebe dị elu nke ebe nchekwa, akụkọ na ihe nnọchianya'
A mụrụ Bopape na Polokwane, South Africa n'afọ 1981
Ọ gụrụ gbasara eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ na Durban Institute of Technology, wee gụchaa De Atelier na Amsterdam na 2007
Na 2010 ọ gụchara MFA na Mahadum Columbia na New York
N'etiti ebe ndị ọzọ, ọrụ Bopape gosipụtara na New Museum, Institute of Contemporary Art, Philadelphia, na 12th Biennale de Lyon
Edokwala ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Mart House Gallery, Amsterdam; Kwazulu Natal Society of Arts, Durban; na Palais de Tokyo

Bopape bụ onye mmeri nke MTN New Contemporaries Award nke afọ 2008, onye natara 2010 Columbia University Toby Fund Awards, 2017 Sharjah Biennial Prize, na onye mmeri nke Future Generation Art Prize 2017
N'afọ 2018, o sonyekwara na 10th Berlin Biennale, nke Gabi Ngcobo na ndị otu nlekọta nke gụnyere Nomaduma Rosa Masilela, Serubiri Moses, Thiago de Paula Souza na Yvette Mutumba haziri
Ntinye ya, nke akpọrọ Untitled (Of Occult Instability)[Feelings], 2016–18 dị na ogo dị ala nke KW Institute for Contemporary Art

N'etiti ihe mkpofu, ma mee ya maka biennale, e ji ọkụ nwere ụgha oroma wee gosi ọrụ na-agụnye n'etiti vidiyo ya ihe nkiri banyere nwoke ọcha na-akwaso nwanyị ojii iko n'ike na ihe nkiri nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri ama ama bụ Nina Simone nwere nsogbu odida mba akon'uche n'ogbọ ihe omume Ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Tate
Ding (nkè á na-akpọkwa Di mà ọ bụ Dzing) bụ asụsụ Bantu nkè á na-asụ ná Democratic Republic of Congo
Maho (2009) na-ewere ndị á dị kà asụsụ dị ichè ichè nwere njikọ chiri ányá ná Ding
(Lee asụsụ Boma Dzing)
Naanị Ngul, nke gụnyere Ngwi, nkè á bụ asụsụ Ngwii nkè Mbere?] nwere koodu ISO
Dini nwere ike izo aka na ,
Diocese Anglican nke Okigwe South bụ otu n'ime iri na abụọ n'ime mpaghara Anglican Province nke Owerri, nke bụ otu n'ime mpaghara iri na anọ n'ime Chọọchị Naịjirịa
Ehiwere ya na Jenụwarị 8, 1994, site na Diocese nke Okigwe-Orlu dị ka Diocese 44 nke mba ahụ
Bishọp ahụ bụ Bennett Okoro
Diocese malitere na 10 Priest, 8 parishes, 48 church stations na 5 archdeaconries ugbu a enwere 9 Archdeaconries Caleb Maduoma ghọrọ ya Bishop nke abụọ na 2004
Bishọp nke ugbu a bụ David Onuoha, onye a họpụtara na July 2020 ka ọ bụrụ Achịbishọp of Owerri
Diocese na okike nwere otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ala ọzọ; ọ nwere ugbu a 6
Àtụ Provinces (with dioceses) in the Church of Nigeria
Diop (Wolof), Nke a na-asụgharịghị Dioup, bụ aha nna Wolof a ma ama na Senegal na Gambia (ebe a na-edekarị ya 'Job'), ma nwee ike izo aka na
Dipo Rites bụ otu n'ime emume ọdịnala kachasị ewu ewu ma a katọrọ ya na Ghana, ma otu n'etiti ihe omume ndị a na-aga na mba ahụ, na-enweta nnukwu nkwado site n'aka ndị njem nleta
Ndị Odumase krobo na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana na-eme emume ọdịnala
A na-eme emume a n'ọnwa Eprel kwa afọ
A na-eji emume a eme ka ụmụ agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke banye n'oge uto ma ọ bụ nwanyị, ọ na-egosikwa na nwa agbọghọ na-ekere òkè eruola afọ ịlụ di
Ndị nne na nna mgbe ha nụrụ ọkwa nke ememe ahụ zigara ụmụ agbọghọ ha ruru eru na onye isi ụkọchukwu
Otú ọ dị, ụmụ agbọghọ ndị a ga-agafe ememe na ule iji gosipụta ịdị ọcha ha tupu ha eruo isonye na ememme ahụ
N'ụbọchị mbụ nke emume a, ụmụ agbọghọ na-akpụ isi ha ma yikwa akwa n'úkwù ruo naanị ikpere ha
Nke a bụ nne na-eme ememe pụrụ iche na ọ na-egosi mgbanwe ha site na nwata ruo n'oge
A na-egosi ha na obodo niile dị ka ndị mbido (dipo-yo)
Dipo Doherty bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na 1991, Dipo nwere Bsc
na Mechanical engineering na Mahadum Virginia
Ọ gụsịrị Master's Degree na Integrated Design and Management na Massachusetts Institute of Technology Ọrụ ya na-adabere na geometry ohere
[nkọwa dị mkpa]
A họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ngosi na ART X Lagos 2017
Ọrụ ya so na ihe osise ndị e nyere na Arthouse's Affordable Art Auction maka ọrụ ebere na Lagos
A họpụtara ya maka ngalaba Visual Art na The Future Awards Africa 2019

Elizabeth Dipuo Peters (Amụrụ na 13 Mee 1960 na Kimberley, Northern Cape) bụ Minista nke Transport nke Republic of South Africa site n'ụbọchị 10 Julaị 2013 ruo ụbọchị 30 Machị 2017, na nchịkwa Zuma, na onye bụbu Minista nke Energy site n'afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2013 ebe ọ jere ozi dị ka onye nọchiri Manne Dipico dị ka onye isi ala nke abụọ nke Northern Cape Province, 22 Eprel 2004 ruo ụbọchị 10 Mee 2009
Onye otu African National Congress (ANC), ọ na-eje ozi na Women's League National Executive Committee
Dipuo Peters gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu maka African National Congress n'ọnwa Eprel 2017
Peters gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Tidimalo Junior Secondary na Tshireleco Senior Secondary na Kimberley
Afọ ole na ole mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ debanyere aha maka nzere Bachelor of Arts na Social Work na Mahadum nke North (1987)

O mechara gụọ akwụkwọ maka asambodo na mmepe na iwu ọha na eze na Mahadum nke Western Cape (1996); asambodo na Executive Management na Mahadim nke Cape Town Graduate School of Business (2002); na asambodo na International Policy Management, site na Havana, Cuba (2002)
Dipuo Peters sonyeere Young Christian Students, ebe ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere
O sonyere na Youth Formations na ụka na obodo
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Women's Forum na AZASO nke mechara bụrụ SASCO na Mahadum nke North
Na Kimberley ọ bụ onye otu Galeshewe Youth Congress, onye mmekọ nke United Democratic Front (UDF)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahazi mpaghara afọ ofufo maka South African Domestic Worker's Union, na-anakọta, na-ahazikwa, na-akụziri ma na-adụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọdụ na Northern Cape (1987)
Okwu Dirac matter na-ezo aka na klas nke usoro ihe ndị dị n'ime ya nke enwere ike ịkọwa nke ọma site na usoro Dirac
Ọ bụ ezie na e mepụtara usoro Dirac n'onwe ya maka fermions, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ dị n'ime ihe Dirac nwere ike ịbụ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ọ bụla
N'ihi ya, enwere ike ịmata ọdịiche dị n'ihe Dirac na fermionic, bosonic ma ọ bụ anyonic Dirac
Ihe atụ ndị a ma ama nke ihe Dirac bụ Graphene, topological insulators, Dirac semimetals, Weyl semimetals
A na-ekewapụta echiche dị irè nke usoro ndị dị otú ahụ site na nhọrọ a kapịrị ọnụ nke Dirac mass, ọsọ Dirac, matrices Dirac na curvature oge-oghere
Ọgwụgwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke klas nke ihe Dirac n'ihe gbasara echiche dị irè na-eduga na njirimara a na-ahụkarị n'ihe banyere njupụta nke steeti, ikike okpomọkụ na mgbasa nke adịghị ọcha
Ndị otu klaasị nke okwu Dirac dị iche iche na okike
Otú ọ dị, ihe atụ nile nke ihe Dirac jikọtara ọnụ site na myirịta dị n'ime usoro algebra nke echiche dị irè na-akọwa ha
Nkọwa n'ozuzu nke ihe Dirac bụ usoro ihe dị mkpirikpi ebe enwere ike ịkọwa ihe na-akpali akpali n'ime oghere oghere site na usoro Dirac zuru oke
Dirasha (nke a makwaara dị ka Ghidole, Diraasha, Dirayta, Gidole, Gardulla, Dhirasha) bụ onye otu Cushitic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic
A na-asụ ya na mpaghara Omo nke Etiopia, na ugwu ndị dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ọdọ Mmiri Chamo, gburugburu obodo Gidole
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu okwu na-ejikwa Oromo ma ọ bụ Konso
Dị ka Wondwosen si kwuo, 'Dirasha' bụ aha ndị mmadụ, a na-enyekwa aha asụsụ ahụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche dị ka 'Dirashitata, Dirayta na Diraytata' (2006 3,4)
Asụsụ ahụ nwere fọnịm consonant atọ na-apụ apụ na ụda ekwentị abụọ na-enweghị atụ, dabara n'ụdị Mpaghara Asụsụ Etiopia
O nwere ụda abụọ na ụdaume ise
Ogologo oge (ma ọ bụ gemination) pụrụ iche maka ma consonants na ụdaume (Wondwosen 2006 9,10)
Dire Tune Arissi (nke a na-akpọ 'Deer-ay Too-nay'; Ge'ez ዲሬ ቱኔ, amụrụ na 19 June 1985) bụ onye Etiopia ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
Tune sonyere na marathon na 2005 World Championships
Na 2006 World Road Running Championships ọ mechara nke anọ na asọmpi nke onye ọ bụla
Nke a dị mma iji nyere Etiopia aka inweta ọlaọcha na asọmpi otu
N'April 21, na afọ 2008, Tune meriri Boston Marathon na oge nke 2 25 25
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya mba ya na marathon na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, ọ bụkwa naanị onye Etiopia mechara, bụrụ onye nke iri na ise n'ime oge 2 31 16
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2009, Tune ji otu sekọnd gbaa nke abụọ na Boston Marathon na oge nke 2 32 17
Mgbe ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ, ọ dara ma kpọga ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Onye nnọchi anya ya kwuru na nsogbu ahụ bụ n'ihi mmiri ịpụ n'ahụ tinyere ihu igwe dị jụụ na eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ zụrụ maka asọmpi dị mkpirikpi
Dire Tune nwere ihe ndekọ ụwa nke otu awa nke 18517 kilomita setịpụrụ na June 12, 2008 na Ostrava
Ihe ndekọ gara aga (18,340 m) bụ nke Tegla Loroupe setịpụrụ afọ iri tupu mgbe ahụ
Tune meriri na afo 2009 Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon, na-etinye ihe ndekọ nke ọkara marathon nke Ethiopia nke 1 07 18
Bezunesh Bekele setịpụrụ ndekọ mba gara aga (1 08 07) na afọ 2007 na Udine

O meriri n'ọsọ Ottawa 10K nke afọ 2010 na 32 11 na ngwụcha Mee, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ meriri n'ihu onye mmeri ụmụ nwoke na agbụrụ nwoke na nwanyị ebe ngalaba ụmụ nwoke na-amalite nkeji anọ mgbe ụmụ nwanyị gasịrị
Ọ gbara ọsọ na Bogota Half Marathon n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ wee mechie dị ka onye nke abụọ, ihe dị ka sekọnd isii n'azụ onye mmeri Shewarge Amare
Frankfurt Marathon sochiri na Nọvemba ma ọ meziwanye ihe kachasị mma ya site na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu nkeji, na-agba ọsọ 2 23 44 maka ebe nke abụọ n'azụ Caroline Kilel
Ọ malitere afọ 2011 site na mmeri na Ethiopia 15K Championships, na-eti Atsede Habtamu na akara
Ọ gbara ọsọ na Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ, ọ bụ ezie na nkeji ole na ole n'azụ Mary Keitany
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ merie asọmpi World's Best 10K na Puerto Rico izu abụọ ka e mesịrị, mana Sentayehu Ejigu mere ya onye nke abụọ
Ọ nọ n'elu ikpo okwu na World 10K Bangalore, na-akụ Merima Mohammed na akara
Ọ gbara ọsọ marathon na afo 2011 World Championships in Athletics na Daegu, South Korea
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-agba ọsọ kilomita 13 mbụ n'ime ndị isi, a chụpụrụ ya mgbe ọ ṅụrụ ihe ọṅụṅụ site n'aka onye a na-amaghị ama n'etiti ìgwè mmadụ ahụ, nke megidere iwu IAAF
Aremu Olaiwola Qudus (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1993; onye a maara dịka Director K na DK ) bụ onye nduzi vidio egwu Naịjirịa
Ya na ndị na-agu egwu nke ọtụtụ ụdị egwu gụnyere Wizkid, Skepta, Davido, Burna Boy na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ a rụkọọla ọrụ, o meriri 2020 The Headies Award maka vidiyo egwu kacha mma nke afọ
A mụrụ Aremu Olaiwola Qudus na 13 Nọvemba 1993, na Lagos Steeti, Naịjirịa
A mụrụ ya na Kwara Steeti n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ọtụtụ nwanyị
Ọ họọrọ ịga akwụkwọ na Creative Arts na Yaba College of Technology na Lagos
Director K malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2015 mgbe ọ sere vidiyo egwu n'ihi ọchịchọ ịmata ihe na iPhone
N'afọ 2018, Director K duziri vidiyo egwu maka Case site n'aka onye egwu Naịjirịa, Teni ma soro ya site na iduzi vidiyo egwu maka egwu Skiibii bụ Sensima
N'afọ 2019, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mmepụta ihe nke PriorGold Pictures nke na-elekwasị anya na vidiyo egwu, ihe ngosi okike, na telivishọn
N'afọ 2020, Director K duziri Wonderful nke Burna Boy, na Suzannah nke Sauti Sol, nke mere ka ọ nweta nhọpụta abụọ nke Best Music Video na 2020 Afrimma Awards
Ọ gara n'ihu iduzi '1 Milli' nke Davido nke meriri Best Music video na 2020 The Headies Award
N'afọ 2021 Director K duziri egwu Grammy 'Essence' nke Wizkid gosipụtara Tems, abụ Afrịka mbụ e depụtara na Billboard Hot 100 na Global 200
Atụmatu dịgasị iche maka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwere nkwarụ na Naịjirịa
Nchịkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Naijiria nke afọ 2006 kwuru na mmadụ 3,253,169 nwere nkwarụ, ma ọ bụ 232% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 140,431,790 n'afọ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, Centre for Citizens with Disabilities, otu NGO nke Naijiria, na-akọwa na ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ ejighi oke nkwarụ zuru oke na Naijiria

Ọ rịọkwara ngalaba govamenti nke n' afụ maka ọnụ ọgụgụ na Naijiria akpọrọ National Population Commission ka ya na ngalaba ochichi govamenti nke n' afu maka ọnọdụ ụmụnwanyi akpọrọ Ministry of Women Affairs and Social Development rụkọọ ọrụ maka ọnụ ọgụgụ 2016 iji tụọ nkwarụ n'ụzọ ziri ezi
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, a kwụrụ na e nwere ihe karịrị nde ndị Naijiria 27 na-ebi n'ụdị nkwarụ ụfọdụ
Ụdị nkwarụ ise ana-ahụkarị na Naịjirịa bụ ndịa, n'usoro ngbadata, nkwarụ afụhi ụzọ, nkwarụ anụghi ihe, nkwarụnke ana ahụ anya, nkwaru enwehi ọgụgụ isi, na nkwarụ enwehi nyota maka nkwurịta okwu
Naịjirịa kwadoro nkwekọrịta United Nations maka ikike nke ndị nwere nkwarụ na 30 Machị 2007 na nkwekọrịta nhọrọ ya na 24 Septemba 2010
A na-ekpọ Ministri nke Ihe Ndị Na-eme n'Ụmụ nwanyị na Mmepe Ọha ebubo na ọ na-enyefe akụkọ banyere ọganihu, mana emebeghị ya ka ọ na-erule afọ 2013

Nnyocha nke 2008 nke Ngalaba United Kingdom maka Mmepe Mba uwa nile chọpụtara na ọha na eze, ngalaba govamenti nke n'a Ministry of Women Affairs and Social Development, na ndị nwere nkwarụ (DPOs) na Naijiria ghọtara nkwarụ n'ime okwu nke ọdịmma na ọrụ ebere
Nke a dị iche na nkwenye na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, itinye aka, na inye ike dịka ụdị mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze nke nkwarụ nke a na-akwado n'ozuzu ya n'ọhịa ọmụmụ nkwarụ

Ọ chọpụtakwara na ndị DPOs abụọ, Joint National Association of Persons with Disabilities (JONAWPD) na Association for the Comprehensive Empowerment of Nigerians with Disabilities, na-ekwekọrịtaghị mgbe ha abụọ na-eche na ha na-ekwu maka ndị Naijiria niile nwere nkwarụ, na-egbochi ikike ha ime ka gọọmentị nwee nkwarụ

Afọ itoolu mgbe Naịjirịa kwadoro Nkwekọrịta Mba Uwa nịle maka ịkike nke ndị nwere nkwarụ, onye isi ala General Muhammadu Buhari mere iwu Discrimination Against Persons with Disabilities (Mmachibido Iwu) Act 2018
Iwu ahụ kwadoro aro nke ikike diri ndi nkwarụ akpọro Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities ka ọ na-enye ndị nwere nkwarụ ntaramahụhụ maka ndị na-akpa ókè imegịde ndi bi na nkwarụ
Iwu machibidoro ịkpa ókè megide ndị nwere nkwarụ PLWD ma nye ndị na-emebi ịkwụ ụgwọ ntaramahụhụ
E mere ndokwa maka oge mgbanwe afọ ise maka mgbanwe nke ihe ntụrụndụ ọkachasị n'ụlọ ọha na eze na idozi ngwá ọrụ enyemaka na ụgbọala iji mee ka ndị nwere nkwarụ nwee ike ịnweta ma jiri ha mee ihe

Site na usoro nke sonyere na iwu mmachibido nke afọ 2018, Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari kwadoro nguzobe ngalaba nke ana kpọ National Commission for Persons with Disabilities ma kwado nhọpụta James Lalu dị ka onye isi odeakwụkwọ ya
NCPWD bụ ịji gbochie ịkpa ókè megide ndị nwere nkwarụ, na ime ka onye ọ bụla n'ime ha nwee ikike na ohere haha dịka ndị ibe ha na-enweghị nkwarụ
Discolisis nke a na-akpọkwa chemonucleolysis maobụ nucleolysis, bụ ọgwụgwọ maka diski
nke na-achọ ibelata mgbaàmà ndị metụtara ya site na ibatkmzobic ma ọ bụ nke kemịkal ma ọ bụ ime ka nucleus pulposis dị nro
Ọ bụ Lyman W
Smith kọrọ usoro ahụ na 1964, ohe ngwọta oriapapain mee ihe
Discolysis site na iji chymopapain anaghịzi eme n'ihi ihe ize ndụ nke anaphylaxis na transverse myelitis
A na-ejikwa discolysis kọwaa ụdị ọgwụgwọ ozone ebe a na-etinye ihe ngwọta oxigin ozon no n'ime diski intervertebral
A naghị anabata usoro a nke ọma n'akụkụ ụfọdụ n'ihi enweghị nhazi nke usoro, ọzụzụ na ngwá ọrụ
Na United States, usoro ahụ enweghị nkwado FDA
Ndị dere nyocha usoro nke 2018 kwuru na ọ bụ naanị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ọmụmụ na-adịghị mma na mmetụta nke ozone discolysis na azụ dị ala dị, ọ bụ ezie na ha kọrọ na ha dị irè, a kọrọ akụkọ dị njọ
Ndị dere ya kwubiri na ozone discolysis chọrọ ọmụmụ ihe ndị ọzọ na 'usoro zuru oke na nke na-agbanwe agbanwe'
Disdrometer bụ ngwá ọrụ eji atụle nkesa nha na ọsọ nkè hydrometeors na-ada
Ụfọdụ disdrometers nwèrè ike ịmata ọdịiche dị n'etiti mmiri ozuzo, graupel, na akụ́ mmiri igwe
Ojiji màkà disdrometers dị ọtụtụ
Enwèrè ike iji ha mee ihe màkà njikwa okporo ụzọ, nyocha sayensị, usoro nyocha ọdụ ụgbọ elu, na hydrology
Disdrometers kachasị ọhụrụ na-eji teknụzụ microwave ma ọ bụ laser
Enwèrè ike iji disdrometers vidiyo 2D nyochaa mmiri ozuzo na snowflakes

Okirikiri nke ehihie (ma ọ bụ okirikiri diele) bụ usoro ọ bụla nké na-eme kwa awa iri abụọ na anọ n'ihi otu ntụgharị zuru okè nke mbara ala Ụwa gbụrụ-gbúrụ axis ya
Mgbanwe nke ụwa na-akpata mgbanwe okpomọkụ n'elu n'ehihie na abalị, ya na mgbanwe ihu igwe n'afọ niile
Okirikiri nke ehihie na-adabere na radieshon anyanwụ na-abata
Na climatology, okirikiri ehihie bụ otu n'ime ụdị kachasị mkpa nké usoro ihu igwe, gụnyere ọdịiche dị na okpomọkụ ehihie na mmiri ozuzo
Okirikiri ehihie nwèrè ike ịbụ ihe dịka sinusoidal ma ọ bụ gụnyere ihe ndị mejupụtara sinusoid a pịrị apị (n'ihi ịrị elu na ọdịda anyanwụ) na ntụsara ahụ (Newton cooling) n'abalị
Usoro okirikiri nkè ehihie nwekwara mmetụta dị ukwuu na ọkwa carbon dioxide na ikuku, n'ihi usoro ndị dị ka photosynthesis na iku ume nke mkpụrụ ndụ
Okirikiri nke ìhè na okpomọkụ n'ehihie nwèrè ike ịkpata okirikiri yiri nke ahụ na usoro ihe ndị dị ndụ, dị ka photosynthesis na osisi na ịda mbà n'obi n'ime ụmụ mmadụ
Nzaghachi osisi na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi nwèrè ike ọbụna mee ka okirikiri na-apụtaghị ìhè na ọrụ microbial rhizosphere, gụnyere nitrogen fixation
Usoro okirikiri nke ọkara ụbọchị na-ezo aka na usoro nke na-eme ihe dịka awa iri na abụọ ọ bụla ma ọ bụ ihe dịka ugboro abụọ n'ụbọchị
Ọtụtụ mgbè, enwèrè ike ijikọta ihe ndị a na mmiri nke ọnwa, n'ọnọdụ ahụ, ógè ahụ dị nso na awa iri na abụọ na nkeji irí abụọ na ise

A họpụtara Oduruduru maka 200mita na asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2016 na Durban
Mgbe o biputere oge nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ na semifinals, ọ gbaghị ọsọ na njedebe n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
N'afọ 2018 Mkpọkọ Michael Johnson na Waco, Texas, Divine kwalitere ihe kacha mma nke ya na 100 mita ruo sekọnd1010 , kwalite ndekọ ụlọ akwụkwọ Texas Tech site na 001 s
Otu afọ ka e mesịrị na otu nzukọ ahụ, ọ kwalitere ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya ma debe oge na-eduga n'ụwa nke 994 s na 1976 s, na 100 m na 200 m n'otu n'otu
Oge ya na 200 m mebiri ndekọ obodo nke 1984 Francis Obikwelu setịpụrụ n'afọ 1999
N'ime afọ 2019, o lekwasịrị anya na asọmpi kọleji
O setịpụrụ ihe kacha mma nkeonwe na dash 60-mita na asọmpi ime ụlọ Big12 n'afọ 2019, na-agba ọsọ 652 sekọnd maka anya iji merie aha mpaghara
Ọ merikwara 200 mita Big 12 Ime ụlọ
Na 2019 NCAA Division I Indoor Track and Field Championship ọ meriri 200 mita aha ma tinye nke asaa na 60 m ikpeazụ
Na Big 12 Outdoor Championship ọ meriri 100 m na 999 sekọnd, na-agbajisịrị ihe mgbochi nke 10 nke abụọ maka oge mbụ na nnọkọ ịkpọ òkù Michael Johnson mbụ
Ọ nyekwara Texas Tech Red Raiders aka na aha mgbagharị 4 × 100 m
Na 2019 NCAA Division I Outdoor Track and Field Championship, o meriri sprint okpukpu abụọ na 100 m na 200 m, yana ewere nke atọ na ntụgharị 4 × 100 m
100 ya m oge nke 986 sekọnd bụ nke kasị ọsọ n'ụwa n'oge nke oge na 200 ya m oge nke 1973 sekọnd bụ ndekọ asọmpi
Oduduru mere mpụta mbụ ya na sekit IAAF Diamond League 2019 na nzukọ Herculis 2019, mana ọ gwụchara na ebe ikpeazụ

Dizin (nke a na-akpọkarị 'Dizi' ma ọ bụ 'Maji' n'akwụkwọ akụkọ) bụ asụsụ Omotic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic nke ndị Dizi na-asụ, nke kachasị na mpaghara Maji nke South Nations, Nationalities na Peoples Region, nke dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ

Achọpụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 17,583 dị ka ndị na-asụ otu asụsụ na 1994

Dizin (nke a na-akpọkarị 'Dizi' ma ọ bụ 'Maji' n'akwụkwọ akụkọ) bụ asụsụ Omotic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic nke ndị Dizi na-asụ, nke kachasị na mpaghara Maji nke South Nations, Nationalities na Peoples Region, nke dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ
Etiopia
Ọnụọgụ 2007 depụtara ndị na-ekwu okwu 33,927
Achọpụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 17,583 dị ka ndị na-asụ otu asụsụ na 1994
Dizin, yana asụsụ Sheko na Nayi, bụ akụkụ nke ụyọkọ asụsụ dị iche iche a na-akpọ 'Maji' ma ọ bụ 'Dizoid'
Asụsụ Dizoid ma ọ bụ Maji (Majoid) nwere asụsụ atọ a na-asụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia

Dizi dị iche na asụsụ abụọ ndị ọzọ Güldemann (2018) na-anabata na Dizoid yikarịrị ka ọ ga-emetụta Ta-Ne ('North Omotic') karịa Mao na Aroid, ma na-ahụ mmetụta nke okwu mgbazinye ego na asụsụ Maji sitere na obere Gimira nke Ta-Ne
Güldemann (2018) kwenyere na Dizoid nwere ike ịbụ ihe jikọrọ ya na Ta-Ne ('North Omotic') karịa Mao na Aroid, ma na-ahụ mmetụta nke okwu mgbazinye na asụsụ Maji site na Gimira nke Ta-Ne
Djénébou Danté (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Mali na-eme egwuregwu na-ahụ maka ihe omume sprinting
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na 100 mita na 2011 World Championships
O sonyere na mita 400 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro
O weputara nke ise na okpomọkụ ya na oge nke 5285 sekọnd
Ọ bụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ maka Mali n'oge Parade of Nations O meriri nrite ọla edo na 2017 Francophony Games na oge nke 5223 sekọnd
O sonyere na 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics

Djeneba Bamba bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke mba Mali
A mụrụ ya na Febụwarị 5, 1983, na Bamako
Djeneba Bamba na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eche bọọlụ
Ọ na-agba bọọlụ na RC Saint-Étienne na otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị mba Mali
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike kemgbe afọ 2003
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2008, Djeneba Bamba anọwo na Super Lionnes d'Hamdalaye foobal club
Bamba malitere ọrụ ya na Mali na US Djicoroni
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2004, Djeneba Bamba si Mali kwaga na nchekwa nke Racing Club Saint -Étienne, ebe ọ zutere onye obodo ya Aïssata Coulibaly
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2006, a kwalitere Bamba na Division 1 Féminine team nke RC Saint -Étienne ma me mpụta mbụ ya na Septemba 10 na FC Vendenheim
Mgbe afọ anọ na-egwuri egwu maka RC Saint-Etienne gbara bọọlụ, ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ ya, ma kemgbe ahụ ọ nọ na Super Lionnes d'Hamdalaye na obodo ya Mali n'okpuru nkwekọrịta
Bamba bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Mali kemgbe afọ 2003 ma n'afọ 2006 sonyeere iko mba Afrịka nke ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere osote onye mmeri nke Division 2 na Racing Club nke Saint-Étienne na 2007
Djeneba N'Diaye (amụrụ na 8 Julaị na afọ 1997) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball maka AMI Basketball na otu mba Mali
Ọ nọchitere anya Mali na afọ 2019 Women's Afrobasket
Djénébou Sissoko (amụrụ na abalị iri na abuo na onwa nke isii, na afo 1982 na San) bụ onye Mali na-egwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị
Sissoko nọchitere anya Mali, ma sọọ mpi dị ka akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing
N'oge asọmpi ahụ, o nwetara ngụkọta nke akara iri abụọ na anọ na iri atọ na abụọ, gụnyere iri na atọ megide Czech Republic, na egwuregwu ise
Sissoko bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke Djoliba AC na Bamako

Djezzy (Arabic) bụ otu n'ime ndị isi atọ na-ahụ maka netwọk ekwentị nke obodo Algeria, nke nwere òkè ahịa nke 65 pacenti (ihe karịrị nde mmadụ 1649 na Disemba n’afo 2016) na netwọk na-ekpuchi 90 pacenti nke ndị bi na ya (48 wilayas)
Djezzy bụ nke steeti Obodo Algeria kemgbe afo 2022, n'oge gara aga ọ bụ onye enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ Egypt Global Telecom Holding (onye enyemaka nke VEON)
Djezzy nwetara ikikere GSM nke abụọ nke Algeria na 11 Julaị n’afo 2001, na ntinye nke $ 737 nde, ma malite ya na Febụwarị 15, 2002
Na Jenụwarị n’afo 2015, National Investment Fund (FNI) weghaara 51 pacenti nke isi obodo nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ebe onye mmekọ mba ọzọ, Global Telecom Holding, nọgidere na-ahụ maka njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n’afo 2022, VEON rere òkè 4557 pacenti fọdụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na National Investment Fund maka $ 682 nde, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ naanị onye nwe Djezzy
Djezzy na-ekpuchi 95 pacenti nke ndị bi na mpaghara mba ahụ na ọrụ 3G ya na-etinye na 48 wilayas
Djezzy malitere ọrụ 4G ya, na Oktoba 1, n’afo 2016, na wilayas 20 ma kpebisie ike ikpuchi ihe karịrị 50 pacenti nke ndị bi na afo 2021
Djezzy na-etinye aka na usoro mgbanwe iji bụrụ onye isi ọrụ dijitalụ na obodo Algeria ma nye ndị ahịa ohere ịgagharị n'ụwa dijitalụ
Onye isi oche bù Vincenzo Nesci ya na Matthieu Galvani, Chief Executive Officer na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Djezzy bụ akụkụ otu nke VEON, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta na teknụzụ mba ụwa
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye ọrụ dịgasị iche iche dịka ịkwụ ụgwọ tupu oge eruo, ịkwụ ụgwọ mgbe ọ kwụsịrị, data, ọrụ bara uru na SUT
O nwekwara ndị asọmpi abụọ Mobilis nke gọọmentị nwere ya na Ooredoo Algeria nke onwe
Djibo bụ aha nna sitere na Naijirịa
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
