Djibouti Telecom (Djibouti Télécommunication Co) bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke gọọmentị na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta na obodo Djibouti, Djibouta
Ọ na-enye ọrụ ekwentị, ekwentị mpanaaka, ya nakwazi ịntanetị maka ọha na eze
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya n'isi obodo mba ahụ
Na ngwụcha afọ 2013 ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechara kpughee ọrụ 3G ya na mba ahụ dum ma malitekwa na afo 2017 kpughee ozi 4G+
Isi onyinye ịntanetị nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maka ịntanetị na mba ahụ dum na-elekwasị anya ugbu a na ọrụ ADSL
Djibril Kouyaté (Arabic) bụ onye Mali na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme egwuregwu
A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama dịka The return of Tieman, Tiefing na Walaha
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1942 na Bamako, Mali
N'afọ 1969, o mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye nduzi na l'artisanat
Mgbe ahụ o mere ihe nkiri Le retour de Tieman (1970), Le drapeau noir au sud du berceau (1976) na Le Mali aujourd'hui (1978)
Dịk onye na-eme ihe nkiri, o mere ihe nkiri Verloren Maandag (1974), Ta Dona (1991), na Macadam tribu (1999)
N'afọ 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri a ma ama Code inconnu nke a na-eto àgwà ya dịka 'Youssouf'
Djibril Moussa Souna (bu onye amụrụ na Mee 7, 1992 na Niamey, Niger ) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ na-egwuri egwu ugbu a dị ka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu Niger AS GNN
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger, nke a kpọrọ na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations

Djilali Mehri ( Arabic ) bụ onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke Pepsi Algeria, ndị na-ejide Maghreb na Middle East Investors, ọ nwekwara ọrụ iji wuo ụlọ nkwari akụ iri atọ na isii na Accor n'obodo ukwu dị na Algeria dị ka Algiers, Constantine na Oran

A mụrụ ya na Disemba 15, 1937 na El Oued, Algeria, Djilali Mehri malitere na ọrụ mbụ ya Daouia Farm, nke Djilali Mehri hiwere, onye nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na azụmahịa mba ụwa tupu ọ tụgharịa gaa ọrụ ugbo, setịpụrụ ọsọ maka ihe ọhụrụ obodo
Ọ bụghị onye ọrụ ugbo ma ọ bụ nwa onye ọrụ ugbo, Mehri kwenyere na ala nna ya nwere ike imepụta ihe ọ bụla, ọ hụkwara ohere ndị teknụzụ ọhụrụ nke mkpụrụ osisi na-enye

Malite n'afọ 1985 na hekta iri ise na anọ (133 acres), ma ugbu a na-akọ ugbo nke hekta 700 (1730 ac), Daouia na-emepụta pears, pomegranates na pistachios, niile na-ere ahịa na mba niile ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ banye n'ahịa Europe
Ọ kụrụ nkwụ, eucalyptus maka uru ọ bara na njikwa mmiri, na 1990, ọ webatara ịkọ oliv na El-Oued, ihe ọhụrụ ya kachasị mma
Djingarey Mamoudou (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1964) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Nijeria
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwoke na 1988 Summer Olympics
Djo Tunda Wa Munga (amụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Congo
Maka ihe nkiri egwu ya nke afọ 2010 Viva Riva!, o meriri ihe nrite maka onye nduzi kacha mma na African Movie Academy Awards na 2011
Viva Riva! merikwara na 2011 MTV Movie Awards maka Best African Movie Awards
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na mba iri na asatọ nke Afrịka ma gosipụta echiche siri ike nke ndụ na Kinshasa
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri Congo nke mbụ e mepụtara kemgbe Mobutu Sese Seko mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ afọ iri abụọ na ise gara aga
Riva, onye na-ere mmanụ ụgbọala na-ere ahịa, hụrụ enyi nwanyị nke onye isi mpụ nke Kinshasa n'anya
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Angole Hoji Fortuna nwetakwara ihe nkiri nkwado kachasị mma na MTV Movie Awards maka ngosipụta ya nke onye na-eme egwuregwu aha ya bụ Cesar
Àtụ Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Director
Djoueria Abdallah bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Comorian
Onye na-amụ nwa si n'obodo Mitsamiouli
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu Assembly of the Union
Ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara mbụ nke Ngazidja
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2007, ọ ka bụ nanị nwanyị so na Nzukọ ahụ
Doa Aly (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na 1976, na Cairo, Egypt
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Faculty of Fine Arts na Mahadum Helwan na Cairo, wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts ya na nka na ihe osise n'afọ 2001
Ọrụ Aly gụnyere ihe osise, ihe osise
Ọrụ ya sitere na mkpali nke 'mmasị na nke ọdịdị mmadụ, akwụkwọ ochie, na ịgba egwú oge ochie'
Ọrụ ya apụtala na gallery na Middle East, Africa, na Europe
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya nke ihe osise ya bụ Pixel Series na Mashrabia Gallery na Cairo, otu n'ime ụlọ ngosi mbụ nwere onwe ya na Cairo

E mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Europe na Paris, France, na 2007 na Gallery Kamel Mennour Ọrụ ya apụtala dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi na ememme na Dakar Biennale na Senegal, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie Tate Modern na London, na Turkey's Istanbul Biennial
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi na oghere nka nke oge a nke Makan, na Amman, Jọdan
E gosipụtara Aly na ihe nkiri ụmụ akwụkwọ Some Movements for Web Camera, nke enyere onyinye site n'aka National Film School of Denmark

Doaa el-Adl (amụrụ na 6 Febụwarị 1979 na Damietta) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe nkiri na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Al-Masry Al-Youm, nke a maara maka ihe nkiri ya na-atọ ọchị nke nwere isiokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma ọ bụ okpukpe siri ike
A kpọtụrụ ya aha dị ka nwanyị na-ese ihe nkiri a ma ama n'Ijipt
Ọrụ ya na Al-Masry Al-Youm enwetala nlebara anya dị ukwuu ma mepụta esemokwu
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cairo
el-Adl gụrụ Fine Arts na Mahadum Alexandria, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2000
el-Adl malitere ibipụta ihe osise ya n'afọ 2007
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri maka ọtụtụ ndi, nke gụnyere Al-Dustour, Rose al-Yūsuf na Sabah El Kheir, ma gosipụta ihe nkiri maka Qatr El Nada, Alaa-El Din na Bassem
Al-Masry Al-Youm na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a
N'afọ 2009, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ meriri ihe nrite Journalistic Distinction na Caricature
N'afọ 2014, ụlọ ọrụ French Cartooning for Peace kwanyeere El Adl ùgwù

Onye nyere onyinye ahụ bụ onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke UN bụ Kofi Annan, onye kwuru na onyinye ahụ 'na-amata ndị na-etinye olu ha na nkà nka ha maka udo na nnagide na ndị na-eji asụsụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ihe oyiyi iji mee ka anyị mara ma kụziere ma mee emume mmadụ anyị'
Mgbe mgbanwe ọchịchị nke Ijipt nke afọ 2011 gasịrị, ọrụ ya malitere ịkatọ onye isi ala Mohamed Morsi nke ukwuu
el-Adl kpatara esemokwu na Disemba 2012 mgbe Al-Masry Al-Youm bipụtara ihe osise ya nke gosipụtara mmụọ ozi na-agwa Adam na Iv na ha gaara anọgide n'ogige Iden ma ọ bụrụ na ha tụnyere onye ziri ezi

Dị ka el-Adl si kwuo, e bu n'uche ka ihe nkiri ahụ bụrụ nkatọ nke 'ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-eji okpukpe eme ihe ma jiri ya mee ihe iji chịkwaa ma metụta ndị nkịtị', mana ọ mere ka Khaled El Masry, onye ọka iwu Salafi na odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Salafist Front's National Centre for Defending Freedoms, boo ya ebubo nkwulu
Ikpe ahụ kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ kparịrị ọrụ Adam na Islam
Ọkaiwu General Talaat Abdallah nyere iwu ka e mee nchọpụta; a kwụsịrị nke a mgbe nnupụisi ọchịchị nke Ijipt nke afọ 2013 gasịrị
N'otu afọ ahụ, onye ọkàiwu ukwu Talaat Abdallah gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ maka ihe nkiri nke ọ katọrọ ndị Alakụba na Ijipt na mmetụta ha na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Onye Brazil na-ese ihe nkiri Carlos Latuff gbachitere ya, onye gosipụtara el-Adl na-agbachitere onwe ya megide onye Alakụba na pensụl yiri ube

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2013, el-Adl mepụtara ihe nkiri iji katọọ nkwarụ ụmụ nwanyị, site n'igosi nwoke na-ele anya dị ka onye na-arịgo steepụ ma na-agbatị, na-ejide mma, iji bepụ okooko osisi na-acha ọbara ọbara n'etiti ụkwụ nwanyị

N'ikwu okwu na Clitoraid na 2013, El Adl kọwara, 'Tupu mgbanwe ahụ mee, ana m ese ihe na-enweghị isi banyere nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na nsogbu ha, mana ugbu a, a manyere m ise ihe osise ndị a gbasara ụmụ nwanyị iji chebe ịdị adị nke m, nnwere onwe onwe onwe m nke na-eyi egwu n'okpuru ọchịchị nke Muslim Brotherhood'
Ihe osise ya na-egosi ikpe nke Onye isi ala Hosni Mubarak bụkwa ndị a ma ama
N'afọ 2016, ọrụ ya kpuchiri isiokwu mba ụwa gụnyere Brexit, mwakpo a wakporo Mahadum Bacha Khan na ịkwụsị ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị
Doba nwere ike na-ezo aka
Doba bụ asụsụ Central Sudan nke Chad
A na-ewere ya dị ka asụsụ atọ, n'ihi na agbụrụ atọ nwere njirimara dị iche iche na-asụ ya, Bedjond, Mango, na Gor
Otú ọ dị, ha niile nwere ogo dị elu nke nghọta ibe ha, ya mere site na ụkpụrụ ahụ bụ otu asụsụ
Doba bụ aha obodo ahụ bụ ebe etiti ndị Mango, ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-eji dịka okwu mkpuchi maka olumba atọ ahụ
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọkà okwu ejighị n'aka, dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ọhụrụ maka Bedjond, 36,000, sitere na 1969
Ọnụ ọgụgụ maka Gor (87,000) na Mango (52,000) sitere na 2006
A na-asụkwa Bedjond Bediondo na Bejondo, ma a makwaara dị ka Bediondo Mbai, Mbay Bejondo, na Nangnda
Olumba bụ Bedjond, Bebote, na Yom
A makwaara Gor dị ka Bodo; Bodo na Yamod bụ olumba
A makwaara Mango dị ka Mongo, Doba, na Mbay Doba
Àtụ Central Sudanic languages
Dobara bụ ofe nke ndi obodo Algeria na-eri akwụkwọ nri na-atọ ụtọ, nke e ji chickpeas ya na agwa sara mbara mee ma jiri mmanụ oliv mee ka ọ dị mmiri
O sitere n'obodo Biskra di na Algeria, a na-eri ya n'oge oyi n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mba ahụ, ọkachasị na El Oued, Batna, Khenchela, Aïn M'lila, Constantine na Djelfa
E kere Dobara tupu mmalite nke esemokwu obodo Algeria, ọ mechara bụrụ nri nke ndị agha Algeria
Oriri ya sitere na mpaghara Zibans na Aurès ruo na Batna, mgbe ahụ gaa An M'lila na Constantine, yana obodo ndị ọzọ dị na Algeria
E nwekwaziri ọtụtụ ụdị dobara ọkụ maọbụ oyi, ihe ndị e ji mee ya nwere ike ịdịgasị iche dabere na mpaghara
Dobase bụ asụsụ Cushitic a na-asụ na Dirashe Special District nke South Nations, Nationalities, na Peoples Region dị na ndịda Etiopia
Mgbe Blench (2006) weghachiri Bussa site na Dullay gaa na ngalaba Konsoid nke Cushitic, ọ hapụrụ asụsụ mbụ Mashole, Lohu, na Dobase dị ka asụsụ Dobase
Dorota Doda Rabczewska (15 February 1984 Ciechanów, Poland - ) - Polish ọbụ abụ, ede uri na-ese ihe
Dodan Barracks bụ ogige ndị agha dị na Ikoyi, Lagos, Nigeria
Ogige ahụ bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha kachasị elu n'oge Agha Obodo Naịjirịa nakwa site n'afọ 1966 ruo 1979 na 1983 ruo 1985
Dodan Barracks bụ ebe obibi nke ndị isi ndị agha nke ndị agha Naijiria nke 1966 na 1983 na99, yana isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha kachasị elu site na 1966 ruo mgbe ha kwagara Abuja n'afọ 1991
Aha 'Dodan' sitere na ebe a lụrụ agha n'oge agha Burma nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ site na 82nd West African Division
Dodan Barracks bụ otu n'ime isi nke otu ndị isi ndị agha Naijiria bụ ndị kwaturu mba Naijiria mbụ na Jenụwarị 1966
Ndị agha kwụsịrị nnupụisi ahụ, onye ọchịagha ya, Major General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi, wee bụrụ onye isi ala

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1966, Dodan Barracks ghọrọ isi oche nke ike na Naịjirịa mgbe e gbusịrị ọchịchị nke e gburu Ironsi na onye isi ndị ọrụ ya, General Yakubu Gowon ka e mere onye isi ala, na-abanye n'ọgba aghara nke onye ọrụ Federal Guard
Ogige ahụ bụ ebe Gowon natara Biafra n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na njedebe nke Agha Obodo Naịjirịa na Jenụwarị 1970
Ndị ọchịchị sochirinụ nọgidere na-anọ n'ogige ndị agha ruo nkeji iri na ise nke narị afọ na-esote
A kwaturu Gowon n'ọchịchị n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1975, General Murtala Mohammed nọchiri ya
N'otu mgbalị a gbalịrị iwere ọchịchị n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1976, e gburu Murtala mgbe a wakporo ndị njem ya
Obasanjo kwagara n'ogige ndị agha maka ebumnuche nchekwa
N'afọ 1977, ndị agha wakporo ogige nke onye egwu a ma ama Fela Kuti, nke a na-akpọ nna Afrobeat, onye na-akatọ ọchịchị ndị agha
Ha tiri ndị ikom ahụ ihe, dinaa ụmụ nwanyị ahụ n'ike ma tụba Fela n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Nne ya dị afọ iri asaa na asatọ nwụrụ mgbe e mesịrị n'ihi mmerụ ahụ site na windo nke ụlọ elu nke abụọ abụọ
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, o dekọrọ abọm akpọrọ Coffin For Head of State
Fela na ndị na-akwado ya mere njem n'ozuzu igbe ozu nne ya gaa Dodan Barracks ma hapụ ya ebe ahụ iji mee ka Obasanjo ihere
Dodan Barracks bụ ebe nzukọ e nwere n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1978 n'etiti onye isi ala US Jimmy Carter na Olusegun Obasanjo
N'ọchịchị nke Disemba afọ 1983, mgbe General Muhammadu Buhari weghaara ọchịchị n'aka Onye isi ala Shehu Shagari, ndị agha nọ n'ogige ndị agha guzogidere na mbụ, naanị iji nyefee n'ụbọchị sochirinụ
Mweghara ọchịchị n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985 nke General Ibrahim Babangida haziri, weghaara ọchịchị n'aka Buhari
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1986, e guzobere ụlọ ikpe ndị agha pụrụ iche iji kpee ndị a na-ebo ebubo na ha na-akpa nkata iwepu General Babangida
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ kpere ikpe ahụ na Dodan Barracks, na-achọpụta na mmadụ iri na asaa n'ime ndị a na-ebo ebubo na ha gbara ọchịchị mgba okpuru
Dodan Barracks bụ otu n'ime ebe ndị dị mkpa e weghaara n'April 1990 site na Major Gideon Orkar megide General Ibrahim Babangida
Babangida bụ onye bi mgbe a wakporo ogige ndị agha, mana o si n'ụzọ azụ gbapụ
Ndị nche ahụ mebiri mgbalị ahụ, na-efunahụ ndị otu ise na-echebe Dodan Barracks

Nwunye Babangida, Maryam, onye ya na ụmụ ya nọkwa n'oge mgbalị iwe ọchịchị, chetara na mgbe ọ kwagara n'ogige ndị agha na 1985 ọ ga-ahazi nnukwu mmezigharị iji mee ka ọnụ ụlọ ndị ahụ dịkwuo mma maka oriri
Mgbe a kwagara isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha na Abuja na 1991, na ịmaliteghachi ike ndị nkịtị na 1999, ego maka mmezi nke ogige ndị agha belatara nke ukwuu
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 2003, ala ahụ bụ ihe ruru unyi na nke na-adịghị ọcha, nsị na-agbapụta site na paịpụ mebiri emebi, mgbidi nke ụlọ ụfọdụ gbawara ma gbahapụ ọtụtụ n'ime ha

N'afọ 2004, onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo nke oge ahụ - dị ka ngosipụta nke ọpụpụ site na ọchịchị aka ike nke ndị agha gara aga mechara nye iwu ka e nyefee Dodan Barracks na ụlọ ndị agha ndị ọzọ niile a na-ejighị mee na mba ahụ n'aka ndị uwe ojii nke mba ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2006, ụlọ ọrụ Lagos Environment and Sanitation Network chọpụtara ọwa mmiri na-emetọ nke ukwuu n'ahịa Obalende mammy, n'azụ State House na Dodan Barracks
Nnyocha nke August 2007 chọpụtara na mmiri ahụ nwere ihe nsị
Ndị bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'ahịa, Dodan Barracks na State House nọ n'ihe ize ndụ site na ọrịa ndị dị ka ịba ahụ, afọ ọsịsa, dysentery na ọgbụgbọ na ọgbọrọgwụ
Na Jenụwarị 2009, a kọrọ na Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua ga-etinye ụfọdụ n'ime oge nke ezumike ya n'ogige ndị agha
Dodo Ikire bụ nri omenala nke sitere na Osun siteti nke nigiriiaAnemputa nria site abirika a jụrụ ajụ, mana taa ndị mmadụ n' ejizi abirika nke dị ọhụrụ emepụta ya
Ngwa ngwa nri ya gụnyere abirika, ose, mmanụ, na nnu
Dodo Ikire na eji ọjị ma gba kwa okirikiri n' ile anya
A na-akpọ plantain ma ọ bụ unere na-esi nri, nke a na-ewepụ, bepụ ma sie ya nke ọma Dodo n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Naịjirịa
Ikire bụ obodo dị na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa n'etiti obodo Ibadan na Ile-Ife, na Osun Steeti
Nwanyị agadi nwanyị a enweghị nri fọdụrụ ma e wezụga plantain ndị tozuru oke, nke ọ ga-atụba n'ime ite ahụ, mana o kpebiri iji nnu na ose gwakọta ya niile ma sie ya na mmanụ nkwụ
Ọ riri ya, nwee obi ụtọ na ya wee kpebie ime ihe ndị ọzọ ma soro ndị agbata obi ya kerịta ya
Nsonaazụ ya bụ ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka Dodo Ikire, nke aha ya sitere n'obodo o si
A na-ere ya karịsịa na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
Doe (Dohe) bụ asụsụ nke ndị Bantu nke mpaghara Pwani nke obodo Tanzania
Dolapo Adeleke, onye a makwaara dị ka LowlaDee bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa
A mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Septemba, afọ 1990 na Steeti Kano, Adeleke bidoro i de ihe na nwata, bipụta akwụkwọ ọgụgụ abụọ tupu ọ malite mahadum
Adeleke gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Dansol High School,dị na Legos Steeti
O nwetere nzere bachelọ sekọnd klas ọpa na Mass Communication na Mahadum nke Covenant n'afọ 2011
Na mkparịtaụka ya na Busayo Adekoya nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ThisDay, o kwuru na ọ malitere i mepụta ihe nkiri n'afọ 21

N'afọ 2012, e tinyere ya na ndepụta Vanguard nke ndị na-eto eto bụ ndị Naijiria na-enwe mmetụta dị egwu, were hụ ya na ọ meriri Onye edemede kachasị mma nke afọ nke Angles Magazine maka i de Flesh and Blood na Little White Hen
Site na mgbasaa obere ihe nkiri ya Brave, nke Adesua Etomi na Wole Ojo nọ na ya, a họpụtara ya n'okpuru ngalaba Onye mmepụta Kachasị Mma nke Nigerian Entertainment Awards (NEA 2015)
N'afọ 2015, ọ gara n’ihu mepụta ihe nkiri izizi ya nke telivishọn a kpọrọ A Place Called Happy nke ndị ihe nkiri ndị Naijiria na ndị Gana pụtakọrọ na ya
N'afọ 2016, o weputara Mini Series nke mbụ ya a kpọrọ This Is It na YouTube Platform jikọtara ndị ihe nkiri Naijiria na ndị Kenya
Ọ nwetara nnabata n'otu ntabi anya karịrị nde mmadụ asatọ n'ozuzu ya

Mini Series ahụ malitere nke ọma na ọdụ mgbasa ozi telivishọn dị iche iche n'ofe Afrịka were gaa n'ihu merie Best Television Series na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards (AMVCA) 2018 LowlaDee dere, Duzie ma dezie agba 20 ahụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Show Runner
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara LowlaDee maka EbonyLifeTV Sisterhood Awards Africa maka ‘Film Director Of The Year’ maka ihe ọ rụzuru na Mini Series, 'This is it'
N'afọ 2017, a hoputara ya maka ihe nrite nke 'Future Awards Africa' for New Media, ma n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2018 ka e deputara ya dika Leading Ladies Africa's ‘100 Most Inspiring Women In Nigeria’

LowlaDee dere, Duzie ma dezie nkeji 60 ihe nkiri Valentine's Day Digital film, PLAN B, akụkọ gbasara onye Kenya na Naijiria nke gara n'ihu ngw ngwa, nke nwetara ndị nkiri karịrị otu nde n'ime izu ụka abụọ izizi ya na-enweghị mgbasa ozi ị kwụ ụgwọ
Ọ bụ onye nwe LowlaDee Original Inc (nke a na-akpọbu Doreen Media) ma na-agba n'etiti Legos Naijiria na Nairobi Kenya
starred Eldee, Paul Utomi na Adesua Etomi

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii,n'ụbọchị nke 20 n'Ọgọstụ, afọ 2007, ka ọ na-aga i ji weta akwụkwọ ụfọdụ, ka a nabatachara ya Mahadum nke Covenant, Adeleke nwere ihe mberede nke okporo ụzọ n'ihi mmebi breeki moto ya nke butere ọtụtụ ịwa ahụ na ọnya n'egedege ihu ya
Nke a mere o ji e ji fringe na bangs edozi isi
Dịka o si kwuo, ọ bụhnị naanị ntutu isi mana ọ na-enye ya ike ibuli onwe ya ikarị obi mmafụ na ihe ndị ọzọ so ihe mberede ahụ

N'ime ozi instagram ya, LowlaDee kpughere na ya na ịda mba gbsiri mgba ike ma ị na-ele onye nhazi ihe nkiri American-Indian TV na Actress Mindy Kaling's TV show, The Mindy Project, nyere ya ọṅụ ma kpọtee akụkụ egwuregwu ya na-emepụta nka
Njikọ a mụrụ Romcom web series This is it

Ifedolapo Opeyemi Badmos nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Dolapo Badmos bụ ọnye uwe ojii Naijiria na Chief Superintendent of Police ọnye nwere ọkwa dị iche iche na ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa A maara ya maka akụkọ a na-ebo ebubo, ebe e wepụrụ ndị uwe ojii 36 nke ndị uwe ojii Nigeria n'ihi omume ọjọọ, nke ndị isi ike mechara gbaghaa ya
Badmos si Ekiti Steeti na Naịjirịa, ọ gụrụ Accounting na Federal Polytechnic, Ado Ekiti, ọ nwekwara nzere masta nke sayensị na Public Administration
Badmos sonyeere ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa n'ụbọchị nke iri na ise, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2002 dị ka ọnye enyemaka onye isi ndị uwe ojii
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọrụ dị iche iche na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria site na 2002 ruo ugbu a
Dolapo Badmos jere ozi dị ka Aide de Camp (ADC) nye nwa amaala nke anọ nke Naịjirịa

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi okporo ụzọ nke ngalaba (DTO) na Alakuko, Lagos, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ya, a kwalite ya ka ọ bụrụ ọnye isi ndị uwe ojii nke ngalaba (DPO) na-elekọta Isokoko Division na Agege, steeti Lagos

Na Jenụwarị, 2016 a kpọrọ Dolapo Badmos dị ka ọnye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke ndị uwe ojii Lagos (PPRO), nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịsi ọnwa ọle na ọle tupu e bulie ya n'ọchịchị mpaghara abua na-ekpuchi Lagos na Ogun steeti dị ka ọnye uwe ojii mmekọrịta ọha na ibe ya (PPRO)

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, a kwalitere Dolapo Badmos ka ọ bụrụ ọnye isi nke ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa, ọnọdụ ọhụrụ ahụ nyere ya ohere ịgbanwe uwe isi ya, ọnọdụ ọhụrụ ya dị ka onye isi na-etinye ya n'ahụ maka ịdọ aka ná ntị ma ọ bụ ịdọ aka na ntị megide ndị uwe ojii na-eme ihe adịghị mma
N'ọnwa oktoba 2020, e boro ebubo na Dolapo Badmos na ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa 36 e wepụrụ n'ọkwa n'ihi omume ọjọọ
Otú ọ dị, ndị uwe ojii jụrụ nkwupụta na ebubo ahụ ma gwa ọha na eze na a baara Dolapo Badmos mba, achughi ya ma ọ bụ butue ya n'ọkwa
O doro anya na ọ bụ onye uwe ojii nwanyị kachasị ewu ewu na Naịjirịa
Dolapo Oni, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ Marcy Dolapo Oni bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emeputa ihe na TV, onye nduzi na MC
Oni bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ n'ezinụlọ ya
Ọ biri afọ iri abuaina United Kingdom tupu ọ laghachi Naịjirịa n'afọ 2010
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ hụrụ egwu Andrew Lloyd Webber, Aspects of Love, na The Oxford Playhouse
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Headington School, ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na-akwụ ụgwọ na Oxford, England, ebe ọ bụ nwa agbọghọ ojii mbụ
Ọ gara Mahadum Bristol ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na kemịkal
Oni malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ bi na United Kingdom, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, site n'ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri

Ọ nwetara ebe ọ ga-amụ na Academy of Live and Recorded Arts (ALRA) na Wandsworth, London, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gụnyere Walking Waterfall nke Nii Ayikwei Parkes, William Shakespeare's A Midsummer Nightńs Dream, In Time nke Bola Agbaje, God is a DJ na Iya-Ile (The First Wife nke Oladipo Agboluaje)

Sayers Drama Award

Ọ hapụrụ Studio 53 Extra n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ n'otu oge ahụ ka ọ hapụrụ Moments na Mo iji malite ihe ngosi nke ya, The Marcy Project
O gosipụtara na ihe ngosi MNET, 53 Extra (nke bụbu Studio 53 Extra) na Africa Magic, tupu ya esoro Mo na-akwado Moments na Ebony Life TV

Dịka nwunye osote onye isi ọchịchị Naijiria Yemi Osinbajo, ọ bụla nwanyị nke abụọ nke Naijiria kemgbe 29 Mee 2015

Ọ lụrụ Yemi Osinbajo, nwanne nna ya, na 25 Nọvemba n'afọ 1989
N'afọ 1990, a kpọrọ ya n'ụlọ Ndi omeiwu Naijiria
Dolapo Osinbajo bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Otu Ụmụ Nwanyị Na-enyere Aka, ebe mgbaba na Epe, Legọs, nke e guzobere n'afọ 2014, na onye so chọpụta Otu Usoro nke Ntukwasi Obi Ọha Mmadụ
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2019 ọ chịburu n'ọgbakọ ekpere ụmụ nwanyị Benue nke iri anọ na itoolu (BEWIP) na Makurdi
O meghekwara Ụlọ Ụmụaka Nne Abyol nke ụlọ ọrụ , Mmepe na Ihe Ọhụrụ Benue(BENCEDI)
N'okwu ọ gwara ndị na-eto eto na Benue Steeti, ọ dọrọ ha aka ná ntị ka ha ghara ịbụ ụdị ndụ ịntanetị echiche efu
Mgbe ọ na-agwa ụmụ agbọghọ na-agụsị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Legọs na Disemba n'afọ 2019, ọ gbara ha ume ibi ndụ nke ọma dị ka ezigbo ndị nlereanya
Ọ kọwakwara na ime ihe na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ime njọ megide mmadụ

N'etiti ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2019 Nwunye onye isi ọchịchị Naịjirịa bụ Aisha Buhari họpụtara Osinbajo - ya na ndị nwunye gọvanọ steeti Naịjirịa ka ọ bụrụ 'onye mmeri' na-edu ọgụ megide ụkwara nta na Naịjirịa
Dolf Rieser (1898-1983) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ, na ónyé nkuzi na South Africa
A mụrụ Dolf Rieser na King William's Town, South Africa, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Germany na Switzerland
N'afọ 1917, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École Polytechnique, Zürich, nweta diplọma na injinia ọrụ ugbo, mgbè ahụ site na 1918 ọ nwetara nzere doctorate na sayensị ihe ndị dị ndụ na Mahadum Lausanne
N'afọ 1923, ọ nyochara sayensị na Mahadum Munich, mgbè ọ na-amụ nka na Hans Hoffman
Rieser gụrụ akwụkwọ na 'Atelier 17' na Paris na onye na-ese ihe na ónyé na'akwụkwọ na Britain bụ Stanley William Hayter (1901 Xi 888) na onye na na-ese akwụkwọ na Poland bụ Józef Hecht (1891 Xi 1951)
N'afọ 1926, Hayter biri na Paris, ebe ọ debanyere áhà na Académie Julian ma mụọ ihe osise burin na nzuzo na Hecht, ónyé kụzikwaara Anthony Gross

Dolf Rieser sonyeere Hayter na 1928 mgbè ọ malitere iwere ụmụ akwụkwọ nkè yá wee rụọ ọrụ ruo 1940 na Atelier 17 (nke akpọrọ aha na 1933, site na nọmba okporo ámá nke ụlọ ọrụ Hayter na Rue Campagne-Première)
Ntinye aka nke ogbako ahụ bụ usoro ọchịchị ónyé kwuo uche ya, na-agbasa na ụlọ ọrụ ndị France na-ese ihe site n'ịkwado usoro mmekorita maka ọrụ na nchọpụta teknụzụ

N'afọ 1929, Yves Tanguy na André Masson, tinyere ndị ọzọ Surrealists (gụnyere Picasso, Miró, Arp, Tanguy, Giacometti, Ernst, Trevelyan, Peterdi na Rieser), mèrè ka Hayter mará Surrealism, jikọtara ya na Atelier irí na asaa

Ọ haziri akwụkwọ mpịakọta iji nweta ego màkà ihe kpatara Spain, (gụnyere Solidarité (Paris, 1938), akwụkwọ mpịaka nke akwụkwọ mpịasị asaa, otu n'ime ha bụ nke Picasso), na Kandinsky nyere aka na Stephen Spender na Atelier 17 album ŌFraternité́ iji nweta ego iji nweta ụmụaka na-enweghị olileanya nke Agha Obodo Spain
Abụ Spender dị n'asụsụ Bekee nakwa na nsụgharị French nke Louis Aragon, otu ìgwè nke Kandinsky, Miro, Hayter, Hecht, Buckland-Wright, Husband, Mead, Rieser na Varas
Ọ kwagara England iji sonye na agha na 1940, na 1945, mgbe ọ lụrụ di ọhụrụ, ọ laghachiri na ndụ ndị nkịtị, na-akụzi ihe ọmụmụ, ọmụmụ na nka, ébé ọ na-enyekwa nkuzi onwé ónyé na obibi akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1960, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa Mahadum Cape Town na Johannesburg ka ọ kụzie okwu banyere isiokwu ahụ
N'ime afọ 1960, Rieser malitere ibipụta ihe na translucent fiber-glass panels na laminates
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe edere na akwa màkà Liberty
Ónyé otu Royal Society of Painter-Etchers, ọ webatara intaglio na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na Britain mgbè agha gasịrị
O sonyere na ihe ngosi otu n'ọtụtụ ebe na Europe na America, gụnyere Peggy Guggenheim's Gallery, 1939; Atelier 17 na New York na San Francisco, 1954
Ihe ngosi ya n'onwe ya bụ nke mba ụwa, gụnyere Galerie Bonjean, Paris, 1936; Zwemmer Gallery, 1956; ICA 1966, Lumley Cazalet, 1968; na David Paul Gallery, Chichester 1979
Victoria & Albert Museum, Imperial War Museum, Arts Council UK, National Gallery of Canada na New York Public Library nwere ọrụ ya
Dollar bụ ego e wepụtara na obodo nke Sierra Leone n'agbata afọ 1791 na afọ 1805
E kewara ya na 100 cents ma ụlọ ọrụ Sierra Leone wepụtara ya
A na-ejikọta dollar na sterling na ọnụego nke 1 dollar = 4 shillings 2 pence
N'afọ 1791, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego nke otu, iri, iri abụo, 50 cents, 1 penny na 1 dollar
A na-eji ọla nchara emepụta 1 cent na 1 penny, ndị ọzọ na ọlaọcha
Mkpụrụ ego niile gosipụtara ọdụm n'ihu ya na aka abụọ na-ama jijiji, otu ọcha, otu ojii, n'azụ ya
Dolly Rathebe (OIS) (2 Eprel 1928 16 Septemba 2004) bụ onye na-eti egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke so ndị otu Elite Swingsters jazz, na Alf Herbert's African Jazz and Variety Show
Rathebe nwụrụ na 16 Septemba 2004 site na ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ
A mụrụ Rathebe na Randfontein, South Africa mana o tolitere na Sophiatown, nke ọ kọwara dịka 'ebe magburu onwe ya'
A chọtara ya n'ihe dịka afọ 1948 mgbe ọ gụsịrị abụ na picnic na Johannesburg
Onye na-enyocha nkà si Gallo bịakwutere ya ma ọ bụghị ogologo oge tupu ọ ghọọ kpakpando
Mgbe ihe ngosi African Jazz and Variety nke Alf Herbert meghere n'afọ 1954, Rathebe pụtara ma nọrọ dịka isi ihe na-adọrọ mmasị Herbert ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'ụwa niile mgbe ya na ndị otu Afro jazz, Elite Swingsters, bụrụ abụ n'afọ 1964
Mgbe gọọmentị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ mebiri Sophiatown na ngwụcha afọ 1950 na mmalite afọ 1960, Rathebe chọpụtara na ọ na-esiri ya ike ịrụ ọrụ, ọkachasị mgbe a manyere iwu 8pm
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Cape Town township ma, iji dịrị ndụ, na-agba ọsọ Shebeen ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1989, Rathebe sonyeere Elite Swingsters ọzọ iji mee ihe nkiri nke e debere na 1950s Johannesburg
Ndị otu ahụ nọrọ ọnụ, wepụta abọm ọhụrụ, Woza, na 1991
Nke a sochiri abọm abụọ ọzọ, A Call for Peace (1995) na Siya Gida/We Dance (1997)
N'afọ 2001, Rathebe natara Lifetime Achievement Award na South African Music Awards

N'afọ 2003, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na ise, Rathebe pụtara na ihe ngosi Johannesburg Sof'Town, A Celebration!, ebe ọ bụrụ abụ 'Randfontein', akụkọ banyere onye na-egwu ala mmanya na-egbu na-alaghachi n'ụlọ iji chọta nwunye ya n'àkwà ya na nwoke ọzọ, onye a na-eti ihe ma chụpụ ya
N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, Rathebe bụ onye ndu na Ikageng Women's League nke Pretoria
O nyere ego maka iwu ụlọ nzukọ nwere ọtụtụ ebumnuche n'obodo Sofasonke dị nso na Klipgat, n'ebe ugwu Pretoria
A na-akpọ ụlọ nzukọ ahụ 'Meriting kwaDolly', nke pụtara 'Dolly's Retreat'

N'afọ 2004, e nyere Rathebe South African Order of Ikhamanga na Silver maka 'onyinye ya magburu onwe ya na egwu na nka na ntinye aka na echiche nke ikpe ziri ezi, nnwere onwe na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya'
Dolly Unachukwu (a mụrụ n'ọbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1969) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-eme, na-arụputa, na-ede, ma na-ahazi ihe nkiri
Otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Nollywood, o nwetara aha n'obodo dịka Fadake Akin-Thomas n'ihe nkiri ahụ a kpọrọ Fortunes
Dolly Unachukwu bu otu n’ime ndi bidoro Nollywood,ezigbo onye omee, odee, na-arụpụta ihe nkiri
Unachukwu a mụrụ n’afọ 1969 n’ezinaụlọ dị asaa, bidoro ọrụ ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Nwaafọ Amichi n'Anambra steeti, bụ onye pụtara n'ihe nkiri mbụ nke obere n’afọ 1985 dịka odeakwụkwọ

Ka oge na-aga n'afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya i sonye n'ihe nkiri kachasị mma oge ahụ bụ Mirror in the Sun dịka Prisca, mana ọ bụ ọrụ ya na Fortunes mere ka ọ bụrụ aha a ma n'ezinụlọ n'afọ 1993, ebe ọ zara 'Fadeke', nwanyị di ya ji ezigbo egoa na-emegbu emegbu, ezigbo nwanyị Naijiria
Unachukwu mere onyeihe nkiri izizi ya n’ime Deadly Affair na Deadly Affair II, ebe ya na ndi aka ochie nollywood dika; Emeka Ike, Sandra Achums na Jide Kosoko pụtakọrọ

Ịsu asusu atọ Naijiria di iche na ihe nkiri a, Unachukwu pụtara n'ihe nkiri na-ese okwu bụ Glamour Girls dị ka onye ahịa mgbere nwanyị, ihe nkiri mechara nweta nrite ihe nkiri Naịjirịa kachasị ewu ewu n'America n'afọ 1995
N’afọ 1997, Unachukwu meputara akuko ndu ya bu “ Wildest Dream”
N'ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ kọrọ akụkọ nhụjuanya nke alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya, nke dara n'afo 1994, mere ya nne enweghị di
Di ya yiri egwu ịgba ya akwụkwọ n'ihi iji ezigbo aha ya eme ihe nkiri ahụ
Unachukwu lụrụ ọzọ n’afọ 2000 ma n’ọnwa asatọ nke afọ ahụ ọ gawara isonyere di ya n’Ingland, ma ya na ya kewara n’ọdụ ụgbọelu mgbe ọ matara na ọ bụghị eziokwu ka o kwuru

Ugbu a na Ingland, Unachukwu nwetakwara ihe ọmụma ka ọ nwetara European Computer Driving License n'afọ 2002 ma bido mmụta n'afọ na-eso ya n'ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke East London, na-ewe afọ abụọ i ji lekọta nwa ọhụrụ ya bịara n'afọ 2004
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Juunu afọ 2008
Unachukwu mepụtara ma duzie ihe nkiri nke ya nke a kpọrọ The Empire n'afọ 2005, mgbe ọ na-ahapụ mahadum
Unachukwu gara Television College na Jọs dị na Plateau Steeti, ebe ọ natara diplọma na Television Production n'afọ 1988
O mechara gaa ọmụmụ fọnetik n'afọ 1989 na FRCN Training School Legos ma mechaa gaa Lagos State University n'afọ 1990 were nweta diplọma na Iwu
Dolma bụ ezinụlọ nke nri ndị a na-etinye na nri ndị Ottoman, na nke a na-ahụkarị na nri mba nke oge a nke mpaghara na mba ndị bụbu akụkụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman
A na-eji akwụkwọ nri, mkpụrụ osisi, anụ ma ọ bụ ihe oriri mmiri eme ụdị dolma ụfọdụ, ebe a na-eme ndị ọzọ site na ikpuchi mkpụrụ vaịn, kabeji, ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gburugburu ihe a na-etinye
A maara dolma a na-ekpuchi ekpuchi dị ka sarma
Enwere ike inye ha ọkụ ma ọ bụ na okpomọkụ ụlọ
Nri akwụkwọ nri a na-etinye na ya abụwo akụkụ nke nri Middle East ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ
A chọtawo usoro nri maka osisi ákwà na-etinye n'ime akwụkwọ nri Arabic nke oge ochie, na nri ndị Gris oge ochie, a na-akpọ akwụkwọ fig e ji cheese na-atọ ụtọ mee ka ọ bụrụ thrion
Okwu dolma, nke sitere na Turkish, pụtara 'ihe jupụtara' ma ọ bụ 'jupụtara'

N'ime ụfọdụ n'ime mba ndị bụbu Ottoman, a na-ejigide aha ala ma ọ bụ jikọta ya na okwu asụsụ Turkish, dịka ọmụmaatụ, na steeti Arab nke Persian Gulf na Damascus, a na'akpọ akwụkwọ ndị a na-etinye na mahshi yabraq ma ọ bụ mahshi brag, ngwakọta nke okwu Turkish maka akwụkwọ (yaprak) na okwu Arabic maka ihe a na-emepụta (mahshi)

E dekọrọ ọtụtụ usoro nri dolma na narị afọ nke 19 na Iran site n'aka onye isi nri Naser al-Din Shah Qajar, gụnyere akwụkwọ osisi vaịn, akwụkwọ cabbage, kukumba, osisi ákwà, apụl, na quinces, yana ihe dịgasị iche iche e ji anụ a gwakọtara, akwụkwọ mint, osikapa na saffron
Ezinụlọ ndị Juu Iraqi nwere ụdị dolma nwere ụtọ na-atọ ụtọ nke na-adịghị na nsụgharị ndị ọzọ
Dolma bụkwa akụkụ nke nri nke ndị Juu Sephardic
Ndị Juu nọ n'Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman jiri akwụkwọ vaịn a na-akụ n'ógbè ahụ ma nabata aha Turkish nke nri ahụ
N'oge ọnwa oyi, cabbage bụ nri bụ isi maka ndị ọrụ ugbo na Peasia na Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman, ọ gbasakwara na Balkans

Ndị Juu nọ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Europe kwadebere ụdị dị iche iche nke mpịakọta cabbage na nri kosher meatīthis a na-akpọ golubtsy na Russian, holubtsi na Ukrainian, gołąbki na Polish na holishkes na Yiddish
Ebe ọ bụ na anụ dị oke ọnụ, a na-agwakọta osikapa na anụ mgbe ụfọdụ
Ndị Juu nọ na Europe na-eji oge ụfọdụ dochie ọka bali, achịcha ma ọ bụ kasha (barley porridge) maka osikapa
Na Persian Gulf, a na-ahọrọ osikapa basmati, a pụkwara ime ka ụtọ nke ihe a na-etinye n'ime ya dịkwuo mma site na iji tomato, yabasị na cumin

Akwụkwọ mpịakọta cabbage batara na nri Swedish (ebe a maara ha dị ka kåldolmar) mgbe Charles nke Iri na Abụọ, nke ndị Russia meriri n'agha nke Poltava, laghachiri Sweden na 1715 ya na ndị Turkish na-akwụ ụgwọ ya na ndị na-esi nri ha
A na-ahụ nri Dolma na Balkan, Caucasian, Middle East, North Africa, Mesopotamian, Persian, Israel, Bengali, Swedish, Turkish, Maghrebi na nri Central Asia
N'afọ 2017, a gụnyere ime dolma na Azerbaijan na UNESCO emeghị eme ndepụta nkwado omenala
E nwere ọtụtụ ụdị zeytinyağlı (nke nwere mmanụ oliv) na Niolayağlı (ya na bọta doro anya) dolmas
A na-ejikarị osikapa jupụta na dolmas zeytinyağlı ma jiri galik-yogurt mee ihe na-ajụ oyi, mana a na-enye ụdị dị iche iche na anụ na-ekpo ọkụ, mgbe mgbe na tahini ma ọ bụ avgolemono sauce
A maghị mmalite nke akwụkwọ osisi vaịn a na-etinye n'ime ya
Enwere ike iji anụ ma ọ bụ ọka mee ha, ma jiri yogọt galik, ma ọ bụ ofe na-atọ ụtọ ma na-esi ísì ụtọ nke e ji pomegranate syrup na cherries na-esi ụtọ mee
A maara ha dị ka dolmeh na Iran, dolmades na Gris, tolma na Armenia, yarpaq dolması na Azerbaijan na yebra na Syria
Ndị Ijipt na-akpọ nri a mahshi (nke a na-akpọkwa mashi ma ọ bụ mashy)
mana n'ọdịnala, a na-eji cabbage eme ihe n'oge oyi ma na-eji akwụkwọ osisi vaịn eme ihe n'oge ọkọchị
A na-enye akwụkwọ osisi vaịn na-enweghị anụ ọ bụla, nke a na-akpọ yalancı dolma na Turkish, na okpomọkụ ime ụlọ
Na nri ndị Peshia, basuts dolma bụ efere nke rọba a na-etinye agwa na mkpụrụ osisi tart
A na-ekpuchi ya na akwụkwọ cabbage, ma tinye ya na agwa na-acha ọbara ọbara, agwa garbanzo, lentils, ọka wit gbawara agbawa, tomato paste, yabasị na ọtụtụ ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na ihe na-atọ ụtọ
A na-akpọ mpịakọta cabbage Pasuts tolma (ասպուց տոլմա) (Lenten dolma) n'asụsụ Armenian ebe ha nwere mkpụrụ asaa dị iche iche ♡ chickpea, bean, lentil, ọka wit gbawara agbawa, pea, osikapa na ọka
[citation needed] Ndị na-esi nri Armenia na-eji mgbe ụfọdụ rose hip syrup iji mee ka mpịakịrị cabbage jupụtara na ụtọ
Mpịakọta cabbage a makwaara dị ka kalam dolmasi na Azerbaijan
Mülebbes dolma bụ usoro nri akụkọ ihe mere eme sitere n'oge Ottoman
Halep dolması a na-akpọ maka Aleppo bụ nri a na-etinye Mputu ákwà na anụ na osikapa jupụtara na ya nke a na-eme ka ọ na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ ihe na-esi ụtọ ma ọ bụrụ mmiri oroma
Şalgam dolma bụ turnips jupụtara na Russia
Soğan dolması ('soğan' nke pụtara 'onion' na Turkish), ma ọ bụ yabasị a na-etinye n'ime ya, bụ nri ọdịnala na Bosnia, nke a na-ewere dị ka ihe pụrụ iche nke Mostar

Ihe ndị a na-etinye na ya gụnyere yabasị, anụ ehi a mịrị amị, osikapa, mmanụ, tomato purée, paprika, vinegar ma ọ bụ mmiri ara ehi, yogọt a na-akpọ (nke a maara n'ógbè ahụ dị ka kiselo mlijeko, nke pụtara 'mmiri ara ehi'), ose ojii, nnu na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Mgbe ewepụchara akpụkpọ yabasị, a na-eji nnukwu, mpụga, akwa (akwụkwọ) nke bulbs yabasị dị ka akpa, nke a na-akpọ 'shirts' (Old Turk
'dolama(n) maka ụdị uwe Ottoman pụrụ iche) [citation needed] maka itinye anụ
A na-ejikwa akụkụ fọdụrụnụ nke yabasị, gwakọta ya na anụ ma sie ya na mmanụ maka nkeji ole na ole, iji nweta ntọala nke ihe ahụ
Iji wepụ 'ùwé' dị iche iche, a na-ebipụ bulbs niile n'elu wee sie ya ruo mgbe ọ dị nro iji wepụ ya, okpukpu site na okpukpu
Iji gbochie ịdị nro na ịda mbà, a ga-eme ka bulbs dị ọcha
A na-ewepụ 'shirts' site na bulbs site na nrụgide mkpịsị aka dị nwayọ na nke dị nro
A na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ sie 'shirts' ('dolme') jupụtara na broth
Ọnọdụ mmiri kwesịrị ezu iji kpuchie dolmas kpamkpam
A na-ejikarị yogọt siri ike eme Sogan-dolma
Enginar dolması bụ obi artichoke zuru oke
Enwere ike itinye ha osikapa ma ọ bụ anụ a gwakọtara agwakọta nke e siri n'ime tomato sauce na ose aleppo
Enwere ike iji mgbọrọgwụ Celery dochie anya artichoke
Otu mpaghara pụrụ iche sitere na Mardin bụ efere dolma agwakọta
A na-ebu ụzọ jiri okpokoro yabasị, akwụkwọ osisi vaịn, na cabbage kpuchie osikapa na-atọ ụtọ nke a na-etinye na sumac na Urfa
A na-eji osikapa fọdụrụ na ya emeju osisi ákwà, zucchini, na ihe na-eme ka ose jupụta

Dalak dolması, nke a na-ewere n'ọtụtụ ebe dị ka nri dị ụtọ nke sitere na Armenia, bụ spleen jupụtara na osikapa nke ejirila allspice, nnu, ose, mint, parsley na yabasị mee ka ọ dị ụtọ

Dolphin Estate bụ obodo nwere ọnụ ụzọ na Ikoyi, Lagos, Naijiria
Dolphin Estate bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị mbụ Ikoyi
nke Messrs HFP Engineering Nigeria wuru na afọ 1990 maka Lagos State Development and Property Corporation, LSDPC
Nke a bụ mmezu nke nzọụkwụ 1, nke gụnyere iwu nke 646 nkeji
Nzọụkwụ nke abụọ nke ọrụ ahụ, nke Messrs HFP mepụtara, gụnyere iwu otu narị na iri anọ na ise na asatọ
Nzọụkwụ nke atọ gbakwunyere ụlọ elu dị elu na blọk asatọ nke Estate, na mbụ iji mee ka ndị ọrụ owuwu ahụ chụpụ
Ọ bụ ala ebe e gburu Funsho Williams, onye a ma ama na PDP Lagos na-achọ ịbụ gọvanọ, na 26 Junn, na afọ 2006 na ebe obibi ya na Corporation Drive
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, e jidere mmadụ iri anọ na ise a na-enyo enyo na Boko Haram mgbe ha kpara nkata ịwakpo ala ahụ, mana e mechara chọpụta na ọ bụ mgbawa gas

N'ọnwa Julaị, na afọ 2017, gọmentị gwara ndị niile nwe ụlọ ndị e wuru n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị n'elu netwọk mmiri ka ha hapụ ụlọ ha ma kwaga ebe ọzọ, na-ata ọnụnọ ha ụta maka idei mmiri na-eme ugboro ugboro n'ógbè ahụ, ma tinye aka na nkwa mbibi nke ụlọ ndị iwu na-ekwadoghị na otu ọnwa ahụ
Na Septemba, na afọ 2018, nnukwu idei mmiri dakwasịrị Dolphin Estate, na ọzọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2019
Usoro mmiri ahụ enweghị ike ịtọhapụ mmiri niile e jidere n'oké osimiri n'otu oge, na-eme ka ọ nọrọ n'ógbè Ikoyi ma rịa elu

Hubert van Zeller (1905 - 11 Mee 1984) bụ onye edemede Benedictine, onye na-ese ihe, na (n'okpuru aha Nwanna Choleric) onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara nke ọma maka ide banyere ahụhụ mmadụ site n'echiche Katọlik
A mụrụ ya n'Ijipt na 1905, van Zeller banyere na Benedictine novitiate mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
N'otu oge, ọ hapụrụ ndị Benedictines ka ọ sonye n'ebe obibi ndị mọnk Carthusian, na-enwe olileanya ịnwale nghọta miri emi na nke siri ike nke okwukwe ya
O mechara laghachi na Benedictines
Ọ mesịrị biri na Downside Abbey n'oge ndụ ndị mọnk ya
Dom Hubert biri na StWalburga's na Colorado, USA na mgbe ahụ Little Sisters of the Poor ụlọ na Denver, Colorado na 1970s-1983
Onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe, a pụrụ ịhụ ọrụ van Zeller na chọọchị dị iche iche na Britain na United States

Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya edere na-elekwasị anya na nzaghachi maka nhụjuanya, nke gụnyere nhụjuaka Azịza Katọlik na Ihe Omimi nke nhụjua; na-arịa ọrịa maka ọtụtụ n'ime ndụ ya, ọ nọgidere na-enwe nchekwube n'ụwa
Nwoke na-anụ ọkụ n'obi nke ukwuu, naanị ihe onwunwe ya n'oge ndụ ndị mọnk ya bụ brọsh ezé na ígwè typewriter
N'okpuru aha Nwanna Choleric, o mepụtara usoro akwụkwọ eserese banyere ndụ ndị nọn na ndị mọnk, malite na Cracks in the Cloister (1954, Sheed & Ward, New York)

Ọ na-eche echiche nke ọdịda ihu

Onye siri ike n'ụdị olileanya a na-ele ihe niile na-abịa na njehie na nnukwu ọdịda dị ka ohere nke a na-apughi ichefu

Site na The Mystery of Suffering 'A na-egosi anyị echiche Ndị Kraịst n'ogige Getsemane Onyenwe anyị na-arịọ ka ahụhụ gafere ya, ebe n'otu oge ahụ na-adị njikere iburu ya ma ọ bụrụ na nke a bụ uche Nna
Site na The Mystery of Suffering 'Ndị nsọ na-agba ọsọ dị ka ndị ọzọ mgbe obe na-abịa, mana ha anaghị ekwe ka ịgba ọsọ ha mebie echiche ha

'Ihe niile m nwere ike ikwu bụ na ọ bụrụ na enwere m ahụike ndụ m niile agaghị m ekpe ekpere [nke ọma] ma ọ bụ tinye onwe m n'aka Chineke; ọ bụrụ na m na-ele anya nke ọma, agaghị m agbanahụ ọnọdụ ndị enyi m mara mma tinyere onwe ha
Mgbe ọ na-ekwurịta okwu maka egwu ndị mmadụ na Ronald Knox na-atụ maka ọnwụ 'Onye na-arapara n'ahụ, enweghị m ike iche ihe kpatara ya

Domari bụ asụsụ Indo-Aryan nke nọ n'ihe ize ndụ, nke ndị Dom gbasasịrị na Middle East na North Africa na-asụ

A na-akọ na a na-asụ asụsụ a ruo n'ebe ugwu ruo Azerbaijan na na ndịda ruo etiti Sudan, na Turkey, Iran, Iraq, Palestine, Israel, Jordan, Egypt, Sudan, Libya, Tunisia, Algeria, Morocco, Syria na Lebanon
Dabere na usoro nke mgbanwe ụda, a maara nke ọma na aha Domari na Romani sitere na okwu Indo-Aryan ḍom

Dombolo, (nke a makwara dị ka umbhako, ujeqe, dipapata na Setswana na rostile na Xhosa), bụ achịcha a na-esi ísì ụtọ na South Afrika
Ọ bụ nri a ma ama n'ọtụtụ ụlọ na mba South Afrịka
A na-akwadebe achịcha ahụ n'ime ite dị n'ime mmiri na-esi ísì
Ọ dị iche na dumpling ọdịnala n'ihi na a na-akwadebe ya site na iji ihe iko achịcha kama ime achịcha
E nwere ụdị dị iche iche nke nri ahụ gburugburu obodo South Afrika
N'omenala ndị Zulu, a na-esi dombolo n'elu stew kama n'onwe ya n'ime ite dị iche
A maara ụdị achịcha a na-esi ísì ụtọ n'etiti ndị Zulu dị ka uJeqe
A na-eri Dombolo na ụdị nri dị iche iche dị ka nri ọkụkọ, anụ ehi, anụ ehi ehi, anụ nwa atụrụ, ma ọ bụ eriri afọ

Domiati cheese, nke a na-akpọkwazi cheese ọcha (Egyptian Arabic جبنة بيضا gebna bēḍa Egyptian Arabic pronunciation ), bụ cheese na-acha ọcha nke a na emekari n’ obodo Egypt, kamakwa na Sudan ya na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Etiti Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Ụwa
A na-ejikarị mmiri ara ehi, mmiri oke ara ehi maọbụ ngwakọta eme ya, a pụkwara iji mmiri ara ehi ndị ọzọ, dịka atụrụ, ewu maọbụ mmiri ara kamel were mee ya
Ọ bụ cheese ndị Ijipt a na-ahụkarị
N'adịghị ka feta na cheese ndị ọzọ na-acha ọcha, a na-agbakwunye nnu ozugbo na mmiri ara ehi, tupu agbakwunye rennet
A na-akpọ ya aha obodo ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Obodo Damietta (دمياط)
Domingo López Torres (1910-1937) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye edemede, na onye na-ede uri na Canary
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ dara ogbenye na Santa Cruz de Tenerife
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-amụta onwe ya ma kwenyesie ike na ụkpụrụ Marxist, na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu na mmepe nke ọgụgụ isi mgbanwe na Canary Islands
O bipụtara isiokwu ndị na-akpali akpali n'akwụkwọ ọrụ dị iche iche, dị ka La Tarde na Gaceta del Arte
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide ya jikọtara Surrealism na Marxism
N'afọ 1930, o guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ ọdịbendị, echiche, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Cartones
N'afọ 1935, ọ meghere ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na-ere ụtaba, nke ghọrọ ebe nzukọ maka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị otu edemede Canary
Mgbe Agha Obodo Spain malitere, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ e jidere
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ogige ịta ahụhụ Nationalist n'afọ 1937

Dominic Benhura (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ Benhura na Murewa, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Harare
Nna ya nwụrụ tupu a mụọ ya, ọ bụ nne ya zụlitere ya
Ebe ọ bụ ezigbo nwa akwụkwọ, a tụrụ aro ka e ziga ya Salisbury maka ọmụmụ ihe ọzọ
Nwanne nna ya nwere ụlọ na mpaghara Tafara, Benhura wee gaa biri ebe ahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri; ya na nwa nwanne nna ya Tapfuma Gutsa bi, onye a ma ama na-akpụ ihe
Benhura malitere ịcha ihe ọkpụkpụ nwa nwanne nna ya, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ malitere ịkpụ ihe n'onwe ya, na-eme obere ihe tupu ọ banye na nnukwu nkume
O rere ibe mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla, Benhura tụgharịrị ịkpụ ihe oge niile mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, na-egosi ọrụ ya na Chapungu Sculpture Park na nke mbụ ya na 1987
Ọ sonyeere ememe ndị na-ese ihe n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 1990, nọrọ ruo mgbe ọ nwetara ụlọ na Athlone, Harare, n'afọ 1995
Site na mmemme ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nnukwu ihe; ọ malitekwara njem n'oge a, na-aga ọmụmụ ihe na Botswana, United States, Belgium, Netherlands, Denmark, na Germany
Ọ malitere itinye ọla na ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume ya
A na-ewere Benhura dị ka akụkụ nke ọgbọ nke abụọ nke ndị Zimbabwe na-akpụ nkume
N'afọ 2016, ọ kpụrụ ihe oyiyi nke Robert Mugabe
Dominic Kanaventi bụ onye ama ama na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme egwuregwu na Zimbabwe
Ọ pụtara na Shamwari n'afọ 1982, Mandela, Cry Freedom n'afọ 1987 na The Midday Sun n'afọ 1989
O nwere ọrụ dị mkpa na Neria, nke e wepụtara n'afọ 1993 na Salone, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 2016
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Zimbabwe Actors Guild (ZAG)
Kanaventi malitere dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ ndị mbụ ọ bụ onye otu ihe nkiri nke Katọlik kwadoro, Mabvuku Youth Center
Na ihe nkiri, o nwere akụkụ na Shamwari na Cry Freedom, ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ n'afọ ndi 1980
N'afọ 1992, o nwere ọrụ dị mkpa na Neria, n'afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmepụta iri na anọ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1997, Kanaventi bụ onye isi oche nke ZAG, nke bụ Zimbabwe Actors Guild
Ọ na-ekwu okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ banyere mmegbu nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Zimbabwe na ọdịiche dị n'etiti ha na ndị ibe ha ndị ọzọ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Alan Tempest maka The Standard, o kwuru na ọ nwere ruo ọnwa Jenụwarị 2002 tupu a kpọọ ya onye na-enweghị ala
O doro anya na nke a mere mgbe a mụrụ nna Kanaventis na Mozambique
Ọ gara Salisbury dịka a na-akpọ ya n'oge ahụ, wee lụọ nne ya
A mụrụ Kanaventi n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1950
N'ihi enweghị ala ya, ọ kwagara United States n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2002
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere oche na onye na-azụ ụgbọ ala ma na-aga n'ihu ghọọ nwa amaala US n'afọ 2009
Ọ ghọkwara nwa akwụkwọ ma n'ọnwa Disemba 2014, ọ gụsịrị BS
ya na Marketing Management
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ
Dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ya na Walter Muparutsa nwetara 1983 Best Actor Award maka ọrụ ha na mmepụta Andrew Whaley, Platform Four
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere ịrụkọ ọrụ na Ben Sibenke maka egwuregwu afọ 1985

Maka egwuregwu afọ 1997 Platform Five, nke bụ egwuregwu banyere ndị na-agagharị agagharị na ụwa ha na Harare gburugburu ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ahụ, Kanaventi na Walter Muparutsa yi uwe dị ka ndị na-agbagharị agagharị wee banye n'ógbè ahụ wee soro ndị nọ ebe ahụ kwurịta okwu iji nweta mmetụta nke ihe ndụ ha bụ
Ọ pụtara na The Midday Sun nke e wepụtara n'afọ 1989 na The Power of One nke e weputara n'afọ 1992
Na Neria, Kanaveti mere Phineas, nwanne di ya nwere anyaukwu na obi ọjọọ, onye mgbe nwanne ya nwoke nwụsịrị, mere ka nwanyị di ya nwụrụ taa ahụhụ
E kwuru na arụmọrụ ya na The Standard
Dominika (Asụsụ France Dominique) ézíbóté áhà ya bu Àkù-ñkịtị nke Dominika, bu òbòdò àgwè na Ògbu miri Karibbean
Na odida olilé anyanwu ya bu Guadeloupe, na owuwa nleda anyanwu ya bu Martinik
Ívụ bu mgbárí kilometers 754 na ébé kárírí na élú àlà ya bu Morne Diablotins nwéré ogologo rúrú meters 1,447
Ha sị Àkù-ñkịtị nke Dominika wèrè madu ruru 73,897 (2017)
Ishiochie ya bu Roseau
Há gùrù Dominika 'Nature Isle of the Caribbean' (nwa Àlà na mmiri nke Karibbean) maka àlà ha si é mésoghị
O bu àlà na mmiri nke kárírí bu nwátà na ébé ha na kpo Antilles Ntạ maka àlà katu náa kéwári e kéwárí na álá ókú àlà, o zịrị na àlà maka ó nwèrè mmiri nkechi ókú
Obodo na mmiri nkeá nwèrè óhiá ugwu ukwu di ndù ndù, búrú úlọ akwukwo ndù, anumanu, na anú élú di ntakírí na uwà
Ámá nke énweghi mmiri na ifufe di na odida anyanwu mmiri, mànà ézù di na etíti àlà nke
Nnùnù omeka Sisserou (madu mara ya ka Mpaghara Amazon), nnùnù àla nka, bu ihe nor na okoloto obodo nke
Àkù Dominika lìlì na ndi madu na báta maka nlénle na ikú ubi
Christopher Columbus gùrù àlà mmiri nke shí ubochi o hùrù ya, Sundai (Dominica na asụsụ Latin), Önwa iri na otụ 3, 1493
Na afọ nari shí mgbe Columbus bàrà, Dominika nòrò onwé ya na ndi Carib nòrò nga mgbe ndi Europe kúfùrù ha na obodo mmiri gbara Dominika gburu gbúrù
France mèchàrà nweré áká Dominika nyé Njikota Ochíchìézè na 1763
Njikota Ochíchìézè mecha tinyé ochíchì na kú Dominika ímé mpaghara ya na 1805
Inyeonwé maka ohu Afrika mèrè ébé níle na Mpaghara Britain na 1834, na 1838, Dominika búzọr búrú àlà nke ndi ojie né tinyé ónú na ákíkó obodo
Na 1896, Njikotak Ochíchìézè byàrà ozór I chí Dominika, mé ya ka o bu nkeji mpaghara ézè nwanyị
Na ọkara afọ ochie gárá, shí 1958 rüó 1962, Dominika buzị nkeji obodo di ndu ogẹ-ntạ ha kporo Federation Odida Indies
Na 1978, Dominika nwèrèzi onwé yá

Dominika Lasota (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Poland na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi nke ihu igwe bụ onye na-ahazi ọrụ na Fridays For Future movement
Ọ so na ndị guzobere Kansụl Ndụmọdụ, nke e guzobere n'ihi ngagharị iwe ndị Poland n'October 2020
A mụrụ Lasota na 26 Nọvemba 2001
Ọ gara Stonyhurst College na England ruo afọ abụọ n'ihe dị ka 2018 - 2019 wee sonye n'ogige ndị ntorobịa na United States

Lasota bụ onye na-eme ngagharị iwe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mkpọsa maka iwu ihu igwe Europe na maka mgbanwe ziri ezi, mgbanwe akụ na ụba na akụ na ụba ahịhịa ndụ nke na-echebe ndị ọrụ

Na 15 Jụn 2020, Lasota bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-eme ihe na-eme n'ihu Chancellery nke Praịm Minista nke Poland iji nye gọọmentị Poland nsogbu maka nsogbu ihu igwe na nzukọ Kansụl Europe nke 19 Jụn 2020
Lasota kwuru na ebe ọ bụ na a gere ndụmọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị n'oge ọrịa COVID-19, a ga-ege ntị na ndụmọdụ ndị ọkà n'ihe gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe (IPCC) Assessment na akụkọ pụrụ iche
Lasota katọrọ ọdịda nke ndị ọrụ Praịm Minista itinye aka na mwakpo a wakporo onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe
Mwakpo ahụ mere n'oge nzukọ dị n'etiti ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọha na eze na Bydgoszcz na 26 Jụn n'ihe gbasara ntuli aka onye isi ala Poland nke afọ 2020
Ọtụtụ 'ndị okenye' wakporo onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe bụ Malwina Chmara, 'naanị mita 152 site na Praịm Minista', dị ka Lasota si kwuo
Lasota kwuru na 'ọ dịghị ihe e mere iji kwụsị mwakpo ahụ'

Lasota na Chmara kwuru na ha aghọtaghị ihe kpatara mwakpo ime ihe ike ahụ, ha chọpụtakwara na ọ bụ ihe na-ewute na ma praịm minista ma ọ bụ ọfịs onye isi ala rịọrọ mgbaghara maka enweghị ike itinye aka

Na ngagharị iwe nke August 2020 n'ihu Ministry for State Assets, nke Minista Jacek Sasin duziri, Lasota kwuru na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị wepụrụ ndị nkịtị na mkpebi gbasara nsogbu ihu igwe, kama ịkwado ndị Poland na-akwado ndị na-ahụ maka coal
Na ngagharị iwe na Bydgoszcz na Septemba 2020, o kwuru na nsogbu ihu igwe metụtara ndị mmadụ n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma ebe ọ bụ na ndị ogbenye enweghị ike ichebe ụlọ ha pụọ na ajọ ifufe na idei mmiri
O kwuru na mmetụta nke nsogbu ihu igwe a na-enwe na Poland gụnyere ọkụ ọhịa nke Eprel 2020 na Ogige Ntụrụndụ Biebrza na ọnwụ ndị ọrụ ugbo nke ụkọ mmiri ozuzo kpatara
Lasota kwuru na ya na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ihu igwe bu n'obi 'ịgba praịm minista Poland aka maka mgbanwe ziri ezi' n'ihe gbasara okpomọkụ ụwa

A họpụtara Lasota dị ka otu n'ime ndị guzobere ndị otu ndụmọdụ nke e guzobere na 1 Nọvemba 2020 n'ihe gbasara ngagharị iwe ndị Poland n'Ọktoba 2020, dị ka njikọ aka na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe

Dominique Lynn Duncan (amụrụ na 7 Mee 1990) bụ onye America-Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ nke ruru eru ịsọ mpi maka obodo ya Nigeria mgbe ọ gbanwere nkwado site na United States of America na 2014

Dominique bụ onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ mba na Afrịka mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ọla edo n'akụkụ Blessing Okagbare, Regina George na Christy Udoh na ihe omume relay nke ụmụ nwanyị 4 × 200 mita na 2015 IAAF World Relays na Nassau, Bahamas

Na 12 June 2009, Dominique n'akụkụ Khrystal Carter, Porscha Lucas na Gabby Mayo mebiri ndekọ NCAA Women's Division I Outdoor Track and Field Championships na ihe omume 4 × 100 mita mgbe ọ gbasịrị 4236s tupu ọ gaa n'ihu merie ọla edo na 4 × 100 metres relay ihe omume ṅa 2010 NCAA Division I Out Door Track and Field Championship
N'afọ 2012, Dominique kwuru na ọ bụ ọla nchara na omume mita 200 na 2012 NCAA Division I Outdoor Track and Field Championships
Mgbe ọ gbanwere nkwado na Naijirịa, Dominique sonyere na 2014 African Championships in Athletics na-azọrọ ọla nchara na ọla edo na mita 200 na 4 × 100 mita relay events n'otu n'otu
Ya na Blessing Okagbare, Regina George na Christy Udoh meriri ọla edo ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ mba ọhụrụ nke 1 3052s na 4 × 200 mita relay ihe omume na 2015 IAAF World Relays na Nassau, Bahamas
Dominique Kouas (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ onye Benin na-ese ihe Vodou
Ọrụ ya nwere mmetụta siri ike site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe ọdịnala Africa a na-amaghị aha ha site na senchiri ndị gara aga
A maara ya maka nnukwu ọrụ ya sitere na ígwè, nke a na-egosi na International Festival of Vodun Arts and Cultures na Ouidah, mana ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Porto Novo
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ ihe a tụrụ atụ nke 'Mami Wata nwere isi atọ, ụkwụ atọ, aka atọ'
Onye ọzọ bụ nke 'na-egosi ọtụtụ ihu na-ebu Fon (abụọ na ntì ọ bụla, ụlọ nsọ, na ihu) na Yoruba (atọ na ntì nke ọ bụla) akara na-egosi ndị otu agbụrụ ha'
Ụlọ ngosi Ọktoba dị na London nwekwara nka ya
A na-ewere ọrụ onye omenkà ahụ rụzuru na 1980s na 1990s ugbu a dị ka otu n'ime ihe osise Beninoise kachasị emetụta oge a
Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta Jordan National Gallery of Fine Arts
Domoraud bụ aha nna West Africa
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Don Coscarelli Jr
(a mụrụ n'abalị 17 nke ọnwa Febụwarị, afọ 1954) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri America, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya n'aka ndị Itali bi na Libya, a maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri egwu
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere usoro Phantasm, The Beastmaster, na Bubba Ho-Tep
A mụrụ Coscarelli n'aka ndị Itali bi na Libya ma zụlite ya na Southern California
Ọ bụ ezie na ezinụlọ ya enweghị njikọ na azụmahịa ihe nkiri, ọ nwere mmasị na igwefoto na ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị obere

Ogologo oge tupu ya eruo ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi, nke e mere site n'enyemaka nke ndị enyi agbata obi n'obodo ya bụ Long Beach, California, na-enweta ihe nrite na telivishọn
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 19, Coscarelli ghọrọ onye nduzi kachasị nta nwere ihe nkiri nke nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-ekesa mgbe ọ rere ihe nkiri ya nke onwe ya Jim the World's Greatest, na Universal Pictures
Jim the World's Greatest bụ nhọrọ gọọmentị nke USA Film Festival
A maara Coscarelli nke ọma maka Phantasm, na ihe ndị ọzọ sochiri ya
Phantasm mbụ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma zuru ụwa ọnụ ma merie Special Jury Prize na Festival du Cinema Fantastique na Avoriaz, France
Coscarelli sokwa dee (ya na Paul Pepperman) ma duzie The Beastmaster, nke Entertainment Weekly kọwara dịka 'onye na-ege ntị kachasị amasị'
The Beastmaster emeela ihe abụọ na usoro telivishọn
Coscarelli bụ onye natara Bram Stoker Award maka Best Screenplay maka ihe nkiri ya Bubba Ho-Tep, nke ọ nyekwara ntụziaka
Dabere na akụkọ dị mkpirikpi nke Joe R
Lansdale, Bubba Ho-Tep kpakpando Bruce Campbell, Ossie Davis, na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ Coscarelli ugboro ugboro Reggie Bannister

Na mgbakwunye na ịbụ ihe dị egwu, Bubba Ho-Tep bụkwa onye ọkacha mmasị na mmemme, na-egwu mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa dịka Toronto International Film Festival, SXSW, Florida Film Festival, Brussels International Festival of Fantasy Films, na Hong Kong International Film festival
Na HBO's US Comedy Arts Festival, Coscarelli bụ onye natara Best Screenplay Award
Na Montreal's FantAsia Festival, Bubba Ho-Tep bụ onye natara onyinye Best International Film
Coscarelli nyekwara ntụziaka nke ihe omume izizi nke usoro ihe nkiri American TV Masters of Horror, nke akpọrọ 'Incident On and Off a Mountain Road' ma soro Stephen Romano dee ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2008, Coscarelli zụrụ ikike ihe nkiri maka akwụkwọ akụkọ egwu na usoro ịntanetị John Dies at the End nke David Wong
E mechara ihe nkiri ahụ n'afọ 2011, wepụtakwara ya n'afọ 2013
N'afọ 2018, o bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ya, True Indie Life and Death in Filmmaking
Coscarelli na nwunye ya, onye na-emepụta ejiji Shelley Kay na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro
Nwa ya nwanyị bụ onye na-eme ihe nrite vegan bụ Chloe Coscarelli

Donald Davis (Ọnwa Ọktoba n'ubochí iri abụọ n'ise, n'afọ 1938 rụọ úbọchị nke ịse n'ọnwa June, n'afọ2014) bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-egwu egwu nke jikọtara ọrụ egwu na otu na ụlọ akụ
A mụrụ ya na Detroit, ọ bịdọrọ ịkpọ egwu n'etiti afọ 1950 ma ógè ọ hapụsịrị Central High School, o guzobere otu jazz ya, Don Davis Trio, tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-eti egwu
Ọ na-akpọ guitar banyere ọtụtụ akara ndekọ Detroit, gụnyere Golden World na Ric-Tic, yana na ndekọ Motown mbụ dịka egwu, 'Money (That's What I Want)' nke Barrett Strong na Mary Wells 'Bye Bye Baby'
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede ma na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na Detroit wee sonye na Stax Records na Memphis, na-ezube inweta njikọta nke ụda Stax na Motown

O nwetara nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma izizi ya dị ka onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe n'afọ 1968 na egwu Johnnie Taylor 'Who's Making Love', nke ruru no1 na chaatị Billboard Hot R&B Singles na nọmba ise na Hot 100
Davis na-akpọkwa guitar na egwu ahụ, ya na Steve Cropper
Ya na Taylor rụkọrọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ egwu ya n'afọ ndị 1970, gụnyere egwu R&B no1 nke 1971 'Jody's Got Your Girl and Gone', nke Davis so dee
Mgbe e mesịrị, na 1976, o dekwara ma mepụta 'Disco Lady' nke Taylor, nke nọrọ izu anọ na no1 na Billboard Hot 100 na izu isii na chaatị R&B na US
Ọ bụ egwu mbụ RIAA kwadoro platinum

N'afọ 1975, Davis bịdọrọ ma duzie akara ndekọ nke RCA na-ekesa na Detroit, Tortoise International nke gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe, First Fire, The Rockets, abọm nlọghachi nke afọ 1978 nke The Skyliners, yana afọ 1978 Dan Schafer version nke 1960s re-make 'Baby Now That I've Found You' nke ewepụtara ọzọ na 2012 na CD Maybethe Very Best of Dan Schafer N'afọ 1977, Davis mepụtara Billy Davis, Jr
na Marilyn McCoo kụrụ, 'You Don't Have to Be a Star (To Be in My Show)'
O bi na West Bloomfield Township, n'ebe ugwu nke Detroit, ma nwụọ ógè ọ rịachara obere ọrịa n'ọnwa June n'afọ 2014, ọ dị afọ 75
O nwere nwunye na ụmụ atọ
Don Hogan Charles (amụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba 9, nke afọ 1938 - rụọ ọnwa Desemba 15, afọ 2017) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ese foto nke The New York Times were n'ọrụ
N'ime afọ iri anọ ọ nọrọ n'ebe ahụ, Charles sere foto ndị ama ama gụnyere Coretta Scott King, John Lennon, Malcolm X na Muhammad Ali
A mụrụ Charles 'Daniel James Charles' na New York City n'ọnwa Septemba 9, afọ 1938, nye James Charles na Elizabeth Ann Hogan
Ọ gara George Washington High School na Manhattan wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ injinia na City College nke New York tupu ọ kwụsị iji chụsoo foto
N'afọ 1964, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị City College, Charles sonyeere The New York Times ma nọrọ ebe ahụ afọ iri anọ na atọ, ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2007
Tupu ọ banye na The Times, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya
Ọrụ onwe onye nke Charles pụtara na nnukwu akwụkwọ mba ụwa dịka Der Spiegel na Paris Match
Ndị ahịa azụmahịa ya gụnyere Bill Blass, Oscar de la Renta na Pan American World Airways
Ọrụ Charles dị na nchịkọta nke MOMA na National Museum of African American History and Culture
Otu n'ime foto ndị a ma ama nke Charles sere bụ otu onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ bụ Malcolm X na-ejide M1 carbine mgbe ọ na-elepụ anya na windo
Foto ahụ, nke Charles weere maka Ebony, ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya nke mkpebi siri ike nke Malcolm X iji chebe ezinụlọ ya 'n'ụzọ ọ bụla dị mkpa'
Don Leonard (1925-2002) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba South Africa
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri iri n'agbata afọ 1965 na afọ 1979
Don Tate (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na otu n'ọnwaa Disemba, 1963) bụ ónyé edemede America na ónyé na-ese ihe osise nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-eme ihe ike na-akwalite agbụrụ na ọdịbendị na akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Ọ na-ekwu na mgbè ọ bụ nwatakịrị, ọ ga-agụ encyclopedia iji chọpụta ụwa nwere ọdịbendị dị iche iche; dabere na akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke oge ya, ọ 'eche na ụwa bụ ọcha'
O guzobere blọọgụ ndị Africa America na-eto eto The Brown Bookshelf ma na-enyere aka na mkpọsa #WeNeedDiverseBooks iji melite ihe dị iche iche dị na akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Tate malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Say Hey A Song of Willie Mays (Jump at the Sun/Hyperion, 2000), nke Peter Mandel dere
Lee & Low Books bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya dị ka ónyé édémédé, It Jesʹ Happened When Bill Traylor Started to Draw, nke R
Gregory Christie sere, na 2012
Ọ bụ akụkọ ndụ 'na-adọrọ mmasị' nke onye na-ese ihe nkiri ọdịnala Bill Traylor, onye bụbu ohu
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ ònyínyé dịka Lee & Low New Voices Honor Award na Ezra Jack Keats New Writer Honor

A họọrọ ya dị ka Kirkus Best Children Books List Selection, a Booklist Editorsī Choice, 2012, na New York Public Library Top 100 Titles for Reading and Sharing nakwa otu n'ime Bank Street College of Education Best Children's Books of the Year, 2012
Na mgbakwunye na akwụkwọ ụmụaka, Tate na-enyekwa ndị na-emepụta ngwaahịa ikike nka ya
KIDZ bụ akara nke ihe ndina ụmụaka na ihe ịsa ahụ gụnyere akwụkwọ mgbidi, ọkụ ọkụ, ihe osise mgbidi na bọtịnụ drawer
O nwekwara akara akwa / akwa ụmụaka dị na ụlọ ahịa akwa pụrụ iche, nke gosipụtara atụmatụ ya
My Peepz, otu ndị Africa America, na-ere ndị tweeners ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na ahịa kalenda
Tate mepụtara kalenda n'ihi enweghị ndị Africa America na ngwaahịa ndị dị ugbu a
Ya na ezinụlọ ya bi na Austin, Texas
Rodney 'Don Vito' Richard (amụrụ na Julaị 9, 1978) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nke ya na Kandi Burruss rụkọtara ọrụ na ọrụ ndị egosiri na The Real Housewives of Atlanta, gụnyere Kim Zolciak's breakout single 'Tardy for the Party', dị ka ónyé ọka ikpe na The Kandi Factory na-egosi na Bravo, yana dị ka ónyé isi na-emepụta màkà usoro webisode kwa izu nke Kandi Burrusse Kandi Koated Nights
A mụrụ Don Vito na July 9, 1978, na Gary, Indiana na Louis na Juanita Richard
Mgbè ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ mụtara nkà nke DJing ma na-eme na ịgba egwú ụlọ akwụkwọ na oriri na ọṅụṅụ ụlọ
Mgbè a tọhapụrụ ya na Marine Corps, Vito kwagara Atlanta, Georgia
A kọwaara Vito Ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, DJ Cooley C, ónyé nyèrè ya ohere iso ónyé na-ese egwu hip hop, Ghetto Mafia na Kilo rụọ ọrụ
Mgbè e mesịrị, ọ zutere Ian Burke ónyé méré ka ọ mata ónyé na-eti egwu Solé, nke bịanyere aka na RedZone Entertainment
Tricky Stewart bịanyere ya aka na Redzone, na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe dịka Solé, Mýa, na Blu Cantrell
N'ihe na-erughị afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, Don Vito sonyeere otu R&B, Cherish
Donal Fox (amụrụ yá n'ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Julaị, 1952) bụ ónyé America na-ede egwu, onye na-akpọ piano na onye na-eme ihe n'ụzọ na jazz na ụdị ọdịnala
Ọ bụ ónyé Africa-America mbụ na-ede egwu na St
Louis Symphony (1991)
N'afọ 1993, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Mahadum Harvard
Site na 2009-2011, ọ bụ Martin Luther King Jr
Visiting Scholar na Massachusetts Institute of Technology
Donal Fox bụ ónyé Steinway Artist
A na-arụ ọrụ Fox na Carnegie Hall
'Peace Out' bụ nké American Composers Orchestra nyere iwu ma rụọ
Egwú ya, 'Hear De Lambs A-Cryin,' bụ nké ndị Albany Symphony Orchestra méré na Stern Auditorium na 2011
Ọ natara 1997 Guggenheim Fellowship na egwu egwu na 1998 Fellowsship site na Bogliasco Foundation
N'afọ 2008, e nyèrè Fox onyinye American Academy of Arts and Letters Academy Award na Music
Donal Fox bụ nwá mbụ n'ime ụmụnne isii
Nwanne ya nwoke Brian Fox bụ ónyé mmemme kọmputa na ónyé édémédé mbụ nke GNU Bash shell
Donal bụ nwa nwa nke onye na-ese ihe Daniel Fox, ónyé mepụtara Monopoly Man

Donald Gray (onye a mụrụ Eldred Owermann Tidbury, 3 Machị 1914 -7 Eprel 1978) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri British TV Mark Saber, maka inye olu Colonel White, Captain Black na Mysterons na Captain Scarlet na Mysteron, yana maka ịbụ ihe mere Donald Marshall Gray ji gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Charles Gray mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Ikekwe ọ bụghị na mberede, na ụfọdụ mgbasa ozi na-agbanwe agbanwe, a na-ekwu na ezigbo aha Colonel White bụ Charles Grey
A mụrụ Gray n'ugbo nnụnụ na Cape Province, South Africa

N'afọ 1933, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Paramount Pictures chọrọ ime ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ma mee ka ndị na-arụ ọrụ nkwekọrịta ya dị iche iche, wee malite asọmpi a maara dịka 'Nchọgharị maka Ịma Mma'; okpomọkụ mere na mba dị iche iche n'ụwa ndị na-asụ Bekee
Eldred Tidbury banyere n'obodo ya bụ South Africa ma họrọ ya na Lucille du Toit, onye nọọsụ ezé si Pretoria, dịka otu n'ime ndị mmeri
Colin Tapley, onye ga-emesị pụta n'ihu Gray na usoro TV Mark Saber, bụ onye mmeri nwoke nke New Zealand
N'ozuzu, e nwere ndị ikpeazụ 30 n'ụwa niile, bụ ndị a nwalere n'ime izu isii na ngwụcha afọ 1933
N'ime nkwekọrịta ndị ọkpụkpọ 30, e nyere 10, a họpụtakwara Tidbury dịka onye mmeri nwoke n'ozuzu ya na ego nke US $ 1,000, nke o ji zụta ụgbọ ala
Onye mmeri nwanyị ahụ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Scotland bụ Gwenllian Gill, onye mechara soro Tidbury gaa Britain wee kwere ya nkwa ọlụlụ; Otú ọ dị, a kwụsịrị nkwa ọlụ ha n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ

Na mbụ ọ jụrụ ije ozi agha n'ihi ọnyá duodenal, Gray mechara banye na Gordon Highlanders, ndị nwere ogige ha na Aberdeen, ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịghọ ihe ọ kpọrọ 'Jock nkịtị' (n'ịbụ onye kwuru na ọ bụ ndị nna nna Scotland)
N'afọ 1941, e nyere ya ọrụ n'ime ndị na-ahụ maka ókèala Scotland nke Eze, ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na Llanberis na North Wales
Gray hapụrụ ndị agha n'oge na-adịghị anya iji soro Dame Vera Lynn pụta na ihe nkiri We'll Meet Again (1943)
N'afọ 1944, bọmbụ ndị Germany na-alụso tank ọgụ merụrụ ya ahụ na Caen, France, e bepụkwara aka ekpe ya
Gray wee pụta dịka onye nchọpụta nwere otu aka Mark Saber na usoro ihe nkiri British TV nke otu aha ahụ, nke gbara ihe omume 156 site n'afọ 1955 ruo 1961
A na-akpọ ya Mark Saber, ma ọ bụ The Vise na United States, mana e mechara mara ya dịka Saber of London na Detective's Diary
N'afọ 1957, a gbanwere aha The Vise, mezigharịa ya, ma si na ABC nyefee ya na NBC n'okpuru aha ọhụrụ Saber of London
Na-eso Mark Saber, Gray pụtara na ihe omume nke Dixon nke Dock Green na Emmerdale Farm
N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, olu ya, dabere na nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa Basil Rathbone, wetara ya ọrụ na olu, mgbasa ozi na usoro TV Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1978 n'ihi ọrịa obi na South Africa
A na-enyocha akụkọ ndụ Trevor Jordan banyere Gray, Colonel White Meets Mark Saber, maka ntọhapụ n'afọ 2012
Donald Oliver Soper, Baron Soper (31 Jenụwarị 1903 ruo afọ 22 Disemba 1998) bụ onye ụkọchukwu British Methodist, onye Socialist na onye na-ahụ maka udo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Metọdist n'afọ 1953 ruo 54
Mgbe ọnwa Mee 1965 gasịrị, ọ bụ onye ọgbọ na House of Lords
Mkpúrù èdè íke
Donald John Trump (onye a mụrụ na Juun 14, 1946) bụ onye isi ala nke iri anọ na anọ nke United States, site na Jenụwarị 20, 2017 ruo Jenụwarị 20, 2021
Tupu ya abanye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye telivishọn
A mụrụ Trump na obodo Nú Yọk na mpaghara Queens
Ọ gara Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania ebe ọ gụrụ Economics
Onye ahia nke ọgbọ atọ, Trump sooro nzọụkwụ nke nne nne ya bụ Elizabet na nna ya Fred na-elekọta azụmahịa ezinụlọ ha
Ọ mere nke ahụ site n'afọ 1971 wee ruo mgbe ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche na Jenụwarị 2017, mgbe o tinyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'aka ụmụ ya ndi nwoke bụ Donald Jr ya na Eric
Ọrụ azụmahịa Trump bụ ihe gbasara i rụ ma ọ bụ I rụghari ụlọ ọrụ ọfịs, ụlọ nkwari akụ, ụlọ ịgba chaa chaa, na golf
Ọ jiri aha ya wee bido ihe ndi uzo di iche iche
Trump edeela ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Art of Deal, ma na-emepụta na kwado ihe ngosi telivishọn bụ The Apprentice nke nọgoro afọ iri na abụọ
Trump bụ nwoke 544 kasị baa ọgaranya n'ụwa ka ọ na - erule afọ 2017, nke nwere atụmatụ akụnụba nke ijeri $ 35
Ọ meriri Hillary Clinton na nhoputa ndi presidenti nke afo 2016
Doneeka Danyell Lewis, née Hodges (amụrụ na Julaị 19, 1982), bụ onye Amerika Bulgaria ọkachamara basketball na egwuri egwu ugbu a maka Olympiacos na Gris
N'ịbụ onye nche nke afọ na 5-9, e debara aha ya na nke iri abụọ na ise n'ozuzu na 2004 WNBA Draft maka Los Angeles Sparks, site na LSU
Ọ bụ ejima Roneeka Hodges
Ọ lụrụ Gentry Lewis noge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2004
Nọrụ kọleji ya, o nwetara akara 1,484, ma nweta 418 nlọghachi azụ
Ọ nọ nọnọdụ nke iri na otu na ndepụta akara ụlọ akwụkwọ niile
Nafọ 2002 na 2004, ọ nwetara ndị otu nke abụọ Ha niile SEC nsọpụrụ
Ebe e si nweta yaÀtụ NBA player statistics legend
Nime oge anọ, o nwetara akara 362, ma nweta 113 rebounds, 165 na enyere aka, 43 steals, na 13ihe mgbochi
O nwetara akara 17 dị elu, n'oge oge 2005, megide San Antonio Silver Stars
Ọ naegwuri egwu ugbu a maka ndị mmeri Gris bụ Olympiacos (2016-17)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Galatasaray Ogige ahụike nke Turkey nafọ 2010 na 11

Donetsk UK UK / dɒ ˈnjətsk / don - don-, US / də ˈn ( j ) ɛ t sk / də-N (Y)ETSK ; ] Ukrainian [doˈnɛtsʲk] ( , Russian [dɐˈnʲetsk] ), nke a na-akpọbu Aleksandrovka, Yuzivka (ma ọ bụ Hughesovka ), Stalin na Stalino ( leekwa aha ndị ọzọ nke obodo ), bụ obodo mepere emepe na ọwụwa anyanwụ Ukraine nke dị n'akụkụ osimiri Kalmius na mpaghara Donetsk na esemokwu
Mgbe mba ụwa ghọtara dị ka na Ukraine, obodo bụ n'okpuru de facto ochichi nke Donetsk People's Republic, nke na-azọrọ na ya dị ka isi obodo
E mere atụmatụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na 905,364 (2021 est) na isi obodo, yana ihe karịrị nde 2 na mpaghara mepere emepe (2011)
Dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Ukraine 2001 si kwuo, Donetsk bụ obodo nke ise nke kachasị na Ukraine
Na nchịkwa, Donetsk abụrụla etiti mpaghara Donetsk, ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ bụ isi obodo na-akwadoghị na obodo kachasị ukwuu nke akụ na ụba na ọdịbendị ka ukwuu Donets Basin ( Donbas ) mpaghara
Donetsk dị n'akụkụ isi obodo ọzọ, Makiivka, yana obodo ndị ọzọ gbara ya gburugburu na-etolite nnukwu obodo mepere emepe na mkpọmkpọ ebe na mpaghara ahụ
Donetsk abụrụla nnukwu ebe akụ na ụba, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na sayensị nke Ukraine nwere nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ dị arọ yana ndị ọrụ nwere nkà
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ụlọ ọrụ dị arọ (nke kachasị mmepụta ígwè, ụlọ ọrụ kemịkalụ, na ngwuputa coal) kpebiri ọnọdụ ebe obibi na-ama aka nke obodo ahụ
N'afọ 2012, otu akụkọ UN depụtara Donetsk n'etiti obodo ndị mmadụ na-ebi ngwa ngwa n'ụwa
Ebe obibi mbụ dị na ndịda nke akụkụ Europe nke Alaeze Ukwu Russia bụ nke mbụ a kpọrọ Aleksandrovka na 1779, n'oge ọchịchị nke Empress Catherine the Great

N'afọ 1869, onye ọchụnta ego Welsh bụ John Hughes tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ nchara na ọtụtụ ebe a na -egwupụta coal na mpaghara ahụ, a na-akpọkwa obodo ahụ Hughesovka ma ọ bụ Yuzovka (Юзовка) n'ihi ọrụ ya ('Yuz' bụ mkpokọta asụsụ Russian nke Hughes )
N'oge Soviet, ụlọ ọrụ ígwè nke obodo ahụ gbasaa
Na 1924, Yuzovka gbanwere aha Stalin
Na 1929 Stalin e renamed Stalino, na 1932 obodo ghọrọ etiti nke Donetsk mpaghara
A kpọgharịrị aha Donetsk (nakwa Donetske, dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ Kharkiv ) na 1961, obodo taa ka bụ ebe etiti maka ngwupụta kol na ụlọ ọrụ nchara
Kamgbe April 2014 Donetsk na gburugburu ya bụ otu n'ime isi saịtị nke ọgụ na-aga n'ihu Donbas War, dị ka pro-Russian separatist agha agha Ukraine agha agha maka ịchịkwa obodo na gburugburu ebe

N'ime agha ahụ niile, obodo Donetsk a na-elekọta ndị agha pro-Russian separatist dị ka etiti nke Donetsk People's Republic (DPR), na mpaghara ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ nke mpaghara Donetsk kewara n'etiti akụkụ abụọ ahụ
Ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa Donetsk ghọrọ ebe mbụ agha ahụ ji ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu afọ na-alụ ọgụ nke butere oke ọnwụ n'etiti ndị nkịtị na mbibi nke mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo
As of July 2021[update], the DPR has full control of the city, with Ukrainian and DPR forces still engaging in combat outside of the city
Otu n'ime ndị mbụ Ngwuputa obodo na ókèala Donetsk bụ Aleksandrovka [ ru ]
Achọpụtara ịdị adị nke Aleksandrovskaya Cossack Sloboda n'ọnọdụ ya na 1779
N'ikpeazụ, Aleksandrovsky coal mine [ ru ] ka e meghere ebe ahụ
E hiwere obodo Donetsk na 1869 mgbe onye ọchụnta ego Welsh bụ John Hughes na-arụ ọrụ nchara na ọtụtụ ogbunigwe na Aleksandrovka
Nkwa nke onye ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jikọtara Aleksandrovka ma kpọọ ebe ahụ Yuzovo, emesịa Yuzovka ( Russian ), mgbe Hughes gasịrị
N'oge mmalite ya, ọ natara ndị si Wales, ọkachasị n'obodo Merthyr Tydfil
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite nke narị afọ nke 20, Yuzovka nwere ihe dị ka mmadụ 50,000, wee nweta ọkwa obodo na 1917
A na-akpọ isi mpaghara Yuzovka English Colony, na mmalite obodo Britain na-egosipụtakwa na nhazi ya na nhazi ya
Mgbe agha obodo Russia dara, Yuzovka bụ akụkụ nke Donetsk-Krivoy Rog Soviet Republic site na nkwupụta nke nnwere onwe na 12 February 1918
Ebisara Republic na 2nd All-Ukrainian Congress of Soviets na 20 Maachị 1918, mgbe e kwupụtara nnwere onwe nke Ukrainian Soviet Republic
Ọ dabara nke ọma, ma mba ụwa ma ọ bụ site na Russian SFSR, ma kagburu ya n'okpuru Nkwekọrịta nke Brest-Litovsk
Na 1924, n'okpuru ọchịchị Soviet, a gbanwere aha obodo ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Stalin
N'afọ ahụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi n'obodo ahụ ruru 63,708, na n'afọ na-esote, 80,085
Na 1929–31 a gbanwere aha obodo ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Stalino
Obodo ahụ enweghị usoro mmiri ọṅụṅụ ruo 1931, mgbe 553 km (344 mi) usoro e tọrọ n'okpuruala
Na July 1933, obodo ahụ ghọrọ ebe nchịkwa nke Donetsian Oblast nke Ukrainian SSR
Na 1933, 12 nke mbụ arụnyere sistemu nsị, na ojiji nke gas malitere n'afọ ọzọ
Ebe ụfọdụ kwuru na a kpọchara obodo ahụ Trotsk n’oge dị mkpirikpi—mgbe Leon Trotsky gasịrị—ruo ọnwa ole na ole ná ngwụsị 1923
Ná mmalite nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ndị bi na Stalino dị 507,000; Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, 175,000
Mwakpo nke ndị Nazi Germany fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ibibi obodo ahụ kpam kpam
Ndị agha German na Ịtali were ya dị ka akụkụ nke Reichskommissariat Ukraine n'etiti 16 Ọktoba 1941 na 5 Septemba 1943
E wughachiri ya n'ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ buru ibu mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị

Na 1945, ụmụ okorobịa na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị dị afọ 17 ruo 35, sitere na obodo Danube Swabian nke Yugoslavia, Hungary na Romania ( Batschka na Banat ), ezigara Russia n'ike dị ka Allied 'nkwụghachi ụgwọ agha', na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ọrụ ohu iji wughachi Stalino na ịrụ ọrụ na ogbunigwe ya
Ọnọdụ ndị ahụ dara nke ukwuu nke na ọtụtụ ndị nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa na erighị ihe na-edozi ahụ

N'oge ebili mmiri nke abụọ nke Nikita Khrushchev nke mbibi na Nọvemba 1961, a kpọgharịrị obodo ahụ Donetsk, aha Osimiri Seversky Donets, nke dị na Don iji mee ka ọ dịpụrụ adịpụ na onye ndu mbụ Joseph Stalin
Na 1965, na Donetsk Academy nke Sciences e guzobere dị ka akụkụ nke Academy nke Sciences nke Ukraine SSR
Mgbe ọ nwesịrị oge siri ike na 1990s, mgbe ọ bụ ebe etiti agha ndị otu maka ịchịkwa ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe,, Donetsk mere ngwa ngwa, nke ukwuu n'okpuru nduzi nke nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ

Na 1994, e mere referendum na Donetsk Oblast na Luhansk Oblast, na gburugburu 90% kwadoro nkwenye nke Russian dị ka asụsụ gọọmentị n'akụkụ Ukraine, na maka Russian na-bụ nanị ukara asụsụ na a mpaghara larịị; otu o sila dị, ndị ọchịchị Kyiv kagburu referendum ahụ
N'afọ ndị 1990 na oge 2000, e gburu ọtụtụ narị n'ime ogbunigwe i na Donetsk na mpaghara ahụ
Ndị a gụnyere mkpọmkpọ coal nke Ukraine n'afọ 2008, ọdachi ogbunigwe Zasyadko nke afọ 2007, na ọdachi ahụ mere n'afọ 2015 nke Zasyadko

Ukraine enweela ọtụtụ ihe mberede n'ịgbapụta ihe kemgbe ọdịda Soviet Union na 1991, otu ihe kpatara ya bụ njikọ nke ụgwọ ọrụ nke ndị na-egwuputa ihe na mmepụta ihe, bụ ihe mkpali ileghara usoro nchebe anya nke na-ebelata mmepụta ihe
Na nzuko e nwere na Moscow na 2008, a ghọtara Donetsk dị ka obodo kacha mma na Commonwealth of Independent States maka atụmatụ mmepe ya etinyere
na 2012 na 2013 Donetsk ghọtara dị ka ebe kacha mma maka azụmahịa na Ukraine
Ka ọ na-enweta otuto maka ikike azụmahịa ya, Donetsk nwetakwara nkatọ maka njikọ mafia siri ike nke oligarchy ya na-eto eto, yana maka ọnụ ọgụgụ ịda ogbenye na-abawanye
Ụfọdụ ndị nyocha dọrọ aka ná ntị banyere ọdịda Donetsk ogologo oge; na na ọ nwere ike ịkekọrịta ọnọdụ ọjọọ Detroit n'ihi ọdịda ya ịlụso mpụ na ịda ogbenye ọgụ
Mgbe Onye isi ala Yanukovych gbapụrụ na Ukraine ịchọ mgbaba na Russia, ndị na-agbachitere Russia na-akwado weghaara Ọchịchị Oblast State Administration [ uk ] (OSA), isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, na Donetsk
Ndị uwe ojii enyeghị mmegide
Mgbe e mesịrị na izu ndị ọchịchị nke Donetsk disallowed a referendum na ọnọdụ nke mpaghara na uwe ojii retook Donetsk OSA ụlọ
Donetsk ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị emmepe nke 2014 pro-Russian esemokwu na Ukraine
Na 7 April 2014, pro-Russian ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị weghaara ikike nke Donetsk OSA ma kwupụta ' Donetsk People's Republic ', na-arịọ maka enyemaka Russia
Na 11 May 2014, a Donetsk ọnọdụ referendum, 2014 e ẹkenịmde ke Donetsk nke ndị ntuli aka nwere ike họrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nnwere onwe

Onye isi kọmishọna nhoputa ndi ochichi nke kpọsara onwe ya Donetsk People's Republic, Roman Lyagin, kwuru na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ pasent 90 nke ndị mere ntuli aka na mpaghara Donetsk kwadoro nnwere onwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na Kyiv
Ukraine anaghị aghọta referendum, mgbe EU na US kwuru na ntuli aka bụ iwu na-akwadoghị
Mgbọ ogbunigwe nke ndị agha Yukren na ndị otu ndị agha akpatala ọnwụ ndị nkịtị na Donetsk

Human Rights Watch akpọkuola akụkụ abụọ ahụ na-alụ ọgụ ka ha kwụsị iji ogbunigwe BM-21 Grad na-adịghị eduzi n'ebe ndị mmadụ bi, ma kwuo na iji usoro ngwa agha ndị a bụ mmebi iwu mba ụwa na ọ nwere ike bụrụ mpụ agha
Ọ kpọkukwara ndị ọgbaghara ahụ ka ha zere ibunye ha n'ebe ndị mmadụ juru

Kama Donetsk, a haziri asọmpi ahụ na Kraków, Poland
N'ikpeazụ, Ukraine kwadoro 2017 IIHF World Championship Division I, ọzọ Group A, ma na isi obodo ya, Kyiv
Donetsk lina na steppe odida obodo, gbara ya gburugburu gbasasịrị woodland, ugwu nta, nkwata Atụmatụ, osimiri na ọdọ mmiri
A na-ejikarị mpụga ugwu eme ọrụ ugbo
Osimiri Kalmius jikọtara obodo ahụ na Oké Osimiri Azov, nke bụ 95 km (59 mi) n'ebe ndịda, yana mpaghara ntụrụndụ ama ama maka ndị bi na Donetsk
Ogologo eriri nke ala ubi gbara obodo ahụ gburugburu
Obodo ahụ ruru 28 km (17 mi) site n'ebe ugwu ruo na ndịda na 55 km (34 mi) from east to west
Enwere ọdọ mmiri abụọ dị nso Nyzhnekalmius (60 ha ), na 'Oké Osimiri Donetsk' (206) ha)
Osimiri 5 na-agafe n'obodo ahụ, gụnyere Kalmius, Asmolivka (13 km), Cherepashkyna (23 km), Skomoroshka na Bakhmutka
Obodo nwekwara ngụkọta nke 125 ndụmọdụ nkwata
Ihu igwe nke Donetsk bụ kọntinent na- ekpo ọkụ n'oge okpomọkụ ( Köppen Dfb )
Nkezi okpomọkụ bụ −41 Celsius C (25 Celsius F) na Jenụwarị na 216 Celsius C (71 °F) na Julaị
Nkezi ọnụọgụ mmiri ozuzo kwa afọ na-agbakọta ụbọchị 162 na ruo 556 millimeters kwa afọ
Ebe ọ bụ na 7 April 2014 Donetsk bụ de facto nke Donetsk Ndị mmadụ Republic na- achị dị ka isi obodo ya

South Ossetia, obodo ọzọ nwere oke ude, ghọtara Donetsk People's Republic dị ka onye nwe obodo yana Donetsk dị ka isi obodo ya

Donetsk na ókèala ndị gbara ya gburugburu bụ obodo mepere emepe nke ukwuu ma na-agbakọba n'ime obodo
Ndị ọrụ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na ụlọ ọrụ dị arọ, ọkachasị ngwuputa kol
Obodo ahụ bụ ebe dị mkpa nke nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na kol na Donets Basin ( Donbas )
Kpọmkwem n'okpuru obodo dina coal ogbunigwe, nke na-adịbeghị anya hụrụ na-abawanye na Ngwuputa ihe mberede, kasị ọhụrụ mberede bụ na Zasyadko mine, nke gburu ihe karịrị 100 ọrụ
Akụ na ụba Donetsk mejupụtara ihe dị ka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe 200 nwere ngụkọta mmepụta nke ihe karịrị ijeri 120 rubles kwa afọ yana karịa otu 20,000 ọkara-obere nha
