Ogige ndị mmụọ ozi dị na Donetsk bụ ihe ncheta ụmụaka gburu n'oge agha Donbas
Donetsk, n'oge ahụ Yuzovka, kewara ụzọ abụọ n'ebe ugwu na n'ebe ndịda
N'akụkụ ndịda bụ ụlọ ọrụ obodo, ọdụ ụgbọ oloko, ụlọ telegraph, ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'ebe na-adịghị anya na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe bụ ógbè Bekee ebe ndị injinia na ndị ọrụ nlekọta bi
Mgbe e wuchara ebe obibi John Hughes na ogige dị iche iche maka ndị ọrụ si mba ọzọ, e wuru akụkụ ndịda obodo ahụ n'ụzọ bụ isi n'ụdị Bekee
Ụlọ ndị a na-eji facade nke nwere akụkụ anọ na akụkụ atọ, elu ụlọ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, nnukwu windo, nke nwere akụkụ buru ibu nke ụlọ ahụ, na mbara ihu
N'akụkụ a nke obodo ahụ, okporo ámá ndị buru ibu ma nwee pavement
Mmetụta dị ukwuu na nhazi ụlọ na Donetsk bụ onye na -ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke ụlọ ọrụ Novorossiya - Moldingauyer
Ụlọ ndị echekwara na mpaghara ndịda Yuzovka nwere ebe obibi nke John Hughes ( 1891, nke echekwabara ), Bolfur ( 1889 ) na Bosse
N'ebe ugwu nke Yuzovka, Novyi Svet, ndị na-azụ ahịa, ndị omenkà na ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ
N'ebe a, e nwere ụlọ ahịa ahịa, isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii na Katidral nke Nnwogha nke Jizọs
Okporo ụzọ etiti Novyi Svet na okporo ámá ndị gbara ya gburugburu bụ ụlọ obibi nwere okpukpu abụọ ma ọ bụ okpukpu abụọ, yana ahịa, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ akụ
Ụlọ a ma ama nke echekwara na mpaghara ugwu Yuzovka bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ Great Britain
Atụmatụ izugbe mbụ nke Stalino mere na 1932 na Odessa site n'aka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ P
Golovchenko
Na 1937, a rụgharịrị ọrụ ahụ n'otu akụkụ
Ọrụ ndị a bụ nke mbụ n'ime akụkọ ihe mere eme ụlọ ọrụ owuwu obodo
A nnukwu akụkụ nke obodo ụlọ site na nkera nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke 20 e mere site architect Pavel Vigdergauz, nke e nyere Gọọmenti award nke USSR maka ije na obodo Donetsk na 1978
Ndị bi na Donetsk so na omenala okpukpe gụnyere Chọọchị Ọtọdọks nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eastern Catholic Churches, Protestantism, na Roman Catholic Church, yana Islam na okpukpe ndị Juu
Otu okpukpere chi nwere ọtụtụ ndị otu bụ Ụka Ọtọdọks nke Ukraine (Moscow Patriarchate) na Ụka Ọtọdọks nke Ukraine nke Kyivan Patriarchate
N'afọ 2014, e kesara ndị Juu akwụkwọ akụkọ adịgboroja 'nke onyeisi oche nke ọchịchị nwa oge Donetsk Denis Pushilin bịanyere aka na ya' n'ememme Ngabiga
Akwụkwọ nta ahụ gwara nwa amaala Juu Donetsk ka ọ deba aha onwe ya, ihe onwunwe ha na ezinụlọ ha n'aka ndị ọchịchị na-akwado Russia
Mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ kwuru na emeghị ihe ọ chọrọ ga-eme ka a napụ ya ikike ịbụ nwa amaala na ịnara ihe onwunwe ya
Akwụkwọ nta ahụ kpalitere ọgba aghara na ụjọ n'etiti ndị Juu Donetsk, bụ ndị hụrụ nkwughachi nke Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ na mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn ise na-arụ ọrụ na Donetsk
Na Donetsk, e nwere ụlọ elu TV nke dị mita 360, otu n'ime ihe owuwu kacha ogologo n'obodo ahụ, nke arụchara na 1992
A na-akpọkarị ụmụ amaala Donetsk Donchyani ( Russian )
Ndị a bụ ndepụta ndị ama ama bụ ndị amụrụ ma ọ bụ zụlitere n'obodo ahụ
Donetsk bụ ụlọ ihe ngosi nka 140
N'ime ha, abụọ nnukwu obodo ngosi ihe mgbe ochie - Donetsk Region History Museum na Donetsk Regional Art Museum

Ntọala na 1924, ọ na-enye ihe ngosi sara mbara nke nwere ihe ngosi 120,000 site na nchọpụta ihe ochie nke malitere na oge ochie ruo mgbe John Hughes malitere obodo ahụ, mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ na ngwuputa coal, Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na oge Soviet
Na 21 Ọgọst 2014, onye isi obodo Donetsk kọrọ na ọkụ ogbunigwe ebibiela ụlọ na mgbidi nke Donetsk Regional History Museum n'isi ụtụtụ ahụ
E mepere FC Shaktar Museum na 2010
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke Ukraine nke a ga-ahọpụta maka onyinye ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke European
Isi ụdị njem n'ime Donetsk bụ trams, bọs trolley eletriki, bọs na marshrutkas (obere bọs nkeonwe)
Usoro njem ọha na eze nke obodo ahụ bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ obodo Dongorpastrans dị n'otu na-achịkwa
Obodo ahụ nwere okporo ụzọ ụgbọ oloko iri na abụọ (~ 130 km), ụzọ ụgbọ oloko iri na asaa (~ 188 km), na ihe dị ka ụzọ ụgbọ oloko iri na ise
Ma usoro ụgbọ oloko na ụgbọ oloko dị n'obodo ahụ na-arụ ọrụ site na ebe nchekwa abụọ nke ọ bụla
Ụzọ njem ọzọ n'ime obodo ahụ bụ ọrụ taxi, nke e nwere 32 na Donetsk

Obodo nwekwara autostations dị n'ime obodo na ala ịta ahịhịa ya autostation Yuzhny (South), nke na-eje ozi tumadi ahịrị njem na ndịda, n'ihi ya aha ya; autostation Tsentr (Centre), nke na-eje ozi na njem na ntụziaka nke Marinka na Vuhledar nakwa dị ka intercity iga; na autostation Krytyi rynok (ime ụlọ ahịa), nke na-eje ozi tumadi iga n'ebe ugwu na n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ntụziaka; na autostation Putilovsky, nke na-eje ozi karịsịa n'ebe ugwu na n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ ntụziaka njem
Owuwu nke usoro metro n'obodo ahụ, nke malitere na 1992, gbahapụrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'ihi enweghị ego
Ọ nweghị ahịrị ma ọ bụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu emechara
Isi ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Donetsk, nke na-eje ozi ihe dị ka nde ndị njem asaa kwa afọ, dị na mpaghara ugwu nke obodo ahụ
E nwere ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị nso na isi ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè, na-ahụ maka akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụgbọ okporo ígwè mpaghara ahụ
Ụgbọ okporo ígwè ndị ọzọ bụ Rutchenkovo, nke dị na Kyivskyi Raion; Mandrykino (Petrovskyi Raion), na Mushketovo (Budionivskyi Raion)
Ụfọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ndị njem na-ezere ọdụ Donetsk ma na-eje ozi na ọdụ Yasynuvata, nke dị na mpụga obodo
Ọ bụ ezie na a naghị eji ya eme njem mgbe niile, obodo ahụ nwekwara ụgbọ okporo ígwè ụmụaka
(Dị ka ọ dị na Septemba 2009) a na-eme atụmatụ ụlọ ọrụ ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ọhụrụ nke ga-agbaso ihe UEFA chọrọ (ebe ọ bụ na Donetsk bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị ọbịa maka UEFA EURO 2012)
Donetsk Oblast bụ ebe njem dị mkpa na Ukraine, ya mere ebe etiti ya bụ Donetsk
Ụgbọ okporo ígwè Donetsk, nke dị na Donetsk, bụ ngalaba ụgbọ okporo ígwè kachasị ukwuu na Republic
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke mpaghara ahụ, na ndị bi na Donetsk na Lugansk Republics na akụkụ nke Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhia na Kharkiv oblasts
Nke okporo ụzọ, akụkụ nke International E-road netwọk, na-agafe n'obodo ahụ na-aga Rostov-on-Don na Russia
Na mgbakwunye, okporo ụzọ mba ọzọ na-agafe obodo ahụ M 04
Ọzọkwa, okporo ụzọ mba Ukraine atọ (N 15, N 20, na N 21) na-agafe obodo ahụ
A ga-arụcha ọkwa nke anọ nke okporo ụzọ okirikiri na-agafe Donetsk n'afọ 2014
Na mgbakwunye na njem ọha na eze na ụgbọ okporo ígwè, Donetsk nwere ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa
E wuru ya n'oge mmalite afọ 1940 na mmalite afọ 1950
E wughachiri ya na 1973 na ọzọ site na 2011 ruo 2012
N'ihi ọgụ, emechiri ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ na 26 Mee 2014 ma kemgbe ahụ emebiela ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ
E mechikwara mbara igwe dị n'elu Donetsk kemgbe ọdachi MH17
Donetsk nwere ọtụtụ mahadum, nke gụnyere mahadum steeti ise, ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na otu, ụlọ akwụkwọ atọ, ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ iri na anọ, mahadum ise nke onwe, na kọleji isii

Ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ kachasị mkpa na ndị a ma ama gụnyere Donetsk National Technical University, nke e hiwere na 1921 ('Donetsk Polytechnical Institute' na 1960–1993), yana Donetsk National University nke e hiwere na 1937
National Technical University nwere mmekọrịta chiri anya na Mahadum dị na Magdeburg
Kemgbe 1970, ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ 100 si Germany (East Germany) agụchaala agụmakwụkwọ ka elu na otu n'ime mahadum abụọ dị na Donetsk
Donetsk bụkwa ebe obibi nke Donetsk National Medical University, nke e hiwere na 1930 wee bụrụ otu n'ime mahadum ahụike kachasị na Soviet Union
E nwekwara ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha sayensị na Mahadum Alakụba n'ime Donetsk
Donetsk bụkwa ebe obibi nke Prokofiev Donetsk State Music Academy, ụlọ nchekwa egwu nke e hiwere na 1960
Donetsk na-ekere òkè na atụmatụ obodo mba ụwa iji kwalite ezi mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Ndị mmekọ gụnyere
ASUSU Dong
Dongo (Donga, Dongo Ko) bụ asụsụ Ubangian á na-asụ ná Haut-Uele Province, DR Congo
Donia Maher (amụrụ na 14 Nọvemba 1979) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, odee na onye na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na Cairo
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ihe nkiri, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, na-ejedebe na ọrụ ọganihu ya na ihe nkiri Hala Lotfy Al Khorug lel Nahar (2012) nke e gosipụtara na mmemme ihe nkiri gburugburu ụwa
A jara ya mma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri TV Segn El Nesa (Ụlọ Mkpọrọ Ụmụ nwanyị)
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Maher enwetala aha ama ama maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya The Apartment in Bab El-Louk, nke ya na ndị na-ese ihe nkiri Ganzeer na Ahmad Nady jikọrọ aka mepụta
A họpụtara nsụgharị Bekee nke Elisabeth Jaquette maka onyinye Banipal
Donia Maher bi na Cairo
Donia Massoud (amụrụ na 2 Mee 1979) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ Massoud ma zụlite ya na Alexandria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, ọ kwagara Cairo nke mere ka ndị mụrụ ya nwee mwute
Massoud chọpụtara ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na Cairo, na-aghọ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'oge mmalite afọ 2000, Massoud nọrọ afọ atọ na-eme njem n'Ijipt na-anakọta akụkọ ọdịnala na egwu
O mere ndekọ nke abụ ọdịnala ma nweta ohere n'agbamakwụkwọ na ememe obodo
O juru ya anya na ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ahụ na-ekwu maka ahụmịhe ụmụ nwanyị, na-akọwa ọtụtụ abụ dị ka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe rụrụ arụ
Massoud wepụtara abọm na 2009, Mahatet Masr, na egwu ya kachasị ewu ewu 'Betnadeeny Tany Leeh' na-ajụ ihe mere enyi nwoke ochie ji akpọ ya kemgbe ọ chọtara onye ọ hụrụ n'anya ọhụrụ
Ọ gara njem na-eme egwu na Africa, Europe, na Eshia, na-akpọ ngwá egwú ọdịnala yana ịbụ abụ
Na mgbakwunye na egwu ya, Massoud sonyeere otu ihe nkiri Al-Warsha
Ọ na-ewere egwu dị ka ụdị nka yiri nke nka ihe nkiri
E jiri ọnụnọ ya tụnyere nke Soad Hosny
Massoud emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn na Egypt na Sweden, na Arabic na Bekee
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe nkiri Galteny Mogremen (2006), In the Heliopolis Flat (2007) na Genenet al asmak (2008)
N'afọ 2015, Massoud mere esemokwu maka egbugbu n'azụ ya nke na-agụ, 'Obi m na Chineke na-ese okwu'
Donia Samir Youssef Ghanem (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1985) bụ onye Egypt na-eme nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Samir Ghanem na onye na-ese ihe nkiri Dalal Abdel Aziz; na nwanne nwanyị Amy (Amal)
Donia gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum MSA wee malite ndụ nka ya na 2001 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
O nwere ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe ngosi TV a na-akpọ 'Ikpe ziri ezi nwere ọtụtụ ihu' (Lil Adala Wogouh Katheera)
Donia sonyere na ihe ngosi TV abụọ mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị
Ọ dọtara uche mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro ndị Ijipt a na-akpọ 'Justice has many faces '
Oge mbụ ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri bụ na 2005 ya na onye na-eme ihe ọchị bụ Mohamed Henedi
Site n'ịpụta na ihe ngosi okwu dị iche iche nke ndị Ijipt, Donia pụtara ìhè maka iṅomi ndị na-agụ egwú Arab ndị ọzọ
Ihe kachasị ewu ewu bụ olu Ahlam na-abụ abụ Myriam Fares
A kpọrọ abụ mbụ ya 'Far2 el Sen'
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe na oge nke anọ (2015) nke The X Factor Arabia tinyere Elissa na Ragheb Alama, ndị na-agụ egwú Lebanọn
Donkorkrom Presbyterian Ụlọọgwụ Donkorkrom Presbyterian bụ ụlọọgwụ ọha dị na Kwahu Afram Plains North District na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ
E depụtara ikike dị ka àkwà 74
Donna Auguste (amụrụ na afọ 1958) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke Amerịka, onye ọchụnta ego, na onye enyemaka
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa, ya na onye ọrụ ibe John Meier, na onye isi ọrụ (CEO) nke Freshwater Software site na afọ 1996 ruo afọ 2000
Tupu ịmalite Freshwater Software, Auguste bụ onye isi njikwa injinia na Apple Computer onye nyere aka ịhazi mmepe nke Newton personal digital assistant (PDA)
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye isi nduzi maka US West Advanced Technologies, ebe ọ zutere John Meier wee malite iche echiche nke ọma banyere ịmepụta Freshwater Software
Na afọ 2000, o rere Freshwater Software nye Mercury Interactive Corp
maka $147 nde
N'otu afọ ahụ, a ghọtara ya dị ka otu n'ime 'ụmụ nwanyị iri abụo na ịse na-eme ka ọ buru ibu na obere azụmahịa' site na Fortune Magazine
Ọ nwetakwara onyinye nturu ugo ọla edo nke afọ 2001 maka nwanyị pụtara ìhè na teknụzụ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na agụmakwụkwọ maka PhD
na Mahadum Colorado Boulder, Auguste nwetara aha 'onye injinia a ma ama' nke sitere na ọha injinia kacha ochie na-asọpụrụ obodo, Tau Beta Pi
A mụrụ Donna Auguste na Texas mana ọ kwagara Louisiana wee gaa California ebe ọ gara kọleji
Ọ bụ nne ha zụrụ ya na ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị anọ
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ nwata, Auguste na-enwe mmasị iji ngwá ụlọ na-emekọ ihe
Ọ na- ewepụtakarị mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ wee kwakọba ngwa eletriki ndị ọzọ iji ghọta makaniiki dị n'azụ ka ha si arụ ọrụ

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ debanyere aha na mmemme injinịa eletriki na sayensị kọmputa (EECS) na Mahadum California, Berkeley ebe ọ meriri ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi iji nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor nke sayensị na Electrical Engineering na Kọmputa Sayensị
N'ịbụ onye na-aga mmemme nwere nnukwu mkpokọta nke ndị ọgbọ nwoke, Auguste na-achụpụkarị ma na-eleda ya anya site n'aka ndị ọrụ ibe ya
Auguste gara n'ihu bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America mbụ ga-aga mmemme PhD na Mahadum Carnegie-Mellon
Mgbe ọ na-eme nyocha na sayensị etinyere na ọgụgụ isi na Mahadum Carnegie-Mellon, Auguste etinyere na Xerox Corporation 's Palo Alto Research Center wee zute ndị malitere IntelliCorp n'ọdịnihu
IntelliCorp goro Auguste ka onye injinia sọftụwia na 1986 ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ngwaahịa teknụzụ jikọtara ọgụgụ isi
Mgbe Auguste nọrọ afọ anọ na IntelliCorp, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ruo ọnwa abụọ iji jiri igwe kwụ otu ebe gafere n'ime ime obodo Japan
Mgbe ọ lọghachiri, Apple Kọmputa goro Auguste na 1990 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi njikwa ngwanrọ ngwanrọ maka ọrụ mmepe Newton PDA
Mgbe ọ nọ na Apple Kọmputa, Auguste nwere mmasị na ya ma nweta otuto maka nkà njikwa ya yana onyinye ọrụ aka (o jidere patent dị iche iche maka ọrụ ya na Newton PDA)
Na 1996, Auguste kwagara Boulder, Colorado wee sonye na US West Advanced Teknụzụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke injinia na mmepe sistemu ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ngwa telivishọn mmekọrịta maka netwọk netwọk fiber-optic nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Auguste buru ụzọ hụ na ịntanetị nwere ike ma mesịa malite ụlọ ọrụ nke ya Freshwater Software Inc, onye na-enye ngwọta ngwanrọ maka idowe na nyochaa ngwa weebụ dị mkpa nke azụmahịa

Software Freshwater tolitere ngwa ngwa site na obere mmalite gaa na onye na-eweta sọftụwia ọtụtụ nde dollar nke mba nke turu ọnụ ndị ahịa Fortune 500 dị ka Alta Vista, IBM, Microsoft, Gocom, na Merrill Lynch
Emechara zụta Freshwater Software site na Mercury Interactive Corp
nke California maka nde $147 na 2001

Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nka ka ire Freshwater Software, Auguste mepere ntọala Leave a Little Room, LLC, otu ọrụ enyemaka na-enyere aka inye ụlọ, ọkụ eletrik na ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa nye obodo ndị ogbenye na ndị nwere nsogbu gburugburu ụwa

N'afọ 2009, e nyere Auguste $750,000 sitere na Santa Clara County dị ka nkwụsị maka imeri nkwubi okwu dị elu sitere na ụzọ aghụghọ nke onye ọka iwu si n'ọfịs onye ọka iwu mpaghara jiri mee ihe n'okwu mpụ ebe a na-enyocha ụlọ Auguste's Colorado n'ihe metụtara ya
Mkpebi idina nwa nwanne Damon Auguste nke e mechara kagbuo
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik na onye otu Cure d'Ars Parish na Denver
Donnamaria Bruton (May 3, 1954 - September 9, 2012) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé otu ngalaba na Rhode Island School of Design, nke a maara màkà ihe osise mgbasa ozi ya na collages
Bruton rụrụ ọrụ na RISD malite na 1992, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ngalaba na-ese ihe site na 2001 na 03, na dị ka ónyé na-anọchi anya dean nke Graduate Studies site na 2003 na05
Ụdị Bruton, nke The Providence Journal kọwara dị ka 'ụdị na-enweghị isi
mana nke nwéré ike ime ihe n'eziokwu,' na-eji ihe osise ya, eserese na nkà collage
Ọtụtụ n'ime collages ya na-eji ihe ndị ụwa dị ka isi ihe iji nweta ncheta miri emi ma ọ bụ echiche
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na 1993 na Austin, Texas, a nabatara ya nké ọma
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, ogo nké ọrụ ya gbasaa, ọtụtụ n'ie ha ruru 8 site na 8 feet (24 site na 24 m)
Bruton natara Blanche E
Colman Award site na BNY Mellon na 1999
Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na RISD Museum na Gwanjiu Museum na Korea, ya na ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwé
Ọrụ Bruton dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Newport Art Museum
A mụrụ Bruton na Milwaukee, Wisconsin, na 1954
Nna ya bụ ónyé na-egwu baseball Bill Bruton, nna nna ya n'akụkụ nne ya bụ ónyé egwuregwu Negro leagues Judy Johnson
Ọ natara Bachelor of Fine Arts na Mahadum Michigan State, na Master of Fine Arts site na Mahadim Yale
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru ónyé na-ese ihe Edward Loper ma gosipụta ya na Dell Pryor na Detroit
Ọ lụrụ Timothy Coutis na Jenụwarị 1999
Donna Chambers bụ onye America na-emepụta ọla na White Plains, New York
A maara ya màkà atụmatụ ndị na-egosi nkume pel na nné ochie nke chips ịgba chaa chaa pearl
Nnukwu ụlọ ahịa dị ka Bloomingdale's, Saks Fifth Avenue na Na Hoku na National Museum of African American History and Culture na Washington, DC ebutewo ọla Chambers
Màkà ọtụtụ ógè okpomọkụ na mgbè ụlọ akwụkwọ gachara, ónyé na-emepụta ákwà Vera Neumann gọrọ Chambers dị afọ iri na ụma ka ọ kewaa agba màkà akwa ákwà silk
N'afọ 1968, Chambers natara ònyìnyé Vera Industries George Neumann Scholarship nke mbụ wee gaa Pratt Industries iji mụọ ihe ejiji
Chambers rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-enyere ónyé na-emepụta ejiji Oleg Cassini aka
N'afọ 1990, Chambers meghere That Old Black Magic Book and Gift Gallery, ụlọ ahịa ònyìnyé Westchester, New York nke gosipụtara ihe ònyìnyé ndị Africa America, nka, kaadị ekele na akwụkwọ
E gosipụtara ọrụ nke ihe karịrị ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-emepụta ihe irí isé na ụlọ ahịa ahụ
Otu klọb akwụkwọ kwa ọnwa nke ụlọ ahịa ahụ kwadoro gosipụtara ọgụgụ Arthur Ashe, Nikki Giovanni, Bernice L
McFadden, Rev
Al Sharpton, na Iyanla Vanzant
Ụlọ ahịa ahụ mechiri mgbe afọ iri abụo gasịrị
Donovan Ward (amụrụ na Nọvemba 1962 na Western Cape, Cape Town, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro mgbasa ozi, nke gụnyere eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ Donovan na nchịkọta onwe na nke ọha na eze nke gụnyere Mahadum South Africa, Pretoria, na Durban Art Gallery
Ọrụ nka ọha na eze gụnyere ihe ncheta Gugulethu 7 nke City of Cape Town na Gọọmentị Provincial nyere iwu na United Democratic Front Memorial
Catherine Saint Jude Pretorius, onye a maara dịka Dope Saint Jude, bụ onye South Africa na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye mmepụta egwu
A mụrụ Dope Saint Jude na Cape Town ma otolitere na Elsies River
Ọ kụziiri onwe ya guitar mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ wee malite ide uri iji soro egwu ya
O mechara banye n'ụdị hip hop nke ya, nke a kọwara dị ka ụda Mgbakwunye maka njikọta nwanyị, nnabata na ike
A ma ya ama maka iweta 'queer' n'ihe nkiri hip hop
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2011, n'egosipụta n'ihie omume dị ka Saint Dude, a drag king
N'oge a, ọ malitere otu egwu drag queen dị na akwụkwọ na South Africa
N'afọ 2013, Saint Jude hapụrụ otu ahụ iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri naanị ya
N'afọ 2016, ya na MIA
rụkọrọ ọrụ nsonye nke vidiyo mgbasa ozi nke H&M maka izu mmegharị ụwa
Na'onwa Julaị afọ 2016, Saint Jude wepụtara EP mbụ ya, Reimagine N'afọ 2017, e gosipụtara ya na abọm Jlin, Black Origami
O meela ihe nkiri na Cape Town International Jazz Festival n'afọ 2017, Mahadum Stanford n'afọ 2017 nakwa Afropunk Festival Johannesburg n'afọ 2018
N'afọ 2018, o wepụtara EP ya nke abụọ, Resilient E wepụtara egwu a, 'Grrrl Like' n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2018

E ji egwu a mee ihe maka ihe ngosi Apple TV Dickinson, ihe ngosi Netflix nke anime Kipo na Age of Wonderbeasts, mgbasa ozi nke onye na-emepụta ụgbọ ala na ihe nkiri n'ewu ewu nke Netflix's South African original series, Blood & Water
Dora Kanabahita Byamukama bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye ọka iwu, onye ọka ikpe na onye omeiwu
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke East Africa maka oge June 2012 ruo June 2017
Ọ rụburu ọrụ na mpaghara Mwenge South dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke UgandaNa Afrịka
O nwere nzere abụọ na Mahadum Makerere ma a na-ewere ya dị ka ọkachamara mba ụwa na iwu, ikpe ziri ezi na mmepe
Dora Siliya (amụrụ n'Oktoba 8, na afọ 1970 , Kitwe ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zambia
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu nke Petauke Central na onye bụbu Minista nke nkwukọrịta na mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ ya na Kitwe ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na Mufulira
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ụmụ nwanyị Kabulonga na afọ 1988, ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na Mahadum Zambia ebe ọ gụrụ ọgwụ
Mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị, ọ hapụrụ Mahadum wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Zambia Television and Radio (ZNBC), wee laghachi na mahadum iji mụọ nkwurịta okwu ọha, mgbe ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ na ZNBC
N'afọ 1996, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na South African Broadcasting Corporation
N'afọ 1997, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BA
O nwere nzere masta na Development Economics na Mahadum Cambridge na United Kingdom
Siliya ghọrọ Onye Nlekọta telivishọn, na-arụ ọrụ na Duncan Mbazima, onye bụ onye isi nchịkwa
Ọ hapụrụ ZNBC ma rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ European Union nke Private Sector Development ruo afọ abụọ
N'afọ 2001, Movement for Multiparty Democracy bịakwutere ya ka ọ gbaa ọsọ maka National Assembly, nke o mere na Petauke
O nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma ma zigara ya n'ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya Zambia na Cairo na-arụ ọrụ maka osote onye nnọchiteanya ma na-etinye aka na mmekọrịta azụmahịa
N'afọ 2006, ọ pụtara ọzọ dị ka onye omeiwu maka MMD na Petauke
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ike na Mmepe Mmiri, Minista nke Ọrụ Ugbo, na Minista nke Transport na Communication
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2018, onye isi ala Edgar Chagwa Lungu họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke ozi ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi ọnụ na-ekwuchitere gọọmentị
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Mee, na afọ 2020, a chọpụtara na Siliya nwere COVID-19
A họpụtara Siliya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba na Zambia n'afọ 2006 na mpaghara Petauke-Central
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Dora Nkem Akunyili (amụrụ ya na abali 14 n'ọnwa asaa n-afọ 1954 – ya anwụọ n'abali asaa n'ọnwa isii na-afọ 2014)
Ọ bụ onye Ntụziaka nke Ụlọ-ọru ndi (Director General) National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC) nile di na Naijiria
Bụkwara Onye isi Mgbasaozi nke ala Naijiria (Nigerian Minister of Information and Communications) site na-afọ 2008 ruo 2010

Ọ bụ onye Ntọ Ọgwụ nke ndi bekee na-akpọ Pharmacist nakwa onye Ọrụ Gọvament ama-ama na mba ụwa tinyekwara n'onwetara ọtụtụ inwe site n'ọrụ ya 'Pharmacology', 'Public Health' na 'Human Rights'[Tinye edensibịa]
Akunyili dọrọ ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchichi nke 'Senator' ndi Anambra Central n'okpuru APGA n'ọnwa anọ na-afọ 2011 mana Chris Ngige nke ACN meriri ya
Ozugbo, ozigaara ndi Independent National Electoral Commission igbagha ndaputa ndọrọ-ndọrọ a Ọ nwụrụ maka cancer n'ụlọ-ọgwụ di na India n'abali asaa n'ọnwa isii na-afọ 2014

Na nsote nghoputa ya dika onye Ntuziaka ofis ndi NAFDAC nile n'onwa ano na-afo 2001, Akunyili mere ya ihe di mkpa ikpochapụ ọgwụ ndi na-adighi mma 'counterfeit drugs' na nri ndi n'adighi mma n'ahụ 'unsafe food'
Tupu ya arigoro n'ọkwa ya na NAFDAC, ogwu na nri adịgboroja juru n'ala Naijiria n'enweghi onye mezi ya

O wutere ya nke nnukwu na ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyi obodo ya na-aṅụ ọgwụ adịgboroja yiri nke bụ ezi ya maka oria iba 'malaria' na 'tuberculosis Na-agbanyeghi na enwere ọtụtuihe ize ndụ na mkpebi ya ikpochapụ ogwu adịgboroja, otinyere ndụ ya n'ọgwụ
Tinyere n'onwetara ọtụtu ihe inwe na mba ụwa'

Professor (Odoziaku) Dora Nkem Akunyili, onye rigoro n'ọkwa na-abali 12 n'ọnwa anọ na -afọ dika onye Ntụziaka ndi National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC), bụ 'Pharmacist', 'Pharmacologist', 'Erudite Scholar', Seasoned Administrator', nakwa 'visionary leader'
Ọ bụkwara 'Senior Lecturer na Consultant Pharmacologist' na College of Medicine, University of Nigeria, Nsukka (UNN), Enugu Campus, tupu Ọ bụrụ onye isi ndi NAFDAC
A mụrụ ya na Makurdi, Benue State, mana otoro na Nanka alụọ ya n'Agulu, ha abụọ di na Anambra State nke Naijiria
Agụm Akwụkwọ ya bidoro mgbe ọgafere ule 'First School Leaving Certificate' nweta Distinction na St

Patrick's Primary School, Isuofia, Anambra State na-afo 1966, na West African School Certificate (WASC) with Grade I Distinction na-afo 1973 na 'Queen of the Rosary Secondary School, Nsukka', nke di na mba Naijiria

Mpụta asambodo First School Leaving Certificate na WASC mere ya enweta agụm akwụkwọ n'efu nke 'Eastern Nigerian Government Post Primary Scholarship' na 'Federal Government of Nigeria Undergraduate Scholarship'
O nwetara Digirii nke mbụ ya na Pharmacy BPharm (Hons) na-afọ 1978 na PhD ya na-afọ 1985 na UNN
Professor Akunyili bụ Post-Doctorate Fellow nke ndi 'University of London' nakwa 'Fellow nke West African Post-Graduate College of Pharmacists'
I ji kwadebe ya maka ọkwa nlekọta ya, enyere ya nkwado Computer Education Programme nke WHO/UNDP/World Bank kwadoro nakwa Senior Management skills Course in RIPA, London, n'afọ 1994 na 1998
Akunyili nwetara ọtụtụ nkwado n'efu

Akunyili bidoro Ọrụ ya dika onye mmepụta ọgwụ n'afọ 1978 rute 1981, na University of Nigeria Teaching Hospital (UNTH), Enugu, Tupu ya agawa n'ogba Agụmakwụkwọ dika Graduate Assistant (Research Fellow) na Faculty of Pharmaceutical Sciences, UNN site na 1982 ruo 1986
N'usoro ndi Mahadum, onwere ọtụtụ ọganihu site na Lecturer I na 1986 tupu emee ya Senior Lecturer na 1990
Ezigara ya College of Medicine, UNN na 1992, ebe emere ya Consultant Pharmacologist na 1996, ọkwa ọnọro ruo abali iri abụọ n'ọnwa anọ n'afọ 2001
N'ihi ịhụnanya ya n'ebe ndi eto-eto di, ọ bụkwara onye nkụzi ọkara oge na West African Postgraduate College of Pharmacists Lagos, Nigeria na-afọ 1992–1995

A kwadoro Akunyili maka ọkwa ndụti ya na NAFDAC site na ọrụ afọ anọ ya dika onye ode-akwụkwọ na Petroleum Special Trust Fund (PTF), na ahazi ọrụ na steeti ise ndi di n'ọwụwa anyanwụ na-ala Naijiria (Abia, Anambra, Ebonyi, Enugu na Imo States)

Ọrụkwara dika onye Nlekọta na Ọrụ Ubi nakwa otu onye ndi Caretaker Committee nke Local Government, Anaocha Local Government Area di na Anambra State site 1994 ruo1996Site na 1992 ruo 1994, Akunyili rụrụ dika otu onye State's Hospitals Management Board nakwa State Advisory Council for Women Commission nke di na Anambra State of Nigeria
Dika
ọkà mmụta sayensị, owepụtara karia Akwụkwọ Research 20 n'ọtụtụ Local and International Scientific Conferences, tinyekwara ibipụta otu akwụkwọ na ihe edide 18
O lekọtara ndi Ogo Doktorate na Masters na Nnamdi Azikiwe University Awka na UNN
nke di na Naijiria
Ọbụna dị ka onye Ntuziaka ndi NAFDAC, Dr
Akunyili wepụtara oge ilekota ndi ụmụakwụkwọ postgraduate na College of Medicine UNN
Ọ bụkwa Chief Examiner in Pharmacology ndi 3rd MBBS College of Medicine, Abia State University Uturu, Naijiria
Akunyili bụkwara ọtụ onye ndi Pharmaceutical Society of Nigeria (PSN) ebe ọrụrụ dika

Ọ bụkwara otu onye ndi okachamara ndi ọzọ di na Naijiria dika Nigerian Society for Pharmacology, West African Society for Pharmacology, International Union of Pharmacology na International Pharmaceutical Federation
Akunyili nwekara ọtụtụ okwa na University of Nigeria Nsukka Senate dika
Akunyili’s high sense of responsibility led to her being made a member of the following Faculty of Pharmaceutical Sciences Committees (UNN), 1986–92
Akunyili bụkwa onye ụka Katọlik nke di ya bụ Dr J
Akunyili, of the University of Nigeria Teaching Hospital, Enugu ruo ọnwụ ya
Ha nwere ụmụ isii
Omume ntụrụndụ ya bụ igụ akwụkwọ nakwa ide akwụkwọ
Ndi oke isi si mba di iche iche nke tinyere Onye isi-ala Goodluck Jonathan na onye isi-ala nke gara-aga General Yakubu Gowon biara Olili ya nke emere n'abali iri abụọ n'asaa na iri abụọ n'asatọ
Akunyili was laid to rest at Agulu in Anambra state
Ụfọdụ inwe ndi Prof
Akunyili nwetara na ndụ ya bụ

N'ime Ụlọ Diary, onye ọ bụla bi n'ụlọ na-atụ vootu otu ma ọ bụ abụọ n'ime ndị bi n'ime ụlọ anọ ha chọrọ ịhapụ
A na-achụpụ onye ya na ya bi nke nwetara ọtụtụ vootu

Àtụ Big Brother Nigeria

Dorathy Kpentomun Mato bụ onye (amụrụ na 16 Septemba 1968) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye otu na-anọchite anya Vandeikiya / Konshisha Federal Constituency nke Benue Steeti na National Assembly (NASS) site na Ọktoba 2017
Mato nọchiri Maazị Herman Hembe, onye bụbu onyeisi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ na Federal Capital Territory mgbe a chụpụrụ ya site na mkpebi ikpe Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke kagburu nhọpụta ya na 23 June 2017

A mụrụ ya na ụbọchị iri na isii na onwa Septemba 1968 dị ka Dorathy Kpentomun Mato Kindred, Mbaduku na mpaghara Vandeikya nke Benue Steeti Dorathy Mato si n'obodo Mbatyough site n'ezinụlọ Kpentomun Mato onye ọrụ ugbo na Mbaduku na Vandeikya Local Government Area nke Benue steeti
Ọ bụ ezie na a zụlitere Mato n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo dara ogbenye n'ihi na ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-arụsi ọrụ ike mana ha ka ghọtara uru agụmakwụkwọ ma ha debanyere aha ya na RCM
Primary School maka agụmakwụkwọ nwata ya, site n'ebe ahụ ka o nwetara asambodo mbụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na 1979

Mgbe usoro mkpesa na-azọ ntụkwasị obi nke nhọpụta Hembe megide ya, na ụbọchị iri na atọ n'ọnwa June 2017 Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kwupụtara Dorathy Mato dị ka ezigbo onye nnọchi anya Vandeikiya / Konshisha nke Benue State ma kagbuo nhọpụta Herman Hembe, onye bụbu onyeisi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ na Federal Capital Territory onye e nyere ikike ahụ ma kwuo na ọ meriri ntuli aka ahụ n'oge ntuli aka nke 2015 Nigeria n'okpuru Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), ikpe nke hụrụ Mato dị ka onye a họpụtara n'ụzọ ziri ezi ka onye nnọchianya nke ndị nnọchi anya ya na Federal Assembly

Onye isi oche nke House of Representatives Yakubu Dogara jụrụ ịṅụ iyi na Dorathy Mato dị ka onye nọchiri Maazị Herman Hembe n'ihi ihe ndị nnọchi anya na-ekpugheghị mana, na mkpụrụ ụbọchị atọ na onwa Ọktoba 2017 onye isi oche ụlọ ahụ mechara ṅụọ iyi na Mato n'ọkwa

Dorathy Nyagh bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-egwu egwuregwu dị bekee kpọrọ Handball na onye isi nke Benue Queens na otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu edepụtara ịnọchite anya Naịjirịa na African Women's Handball Championship nke weere ọnọdụ na Yaoundé, Cameroon na June 6, 202
Dorathy malitere egwuregwu ya akpọrọ 'Handball' n'olu bekee mgbe ọ nọ n' ogo akwụkwọ dị nta na 2005 na Queen of the Rosary Secondary School Gboko
Onye nkuzi ya, Maazị Godwin Tondo nke a na-akpọkarị 'Gordons' na sekọndrị gbara ya ume bụ onye nyeere ya aka inwe mmasị n'ịgba Handball
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọakwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mahadum Benue State na 2009 ebe ọ gụrụ maka asụsụ bekee wee bụrụ onyeisi nke ụlọakwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ bụ naanị nwa agbọghọ n'ime ụmụ anọ, ndị mụrụ ya kwadoro mmasị ya maka egwuregwu ma nye ya nkwado niile iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na ya
Nna Dorathy bụkwa onye egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na College of Education na Katsina- Ala
ebe ọ na-akụzi na ngalaba nke kinetics mmadụ
Dorathy amalitela igwu egwu ma na-anọchite anya ụlọakwụkwọ ya ebe ọ bụ na ọ nọ na mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'oge egwuregwu ụlọakwụkwọ sekọndrị niile
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, mgbe ọ gwụsịrị egwu na mbipụta mbụ nke Prudent Energy Handball League, ọ gbara bọọlụ na Civil Defender Babes
N'afọ 2020, ya na ndị otu ya gbara bọọlụ na Prudent Energy Handball League Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka All Africa Games qualifiers
Mgbe ya na ndị otu ya ruru eru, a kpọrọ ha ka ha bịa egwuregwu ahụ
Na Morocco, ọ gbara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ egwuregwu niile
N'afọ 2021, o duru ndị otu ahụ gaa Naịjirịa na Women's Africa Handball Championship nke were ọnọdụ na Yaoundé, Cameroon
Dorcas Ajoke Adesokan (amụrụ na ụbọchị nke ise na ọnwa Julaị na afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na asatọ) bụ onye Naijiria na-egwu badminton
N'afọ puku abụọ iri na anọ, o ritere ọla nchara na African Championships na ụmụ nwanyị na-alụbeghị di na nwunye na ihe omume ngwakọta abụọ, na ọlaọcha na ihe omume ndị otu ngwakọta
N'ọnwa Juun, ọ meriri asọmpi mba Lagos na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
N'afọ puku abụọ iri na itoolu, ọ gara asọmpi n'egwuregwu Afrịka, merie ọla edo ngwakọta, ọlaọcha abụọ n'egwú ụmụ nwanyị na abụọ
N'afọ puku abụọ iri abụọ na otu, o sonyere na na afọ puku abụọ na iri abuo Summer Olympics
Dorcas Gyimah (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ na 100 mita na 200 mita
Ọ nọchitere anya Ghana na mita 200 na afọ 2015 African Games
A họpụtara Gyimah ka ọ nọchite anya Ghana na 4 × 100 mita relay na afọ 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
A họrọghị Gyimah ka ọ gbaa ọsọ na okpomọkụ ma ndị otu ahụ agafeghị na nke ikpeazụ

Dorcas Muthoni (a mụrụ n'afọ 1979, Nyeri ) bụ onye Kenya bụ onye ọchụnta ego, ọkà mmụta sayensị kọmputa na onye guzobere OPENWORLD LTD, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ngwanrọ ọ malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ 24
Site na ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego na ọkà mmụta sayensị kọmputa, Muthoni na-achọ ịhụ nkà na ụzụ na-agbanwe ndụ nke ọha mmadụ, gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ Afrịka
Dorcas gụrụ sayensị Kọmputa - Sayensị Kọmputa na Mahadum nke Nairobi, nwere ọzụzụ pụrụ iche na netwọk wireless, nkwukọrịta redio na atụmatụ teknụzụ, n'etiti isiokwu ndị ọzọ
Site na ọrụ ya kwa ụbọchị dị ka nwanyị ọchụnta ego na ọkà mmụta sayensị kọmputa, ọ na-achọ ịhụ ka nkà na ụzụ na-agbanwe ndụ nke ọha mmadụ na azụmahịa Afrịka

OPENWORLD etinyela aka na nnyefe nke ụfọdụ ngwa weebụ na igwe ojii a na-ejikarị eme ihe na Africa, dị ka ARIS, ngwa akụkọ nke African Union nke mba 54 niile so na ya na-eji; Usoro Nchịkwa Ọrụ maka Gọọmentị Kenya, na-arụ ọrụ nkwekọrịta arụmọrụ na ngalaba ọha na eze; na OpenBusiness, igwe ojii na-agbanwe agbanwe nke dabeere na obere na obere njikwa azụmahịa
Muthoni bụkwa onye guzobere nzukọ mpaghara AfChix, atụmatụ ndụmọdụ na iwulite ikike maka ụmụ nwanyị na kọmputa n'ofe Afrịka

Kemgbe afọ 2004, ọrụ AfChix gụnyere ịhazi Nzukọ Ọrụ Kọmputa kwa afọ na mmesi ike pụrụ iche n'ịgba ume ọrụ kọmputa maka ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ agbọghọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị; mmepe ọrụ na-aga n'ihu maka ụmụ nwanyị na teknụzụ na ịme ihe ngosi maka ụmụ nwanyị na-abịanụ na kọmputa
Mmasị a na itinye aka emeela ka ọ bụrụ ihe nlereanya n'onwe ya, maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ na obodo Afrịka
Muthoni abụrụla onye otu Internet Society (ISOC) na Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) na World Bank infoDev Global Forum

N'afọ 2008, ọ bụ onye mmeri Anita Borg Institute for Women and Technology's Change Agent award na n'afọ 2009 a họpụtara ya dị ka Women's Forum Rising Talent, netwọk nke ụmụ nwanyị nwere nkà dị ukwuu nwere ike ịghọ ndị nwere mmetụta n'ọdịnihu
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya dị ka World Economic Forum Young Global Leader, otu ndị isi a ma ama si gburugburu ụwa n'okpuru afọ iri anọ

N'afọ 2017, Mahadum Pompeu Fabra mere Honoris Causa maka ọrụ ya dị ịrịba ama n'ịkwalite ọmụmụ injinia n'etiti ụmụ agbọghọ na Afrịka, ndụmọdụ nke ndị na-eto eto, na nkwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ọgụ megide ịda ogbenye
O nwetara onyinye Anita Borg Institute for Women and Technology's Change Agent n'afọ 2008
Àtụ Internet Hall of Fame
Dorcas Shola Fapson bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na onye na ekwuputa okwu na onyonyo na Naịjirịa, ọ onye ama ama maka ọrụ ya na MTV's Shuga dị ka 'Sophie'
N'afọ 2020, ọ laghachiri na usoro MTV Shuga ka ọ na -ekwu maka okwu coronavirus, ya na ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na -ese ihe nkiri, n'ọtụtụ mba Africa
A mụrụ Fapson na London na 1990
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 14 na ọ were akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Criminology England
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara n'ihu na -amụ ime ihe nkiri na New York
Ọ pụtala na usoro nke 3 nke MTV Shuga dị ka 'Sophie' na ọ bụ onye na -eweta usoro ajụjụ ọnụ 'The Juice' maka NdaniTV
Ọ nọ n'usoro 3 MTV Shuga wee laghachite dị ka ọkachamara ahụike 'Sophie' mgbe ọ banyere n'ime obere usoro akpọrọ MTV Shuga Alone Together na- akọwapụta nsogbu Coronavirus na 2020
Tunde Aladese dere usoro ahụ wee gbasaa ruo ọtụtụ abalị - ndị na -akwado ya gụnyere United Nations
Usoro a dabere na Naịjirịa, South Africa, Kenya na Côte d'Ivoire na akụkọ ahụ ga-aga n'ihu site na iji mkparịta ụka ịntanetị n'etiti ndị odide
Dorcus Acen nke a makwaara dị ka Dorcas Acen bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Alebtong District na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda

O guzoro dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Alebtong District na Nzukọ nke iri nke Uganda dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere onwe ya mana Christine Acen nke jikọtara ya na National Resistance Movement meriri ya
Christine Acen bụ nwanyị a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka Alebtong na afo 2016
Christine gụsịrị Senior Six wee malite ịrụ ọrụ ya
Na ntuli aka nke afo 2021, Dorcus Acen nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement dị ka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị
N'oge mkpọsa ya, o nyere ndị ambulance abụọ na mpaghara obodo ya iji nyere aka n'ịchịkwa ikpe ndị a na-enye na mpaghara ahụ ma bulie mmeghachi omume ngwa ngwa maka ọrịa COVID-19
O nyekwara posho na agwa nye ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ na mpaghara ahụ bụ ndị ụzọ ha si ebi ndụ metụtara mkpọchi ahụ na usoro ndị ọzọ nke onye isi ala na-eme iji jikwaa COVID-19, na mba niile
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na GBV Prevention Network dị ka onye na-elekwasị anya maka ime ihe ike mmekọahụ na VAW na ọnọdụ mberede
Na afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na nchekwa na CARE International na South Sudan, ebe ọ na-ahụ maka ntụziaka zuru oke nke mmemme gbasara nwoke na nwoke
Doreen Amata (a mụrụ ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 1988 na Legos, Naijiria ) bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-egwu egwuregwu bụ ọkachamara na ihe omume ị wuli elu
Amata nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2008, rite ọkwa nke iri na isii n'ogo niile
O ritere ọla edo maka obodo ya nke West Afrịlka na 2007 All-Africa Games
Amata zọrọ Naịjirịa asọmpi na asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2016, mana o rughị agba nke ikpeazụ
Ọ bụ onye nnọchite anya Naijiria n'emume mmechi ahụ
Ihe omume ọ kacha mee ọfụm na ya bụ ihe omume nke mita 195 Ọutdoors (n'Abuja n'afọ 2008, na Daegu n'afọ 2011) na mita 193 (na Banska Bystrica n'afọ 2016)
Doreen Ruth Amule, onye a maara dị ka Doreen Aumule, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwụ na-anọchite anya mpaghara ụmụ nwanyị nke Amolatar, kemgbe 2017
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ịwu ndị omeiwu na-ese okwu iji wepụ afọ ole onye isi ala Ugandan, dịka edepụtara na Iwu Ugandan nke 1995
A mụrụ ya na Amolatar District, na 28 Ọktoba 1882
Ọ gara Masindi Secondary School n'etiịịafọ 1998 na 2001, maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na Wanale View Secondary School, na Mbale, maka agụm akwụkwọ A-Level ya, site na 2002 ruo 2003
N'afọ 2004, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Islam dị na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2007 na Bachelors na Human Resource Management
N'afọ 2010, ọ gara Law Development Centre na Kampala, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na asambodo na Iwu Nchịkwa
Ka e mesịrị, na 2014, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Business Administration na Mahadum Nkumba
N'afọ 2008, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Naịl na ogige Arua, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Gọọmentị Obodo Amolatar District
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Women Caucus na Amolatar District, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ n'afọ 2016

N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Network for Locally Elected Women of Africa (REFELA), na dịka onye isi oche of the Ethics and Accountability Committee of the Uganda Local Government Association
Site na 2011 ruo 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Amolatar District Local Council
N'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere oche ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara ụmụ nwanyị nke Amolatar District
Ọ gbara ọsọ na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement na-achị
Ọ meriri ma bụrụ onye nọ n'ọkwa
Doreen Nyanjura (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1989) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye a họpụtara na 18 Jụni 2020, dịka osote Lord Mayor maka Kampala, na-anọchi Sarah K Gameu

Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye a họpụtara na Local Council 5 (LCV) Woman Councillor, na-anọchite anya Mahadum Makerere na Kampala Capital City Authority, òtù na-achị Kampala, isi obodo na obodo kachasị ukwuu nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ọ nọ ugbu a n'afọ 2016
A mụrụ Doreen Nyanjura n'ihe dị ka 1989, na Fort Portal, Kabarole District, na Western Region nke Uganda
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ, n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne asaa
Nne na nna ya kewara mgbe ụmụaka ahụ ka dị obere; ụmụaka ahụ na nna ha tolịtere ma gaa leta nne ha n'oge ezumike ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nna ya, Samson Muhenda, onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, jere ozi dị ka osote onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Nyakasura School
Doreen gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'ógbè ahụ
N'afọ 2003, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị ụmụ nwanyị Kyebambe, na Fort Portal, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ O-Level ya wee nweta asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda
Maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya, ọ gara Masheruka Girls School, n'oge ahụ na Bushenyi District, mana ugbu a na Sheema District
Na Musheruka Girls School, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education
N'afọ 2009, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ukwuu na nke kachasị ochie na Uganda, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Bachelor na Tourism, afọ atọ ka e mesịrị
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, e debara aha ya na mmemme nzere postgraduate nke Master of Arts na iwu ọha, na Mahadum Makerere
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Doreen malitere na 2001 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
O chere na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala Kiiza Besigye enyeghị ya ohere egwuregwu ziri ezi iji gosipụta ma kọwaa nkwupụta ya
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị obere ịtụ vootu, ọ gwara nna ya ka ọ tụgharịa vootu maka Besigye
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị, na-ekere òkè na ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ megide ụfọdụ ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na nri ụlọ akwụkwọ ọjọọ na Kyebambe Girls' School
Na Masheruka Girls School, a họpụtara ya dịka onyeisi oche nke kansụl ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nke a nyere ya obi ike na nkà idu ndú ya ma mee ka ọ bụrụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ya, Forum for Democratic Change (FDC)
Na mahadum, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ịhazi maka FDC
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke Makerere University Guild, ma hazie ma ọ bụ sonye n'ọtụtụ ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbalị ya dọtara uche ndị isi otu FDC
N'afọ 2012, e jidere ya maka ide akwụkwọ 'Is It a Fundamental Change?'
Akwụkwọ ahụ katọrọ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị, National Resistance Movement
E jidere ya na onye na-ede akwụkwọ ahụ, Ibrahim Bagaya Kisubi
Ikpe ahụ dara, mana onye a na-ebo ebubo nọrọ oge n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Luzira Maximum Security Prison
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mbụ ya, ọ jụrụ ọnọdụ na-adịgide adịgide na Uganda National Social Security Fund ma kama ọ malitere ọrụ nyocha nwa oge na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ya na ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 2016, o meriri n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị LCV na Kampala Capital City Authority
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị FDC, bu Doreen Nyanjura ụzọ dị ka onye nnọchiteanya nke pati ahụ maka onye isi oche KCCA, ọnọdụ ọhụrụ e mepụtara
Àtụ Kabarole District
Doreen Sibanda bụ onye Zimbabwe a mụrụ na UK, onye nlekọta na onye nchịkwa nka
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe kemgbe afọ 2004
A mụrụ Sibanda na United Kingdom nye na nne na nna Jamaica
Nne na nna ya gbara ya ume ịhọrọ ọrụ na Education dị ka onye nkuzi nka
Ọ lụrụ Dr Misheck Sibanda
E gosipụtara ọrụ Doreen Sibanda na ọtụtụ mba dị iche iche dịka Czech Republic, Russia na Zimbabwe
Nke a mere ka ọ kwaga Zimbabwe n'afọ 1981–88, na-arụ ọrụ nchịkwa na National Gallery of Zimbabwe dị ka onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya

Sibanda edeela ma dezie ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Zimbabwe Stone Sculpture A retrospective, 1957-2004, The Zimbabwe Integrated Teacher Education Course (1982), na Mawonero Modern and Contemporary Art in Zimbabwe (2015)
Doreen Southwood (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye nwe ụlọ ahịa nke dị na Cape Town
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche na ọrụ nka ya, na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, ihe, mbipụta, ihe nkiri, na ihe ndị ọzọ, nke ọ na-adabere na ahụmịhe onwe ya na nnyocha onwe ya

Eziokwu ya banyere ntụpọ onwe onye na usoro mmegide na ịnagide nke na-eso ndị na-agbaso omenala, ndị nọ n'etiti, ịzụlite ndị Afrikaans na-eme ka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya mara, na-adọrọ uche gaa n'ụzọ ndị a na-emechi ụmụ nwanyị ma ọ bụ na-egbochi ha n'ụzọ ọzọ na oghere ahụ
N'afọ 2003, a kpọrọ Southwood onye mmeri nke Brett Kebble Art Awards maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara ya, 'The Swimmer'
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ gosipụtara nwa agbọghọ na-ele anya n'ihu ka ọ na-eguzo na njedebe nke bọọdụ mmiri
Maka onyinye a, Southwood natara R100,000, n'oge ahụ bụ onyinye kachasị ukwuu maka otu ọrụ nka na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Senegal, Cuba, New York City, na South Africa
N'afọ 2001 ọ meghere ụlọ ahịa na Cape Town a na-akpọ Mememe, nke na-achọ ime ka ọrụ nke ndị na-emepụta ejiji n'Afrịka dịrị ọha na eze
Ụlọ ahịa Mememe ọzọ meghere na Johannesburg n'afọ 2011
E gosipụtara atụmatụ nke Southwood n'ime izu ejiji na Johannesburg na Cape Town ma mara ya maka igosipụta ihe ndị metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na nostalgic

ya na Fine Arts na Mahadum Stellenbosch na 1998

Doria Achour (a mụrụ na 1 Machị 1991) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na France-Tunisia
Achour bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri mba Tunisia Lotfi Achour na nne Russia bụ onye na-ede egwuregwu
Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bụ onye na-ede egwuregwu, o nwekwara nwanne nwoke nke obere
Achour tolitere na 12th arrondissement nke Paris n'ọnọdụ nke bụ 'ebe nka, mana ọ bụghị nke ndị ọgaranya'
Dịka nwatakịrị, ọ na-eso ndị mụrụ ya n'oge ha na-eme mmega ahụ na n'egwuregwu ha
N'afọ 2002, Achour gosipụtara nwa nwanyị Sergi López na Les Femmes
ou les enfants d'abord
[fr], nke Manuel Poirier duziri
Nne ya nyeere ya aka ịchọta ọrụ ahụ, na-ahụ mgbasa ozi na Libération
Mgbe ọrụ mbụ ya gasịrị, Achor gara nkuzi ime ihe nkiri otu afọ na Théâtre des Déchargeurs
O nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ nke abụọ na ihe nkiri ole na ole, dịka L'enemi naturel na L'École pour tous Iji lekwasị anya na ọmụmụ ya, Achour kwụsịrị ọrụ ihe nkiri ya ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Achour nwetara akara ugo mmụta na akwụkwọ na Mahadum Paris-Sorbonne ma mesịa nweta nzere masta na sinima na Mahadim Paris Diderot
N'afọ 2012, Achour mere Yasmeen na La fille publique, ọ bụkwa ndụ Cheyenne Carron kpaliri àgwà ya
N'afọ 2013, Achour duziri ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya, Laisse-moi finir, na isiokwu nke ndụ na Tunisia mgbe Arab Spring gasịrị mgbe ndị Islamist weghaara ikike
E gosipụtara ya n'ọtụtụ ememme ma nata onyinye ndị na-ege ntị na asọmpi ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke Made in Med nke ọnwa June afọ 2014
Ọrụ ya na La fille publique dọtara uche onye nduzi Sylvie Ohayon, onye mere ka nwa agbọghọ ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Stephanie na ihe nkiri afọ 2014 Papa Was Not a Rolling Stone
N'afọ 2016, Achour pụtara na ihe nkiri Arabic mbụ ya, Burning Hope Ọ duziri ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Le reste est l'œuvre de l'homme, nke meriri Jury Prize na Sundance Film Festival
nke afọ 2017
Ọ rụrụ Leila, nwa nwanyị furu efu, na ihe nkiri Naidra Ayadi nke afọ 2018 Ma fille
Achur bụ onye agnostic
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado akwụkwọ oge ochie

Alton Dorian Clark (amụrụ yá n'ubochí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, n'afọ 1984), nke a maara dịka Dorian, bụ onye America na-eti egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ede egwu, na onye nkuzi basketball si Indianapolis, Indiana
A mụrụ Alton Dorian Clark n'ubochí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, n'afọ 1984 na Dyess Air Force base na Abilene, Texas
Nne ya gụrụ ya aha onye na-eme ihe nkiri Dorian Harewood onye si obodo nne na nna ya bụ Dayton, Ohio
Nna ya bụ onye ọrụ ụgbọelu na United States Air Force nke mere ka Dorian kwaga ugboro asaa tupu ọ dị afọ iri
Nne na nna Dorian tolitere n'oge afọ 1970s funk oge ma na-akpọkarị ndị na-ese ihe dịka The Ohio Players, Lakeside na Bootsy Collins nke ga-emesị metụta Dorian n'egwú
Dorian mụtara otú e si agụ egwu ógè ọ dị afọ itoolu mgbe ọ na-akpọ opi na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị

Na klas nke isii, ezinụlọ Dorian kwagara Indianapolis, Indiana ebe ọ na-akpọ ịgba na ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti ma na-abụ abụ na ukwe ụka Baptist ya site na klas nke asatọ ruo ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na North Central High School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Indiana-Bloomington, Dorian kpọrọ oku ekwentị oyi narị asatọ ma zipụ ozi ịntanetị oyi otu puku na narị atọ na-enwe olileanya inweta ọrụ nkuzi basketball
Dorian ga-enweta ọrụ na Lees-McRae College na Banner Elk, North Carolina

N'afọ 2009, Dorian debara aha ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Central Florida ma zụọ basketball ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Montverde Academy n'okpuru Kevin Sutton N'oge ezumike, ọ zụrụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Mahadum nke Florida bụ Patric Young Dorian ga-azụkwa ọzụzụ na Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth n'okpuru Shaka Smart na Mahadum Jacksonville n'okpuru Cliff Warren
N'afọ 2012, Dorian dere maka ihe banyere ESPN's TrueHoop Network na-ekpuchi Orlando Magic
N'ụbọchị Valentine n'afọ 2014, Dorian zụtara ngwanrọ mmepụta egwu nke Apple Logic Pro X
Ọ kụziiri onwe ya otu esi eme egwu site na nkuzi YouTube
N'afọ 2015, Dorian bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa dijitalụ
N'ụbọchị Valentine n'afọ 2015, Dorian wepụtara ọrụ izizi ya, The DUCK
Tape
Dorian laghachiri Indianapolis wee bídó ịrụ ọrụ nke abụọ ya na onye na-emepụta egwu Joey French
Dorian na Joey French zutere ógè ha na-aga Mahadum Indiana
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, Dorian wepụtara “Sunshine” dị ka onye ndu na abọm nke abụọ ya

N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, Dorian wepụtara LP ya nke abụọ zuru oke Every Scar Has A Story Ọ bụla Scar Has A Story bụ onye isi nke Joey French mepụtara ma gosipụta onye na-eme ihe ọchị Rob Sherrell Onye nchịkọta akụkọ AllMusic bụ Paul Simpson na-ekwu, 'ụdị mmepụta ya na nkà ịkọ akụkọ ya nwere ihe jikọrọ ya na 80s na 90s hip-hop (ya na Warren G na Dr
Dre dị ka mmetụta bụ isi)ma ụda ya gụnyere mmetụta ndị ọzọ dị ugbu a dị ka ọnyà na Kanye West
N'afọ 2018, Dorian hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ egwu, Òtù iri asatọ na abụọ
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2018, Òtù iri asatọ na abụọ natara nkwanye ùgwù mba site na United States Chamber of Commerce maka ihe ịga nke ọma akụ na ụba ha
Dorian depụtara Kanye West's The College Dropout, JAY-Z's The Blueprint, Eminem's The Eminem Show, Nas' Stillmatic na Yo Gotti's Back 2 Da Basics dị ka abọm rap kachasị amasị ya ná mgbé niile
N'ọnwa Juun ụbọchị iri na asaa, n'afọ 2019, Dorian kwupụtara ọmụmụ nwa ya nwanyị Nova site na Instagram
(feat
Mark Battles)
Dorian Corey (ubochí isii n'ọnwa Juun, 1937 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1993) bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkírí na ónyé na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ pụtara na Wigstock mà gosipụta ya na ihe ngosi Jennie Livingston nke 1990 Paris Is Burning
A mụrụ Corey na Buffalo, New York na Franklin Legg na Mary Fox Clark na-alụbeghị di, ọ bụ ezie na ha mechara lụọ úbọchị irí nà asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1947
E kenyere Dorian nwoke mgbè a mụrụ ya, mana o mechara ghọta na ọ bụ nwanyị trans
N'ịbụ ónyé a zụlitere n'ugbo dị na Buffalo, Dorian malitere ịrụ ọrụ na drag mgbè ọ hapụrụ ọbọdọ Buffalo
N'afọ 1950, Corey rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-edozi windo na Hengerer's, wee kwaga New York City iji mụọ nka na Parsons
N'afọ ndị 1960, Corey gàrà njem dị ka ónyé na-agba egwú agwọ na Pearl Box Revue, ihe nkiri cabaret
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkírí anọ pụtara na 1972 Pearl Box Revue LP Call Me MISSter
Corey bụkwa ónyé guzobere ụlọ Corey, na-ejide ihe karịrị nnukwu ihe nrite irí isé site na bọọlụ voguing
Ọ bụkwa 'nne ụlọ' Angie Xtravaganza, ónyé mechara bụrụ nné ụlọ nke ya ma gosipụta ya na Paris Is Burning
N'August ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu, 1993, Corey nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbụ ndị metụtara ọrịa AIDS na Columbia Presbyterian Medical Center na Manhattan mgbè ọ dị afọ 56
A chụsasịrị ozu Corey ọkụ n'ime mmiri dị na City Island, New York

Ihe nketa Corey ka bụ otu ihe dị mkpà màkà ọbọdọ ndị na-adọkpụ na ndị na-agba egwú, na mkpa ọ dị na mmepe nke voguing dị ka isi nkuku nke omenala ịgba egwú nke New York ka a na-asọpụrụ ma na-echeta ya n'oge a
Ndị na-akwado Corey, ndị enyi na ndị ezinụlọ na-echeta ya màkà nkà ihe ọmụma ya dị mfe nke '[onye ọ bụla] chọrọ ime ka mmetụta dị mma, ụfọdụ akara n'ụwa
Ị gaghị agba ụwa dum
Echere m na ọ ka mma naanị ịnụ ụtọ ya
Kụọ ụgwọ gị, ma nwee obi ụtọ na ya
Ọ bụrụ na ị gbaa ụta ma ọ na-aga elu, hooray màkà gị
Àtụ Soundbox
Doris Amelia Blackburn (née Hordern; 18 Septemba 1889 12 Disemba 1970) bụ onye Australia na-eme mgbanwe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na House of Representatives site na 1946 ruo 1949, nwanyị nke abụọ na-esote Enid Lyons ime otú ahụ
Blackburn bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama ma bụrụkwa onye otu Labour Party
Ọ lụrụ Maurice Blackburn, onye otu Labour MP, mana a chụpụrụ ya na pati ahụ na 1937 ma ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na pati ahụ iji kwado ya
Di ya nwụrụ na afọ 1944, a họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mbụ ya na ntuli aka gọọmentị etiti nke afọ 1946 bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ ndị omeiwu dị ka onye nweere onwe ya
Otú ọ dị, Blackburn jere ozi naanị otu oge tupu e merie ya
O mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom

A mụrụ ya na Hawthorn, Melbourne, Victoria na Lebbeus Hordern, onye na-ahụ maka ala, na nwunye ya Louisa Dewson (née Smith), Doris Hordern tinyere aka na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na nsogbu udo site na nwata ma jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ mkpọsa nke Vida Goldstein, nwanyị mbụ na-azọ ọkwa maka ntuli aka na ndị omeiwu etiti na Australia
Ọ lụrụ Maurice Blackburn, onye otu firebrand socialist, na Melbourne na 10 Disemba 1914 ma nọrọ n'oge ezumike ezumike ha na-ahazi mkpọsa megide agha na megide ịdebanye aha

Mgbe di ya jere ozi n'oge dị iche iche dị ka onye otu Australian Labor Party (ALP) nke ndị omeiwu Victoria na Federal, Blackburn gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na okwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ụfọdụ n'ime ha mere ka ya na ndị otu Labour Party (nke ya onwe ya bụkwa onye otu) na mgbe a chụpụrụ Maurice na pati ahụ, na 1937, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ALP
Di ya gara n'ihu na-anọdụ ala na ndị omeiwu dị ka onye nweere onwe ya mana ọ tụfuru oche ya na ntuli aka gọọmentị etiti nke 1943 n'aka onye ọrụ gọọmentị, ma nwụọ n'afọ sochirinụ

N'ịbụ onye iwe ji n'emeso di ya nke Labor, Blackburn guzoro dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye ọrụ Independent Labour maka oche ochie di ya nke Bourke na ntuli aka afọ 1946, site na mmeri ya ọ ghọrọ naanị nwanyị nke abụọ a họpụtara na House of Representatives nke Australia

Na nzuko omebe iwu Blackburn, onye ya na onye otu Labour ibe ya bụ Jack Lang, kwadoro okwu ndị yiri nke di ya nwụrụ anwụ, na-enweta aha ọjọọ na mba niile na afọ, 1947 dị ka naanị onye omebe iwu na-atụ vootu megide Atomic Energy Bill
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Council for Civil Liberties
Mgbe a na-ekesa ya na ntuli aka, e wepụrụ oche ya nke Bourke, na ntuliaka 1949 ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche ọhụrụ nke Wills
N'asọmpi ya na ndị otu Labour na ndị Liberal, ọ bịara nke atọ na pasent 20
N'ịguzo na Wills ọzọ na ntuli aka nke afọ 1951, ọ bịakwara nke atọ na pasent iri na asaa nke votu
Ugboro abụọ ahụ, ndị ọrụ meriri oche ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule Septemba n'afọ 1949, Blackburn bụ onye otu iwu nke Australian Peace Council
Blackburn mechara nọgide na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
N'ịghọta nsogbu ndị Aborigines na-eche ihu, mgbe ọ gachara Woomera Rocket Range, ya na Douglas Nicholls guzobere Aborigines Advancement League na Federal Council for Aboriginal Advancement
Blackburn nwụrụ na 12 Disemba 1970 na Coburg, Victoria, dị afọ 81, ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ na otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ
Doris Bloom (amụrụ n'afọ 1954 nà Vereeniging, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe nà South Africa nké na-etinye ihe osise n'ime ọrụ ya
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ nà Denmark
N'afọ 1972, Bloom gàrà Johannesburg College of Art ma mesịa gaa Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts n'afọ 1976
Ọ natala Queen Ingrid's Great Roman Grant, Villiam H
Michaelsen's Grant, na The State Art Council's Grant
Doris Bloom bụ ónyé Juu
Bloom egosiwo ihe ngosi kemgbe 1977
Màkà ihe ngosi, a maara ya màkà ime ihe n'onwe ya yana mmekorita
A makwaara Bloom maka arụmọrụ n'oge ngosi, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-agụnye ya na-eme ihe ngosi n'ihu ọrụ a rụchara, mana ụfọdụ na-agụnyekwa ya ịmepụta ihe osise n'ihu ndị na-ekiri ya
Bloom na-eji ọtụtụ usoro mgbasa ozi dị iche iche màkà ọrụ ya; mmanụ, watercolor, crayon, na mgbasa ozi ngwakọta
Doris Davenport, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ doris davenport (amụrụ na 29 ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 1949), bụ onye edemede, onye nkuzi, na onye na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na'egwuregwu uri
O dere edemede gosipụtara na This Bridge Called My Back Writings by Radical Women of Color nke akpọrọ 'The Pathology of Racism A Conversation with Third World Wimmin'
Ọ na-elekwasịkwa anya na uri na agụmakwụkwọ
Davenport na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka onye Afrịka Amerịka, Appalachian, Feminist, na LGBTQ, nke niile na-emetụta ihe odide ya nke ukwuu
Taa, ọ na-enwe ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe na ihe ngosi uri
A mụrụ Davenport na Gainesville, Georgia, ma zụlite ya na Cornelia, Georgia
Ọ na-ekwukarị banyere ndụ ya na-etolite n'okpuru ugwu Appalachian ma dee ọtụtụ uri e bipụtara na Appalachien Heritage
O nwere Bachelor of Arts (BA) na Bekee site na Paine College
Ọ nwetara Mater of Arts (MA) na Bekee na Mahadum dị na Buffalo
O nwetara Doctorate of Philosophy (PhD) na Literature na Mahadum nke Southern California
N'ime edemede dị afọ iri anọ, 'The Pathology of Racism A Conversation with Third World Wimmin,' ọ na-ekwu maka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ dị ka ọrịa (nke na-emetụta ndị ọcha na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị)
davenport na-atụle ọhụụ nke ịdị mma n'etiti ndị inyom niile, n'ụwa niile, ma kwuo na enwere ọtụtụ nsogbu ndị ọzọ ị ga-elekwasị anya
N'ime edemede ndị na-adịbeghị anya, davenport lekwasịrị anya na uri nke Afrịkan Amerịkan wimmin, na nso nso a, Brenda Marie Osbey nke New Orleans, LA
Otu n'ime mmetụta ya dị ka onye edemede bụ site na ọtụtụ njirimara ya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, onye na-akpọ onwe ya nwaanyị na-edina nwaanyị ịbe ya, davenport na-etinye uri sitere na ndụ ya nke na-agba gburugburu ya na-ebute ụmụ nwanyị ụzọ
Nchịkọta uri ya nke onwe ya bipụtara dị ka nke a bụ akwụkwọ uri mbụ ya bipụtara, nke mikpuru n'echiche ụwa nke mmụọ
Doris Jacob Onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri na isii n'ime onwa Desemba n'afọ 1981, bụ Sprinta Nigeria ma bụrụ ọkachamara na 400 mita
Doris mgbara onye nke asaa na mita 4 x 400 na 1997 World Championship, ya na ndị otu egwuregwu Olabisi Afolabi, Fatima Yusuf na Falilat Ogunkoya

Isonye na egwuregwu a na 2000 Summer Olympics, ndị otu a gunyere Jacob, Afolabi, Rosemary Okafor na Charity Opara setịpụrụ akụkọ mba nke nkeji 3 2299 na ọṅụṅụ ọkụ Jacob nyekwara aka nweta nrite ọla nchara na 2002 Commonwealth Games
Na ọkwa onye ọ bụla, Jekọb ritere ọla ọcha na 2003 All-Africa Games na ọla nchara na 1999 Summer Universiade, onye a n'ekwu maka ya na oge kachasị ya mma bụ 5104 sekọnd
Doris Simeon bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri n'asụsụ yoroba na bekee,nke bụkw onye Edo Steeti
A mụrụ Simeon na Legos,nke Naijiria
N'ịbụ onye a zụlitere ma gụọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Ojota nke Legos,na Naijiria, Doris bidoro ihe nkiri site n'ihe nkiri nke Nollywood nke afọ 2001 aha ya bụ Oloju Ede

Doris Frema Wiredu (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1964) bụ nwanyị Ghana lara ezumike nká na-eme egwuregwu n'egwuregwu nke na-eme ihe nkiri na mita 100
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na afo 1984 African Championships na ihe omume ahụ, na ọlaọcha abụọ na 100 mita na 400 mita na mbipụta na afọ 1985
Ihe kacha mma ya na 100 mita bụ 1175, nke e debere na 1985

O mekwara asọmpi maka Ghana na afo 1984 Summer Olympics na Los Angeles dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana 4 × 100 mita, nke mechara nke ise na okpomọkụ nke ọkara ikpeazụ, n'enweghị ọganihu na agba ikpeazụ
Asusu Dorop
Dorothy A
Atabong bụ onye Canada na-eme ihe nkiri, odee na onye mmepụta ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka Sound of Tears nke o nwetara ihe nrite dị iche iche gụnyere ihe nrite ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy na 2015

Atabong nwetara nyocha dị mma maka mmepụta ihe nkiri dị ka Wedding Band, The Africa Trilogy site na Volcano Theatre, akụkụ nke Luminato Arts Festival na Stratford Festival, Ụlọ ọrụ Canada Stage na Studio 180 mmepụta nke The Overwhelming
AAtabong bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ịhụnanya, The Princess of Kaya, na 2002, bụ nke o mesịrị gbanwee n'ime ihe nkiri
Ogologo ihe odide ya, Obi Daisy, meriri Akwụkwọ edemede mmefu ego kacha mma na 2011 Female Eye Film Festival na Toronto
O dekwara, mepụta na kpakpando na Sound of Tears, obere ihe nkiri nke malitere na Montreal World Film Festival
Ihe ngosi TV gụnyere ihe nrite na-emeri usoro telivishọn Mayday, Ocean Landing ( African Hijack ) maka Channel Discovery ; Degrassi Ọgbọ na-abịa na ahịrị maka netwọkụ ihe nkiri

Atabong nwekwara kpakpando na Glo, akụkụ nke The Africa Trilogy nke Josette Bushell-Mingo duziriỌrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere The Studio 180 na Canadian Stage Company mmepụta nke The Overwhelming site JT Rogers, na Theater Awakening si mmepụta nke Darfur na Theater Passe Muraille maka SummerWorks, nke ọ nwetara Emerging Artist Award
Atabong lụrụ di na 2008 wee mụọ ụmụ nwoke abụọ, otu a mụrụ na 2011 nke ọzọ na 2015

Na 2013 Atabong pụtara na CBC Radio show Metro Morning na Matt Galloway iji kwurịta nsogbu nke ime ihe ike ezinụlọ megide ụmụ nwanyị, na ihe nkiri ya bụ Sound of Tears for the National Day of Remembrance and Action on Violence Against Women on December 6, 2013
Dorothy Akpene Amenuke bụ onye Ghana Sculptor / fiber Artist na Lecturer
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi ugbu a na Ngalaba eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ na ngalaba nke Fine Art, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST)
A mụrụ Amenuke n'afọ 1968 ma si Adzokoe-Peki, na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana
Ọ gụrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Mahadum Kwame Nkrumah nke Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ nke Ghana (KNUST) dị ka onye na-agụ akwụkwọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na KNUST maka MA ya na Art Education, MFA na Sculpture, na PhD na Sculpture
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi nka na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na nke sekọndrị site n'afọ 1987 ruo n'afọ 2004
Ọrụ Amenuke dị na nchịkọta nke Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam
Dorothy Azairwe Nshaija Kabaraitsya (amụrụ na 15 Disemba 1974) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan nke Kamwenge District na onye na-ahụ maka ego site na ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti nke nwere njikọ na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị achị nke National Resistance Movement na Nzukọ nke iri nke Uganda
O nwetara diplọma Uganda na Business Studies na Makerere University Business School na 1998
N'afọ 1998, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Business Administration na Mahadum Makerere
Site na 2011 ruo taa, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi mpaghara nke Rwenzori Region na Office of the Government Chief Whip
Site na 2016 ruo taa, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke Uganda Women Parliamentary Association
N'agbata afọ 2000 na afọ 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ego na Uganda Finance Trust
Site na 2004 ruo 2009, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego nke Bunyoro Toro Rural Development Company Limited
Site na 2010 ruo taa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke National Resistance Movement
Site n'afọ 2011 ruo taa, ọ bụ onye omeiwu na ụlọ omeiwu nke Uganda
Dorothy Detzer (December 1, 1893 na Ft
Wayne, Indiana- January 7, 1981 na Monterey, California) bụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke US nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (1924-1946)
Dị ka onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Detzer kpebiri ịhapụ usoro kọleji ọdịnala, na-ahọrọ ịga njem na Far East ma biri nwa oge na Philippines
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na US, ọ gara biri na Hull House, na-aga Chicago School of Civics and Philanthropy mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ nke Juvenile Protective Association
Na ngwụcha Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ nọrọ otu afọ na Austria na-arụ ọrụ enyemaka maka Kọmitii Ọrụ Ndị Enyi America (AFSC)
O mechara nọrọ afọ abụọ na Russia dị ka onye nchịkwa enyemaka ụnwụ nri nke AFSC na ndagwurugwu Volga

N'ịhụ mbibi nke agha na ịtachi obi ọnwụ nke nwanne ya nwoke ejima Don, onye e gburu n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ ma nwụọ site na ọrịa na-adịgide adịgide, mere ka Detzer kwenye na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ezughị nakwa na ọ chọrọ ịrụsi ọrụ ike maka ihe ndị na-eme udo
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na US na 1924, Detzer ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ mba nke WILPF, ngalaba US
Detzer gbara mbọ maka ịmalite ọtụtụ nyocha iwu, ọkachasị nke Senator Gerald P
Nye malitere na ụlọ ọrụ mgbọ (1933-1936)
O nyere aka n'ilekwasị anya na mmegbu nke mba Afrịka, ọkachasị Ethiopia na Liberia, site na nkwenye azụmahịa US, gọọmentị Liberia nyekwara ya Humane Order of African Redemption na 1933 maka mbọ ndị a

O mekwara ka a họpụta otu nwanyị (Mary Woolley) na ndị nnọchi anya US na Geneva Disarmament Conference (1932), rụọ ọrụ maka nkwenye nke Russia dị ka onye otu ezinụlọ nke mba, na nnwere onwe maka Cuba site na ntinye aka US, ma kwuo maka nnọpụiche ka US na-eru nso Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
A na-akọ ihe omume nke afọ iri abụọ na, Washington n'akwụkwọ ya Appointment on the Hill (1948) nke e dere n'afọ mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ya na WILPF
Ọ lụrụ Ludwell Denny, onye nta akụkọ, na 1954 ma nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ sochirinụ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ mba ọzọ
Obere oge tupu ọnwụ di ya ##na 1970, Dennys hapụrụ Washington, DC
gaa West Coast, ebe Dorothy Detzer Denny nọgidere na Monterey, California, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Dorothy Elizabeth Evans (6 Mee 1888 na 28 Ọgọst 1944) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na Britain
Na mbido Agha Ụwa Mbụ ọ bụ onye na-ahazi agha maka Women's Social and Political Union e jidere ugboro abụọ na Belfast maka ebubo bọmbụ
Ọ kewapụrụ na Christabel Pankhurst na WSPU n'afọ 1914 n'ihi nkwado ha maka agha ahụ, ma nọgide ruo ọgwụgwụ ndụ ya dị ka onye na-eme udo na onye na-ahụ maka ịha nhata ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ ya na Kentish Town nke London, Evans gụrụ akwụkwọ na North London Collegiate School na Dartford College of Physical Education, na-eru eru dị ka onye nkuzi
Ọ sonyeere Women's Social and Political Union (WSPU) n'afọ 1907 ma, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ nkuzi, site na mbido afọ 1910 ọ rụrụ ọrụ oge niile dị ka onye nhazi Birmingham nke Union
N'oge a, a na-ejide ya ugboro ugboro ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ maka omume ndị metụtara mkpọsa suffragette, gụnyere ịjụ ịzụta akwụkwọ ikike nkịta
A mara ya ikpe maka òkè ya na mkpọsa na-agbaji windo na West End nke London, n'etiti Machị na Julaị 1912 e jidere Evans na ngalaba Feeble-Minded Inebriate nke Ụlọ Mkpọrọ Aylesbury
O mere ngagharị iwe n'oge agụụ na-anọ ugboro abụọ ma tachie obi na inye ya nri
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka WSPU n'etiti isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na London na onye ndú ya, Christabel Pankhurst, na Parisien
Evans mere njem na nzuzo iji zere nchọpụta, mana ọ chọpụtara na ọ zere ijide naanị n'ihi na e jidere Dorothy Evans
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 1913, e zigara Evans n'ebe ugwu Ireland, Ulster, ebe Pankhurst kpebiri na ọ bụ ndị Ulster Unionists, ọ bụghị ndị Irish nationalists, bụ ndị a ga-achọ

Ndị Irish Party leghaara ịdọ aka ná ntị ya anya na ọ bụrụ na ha nyere aka merie iwu nkwekọrịta nke 1912 (nke gaara agbatị ụmụ nwanyị vootu ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ ihe onwunwe siri ike), ha ga-anọ na 'ọgụ ọnwụ' na ndị suffragists 'Enweghị vootu maka ụmụ nwanyị, enweghị Home Rule'

Mgbe n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 1914, onye ndú Unionist Edward Carson manyere Evans (ọ duziri nnọchibido awa iri anọ nke ọnụ ụzọ ya na London), kwụsịrị Craig (onye kwadoro Conciliation Bill) na mkpebi Unionist maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, Evans kwupụtara njedebe nke 'nkwekọrịta anyị nwere na Ulster'
N'otu nzukọ e nwere na Ulster Hall na ụbọchị 13 Machị 1914, ọ tụrụ aro na
Carson abụghị enyi ụmụ nwanyị ọ gwụla ma ọ dị njikere iguzo ma kwado ikike ha n'ụzọ siri ike dịka ọ kwadoro ikike ụmụ nwoke
ọ bụ onye iro ha, a ga-alụkwa ya ọgụ dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ bụla ọzọ
onye nwere ike ma ghara iji ya nweta ikike ha
kwupụtara agha
Carson
Agha obodo nke doro anya bụ nke dị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na ike ndị dị

N'ime ọnwa ndị sochirinụ, ndị agha WSPU (gụnyere Elizabeth Bell, nwanyị mbụ na Ireland ruru eru dị ka dọkịta na onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa ụmụ nwanyị) so n'usoro mwakpo ọkụ na ụlọ ndị Unionist na ụlọ ntụrụndụ na egwuregwu ụmụ nwoke
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1914, ndị uwe ojii wakporo ụlọ ahụ dị na Belfast Evans na onye na-eme ihe ike n'ógbè ahụ bụ Midge Muir, wee chọta bọmbụ
N'ụlọ ikpe, ụbọchị ise ka e mesịrị, ha abụọ kpatara ọgba aghara mgbe ha chọrọ ịmara ihe mere Ulster Unionist James Craig onye na-eji égbè ndị Ulser Volunteers apụtaghị n'otu ebubo ahụ
N'ịbụ onye a mara ikpe ma tinye n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Tullamore, Evans gara ngagharị iwe agụụ
O degaara onye agha ibe ya Kate Evans akwụkwọ ozi, 'M na-enweta udo nke uche na nke ime mmụọ, ọ bụ ezie na ahụ m na-ata ahụhụ na-ahụ na m na-arịa ọrịa n'oge na-adịghị anya ugbu a anaghị m anọrọ mmiri
Mkpụrụ ndụ ndị a gbara ọchịchịrị karịa nke ọ bụla m hụtụrụla'
N'ihi mmebi ya, a tọhapụrụ Evans na 26 Julaị
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị WPSU Hunger Strike Medallist Lillian Metge lekọtara ya
N'ọnwa Mee, Metge so n'otu nnukwu ìgwè ụmụ nwanyị na-ebo Eze George V ebubo n'èzí Buckingham Palace, n'oge ụzọ Evans, e jidere ya onwe ya maka ịtụ nkume na windo ụlọ ikpe
Na 31July 1914, na atụmatụ ya na Evans, Metge tụrụ bọmbụ na chancel nke Lisburn Cathedral
Ọzọkwa n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, a tọhapụrụ Evans n'okpuru mgbaghara zuru oke e nyere ndị otu WSPU mgbe agha ahụ malitere n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ
Ọ kewapụrụ na WSPU na Pankhursts site na imegide agha ahụ wee ghọọ onye nhazi maka Independent Women's Social and Political Union
N'afọ 1915, a jụrụ ya akwụkwọ ikike ngafe iji gaa nzukọ udo ụmụ nwanyị na Hague
Evans malitekwara ịrụsi ọrụ ike site na nkewapụ mbụ na WSPU, Women's Freedom League, n'afọ 1917 na-enyere aka ịmepụta alaka na Newcastle upon Tyne na Ada Broughton na Emily Davison
Njikọ ahụ guzobere n'afọ 1907 iji mee mkpesa megide enweghị nzaghachi nke ndị Pankhurst na omume agha ha (na Evans) kwadoro
Mana mkpebi nke Njikọ maka enweghị ime ihe ike gbatịrị na mmegide megide agha na mkpebi na Kansụl Udo Ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Evans gara n'ihu dị ka onye nhazi maka WFL ma site n'afọ 1923 hazie maka Women's International League for Peace and Freedom

O mechara bụrụ onye isi otu (onye isi oche ruo ọtụtụ afọ) nke Six Point Group nke chọrọ mmezi iwu gbasara mmetọ ụmụaka, ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ na ndị na-alụbeghị di, ikike nne na nna hà nhata, na ụgwọ ọrụ na ohere hà nhata n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na ọrụ gọọmentị, ọ sonyeere National Union of Societies for Equal Citizenship
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Women's International League
Otú ọ dị, nchegbu ya bụ isi nọgidere na-abụ ịha nhata ọrụ
O sonyere na Equal Compensation Campaign site n'afọ 1941 ruo n'afọ 1943 wee bụrụ onye otu Equal Pay Campaign Committee n'afọ 1944, iji hụ na ịkwụ ụgwọ hà nhata na Civil Service
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Women for Westminster otu na-eme mkpọsa iji mụbaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị omeiwu, na idepụta Equal Citizenship (Blanket) Bill nke afọ 1944
Evans nwụrụ mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ụbọchị abụọ na Glasgow ebe ọ ga-ekwu okwu na nzukọ
Ọ dị afọ 55
Evans na Sybil Morrison na Emil Davies, onye lụrụ di na nwunye Labour Party London County councillor, nwere mmekọrịta ogologo oge
Evans jụrụ ịlụ di na nwunye, ma dị ka enyi ya Monica Whately si kwuo, ọ zọpụtara afọ atọ na nkwadebe maka nwa Davies mụrụ n'afọ 1921
N'oge ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1944, nwa ya nwanyị Lyndal (nke akpọrọ aha onye dike na Olive Schreiner's Story of an African Farm) bụ onye otu kọmitii isi nke Six Point Group
Dorothy Evans (1893 - 22 Septemba 1943) bụ onye isi otu ọrụ na Britain
A mụrụ ya na Stockport, Evans gụrụ akwụkwọ na Stockport High School, mgbe ahụ ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Na Mahadum Manchester

Site na 1918 ruo 1931, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Association of Women Clerks and Secretaries (AWCS), ma site na nke a ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Trades Union Congress, na-eje ozi na Standing Joint Committee of Working Women's Organisations
N'oge ezumike ya, Evans gụrụ akwụkwọ ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu, a kpọkwara ya n'ụlọikpe n'afọ 1925
N'agbanyeghị nke a, ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye ọrụ otu ọrụ

Dororthy Irene Height (Önwa ato 24, 1912 — Önwa ano 20, 2010) bu mgbe mbu onye Afrika nor na Amerika nke na lefu ihe anya, ony nkuzi, na onye na jé íjẹ maka iwu mmadu
O bu mgbe mbu onye ishi Nationa Council of Negro Women na afọr di iri ano, na o nwètèrè ihe onyinyé Presidential Medal of Freedom na afọr 1994, na olaédo nke Congressional Gold Medal na afọr 2004
Dorothy Samali Hyuha bụ onye nnọchi anya mba Uganda, onye nkuzi, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ Kọmishọna Ukwu (Ambassador) nke Uganda na Malaysia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-enweghị ọfịs na Cabinet nke Uganda
Site na afọ 2006 ruo na afọ 2011, Hyuha jere ozi dị ka Butaleja District Woman MP na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ugandan
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A họpụtara Hyuha na mbụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na afọ 1996 dị ka onye nnọchi anya Tororo District, ọfịs ọ nọrọ ruo na afọ 2006
Mgbe e wepụrụ Butaleja District na Tororo District na afọ 2006, ọ meriri oche ndị omeiwu nke onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Butalehja District na tiketi NRM
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe Cerinah Nebanda meriri ya n'afọ 2011
Site na afọ 2009 ruo 2011 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-enweghị Portfolio
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012, a họpụtara Hyuha ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna Ukwu nke Uganda na Tanzania, ebe ọ jere ozi ruo n'ọnwa Agọstụ n'afọ 2017 wee kwaga Malaysia n'otu ọrụ ahụ
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a na High Commission nke Republic of Uganda na Malaysia
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị NRM na-achị
Ọ lụrụ Daniel Hyuha, onye nwụrụ na Disemba 2014 mgbe ọ dị afọ 68
Ha nwere ụlọ atọ na Butalja District

Dorothy Harriet Eugenia Musuleng Cooper (nke a makwara dị ka 'D-Mus,' Septemba 9, na afọ 1930 na Juun 30, na afọ 2009) bụ onye nkuzi Liberia, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ na Liberia

na MS ya na College of West Africa na San Francisco State University

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ n'etiti ngụsị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na matriculation na afọ 1964 na San Francisco na afọ 1964, mmepe usoro mmụta na Ministry of Education, na onye isi nke Cuttington University College

Nke a kpatara Agha Obodo Liberia nke Mbụ site na 1989 ruo 1999 nke gburu mmadụ 200,000
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ndị nnupụisi kewara n'akụkụ dị iche iche, ya bụ IGNU, Ulimo na NPFL

Nchịkwa nke kansụl ahụ na-egbu oge n'ihi igbu oge n'ịkpọbata ndị agha na-ahụ maka udo

N'oge ọ bụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya na-anwa ịtọhapụ ndị United Nations jidere na Sierra Leone

Dorothy Nyakato Nzibonera bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda bụ onye bụ nwanyị omebe iwu maka Kitagwenda District na Uganda na omebe iwu nke iri na otu nke Republic of Uganda
