O meriri Asiimwe Joan nke Forum for Democratic Change, Ninsiima Grace onye Dorothy meriri na primaries na Kenyonyonzi Efrance bụ ndị gbara ọsọ dị ka ndị nweere onwe ha na Jenụwarị, ntuli aka 2021 iji merie ntuli aka site na ọtụtụ vootu
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka na-ahụ maka ego na Human Rights Center, Uganda ọrụ ọ na-arụ ruo ugbu a
A mụrụ ya na nso Dundee, KwaZulu-Natal, Nyembe bụ nwa nwanyị Leeya Basolise Nyembe, onye nna ya bụ Chief Ngedee Shezi
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ala ọzọ ruo mgbe Standard 9
Ọ mụrụ naanị nwa ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Nyembe nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma ọ bụ n'okpuru iwu machibidoro iwu ma ọ bụ na ụlọ mkpọrọ, na-eje ozi site na 1963 ruo 1966 maka ịkwalite òtù ANC
Ọzọkwa site na 1968 ruo 1983 maka ebe ndị na-eyi ọha egwu
Nyembe sonyeere Òtù Ụmụ nwanyị nke Natal (NOW) mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya na 1984
A tọhapụrụ ya ọzọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'afọ otu puku narị itoolu iri asatọ na asaaa
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba n'afọ 1994
Nyembe bụ onye ahịa mana ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-ekere òkè ma ọ bụ na-achịkwa ọtụtụ òtù na-aga n'ihu
Ọ sonyeere African National Congress na 1952 ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike
Mgbe ọ sonyeere ANC mkpọsa Defiance na-aga n'ihu
A tụrụ Nyembe mkpọrọ n'afọ 1952 maka imebi iwu na-ezighị ezi
Ọ duziri ụmụ nwanyị si Natal na Defiance Campaign nke 1956
Akụkụ nke Defiance Campaign bụ ịbụ onye ndú megide iwepụ Cato Manor na 1956
N'afọ 1956, a họpụtara ya dịka osote onye isi oche nke Durban ANC Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ime òtù iji gbochie ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, na-ewepụ ọrụ n'aka ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1959, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke ngalaba Natal nke African National Congress Women's League
Mgbe a machibidoro ANC iwu na 1960, ọ sonyeere Spear of the Nation
N'afọ 1961, a nabatara Nyembe n'ime Umkhonto we Sizwe ma soro ọtụtụ ndị enyi dịka Chief Albert Luthuli, Moses Mabhida, Nelson Mandela, Walter Sisulu na Oliver Tambo rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 1963, ọ duziri ụmụ nwanyị n'oge Natal Women's Revolt A tọhapụrụ ya na 23 Machị 1984, mgbe a tọhapụrụ ye, Nyembe malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Natal Organisation of Women (NOW)
NOW jere ozi n'ọtụtụ ebumnuche
Ịlụ ọgụ megide ịrị elu nke ụgwọ, ụgwọ njem, agụmakwụkwọ na-adịghị mma na enweghị ụlọ nlekọta ụmụaka bụ isi ihe nzukọ ahụ lekwasịrị anya
Nkà ihe ọmụma ANC n'oge mmalite afọ 1950 bụ nke Gandhi
Nkà ihe ọmụma na-adịghị arụ ọrụ ebe ndị otu dị njikere ịga mkpọrọ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa
Nyembe, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị onye na-eme udo, sonyeere ANC ma na 1952 dị njikere imebi iwu ndị na-etinye ihe mgbochi nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọrụ na ikike obibi
Oge Nyembe na mkpọsa nnupụisi kwụsịrị mgbe, na 1953, ndị Britain wepụtara iwu machibidoro nzukọ ngagharị iwe
Mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke ngalaba Natal na 1959, Nyembe tinyere aka na atụmatụ nke mmegide iji mee iwu
Iwu paswọọdụ ga-eme ka ọ chọọ ka ụmụ amaala ojii niile buru kaadị njirimara gburugburu ebe ndị ọcha
Mgbe ogbugbu Sharpeville gasịrị na a machibidoro ANC na PAC iwu n'okpuru iwu ọhụrụ nke Iwu Òtù Na-akwadoghị
Nyembe sonyeere otu òtù na-eme ihe ike nke ANC a na-akpọ ube nke mba
N'okpuru ọrụ a, o sonyere na imebi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị
Dị ka onye ndú nke Natal Women's Revolt, Nyembe na ụmụ nwanyị ojii ndị ọzọ nke South Africa na-emegide ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ biya
Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ wepụrụ isi ihe na-eweta ego site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị
Nzukọ a chọkwara mbibi nke ihe onwunwe Durban Corporation
Nyembe na-alụ ọgụ maka ịchịkwa ọpụpụ, na-enye ụmụ nwanyị ikike, na ikike ịchọ ọrụ
N'oge ọrụ ya, ọ natara Order of Friendship of Peoples, site na Soviet Union, na onyinye Chief Albert Luthuli, nke ikpeazụ na 1992
Dorothy Akinyi Ooko bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe ike na ọkachamara na teknụzụ
A mụrụ ya na Mater Hospital, Nairobi, Ọ gara Fort Hall Road Primary School n'obodo ya wee gaa Pangani Girls High School maka ọkwa 'O' ya wee gụchaa ọkwa 'A' ya na Alliance Girls 'High School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọkwa 'A', ọ gara Université de Haute Bretagne na France, ebe ọ gụrụ Lettres Modernes tupu ọ gbanwee gaa Asụsụ Bekee
Ọ laghachiri Kenya wee gụọ Bachelor of Education (French na English in Literature) site na 1985-1988
Ọ kụziri na Mukumu Girls' maka obere oge wee nweta agụmakwụkwọ iji mee Masters na French na Mahadum Kenya
O nwekwara Masters na International Business Administration na United States International University (USIU)
Ooko bụ onye njikwa nkwukọrịta, East na Francophone Africa maka Google nke dị na Nairobi
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Nokia na Nairobi
Ooko bu ụzọ mee ngagharị iwe maka iwepụ ụtụ isi bara uru (VAT) na ekwentị mkpanaaka na Kenya
Dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu Nokia East na Southern Africa, ya na ndị otu LG, Safaricom na ndị na-ekesa aka
Dorothy Celene Thompson (July 9, 1893 na January 30, 1961) bụ onye nta akụkọ America na onye mgbasa ozi redio
Ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ America mbụ a chụpụrụ na Nazi Germany n'afọ 1934 ma bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-akọ akụkọ na redio n'oge afọ 1930
Ụfọdụ ndị na-ewere Thompson dị ka 'Nwunye Mbụ nke American Journalism' ma bụrụ onye magazin Time nabatara n'afọ 1939 dịka onye ya na Eleanor Roosevelt hà nhata
A mụrụ Thompson na Lancaster, New York, n'afọ 1893, otu n'ime ụmụ atọ nke Peter na Margaret (Grierson) Thompson
Ụmụnne ya bụ Peter Willard Thompson na Margaret Thompson (mgbe e mesịrị Mrs
[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe Thompson dị afọ asaa (n'April 1901), na-ahapụ Peter, onye nkwusa Metọdist, ịzụlite ụmụ ya naanị ya
Peter lụrụ di ọzọ n'oge na-adịghị anya, mana Thompson na nwunye ọhụrụ ya, Elizabeth Abbott Thompson emeghị ka ha nwee mmekọrịta chiri anya
N'afọ 1908, Peter zigara Thompson na Chicago ka ya na ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ biri iji zere esemokwu ọzọ
N'ebe a, ọ gara Lewis Institute ruo afọ abụọ tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Syracuse dị ka onye na-eto eto
Na Syracuse, ọ gụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere n'afọ 1914

N'ihi na o nwere ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ, n'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị nke oge ahụ, Thompson chere na o nwere ọrụ ọha na eze ịlụ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na United States, nke ga-aghọ ntọala nke nkwenkwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya siri ike
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Thompson kwagara Buffalo, New York wee tinye aka na mkpọsa ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo Afrịka 1920, mgbe ọ gara mba ọzọ iji chụsoo ọrụ odeakụkọ ya
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro atọ, nke a ma ama bụ di nke abụọ na onye mmeri Nobel Prize na akwụkwọ Sinclair Lewis
N'afọ 1923 ọ lụrụ di mbụ ya, onye Hungary Joseph Bard; ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1927
Thompson lụrụ Lewis na 1928 wee nweta ụlọ na Vermont
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke, Michael Lewis, amụrụ n'afọ 1930
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1942
Ọ lụrụ di ya nke atọ, onye na-ese ihe Maxim Kopf [de], n'afọ 1945, ha lụrụ di na nwunye ruo mgbe Kopf nwụrụ na 1958
Alụmdi na nwunye ya na Sinclair Lewis bụ isiokwu nke Sherman Yellen's Broadway play Strangers, ebe Lois Nettleton mere ya
Dorothy Udeme Ufot SAN bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjịria nwere ọkachamara na iwu azụmahịa
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ si Akwa Ibom Steeti ka e buliri ya n'ọkwa onye isi ọka iwu nke Naịjirịa (SAN)
Dorothy bụ onye guzobere Dorothy Ufot & Co
ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu zuru oke na Naịjịria ebe ọ na-eduzi ngalaba ikpe na ikpe nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Dorothy bụ ọkachamara na ikpe mba ụwa, ikpe na ụdị ndị ọzọ nke ngwọta esemokwu, gụnyere ikpe nkwekọrịta itinye ego, itinye ego na nkwekọrịta ikpe mba ọzọ, ndụmọdụ itinye ego, iwu ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa
Dorothy bụ onye otu Court of Arbitration nke Casablanca International Mediation and Arbitration Centre (CIMAC) Morocco, kemgbe 2016
A họpụtara Dorothy ka ọ rụọ ọrụ afọ isii na panel nkè ndị omebe iwu nke International Centre for the Settlement of Investment Disputes na Febụwarị 2017

Ọ bụbu osote onye isì oche ụwa nke ICC Commission on Arbitration na ADR, ma ugbu a ọ bụ onye otu kansụl nke ICC Institute of World Business Law na osote onye oche nke arbitration na ADD commission nke ICC Nigeria yana onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke ICC Nigeria National Committee
Dorothy bụ onye otu ICC International Court of Arbitration na Paris ma bụrụ osote onye isí oche nke ICC Commission on Arbitration
N'afọ 2000, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Chartered Institute of Arbitrators London
A mụrụ Dorothy Ufot na Ikwa-ibom steeti, Nigeria
Dorothy bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Calabar, Calabar, Naịjịria; nwere nzere bachelọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1983
O mechara nweta LLB degree site na Mahadum Lagos na 1988
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria n'afọ 1989
N'afọ 1996, Dorothy gụsịrị nzere masta ya na Law (LLM) ma nweta Advanced Diploma na Commercial Law and Practice na Mahadum Lagos, Nigeria na 1998Dorothy Ufot lụrụ Maazị Udeme Ufot ma nwee ụmụ
Dorothy malitere ọrụ iwu ya mgbe a kpọrọ ya n'ụlọ ikpe Naịjịria n'afọ 1989
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na ikpe azụmahịa na ikpe
N'afọ 2009, Dorothy ghọrọ nwanyị ọka iwu mbụ si Akwa Ibom Steeti na-eyi uwe silk
Ewezuga ọrụ iwu ya, Dorothy arụwokwa ọrụ dị iche iche na Nigerian Stock Exchange, Chevron Oil PLC, na MRS Oil PLC
N'afọ 2020, African Arbitration Association nyere Dorothy African Arbitrator of the Year, maka onyinye ya na Arbitration na Commercial Law
A makwaara ya dị ka onye otu Chartered Institute of Arbitrators (UK) (CIArb) na onye na-eme mkpebi
Dorothy Vena Johnson (May 7, 1898 - 1970) bụ onye America na-ede Abụ na onye nkuzi bi na Los Angeles, California
N'afọ 1939, ọ bụ onye guzobere Njikọ nke nkà mmekọrịta, otu nzukọ nka ụmụ nwanyị Afrika na Amerika
A mụrụ Dorothy Vena na Los Angeles, nwa James Vena na nwunye ya Namie (née Plum)
Ọ bụ onye odeakwụkwọ nzipu ozi, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na onye guzobere alaka Los Angeles nke NAACP
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Mahadum nke Southern California na asambodo nkuzi na Mahadum nke California, Los Angeles (UCLA)
Ọ lụrụ onye ọka iwu, Ivan Johnson III, tupu afọ nke 1932
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1970, mgbe ọbara ọgbụgba ụbụrụ
Johnson bụ onye na-ede abụ nke Harlem Renaissance metụtara

E tinyere abụ ya, gụnyere 'Green Valley', 'Palace', 'Letter En Route Overseas', 'Bread for Sale', 'Epitaph for a Bigot', na 'Post War Ballad', na mbipụta na nchịkọta uri nke Arna Bontemps na Beatrice M
Murphy deziri
Ọrụ ya ka na-apụta na anthologies nke uri ụmụ nwanyị ojii

Johnson na onye ọrụ ebere Juanita Ellsworth Miller (nwunye onye nkwusa na onye ọka ikpe Loren Miller) rụrụ ọrụ iji kwalite onye na-ede uri Langston Hughes mgbe ọ nọ na Los Angeles, site na ahụmịhe ahụ, ha hiwere Njikọ nke nka mmekọrịta, otu nzukọ nka ụmụ nwanyị mba Afrika na Amerika, n'afọ 1939
Johnson bụ onye isi oche nke Njikọ ahụ site na ntọala ya ruo n'etiti afọ 1950

N'oge ọchịchị ya, Njikọ ahụ malitere inye ndị oji na-ese ihe na ndị edemede agụmakwụkwọ, ma kwalite ndị na-agba egwu, ihe ngosi ihe nkiri, na ọgụgụ nke ndị edemede, ma kwado eserese Migration Series nke Jacob Lawrence
N'afọ 1962, akpọrọ Johnson 'Nwanyị nke Afọ' site na California Alpha Psi Zeta isi nke Zeta Phi Beta sorority
Johnson kụziiri ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Los Angeles Unified School District akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ
Ọ bụ onye otu Òtù Ndị Nkụzi Ode Ihe Okike nke Los Angeles Ọ bụ onye isi na Garden Gate High School, ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1963
Otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego Dolores Ratcliffe, onye chetara ya dị ka 'mmadụ pụtara ìhè na naanị otu n'ime ndị nkụzi ojii abụọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị m
Ekpebiri m na klas nke atọ na m ga-adị ka ya
Ọ bụ onye isi ojii mbụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Los Angeles
A raara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Dorothy Vera Johnson nye na Disemba 1980
E mechara mara ya dị ka Johnson Community Day School, ụlọ akwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu nke ọkwa 7 ruo 12, nke dị na mpaghara ụlọ ọrụ dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Harbor Freeway na South Los Angeles
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2008, a kwagara ya na nkuku Bernstein High School n'ebe ndịda Sunset Boulevard na Hollywood
A kpọrọ nchịkọta akụkọ ihe mere eme ojii na Vernon Branch nke ọbá Akwụkwọ ọha nke Los Angeles maka Johnson n'afọ 1971
Njikọ nke Allied Arts ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Los Angeles; a na-edebe akwụkwọ ya na UCLA
Dorra Ibrahim Zarrouk (Arabic ; a mụrụ na 13 Jenụwarị 1980) bụ onye obodo Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri bi na Egypt
A mụrụ Dorra na Tunis, nna ya bụ Ibrahim Zarrouk na nna nna ya, Ali Zouaoui, bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Dorra nwere nzere bachelọ nke iwu na Faculty of Law and Political Science nke Tunis n'afọ 2001, mgbe ahụ o nwere nzere masta nke Advanced Studies na Political Science na Mahadum Saint Joseph na Lebanọn n'afọ 2003
N'agbanyeghị agụmakwụkwọ ya, Dorra malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1997, mgbe ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Tunisia, El Teatro [fr], ya na Taoufik Jebali n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 2002, ihe mbụ Dorra mere bụ na ihe nkiri Franco-Tunisian, Khorma [fr]
N'afọ 2003, o sonyere na Colosseum Rome's Arena of Death
Usoro TV mbụ ya na mpụga Tunisia bụ n'afọ 2004, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Fares Bani Marwan na Syria
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na Nadia et Sarra na Hiam Abbass
N'afọ 2005, o mere ihe nkiri na Le Voyage de Louisa [fr]
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'Ijipt, ebe ọ gosipụtara na Alawela fel Gharam na Heya Fawda na Menna Shalabi
Ka oge na-aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri dị iche iche dịka Al Mosafer, Tisbah Ala Khair na Sheikh Jackson
Dorra kwere onye ọchụnta ego Tunisian bụ Qays Mukhtar nkwa ọlụlụ n'oge na-adịghị anya n'afọ 2012
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, o biputere foto na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na onye ọchụnta ego Ijipt na onye na-emepụta ime ụlọ, Hany Saad, onye ọ lụrụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020
Dorries Eunice Dlakude bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress
Dosunmu (ihe dị ka 1823), nke a na-akpọ Docemo na akwụkwọ ndị Britain, chịrị dị ka Oba nke Lagos site n'afọ 1853, mgbe ọ nọchiri nna ya Oba Akitoye, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1885
A manyere ya ịgbaga Britain n'okpuru iyi egwu nke ike n'Ọgọọst 1861

Ịnọ n'ocheeze Dosunmu mebiri omenala n'ihi na onye nnọchi anya Britain na Lagos Benjamin Campbell họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Oba mgbe Britain batara n'ihe omume Lagos na-esote Reduction of Lagos na Disemba 1851
Campbell mụtara banyere ọnwụ Oba Akitoye na 2 Septemba 1853 site n'aka onye ọrụ CMS CC
Gollmer mana o gbochiri ozi a n'aka ndị isi, kama ịjụ ha onye onye nketa Akitoye kwesịrị ịbụ
N'otu oge, ndị isi kwetara na Dosunmu bụ onye nketa kwesịrị ekwesị ma ọ bụ naanị mgbe ahụ ka Campbell gwara ha akụkọ ọnwụ Akitoye
Campbell wee gwa Dosunmu banyere ọbịbịa ya n'Obaship wee soro emume ọbịbịa ngwa ngwa n'obí eze
N'echi ya, a nabatara Dosunmu dị ka Oba nke Lagos ma nata ekele egbe 21 site na Royal Navy

Dosunmu ketara nsogbu 'Kosoko' site n'aka nna ya (Akitoye) n'ihi na Kosoko guzobere ụlọ ọrụ kwụụrụ onwe ya na Epe na ihe dị ka ndị agha narị anọ (gụnyere Oshodi Tapa) na ebe o si mebie Lagos site na ọtụtụ mwakpo nke bịara n'ụzọ dị ize ndụ na Akitoye

Ọ bụ ezie na Kosoko mechara bịanye aka na Nkwekọrịta nke Epe na 28 Septemba 1854 na Consul Benjamin Campbell, na-ekwenye na ọ gaghị ekwu okwu ọ bụla na Lagos ma ọ bụ itinye azụmahịa na Lagos n'ihe ize ndụ
Nkwekọrịta ahụ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma maka Kosoko onye mere ka ndị Britain kweta na steeti ya na Epe
Otú ọ dị, n'ime nnukwu foto ahụ, ocheeze Lagos nọgidere na-enweghị ike iru na ụmụ Akitoye na Dosunmu gbanyesiri mkpọrọgwụ ike
Asọmpi Kosoko-Akitoye / Dosunmu gbasara n'ọchịchị akụ na ụba
Ndị na-akwado Oba Dosunmu enweghị ekele zuru oke maka ọnụnọ ndị Britain na Lagos mgbe ha nwetasịrị ya na 1861 mgbe ndị enyi Kosoko jiri mmekọrịta ahụ mee ihe

Ọzọkwa, dị ka usoro nkwekọrịta e nwetara na 1854 si dị, Dosunmu hapụrụ ikike azụmaahịa maka ọrụ omenala, nke e mesịrị manye ya ịhapụ dịka usoro nke Nkwekọrịta 1861 si dị maka ezumike nká nke otu puku Euros kwa afọ
N'ihi ya, akụ na ụba Oba belatara mgbe Kosoko na ndị enyi ya, n'okpuru enweghị ihe mgbochi azụmaahịa dị otú ahụ, nwere ọganihu
Ogige Kosoko gụnyere ndị ikom dị ka Oshodi Tapa na Taiwo Olowo bụ ndị ji ịnụ ọkụ n'obi banye n'azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ ndị Europe
Onye isi nke ngalaba akụ na ụba Dosunmu bụ Chief Apena Ajasa onye na-ese okwu ugboro ugboro na Taiwo Olowo
Mgbe Kosoko nwụrụ, gọọmentị na-achị mba ahụ mere atụmatụ na akụkụ akụ na ụba ya bụ nke kachasị ike na ọ dịkarịa ala ndị na-eso ụzọ Puku iri abụo
N'ịgbaso egwu sitere n'aka Kosoko na ndị France nọ na Wydah, Lord Palmerston (Prime Minista Britain) mere mkpebi nke kwuru na 'ọ dị mma nke ịghara igbu oge n'ịnọ na-echebe Lagos'

William McCoskry, onye nnọchi anya na Lagos na Commander Bedingfield kpọkọtara nzukọ na Oba Dosunmu na 30 Julaị 1861 n'ụgbọ HMS Prometheus ebe akọwapụtara ebumnuche Britain na nzaghachi maka okwu ndị ahụ chọrọ site na ọgọọstt 1861
Dosunmu guzogidere usoro nkwekọrịta ahụ mana n'okpuru egwu nke ime ihe ike na Lagos site n'aka Commander Bedingfield, Dosunmu kwetara ma bịanye aka na Lagos Treaty of Cession
Ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị France na-enweghị ikike azụmahịa ha gwara Dosunmu, na-enwe obi ụtọ na ọnụnọ ndị Britain nọ na Lagos, na-ekwe ya nkwa enyemaka maka inupụ isi megide Gọvanọ John Hawley Glover
Glover kwụsịrị mgbalị ahụ, kwụọ Dosunmu £uros iri ise, ma kwụsị ụgwọ ọnwa ya ruo ọnwa 4
Dosunmu enweghị obi ụtọ ma chee na Glover jiri Kosoko kpọọ ya asị

Ọnọdụ Dosunmu ruru eru ka Glover nwere ezigbo ọbụbụenyi na ndị enyi Kosoko dịka Oshodi Tapa onye Glover gakwuuru tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na ọrụ ọha na eze na Taiwo Olowo onye Glover gbara ume ka ọ gaa n'azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ nke Messrs GL
Gaiser
Dosunmu nwụrụ n'afọ 1885 ma nwa ya nwoke Oba Oyekan I nọchiri ya
Otu nwa ya a ma ama bụ Oloye Abiola Dosunmu, Erelu Kuti nke Lagos

Dotun Akinsanya (amuru 20 Jenuarị 1981) bu onye egwu badminton nke Naijiria
O nwetara ihe nrite ọla ọcha n'asọmpi ndị nwoke n'ọkwa abụọ na ndị otu agwakọtara ọnụ, nakwa ihe nrite ọla nchara n'ọkwa otu ndị nwoke na egwuregwu 2003 All-African
Akinsanya mechara weghara ihe nrite ọla edo na 2007 All-Africa Games na mmemme otu agwakọtara
Na 2002, ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya na 2002 Manchester Commonwealth Games

Na 2003, ọ natara akwụkwọ mmụta site na mmemme mmepe ntorobịa nke Olympic Solidarity na mmekorita ya na International Badminton Federation, maka nkwadebe nke ndị ntorobịa nwere nkà maka egwuregwu Olympic n'ọdịnihu, kpọmkwem na Beijing 2008 Olympics
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ meriri asọmpi 2004 nke Africa, ọ erughi eru na asọmpi Olympic nke 2004, mgbe ọkwa ụwa ya gbadara na onye na-egwu egwu si South Africa

Dotun Popoola (amụrụ na 1981, Lagos ) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge a na Naijiria (onye na-ese ihe) bụ onye ọkachamara n'ịkpụpụta ígwè
Ọ na-emepụta ihe osise site na ọla ndị atụfuru
Ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya n'ịgbanwe ihe mkpofu ka ọ bụrụ akụ, ihe mkpofu ka ọ bụrụ rubies na mkpofu ka ọ bụrụ akụ na ụba site n'iji ihe mkpofu nke na-eyi gburugburu ebe obibi egwu
Dotun gụrụ eserese na nka n'ozuzu ya na Auchi Polytechnic, Auchi, Edo Steeti ebe o nwere diplọma mba na eserese na nka n'ozuzu ya n'afọ 2004
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na nke abụọ ya na nka dị mma na nke etinyere ya na ọkachamara na ihe ọkpụkpụ na eserese n'otu n'otu
Dotun bụ onye na-ese ihe na Lopez Studio na Lemmon, South Dakota, ma na-eme njem n'etiti United States na Nigeria iji see ihe osise
Ọ bụ onye nlekwata na National Gallery of Art
Popoola na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ bụ isi na metal scrap, ebe ịmepụta ụdị anụmanụ bụ ụzọ kachasị amasị ya iji ihe eji eme ihe
E gosipụtara kwa ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na ART X Lagos O nwere ihe ngosi nke akpọrọ 'Irin Ajo' (Journey) na Signature Beyond Art Gallery, Lagos, ebe o gosipụtara ihe dị ka ọrụ ọla iri abụọ na anọ ya
Gaa na nsoroụzọJump ka ịchọọ
Bradley Brandon (amụrụ n'ubochí mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba, n'afọ 1989), onye a maara dị ka Doughboy Beatz ma ọ bụ naanị Doughboy, bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ America si Columbus, Mississippi

O nwere ike ịbụ na a maara ya nke ọma maka imepụta 'Pedestrian' site n'aka onye na-eti egwu Gunna, yana 'Lost It' site n'aka onye na-eti egwu Rich The Kid gosipụtara Offset na Quavo nke Migos nke RIAA kwadoro ọla edo

Doughboy emepụtala ụfọdụ egwu maka ndị egwu dị iche iche dịka Young Jeezy, Gucci Mane, Future, Yo Gotti, Juicy J, 21 Savage, NBA Youngboy, Lil Boosie, Soulja Boy, Shy Glizzy, YFN Lucci, Plies, Trina, Crooked I, BG, CyHi the Prynce, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
O nwetara Grammy Nomination n'ihe banyere ọrụ ya na 21 Savage's I Am > I Was for Best Rap Album na 62nd Annual Grammy Awards
Brandon bịdọrọ ịkụ egwu ógè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, maka nwanne ya nwoke nke nta na FL Studio
Ọ gara n'ihu mepụta Hitz Committee / Jive Records signee, Trai'D's lead single 'Gutta Chick' na 2008
'Gutta Chick' ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ 72 na chaatị Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs
Doughboy esorola ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe kemgbe ahụ

N'ime afọ 2010, Doughboy agbasoola mmepụta na ụfọdụ ọrụ a ma ama nke gụnyere Jeezy's Trap or Die 2, Shy Glizzy's Law 3, Rich The Kid's The World Is Yours, Gunna's Drip Season 3 na Gucci Mane's East Atlanta Santa
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2019, Doughboy bịanyere aka na Metro Boomin's Boominati Worldwide label
Boominati Worldwide nwere mmekorita ya na Republic Records na Universal Music Group
Douglas Archibald Campbell ISO (13 Disemba 1906 7 Machị 1969) bụ onye nkuzi New Zealand na onye na-echekwa ala
A mụrụ ya na Dunedin, New Zealand, na 13 Disemba 1906
Campbell gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Canterbury Ọrụ ugbo (nke bụzi Mahadum Lincoln) na nzere masta na red clover n'afọ 1930
N'afọ 1967, ụlọ akwụkwọ Canterbury Agricultural nyere Campbell Bledisloe Medal
N'afọ 1968 New Year Honours, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ibe nke Imperial Service Order
Dounia Batma (Arabic) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Morocco nke ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'ụwa niile dịka onye nke abụọ nke oge mbụ nke Arab Idol (nke Arabic nke Pop Idol) na MBC
Ọ tụfuru aha ahụ megide onye asọmpi Ijipt Carmen Suleiman
Ọ lụrụ Mohamed Al Turk, nna onye na-agụ egwu Bahraini bụ Hala Al Turk
A mụrụ Batma ma zụlite ya na Hay Mohammadi, na mpaghara Ain Sebaa-Hay Mohammedi nke Casablanca, Morocco

Nna ya, Hamid Batma, na-egwuri egwu maka òtù dị iche iche gụnyere Mesnawa na Nass El Ghiwane, na nwanne nna ya, Laarbi Batma, bụ onye ndú nke otu Moroccan fusion Nass ElGhiwane, nke Martin Scorsese weere dịka 'Rolling Stones nke Africa'
Ọ gụrụ maka njem nlereanya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, n'akwụsịghị nrọ banyere ọrụ egwu

N'afọ 2010, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, site n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke nwa nwanne ya nwanyị a ma ama bụ Khansa Batma (nwa nwanyị Mohamed Batma), ọ sonyere na asọmpi egwu Moroccan, nke a na-akpọ Studio 2M, nke a-agbasa na 2M TV, na mpaghara Oriental
Ọ bụrụ abụ dị iche iche nke Moroccan na Middle-Eastern repertoires, wee ruo ọkara ikpeazụ
Ọbụna ma ọ bụrụ na ọ rughị na nke ikpeazụ, o jisiri ike wepụta otu 'Aalash Tgheeb' (Gịnị mere ị ji zoo?) na Moroccan Arabic nke na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Mana ọ ghọtara na ọ ga-aga n'ihu iji nweta ọrụ ọ na-atụ anya na Arab Idol bụ nnukwu ebe iji ruo n'obi Arab World
Na Septemba 8, 2011, Batma gara nyocha maka asọmpi egwu Arabic Arab Idol
Ihe ngosi a bụ ụdị pan-Arab nke Pop Idol na ọmụmụ nke ihe ngosi Super Star nke Future TV
Onye mmeri nke asọmpi ahụ kwesịrị imeri nkwekọrịta na akara ndekọ Platinum Records na Chevrolet Corvette (C6) yana mkpọsa mgbasa ozi dị mkpa na Pepsi

Ọ gara nyocha na Casablanca, ma mee La Tfaker (nke onye na-agụ egwu Tunisian bụ Thekra nwụrụ anwụ) n'ihu ndị ọka ikpe nke onye na-abụ abụ pop nke Lebanọn bụ Ragheb Alama, Emirati diva Ahlam na onye na-emepụta egwu na onye na'egwú nke Ijipt bụ Hassan Shaf'ei
Ha kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye, nke mere ka ọ mata ndị Arab na-ege ntị
A họpụtara ya n'ime ndị 10 kachasị elu megide ndị na-asọmpi si Tunisia, Syria, Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq na mba Egypt
Ikike olu Batma tụrụ ndị otu ndị ọka ikpe n'anya ma mee ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ọkacha mmasị kemgbe oge mbụ, ebe ọ rụrụ 'Magadir' nke Talal Maddah
Ọrụ ya siri ike ma sie ike nke na o mere ka Ahlam tie mkpu n'ihi mmetụta uche

Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara n'asụsụ dị iche iche na ụdị dị iche iche site na abụ ndị Ijipt (Umm Kulthum, Mohammed Abdel Wahab, Warda, Faiza Ahmed), na egwu pop Arabic (Samira Said, Fulla, Najwa Karam, Asala Nasri) na egwu Gulf (Ahlam, Mohammed Abdu, Talal Maddah)
Dounia Boutazout (a mụrụ n'abalị 13 ọnwa June, afọ 1981) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
O nweela ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri TV dịka L'Couple, Nayda fīdouar na F'SalonKpọpụta njehie Closing tag
Douye Diri (amụrụ ya n'abali anọ nke ọnwa Juun afọ 1959) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa na Gọvanọ nke Steeti Bayelsa
Ọ bụ sinetọ na-anọchite mpaghara etịtị nke Bayelsa na ụlọ nzukọ ukwu sineti maka Bayelsa steeti na ụlọ nzukọ ukwu nke agbata itolu na Nigeria
Douye Diri malitere agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya na ụlọ akwukwọ Primari Okoro, Sampou wee guchapu ya na Rev
Proctor Memorial Primary School, Kaiama na afọ 1977, ebe o nwetara asambodo nzere mbu nke mbu
O mechara gaa Ụlọ akwụkwọ Sekọndari nke Gomenti nke Odi na Bayelsa
Douye gụrụ akwụkwọ na College of Education, Port-Harcourt, Rivers State ebe ọ nwetara asambodo National Certificate in Education (NCE) na afọ 1985
Ọ gakwara Mahadum Port-Harcourt inweta nzere bachelọ nke mmụta (BEd) na Sayensị Ọchịchị na afọ 1990

N'abali iri na atọ nke ọnwa Febụari afọ 2020, Ụlọ ikpe Kasị Elu nke Obodo Nigeria kagburu nsonaazụ ntuli aka nke gọvanọ Steeti Bayelsa nke emere na afọ 2019 na-ekwu na onye so onye meriri na ntuli aka ahụ zọ dịka osota ya, David Lyon, nyere asambodo nke iwu na-akwadoghị na Independent National Electoral Commission
ỤLọ ikpe nyere ikike ka enye Diri asambodo nloghachi, nke ga-eme ya gọvanọ a họpụtara
Na abali iri na ano nke onwa abuo n’afo 2020, eduru ya n'ịyi ọrụ dika onye ochichi nke Steeti Bayelsa
N'abali iri na asaa nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2020, otu ụlọ ikpe dị na Abuja, Nigeria, nyere iwu ka a chụọ Diri dịka gọvanọ steeti ahụ
Agbanyeghị, n'abali abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2020, ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị nọ na Abuja merụrụ nkwuputa ụlọ ikpe nke mbụ ma kwado ya dị ka Gọvanọ
Dowen College bụ kọleji agụmakwụkwọ dị na Lekki, mpaghara Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Kọleji ahụ na-anabata ma ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ebi ebi ma na-anabatị ha n'agbata afọ iri na otu na iri na asatọ
N'afọ 2015, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ haziri ọrụ nkwụsịtụ, ebe a kwụrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ pụtara ìhè na arụmọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ha ụgwọ
A gbara vidiyo egwu maka Wizkid's 'Holla at Your Boy' na Dowen College
N'ọnwa Disemba 2021, Sylvester Oromoni, nwa akwụkwọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, e boro ebubo na ndị okenye ise megburu ya ma tie ya ihe ruo ọnwụ maka ịjụ isonyere otu òtù nzuzo
Dị ka nna ahụ nwụrụ anwụ si kwuo, ha nyekwara ya kemịkal ka ọ ṅụọ
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos mechiri ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ruo mgbe ebighi ebi ka ha na-echere nsonaazụ nyocha ha
Ọ na-eduga na hashtag #JusticeForSylvesterOromoni nke ọtụtụ ndị nwere mmasị na ụmụ amaala nwere nchegbu
Nne na nna nke ụmụ nwoke anọ metụtara ya nọ n'aka ndị uwe ojii mgbe ha nyefere onwe ha n'aka Ndị uwe ojii maka nyocha ọzọ
Àtụ Drugbox
Doxefazepam (nke a na-ere n'okpuru aha Doxans) bụ ọgwụ benzodiazepine Ọ nwere ihe na-eme ka nchegbu kwụsị, ihe na-egbochi nkụchi, sedative na ihe na-ehi ụra nke ọkpụkpụ
A na-eji ya agwọ ọrịa dị ka ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ na-ehi ụra

Dị ka Babbini na ndị ọrụ ibe ya si kwuo na ụdị nke ụwa na ụdị nke dị ka onye isi oche nke ọkụ na 1975, ihe a sitere na flurazepam dị n'etiti okpukpu abụọ na okpukpu anọ karịa nke ikpeazụ ma n'otu oge ahụ bụrụ ọkara dị ka nsị na anụmanụ ụlọ nyocha

Akụkụ 55 nke isiokwu Doxefazepam na Mpịakọta 66 nke Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa (WHO) na International Agency for Research on Cancer's (IARC) IARC Monographs na nyocha nke ihe ize ndụ carcinogenic nye ụmụ mmadụ, isiokwu na-akọwa mmetụta carcinogenic / toxic nke doxefazefam na ụmụ mmadụ na ụmụ anụmanụ na-anwale, na-ekwu na enwere 'ihe akaebe na-ezughị ezu n'ime ụmụ mmadụ maka carcinogenicity nke doxefefaze' na ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ ghara imebi
Àtụ Infobox ethnonym
Doyayo (ethnonym Dowayo) o bụ zi asụsụ ihe alaka Duru nke asụsụ Adamawa a na-asụ na Cameroon
Doyayo (Doo23ya̰a̰1yɔ1 'ọnụ nwoke'; n'ụzọ ọzọ Doo2waa23ya̰ a̰1yɔ 1yɔ1 ' ọnụ nwa nwoke') bụ nke ndị Dowayo (ma ọ bụ Doo2waa 23yɔ1 'nwa nwoke') na-asụ
Dị ka ALCAM si kwuo (2012), Doayo, nke nwere ndị na-asụ 18,000, bụ asụsụ bụ isi nke mpaghara ugwu nke obodo Poli (na ngalaba Faro, Northern Region)
A na-asụ Taara n'ugwu ndị dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Poli, na Marka na mbara ala ndị dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ na obodo Tcheboa, ngalaba Bénoué

Okwu ahụ bụ Namchi, nke pụtara 'ndị e gburu' ma ọ bụ 'ndị na-egbutu [mmiri maka anyị]' na Fulfulde, bụ okwu mkpuchi nke na-ezo aka ọ bụghị naanị na Doayo, kamakwa ndị agbata obi ya Duupa na Dugun (nke abụọ ikpeazụ bụ asụsụ Dii)
Doyinsola Hamidat Abiola onye nke eji Doyin Abiola mara bụ managing director na-achikwata ụlọ ọrụ Concord news agency
Doyin bụkwa nwaanyi izizi nwetara ọkwa onye nhazi akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Nigerian daily
Dọkịta Doyin Abiola nwetara nzere digiri na Asụsụ Bekee nakwa ihe gbasara mmepụta egwuregwu site na University of Ibadan n'afọ 1969
Ka Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ,o bidoro ọrụ n;ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkụ a kpọrọ 'Daily Sketch' n'afọ 1969
N'oge a, ọ malitere ide ihe ederede nke a kpọrọ Tiro bụ nke na-egosipụta nsogbu na mmekpa ahụ metụtara ọha na eze,tụmadị ihe gbasara ịkpa oke n'etiti nwoke na nwaanyị
N'afọ 1970, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Daily Sketch wee gaa Obodo oyibo ije gụ akwụkwọ maka nzere Mastas n'ihe gbasara ịchụ nta akụkọ
Ka ọ si obodo oyibo lọta e were ya ọrụ dika onye odee n'akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Times
Ọ bụ nke a ka ọ megidere wee bụrụzie onye isi na-enyoche ihe akụkọ edere ede
O mechara gaa New York University ebe ọ nọ nweta nzere PhD n;ihe gbasara mgbasa akụkọ nakwa ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchichị n'afọ 1979
Ka ọ lọchitere azụ Nigeria , ọ gakwara n'ụlọ ọrụ 'Dail Time ede o sonyeziri n'oyu bọọdụ ndị na-ahazi akụkọ ederede, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ Stanley Macebuh, Dele Giwa na Amma Ogan
Mana, ọ rụrụ ebe a obere oge n;ihi na ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkụ 'National Concord ebidoro ọhụụ nyere ọrụ dika onye izizi ga arụ dika onye isi n'ịhazi akụkọ
E mchara bugoo ya nọkwa dika 'Managing Director/Editor in Chief n'afọ 1986
Ọkwa a mere ya nwaanyị mbụ nọgoro n'ụdị ọkwa na Nigeria
Doyin Abiola bu kwa nwunye onye izizi bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ nke a kpọrọ 'National Concord Newspaper' Chief Moshood Abiola onye nke ọ lụrụ n'afọ 1981
Doyin Abiola rụtere ọrụ aka n'ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Concord
Ọ nọkwara n'ọkwa di iche iche na Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na mmeme ihe onyinye nke mbụ emere na Nigeria nke a kpọrọ 'Nigerian Merit Award'
Ọ bụ onye otu kansulu ndụmọdụ nke Ngalaba Social and Management Sciences nke dị na Ogun State University
Ọnwetara nkwanye ugwu na ihe onyinye di iche iche dika 'Diamond Award maka Media Excellence' (DAME) maka mbọ niile ọ na-agba iji akụkọ ederede wee kọwapụta ụzọ ndozi na ọchichị obodo
Ndị Nlekọta nke DAME jikọtara aka wee nye ya onyinye nke a kpọrọ 'Lifetime Achievement Award na mmeme ha mere
Ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ natara Onyinye a onye nke mbụ bọ Oriakụ (Omobola Onajide)
E nyekwara ya ikike iso n'otu ndi Felow nke Eisenhower Fellowship n'afọ 1986
Doyle Lane (1925-2002) bụ onye Africa-America na-eme ihe ọkpụkpụ nke a maara màkà ihe ọhụrụ ya, glazes na-emetụ aka
Ọrụ ya sitere na arịa dị nro na ihe ọkpụkpụ ụrọ ruo nnukwu ihe osise ụrọ na mosaics
Lane nwèrè ụlọ ọrụ na mpaghara El Sereno nke East Los Angeles

O gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Brockman Gallery na Leimert Park (1968) na Ankrum Gallery na La Cienega Boulevard (1967, 1968), ebe abụọ a ma ama màkà nka Africa America na Los Angeles n'etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ
A mụrụ ya na New Orleans, ọ kwagara Los Angeles na mbido afọ 1950
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Los Angeles City College, East Los Angeles City University tupu ọ gaa Mahadum nke Southern California
Na mbido ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà glaze màkà LH
Butcher na Co
Ka e mesịrị, ọ ga-anọgide na-arụ ọrụ na-akwado onwé ya dị ka ónyé ọrụ ite ụlọ
Lane mepụtara nnukwu ihe osise ụrọ màkà ọtụtụ ébé a ma ama na Southern California
ite e ji enyo mee
Ihe osise ụrọ
Isi iyi azụ
Mural na Huntington Library
Nkọwa nke mgbidi na Ọ́bá Akwụkwọ Huntington
Igbe ahịhịa atọ dị na Doyle Lane
Aha nna Dozie bụ aha Naijiria

A mụrụ Charles Smith na New Orleans na 1940 na Bertha Mary Smith
Mgbe Smith dị afọ iri na anọ, mmiri riri nna ya n'ime mpụ ịkpọasị
Nné ya kpọgara ya na ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ na Chicago mgbè e gbùrù nnà ya n'ihi agbụrụ
Ha biri na mpaghara dị ichè íchè nkè Maxwell Street District dị nso na 14th Street
Otu afọ mgbè e mesịrị, na 1955, Mrs
Smith kpọọrọ Charles gaa hụ ozu Emmett Till na Roberts Temple Church of God
Ahụmahụ ndị a nyèrè áká kụlite nghọta Smith banyéré ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na steeti
N'afọ 1964, Smith rụrụ ọrụ na Trans World Airlines na dị ka ónyé na-ebu akwụkwọ ozi, na-arụ ọrụ abụọ ahụ iji chekwaa ego iji zụta ụlọ màkà nwunye ọhụrụ ya na onwé ya
N'afọ 1966, e debara aha Smith na Marine Corps ebe ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na Vietnam, a chụpụrụ ya na Purple Heart n'afọ 1968 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Mmetụta anụ ahụ nke Agent Orange kpatara nsogbụ ahụike na-aga n'ihu ruo taa

O nwekwara mmetụta siri ike n'ụzọ uche na nke ime mmụọ site na ahụmịhe ebe ahụ, na-akpata ịgba alụkwaghịm Smith na ịbawanye nsogbu nchekasị Posttraumatic site na afọ 18 nke ọgụ na-esote agha tupu ọ chọta oku ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
E wezụga ọmụmụ ihe ya na Virginia Black Training Academy, màkà ọtụtụ afọ nke ahụmịhe ndụ ya, ịmụ ihe na amamihe, Smith malitere iji utu áhà ya, dị ka ihe kwekọrọ na PhD

N'isiokwu, ọrụ Charles na-eche ihe ọ na-ahụ dị ka ihichapụ akụkọ ihe méré eme' nke ndị isi ojii site n'ịmepụta ihe nkiri na ihe oyiyi nke akụkọ ndị ahụ n'usoro mgbasa ozi siri ike na nke ngwakọta nke ihe o mepụtara
A na-emepụta ọrụ ya ma na-etinye ya n'èzí
N'afọ 2000, ya na ónyé na-ese ihe Charles Gillam Sr
guzobere Algiers Folk Art Zone & Blues Museum
Ọrụ Smith dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Smithsonian American Art Museum
E tinyere ọrụ ya na Life, Liberty & Pursuit of Happiness na American Visionary Art Museum na 2010
N'afọ 2017 ọ kụziri ihe na African American Men of Unity na Aurora na nzukọ The Road Less Traveled na Sheboygan, Wisconsin
E rere ọrụ ya na New Orleans Botanical Garden na 2017
E tinyere ọrụ ya na usoro ihe ngosi 50th Anniversary nke Kohler Art Center, The Road Less Traveled na 2017-18
A na-asọpụrụ ihe ngosi ya maka usoro a dị ka nhọrọ nke abụọ maka 'Best of 2017' na magazin Art Forum
[nkwado dara]

N'afọ 2018, ọrụ Smith gụnyere ihe ngosi 10 nke ndị omenkà, Chicago Calling Art Against the Flow, nke Lisa Stone na Kenneth Burkhart haziri na Intuit The Center for Intuitive and Outsider Art dị ka akụkụ nke Art Design Chicago
N'ime ihe ngosi ahụ na ọrụ Smith bụ ọrụ Henry Darger, Gregory Warmack (nke a maara dị ka Mr
Imagination), Joseph Yoakum na Lee Godie
Smith bụ naanị onye na-ese ihe dị ndụ na ngosi ahụ
Smith na-ejikarị ihe atụ, ihe nnọchianya, akụkọ akụkọ, akụkọ ihe méré eme na ahụmịhe nke ya na nhọrọ na mmekọrịta nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ya iji mepụta gbụrụ-gbúrụ nka ya
Ndị nleta na-akpa gbụrụ-gbúrụ iberibe ndị ahụ na-agbaso dioramas ya na-adịkarị ndụ na ụzọ nkịtị ọ mèrè màkà njem
E wezụga ahụmịhe ndụ ya, ebumnuche ya bụ ịgwọ ụwa site n'ịkụziri ndị mmadụ banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị isi ojii site na ọrụ ya
Ntọala ahụ nọ na-agbanwe mgbè niile ma na-agbanwere ka Smith na-ewu ọrụ ọhụrụ
'Ihe niile na-aga n'ihu n'otu ógè ka Chineke na-akwagharị m
Ọ na-egosi m otu esi eme ya, ebe ị ga-etinye ya, na otu esi ewu ya
' Smith kwuru
Sergeant Ramey nọ n'etiti ihe onwunwe ya Aurora n'elu ụlọ ya
Ọ bụ ihe ncheta na-egosi otu n'ime ezigbo ndị enyì Smith nwụrụ n'agha, ihe ncheta nke na-anọnyere Smith
Smith lụrụ di na 1964 ma gbaa alụkwaghịm mgbè ọ lọtara n'agha na 1968
N'akụkụ ọrụ ọkpụkpụ ya, Smith bụ ónyé ozi a họpụtara ahọpụta
Ọ bụ ónyé ụkọchukwu na Ụlọ Ekpere na Nsọ nke Chineke na Memphis Tennessee
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya n'èzí ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na-arụ ọrụ iji nyéré ákà gwọọ ndị mmadụ n'ụzọ uche
Ọ na-akwado ndị agha Vietnam ndị ọzọ, ya na ndị Black Caucus nke Congress rụkọtara ọrụ na Agent Orange na njikọ PUSH nke Jesse Jackson

Sidney Onoriode Esiri (amụrụ na 1 Mee 1980 na Ikeja, Legọọsụ Steeti, Naịjirịa ), amakarị ya dịka, Dr SID
O si na Delta Steeti mana amụrụ ya na Legọọsụ

Sir Warrior, bụ onye isi otu Oriental Brothers International Band bụ nke ama ama na egwu egwu Igbo Highlife Nigeria ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ
O mere egwu nke ọma na Naijiria, tinyekwara ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ya na mba ụwa dịka London na United States of America
Na mbụ, onye malitere otu a bụ Ferdinand Emeka Opara
Sir Warrior nwere ike gbanwee arụmọrụ ya ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma na 1970s mgbe ọ sonyeere Orientalu Brodas Entanashional Band
Ndị otu ahụ mechara gbawaa, na-eduga na Prince Ichita & the Great Oriental Brothers International Band, Oriental Brothers International, na mgbe ahụ Dr
Sir Warrior & His Oriental Brothers International, nke akpọrọ The Oriental Original
O nwere ihe dị ka platinum 12 na ọla edo iri n'ọrụ ya
Dr Sir Warrior lụrụ di ma mụọ ụmụ ise (ụmụ nwoke atọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ)
Nwa mbụ ya kwuru banyere ya 'O kweghị ka anyị nwee mmasị n'egwú
Ọ chọrọ ka anyị buru ụzọ gụchaa akwụkwọ
Ọ na-ekwusi ike mgbe niile na agụmakwụkwọ bụ ihe nketa kacha mma, ihe ndị ọzọ nwere ike iso ma emechaa' Ajuzieogu nke nta mara na otu ụbọchị ọ ga-abụ onye egwu egwu dị ka nna ya
Ha abụọ kwuru, 'Ọ bụrụhaala na anyị bu n'obi ịchụ egwu dịka ọrụ anyị ka ga-agbaso ọchịchọ nna anyị'
Oliver De Coque chịkọtara ihe nketa ya, bụ onye n'ịkwanyere Dr
Sir Warrior ụtụ, kwuru, 'Ọ bụ ezigbo mmadụ na enyi

The Drama Desk Award bụ ihe nrite kwa afọ na-amata mma na ụlọ ihe nkiri New York
Nke mbụ e nyere na afo 1955 dị ka Vernon Rice Award, ihe nrite ahụ na mbụ na-asọpụrụ mmepụta Off-Broadway, yana Off-off-Broadway, na ndị nọ nso
N'ịgbaso aha 1964 dị ka Drama Desk Awards, a gụnyere ihe nkiri Broadway malite na oge onyinye 1968 rụọ 1969
A na-ewere onyinye ndị a dị ka ihe dị ịrịba ama n'ụlọ ihe nkiri America
E guzobere nzukọ Drama Desk na afo 1949 site n'aka otu ndị nkatọ ihe nkiri New York, ndị editọ, ndị nta akụkọ na ndị nkwusa, iji mee ka ọha na eze mara ihe ndị dị mkpa gbasara ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ha bidoro ihe ngosi nke Vernon Rice Awards
Aha a na-asọpụrụ onye nkatọ New York Post bụ Vernon Rice, onye malitere mgbasa ozi Off-Broadway na akwụkwọ akụkọ New York
A gbanwere aha ahụ maka oge onyinye 1963–1964 na Drama Desk Awards
N'afọ 1974, Drama Desk malitere dị ka nzukọ na-anaghi ebe egob
N'afọ 1975, ọkwa Drama Desk nke ndị mmeri gụnyere ndị a họpụtara
The Drama Desk nwere ihe karịrị otu narị ndị otu, gụnyere ndị nkatọ ihe nkiri, ndị nta akụkọ na ndị editọ na-ekpuchi ihe nkiri New York ma na-atụ vootu na onyinye
Ndị otu nwere ụdị abụọ ndị otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike (voting) na ndị otu na-ekere òkè
Ndị ọrụ Drama Desk niile na ndị otu kọmitii na-aropụta na-arụ ọrụ ha dị iche iche maka nzukọ ahụ n'afọ ofufo
Kọmitii na-ahọpụta na-ezukọ ugboro abụọ n'ọnwa iji kwurịta ọtụtụ ndị otu ihe ngosi ruru eru na-ahụ maka ịhụ
Ha na-ahọpụtazi mmepụta nke ndị otu niile ga-atụ vootu
Ihe na-eme ka nzukọ ahụ dị iche bụ na a na-ahọrọ onyinye ndị ahụ 'ndị mgbasa ozi naanị n'enweghị mmasị ọ bụla na nsonaazụ,' dị ka nzukọ ahụ si kwuo
Drama Desk Awards enye go aka na ihe ịga nke ọma na-aga n'ihu nke ndị isi kpakpando, ndị na-ede egwuregwu na ndị na-emepụta ihe, ebe ha na-ahụkwa ndị bịara ọhụrụ
The Drama Desk bụ nzukọ ihe nkiri mbụ nke New York nyere onyinye nye ndị talent dịka Edward Albee, Wendy Wasserstein, na George C
Scott
Na idebe na ọrụ mbụ ya, nzukọ ahụ na-akwado nri ehihie ndị ọbịa na ndị ọkachamara n'ihe nkiri
Ndị otu na-ekwu maka isiokwu ndị nwere mmasị ugbu a na-ekpuchi oge na Broadway, Off-Broadway, na Off-Off-Broadway, na ebumnuche nke ịkpalite mkparịta ụka na-enye ihe ọmụma na nke na-akpali akpali
Ofe na Alụlụ bụ aha ofe dị iche iche sitere na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
A na-eji okra, ogbono ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ewedu (jute) eme ha
Aha ahụ sitere na njirimara viscosity siri ike nke broth ka ọ na-apụta na efere mgbe a na-eri ya ma ọ bụ na spoon ma ọ bụ, karịa, site na itinye obere ihe siri ike (fufu) n'ime ya
Enwere ike inye ya na ọtụtụ nri fufu nke Naịjirịa , gụnyere eba (garri)
Enwere ike iji Ewedu mee ofe Yoruba nke a na-ejikarị amala eme ihe
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe na-ezo aka n'oge ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu mgbè ọkwa nke gas na-ekpo ọkụ na ikuku kwụsịrị ịrịgo ma bídó ịda
Drawdown bụ ihe dị ịrịba ama n'ịtụgharị mgbanwe ihu igwe ma mechaa belata okpomọkụ ụwa
Project Drawdown na-ezo aka n'òtù na-enweghị uru nke nwéré ebumnuche inyere ụwa aka iru ala ma kwụsị mgbanwe ihu igwe na-emebi ngwa ngwa, n'enweghị nsogbụ, na n'ụzọ ziri ezi
N'afọ 2017, akwụkwọ akpọrọ 'Drawdown' ghọrọ akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa na New York Times, ebe ọ gosipụtara ma kọwaa ihe ngwọta dị íchè íchè na mbọ dịnụ iji nyéré aka iru ihe mgbaru ọsọ a
Project Drawdown bụ ọrụ mgbochi mgbanwe ihu igwe nkè Paul Hawken na ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe Amanda Joy Ravenhill malitere
Ụkpụrụ ndị bụ isi nkè ọrụ ahụ bụ
Project Drawdown na-ahazi ngwọta dị íchè íchè n'ime otu ndị dabara na ụkpụrụ ndị a iji mepụta Drawdown Framework
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke nzukọ Project Drawdown gụnyere nkuzi vidiyo nke na-akọwa nyocha na nghọta n'azụ mgbalị na nyocha nke mejupụtara sayensị n'azụ ọrụ ahụ
Isi ihe dị na ọrụ ahụ bụ nchịkọta nkè ndepụta nke 'ihe ngwọta kachasị mkpa màkà okpomọkụ ụwa'

Ndepụta ahụ, nke na-agụnye naanị ngwọta ndị dị ugbu a na teknụzụ, bụ nke otu ndị ọkà mmụta ihe karịrị narị abụọ, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, ndị na-eme iwu, ndị isi azụmaahịa, na ndị na-arụ ọrụ chịkọtara ma ugbu a ọ dị n'ịntanetị
Ndị otu ahụ tụrụ ma gosipụta mmetụta carbon nke ngwọta ọ bụla site n'afọ 2050, ngụkọta ya na ọnụahịa ya màkà ọha mmadụ, na ngụkọta ndụ ya
Project Drawdown na-eji ọnọdụ dị ichè íchè iji nyochaa mgbanwe dị íchè íchè na mbọ ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ nwèrè ike ịdị
N'okpuru ebe a bụ tebụl nke ngwọta iri kachasị elu gụnyere na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke nzukọ ahụ, yana mmetụta nke ikuku ha dabere na nke ọ bụla
Ntụle ndị ahụ na-ezo aka na gigatons nke CO2 nke dị ka nke e belatara / nke e kewara (202050) na mgbalị kacha nta achọrọ maka ihe mgbaru ọsọ dị elu na mgbalị kachasị elu achọrọ màkà ebumnuche dị ala
E bipụtara nyocha nke afọ 2020 nke nchọpụta nke dugara n'akwụkwọ afọ 2017 dị ka PDF 104 na 2020
Àtụ Infobox football club
DreamStar FC Ladies bụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke dị na Surulere Lagos State, Nigeria na onye otu Nigerian Women Football League (NWFL)

Ha asọọla mpi na Nigeria Women Premier League, nkega kachasị elu maka egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na mba ahụ, kemgbe oge 2018/2019, ebe ha nwetara nkwalite na league ndị ama ama site na mmeri egwuregwu niile nke ngalaba ha dị ala

A maara ha dị ka Dream Stars Ladies, ruo n'ọnwa Eprel 2020, DreamStar FC Ladies nwere ọdịiche nke ịbụ naanị otu egwuregwu a na-enyeghi goolu na 2nd Division Pro league n'oge 2017/2018 na Northern na Southern Conferences

DreamStar FC Ladies bụ otu nwanyị ọkachamara kachasị mma, ndị otu nke Dream Stars Sports Development Organisation, ụlọ ọrụ mmepe bọọlụ nke na-enye mmemme mmepe zuru oke site na ụlọ akwụkwọ bọọlụ ya maka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na ọkwa ọkachamara
The Dream Stars Sports Development Organisation, academy ya, na klọb ka onye guzobere na onyeisi oche, AbdulRahmon Abolore mepụtara na 29 nke Febụwarị 2012
DreamStar FC Ladies gbara na Southern Conference nke ngalaba dị ala nke NWFL Pro League na oge 2017/2018, wee bulie nkewa ahụ, n'emeghị ka ọ daa
Nke a mere ka ha nweta nkwalite na Premier Division nke NWFL maka oge 2018/2019

Oge izizi na Premier League enweghị ihe ịma aka ya, n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-edekọ ihe ụfọdụ a na-agaghị echefu echefu dịka ịgba goolu kachasị maka akụkụ ọ bụla (4-0 megide Heartland Queens) na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke NWPL (nke abụọ kachasị elu maka klọb ọ bụla na Bayelsa Queens ' 5 - 1 trouncing nke Kaduna Queens), na mmeri NWFL Goal of the Season Award 2018/2019, nke onye na-agbachitere, Oluwabunmi Oladeji, DreamStar FC Ladies mechara na ala tebụl ha
Iji nọgide n'ọnọdụ ha na Premier League, DreamStar FC Ladies sonyere na play-offs megide klọb atọ ndị ọzọ na-agbadata site na ìgwè atọ ndị ọzọ
Ndị mbata (nke a maara n'oge ahụ dị ka Dream Stars Ladies) meriri Invincible Angels 4 - 2 na penalties mgbe ha gbara 1 - 1 na Fifa Goal Project pitch, MKO Stadium, iji zere relegation

Ndị otu ahụ nwetara ọganihu na nkeji nke iri abụọ na otu nke egwuregwu ahụ, dịka Anuoluwapo Salisuʹa na-agba ọsọ n'akụkụ chọtara Judith Nwaogu, onye bọọlụ isi ya meriri onye na-edebe goolu nke Heartland Queen
Otú ọ dị, akụkụ nke Benue State lụrụ ọgụ na ọkara nke abụọ ma mee ka ihe dị mma na nkeji nke ịrị asatọ na anọ site na Kafayat Bashiru tupu oge zuru ezu, mana emesịa tụgharịa na igba penalti
Na 2019/2020 NWPL gbanwere usoro otu anọ ya ka ọ bụrụ otu abụọ, iji mee ka asọmpi dị elu
DreamStar FC Ladies abanyela n'otu A, tinyere Pelican Stars FC, Nasarawa Amazons FC, Sunshine Stars FC, Bayelsa Queens FC, Abia Angels FC, Confluence Queens FC, na Edo Queens FC

Ndị otu abụọ kachasị elu site na otu ọ bụla ga-eru eru na-akpaghị aka maka Super Cup nke ụmụ nwanyị Nigeria (nke a makwaara dị ka The Super 4 Championship), ebe ndị otu ikpeazụ sitere na otu abụọ ahụ ga-agbadata na NWFL - 2nd Division Pro League

Iji mee ka DreamStar FC Ladies bụrụ ezigbo klọb ọkachamara nke mba ụwa, onye nwe ya achọtala enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmepe egwuregwu iji weghachite onyinyo ya ma wuo akara a na-ahụ anya, na ebumnuche nke igosi ndị na-akwado ya na ndị mmekọ na klọb ahụ abụghị naanị na ọ dị egwu maka ịnọgide n'ọgbọ egwuregwu bọọlụ kachasị elu na Naịjirịa na Afrịka, kamakwa na ọ na-ezube ịnọgide na-abụ otu n'ime klọb kachasị mma ma na-aba uru
Dị ka mmalite nke oge 2019-2020, ndị nwe klọb ahụ emeela mgbanwe abụọ dị ịrịba ama
Ihe ngosi klọb ochie site na Febụwarị 2012 ruo Machị 2020
Ihe ngosi klọb ọhụrụ site na Eprel 2020
Ewezuga mgbanwe ndị edepụtara, klọb ahụ nwere usoro ime na mgbanwe njikwa otu nke na-emetụta njikwa na mmelite teknụzụ

Ihe ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-emeziwanye ihe gụnyere imepụta ebe weebụsaịtị ọkachamara na nke na-adọrọ mmasị, imezigharị na ime ka ibe mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta kwekọọ, ịhazi ọzụzụ teknụzụ na mmepe nkà maka ndị na-azụ ndị nkuzi, iwulite nkà mmụta uche otu gburugburu ọhụụ nke klọb ahụ, yana ịmepụta ihe nlereanya klọb ndị na-akwado iji kwalite iguzosi ike n'ihe n'etiti ndị na-agba ọsọ Lagos
Dreamworld Africana bụ ogige ntụrụndụ nleherianya na ogige ntorobịa dị na Lekki, Lagos State
E guzobere ya na afọ 2018, ebe nleherianya Dreamworld weere mpaghara ala nke ogo acre ya di (iri hectare anọ) ma emeghete ya maka ọha na eze na afọ 2013
Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ bụ otu n'ime ogige nlehrianya ọturungwa kachasị na obodo ahụ
Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị iji mee ka ndị ọbịa ya nwee obi ụtọ
Ihe na-adọrọ mmasị gụnyere ihe ndị dere mmiri na ndị kpọrọ nkụ, ụgbọ ala, carousal, roller coaster, ụgbọ okporo ígwè, njem na-atọ ụtọ, ebe ụmụaka na-egwuri egwu na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ndị na-etinye ego maka mmụta na ụlọ ọrụ onwe ha malitere ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ n'afọ 2010 nke dabere na ego mmepe akụ na ụba sitere na aka Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti
E nwere atụmatụ ịgbasawanye ogige ntụrụndụ na ihe na-adọrọ mmasị
Official website
Aboriomoh Femi Raymond, onye a maara aha ya bụ Dremo, bụ onye Naijiria na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na-edekọ egwu, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na arụ ọrụ na Davido Music Worldwide (DMW) ugbu a
Dremo si Edo Steeti, Naịjirịa ebe a mụrụ ya, mana o tolitere na obodo Ibadan, Oyo Steeti
Ọ gara George na Duke High School na Ibadan, o mechara hapụ National Open University of Nigeria mgbe afọ nke abụọ ya gasịrị iji nweta oru na DMW
Dremo malitere egwu mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na ntụrụndụ egwu APPE, ebe ọ wepụtara 'Normal Levelz' na 'OBT'
Na 5 Eprel na afọ 2016, Davido tinyere Dremo na Mayorkun bịanyere aka na Davido Music Worldwide
Na 20 Julaị na afọ 2018, Dremo wepụtara EP izizi nke akpọrọ “Codename Volume 1”
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 2019, o wepụtara EP nwere egwu ise, “Icen B4 the Cake” dị ka ihe na-esote “Codename Volume 1”
Na 17 Eprel na afọ 2020, o wepụtara “Codename Volume 2” na egwu iri na abụọ
Na 23 Eprel, Dremo na Jeriq wepụtara EP 'Ea$t N We$t’
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 4 na afọ 2021, o wepụtara otu egwu nke gosipụtara Patoranking nke akpọrọ 'Wonder'

Dressed to Kill bụ akwụkwọ edere n’afo Otu Puku nari iteghete iri iteghete na ise (1995) nke ndi odee akwukwo bù Sydney Ross Singer na Soma Grismaijer dere nke na-atụ aro njikọ dị n'etiti brassiere na ọrịa kansa ara
Dị ka ndị dere ya si kwuo, ọdịdị mgbochi nke brassiere na-egbochi usoro lymphatic, na'eduga n'ihe ize ndụ nke ọrịa kansa ara
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na-ewere nkwupụta akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka ihe na'enweghị isi, ndị na -eme nchọpụta akatọwo usoro ndị dere ya dị iche iche dị na ezighị ezi
Ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụike gụnyere National Institutes of Health na American Cancer Society achọtaghị ihe akaebe na iyi brọsh na-eme ka ihe ize ndụ nke ọrịa kansa ara dịkwuo elu

Drew Spence (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1992) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Jamaica nke a mụrụ na England nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti maka otu FA WSL Tottenham Hotspur na otu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Jamaica
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba England n'afọ 2015
Onye otu Chelsea na England Gilly Flaherty chetara na ya na Spence na-egwuri egwu na Arsenal Centre of Excellence
Spence gara n'ihu na otu ndị ntorobịa Fulham, tupu ọ banye na Chelsea n'afọ 2008
Chelsea ruru na ngwụcha nke FA Women's Cup nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2012, mana Birmingham City mechara merie ha na penalti mgbe ha butere ụzọ ugboro abụọ
Becky Spencer gbochiri mgbalị Spence
N'afọ 2015, Chelsea meriri nnukwu iko mbụ ha, na 2015 FA Women's Cup Final na Wembley Stadium
Ha wee merie Sunderland n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015 iji nweta aha FA WSL na League na Cup 'ugboro abụọ'
Na ngwụcha oge ahụ, Spence bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ọhụrụ na Chelsea
N'oge Arsenal gbara ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, Spence hapụrụ Kim Little ka ọ na-elekọta ụkwụ gbajiri agbaji na ihe ebe weebụsaịtị Arsenal kọwara dị ka 'ihe siri ike'
A katọrọ ndị isi egwuregwu ahụ maka ịghara ịchụpụ Spence, onye hapụrụ Little ka a chụpụrụ ya ruo ihe dị ka izu iri
N'afọ 2020, Spence bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ nke ga-eme ka ọ nọrọ na Chelsea ruo 2022
Na June 2022, Spence bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ n'otu Tottenham Hotspur, na-ahapụ Chelsea dị ka onye bọọlụ ha kachasị ogologo oge
Onye nkuzi bọọlụ Mark Sampson nyere Spence oku mbụ ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, n'ime ndị na-enweghị ike maka asọmpi mba ụwa nke Yongchuan n'afọ 2015
O meriri na mpụta England mbụ ya na 23 Ọktoba 2015, dị ka onye nọchiri anya na mmeri England na China na Yongchuan
N'ọnwa Septemba 2017, onye otu Spence na Chelsea bụ Eniola Aluko na-achụso ebubo nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ megide The FA site na peeji nke akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian
Spence banyere na esemokwu ahụ mgbe ekpughere ya dị ka onye a na-amaghị aha ya na mbụ bụ 'The Player' onye a sịrị na Mark Sampson 'na-ewe iwe ma na-ewe iwe' na njem ya na China
Spence ruru eru maka Jamaica site na ihe nketa ya ma nweta oku mbụ ya na Reggae Girlz maka ogige ezumike mba ụwa na June
O mere nke mbụ ya na 24 Ọktoba 2021
Nwanne Spence bụ Lewwis Spence bụkwa onye na-agba bọọlụ
Drricky Beukes (29 Disemba 1918 - 9 Nọvemba 1999) bụ onye odee South Africa nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Africaans, mkpirisi akụkọ na ihe nkiri redio
Beukes dere ihe karịrị otu narị akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrikaans, ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke mkpirisi akụkọ na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri redio Afrikaans, gụnyere ụfọdụ nnukwu iberibe maka ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa Springbok Radio
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1999 na Bellville mgbe ọ lụsịrị ọrịa kansa ọbara
Enwere okporo ụzọ Drricky Beukes aha ya na Kokrus, Vereeniging
A mụrụ Hendrika Johanna van Staden na ugbo Seekoebaard na Prieska, Northern Cape, 29 Disemba nke afọ 1918
Ọ bụ ya bụ ọdụdụ nwa n'ime ụmụ iri na atọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, nna ya kwagara ezinụlọ ha na Karos, bụ́ obere obodo dị nso n’osimiri Gariep dị na Upington na Northern Cape, bụ́ ebe o tolitere ma nweta akwụkwọ n’oge mbụ ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Higher Business School na Paarl wee malite ọrụ na Karos ụlọ ọrụ nzipu ozi ka o dechara ule ọrụ ọha
Ọ lụrụ Abraham Opperman Beukes nke Prince Albert na July 4, 1942
Ọ bụ onye isi mbụ nke Laerskool Vredelust na Bellville, onye n'onwe ya dekwara akwụkwọ ụmụaka atọ
Di na nwunye ahụ kwagara Bellville ma ha mụrụ nwa nwoke, Van Staden, na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Brenda na Wilmari
Na Bellville, Beukes bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka obere akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-akpọ Die Noordwester na onye na-enye aka mgbe niile na Oudtshoorn Courant
Mgbe ha lara ezumike nká, di na nwunye ahụ biri na Tygerberg na Bellville
Di Beukes nwụrụ na Durbanville na Maachị afọ nke 1993
Beukes bụ onye ode akwụkwọ nwere ọkaibe na onye ọbịa na ọrụ SABC na redio Springbok
Nkebiokwu nke nwetara ewu ewu n'obodo niile n'oge ahụ bụ mmalite ya na ihe nkiri redio Die Indringer (The Trespasser) 'n verhaal wat elke moederhart sal roer (akụkọ na-emetụ nne ọ bụla n'obi)
Die Indringer bụ akụkọ gbasara ọnwụnwa nke otu nwanyị kuchiri nwa
Die Indringer agbasa ozi na nke mbụ ya na Mee 16, 1960 na ọ bụ mmemme ụbọchị kachasị ewu ewu na redio Springbok maka afọ 11
Beukes nọgidere na ikuku ihe karịrị afọ iri na-eme ka ọ bụrụ aha ezinụlọ na ụlọ ndị na-asụ Afrikaans
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, 'Madelief', n'ime nanị ụbọchị nke iri na anọ ma e bipụtara ya na 1945 na nwunye Ụlọ
Ọ dị naanị afọ iri na asatọ n’oge ahụ
Beukes bipụtara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ewu ewu na Afrikaans
Usoro Kamberg 'Kamberg se wêreld' (ụwa Kamberg), 1982, 'Kamberg se mense' (Ndị Kamberg), 1986 na 'Kamberg se Kinders' (Ụmụ Kamberg), 1988, bụ ndị ama ama n'etiti ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ
Beukes dekwara Meetsnoere na Een wat 'n muur afbreek
Driss Roukhe (a mụrụ na Julaị 5, 1968) bụ onye mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
A mụrụ Roukhe na Dyour Jdad Bńni MʹHamed, ógbè dara ogbenye nke Meknes, nna ya nwụkwara mgbe ọ dị afọ 7
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na òtù ndị ntorobịa dị iche iche
O mechara sonye na Institut supérieur d'angart dramatique et d'anganimation culturelle (ISADAC) ebe a zụrụ ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na mbụ na opera nke onye nduzi Moroccan Ahmed Essyad, Le Collier des ruses, n'afọ 1993
Driwaru bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Droëwors (/ˈdruːəvɔːrs/; Afrikaans n'ụzọ nkịtị 'sausage kpọrọ nkụ') bụ nri nri ndịda Afrịka, dabere na omenala, mkpụrụ coriander-spiced boerewors sausage
A na-emekarị ya dị ka dunwors (Afrikaans maka 'obere sausage') karịa dikwors ('thick sausage'), ebe ọ bụ na sausage dị arọ na akpọnwụ ngwa ngwa ma si otú a, o yighị ka ọ ga-emebi tupu echekwa ya
Ọ bụrụ na a ga-eji dikwors mee ihe, a na-emekarị ka ọ dị larịị iji nye ebe buru ibu maka ịcha
Nchịkọta eji eme sausages ndị a kpọrọ nkụ yiri nke a na-eji anụ ehi dochie anụ ezì na anụ ehi, ebe ọ bụ na anụ ehi nwere ike ịta mgbe a kpọrọ nká, abụba atụrụ na-anọchi abụba ezì eji eme boerewors
Ịkpọ nkụ na-eme ka sausage dị mma maka nchekwa na-enweghị friji

Droëwors bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'etiti anụ kpọrọ nkụ n'ihi na a na-akpọnwụ ngwa ngwa n'ọnọdụ okpomọkụ, nke kpọrọ nkụ, n'adịghị ka droge ọdịnala kachasị njọ na salumi a gwọrọ agwọ nke Ịtali, nke a na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-akpụ n'ọnọdụ oyi na mmiri
Ihe ọzọ dị iche bụ na droëwors enweghị ihe na-agwọ ọrịa dịka a hụrụ na sausage a gwọrọ agwọ
Nsonaazụ kpọmkwem nke a bụ na ekwesighi idebe droëwors n'ọnọdụ mmiri dị ka ebu nwere ike ịmalite ịmalite n'ụzọ dị mfe karịa ka ọ ga-eme na sausage a gwọrọ agwọ
Ngwaahịa a nwere njikọ ma n'aha ma n'okike na droge kacha njọ nke Dutch, nke a makwara dị ka metworst
Earl Tywone Stevens Jr
(amụrụ n'ubochí iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, n'afọ 1988), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Droop-E, bụ onye America na-eti egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ bụ nwa Bay Area rapper E-40
A mụrụ Droop-E Earl Tywone Stevens Jr
n'ọnwa Februari n'ubochí irí na asatọ, n'afọ 1988 na Vallejo, California
Ezinụlọ ya nwere ndị na-eti egwu gụnyere nna E-40, ụmụ nwanne nna ya B-Legit na Turf Talk, ya na nwanne nna ya D-Shot, Mugzi na nwanne nne ya Suga-T
Ngosipụta ndekọ izizi ya bịara ógè ọ dị afọ ise mgbe e gosipụtara ya na 'Ajụjụ' na E-40's Federal album
Ọ gbakwara egwu 'It's All Bad' site na abọm E-40 nke afọ 1995 In a Major Way (nke akpọrọ Lil E), na-eṅomi ụdị nna ya
Mmepụta izizi ya bụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise maka egwu Turf Talk 'In The Heart Of The Ghetto' na nchịkọta Mack 10 nke afọ 2003, Ghetto, Gutter & Gangster
Christopher James Gholson (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 11, 1983), nkè a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Drumma Boy, bụ ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ America
A mụrụ ya na Memphis, Tennessee, ma zụlite ya na Cordova, Tennessee, ọ hụrụ egwu mgbè ọ dị obérè
Nne ya, Billie Baker Gholson, bụ onye na-ahụ màkà ego nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwu opera ógè ụfọdụ ma bụrụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Rudi E
Scheidt School of Music na Mahadum Memphis
Nna ya, G
James Gholson, bụ onye clarinetist lara ezumike nká na prọfesọ egwu na Rudi E
Scheidt School of Music, bụ nwoke mbụ si Afrịka na Amerịka nwere oche mbụ na Memphis Symphony Orchestra
Nna ya bụ onye emeritus nke Memphis Woodwind Quintet na onye na-egwu egwu na United States Navy Band
Nna nna ya bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma nwee ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị aha ya na Washington, DC
Ndị ezinụlọ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere nne nne na nwanne nne ya bụkwa ndị egwu ma na-akụzi egwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Drumma Boy na-ekwu na o nwèrè ihe ndekọ n'aka ya mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ na clarinet mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Nna ya nyere aka n'ịkụziri ya banyere egwu ọdịnala mana ọ bụ nne ya mere ka ọ mata Curtis Mayfield na 1970s rhythm and blues
Gholson bụ onye egwu a zụrụ azụ n'egwú oge ochie, ọ malitere ịme clarinet E-flat mgbè ọ dị afọ isii wee gaa clarinet B-flat
Mgbè ọ dị afọ isii, Gholson malitere ịmụ piano
Mathematics bụ isiokwu ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị amasị ya
Na klas nke itoolu, o mèrè abụ banyéré usoro quadratic maka otuto ọzọ ma nweta ọkwa kachasị elu maka klas ahụ
Gholson malitere ịme egwu hip hop mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ ma nweta ntinye mmepụta mbụ ya na redio ọbọdọ ya na Memphis rapper Tela's “Double Dose'
O mepụtara abọm dum mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
N'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Gholson na-egwu basketball ma nye ya ọtụtụ agụmakwụkwọ egwuregwu
E nyere ya ọkwa na Memphis Youth Symphony Orchestra yana inye ya agụmakwụkwọ egwu kọleji
Dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ malitere ịkwụ ụgwọ $ 200 maka egwu ọ bụla o mere ma mesịa nweta $ 500 kwa egwu mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Gholson gàrà Mahadum nke Memphis dị ka ónyé isi Music Business, matriculating na 2001
N'ihi nrụgide sitere n'aka nne na nna ya iji nweta agụmakwụkwọ, nna ya dụrụ ya ọdụ na nzere kọleji ga-emeghe ọnụ ụzọ ndị ọzọ màkà ọganihu ọrụ, nne ya mesikwara ike mkpà ọ dị inwe ego
Gholson gakwara kọleji iji mezuo nkwenye nna ya na nzere kọleji bụ tiketi maka ọrụ siri ike ma kwụsie ike
N'ịgbaso ndụmọdụ nna ya na site n'afọ ya dị obere, Drumma Boy guzobere aha maka onwe ya ma na-aghọ ngwa ngwa ndị na-emepụta ihe kachasị achọ na Tennessee
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ezumike ya n'èzí klas na keyboard na igwe drum na-eme egwu hip hop n'ime ụlọ ya
N'etiti ịga klas, ọ ga-azụta egwu ya na-eme n'ụlọ nye ndị na-eti egwu Memphis dị ka Gangsta Boo, yana ịga Texas ịrụ ọrụ egwu maka Scarface na Bun B nke UGK
Ọ bụ ezie na Gholson nwetara ezigbo akara, a chụpụrụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 2004 n'ihi enweghị ndị bịara ya
Ego sitere na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta egwu ya siri ike nke na Gholson na-adọta $ 20,000 kwa ọnwa ébé o mechara chọpụta na ọ nweghị ihe mere ọ ga-eji nọrọ na kọleji
Nna ya màrà ya aka, na mgbalị iji mee ka ọ laghachi na kọleji, iji nweta $ 100,000 n'ime ọnwa iri na abụọ iji gosipụta nnwere onwé ya
Drumma Boy nwetara $ 100,000 n'ime ọnwa iri

Ọ bụ ezie na Gholson alaghachighị na Mahadum Memphis, ya na nna ya guzobere James na Christopher Gholson Scholarship Fund, agụmakwụkwọ nke na-aga n'ebe ụmụ akwụkwọ na-agụsị akwụkwọ na-agụsị akwụkwọ na-amụ egwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na-eme ka nnà ya na ezinụlọ ya nwee nkwa na ụkpụrụ màkà agụmakwụkwọ na ịgụ akwụkwọ ọdịbendị
Gholson arụla ọrụ na ọtụtụ ihe omume sitere na hip hop, R&B, na reggae
Gholson kwagara Atlanta n'afọ 2004 ma lekwasị anya ịghọ ónyé na-emepụta egwu na onye ọchụnta ego

N'ihota echiche ya nke azụmahịa site n'aka nne ya, onye ọkachamara na-ahụ maka ego, Gholson hiwere Drum Squad, ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ na-enweghị onwé ya nke gụnyere Drum Squad Productions, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta egwu nke na-anọchite anya ndị na-emepụta ihe na ndị na-ede egwu, Drum Squad Records (akara ndekọ), na Drum Squad Films, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkírí na nkesa
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2008, Gholson ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta hip hop kachasị achọ na ụlọ ọrụ égwu
N'afọ 2008, Vibe Magazine kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe ise kachasị elu 'na-eme mkpọtụ' na ụlọ ọrụ egwu

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009, The New York Times kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe anọ na-ekpo ọkụ 'na-akwọ ọbọdọ' na Atlanta, na-akọwa ụda ya dị ka 'ìgwè aṅụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke synths na-ekpuchi ya na injections bass nke hà nhata Memphis na Atlanta'
E hotara ya na mbipụta Jenụwarị 2010 nke Rolling Stone gbara ọrụ mmepụta ya màkà ónyé na-edekọ egwu Gucci Mane's #1 rap album The State vs
Radric Davis

N'afọ 2013, Gholson wepụtara ụdị mmanya okomoko ya nke a na-akpọ Moreno BHLV Gholson emeghewokwa “G Factory’; ụlọ ọrụ ihe okike 20,000 square foot n’obodo ya bụ Memphis, màkà mmepụta ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi TV nke ga-emesị gụnye ụlọ ahịa osisi, na ndị ọrụ nkọwa ụgbọ ala ebe a ga-ahọpụta ohere ahụ maka ndị ọkachamara na-emepụta ihe, ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-ese ihe iji mee ka nkà ha dị mma
Gholson malitekwara ngalaba mmepụta ihe nkírí na nkesa nke a na-akpọ Drum Squad Films n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ya, Drum Squad
Otu n'ime ihe nkírí ole na ole mbụ a na-akpọ 'Chapters' malitere site na ihe nkírí Drum Squad na 2012, nke Gholson mèrè ihe nkírí ọzọ màkà ya
“Know your History” bụ ihe nkiri ọzọ nweere onwe ya nke ihe nkiri Drum Squad wepụtara na-edekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọbọdọ Memphis
Drumma Boy meriri 'Best Indie Producer of the Year' n'usoro na 2009, 2010 na 2011 Southern Entertainment Awards
O nwetara nhọpụta maka 'Onye Mmepụta nke Afọ' na 2008 Ozone Awards na 2010 BET Hip Hop Awards
Egwu ya nyere aka na nhọpụta abụọ n'oge 2009 Grammy Awards gụnyere ọrụ ya na TI's Paper Trail (Best Rap Album) na 'Put On' nke Young Jeezy & Kanye West (Best Performance by a Rap Duo)
Drumma mepụtakwara 'Stranger' na Usher's 2010 Versus (EP), wepụtara ya na mbipụta deluxe nke Raymond v
Raymond; abọm ahụ meriri Grammy Awards abụọ maka Best Contemporary R&B Album na Best Male R&B Vocal Performance

N'afọ 2011, egwu Drumma 'No Hands' maka Waka Flocka, Roscoe Dash na Wale natara nhọpụta maka 'Best Collaboration' na 2011 BET Awards ma nweta nkwanye ùgwù maka 'Best Club Banger' na 2011 BET Hip Hop AwardsÀtụ Col-begin

Dry Corridor ma ọ bụ Central American Dry Corredor (CADC) bụ mpaghara oké ọhịa kpọrọ nkụ na Pacific Coast nke Central America
Mpaghara a, nke sitere na ndịda Mexico ruo Panama, nwere oke nsogbu maka mgbanwe ihu igwe n'ihi ọtụtụ ndị bi n'ime ime obodo na ịda ogbenye, ya mere na-adabere na ihe ọkụkụ maka ndụ ha
Ndị na-emetụta mgbanwe ihu igwe karịsịa bụ mpaghara Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras, na Nicaragua
Kemgbe afọ 2001, mpaghara ndị a enweela nsogbu site na usoro ụkọ mmiri ozuzo na-adịghị mma n'ihi mgbanwe na El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO)

N'oge ihe omume El Niño na 2009 (afọ e dere okwu ahụ bụ Corridor Dzhia), a na-eme atụmatụ na 50-100% nke ihe ọkụkụ na mpaghara ndị a nwere nsogbu mmiri, na n'etiti afọ 2014 na afo 2016, ọtụtụ nde mmadụ nọ n'okporo ụzọ kpọrọ nkụ chọrọ enyemaka nri n'ihi ụkọ mmiri ozuzo n'oge a, nke kpatara mfu nke ihe ọkpọkọ ọka
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2018, e mere atụmatụ na ọ dịkarịa ala 25% nke ezinụlọ ndị dị na mpaghara ahụ nwere nsogbu nri
N'ihi ya, a dụrụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka ọdụ ka ha mee ihe maka nri mbụ mgbe ha na-edozi nsogbu a, na-elekwasị anya na mbụ na mpaghara ndị nwere ihe ize ndụ kachasị elu nke enweghị nri
Mmetụta ụkọ mmiri ozuzo dị njọ karịsịa na Honduras na Guatemala
2019 bụ afọ nke ise n'usoro nke ụkọ mmiri ozuzo, na 'afọ nke abụọ n'usoro maka mmepụta na-akụ afọ n'ala maka ndị ọrụ ugbo na-ebi ndụ'
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe anọwo na-ekpo ọkụ ma kpọọ nkụ, ihe ndị na-egbu egbu na-abawanye, mmiri ozuzo na-ebelata ma ọ bụ na-adịghị, na idei mmiri adịkwa arọ
Ihe dị ka pasentị asatọ 8% nke ezinụlọ ndị nọ n'ógbè ahụ na-akọ na ha na-eme atụmatụ ịkwaga na mgbalị imeziwanye ọnọdụ ha, na mmụba nke ịkwaga nke ndị na-akwaga mba ọzọ n'etiti afọ 2010 na afo 2015

A na-atụ anya na ihe ruru nde mmadụ anọ na-akwaga na Central America na Mexico site n'afọ 2050, dị ka akụkọ ụlọ akụ ụwa si kwuo, ọ bụrụ na emeghị ihe iji gbochie mgbanwe ihu igwe ma mee ka omume ugbo kwekọọ
Ndị na-akwaga mba ọzọ na-ebu ụzọ gaa n'obodo ukwu ndị dị nso, ebe ole na ole na-aga n'ihu n'ebe ugwu Mexico, na ole na ole ka na-aga ruo n'ókè USA
Mgbanwe ihu igwe dị ka nke a hụrụ na Dry Corridor bụ otu n'ime isi iyi nke esemokwu na ókèala US-Mexico
Na US, Donald Trump akọwaala mbata dị ka mwakpo nke ndị otu na ndị ọjọọ, n'agbanyeghị na onye isi US nke US Customs na nchebe ókèala na-ekwu na ọ bụ isi ọkwọ ụgbọala

Ihe na-eme ka mmekọrịta a dị mgbagwoju anya sie ike bụ eziokwu ahụ bụ na ndị US emeela karịa mba ọ bụla ọzọ iji kpatara okpomọkụ ụwa, ya mere, ha bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala ihe kpatara ọnọdụ nke ndị mbịarambịa a

Ọganihu na mpaghara ahụ ga-achọ ka e jiri ọtụtụ akụkụ mee ihe, gụnyere inye nchekwa nri na enyemaka dị mkpirikpi, idozi mgbanwe ihu igwe n'ụwa niile, yana atụmatụ mmepe na-adịgide adịgide iji kwalite mmepụta ihe ọkụkụ siri ike na mpaghara ndị a na-eche n'ihu ihu na ihu igwe ọhụrụ
Akpụkpọ mmiri bụ ókwú ihu igwe màkà usoro synoptic ma ọ bụ usoro mesoscale
Mkpịsị aka kpọrọ nkụ n'elu na-eme ka akara kpọrọ nkụ gbasaa
Mgbapụta kpọrọ nkụ n'elu ébé ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ, nké na-ekpuchi mmiri (buoyant) na ọkwa dị àlà na-emekarị ka ikike màkà oké égbè eluigwe

Dunduzu Chisiza Junior (26 Machị 1963 - 24 Febụwarị 1999) bụ onye Malawian na-ede egwuregwu, onye nduzi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ na Malawi, W makhata Ensemble Theatre O dere ihe karịrị egwuregwu iri abụọ ma tinye aka n'ide na iduzi ihe dịka mmadụ iri abụọ na ise ndị ọzọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime egwuregwu ya nwere ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke ikike mmadụ n'oge otu otu steeti n'okpuru Banda
Ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ nke Malawi a ma ama Dunduzu Chisiza
Chisiza bụ nwa nwoke nke atọ nke Dunduzu K
Chisiza, onye a ma ama na-eme ngagharị iwe maka nnwere onwe Malawi nke e gburu n'afọ 1962 ọnwa isii tupu a mụọ Du
Nwanne nna ya, Yatuta Chisiza, bụkwa onye na-ahụ mba n'anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-eje ozi dịka onye nche nke Banda n'oge ọgụ maka nnwere onwe
E gburu ya mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị n'oge ọ nwara iweghara ọkwa onye isi ala n'afọ 1967
Chisiza malitere inwe mmasị na ihe nkiri na Henry Henderson Institute na Blantyre dịka nwa akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O dere ma duzie 'The Deceased's Attack', nke meriri ihe nrite mbụ na National Schools Drama Festival n'afọ 1982
O mechara kwaga US ma nye ya BFA na Performing Arts na Philadelphia College of the Performing arts
Ọ ghọkwara onye na-enwe ọnụnụ ọkụ n'obi maka martial arts na-enweta belt ojii ma ghọọ onye nkuzi na Philadelphia Arts Centre
Ọ laghachiri Malawi n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ọ malitere iji nkà nka kpuchie isiokwu ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ nkatọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, n'afọ 1993, o kwetara iwere ọkwa Minista na-ahụ maka egwuregwu, ndị ntorobịa na ọdịbendị n'otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ikpeazụ nke Banda tupu ntuli aka ọtụtụ otu ndọrọ ndọrọ n'afọ 1994
N'ọnwa ndị bu ntuli aka mbụ nke ọtụtụ òtù, nke ọ bụla n'ime òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị atọ dị mkpa chọrọ ya
O kwupụtara ọpụpụ ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 1994 mgbe e meriri MCP
N'afọ 1998, ọ sonyeere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, UDF
O kwupụtara na ọ ga-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu maka Karonga South mana ọ nwụrụ tupu ntuli aka

Nna nna ya bụ Bazuka Mhango
Nwa ya nwoke, Thlupego Chisiza bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma e jidere ya na 2011 maka ịme egwuregwu na-akatọ gọọmentị nke Robert Chasowa dere
