Edafe Egbedi (a mụrụ n'abalị̀ ise nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Naijiria na-agbara Norrby IF bọọlụ
Ọ bụonye ama ama ọkachasị ị̀nọ̀ na song ụkwụ aka nri
N'ọkwa ndị otu mba, ọ gbaara Naịjirịa boolu na 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup, ma nye goolu dị mkpa mgbe Naịjirị meriri England 1-0 na agba nke iri na isii, iji ruo Quarter-final
Ọ gbakwara egwuregwu asaa maka Naịjirịa na 2009 FIFA U-17 World Cup, na-enyere ndị otu ya aka ruo na nke ikpeazụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2014, emere mgbazinye Egbedi nye n'aka AGF na Skive IK maka afọ 2014 fọdụrụnụ
Egbedi họọrọ ịkwụsị nkwekọrịta ya na AGF na n'onwa Jenụwarị 2015
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Landskrona BoIS na Swedish Division nke mbụ na Superettan n'etiti afọ 2017 na afọ̀ 2018
'Edda' ( /ɛ d ə / ; Old Norse Edda, otutu Eddur) bụ Old Norse okwu nke e ekewet arar

sit nae ọkà mmụta nke oge na mkpokọta nke abụọ Medieval Icelandic edemede ọrụ ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka ndị Prose Edda na ihe nchịkọta ochie nke poems na-enweghị aha mbụ a maara ugbu a dị ka Poetic Edda
Okwu a na-ezo aka na akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ naanị Prose Edda, mana nke a ebe ọ bụ na ejirila ojiji n'ihi mgbagwoju anya na ọrụ nke ọzọ
Edere ọrụ abụọ a na Iceland n'oge narị afọ nke 13 na Icelandic, n'agbanyeghị na ha nwere ihe sitere na ọdịnalla mbụ, wee banye nagbo a Vikine
Akwụkwọ ndị ahụ bụ isi mmalite nke ọdịnala skaldic ochie na Iceld d na akụkọ ifo Nors
Eddie Drennon (amụrụ Edward Allen Drennen, 1940) bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, na onye nhazi
Ụdị egwu ya gụnyere R&B, pop, disco, egwu Latin, salsa, jazz, funk, na charanga
A maara ya nke ọma màkà egwu ya na-agafe Atlantic, 'Let's Do The Latin Hustle', nke e dekọrọ na 1975 ya na ndị otu ya na-akwado ya, BBS
Unlimited
Ọ bụ Drennon dere, mepụta ma hazie egwu ahụ
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ nke oge ahụ, gụnyere 'Do What You Gotta Do', ka ndị egwu nke ógè a dịka Grandmaster Flash, The Avalanches, Biz Markie, na Shaggy gosipụtara
A mụrụ Drennon na Newark, New Jersey, United States, mgbè ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ndị otu ọbọdọ

Site na 1959 ruo 1963, ọ gụrụ usoro violin na Louia Vaughn Jones na nhazi egwu na Mark Fax na Mahadum Howard dị na Washington, DC Na mbụ ọ bụ ónyé egwu na-arụ ọrụ na Washington, ónyé isi egwu Lou Perez gbara ya ume ịkwaga New York City n'etiti afọ 1960, ma soro Pupi Legarreta, Super Tipica De Estrellas, Tipica Ideal na Charanga America rụọ ọrụ
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé nduzi egwu Bo Diddley na 1966, na-egwu egwu dị ka onye na-akpọ violin eletrik ya ruo 1967
Ọ rụrụ otu egwu na Bo Diddley's, His Best album Drennon rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-akwado Mongo Santamaría, Ray Barretto na Ike & Tina Turner
N'afọ 1975, ọ zutere ma malite ịrụ ọrụ na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Joe Bana, ónyé nwéré Friends & Co
Records
Ngwakọta Drennon nke Latin na disco wetara nnukwu egwu ya, 'Let's Do The Latin Hustle', nke bụkwa egwu mbụ maka akara ahụ
Egwu a banyèrè na chaatị US Billboard R&B, na-eru na nọmba 36
Ọ bịarukwara nọmba 4 na chaatị Hot Dance Club Songs Ọ gbagoro ruo nọmba 20 na UK Singles Chart na Machị 1976
Ihe mkpuchi nke egwu ahụ site na M na O Band ruru nọmba 16 na chaatị UK, na-eme nke mbụ
Site na nkwado ya BBS
Unlimited, Drennon dekọrọ abọm atọ n'etiti 1975 na 1979 màkà Casablanca Records

Allmusic kwuru na 'Drennon's second Casablanca album [It Don't Mean a Thing] na-eji otu usoro ahụ dị ka nke mbụ nke mepụtara nnukwu egwu ya 'Latin Hustle' Latinish pop rhythms topped by female vocals and accented with strings
Aha egwu ahụ bụ ihe dị egwu, nke kwesịrị ekwesị n'ezie
Drennon gàrà n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpọ violin na oge ndekọ na New York
O dekwara, hazie ma mepụta màkà Esther Williams ('Last Night Changed It All')

N'afọ 1981 na 1982, ọ mepụtara otu salsa na charanga nke New York, Orquesta Novel N'afọ 1983, ọ wepụtara Eddie Drennon na Charanga Soul Drennon nwetara ihe nkírí màkà ihe nkírí ahụ, In the Line of Fire (1993), ma depụta egwu maka egwu Helen Hayes nke 1997, Torn from the Headlines Ndị otu egwu ya gbara egwu na Soldiers of Jah Army's Get Wiser na Get Wiser Live DVD (2006); na 2009 Born in Babylon album

Na 1980s na 1990s, Drennon rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkụzi na Mahadum Fairleigh Dickinson na Mahadum Howard, yana ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nduzi egwu na Everyday Theater na Washington, DC Ọ na-egwu egwu ugbu a na Umoja String Quartet, ma na-eje ozi na ngalaba na Mahadum George Washington na Levine School of Music

Eddie Eckstein (amụrụ na 29 Nọvemba 1939) bụ onye egwu a mụrụ na South Africa, onye na-eme ihe ọchị, ihe nkiri, telivishọn na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya na otu egwu The Bats
Ọrụ ya, nke malitere na 1960s, gafere afọ iri ise
A mụrụ Eddie Eckstein na Bezuidenhout Valley, Johannesburg na 29 Nọvemba 1939
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Marist Brothers College na mpaghara Observatory ma mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya ọ chọrọ ohere ịrụ ọrụ na Barclays Bank
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ehihie na ụlọ akụ ahụ, a na-ewere abalị ya dị ka onye na-akụ igba na onye na-agụ egwú
Ọ ga-abụ onye otu ọtụtụ ndị otu South Africa na mmalite afọ iri isii dịka Al Willox Quartet, Flippie van Vuuren Band na Jimmie Rayson Combo
Mgbe ọ nụsịrị The Beatles na Bulawayo, Rhodesia, ọ ghọtara na ụdị egwu ọhụrụ a bụ ọdịnihu nke egwu ma mgbe ọ laghachiri Johannesburg, ọ zutere Paul Ditchfield wee guzobe otu egwu The Bats na 1964
Otu egwu mbụ nke otu ahụ, 'All I Got', gara na nọmba 1 na Springbok Radio na LM Radio
Eckstein ga-emekwa ihe Paul Ditchfield dere na 1972 Tokyo Song Competition na abụ ahụ, 'Oh God It's Beautiful', na-eru na ngwụcha asọmpi ahụ
Bats kewara na 1981 ma ndị otu ahụ na-achụso ọrụ nke ha, mana ha gbanwere na 2000
Na ngwụcha afọ iri asaa, ọ ga-achịkwa otu ụmụ nwanyị niile dị na Johannesburg, Pantha, nke onye na-agụ egwú ya bụ PJ Powers

N'afọ 2014, Eckstein sonyere na egwu egwu ya na ndị ọzọ a ma ama dịka Bobby Angel na Billy Forrest kpọrọ The Two Cowboys, na-ekpuchi egwu South Africa ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ ma na-egosi mba, rock, pop, duets na comedy

Mgbe telivishọn malitere na South Africa na 1976, ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị gosiri na South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) nke a na-akpọ Biltong & Potroast nke na-eme ka ndị na-eme ihe ọchị a mụrụ na South Africa megide ibe ha maka ihe enyere maka njakịrị kachasị mma
Ihe ngosi ahụ ga-aga afọ ise na telivishọn
Eckstein gosipụtara na mbipụta dị ka ihe nkiri na 2010 nke ga-egosipụta anọ n'ime ndị ama ama mbụ
Ọ ga-esokwa Clive Scott na Annabel Linder mee ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị n'ezinụlọ South Africa Oh George na 1981
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ememe na telivishọn Telly Fun Quiz na 1990s na onye isi ajụjụ Martin Bailie na SABC
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri South Africa n'oge ogologo ọrụ ya nke gụnyere I Love My Wife, Little Shop of Horrors, Pyjama Tops, Not Now Darling, Grin and Bear It and What about Love
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012, a họpụtara Eckstein maka onyinye Audience Choice na Comics' Choice awards nke abụọ nke emere na Montecasino resort, na Johannesburg mana Sifiso Nene meriri ya
Eddie Masaya (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1960) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Nyanga, Masaya gosipụtara obere mmasị na ihe ọkpụkpụ ruo mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ chọtara akwụkwọ The African Times nke nwere isiokwu banyere ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume Zimbabwe
Isiokwu ahụ gosipụtara ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, gụnyere Claud Nyanhongo na Bernard Manyandure; ọ kpọkwara nwa nwanne nna ya bụ Masaya bụ Moses
Nke a bụ nke mbụ Eddie nụrụ banyere ọrụ nwa nwanne nna ya, n'oge na-adịghị anya, o kpebiri ịga Harare mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma rịọ ka ya na nwa nwanne nna ya rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 1980, o mere nke a, nọrọ afọ abụọ na-amụ ma na-arụ ọrụ na Moses
Ndị ikom ahụ gosipụtara na John Boyne Gallery n'afọ 1981
N'afọ 1982, Masaya gara Guruve ka ya na Brighton Sango rụọ ọrụ, mmekọrịta nke kwụsịrị na ọnwụ nke ikpeazụ n'afọ 1995
Masaya so na ndị mbụ n'ime ọgbọ nke abụọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe iji pụọ na mgbochi ejiji nke ndị na-ese ihe na mbụ
A maara ọrụ ya maka àgwà mmụọ ha, ma dị njọ na textures karịa nke ọgbọ gara aga
Omela ihe ngosipụta n'ụwa niile, a pụkwara ịhụ ọrụ ya na Chapungu Sculpture Park
Eddie Nartey (a mụrụ na 6 Nọvemba 1984) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Ọrụ nkwado ya na Frank Rajah's Somewhere In Africa mere ka a họpụta ya na Nollywood na African Film Critics Awards (NAFCA), na onyinye ihe nkiri Ghana

A họpụtara ya na ngalaba onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka Kiss Me If You Can, O nwetara ohere mbụ ya ime ihe nkiri izizi ya nke akpọrọ Could This Be Love ebe ya na Evelyn dere ihe nkiri ahụ, nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Majid Michel, Kwadwo Nkansah (Lil Win), Nana Ama Mcbrown, Fred Amugi, na Gloria Sarfo
Ya na Juliet Ibrahim rụkọrọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Shattered Romance
O dekwara ma duzie ihe nkiri Royal Diadem
O nwere njikọ na British Actor / Director Danny Erskine
Eddie gara Korle Gonno Methodist primary na JSS na Accra maka agụmakwụkwọ bụ isi
Agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bịara na Holy Trinity Cathedral Secondary School (HOTCASS)
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ghana, Legon ebe ọ gụrụ maka iduzi ma nweta BFA na Fine Arts
Nwunye ya nwụrụ na Jenụwarị afọ 2021 mgbe afọ abụọ nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere
Ọ duziri ma mepụta
Eddie Samuel Obong Watson Jr
(amụrụ na Mee 22, na afọ 1980) bụ onye mba Liberia amụrụ na Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
O nwetara ihe nrite mbụ ya na Ihe nrite ihe nkiri Ghana na afo 2014 maka ihe nkiri ya Ebola nke o dere, duzie ma mepụta
Ọrụ ọkachamara nke Watson malitere na afọ 2010 na Labour of Love
O mechara gaa n'otu afọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri agha Afrịka, Somewhere in Africa, ebe o nwere ọrụ nkwado
Costar Majid Michel tụrụ aro Watson nye onye nduzi, Frank Rajah, maka ọrụ nke onye ọhụrụ a na-ewebata na usoro 4Play Reloaded nke 4Play nke Venus Films na-ewu ewu
Ọrụ nkwado ya na Frank Rajah's Somewhere in Africa mere ka a họpụta ya na Nollywood na African Films Critics Awards (NAFCA)
Afọ 2014, bụ afọ dị ụtọ dị ilu maka Watson
West Africa na obodo Watson, Liberia, nke bụ otu n'ime ndị nje Ebola kacha emetụta
Watson dere, mepụta ma duzie obere ihe nkiri ahụ, Ebola Afọ ahụ wetara ọtụtụ nhọpụta maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka ọrụ dị iche iche na ihe nkiri dịka Bachelors, Sister at War na Purple Rose
Na nke mbụ ya, a họpụtara ya na ngalaba abụọ dị iche iche maka Ghana Movie Award (Best Actor in Lead Role for Bachelors and Best Short Film for Ebola, nke o meriri)

Onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ emepụtala nnukwu ihe nkiri abụọ ugbu a; Jack & Jill na She Prayed Na Satọdee, Disemba 5, na afọ 2015, Eddie Watson gosipụtara She Prayed na Sierra Leone site na nkwado site n'aka ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri Africa gụnyere Majid Michel, Beverly Osu na Melvin Oduah
E kwuru na nyocha nke She Prayed bụ ihe ngosi kachasị na mbido niile na ihe ngosi mba ụwa niile na afọ 2015 na Sierra Leone
Eddie Watson lụrụ onye ọlụlụ ya nke afọ abụọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naomi Baaba Watson, na mmemme nzuzo
Di na nwunye a nabatara nwa mbụ ha, Emirror (Emi) Cassia Watson na February 2, afọ 2015
Watson gara na peeji Instagram ya iji kesaa ọnwụ nne ya Leonora Caulker na Mee 27, afọ 2021
Ebumnuche ihe nkiri a bụ ịkụziri ndị mmadụ na mpaghara ndị ọrịa ahụ metụtara

Eddie Watson n'onwe ya kwadoro ihe nkiri ahụ kpamkpam ma kesaa ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mba ndị metụtara ya tinyere ndị ọzọ na mpaghara mbipụta nakwa n'ịntanetị niile n'enweghị otu ụgwọ site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere 'We Need Help-Ebola Campaign' n'otu afọ ahụ e ji akara ngosi Twitter #WeNeedHelpEbola gbaa ihe nkiri ahụ
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ihe nkiri ahụ gara n'ihu merie Best Short Film Movie na Ghana Movie Awards (GMA)
Ndepụta nke ihe nkiri ahọpụtara

Eddy Kimani (a mụrụ na 31 Mee 1978), bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ese olu na onye na-egosi redio
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri In a Better World, The Distant Boat na Lusala
A mụrụ ya na Mee 31, 1978 na Nakuru, Kenya
Ọ lụrụ onye ọlụlụ ya ogologo oge bụ Nyambura Njenga n'afọ 2011
Di na nwunye a mụtara ụmụ abụọ
O mechara kewapụ nwunye ya na ụmụ ya na-ekwu na ịda mbà n'obi ya
N'afọ 2006, o mere ihe nkiri izizi na ihe nkiri Money and the Cross
Otú ọ dị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ a na-edeghị aha ya na ihe nkiri ahụ
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya maka ọrụ 'Winston Kinyang'weu' na usoro telivishọn The Agency
Mgbe ọrụ nkwado ahụ gasịrị, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri afọ 2010 In a Better World na obere ọrụ ọzọ
Nke mbụ ọ sonyeere Capital FM wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye mgbasa ozi na onye na-ahụ maka redio
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye na-egosi TV na onye mgbasa ozi mba KBC na NTV
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nduzi nkwukọrịta nke Gọọmentị Nakuru County
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado ahụike uche na onye na-eme mkpọsa oge niile
Ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ Quality Rights nke WHO mepụtara ma nye ya
N'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ndu na usoro telivishọn Country Queen
Ede-Oballa bụ mpaghara ime obodo di na Nsukka nke dị na ndịda isi obodo
Ede-Oballa bụ obodo atọ kwụụrụ onwe ya mebere ya, Ede-Ukwu, Ede-Enu na Owerre Ede-Oballa na ndị eze ọdịnala ha
Obodo ọ bụla nwere obodo ọ nọ n'ime obodo ma nwee onyeisi obodo a maara dị ka Onyishi
Ede-Oballa dị na mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Nsukka
Opi (saịtị ihe ochie), Eha-alumona, Lejja na Nru Nsukka gbara obodo a gburugburu
Ede bụ nri ọkụkụ nke a na-eri na Africa, Caribbean na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Asia
A na-akụ ede maka mgbọrọgwụ stachi ya
A na-akụ Colocasia maka corm ya nke a na-eri mgbe esichara, ọ mgbe ghere ya ghee
Enwere ike kpoo corms ma jiri ya mee ntụ ọka ma ọ bụ sliced ma ghee ya ka ọ bụrụ ibe
A na-erikwa akwụkwọ osisi ahụ, a na-erikwa ya dị ka akwụkwọ nri mgbe o siri nri dị ka stews
Ede na-eto nke ọma na ala na-atọ ụtọ, nke na-agbapụta nke ọma, na ájá nwere pH n'etiti 42-75

Edemede juru eju bụ okwu iwu ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-akọwa ihe ndị dị ka matarasị, àkwà, ihe mkpuchi, ohiri isi, ihe eji egwuri egwu, teddy bea wdg, ya bụ ihe eji akwa jupụta na ihe na-adịghị arụ ọrụ, ihe siri ike, dị ka ogho, kapok, ma ọ bụ polyurethane ụfụfụ
A na-achọkarị ka ihe ndị dị otú ahụ na-ere dị ka ihe ọhụrụ na United States nwee mkpado a na-akpọ akara iwu na-akọwa akwa na ihe eji eme ihe
Edet bụ aha enyere na nna nna a na-enye nwa nwoke a mụrụ n'ụbọchị ederi nke bụ ụbọchị ụka na kalenda efik
Onye isi nri Dr edet Amana mụrụ na 11 Disemba 1938 ọ bu onye injinia Naijiria
listen (help·info)
A mụrụ Edet James Amana, Officer of Order of the Niger (OON) na Disemba 11, 1938, na oyubia Oron, akwo ibom State gụrụ akwụkwọ na Methodist College uzuakoli na King's College, Lagos

Ọ gara imperial college London(1961-6) ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ na Civil Engineering na-abịa nke mbụ na klas ya na-agụsị akwụkwọMgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị injinia ndụmọdụ nke Britain
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka injinia onu maka Shell-Mex & BP (1968-72)
N'afọ 1972 o guzobere Amana Consulting Engineers
N'ime afọ iri na ise, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ọrụ maka imepụta na mmejuputa oru ngo ruru ihe dị ka $ 2bn
Ngalaba ọrụ injinia nwere ọrụ maka AW Chesterton nke Boston, na Hewlett-Packard (1982)
N'afọ 1981, e guzobere njikọ aka na Earth Technology Corporation nke California maka nyocha na map nke geotechnical na geophysical
Ọrụ ọzọ metụtara ọdịmma Israel gụnyere atụmatụ ụlọ
N'oge ọ kachasị elu, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ were ndị injinia 30, gụnyere ndị mba ọzọ 10
[citation needed] Site na 1980, otu ahụ malitere ịzụlite ugbo rọba ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ nhazi rọba n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
Otu ahụ na-etinye aka na ahia mkpuchi na ahia na nnyefe maka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
Edet Amana bụ onye guzobere Citibank Nigeria ma jee ozi na bọọdụ nke ụlọ akụ ahụ site na 1985 ruo 2010
Taa Edet Amana bụ onye isi oche nke Amana Group of Companies na onye isi oche gara aga nke [[[Nigerian Academy of Engineering]

Ọ bụkwa onye otu Nigerian Society of Engineers, onye isi oche gara aga nke Association of Consulting Engineers Nigeria, onye otu Nigerian Institute of Management na onye otu International Institute of Directors
Ọ bụkwa onye otu American Society of Civil Engineers na Association of African Development Experts
Nwunye mbụ Edet Amana, Doris Edet Amina, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ isii, nwụrụ na Disemba 11, 2004
Ya na nwunye ya nke abụọ, Hilda Edet Amana
Ene Edet otudor otobong dị na July 18,1986 na Douala bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Cameroon nke na-agba ugbu a maka klọb Kucuk kaymakl nke ugwu Cypriot
Na 1 Jenụwarị 2010 ọ nọ na ikpe na Ismaily SC na Egypt
O nwere nnwale gara nke ọma mana ọ pụghị ịbịanye aka n'ihi na klọb ya Al-Ittihad enweghị ike iru nkwekọrịta na Ismaily SC na ụgwọ mbufe nke $ 120,000
Ọ laghachiri Al-Ittihad na 13 Jenụwarị 2010
N'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2011, Otobong agafeela Al-Hilal nke Sudan
Na 7 June 2012 Al Hilal tọhapụrụ ya
Na ngwụcha Jenụwarị 2014, ọ hapụrụ otu Moroccan Kawkab Marrakech gaa n'otu Egypt Premier League Misr El-Makasa, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na ọkara
Na ngwụcha Jenụwarị 2016, ọ hapụrụ otu Egypt Misr El-Makasa maka otu KTFF Süper Lig Küçük Kaymaklı Türk SK, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta ọkara afọ
O gosiputara na Cameroon U-23 na egwuregwu niile nke Africa
Edgar Langeveldt bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na onye omee
A mụrụ Langeveldt n'afọ 1969
Ọ gụrụ iwu na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Na Zimbabwe, a maara ya nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya dịka onye na-eme ihe ọchị
Kemgbe afọ 2001, Langeveldt na-arụ ọrụ ma na-eme njem n'èzí Zimbabwe, n'ihi ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'okpuru ọchịchị onye isi ala Mugabe
N'ihi ya, a ka maara ya nke ọma na South Africa
N'egwuregwu ya, satire ya na-ekwu maka isiokwu ndị dịka iwe, mmegbu ọha na eze na ikpe na-ezighị ezi
Ọ na-achị onwe ya na obodo ndị ọzọ ọchị
N'ọrụ a, ọ na-ede ihe odide nke ya
N'afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri High Explosive
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu
N'afọ 2005, e nyere ya onyinye Prince Claus Award site na Netherlands n'ime isiokwu ọchị na satire, maka ọrụ ya dịka onye na-eme ihe ọchị
Dịka onye na-agụ egwu, ọ meriri Carnivore Lyrics Contest n'afọ2011
Ya na onye edemede Penny Lendrum kerịtara onyinye a
Edi Mūe Gathegi (a mụrụ na Machị 10, 1979) bụ onye Kenya-American na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara dịka onye na-eme ihe ugboro ugboro Dr

Jeffrey Cole (aka 'Big Love') na usoro telivishọn House, dịka Cheese na ihe nkiri afọ 2007 Gone Baby Gone, Laurent na ihe nkiri Twilight na nke ya The Twilight Saga New Moon, na dịka Darwin na X-Men First Class
Edi gosikwara na usoro AMC, Into the Badlands, dịka Baron Jacobee
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ugboro ugboro na usoro telivishọn nke NBC, The Blacklist, dịka Matias Solomon, onye na-arụ ọrụ maka nzukọ nzuzo
Gathegi kwughachiri ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2016–2017 oge mpụ thriller, The Blacklist Redemption Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa na Startup, usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn na Crackle
A mụrụ ya na Nairobi, Kenya, Gathegi tolitere na Albany, California, US
Gathegi gara Mahadum California, Santa Barbara, ebe ọ na-atụ èpèléǹkàtà ruo mgbe mmerụ ikpere kwụsịrị ọrụ ya
Gathegi wee malite ịga klas ime ihe nkiri
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na New York University's Graduate Acting Program na Tisch School of the Arts, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ̀ 2005

Ọrụ Gathegi malitere n'ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri ya gụnyere Two Trains Running na Old Globe Theatre, As You Like It, Twelfth Night, Othello, A Midsummer Night's Dream, na Cyrano de Bergerac, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ ọkachamara mbụ nke Gathegi bụ Haitian Cabbie na ihe nkiri afọ 2006, Crank
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gara nyocha maka ọrụ Kaylo, ndị na-emepụta ihe nyere Efren Ramirez ọrụ ahụ ma kama nye Gathegi ka ọ pụta dịka Haitian Cabbie
O nwere obi abụọ na mbụ banyere ịme ụda olu Haitian, mana otu enyi Haitian zụrụ ya
N'afọ 2007, mgbe onye ọbịa gosipụtara na Lincoln Heights na Veronica Mars, Gathegi gara n'ihu dịka Bodie na Death Sentence, Darudi na The Fifth Patient na Cheese na Gone Baby Gone
O mechara nwee ọrụ ugboro ugboro dịka onye Mọmọn Dr
Jeffrey Cole na ihe nkiri ahụike telivishọn House
House, onye n'onwe ya bụ onye na-ekweghị na Chineke, na-akwakarị àgwà ya emo maka nkwenkwe okpukpe ya
Ọ bụkwa onye ọbịa na CSI Miami, CSI Crime Scene Investigation na Life on Mars n'afọ 2008 tupu e mee ya dịka Laurent na Twilight
Mgbe mbụ Gathegi nyochara maka ihe nkiri afọ̀ 2008, nke sitere na otu akwụkwọ mbụ akpọrọ na usoro Stephenie Meyer's Twilight, ọ nụbeghị banyere usoro ahụ ma ọ maghị na àgwà ya bụ vampire
Ugbu a, ọ gụrụ usoro ahụ dum ma kpọọ onwe ya onye na-akwado hardcore
Ọ na-egosi Eddie Willers na Atlas Shrugged (2011), dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ayn Rand nke otu aha ahụ
O mechara gosipụta onye Haitian ọzọ, Jean Baptiste, na oge nke ise nke Justified, mana obi adịghị ya mma na ọrụ ahụ ma rịọ ka ewepụ ya na ihe ngosi ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ugboro ugboro na usoro telivishọn nke NBC, The Blacklist, dịka Matias Solomon, onye na-arụ ọrụ maka nzukọ nzuzo
Gathegi kwughachiri ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2016–2017 oge mpụ thriller, The Blacklist RedemptionỌ na-egosipụtakwa Ronald Dacey na StartUp
Gathegi lụrụ onye Romania, Adriana Marinescu n'afọ 2018
Drama Desk Awards
Obie Awards
Los Angeles Drama Critics Circle Awards
Method Fest Independent Film Festival
Ihe nrite Ovation
Lucille Lortel Awards
Edip Yüksel (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Disemba 20, 1957 na Güroymak, Turkey) bụ onye America-Kurdish na-eme ihe ike na onye ama ama na òtù Koranism
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ ibe na enyi nke Rashad Khalifa nwụrụ anwụ
Editan soup bụ ofe akwụkwọ nri nke sitere na ndị Efik nke Cross River State na South South South no na obodo Nigeria
A maara ya nke ọma n'etiti ndị Cross River State
A na-eji akwụkwọ Editan, akwụkwọ na-elu ilu eme ofe ahụ
Tupu esi ya esi nri, a ga-ewepụ obi ilu ahụ
E kwenyere na akwụkwọ Editan nwere uru ọgwụ
Àtụ Soups

Edite Ramos da Costa Tenjua (Amụrụ na 31 Disemba 1972) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ọchụnta ego nke São Tomé na Príncipe bụ Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi site n'afọ 2012 ruo afọ 2014, jere ozi n'ụlọ ikpe iwu nke mba ahụ site n'afọ 2019 ruo afọ 2020, ma bụrụ Minista nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ kemgbe ọnwa Septemba 2020
Edith Olumide Alumeida Agoye (amuru na ọnwa 19 Jenuarị na afọ 1976) bu onye ama ama lara ezumike nka n'egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjiria bụ onye gbara Shooting Stars SC n'ikpeazụ
Agoye ya na onye otu egwuregwu mbụ ya bụ Wasiu Taiwo kwagara n'oge okpomọkụ nke 2008 na Shooting Stars SC
Ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkwa nchịkwa maka 3 SC na 2013
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye nchịkwa isi na 2019 ka 3SC enweghị nkwalite
Edith Ogoke (28 Ọgọstụ, Owerri ) bụ nwa agbọghọ Naijiria na-akụ ọkpọ
N'egwuregwu Olimpik Summer 2012, ọ gbara asọmpi n'asọmpị ịdị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị, mana e meriri ya na agba nke abụọ
Na 2014 Commonwealth Games, o meriri ihe nrite ọla, na-eti Shiromali Weerarathna tupu ọ merie Savannah Marshall
Edith Ballantyne bụ onye (amụrụ na Disemba 10, 1922) bụrụ kwa nwa amaala Czech Canada, onye bụ onye a ma ama na, Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) kemgbe afọ 1969
N'oge ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke nzukọ mba ụwa, nke dị na Geneva, Switzerland, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo afọ iri abụọ na atọ
N'agbata afọ 1992 na afọ 1998, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche mba ụwa nke nzukọ ahụ
N'afọ 1995, a kwanyeere ya ugwu dị ka onye natara onyinye udo Gandhi
A mụrụ Edith Müller na 10 Disemba 1922 na Jägerndorf, akụkụ nke Czech Silesia na Rosa na Alois Müller
A zụlitere ya na Czechoslovakia ruo mgbe Sudeten Crisis nke 1938
Ezinụlọ ahụ buru ụzọ gbaga England, ma site na afọ 1939 gaa Canada, ebe ụlọ ọrụ Canadian Pacific Railway Company debere ha ka ha rụọ ọrụ ugbo na British Columbia
N'enweghị ike ịkwado ezinụlọ ha, ha kwagara Toronto na afọ 1941, ebe Müller chọtara ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ụlọ

N'enweghị ike ịsụ Bekee, ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) kụziiri ya asụsụ ahụ, bụ ndị na-agbaso ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Bohemian ma gbalịa inyere ha aka ime mgbanwe na ndụ na Canada
N'ịbanye na WILPF, Müller hụrụ ozi ha banyere pacifism na ikike mmadụ na-akpali akpali, mana ọ hapụrụ njikọ ya mgbe ọ kwagara Montreal na afọ 1945
Na July 1948, Müller lụrụ Campbell Ballantyne, onye ọrụ nke International Labour Office ma soro ya kwaga Geneva n'ikpeazụ n'otu afọ ahụ
Mgbe ọ bịarutere na Switzerland, Ballantyne malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka World Health Organization, na ngalaba mbipụta, dị ka osote onye nduzi
Mgbe afọ ise gasịrị, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ iji lekọta ụmụ anọ di na nwunye ahụ
Mgbe afọ iri abụọ nke ibi na Geneva gasịrị, ọ chọpụtara na isi ụlọ ọrụ WILPF dị n'ebe ahụ ma wepụta onwe ya ije ozi na afọ 1968
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ ode akwụkwọ ukwu nke nzukọ ahụ, ma nabata ọnọdụ oge niile iji rụọ ọrụ iji melite mmekọrịta WILPF na NGO na United Nations (UN)
N'afọ 1970, ọ gara WILPF's Eighteenth Congress, nke emere na New Delhi, nke nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'echiche ya banyere ịhazi nwere onwe na udo

Ọ ghọtara na ọ bụrụ na ụzọ udo iji dozie esemokwu agwụla, a ga-enwe ụzọ iji ghọta na ndị a na-emegbu emegbu nwere ike ịmalite ime ihe ike na ndị otu nwere ike ịkwado ihe ike na-enweghị ịkatọ ndị a na'emegbu ndị chere na nhọrọ ndị ọzọ adịghị adị

Arụmụka ndị sochiri nzukọ ahụ, dugara na mkpebi na ịchụso pacifism, enweghị ike dochie anya nkwenye na ebumnuche ikpeazụ nke udo bụ ikwe ka ndị mmadụ nweta nwere onwe ha ma biri n'enweghị nsogbu ọ bụla
N'etiti ndị ọzọ
N'akụkụ WIL
N'afọ 1976, a họpụtara Ballantyne ka ọ duzie Nzukọ nke Òtù Ndị Na-abụghị nke gọọmentị (CONGO) nke UN ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche ya maka afọ isii sochirinụ
Dị ka onye nnọchi anya mbụ iji jide ọkwa ahụ site n'aka otu ndị na-eme udo, ọ meghere ọnụ ụzọ maka ịchụso ebumnuche nke iwepụ ngwá agha

Mgbe Nzukọ Ụwa gbasara ụmụ nwanyị, 1980 gasịrị, e mere na Copenhagen, Ballantyne jere ozi dị ka onyeisi nke mmepe mmemme maka nzukọ NGO Forum, na-ekwusi ike na nzukọ ndị ọzọ na-akwado udo na nzukọ ndị isi na nzukọ New York City, na-eme ngagharị iwe, na-akwado ndị ọzọ
Nkwado ndị ọzọ

Tinyere itinye aka ndị agha US na Contra War, Ballantyne duziri 'Nzukọ Mba Nile na Nicaragua na Udo na Central America' ya na Adolfo Pérez Esquivel na Lisbon na 1984 iji kwurịta agbụrụ na-arịwanye elu
O lekwasịrị anya n'ịgbaso atụmatụ abụọ ahụ iji nweta udo na ịkwado òtù ndị jụrụ ịnakwere atụmatụ ọdịnala ghọrọ ihe ndabere nke iwu WILPF iji nabata ụzọ abụọ iji kwado ọrụ udo
Ballantyne jere ozi ọzọ dị ka onyeisi oche maka kọmitii na-eme atụmatụ nke nzukọ NGO maka World Conference on Women, 1985 nke a ga-eme na Nairobi
E guzobere Ụlọikwuu Udo, echiche nke Ballantyne, na ahịhịa nke Mahadum Nairobi ma ghọọ ebe a na-elekwasị anya na nzukọ ahụ
N'ụlọikwuu ahụ, a na-eme nnọkọ kwa ụbọchị ebe ụmụ nwanyị na-atụle mmetụta agha na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
N'afọ 1992, Ballantyne ghọrọ onye isi ala mba ụwa nke WILPF ma jee ozi na ikike ahụ ruo afọ isii sochirinụ
N'afọ 1995, a kwanyeere ya ùgwù dị ka onye natara onyinye udo Gandhi
Edith Dankwa bụ onye ọchụnta ego, onye ndụmọdụ na onye isi oche nke Business na Financial Times Limited
A maara Edith maka ịnye ọrụ ndụmọdụ gbasara azụmaahịa ma jee ozi dị ka onye ntinye ahịa maka azụmaahịa na-achọ ịgbatị na iwesapu ọrụ ha na Africa
Ọ na-ejikwa Business Times Africa Magazine (BT), Energy Today Magazine (ET) na akwụkwọ akụkọ Business & Financial Times (B&FT) n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ ya, Business na Financial Times Limited
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Management Studies na Mahadum Cape Coast, wee chụsoo MBA Executive site na GIMPA Business School

O nwere Diploma Post Graduate na Marketing sitere na Chartered Institute of Marketing, Ghana na nzere Post Graduate na njikwa akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere na Inwent International Institute of Journalism, Germany
Edith bụkwa onye otu nke Institute of Certified Economist nke Ghana ma nwee akara mmụta doctoral na nchịkwa azụmahịa (International Business) na Mahadum Walden dị na USA
Dankwa jere ozi na bọọdụ nke ụlọọrụ gụnyere, TV3, International Chamber of Commerce (Ghana), Ghana News Agency na Unilever Ghana
Ọ bụkwa ya tọrọ ntọala nke Executive Women Network, onye isi oche nke African Business Leaders Foundation na onyeisi oche nke Institute for Development and Policy
Edith Eduviere (amụrụ na 18 June 1986) bụ nwanyị Naijirịa na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naijirịa na 2008 Summer Olympics
Edith Eluma (amụrụ na 27 Septemba afọ 1958) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu ụmụ nwanyi naijiria
O s o na ndị otu egwuregwu na 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuru Princess Jegede na Naijiria
Edith Struben (onye amụrụ Edith Frances Mary Struben) (1868 Pretoria - 21 Ọktoba 1936 Newlands, Cape Town) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise na ónyé na-ise ihe na South Africa
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị mbụ nke Harry Struben, ónyé ọsụ ụzọ na-egwupụta ọlaedo na Witwatersrand
N'afọ 1885, Fred na Harry Struben chọpụtara ọla edo na ugbo Wilgespruit (nke bụzi Kloofendal Nature Reserve) na Roodepoort
N'oge ahụ, Edith bụ ónyé tozuru oke dị afọ iri na isii ma na-elekọta Charles (9) na Enid (5) ebe ọ bụ na nne ha adịghị ike ma biri na Pietermaritzburg
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ nke obere ụlọ dị na Little Falls, sie nri màkà ụmụ okorobịa abụọ ahụ ma kụziere ha akwụkwọ n'ụlọ
Ọ chọpụtakwara oge ịkwa akwa na ite ágbá, na-egosi okooko osisi ọhịa ọ hụrụ, ọdịdị ala, na ogige ụlọikwuu dị nso na ọrụ igwu ala
Fred na Harry mechara ree ihe niile ha kwuru na ihe onwunwe ha niile wee laa ezumike nká na Cape Town
Harry wuru 'Strubenheim', nnukwu ụlọ nke na-eje ozi ugbu a na Ngalaba Egwú nke Mahadum Cape Town
Ezinụlọ ahụ gụrụ Rudyard Kipling na Cecil John Rhodes dị ka ezigbo ndị enyi
Edith gụrụ ezigbo nka na Paris, Rome na London, laghachi South Africa na 1901 ma na-egosipụta ihe osise mmiri ya mgbe niile
Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị otu izizi nke South African Society of Artists
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nkè Africana Museum na Johannesburg, Pretoria Art Museum na South African National Gallery na Cape Town
N'afọ 1920, ọ weghaara 'Luncarty', ụlọ Cape Peninsula dị na Upper Holly Street, Newlands, Cape Town na nso Kirstenbosch
Nké a bụ Francis Kaye Kendall ónyé bụ otu n'ime ndị mmekọ azụmahịa nke Herbert Baker, màkà Commander Sereld Hay nke Royal Naval Volunteer Reserve, South African Division
Ọ bụ ónyé nkwado siri ike nke Botanical Society nke South Africa, ịbụ osote ónyé isi oche n'oge ọnwụ ya na 1936
Mmetụta ya na nkume ubi na ụzọ nke Ịtali na Mediterenian dugara ya na itinye áká na atụmatụ na mmezu nke ụzọ nkume na Kirstenbosch
Mesembryanthemum strubeniae LBolus nkè a maara ugbu a dị ka Ruschia strubenia e Schwantes ka enyi ya Louisa Bolus kpọrọ áhà iji sọpụrụ Edith, dị ka Watsonia strubeniaE LBolos
Ụmụnne Edith bụ Arthur, Gertrude, Beatrice Mary, Fredrick, Robert, Charles, Enid (ubochí irí abụọ na ànó n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1879 Pretoria rụọ úbọchị irí n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1966 London)
Enid mechara lụọ Commander Dudley de Chair (1864-1958) na 1903 na Torwood nso Torquay, Devon
Edith H
Howse (19 Disemba 1883 - 1955) bụ onye otu ọrụ aka na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Britain
A mụrụ ya na Chorlton-upon-Medlock, nso Manchester, Howse malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka General Post Office na 1900 dị ka 'onye na-amụ ekwentị'
Ọ sonyeere Postal Telegraph Clerks' Association, na 1909 ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ union na-arụ ọrụ nwa oge
N'afọ 1916, ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi ụmụ nwanyị mbụ zuru oke nke njikọ ahụ

N'afọ 1920, otu ahụ ghọrọ akụkụ nke Union of Post Office Workers ọhụrụ, na Howse na-aga n'ihu dị ka onye nhazi ụmụ nwanyị, yana ịghọ osote odeakwụkwọ nke otu ahụ, na-ahụ maka ngalaba ekwentị na nkwukọrịta
N'ọrụ a, ọ gara ọtụtụ nzukọ mba na nke mba ụwa, na-ekwukarị banyere ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị
Howse lara ezumike nká na 1937, mana ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike, na-aghọ onye otu Labour Party nke kansụl Wembley, ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Wembley

Edith Louise Mary King (1afọ 871- rụọ afọ 962) bụ oónyéna-ese ihe na South Africa nnkéna-arụ ọrụ na mmmírína-acha odo odo, na-elekwasị anya na ọdịdị ala na ihe ndị ọzọ na-adịghị ndụ
N'ịbụ nkè a na-akọwa site na ọkwa dị elu nkè nkọwa botanical, ihe osise ya jikọtara atụmatụ dị elu na ihe ọ pụtara na ụdị enweghị ihe ọ bụla
King kwadoro onwé yá dị ka ónyé nkụzi nka na, mgbè e mesịrị, dị ka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Eunice School na Bloemfontein, South Africa
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká na nkuzi, King biri, mee njem, ma soro nwanne ya nwanyị see ihe, na-agba ndị enyi na ezinụlọ ume n'ọrụ nka ha yana ịhazi na isonye na ihe ngosi
E gosipụtara ise n'ime ihe osise ya n'afọ 1913 Armory Show
Kemgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1962, a na-egosipụta ọrụ King na Tatham Gallery na ihe ngosi Everard Phenomenon na South Africa
Ọrụ ya dịkwa na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè South African National Art Gallery na Pretoria Art Museum

Edith Mary Bataringaya née Kaijuka na afọ 1992, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda a ma ama na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ nke Uganda na-eme mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Ugandan Women's Union na Uganda Council of Women n'akụkụ Rhoda Kalema na Theresa Mbire
Ọ lụrụ Basil Kiiza Bataringaya onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda a ma ama na Uganda mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị
A mụrụ Edith Mary Kaijuka na afọ 1929 na Kabale, obodo dị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Uganda
Nna ya bụ Reverend Kaijuka, onye ụkọchukwu a ma ama na Chọọchị nke Uganda na onye nkuzi si n'obodo dị nso nke Bugongi Hill
Edith Mary Kaijuka lụrụ Basil Kiiza Bataringaya, nwa Marko Kiiza onye isi Ssaza nke Bunyaruguru, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Edith Mary Bataringaye
N'oge alụmdi na nwunye ha, Basil Kiiza Bataringaya nọ na-aga akwụkwọ, na Government Teacher Training College of Uganda (TTC) na Mahadum Makerere na Kampala, Uganda
Basil Kiiza Bataringaya ghọrọ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama na Uganda n'oge na-adịghị anya

Bataringaya gbara ọsọ dị ka onye otu Democratic Party nke Uganda maka oche omeiwu maka Ankole District na Kansụl Iwu nke Uganda na gọọmentị mgbanwe n'etiti oge ọchịchị Uganda Protectorate na Republic of Uganda na ntuli aka mbụ nke mba Uganda, ntuli aka nke March na afọ nke 1961
Ọ ghọrọ onye ndú nke ndị mmegide n'oge ọchịchị Apollo Milton Obote ma nyere aka guzobe ọrụ ahụ dị ka ihe na-achịkwa ndị ndu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Uganda

Basil Kiiza Bataringaya si na Democratic Party of Uganda gaa na Apollo Milton Obote's Uganda People's Congress party n'ala nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na mbido ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị elu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba Uganda

Basil Kiiza Bataringaya ghọrọ Minista dị ike nke Internal Affairs ma nweta ntụkwasị obi nke Praịm Minista Apollo Milton Obote ngwa ngwa, ma nweta ebe n'ime obere ndị ndụmọdụ a tụkwasịrị obi nke Obote ma nweta nnukwu akwụkwọ iwu dị ka otu n'ime ndị minista kachasị ike na gọọmentị Obote
Edith Mary Bataringaya ghọrọ onye nwere mmetụta na ọchịchị bu Mazi Apollo Milton Obote na-esote ọpụpụ Basil Kiiza Bataringaaya na ịrịgo n'ọkwa Minista nke Internal Affairs
Ọ na-agakarị di ya na njem mba ofesi na-anọchite anya Uganda, na-anọchi anya Uganda ma na-atụle ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi na onye guzobere Kansụl Ụmụ nwanyị nke Uganda na ndị nnọchi anya mba ofesi
Ọ gara United States of America ma zute ndị otu mba United States Department of State na mgbakwunye na ileta Disneyland
Edith Mary Bataringaya bụ onye a ma ama na-eme ihe na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ na-arụ dị ka di na nwunye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị elu
Bataringaya malitere Uganda Women's Union na Uganda Council of Women n'akụkụ Rhoda Kalema na Theresa Mbire

N'afọ 1960, n'okpuru nduzi nke Bataringaya, Kansụl Ụmụ nwanyị nke Uganda mere mkpebi na-agba ume na a ga-edekọ iwu gbasara alụmdi na nwunye, ịgba alụkwaghịm, na ihe nketa n'ụdị ederede ma kpọsaa ya na mba niile maka ịhazi omenala na omume ọgbara ọhụrụ
N'ime afọ iri mbụ nke nnwere onwe, kansụl a mekwara ka e mee mgbanwe iwu nke ga-enye ụmụ nwanyị niile ikike inwe ihe onwunwe ma nọgide na-elekọta ụmụ ha ma ọ bụrụ na alụmdi na nwunye ha agwụ

Ọrụ nke Kansụl Ụmụ nwanyị nke Uganda n'okpuru nduzi nke Bataringaya dugara na mgbanwe na Iwu Ịgba Ọgba Ọgba Agha nke Uganda, na-eduga na ederede ederede nke Iwu Ịgba Agha na-enye ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị ohere hà nhata maka ịgba alụkwaghịm
Di Edith Mary Bataringaya bụ Basil Kiiza Bataringaaya duziri mgbalị ijide Idi Amin, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị Uganda mbụ gọọmentị Idi Amin ọhụrụ jidere
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, a tara Bataringaya ahụhụ ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ na Makindye Prison
E zigara Bataringaya na mpụga obodo Mbarara, ebe e gburu ya na ndụ
A na-egosipụta isi ya e bepụrụ egbupụ n'elu osisi, ma na-agagharị gburugburu obodo Mbarara ruo mgbe e gosipụtara isi ya e gbupụrụ egbupụ na ogige ndị agha Mbarara
Edith Mary Bataringaya ghọrọ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na-azụlite ụmụ ya asatọ naanị ya n'ala Bataringaye na Mbarara, wee ghọọ onye a ma ama na-eyi egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide Idi Amin
E gburu Bataringaya n'onwe ya n'afọ 1977 n'oge Idi Amin mechara kpochapụ ya, nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ Juma Bashir, gọvanọ nke Western Province of Uganda
E mechara chọta ozu ya ọkụ n'ala dị na Mbarara nke ezinụlọ Bataringaya
Nke a mere ka ụmụ ya asatọ bụrụ ụmụ mgbei
Ọ bụ nwanne ya nwoke, Dr
Emmanuel Kaijuka zụlitere ha nille
Edith Mary na Basil Kiiza Bataringaya nwere ụmụ asatọ, Dr
Geoffrey Basil Bataringaye, Basil Batiringaya Jr, Grace Bataringay, Kenneth Bataringayo, Jackie Bataringaia, Janette Bataringayan, Juliet Wavamunno, na Dr
Aisha Bataringalalaya-Sseka
Ụmụaka ahụ ghọrọ ụmụ mgbei na afọ 1977 ka ndị nne na nna abụọ ahụ nwụrụ site n'aka ọchịchị Amin
Nwanne Edith Mary Bataringaya, Dr
Emmanuel Kaijuka onye mechara bụrụ Kọmishọna Ahụike nke Uganda, zụlitere ụmụaka ahụ kemgbe ha ka dị obere mgbe ha bụ ụmụ mgbe ha bụ ndị nne na nna ha gburu
N'afọ 1985, ụmụ asatọ ahụ a zutere na nke mbụ ya kemgbe e gburu nne ha n'obodo Muyenga, Uganda

Ụmụ ha niile gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma site na afọ 2003 Grace Bataringaya bụ dọkịta na-ahụ maka anụmanụ na onye njikwa ihe omume, Kenneth Bataringaye bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta ala ezinụlọ, Jackie Bataringay bụ dọkọ maka Action Aid na-arụkọ ọrụ na Harare, Zimbabwe, Janette Bataringayan na-arụarụ ọrụ na Public Health na Boston, Massachusetts na United States, Juliet Wavamunno (née Bataringaia) bụ dọkụ na-arụ maka World Health Organization, na Aisha Bataringayaa-Sseka (née Batingingaya na Mahadum nke Western Africa
Bataringaya bụ onye Katọlik ma tinye aka na Chọọchị Katọlik na Uganda n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nna Bataringaya bụ onye ụkọchukwu nke Chọọchị Uganda, a zụlitere Bataringay na Chọọchị nke Uganda
Di Bataringaya bụ onye nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik dị na Ankole, ma mesịa na-elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ Katólik niile dị na Ancole tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Edith Mary Bataringaya ghọrọ onye Katọlik mgbe ọ lụsịrị Basil Kiiza Bataringaaya ma soro ndị ozi Katọlik dị n'ógbè ahụ rụọ ọrụ n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, edepụtara ya dị ka enyi na onye mmekọ nke ozi Katọlic na Mbarara Region nke Uganda

Edith Chewanjel Masai (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1967) bụ onye Kenya bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge bụ onye ọkachamara na cross country na track races, mgbe ahụ, road races na njedebe ọrụ ya
Ọ nọchitere anya Kenya na 2004 Summer Olympics
Ihe kacha mma ọ rụzuru bụ ihe nrite ọla edo atọ n'otu n'otu na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi na IAAF World Cross Country Championships n'etiti afọ 2002 na afọ 2004
A makwaara ya maka iru n'elu ụwa mgbe ọ dị afọ 35
N'okporo ụzọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye nwetara ọla nchara karịa mita 5000 na ago 2003 World Championships in Athletics ma bụrụ onye mmeri Afrịka nke afọ 2006 karịa mita 10,000
O nwetakwala ihe nrite ọlaọcha karịa 10,000 m na afo 2007 All-Africa Games na 5000 m na afo 2002 Commonwealth Games
Ụzọ kachasị mma ya nke 8 2323 nkeji maka mita 3000, nke e debere na afọ 2002, ka bụ ihe ndekọ Afrịka maka ihe omume ahụ
N'ime ọsọ marathon, ọ gbara ọsọ kachasị mma nke 2 27 06 awa iji merie na afọ 2005 Hamburg Marathon
A mụrụ Masai n'obodo Chepkoya, Mount Elgon District
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ a mụrụ n'ezinụlọ nwere mmadụ anọ
Ọ gbara asọmpi n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe ọ nọ na Kibuk Secondary School
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1988
Ọ sonyeere Kenya Prisons Service na 1990, nke a maara maka iwebata ọtụtụ ndị na-eme egwuregwu nwere nkà
Otú ọ dị, Masai enwetaghị ihe ọ bụla ruo na afọ 1999, mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri mba na-agafe mba, mgbe ọ dị afọ 32
N'ihi ya, ọ malitere ọzụzụ siri ike karị
O meriri Lotto Cross Cup Brussels na 2001 wee gaa n'ihu were ọla nchara na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi na World Cross Country Championships n'afọ ahụ
Ọ meziwanyere nke a n'afọ sochirinụ, were ọla edo na afo 2002 IAAF World Cross Country Championships
Masai nwere ihe ndekọ Afrịka nke mita 3000 nke e debere na onwa Julai, na afọ 2002 na Monaco
O ritere ọla nchara na 2003 World Championships

N'afọ 2004, ọ dara na ule Kenya maka Olimpik, mana ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị Kenya atọ meriri oge Olympic 'A'- nke ruru eru na mita 5000 nke ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ ahụ, a na-enye ya ohere na otu ahụ
Masai n'onwe ya jụrụ onyinye ahụ na mbụ, mana ọ sonyeere ndị otu ahụ mgbe ogologo mkparịta ụka gasịrị
N'egwuregwu Olimpik, ọ kwụsịrị na-enwe mmerụ ahụ n'ọkpụkpụ ụkwụ
O mere marathon mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 38, mana o mere ihe ngosi mbụ nke obi ike, na-agba 2 27 06 iji merie 2005 Hamburg Marathon
Ọ bụ onye nke ise na ọsọ 10,000 mita na afọ 2005 World Championships na Helsinki, Finland
Oge ya, 30 3026 bụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Kenya
Linet Masai meriri ihe ndekọ ahụ na 2008 Olympics, onye gbara 30 2650
Masai anọwo na-agbanwe site na ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ gaa na marathon
O meriri Hamburg Marathon na 2005 ma sonye na ya na afọ 2006 na afọ 2007
N'afọ 2006, ọ meriri Berlin Half Marathon, setịpụ ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ nke ọkara marathon n'afọ ahụ, 1 07 16 nkeji
Ọ bụkwa ihe kachasị mma na ihe ndekọ
O setịpụkwara ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke mita 5000 nke Kenya nke nkeji 14 3384
O ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha 10,000 mita na afọ 2007 All-Africa Games
Oge ya, 31 3118 bụ ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị karịrị afọ 40
Nicole Lévêque nke France nwere ihe ndekọ gara aga, onye gbara 32 1207 na Helsinki na afọ 1994
Masai sonyere na afọ 2008 World championships marathon na Osaka, Japan, na-emecha nke 8 na asọmpi nke onye obodo ya Catherine Ndereba meriri
Masai meriri na afọ 2008 Virginia Beach Rock 'n' Roll Half Marathon
Ọ meriri Singapore Marathon na onwa Disemba, afọ 2008
Ya na onye nnọchi anya ya bụ Dorothee Paulmann kewara
na afọ 2007 wee rụọ ọrụ n'onwe ya
Ọ bi na Ngong na Kitale ugbu a
Ọ na-azụ ndị otu Kenya Prisons Cross Country
Ọ bụ nne gbara alụkwaghịm nke otu, nwa ya nwoke Paul Griffin Sakit amụrụ na afọ 1992 onye gbara ọsọ maka Mahadum Louisiana Tech
Masai lara ezumike nká na asọmpi na mbido afọ 2010 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere
Edith Zewelani Nawakwi (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na Zambia site n'ọrụ
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na Zambia iji jide ọkwa Minista na-ahụ maka ego mgbe a họpụtara ya na afo 1998 kemgbe Zambia nwere onwe ya afọ 33 gara aga
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa ahụ na mpaghara SADC
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Forum for Democracy and Development nke ọ gbara ọsọ maka onye isi ala na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016
A mụrụ Nawakwi na Mwenzo, Northern Province of Zambia

O nwere akara ugo mmụta na Agriculture Economics and Business Management site na Mahadum Zambia na diplọma na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Economics of Energy and Development site na Imperial College London, London
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya mere ka ọ sonye na Movement for Multi-Party Democracy (MMD) na afo 1990

O nwere ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche iche gụnyere Minista nke Steeti maka Ike na Mmepe Mmiri, Minista nke Ike na Mmepụta Mmiri, Mịnịsta nke Ọrụ Ugbo, Nri na Azụmaahịa, Mịnịstra nke Ego na Mịnịsta na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ na Nchebe Ọha n'etiti afọ 1992 na afo 2001

N'afọ 2001, ya na ụfọdụ ndị bụbu ndị otu Movement for Multi-Party Democracy guzobere Forum for Democracy and Development ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu na osote onye isi oche nke pati ahụ tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche na afo 2005, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na Zambia iji nweta ihe dị otú ahụ
N'afọ 2011, n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke Forum for Democracy and Development, ọ bụ naanị nwanyị sonyere na ntuli aka nke afọ 2011, na-etinye nke asaa na ndekọ na ngụkọta nke 6,833 vootu
O mekwara asọmpi na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2015, na-etinye nke atọ na pasentị votu nke 092%
N'afọ 2016, ọ gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa onye isi ala na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016 ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke atọ, na-enweta ngụkọta nke vootu 24,149
Ọ lụrụ Geofrey Hambulo onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ atọ
Na Jenụwarị na afo 2013, e gburu otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwanyị, Hatamba Hambulo
A chọtara ozu ya a tụfuru atụfu n'otu olulu dị na Ibex Hill na aka ya na ụkwụ ya agbụ
Edith Pikwa Boma (amụrụ na abalị atọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị ) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri Cameroon, onye bi na Houston, Texas, USA

A họpụtara ya dika onye na-eme ihe nkiri ' kacha mma/na ome ihe nkiri nwere ebimnoni -ihe nrite nke ụmụ amaala ndị nọ ná mba maka ihe nkiri akpọrọ , A Message to Brian, nke gosiputara ya, na 2014 Golden Icons Academy Movie Awards (GIAMA) Awards
Emere ihe nkiri a na Houston, Texas
Akpọrọ ya na fim aha ya bụ, Ndolor na Senator, nke malitere n'abalị iri atọ na otu nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 2016 na Houston, Texas
Ọ bụ onye na-eduzi ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Camerwood 2018, bụ Tenacity, na-egosikwa Libota McDonald, Mat Atugon, Vuga Samson na Eyo Eyo Michael
Edith T
Martin bụ onye America na-ese ihe na ónyé ọkachamara n'ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie
A mụrụ ya na Caroline County, Virginia
Ọ kwagara Washington DC
ebe ọ nwetara ákàrà ugo mmụta na Fine Arts na Mahadum America ma gaa Mahadum Georgetown
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe ngosi nka na Smithsonian American Art Museum na Renwick Gallery
Martin na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọbọdọ nka na Washington DC
ma na-akwado màkà ngosi nke ọrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị Africa America na-ese ihe karịsịa
Ọ nwèrè njikọ na DC Art Association, Smithsonian Institution Women's Council, National Conference of Artists, na Washington Women's Art Center
Ọ bụ ónyé otu Executive Board nke National Conference of Artists
Ọrụ Martin bi n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka na-adịgide adịgide na United States
Martin sonyere ma hazie ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, ọkachasị na Anacostia Neighborhood Museum, Smithsonian American Art Museum na Renwick Gallery

Edith Katiji, amara aha ya dị ka Edith WeUtonga, (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụo na abụo nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ1979) bụ onye Zimbabwe Afro-jazz na onye ǹkà egwu ọdịnala, onye egwu bass, onye na-ede abụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nkuzi egwu
A mụrụ ya na Kadoma, nke dị ihe dịka kilomita otu narị na iri isii na isii( mi otu narị na atọ), n'okporo ụzọ, southwest of Harare
Ebe ọ bụ onye Malawi ma tolite na Bulawayo ọ na-agú egwu n'asụsụ anọ dị iche iche ọkachasị Shona, Chichewa, Ndebele na Bekee
A na-akpọ ndị egwu ya Utonga nke pụtara chi ọbụbọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agụ bass ole na ole na Zimbabwe bụ onye na-edukwa ụda olu maka otu egwu
Edith na-akpọkwa ụbọ akwara, mbira na ịgbà

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gbasoro egwu na ụlọ akwụkwọ agha nke egwu na Brady Barracks, na obodo nke abụọ nke Zimbabwe Bulawayo, ebe ọ malitere dị ka onye na-abụ abụ na ndị agha Band wee gaa n'ihu Amakhosi a ma ama n'obodo ahụ
Township Square Cultural Center
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ sonyeere nkuzi okuku egwu nke ọnwa isii maka ụmụ nwanyị na-akụ egwu

Nke a mụtara otu egwu ụmụ nwanyị niile sitere na Amakhosi a na-akpọ Amakhosikazi ['Queens'!] ebe ọ malitere dị ka onye na-ede egwú na onye na-edu ụda olu maka ìgwè ahụ ma mesịa chọpụta mmasị ya maka guitar bass
Amakhosikazi kwụsịrị n'etiti afọ 2006
Ṅ'afọ 2008,Ya mere?! mere mgbanwe ụfọdụ mgbe ndị isi ole na ole hapụrụ maka ahịhịa ndụ ndụ ka ọnọdụ akụ na ụba na mba ahụ na-akawanye njọ
Nke ọhụrụ, mesịrị mebie ọdịdị nke Ya mere Gịnị?! nọgidere na-emezu nkwa egwu ha - ruo mgbe ihe mberede nke okporo ụzọ naegbù egbu o nwere
Katiji lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Zimbabwe Elton Mjanana, ha abụọ nwere ụmụ abụọ
N'afọ 2019 Edith gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Midlands State University (MSU) ma nweta ihe nzere nkwanye ugwu na azụmaahịa egwu, egwu egwu na teknọlọji
Onye isi oche nke otu jikọtara egwu na Zimbabwe (ZIMU), n'afọ 2021 Katiji ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ a họpụtara dị ka osote onye isi oche nke International Federation of Musicians (FIM) n'afọ 2021
Katiji nwere ihe mberede okporo ụzọ dị nso na-egbu egbu n'onwa Julaị nke afọ 2008 bụ ebe ọ nwetara nnukwu mmerụ ahụ n'isi na ihu ma nọrọ na coma ihe fọdụrụ obere ka ọ bụrụ izu ụka abụọ
Ihe mberede a mere ya n'ihu ya wee tufuo enyi ya nọ n'oche onye njem
N'oge mgbake ya, ọ chọpụtala ụda ọhụrụ n'ime onwe ya

O chere na ọkpụcha ya na ọnwụ, n'oge na-adịghị anya ka e mesịrị ọmụmụ nwa ya nwoke nke abụọ, nyere ya mmalite ọhụrụ na ndụ, na-akpọ ụda ọhụrụ 'Utonga, nke pụtara 'ututu' wee degharịa onwe ya na ìgwè ya dị ka Edith
WeUtonga 'Edith of Dawn
Edith bụkwa onye ome ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ nọ na Amakhosi o gosipụtara na mmepụta ihe dị ka Athol Fugard's Hello & Goodbye, Greek classic Lyssistrata, Raisedon Baya's Echi People
N'ebe Amakhosi nọ, o nwetara ọrụ ndị isi na Nanị Mana Ọnụ site na Wonder Guchu yana Silent Words nke Tawanda Kanegoni mere nke mere mpụta mbụ ya na Harare emume nka nke mba ofesi/mba ọzọ
(HIFA)
Ọ bụ Cont Mhlanga, onye guzobere Amakhosi bụ onye gosipụtara ya na obere ihuenyo site n'inye ya ọrụ dị ka Mai Shupi na ihe nkiri TV, Sinjalo
O nwetara ihe nrite maka arụmọrụ ya
Edith jikwa ihe nkiri ArtsLab na-eme ihe nkiri gagharịa na mpaghara na mpaghara akpọrọ Standing in Pairs nke emere na emume Grahamstown
Iwu Nhọrọ Kachasị Mma
A maara Brou maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye edemede dijitalụ, onye ọrụ na onye njikwa obodo
N'afọ 2009, ya na ndị enyi ya itoolu jikọtara NGO Akendewa, otu ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na-ahazi mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ọha na eze dị elu
N'afọ sochirinụ, n'oge nsogbu 2010-2011 nke Ivorian, Brou nyere aka ịhazi enyemaka enyemaka site na iji hashtags na ngwaọrụ dijitalụ ndị ọzọ
Na 2015, a kpọrọ ya aha ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Ivory Coast Bloggers Association
N'otu afọ ahụ, Jeune Afrique kpọrọ ya otu n'ime mmadụ 50 kacha nwee mmetụta na Ivory Coast
Edmond Kiraz, onye amụrụ Kirazian (25 Ọgọst 1923 - 11 Ọgọust 2020) bụ onye France-Armenia na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ese onyinyo

A mụrụ ya na Cairo nke sitere na Armenia, Kiraz malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa (na-enweghị ọzụzụ nka) na Egypt, tupu ọ kwaga Paris mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị
N'afọ 1950, o mepụtara ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Line
N'afọ 1959, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka magazin French Jours de France, onye isi ya, Marcel Dassault, mere ka ọ pụọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gaa na ihe osise na-atọ ọchị
Ka oge na-aga, Kiraz mepụtara ụdị ihe osise pụrụ iche na nke na-atọ ọchị nke na-anọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị ọ kpọrọ Les Parisiennes dị gịrịgịrị, nwere ogologo ụkwụ, obere ara, na ihu dị nro
Ihe osise ya na-abụkarị ọ bụghị naanị ihe ọchị kamakwa ọ dị ntakịrị njọ ma ọ bụ ihe na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ, ma kemgbe afọ 1970 ọ na-enye aka mgbe niile na magazin Playboy
Edmund Abaka bụ onye na-ese foto na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa na Mahadum Miami nke dị na Coral Gables, Florida
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Coast na Ghana ma nata nzere masta ya na Mahadim Guelph na Canada
Ọ natara nzere PhD ya na Mahadum York na 1998
Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta Fulbright
A mụrụ Daukoru na 13 Ọktoba 1943 na Bayelsa Steeti nwere mmanụ
O nwetara PhD na Geology na Imperial College, London
Shell International Petroleum Company were ya n'ọrụ site n'afọ 1970, ebe o si na Chief Geologist ruo General Manager of Exploration na Nigeria
N'afọ 1992, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwa nke Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation
N'afọ 2003, Daukoru ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala na mmanụ ala na ike, na Julaị afọ 2005, a họpụtara ya dịka Mịnịsta nke steeti maka ike na kabinet nke onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke OPEC na 1 Jenụwarị 2006 maka otu afọ
A họpụtara Daukoru ka ọ bụrụ Amayanabo, ma ọ bụ onye ọchịchị ọdịnala nke Alaeze Nembe na Bayelsa steeti, were aha Mingi XIII
Esemokwu dị n'etiti obodo Bassambiri na Ogbolomabiri nke alaeze Nembe ochie malitere ihe karịrị afọ 200
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, gọọmentị Bayelsa Steeti nwara ọzọ idozi nsogbu ndị a, na-akpọkọta Daukoru na Ralph Iwowari, Amanyanabo nke Nembe Bassambiri, na ndị isi ndị ọzọ iji chọta ngwọta
Mgbe nzukọ ahụ gasịrị, ndị eze abụọ ahụ kwuru na ha nwere nchekwube na enwere ike idozi ọdịiche dị n'etiti obodo abụọ ahụ na-ese okwu
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010, ndị ntorobịa bu ngwá agha n'ụgbọ mmiri na-agba ọsọ wakporo obí Daukoru bụ ndị kekọtara ndị nche, zuo uwe ọdịnala ma bibie obí eze ahụ
Àtụ Cabinet of President Olusegun Obasanjo 2003-2007

Edna Adan Ismail (Somali ama Adna AadanIsmaaciil) (amụrụ na 8 Septemba, na afọ 1937) bụ onye nọọsụ na-amụ nwa, onye na-eme ihe ike ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ nke Somaliland site na afo 2003 ruo na afọ 2006
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ahụike Ezinụlọ na Mmepe Ọha na Eze nke Somaliland
Ọ bụ onye nduzi na onye guzobere Edna Adan Maternity Hospital na Hargeisa na onye na-eme ihe ike na onye ọsụ ụzọ na ọgụ maka iwepụ akụkụ ahụ nwanyị
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Organization for Victims of Torture

Ọ lụrụ Mohamed Haji Ibrahim Egal onye bụ praịm minista nke steeti Somaliland ụbọchị ise tupu Trust Territory nke nnwere onwe Somalia na mgbe e mesịrị Somali Republic (1960-1960) na (1967-1969) na Onye isi ala Somaliland (19932002)
A mụrụ Edna Adan na Hargeisa, British Somaliland na 8 Septemba, na afọ 1937, nwa nwanyị nke dọkịta Somalia a ma ama
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ ise nne ya mụrụ, mana abụọ nwụrụ n'oge a na-amụ nwa
N'oge ahụ, ụmụ agbọghọ anaghị agụ akwụkwọ na Somaliland, mana nna ya goro onye nkuzi maka ụfọdụ ụmụ nwoke nọ n'ógbè ahụ ma ọ mụtara iso ha gụọ ma dee
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Djibouti ebe nwanne nne ya bụ onye nkuzi
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, a ga-egbu ya
Ọ bụ nne ya na nne nne ya haziri ya mgbe nna ya nọ na njem azụmahịa; mgbe ọ laghachiri, iwe were ya
N'ịchọ igbochi ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ ịnata otu mmerụ ahụ o mere, ọ zụrụ dị ka onye nọọsụ na onye na-amụ nwa na United Kingdom na Borough Polytechnic, ugbu a London South Bank University
O mechara lụọ Muhammad Haji Ibrahim Egal, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia nke a họpụtara dịka praịm minista Somalia n'afọ 1967
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ 'nwa agbọghọ Somalia mbụ' gụrụ akwụkwọ na Britain, onye nọọsụ mbụ ruru eru na Somaliland na nwanyị Somalia mbụ na-akwọ ụgbọala
N'afọ 1980, Edna Adan malitere iwu ụlọ ọgwụ n'isi obodo Somaliland bụ Hargeisa, mana a manyere ya ịhapụ mba ahụ n'ihi mmalite nke Agha Obodo Somalia n'afọ 1981
Ọ laghachiri Somaliland wee wuo ụlọ ọgwụ na-amụ nwa, nke ọ na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ
Edna Adan Maternity Hospital meghere na 9 Machị na afọ 2002, n'ala gọọmentị mpaghara nyere ya na saịtị a na-ejibu dị ka ihe mkpofu

Mpaghara ahụ enweghị ndị nọọsụ a zụrụ azụ iji rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ha gbapụrụ na mba ahụ ma ọ bụ nwụọ n'oge agha obodo ahụ, ya mere Edna kpọtara ihe karịrị mmadụ iri atọ ma malite ịzụ ha n'afọ 2000 mgbe ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ ka na-ewu
Ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ nwere ebe abụọ a na-awa ahụ ugbu a, ụlọ nyocha, ọbá akwụkwọ, ụlọ ọrụ kọmputa na ngalaba zuru ezu a raara nye ọzụzụ ndị nọọsụ na ndị na-amụ nwa
As of 2018[update], ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ nwere ndị ọrụ 200 na ụmụ akwụkwọ 1500
Ebumnauche nke Ụlọ Ọgwụ Edna Adan bụ inyere aka melite ahụike nke ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ, ọkachasị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ọnwụ nne na nwa ọhụrụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ọrụ ebere na-enweghị uru na ụlọ ọgwụ nkuzi nke na-amụ nwa nke na-emekwa ọzụzụ nke ndị nọọsụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị na-enyere ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ nyocha aka
Ọrụ Edna Adan na-akwado ọrụ ebere na United Kingdom na United States nke na-enyere ya aka ịkwalite nkwado na mmata iji zụọ ndị na-amụ nwa ndị ọzọ ma lụso FGM ọgụ na Somaliland

Edna Adan Ismail bụ naanị nwanyị minista na gọọmentị Somaliland ruo n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2006, mgbe onye bụbu Minista nke Ozi na National Guidance Abdillahi Mohamed Dualeh nọchiri ya dị ka Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya na gọọmentị, ọ na-aga n'ihu ịbụ olu maka ọchịchọ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke ndị Somaliland
N'ọnwa Maachị, afọ 2022, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Unrepresented Nations and Peoples Organization
Edna Adan Ismail bụ onye natara onyinye AMANITARE 2002 ihe nrite maka mbọ ọ na-agba imeghe ụlọ ọgwụ na Somaliland n'afọ 1998
N'ịghọta onyinye ndụ ya niile na ọrụ enyemaka, agbakwunyere aha Edna Adan Ismail na Medical Mission Hall of Fame, Mahadum Toledo, Ohio, na Maachị, na afọ 2007
O nwere nzere Doctoral Honorary na Mahadum Clark na Massachusetts
E mere ya onye Honorary Fellow nke Mahadum Cardiff na Wales na afọ 2008
N'afọ 2018, Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists nyere ya Honorary Fellowship
N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara Edna Adan na ihe ngosi Half the Sky Turning Oppression into Opportunity for Women Worldwide, nke malitere na PBS 1 na 2 Ọktoba
Usoro ahụ na-ewebata ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ na-ebi n'ọnọdụ siri ike ma jiri obi ike lụọ ọgụ iji maa ha aka
Ọ bụ Show of Force na Fugitive Films mepụtara usoro Half the Sky PBS TV
Kate Grant, onye isi oche nke Fistula Foundation, akpọwo ya 'The Muslim Mother Teresa'
N'afọ 2018, e nyere ya nzere doctorate nke London South Bank University
Edna Ngeringwony Kiplagat (amụrụ na 15 na onwa Septemba na afọ 1979) bụ onye Kenya ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ụwa nke IAAF na afọ 2011 na 2013 na marathon
O guzobere onwe ya dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ marathon nke nwere mmeri na Los Angeles na New York City Marathons na afọ 2010
Ihe kacha mma ya maka ebe ahụ bụ awa 2 19 50, nke e debere na London Marathon na afo 2012
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 37, Kiplagat meriri na afọ 2017 Boston Marathon n'ime oge nke 2 21 52 awa, wee merie nrite ọlaọcha marathon na IAAF World Championships na London
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 39, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na afọ 2019 Boston Marathon na nke anọ na World Athletics Marathon World Championship
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 41, ọ meriri n'ọsọ ụzọ Bix 7 nke afọ 2021, Falmouth Road Race, ma bụrụkwa onye nke abụọ ọzọ na Boston Marathon
Na mita 3000, Kiplagat ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na afọ1996 World Junior Championships na ọla nchara na afọ 1998 World Junior Champions Championships
Ọ mechara nke iri na atọ na ogologo ọsọ na afọ 2006 World Cross Country Championships
N'otu oge ahụ, o dekọrọ ihe kachasị mma na mita 5000, na nkeji 15 573 na July na Nairobi, na ọkara marathon, na awa 1 09 32 na October na San Jose
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2007, ọ gbara ọsọ 10,000 mita na 33 270 nkeji na Nairobi
O meriri na afọ 2006 Virginia Beach Rock 'n' Roll Half Marathon, afo 2007 Lilac Bloomsday Run na 2007 Bay na ndị mgbaji (San Francisco)
Kiplagat mechara nke abụọ n'azụ Emily Chebet na afọ 2010 Freihofer's Run for Women, na-agba ọsọ oge nke 15 20 ma merie $ 5000 na usoro ahụ

O jisiri ike bụrụ onye nke atọ na asọmpi Beach to Beacon n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010, ma mechaa otu ihe ahụ na Falmouth Road Race izu abụọ ka e mesịrị (na-agwụcha Lineth Chepkurui na Wude Ayalew na asọmpi abụọ ahụ)
Kiplagat meriri Los Angeles Marathon na afọ 2010, naanị marathon nke abụọ ya, wee gaa n'ihu merie n'afọ 2010 New York City Marathon
O meriri ndị mbido marathon abụọ, Shalane Flanagan nke United States na Mary Keitany nke Kenya, bụ ndị nke abụọ na nke atọ, n'otu n'otu
Ọ gbara ọsọ kachasị mma nke 1 09 00 na New York City Half Marathon, na-agwụcha dị ka onye nke abụọ n'azụ Caroline Rotich
Ọ meriri Keitany ọzọ na afọ 2011 London Marathon, mana onye na-asọmpi ya n'ụlọ meriri ya
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, Kiplagat nwere obi ụtọ na arụmọrụ nke atọ ya dịka oge ya nke 2 20 46 gosipụtara ihe kachasị mma, na-emeziwanye oge mbụ ya site na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nkeji ise
Kiplagat bụ onye kachasị amasị maka asọmpi afọ 2011 World Championships Marathon ma nyefee ya n'ụdị ya, na-ewere aha ụmụ nwanyị n'ime oge nke 2 28 43 awa
Mmeri ya adịghị ka o doro anya mgbe ọ dara na kilomita 5 ikpeazụ, mana onye otu ya na onye nke atọ Sharon Cherop kwụsịrị n'etiti ọsọ iji nyere Kiplagat aka iguzo ọtọ
Kiplagat, Cherop na Priscah Jeptoo mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe nrite maka Kenya na oge mbụ mba ọ bụla nwetara ihe nrite atọ ahụ na asọmpi marathon zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ọ banyere na Montferland Run na obere mmerụ ahụ wee mechie dị ka onye nke abụọ na Abebech Afework
Ọ malitere na afọ 2012 na ahịhịa wee bịa nke atọ na Kenyan Cross Country Championships
Nke a bụ nkwadebe ya maka 2012 London Marathon, ebe ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ na-agba ọsọ iji maa onye mmeri Mary Keitany aka ma mechie ọsọ ahụ dị ka onye nke abụọ na elekere 2 19 50
A họpụtara Kiplagat maka ndị otu egwuregwu Olympic nke Kenya n'ihi ya
Ọ bụ onye mmeri dị mma nke New York Mini 10K na June
Na afọ 2012 London Olympics ọ nwetaghị ihe ịga nke ọma ya na isi obodo Britain ma mee naanị nke iri abụọ na Olympic marathon na oge nke 2 27 52 awa
Izu isii ka e mesịrị, ọ gbara ọsọ na Great North Run ma nwee arụmọrụ ka mma, na-etinye ihe kachasị mma nke 1 07 41 awa mgbe ọ na-emecha onye nke abụọ na Tirunesh Dibaba
Kiplagat mechara bụrụ onye nke abụọ na London Marathon maka afọ nke abụọ n'usoro, n'oge a n'azụ Priscah Jeptoo

Ka e mesịrị na afọ 2013 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ nọgidere na-enwe aha ụwa marathon mgbe ọ nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo mbụ n'ụbọchị mmeghe nke World Athletics Championships, na-emeri n'ihu Valeria Straneo na Kayoko Fukushi n'ime oge nke 2 25 44 awa

Mgbe ọ gwụchara n'elu ikpo okwu na nke ọ bụla n'ime mbipụta atọ gara aga, Kiplagat mechara kwuo mmeri na London Marathon n'ihu onye obodo ya (enweghị njikọ) Florence Kiplagat n'ime oge nke 2 20 21 awa
Kiplagat mechiri 2014 na 2 36 24 njedebe (13th ebe) na 2014 New York City Marathon
Kiplagat laghachiri na afọ 2015 London Marathon na oge nke 2 27 16 awa (ebe nke iri na otu)
O mechara bụrụ onye nke ise na 2015 IAAF World Championships na Beijing na oge nke 2 28 15 awa
Na afọ 2016 Kiplagat laghachi na otu n'ime ndị atọ karịsịa nke nnukwu agbụrụ na oge njedebe ngwa ngwa karịa naanị otu afọ tupu
Ọ gwụchara na 2 22 36 awa maka ọnọdụ nke atọ na 2016 Tokyo Marathon, na 2 23 28 awa maka ọnọdụ ya nke abụọ na 2016 Chicago Marathon
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 37, Kiplagat meriri na 2017 Boston Marathon na oge nke 2 21 52 awa
Mmeri a bụ nke mbụ ya na Boston Marathon mgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri nke ịgba ọsọ pụrụ iche gasịrị
'Emere m ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe niile n'egwuregwu anyị, mana ọ bụ otu n'ime nrọ m ịgba ọsọ Boston, marathon kachasị ochie n'ụwa, 'ka Kiplagat kwuru
'Ọ ga-apụta na m agbaala ise n'ime isii Abbott World Marathon Majors na mgbakwunye na egwuregwu Olympic na World Championships
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ Kiplagat sonyere na 2017 World Championships in Athletics nke e mere na London
O meriri nrite ọlaọcha na Women's Marathon, n'oge nke 2 27 18
Rose Chelimo bu ya ụzọ
Kiplagat bụ nwanyị uwe ojii na Iten, Kenya
'Abụ m otu n'ime ihe nlereanya n'obodo m na mba m,' ka Kiplagat na-ekwu
'Enwere m ntụziaka ụmụ agbọghọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma enye ụmụ nwanyị ike ịmepụta òtù obodo
Ana m akwado ụmụaka na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma iji kwụọ ụgwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ha
Kiplagat na di ya nwere ụmụ ise, abụọ n'ime ha bụ nke nwanne ya nwanyị nke nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa ara n'afọ 2003, na otu onye onye agbata obi nke nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-amụ nwa n'afọ 2013
Ụmụ ya Wendy, 9, na Carlos, 13, nọ na njedebe na emume mmeri maka mmeri ya na 121st kwa afọ Boston Marathon
Ọ malitere Edna Kiplagat Foundation iji mee ka a mara banyere ọrịa kansa ara
Kiplagat na-enyekwa onwe ya n'afọ ofufo iji mee ka a mara maka njikwa ihe mkpofu maka idebe gburugburu ebe obibi dị ọcha
Bomo Edith Edna Molewa (23 Machị 1957 22 Septemba 2018) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu African National Congress
Molewa ghọrọ Minista nke Mmiri na Mmekọrịta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi nke South Africa n'ụbọchị 31 Ọktoba 2010, dị ka akụkụ nke mgbanwe nke onye isi ala Jacob Zuma
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2014, e kewara ozi ya ma họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ nọchiri Buyelwa Sonjica
Tupu ọnwụ ya, Molewa na-amụ maka Bachelor's of Arts Honours na Developmental Studies site na Mahadum nke South Africa
Molewa sonyere n'òtù nnwere onwe South Africa site n'afọ 1976 ruo afọ 1990
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu dị iche iche na-eme ihe ike na ụlọ ọrụ mmepe akụ na ụba mpaghara
Malite n'afọ 1984 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke South African Commercial, Catering and Allied Workers Union ma mesịa bụrụ osote onye isi oche ya

N'afọ 1994, Molewa ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ, n'afọ 1996 ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Executive Council on Tourism, Environment and Conservation
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Executive Council on Economic Development and Tourism site n'afọ 1998 ruo afọ 2000
N'agbata afọ 2000 na afọ 2004, Molewa bụ onye otu Executive Council on Agriculture, Conservation and Environment Affairs

N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2004, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi ala nke North West Provincial Government, ọfịs ọ nọ na ya ruo n'afọ 2009, a na-ekwukwa na ọ bụ ya mere ka mpaghara ahụ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma

N'oge dị mkpirikpi, a họpụtara Molewa ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmepe ọha na eze, mana n'afọ 2010 ọ ghọrọ Mịnịsta Na-ahụ Maka Mmiri na Mmekọrịta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi mgbe mgbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ, na-anọchi Buyelwa Sonjica
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, ngalaba ahụ kewara ma Molewa ghọrọ minista nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi ọhụrụ, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Septemba afọ 2018

Otu Edo Steeti Task Force nke Megidere Itụ Mgbere mmadu bụ Against Human Trafficking (ETAHT) bụ ndị ọrụ Naijiria nke gọọmentị Edo steeti hibere iji gboo itu mgbere mmadụ na steeti ahu ya na ịkwaga mba ozo ya na mkparị na-abịa na ya
Steeti Task Force nke megidere ịtụ mgbere mmadụ na-aru ọrụ ugbu a n'ọtụtụ steeti ndịda dịka Ondo, Delta, Oyo, Lagos, Enugu, Ekiti State, wdg
Prof
Yinka Omorogbe bụ Attorney-General na kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi, Edo Steeti, bụkwa onye isi oche ndị ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2017, Maazị Godwin Obaseki hibere ndị ọrụ steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka igbochi ịtụ mgbere mmadụ
Ndị otu a bụ ndị ọrụ nchekwa n'ụlọ gọọmentị dị na Benin City, isi obodo steeti ahụ
Ekwuru na Edo Task Force nke megidere itu mgbere mmadu akporo Human Trafficking n'olu bekee natara ihe dị ka ndị 5,619 si na mba Libya lọta na mba Europe site na 2017 ruo taa
Ndị ọrụ ahụ bụ ndị nnọchi anya sitere na ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa, NGO, NAPTIP MDAS, ụlọ ọrụ okpukperechi na ọdịnala
Iji kwụsị ịtụ mgbere mmadụ na ịkwaga oge niile (ịgba ohu nke oge a), yana enyemaka, weghachite ndị lọghachiri n'ime ọha mmadụ
Ndị Edo ma ọ bụ ndị Benin bụ agbụrụ Edoid nke a na-ahụkarị na mbà Edo, Southern akụkụ nke Nigeria
Ha na-asụ asụsụ Edo ma bụrụ ụmụ nke ndị guzobere Alaeze Ukwu Benin
Ha nwere njikọ chiri anya na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ na-asụ asụsụ Edoid, dị ka Esan, Afemai, Isoko, na ndi Urhobo
Aha 'Benin' (na 'Bini') bụ nrụrụ aka Portuguese, n'ikpeazụ site na okwu 'Ubini', nke malitere iji n'oge ọchịchị Oba (onye ọchịchị) Ewuare the Great, c
'Ubini', okwu Edo oge ochie nke pụtara ndị mara mma, ejiri ya kọwaa ebe nchịkwa eze ma ọ bụ obodo ma ọ bụ isi obodo nke alaeze ahụ, Edo
Ubini mechara merụọ Bini site n'agbụrụ ndị dị n'etiti; ma merụọ Benin n'ihe dị ka 1485 mgbe ndị Portugal malitere mmekọrịta azụmahịa na Oba Ewuare na-enye ha beads coral
Enwere ike ịchọta ndị Edo na steeti Edo nke Naịjirịa nke nwetara aha ya site na ndị isi bi na mpaghara akụkọ ihe mere eme kachasị ama, obodo Benin nke bụkwa isi obodo etiti nke ndị Edo
Ndị Edo nwekwara ọtụtụ ìgwè ndị yiri ha na gburugburu ha nke ókèala ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nchịkwa nke steeti Edo
Ọtụtụ n'ime ìgwè ndị a achọpụtala akụkọ ihe mere eme ha laghachi azụ n'etiti obodo akụkọ ihe mere mere eme nke ndị Benin, ọbọdọ Benin
Ihe atụ nke ìgwè ndị dị otú ahụ dị nso gụnyere ụdị Afemai dị iche iche, ndị Esan nke steeti Edo na ndị Akoko Edo dị na ókèala ugwu nke steeti ahụ
Steeti Edo bụbu akụkụ nke steeti Bendel ochie nke Naijiria, nke a makwaara dị ka Mid-Western Region, Naijiria
Mmetụta na ọdịbendị nke mpaghara a na-egosipụta nke Edo, Urhobo, Esan na ndị ọzọ metụtara Edo
Ndị Edo nwere otu n'ime omenala ejiji pụrụ iche na kọntinent Afrịka
Ihe ejiji ha na-agụnye beads na-acha ọbara ọbara, aka, nkwonkwo ụkwụ, ọrụ raffia na ihe ndị ọzọ
N'okpukpe ọdịnala nke Edo, e nwere, ma e wezụga ụwa mmadụ, ụwa a na-adịghị ahụ anya nke ihe karịrị nke mmadụ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-arịọchitere ụwa mmadụ
A na-enye ha onyinye n'ebe nsọ ha
Osanobua bụ onye okike na Chineke Kasị Elu
Nwa ya nwoke / nwa ya nwanyị Olokun bụ onye na-achị mmiri niile ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ọganihu na ọmụmụ nke ndị na-eso ụzọ ya
Nwa nwoke ọzọ bụ Ogun, bụ chi na-elekọta ndị ọrụ ígwè
Osanobua Noghodua pụtara Chineke Pụrụ Ime Ihe Niile
Okwu Osanobua na-agụnye ọtụtụ ụkpụrụ Chineke - gụnyere ọnọdụ Chineke nke ịbụ onye ebere, enweghị oge, ịdị mma, ikpe ziri ezi, ịdị elu, na nke kachasị elu
N'ime usoro nkwenkwe Edo, Osanobua nwere àgwà chi nke omnipresence (orhiole), omniscience (ajoana), na omnipotence (udazi)
E kwenyere na Chi Kasị Elu nọ ebe niile na oge niile
Ihe osise ọdịnala Edo nwere ihe a tụrụ atụ, ihe nchara na ihe nkpuchi ndị a na-ahụkarị nke na-egosipụta akụkụ dị iche iche nke ime mmụọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọdịnala ọdịbendị ha

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise Edo a ma ama gụnyere ihe nkpuchi nke Eze nwanyị Idia na nnukwu nchịkọta nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Edo a na-akpọ Benin Ọla nke a pụrụ ịchọta ọ bụghị naanị na Naịjirịa kamakwa gbasaa gburugburu ụwa
