Ejije Omenaala ndị igbo gunyere, obere uwe dị ka ihe eji eji ejiji karia ikpuchi ọtọ, mana ndi okenye na-eyichi onwe ha;)

Ụmụaka na- agbakarị ọtọ bido mgbe a mụrụ ha ruo mgbe ha toro (oge a na-ewere ha na ha nwere ihe ha na-ezo ezo ) mana mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-eyi ihe ịchọ mma dịka biidi n'úkwù maka ọgwụ ahụ isi ika iji uli wee see akara di iche iche n'ahụ

Ọbịbia ndị ọcha na okpekpe ụka agbanwela ejiji omenaala anyị, Anyị na- ejizi uwe ụkwụ (trousers na shirts)Site na colonialism na Westernization nke omenala ndị Igbo, uwe ndị a na-eji ejiji nke Western dị ka uwe na uwe akwa na-ewere uwe ọdịnala
Ụmụnwaanyị na- eji akwa ekechiri n'obi akwọ nwa ha n'azụ
Ụzọ ịkwọ nwa n' azụ a ka dịkwa ire n'etiti ndị igbo nakwa mba afrika ndi ọzọ
A gbanweela otu esi akwọ nwa ugbu a dika nke ndị oyibo kpọrọ 'Child carrier'
Mgbe ụfọdụ ụmụ nwaanyị igbo anaghị ekouchi obi ha
Ụmụagbọghọ na- amakarị obere akwa ma were biidi yiri n'ukwu ha, ha na-ejikwa ọla olu nakwa biidi achọ mma
Ma nwoke na nwaanyị na-ama akwa
ejiji omenala igbo
ụmụnwayni jiri ejije igbo
ejiji Igbo
Ụmụ nwoke na-eyi ákwà Isi Ọdụm (Leopard Agụ) nke ha na-awa n'ukwu si na ngada wafee ya n' azụ wee kee ya n'azụ, nke a na-enyere aka maka oke ekpomọkụ nakwa maka ọrụ ugbo
Ụmụ nwoke nwekwara ike kee ihe na'elu akwa isi ọdụm a
Ejiji omenala Igbo ,nke ugbu a metụtara efe ụmụnwoke bụ efe isiagụ bụ nke ana- akwa ka Dashiki ndị Africa
Isiagụ (Ishiagụ) bụ ụdi akwa akpara isiagụ n'ahụ ya niile, Ọ na-achakarị oji, a na-ejikari uwe ụkwụ tụraọza na okpu echichi eyi ya mgbe ụfọdụ
(a fez aha ya bụ okpu agu ma ọ bụ agwu), maọbụ okpu ọdinaala (nke yiri Bobble hat )
Maka ụmụ nwaanyị, ejiji nke ha gunyere uwe obi akpara ihe nke nwere aka kpọfụ (nke ọbiaaia ndị ọcha Europe wetara) ma tinyere ukwu akwa abụọ(nke akpọrọ Hollandis) nakwa ịchafụ isi
Ejike Asiegbu // (na-ege ntị) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke otu omee ihenkiri ndị na-eme egwuregwu nke Naijiria
A họpụtakwara ya n'oge gara aga dị ka onye na-enyere onye isi Biafra Odumegwu Ojukwu aka n'oge ahu, n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'anọ1(994) Ọgbakọ Mba Ome iwu na Abuja
Ejike Asiegbu gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ Constitution Crescent praimarị na Aba, Abia Steeti, Nigeria, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke St
Maryńs dị na Lokoja, Kogi Steeti

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị, Ejike Asiegbu gara Abdul Azeez Attah Memorial College, Okene na Kogi Steeti, Nigeria, mana ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Christ the King College (CKC) na Onitsha, Anambra Steeti, Naijiria n'afọ otu puku, nari iri iteolu na iri asatọ (1980)

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, Ejike Asiegbu gara Mahadum Port Harcourt na Rivers Steeti, Naijiria wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na Theatre Arts n'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri iteolu n'iteolu (1993)

Ejike Asiegbu sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria (Nollywood) n'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri iteolu n'isii (1996) wee mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ 'Sylent Night' ihe nkiri nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama
Ọ na-emekarị ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ya na Pete Edochie, Clem Ohameze, Kanayo O Kanayo na Kenneth Okonkwo
Ejike Asiegbu meriri ọtụtụ onyinye nke gụnyere; *Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'afọ na Afrika Magic Viewers Choice Awards,
Ejike lụrụ Ogechi Asiegbu, ma nwee ụmụ anọ, gụnyere Etochi Ejike Asiegbu
Ejike Ebenezer Obumneme Aghanya (27 Nọvemba 1932 - 3 Julaị 2020) bụ onye agha na onye injinia eletrik nke jere ozi na ndị agha Naịjirịa na ndị agha Biafran, na-ala ezumike nká dị ka onye colonel

A na-ebo ya ebubo itinye aka na nnupụisi ọchịchị Naijiria nke afọ 1966, e jidere ya ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ n'ebughị ụzọ kpee ya ikpe ruo mgbe Agha Obodo Naijiria malitere ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Biafra, na-enwe ọkwá dị mkpa na ndị agha Biafra

Ọ bụ onye isi nke Biafran Agency for Research and Production (RAP) nke mepụtara bọmbụ, rọket, mgbọ ogbunigwe (nke a na-akpọ Ogbunigwe), yana mgbọ, ụgbọala ndị agha, ngwaọrụ nkwukọrịta na mmanụ ala n'etiti ndị ọzọ maka ndị agha Biafran
O mechara bụrụ onye isi ndị ọrụ nke Biafran Organisation of Freedom Fighters (BOFF) nke bụ agha ndị agha na ọrụ pụrụ iche nke Biafran Armed Forces

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Battalion Commander, 44th Electrical and Mechanical Engineer Battalion Biafran Army na mgbe e mesịrị Brigade Commander nke 58th Brigade nke 12th Infantry Division Biafran Army n'oge agha ahụ
Aghanya gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịm St Cyprian Port Harcourt mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara Okrika Grammar School Okrika, Nigeria na-agụsị akwụkwọ na 1953
Degree mbụ ya bụ na injinia eletrik na Yaba College of Technology n' afo 1957
Ọ gara maka agụmakwụkwọ postgraduate na London Polytechnic, mgbe e mesịrị ọ gafere na Southampton College of Technology,na-agụsị akwụkwọ na injinia eletrik na eletrọniki na 1960
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere Ngalaba Mgbasa Ozi Naịjirịa ebe ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Nigerian Broadcasting Service Staff Union
N'afọ 1962, e zigara Aghanya na ndị agha Naịjirịa

Ọ natara ọzụzụ ndị agha na Nigerian Military Training College (NMTC) Kaduna ma gaa n'ihu na-aga ọmụmụ ndị isi na ọzụzụ pụrụ iche na School of Royal Electrical and Mechanical Engineers (REME) n'okpuru Major General Denis Redman na Arborfield Garrison, United Kingdom site na 1962-1963
E nyere ya ọrụ n'ime ndị agha Naijiria n'ọnwa Machị mkpụrụ ụbọchị abụọ n'afọ 1963 na nọmba ọrụ N / 349 na ọkwa nke onyeisi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Commanding Officer Nigerian Army Electrical and Mechanical Engineers (NAEME) Kaduna site na 1963-1964

na 1964 a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ Major ma jee ozi dị ka Commander Officer Nigerian army Electrical andMechanical Engineer (NAEM E) Army Headquarters Lagos na-aghọ onye Naijiria mbụ ijide iwu ahụ, na-anọchi onye isi ndị Britain ikpeazụ Major Whittle

Mgbe nnupụisi ọchịchị nke Naijiria na 1966 gasịrị, e jidere Aghanya na 18 Jenụwarị 1966 ya na Lieutenant Colonel Victor Banjo na-ebo ebubo na ha na-akpa nkata igbu onye isi ndị agha nke steeti Major General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi
E jidere Aghanya n'ebughị ụzọ kpee ya ikpe n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Kirikiri Maximum Security Prison ya na ndị ọzọ a na-ekwu na ha na-etinye aka na nnupụisi ọchịchị
E mechara kpọga ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Enugu ma mesịa kpọga ya Abakaliki
N'ileghachi anya azụ, ndị na-etinye aka na atụmatụ na mmezu nke nnupụisi ahụ dịka Major Adewale Ademoyega gbara akaebe na aka Aghanya na Banjo enweghị ihe ọ bụla n'ihe ncheta ha

Mgbe nnupụisi nke Naijiria nke 1966 nke e gburu Aguyi Ironsi, a tọhapụrụ Aghanya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na Machị 1967 na iwu nke gọvanọ nke mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ n'oge ahụ, Colonel (mgbe e mesịrị General) Odumegwu Ojukwu, na-emebi iwu nke onye isi ala ọhụrụ Colonel (mgbasa General) Yakubu Gowon
Na nzaghachi, Gowon kwupụtara ntọhapụ nke Aghanya na ndị ọzọ mgbe eziokwu ahụ gasịrị

Mgbe agha malitere na Julaị n'afọ 1967 nke gosipụtara mmalite nke agha Biafran nke Naijiria, e nyere Aghanya ọrụ n'ime ndị agha Biafran na ọkwa nke Colonel ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi nchịkwa nke 44th Electrical and Mechanical Engineer Battalion Biafran Army site n'aka onye isi ndị agha Biafra, Brigadier Hillary Njoku
Izu ole na ole n'ime esemokwu ahụ, General Ojukwu họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Biafran Agency for Research and Production (RAP)
N'ọnọdụ a, Aghanya bụ, onye na-ahụ maka ịhazi ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị Biafra, ndị injinia na akụrụngwa na mgbalị a na-eme iji kwalite mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ nke ihe agha dị mkpa maka gọọmentị Biafra
N'okpuru idu ndú ya, e guzobere ìgwè ọrụ sayensị dị iche iche iji nweta ebum, n'uche ụfọdụ
Ihe ndị a na-ebute ụzọ bụ ngwá agha, mgbọ na mmanụ
Iji mezuo nke a, o guzobere ma lekọta n'etiti ndị ọzọ

N'okpuru iwu ya nke RAP, usoro ngwá agha Biafran Ogbunigwe a ma ama nke gụnyere ogbunigwe na-agbawa agbawa, ngwaọrụ na-agbasa agbawa, na mgbọ ogbunigwe a na-ebugharị na-emepụta ma mepụta ya site na Republic of Biafra
Dị ka gọọmentị Biafra na-ekwu n'oge ahụ, RAP mepụtara mgbọ ogbunigwe (Piom-Piom) bụ rọket mbụ a ga-emepụta kpamkpam, mepụta, mepụta ma bido ya n'Africa
Aghanya bụ onye na-ahụ maka ilekọta ìgwè sayensị dị iche iche o guzobere, na-enweta ma na-enye ihe ndị dị mkpa maka mmepụta yana nkesa ngwaahịa ndị a rụchara arụcha nye ndị agha
Ọ nọgidere na-ahụ maka ịnwale prototypes, yana ịzụ ndị agha n'iji ngwá agha dị iche iche eme ihe n'ụlọ, bọmbụ, grenade na mgbọ ogbunigwe
Iji mezuo nke a, o mepụtara ndị otu Ogbunigwe dị iche iche nke e kesara n'ụdị ndị agha ọkụ n'ihu agha dị iche iche ka mkpa bilitere

Na mbụ, e zigara ya na Bonny iji nyere aka chebe Port Harcourt site na ọganihu nke Benjamin Adekunle Canal nke 3rd Marine Commando division na Biafra ya mere ogbunigwe, batrị na mgbọ ogbunigwe ya, General Ojukwu mechara zigara ya ndị agha Ogbunigwe ya na Onitsha iji chebe obodo ahụ megide mwakpo nke Murtala Mohammed ́s Second Division
Aghanya rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ichebe Onitsha
Aghanya na ndị agha Ogbunigwe ya rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa n'ichebe obodo Aba, Ikot Ekpene, Umuahia na Owerri

Mgbe ọdịda nke ụfọdụ nnukwu mpaghara Biafra dị ka Enugu, Abakaliki, Calabar, Ikot-Ekpene na Port Harcourt, ọ bịara doo anya na Biafra enweghị ike ichebe onwe ya nke ọma site na iji naanị ndị agha nkịtị

Aghanya gakwuuru General Ojukwu na onye isi ndị agha Biafra ọhụrụ, Major General Madiebo, na atụmatụ nke ịmepụta ndị agha guerrilla na ike nkewa, nke ga-arụ ọrụ n'azụ ndị iro karịsịa n'ógbè Biafra nke ndị agha Naijiria
Ndị agha ahụ ga-abụ ndị nkịtị, gụnyere ụmụ nwanyị, bụ ndị mgbe a zụrụ ha na mmebi na iji RAP mee ihe na-agbawa agbawa ga-abanye n'azụ ndị iro
E nyere Aghanya ọrụ nke ịmepụta, ịkwado na ịzụ ndị agha guerrilla nke akpọrọ Biafran Organisation of Freedom Fighters (BOFF)
A na-akpọkwa ya 'Rangers', echiche dị n'azụ nkewa a sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ ma dabere na ihe nlereanya Viet Cong
O nwetara otu ndị nkuzi South Africa n'okpuru Colonel Jan Breytenbach iji zụọ ndị agha BOFF na mmebi na mgbochi nnupụisi
E mere Aghanya onye isi nke ngalaba ọhụrụ a nke ndị agha nwere utu aha Chief of Staff
Ndị ọrụ ya gụnyere Chinua Achebe, Ukwu I
Ukwu na Okonjo (nna Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala) Isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ngalaba BOFF dị na Umuahia
Banyere ebumnuche, ebumnuche na modus operandi nke BOFF, Ezenwa-Ohaeto hotara Aghanya dị ka ndị a
BOFF bụ ndị agha kachasị mkpa na Biafra ma e wezụga ndị agha nkịtị
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1968, ha nwetara ihe dị mkpirikpi ma dị egwu site n'inweta Asaba n'aka ndị agha Naịjirịa nke abụọ, na-egbochi nnyefe kpọmkwem gafee Osimiri Niger
Ha gbochikwara Ngalaba nke Abụọ nke Ndị Agha Naịjirịa ijikọ ya na Ngalaba nke Mbụ nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Enugu site na igbochi ụzọ Onitsha-Enugu ruo mgbe agha ahụ biri
Ka ọ na-erule Septemba 1968 ha na-arụ ọrụ nke ukwuu n'azụ ndị iro, na mpaghara Mid-Western na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke Biafra
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Juun afọ 1969, ọrụ ndị agha Biafra dị oke na Mid West nke na a ga-eziga ndị agha Naịjirịa isii n'ógbè ahụ na mgbalị iji gbochie egwu ahụ
BOFF n'okpuru Aghanya rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa n'inweta Owerri na 1969
Aghanya lụrụ Comfort Ifeoma Modebelu na 19 Ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1962 na Birmingham, United Kingdom
Ọ bụ onye otu, na onye guzobere Nigerian Society of Engineers, Council of Registered Engineers of Nigeria, na British Institution of Electronic and Radio Engineers
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Aghanya guzobere ụlọ ọrụ injinia nke onwe ya nke a na-akpọ NICON Engineering Company ma bụrụ onye mbụ mepụtara, mepụta ma mepụta ọkụ okporo ụzọ na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye otu Igbo Traditional Chieftaincy Title Holders Association Nze na Ozo na-ejide aha Ochiagha-Udo na Amawbia, onye guzobere Ohanaeze Ndigbo, na onye guzobere Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)
Aha nna Ejiogu bụ aha Naijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Ejiro Amos Tafiri bụ nwafọ Naijiria na-ekiri eyimeyi
Ọ bụ nsogbu Ejiro Amos Tafiri (EAT) akara bụ nke e adi i gbo mkpa eyimeyi nke nsogbu agba ọhụrụ
Ejiro bu onye Delta steeti, a muru ya na obodo Legọs
Ụdị ya maka eyimeyi egwu mgbe ọ dị obere afọ atọ site na izi nke nne na nna ya bụ onye na-akwara ya mgbe ahụ
Ndị ọrụ ya anya ka ọ bụrụ maka ị bụ dibia bekee ma ọ nna clothes na design na Yaba College of Technology
Ejiro mbụ akara ya n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2015, akara rie a tijaabi “The Madame”, nchịkọta ihe eyimeyi o mere na Native & Vogue Port Harcourt Fashion Week ma na Dakar Fashion Week na Kenya Fashion Izu n'otu ụzọ ahụ
Ofe Eka nke a makwaara dị ka ekuku bụ nri dị ụtọ nke agbụrụ atọ dị na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjịrịa, a na-akwadebe ya site na mkpụrụ nkwụ mashed, groundnut e siri esi na mkpụrụ nke dump
A na-aṅụ ofe Eka kacha mma na nri ndị nwere starch dị ka fufu
A na-ahụkarị ofe ahụ n'etiti ndị mmadụ nọ na Benue, Kogi na Cross River State
A maara ofe Beniseed dị ka ofe ishwa site n'ebo Tiv, ndị Hausa na-ezo aka na ofe ahụ dị ka 'ridi'
Ihe a na-esi n'ọkụ, mkpụrụ osisi a na-esiri n'ọkụ n'ọkụ
Iji kwadebe ofe Eka, a na-esi anụ mbụ n'ime pan maka nkeji ole na ole
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-agwakọta mkpụrụ osisi a siri esi, groundnut a siri esi na nkwụ kernel mash
A na-agbakọta ngwakọta ahụ n'ime obere bọl ma sie ya na akwụkwọ nri mmanụ nkwụ (akwụkwọ dị ilu) na ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka Maggi, yabasị, nnu, crayfish wdg
ofe ndị ọzọ e ji mkpụrụ na mkpụrụ mee gụnyere
A na-aṅụ ofe Eka na Eba, yam na fufu
Aha nna Ekaette bụ aha Naijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Ekanem Ikpi Braide ( OFR ) amụrụ ya n' ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Maachị 1946, bụ nwanyị onye Naijiria Parasitologist
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Cross River University of Technology (CRUTECH), Calabar
Ọ bụ kwa onye oso ụzọ Vice-Chancellor nke Federal University of Technology, Lafia
Ekwuru na ọ bụ onye nyere aka na mkpochapụ guiworm na Naịjirịa
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ (2020), e mere ya nwanyị mbụ onye isi oche-ahọpụtara nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị nke Naijiria
Braide bụ onyeisi oche nke Board of Trustees, The Leprosy Mission (TLM) Nigeria
Ọ bụ Pro-Chancellor nke Mahadum Arthur Jarvis, Akpabuyo, Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Braide na
Cross R steeti,iverafo na 1946, wee gaa ụlọ akwụ￼￼ na kwọ St Anne's Ibanke nọ na Oyo steeti dan mụgumalọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya

Ọ gụrụ zoology na Mahanke dum Ife tupu ọ nwkwe ata akara ugo mmụta Master na Parasito na afo logy (1973), na akDra doctorate na Epedimiolosite na gy, Mahadum Cornedị n' obodo ll, New Yna afọ ork (1978)
O ji akwụkwọ asambodo na usoro ọrịa na-efe efe sitere na Mahadum Southampton (Agụmakwụkwọ Council Britain)
Ọòbụ onye otu na ngalaba-nchoputa, Nigerian Society of Parasitology; Onye otu, Ụlọ Nzukọ Ọmụmụ Salzburg 319; Onye otu (President họpụtara) Ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị nke Naijiria

N'oge mmalite nke ọrụ ya, Braide kụziri na Community Secondary School, Ugep site na afọ 1966 ruo afọ 1968, tupu ọ gafere na College of Education, Port Harcourt, River steeti n afọ (1973), ma mesịa gaaMahadum Nigeria, Nsukka ebe ọ gụrụ nkuzi n'etiti n' afọ 1973 na 1976
N' ime afọ 1978, a họpụtara ya Officer/Researcher (ọsụ ụzọ) na-elekọta ngalaba Onchocerciasis Control Unit nke Nigerian Institute for Trypanosomiasis Research, Kaduna ruo n' afo 1979
Braide rụkwara ọrụ na Mahadum Calabar kemgbe n' afọ 1979
Ebuliitere ya ịbụ Prọfesọ na 1991
Mmasị nyocha Braide na-elekwasị anya na njikwa ọrịa karịsịa nyocha ọrụ, nyocha mmetụta nke ntinye aka, ụzọ nyocha ngwa ngwa na ọrịa nke eserese na atụmatụ obodo na njikwa ọrịa

N'agbata afọ 1988 na 1998, Braide bụ Zonal Facilitator, Nigerian Guinea worm Eradication Programme (South East) , wee sonye na World Health Organisation / Federal Government of Nigeria Guinea worm Eradication Certification Committee ruo n ' afọ 2013 mgbe Nigeria nwetara asambodo nke nnwere onwe pụọ na Guinea worm

Braide achikọtala ndị otu Anglophone maka emume nke Africa na njikwa Onchocerciasis (APOC), ntule mmetụta mba dị iche iche nke emume nchịkwa onchocerciasis na Sudan, Ethiopia, Uganda, Tanzania na Nigeria

Ọ bụ onye otu TDR / APOC nke mepụtara RAPLOA, ngwá ọrụ nyocha ngwa ngwa iji achọpụta oke Loa loa maka njirimara ngwa ngwa nke obodo na mpaghara ndị na-ejikọta maka onchocerciasis na loaisis bụ ndị nwere nnukwu ihe ize ndụ nke mmeghachi omume ọjọọ na ọgwụgwọ Ivermectin
N' afọ 2001, Braide bụ onye otu WHO/APOC Technical Consultative Committee (TCC), na na afọ 2003, ọ were ọnọdụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii ahụ ruo afọ 2006
N'agbata afọ 2003 na 2006, Braide jere ozi dị ka onye so na kọmitii Mectizan Expert
Site na afọ 2007 ruo 2018, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye otu (Onye isi oche ọzọ) nke National Steering Committee, Nigerian Leglected Tropical Diseases Programme
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara Braide ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche, kọmitii ndụmọdụ nka na ụzụ, emume ọrịa na-efe efe nke steeti Cross River
Ọ bụ onye otu Board of Trustees of Sightsavers afọ asatọ, ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Technical Advisory Group (TAG) (afọ 4 Sightsavers) DFID kwadoro ọrụ NTD UNITED nke kwụsịrị na 2019
Ọ bụ Vice Chancellor nke mbụ nke Federal University of Technology, Lafia malite n' afọ 2011 rue n 'afọ 2016 na Vice-Chancellor Cross River University of Technology (CRUTECH), Calabar (2004 - 2009)
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị gọọmentị nke Nigeria, Society for Family Health, Nigeria
Braide bụ onye nnata nke Jimmy/Roslynn Carter Award maka nraranye pụtara ìhè na mmezu ya na mkpochapụ guinea worm na Nigeria
N'afọ 2000, ọ nwetara ihe nrite Cross River State 2000 Millennium Award

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, Braide nwetara ihe nrite ugwu mba Naijiria nke Officer of the Order of the Federal Republic (OFR), maka ntinye aka ya n'ịchịkwa ọrịa na Naijiria nke onye isi ala Naijiria nyere ya
N'afọ 2020, e mere ya onyeisi oche nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị nke Naijiria
Ọ ga-abụ nwanyị mbụ ga-abụ onye isi oche nke agụmakwụkwọ na Jenụwarị 2021 mgbe ọ nọchiri Prọfesọ Kalu Mosto Onuoha
Braide abụrụla onye osote onye isi oche nke Academy
Edensibịa

Ekaterina Dimitrova (Bulgarian Cyrillic Екатерина Димитрова, amụrụ na 23 Nọvemba 1987 na Plovdiv) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ bọọlụ mba ụwa si Bulgaria, nke a na ewere dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na agba basketball kacha nwee nkà na mba ahụ
Ọ nọchitere anya Bulgaria na ọkwa mba niile dị ala ma bụrụkwa onye otu ndị okenye
Dimitrova lụrụ Batiste Kiurkulos na 2014
Ọ na arụsi ọrụ ike mgbe ọ na abịa n'ọrụ ebere

Ekaterina Karavelova (Bulgarian), (21 Ọktoba 1860 na Rouschuk ♡ 1 Eprel 1947 na Sofia), bụ onye nkuzi Bulgaria, onye ntụgharị, onye mgbasa ozi, onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị

Ọ bụ onye guzobere nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị ọdịbendị Maika na onye isi oche ya na 1899-1929, osote onye isi oche nke Bulgarian Women's Union n'afọ 1915-1925, onye isi oche of the Bulgarian branch of the Women's International League for Peace and Freedom n'afọ 1925, onye guzobere Bulgarian-Romanian Association n'afọ 1932, onye guzobere otu Bulgarian Writers Association na onye isi ya n'afọ 1935
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye nkuzi, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na arụmụka banyere agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na ọnọdụ nke ndị nkuzi ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1901, ọ bụ onye guzobere Òtù Ụmụ nwanyị nke Bulgaria n'akụkụ Vela Blagoeva, Kina Konova, Anna Karima na Julia Malinova
Nzukọ ahụ bụ nzukọ nke òtù ụmụ nwanyị 27 dị n'ógbè ahụ nke e guzobere na Bulgaria kemgbe 1878

E guzobere ya dị ka nzaghachi nye njedebe nke agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na ohere maka ọmụmụ mahadum na 1890s, na ebumnuche ịkwalite mmepe ọgụgụ isi ụmụ nwanyị na itinye aka, hazie mgbakọ mba ma jiri Zhenski glas dị ka akụkụ ya
Ekaterina Karavelova jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Bulgaria nke ọtụtụ nzukọ mba ụwa
N'afọ 1935, ọ megidere ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ nke ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Bulgaria, na 1938 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii na-emegide mmechi ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Bulgaria na Romania
Ebe Karavelova dị n'Antarctica nke a kpọrọ aha Ekaterina Karavelova (1860-1947), onye ntụgharị, onye edemede na nwanyị na-eme ihe ike
Eken bụ aha nna ndị ama ama nwere aha nna incl
Ekene bụ aha nwoke

Ekene Emeka-Maduka (a mụrụ n'afọ 1996) bụ onye Canada na Naịjirịa na-ese ihe n'oge a, onye ọrụ ya na-esite n'ihe nketa ya nke Naijiria
A maara ya maka iji ihe osise onwe ya
A mụrụ Emeka-Maduka na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1996, nne ya bụ onye na-emepụta ime ụlọ ebe nna ya bụ onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ
A zụlitere ya na Kano, Nigeria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Manitoba Emeka-Maduka ekwuola na ahụmịhe ya mgbe o bi na Naịjirịa nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ọrụ ya
Ọrụ ya gụnyere isiokwu nke mbugharị na iwughachi njirimara, ọ na-abụkarị isiokwu nke eserese ya
Ihe ọzọ a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ ya bụ anya ndị mmadụ na-enwe na onye na-ekiri ihe osise ya

Eki Igbinedion (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye bụbu nwanyị mbụ nke Edo Steeti na nwunye Lucky Igbinidion, onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Edo Steet
Eki Igbinedion guzobere Idia Renaissance, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke dị na Edo Steeti, na ebumnuche nke ịlụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ ọgụ, gụnyere ịnabata ndị a na-ere ahịa mmadụ
A mụrụ Princess Eki Igbinedion n'ezinụlọ eze nke Prince na Princess Oyemarense na Benin City, isi obodo Edo State
Ọ gara Mahadum na Boston, Massachusetts, nke dị na United States of America ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na akụ na ụba
N'ịbụ nwanyị mbụ nke Edo State, Eki Igbinedion nara ụfọdụ ọrụ anụ ụlọ iji nyere ndị na-enweghị ka ọra ha aka ma nyekwa aka dozie nsogbu nke metụtara obodo ụfọdụ na steeti ahụ
N'afọ 1999, o guzobere Idia Renaissance iji nyere aka dozie nsogbu akwamiko na ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na Edo State
O guzobekwara Edo Underprivileged Children Scholarship Trust Funds na ebumnuche nke inye agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị na-enweghị ka ọra ha na steeti ahụ
Ekiti South-West bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Ekiti steeti, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Ilawe Ekiti
Ọ nwere mpaghara narị atọ na irí anọ na isii km 2 ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ ruru puku narị iri isii na ise, narị abụọ na iri asaa na asaa na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị atọ na iri isii na abụọ

Eko Atlantic, nke a na-akpọ Nigeria International Commerce city, nke a makwaara dị ka Eko Atlantic City, ma ọ bụ mbido EAC
na EA, bụ obodo a na-eme atụmatụ na Lagos steeti, Nigeria, nke a ga-ewu n'ala e nwetara n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic
Mgbe emechara ya, mpaghara ọhụrụ ahụ na-atụ anya ma ọ dịkarịa ala ndị bi na 250,000 na ndị njem 150,000 kwa ụbọchị
A na-emekwa mmepe ahụ iji nyere aka ịkwụsị mbuze nke ụsọ oké osimiri Lagos
Obodo a dị n'akụkụ mpaghara Victoria Island nke obodo Lagos, na mpaghara nke izizi1 nke mbụ Lekki n'ebe ugwu, ebe ókèala ọdịda anyanwụ, ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda niile bụ ụsọ oké osimiri

A na-atụ anya na Eko Atlantic ga-arị elu dị ka ọgbọ na-esote nke ihe onwunwe na kọntinent Afrịka; nwere ngụkọta nke mpaghara 10, gbasaa gafee ala nke ihe dịka uare kilota 10 (39 sq mi), obodo ahụ ga-egbo mkpa maka ego, azụmahịa, ebe obibi na ebe obibi ndị njem nleta

A na-eme mmepe Eko Atlantic dị ka mmekọrịta ọha na eze (PPP) na ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwe onwe ha na ndị na-etinye ego na-enye ego, ebe Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos bụ onye mmekọ atụmatụ, na nkwado nke Gọọmentụ Federal(Gọọmentị Naịjirịa) Ndị nkwekọrịta bụ nke obodo China Communications Construction Group LTD(CCCC), ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa mmiri na ọrụ mkpofu
Ndị ndụmọdụ bụ Royal Haskoning (ọkachamara n'ịgafe na njem) na ar + h Architects
South Energyx Nigeria Ltd, onye enyemaka nke otu Chagoury, ka e kere kpọmkwem iji mee mmepe ahụ

Nnyocha nke usoro nchebe oké osimiri mere na DHI Institute na Copenhagen, Denmark, ebe a nwalere ụdị nke ọma maka otu n'ime otu narị afọ nke oke osimiri, na otu n'afọ 120, otu nime afọ 150 na otu n'ime afọ 1,000
Eko Atlantic ga-egbo mkpa maka ego, azụmahịa, ebe obibi na ebe obibi ndị njem nleta, yana akụrụngwa kwekọrọ na ụkpụrụ nke oge a na gburugburu ebe obibi
Ụkpụrụ ndị a ga-enye ndị bi n'obodo ahụ mmiri, njikwa mkpofu, nchekwa na usoro njem
Obodo ahụ ga-enwekwa isi iyi ike kwụụrụ onwe ya nke a na-emepụta kpọmkwem maka obodo ahụ

Eko Atlantic dị n'ala e wepụrụ site na mbuze ma na-echebe ya site na mkpuchi osimiri nke Royal Haskoning mepụtara nke a maara dị ka Great Wall of Lagos, ihe mgbochi dị kilomita 85 nke e ji nkume wuo ma jiri ihe agha accropode kpuchie ya
Ọrụ Eko Atlantic City nwetara nlebara anya zuru ụwa ọnụ na 2009, dịka Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti na ndị mmekọ ya na ọrụ ahụ, South Energyx, natara Clinton Global Initiative Commitment Certificate
Eko Atlantic bụ onye ebe ahaziri ka o nwee mpaghara asaa nke dị ka ndị a

Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2009, mgbe ọrụ ahụ ka nọ n'oge ọ na-egwu ala, ihe dị ka 3,000,000 bic mita (3,900,000 cu ) jupụtara n'ájá ma tinye ya n'ógbè ahụ, ebe e bugara ihe dị ka tọn 35,000 nke nkume na saịtị ahụ
N'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Bar Beach, a hụlarị ala a na-eweghachi
Ndị na-egwu ala na-arụ ọrụ n'oge niile iji jupụta ebe ahụ na ájá

N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2013, e mere emume nraranye n'ala Eko Atlantic, ebe Goodluck Jonathan, Bill Clinton, Babatunde Fashola, Bola Tinubu, Aminu Tambuwal, na Ibikunle Amosun bịara
Na Machị N'afọ 2014, David Frame, onye isi nchịkwa nke South Energyx Nigeria Ltd, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmepe ahụ, kwupụtara na 'Ụlọ elu obibi mbụ ga-emeghe na 2016'
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, e wuchara ụlọ ole na ole karịsịa Eko Pearl Towers na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ewu na na atụmatụ
Obodo a aghọwo ebe na-arụsi ọrụ ike maka egwu egwu na egwuregwu dịka Lagos City Marathon na Copa Lagos
Eko Atlantic City enwetala asambodo EDGE site na International Finance Corporation (IFC), onye nke otu akụ mba uwa

Ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ bi nso akatọọla ọrụ Eko Atlantic, na-ekwu na ọrụ owuwu na-aga n'ihu emeela ka mmiri na-emebi n'ụsọ oké osimiri na oke osimiri; ka mmiri nke oké osimiri na-agafe n'ebe obibi, na-eme ka okporo ụzọ na-abanye na iwepu ogwe ọkụ ma na-amanye ndị bi na ya ịkwaga ebe ọzọ
A na-akatọkwa Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti maka ịghara itinye ndị mmadụ na ọrụ ahụ

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, Oké Osimiri Atlantic jupụtara n'ikpere mmiri ya, na-eburu mmadụ iri na isii banye n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic, na-egbu ọtụtụ mmadụ ma na-ekpuchi Kuramo Beach, Victoria Island na mpaghara ndị ọzọ

Dị ka onye ọkachamara na gburugburu ebe obibi si kwuo, 'mmụba nke oké osimiri mere n'ihi ọdịda nke ndị ọrụ nkwekọrịta na-ahụ maka ọrụ ájá nke Atlantic Ocean City a tụrụ aro, iji tinye usoro nke ga-ebelata mmetụta nke mmụba ahụ na gburugburu ebe ahụ'
Ngalaba Lagos State nke People's Democratic Party wepụtara nkwupụta gọọmentị, na-ebo ACN (nke bụzi APC) - nke gọọmentị steeti na-eduzi ájá maka oke osimiri
Ndị otu ahụ kpọrọ oku ka a kwụsị ọrụ Eko Atlantic na ịkwụ ụgwọ ozugbo maka ezinụlọ ndị nwụrụ anwụ
Ákwà mmírí Eko bụ otu n'ime àkwà mmiri atọ jikọtara Lagos Island na isi ala, ndị ọzọ bụ àkwà ifufe nke atọ na Carter
E wuru àkwà mmiri ahụ N'afọ 1975 ma bụrụ nke kachasị mkpụmkpụ n'ime àkwà atọ jikọtara Lagos Island na mainlaind
E mere àkwà mmiri Eko iji bufee ụmụ amaala ngwa ngwa
Bolu Akande wetara echiche ahụ na nzukọ ndị isi N'afọ 1963 mana ọ dịghị onye gere ya ntị ruo na afọ 1965
Ọ bụ nnukwu ọrụ mbụ Julius Berger rụrụ nke Shehu Shagari kwadoro, onye bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ n'oge Republic Mbụ nke Naịjirịa
Àkwà mmiri ahụ na-amalite site na Ijora na isi ala ma na-agwụ na mpaghara Apongbon nke Lagos Island
Akụkụ ọdọ mmiri nke àkwà mmiri ahụ gafere mita 430
E wuru àkwà mmiri ahụ na mgbatị ya nke 1350 mita n'usoro n'etiti afọ 1965 na 1975
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka ebe kachasị mma maka okporo ụzọ na-abịarute Lagos Island site na mpaghara Apapa na Surulere nke Lagos
Ọ bụ Julius Berger Nigeria PLC wuru àkwà mmiri ahụ
Atụmatụ mmezigharị nke mbụ malitere sitere na 23 Ọgọst 2014 ruo na 27 Ọktoba 2014 nke were ụbọchị 71
Gọọmentị steeti mara ọkwa na mmezigharị ahụ agaghị achọ ka emechi ya kpamkpam kama a ga-edozi àkwà mmiri ahụ n'oge
E mechiri àkwà mmiri ahụ maka imezigharị ya na mkpụrụ abali anọ Julaị 2020
Federal Ministry of Works, Nigeria, rụzigharịrị akụkụ nke abụọ nke àkwà mmiri ahụ site na 23 Ọktoba ruo na 9 Nọvemba 2021
Gọọmentị steeti mara ọkwa nke abụọ nke mmezigharị ahụ ka ọ malite na Satọdee Ọktoba 23 ruo Nọvemba 9, 2021, site na ulo oru nke Federal Ministry of Works
Dị ka akụkọ ahụ si kwuo, ọrụ ahụ ga-amalite na mpaghara Alaka-Apongbon nke steeti ahụ
E guzobere Eko FM n'afọ 1997 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nwanne nwanyị nke Radio Lagos

Ụlọ Ọgwụ Eko bụ ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye dị na Ikeja na mgbakwunye na Ikoyi, Etiti Lagos, Surulere, Steeti Lagos Naijiria
E guzobere ụlọ ọgwụ a na afọ 1982 iji nọchie Mercy Specialist Clinic, ụlọ ọgwụ na-arụ ọrụ na ngwụcha afọ 1970 iji nye ndị niile nọ na Steeti Lagos, Nigeria ọrụ nlekọta ahụike
Ebumnache na ebumnache bụ isi nke ụlọ ọgwụ Eko bụ inye ọrụ ahụike dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere ọrụ nke abụọ maka ndị bi na ya, mpaghara yana ọrụ ahụike mba
Ụlọ ọgwụ Eko, bụ ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye mbụ e depụtara n'ala nke Nigerian Stock Exchange
Ụlọ ọgwụ Eko nwere mgbakwunye na Ikeja nke nwere ihe dị ka àkwà 130 na ngwá ọrụ ahụike dị mkpa maka ịme usoro nyocha
Ihe mgbakwunye Surulere bụ ụlọ nlekọta ahụike nke sekọndrị nwere àkwà 40

Eko Hotels and Suites bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ nwere kpakpando ise na Lagos
E guzobere ya na afọ 1977 dị ka Èkó Holiday Inn ma wuo ya na Victoria Island, ọ bụ nnukwu họtel na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ bụ Oluwole Olumuyiwa na mmekorita ya na ndị America
A gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Le Meridien Eko Hotel and Suites, Lagos
L'Hotel Eko Le Meridien bụ akụkụ nke Chagoury Group nke ụlọ ọrụ
Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ nwere ọnụ ụlọ 825 na suites n'ime ụlọ anọ nwere ọtụtụ okpukpu, na-acha ọcha na-ele anya n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic na Kuramo Lagoon
Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ dị n'akụkụ ebe ego nke Lagos Island Victoria Island
Eko Hotels & Suites nwere ụlọ nkwari akụ nwanne nwanyị na Port Harcourt nke akpọrọ Hotel Presidential
Eko Hotels & Suites nwere nnukwu ụlọ mgbakọ na Naịjirịa
Ihe omume ndị mere na ụlọ nkwari ahụ gụnyere; kọntaktị, ihe nkiri izizi, ihe ngosi mba ụwa, agbamakwụkwọ, nzukọ na emume onyinye
A na-ejikarị ebe mgbakọ ahụ eme ihe maka ihe omume ndị a ma nwee ike ijere mmadụ 6,000 ozi
E nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ mmanya asatọ n'ime ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ
Asụsụ Ekoid bụ ụyọkọ asụsụ nke asụsụ Southern Bantoid nke a na-asụkarị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa na mpaghara ndị dị nso na Cameroon
Ọ dịla anya a na-ejikọta ha na asụsụ Bantu, na-enweghị nkọwa doro anya nke ọnọdụ ha
Crabb (1969) ka bụ akwụkwọ edemede kachasị na asụsụ ndị a, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dị mwute na, Akụkụ nke Abụọ, nke ga-enwe nyocha ụtọ asụsụ, ebipụtaghị ya
Crabb na-enyocha akwụkwọ banyere Ekoid ruo ụbọchị e bipụtara ya
Asụsụ Mbe dị nso bụ onye ikwu Ekoid kacha nso ma jiri ya mepụta ngalaba Ekoid–Mbe nke Southern Bantoid
Ethnologue depụtara ụdị Ekoid ndị na-esonụ na ọnọdụ nke asụsụ ndị nweere onwe ha

Ekow Mensah bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-ekwu okwu na Ghana bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke The African Network of Entrepreneurs (TANOE)
A mụrụ Mensah na Takoradi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana O nwetara nzere na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Kwame Nkrumah dị na Kumasi, Ghana Ekow Mensah lụrụ Oriakụ AJ Mensah
Dị ka onye isi oche nke The African Network of Entrepreneurs, ọ na-elekọta netwọk 5 na ọrụ 6 nke na-etinye aka na ọrụ dị iche iche na-emetụta Ghana

Networklọ ọrụ ndị ọchụnta ego nke Africa na-ejide ihe karịrị ndị ọchụnta ego 1750 n'ofe Africa ọkachasị na Ghana, Nigeria, South Africa, Uganda, Liberia, Kenya na Zambia Ọ malitere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya ụlọ ọrụ nka nka nke mbụ Ghana na ebe a na-arụkọ ọrụ, nke a maara dị ka TANOE Hub nke na-enye ohere na akụrụngwa maka ihe okike na Accra, Ghana
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Premium Bank Ghana Ltd họpụtara Ekow ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Board of the Ghana Startup Awards
Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ onwe ya na British Council Ghana na DwellWorks, USA na ndị nkuzi sonyere na mmemme YALI West Africa na ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Ashesi
E bipụtara edemede ya banyere Onye isi ala Donald Trump nke ọma ma tụọ aro ya n'ofe Afrịka
N'afọ 2015, Avance Media họpụtara Mensah n'etiti ndị ntorobịa Ghana 50 kachasị nwee mmetụta ma Coca-Cola mechara mata ya n'etiti Ndị ntorobịa 60 na Ghana

Ekpe, nke a makwaara dị ka Mgbe ( Ekoi Language Leopard ), bụ otu nzuzo nzuzo nke West Africa na Nigeria na Cameroon na-eto eto n'etiti ndị Efik tinyere ndị Manyu na Cameroon, Bahumono nke Cross River State, Ibibio, Uruan na Oron nke Akwa Ibom State, Arochukwu na ụfọdụ akụkụ Abia Steeti, yana ndị bi na mba ọzọ, dịka na Cuba na Brazil
Oha ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmalite nke narị afọ nke 21, ugbu a na-ekere òkè n'ememe
Enwekwara obodo abụọ dị iche ma nwee njikọ
Primary Society dị na Cross River, Akwa Ibom na Arochukwu mpaghara Nigeria, na secondary society bụ ndị si na ndịda na Eastern Igbo nke otu oha
Ekpe bu mmuo di omimi kwesiri ibi n'ime oke ohia ma na-edukwa emume obodo
A na-ekwu na ndị otu Ekpe na-eme ka ndị ozi nke ndị nna nna ( ikan )
Akụ na ụba oha na-adabere n'ịkwanyere ndị nna nna obodo
Naanị ndị nwoke nwere ike isonyere, ụmụ nwoke na-amalite ihe dịka onwa ntozu
Ejidere ndị otu na iyi nzuzo, a na-akwụkwa ụgwọ maka mbata
A na-ahọpụta ndị Ekpe-nwoke na akara mmụta asaa ma ọ bụ itoolu, maka nkwalite nke ọ bụla n'ime mmemme mmalite mmalite, ụgwọ na iyi dị mkpa
ItNdị otu na-ejikọta ụdị nnwere onwe yana ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke na-akwado iwu
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, onye ọ bụla e mejọrọ na mpaghara Ekpe, bụ nke ọha mmadụ na-achị, ọ ga-agwa onye Ekpe okwu naanị ma ọ bụ tie ịgbà Ekpe n'ụlọ Ekpe, ma ọ bụ fụ Ekpe dịka a na-akpọ ya, ya bụ, ụda Ekpe
mpi, n'iru ulo nke onye nēmebi iwu, na ígwè ọrụ nile nke obodo ka a na-etinye n'ike iji hụ na e mere ikpe ziri ezi

Ndị otu Ekpe na-eyi ihe mkpuchi mgbe niile mgbe ha na-arụ ọrụ uwe ojii, n'agbanyeghị na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu nwere ike ịmata ya, egwu nke ntaramahụhụ sitere n'aka ndị ikan na-egbochi ndị mmadụ ebubo ndị otu ahụ nwere ike ịgafe oke ha
N'oge gara aga, ọha mmadụ nwetara aha ọjọọ n'ihi ihe ndị Britain lere anya dị ka omenala ọjọọ nke jikọtara ya na emume ya
A na-ejikọta mkpa ọha na eze na ọkwa kachasị elu nke Ekpe-men, nke a na-akpọ Amama
Opekempe n'oge gara aga, a na-akwụ nnukwu ego iji nweta ọkwa ndị a dị elu
Azụmahịa a bụ na Amama na-achịkwa ọtụtụ akụ na ụba obodo

Ndị Amama na-ejikarị ọtụtụ narị acres nke nkwụ eme ihe maka onwe ha na, site na uru ha na-enweta, na-ahụ na ụmụ ha nwoke nwetara ọkwa yiri nke ahụ, nke nwere mmetụta nke igbochi ohere ịnweta uru akụ na ụba maka ndị obodo ndị ọzọ
Ndị Ekpe na-achọ ka ndị ha bido na-akwado oriri na ọṅụṅụ maka obodo ahụ, nke na-akwalite ọdịdị nkesagharị akụ na ụba site n'inye ndị ogbenye nri na ihe ọṅụṅụ
Ekpedeme Friday 'Ekpe' Udoh (/ɛˈpeɪ ˈjuːdoʊ/ eh-PAY YOO-doh; amụrụ ya n Mee 20, 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu Naijiria-Amerịka ọkachamara basket boolu maka Kyoto Hannaryz nke Japanese BLeague
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka Michigan Wolverines na Baylor Bears
Na 2010 NBA draft, Golden State Warriors họọrọ ya na nke isii n'ozuzu
N'inwe ogologo ogwe aka 7'4 1⁄2', Udoh bụ onye na-ebute ụzọ na Nnọkọ iri na abuo n'oge afọ 2009 -10

Ọ duziri nzukọ ahụ n'otu oge ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ Baylor (2009-10), mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Michigan ebe, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke abụọ maka 2007-08 Michigan Wolverines, ọ duziri Nnọkọ Nnukwu Iri na mgbochi na 29 kwa egwuregwu (ngụkọta nkuchi Iri itoolu na anọ) n'afọ 2007-08
Ugboro abụọ All-EuroLeague Team selection, Udoh duuru Fenerbahçe gaa na EuroLeague title na 2017, na-enweta EuroLeague Final Four MVP award na usoro ahụ
A họpụtara Udoh maka ndị otu mba Naijiria maka 2019 FIBA World Cup na Olympic Games nke afọ 2020
Udoh gbara bọọlụ kọleji oge atọ, abụọ na Michigan na otu na Baylor, na-enweta akara 84, 63 rebounds, 15 assists na 28 blocks kwa egwuregwu na egwuregwu 103

N'afọ 2009, Associated Press nyere Udoh aha nsọpụrụ ndị Amerika niile, yana ịkpọ aha na otu nke abụọ All-Big 12, Big 12 All-Defensive team, Big 12 Newcomer of the Year, Big 12 All'Rookie team, USBWA All-District VII team na NABC Division I All-Distrct 8 second team
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, o kwupụtara ebumnuche maka draft NBA, na-ahapụ afọ ikpeazụ ya nke iru eru kọleji
A họpụtara Udoh na nke isii n'ozuzu na NBA draft nke afọ 2010 site na Golden State Warriors
N'ihi mmerụ ahụ n'aka, Udoh emeghị NBA mbụ ya ruo na Disemba 11, 2010 megide Miami Heat na nkeji atọ ikpeazụ nke egwuregwu ahụ, na-enweta akara abụọ
Na Nọvemba 21, 2011, Udoh bịnyere aka na Bnei Herzliya nke Israel maka oge mkpọchi NBA
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011, ọ laghachiri Warriors mgbe ọ chịsịrị naanị otu egwuregwu na Bnei ebe o dekọrọ isi iri abụọ na abụọ, 16 rebounds, 3 assists na 4 blocks
Na Machị 13, 2012, e rere Udoh, ya na Monta Ellis na Kwame Brown, na Milwaukee Bucks iji gbanwere Andrew Bogut na Stephen Jackson
Na Septemba 3, 2014, Udoh bịnyere aka na Los Angeles Clippers
N'ime oge niile, ọ pụtara na egwuregwu iri atọ na atọ, na-enweghị ike inweta oge na ọrụ dị ukwuu
Na Julaị 28, 2015, Udoh bịnyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na klọb Turkish Fenerbahçe
N'oge mbụ ya na otu ahụ, Udoh enweela ọrụ mmalite, ịbụ otu n'ime ndị isi otu ahụ
Fenerbahçe meriri iko Turkey, site na mmeri 67-65 na Darüşşafaka
Fenerbahçe bịakwara n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke afọ 2016 EuroLeague Final Four, mana ọ gaghị emeri n'asọmpi EuroLeague, mgbe CSKA Moscow meriri ya na oge mgbakwunye nke 96-101
N'ihe karịrị egwuregwu iri abụọ na asaa na EuroLeague, ọ na-enweta akara 126 na 51 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
Na ngwụcha oge ahụ, Fenerbahçe merikwara asọmpi Turkish League
Na Julaị 11, 2016, Udoh bịnyere aka na Fenerbahçe, na nkwekọrịta 1 + 1
N'afọ 2016, Udoh meriri asọmpi EuroLeague na Fenerbahçe
A kpọrọ ya EuroLeague Final Four MVP, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Final Four
Na Julaị 14, 2017, ọ hapụrụ Fenerbahçe, laghachi na NBA
Na Julaị 21, 2017, Udoh bịnyere aka na Utah Jazz maka afọ abụọ, nkwekọrịta $ 65M
Na Julaị 7, 2019, Udoh bịnyere aka na Beijing Ducks maka nkwekọrịta otu afọ
Na Machị 4, 2021, Ekpe Udoh bịnyere aka na Beijing Royal Fighters
Na Julaị 18, 2021, Udoh bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na Virtus Bologna nke Italian LBA
Virtus na-egwuri egwu na EuroCup
Na Septemba 18, 2021, ọ nwere nnukwu mmerụ ahụ n'ahụ n'oge nkeji iri na ise nke 2021 Italian Supercup
Otú ọ dị, na Septemba 21, otu ahụ meriri Supercup nke abụọ ya, na-emeri Olimpia Milano 90 Á84

Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ chụpụrụ Lietkabelis, Ulm na Valencia na agba atọ mbụ nke egwuregwu ahụ, na 11 Mee 2022, Virtus meriri Frutti Extra Bursaspor site na 80 Xi 67 na Segafredo Arena, merie EuroCup mbụ ya ma ruo eru maka EuroLeague mgbe afọ 14 gasịrị
Agbanyeghị, n'agbanyeghị na ọ kwụsịrị oge oge niile na mbụ wee chụpụ 3–0 ma Pesaro na Tortona na agba abụọ mbụ nke playoffs, Olimpia Milan meriri Virtus 4–2 na asọmpi mba ahụ

Udoh bụ nwa nne na nna Naijiria, Alice na Sam Udoh, o nwekwara otu nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya, Eddie, na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, Esther na Sefon
Udoh na-enwe mmasị na-ịgụ akwụkwọ ma na-elekọta otu akwụkwọ ọha na eze, nke ka ukwuu n'ịntanetị n'oge ezumike ya
A na-ekwu na ọ na-ekwu si, 'Ọ bụrụ na m nwere ike gbaa na NBA ma ka chọta oge ịgụ ya, ị nwere ike ịgụ ya!'
Ekpenta nke amakwa dịka ọrịa Hasen (HD), n'anọ (ọgwụ) ogologo ogenke ihe n'akpata ya bụ nje ọzọ akpọrọ Maịkbakteriom lepranankeakpọkwara Maịkobakteriom lepromatọsịs
Ha niile n'akpata ekpenta
Na mbido, onweghị ihe n'egosi na onye ahụ ebutala ekpenta nke na ọ na-anọgide site n'afọ ise ruo 20
Ihe ndị a na ahụ nke n'eyi ka onye ahụ onweela ya gụnyere otito n'elu ahụ,n'ụbụrụ na n'elu ahụ,akụkụ ebe esi eku ume, n'anụ ahụ nke a na ahụ anya
Nke a nwere ike ime ka onye ahụ ghara igosi ahụ mgbu n'ihi akụkụ anụ ahụ nke n'apụ site n'oge ruo n'oge nke n'apụta n'ihi ahụghị ọnya n'ahụ onye ahụ
Ike ọgwụgwụ n'ahụghị ụzọ nkeọma nwere ike isonyekwa na ya
Ekpenta n'agbasa site n'otu onye gaa n'onyeọzọ
A na-ebuta ya site n'ụkwara nke onye nwere ya maọbụ mmiri si onye ọ na-eme n'imi gbapụta
Ekpenta n'arịakarị ndị dara ogbenye
Onwekwara ike ịgbasa site n'okuku ume, na mmiri nke si n'ahụ onye ọdị n'ahụ pụta
Dịka ụfọdụ si chee, anaghị enweta ya ngwa ngwa
Onwere ụdị abụọ ya nke doro anya nje nke n'agbasa n'onwe ya na nke n'agbasa karịa otu

Ekewara abụọ ndị a n'ọnụọgụgụ elu anụ ahụ na nke n'adọkasị elu anụ ahụ, nke n'egosi n'ụdị nke mbụ ya n'enwe ihe ise maọbụ karịa dị iche maọbụ dị ole na ole na nke abụọ nke nwere ise maọbụ karịa|Emere nchọpụta a site n'iji ihe enwetara n'anụ ahụ nke onye echere nwere ya n'iji nke a na-akpọ DNA nke ihe jikọtara ndụ mee nnyocha
A na-agwọ ekpenta site n'iji ọgwụ dị iche iche maka ya mee ihe
A na-enye onye nwere ụdị ya nke mbụ ọgwụ dapson rifampisinruo ọnwa isii
Ejikwa ọgwụ ndị a agwọ onye nwere ogo nke abụọ ya rifampisin dapson, na klofazimin[[]] ruo ihe ruru otu afọ
Ndị otu mbaụwa n'ahụ maka ahụike bụ Wọld Helt Ọganaịzeshọn n'enye ọgwụgwọ n'efu maka onye ọbụla nwere ọrịa a
Enwekwara ike iji ọgwụ ndịọzọ mee ihe
N'afọ 2012 n'ụwa niile, enwere mmadụ 189,000 nwere ọrịa ekpenta bụ nke dị ala nke nde ise n'ụma abụọ bụ ndị nwere ya n'afọ ndị 1980 gaa n'ihu
Ndị ọhụrụ achọpụtara nwere ya dị 230,000
Achọpụtara ndị ọhụrụ a na mba 16, nke mba India bụ ọkara na ya
N'afọ 20 gara aga, agwọọla mmadụ dị nde 16 ekpenta n'ụwa niile
A na-achọpụta mmadụ 200 nwere ya na mba Unaịted Steeti kwa afọ
Ekpenta ebiela ndị mmadụ aka ọjọọ ọtụtụ puku afọ ugbu a

Ụfọdụ n'ewe iwe ma ejiri okwu ahụ bụ ekpenta mee ihe, kama asị 'na mmadụ nwere ekpenta' ọ na-ekwe nghọta karịa
Ebidoro ụbọchị mbaụwa wepụtara maka ndị nwere ekpenta n'afọ 1954, iji mee ka ndị mmadụ marakwuo maka ọrịa ekpenta nkeọma
Ekpeye (Ekpe ye) bụ asụsụ Igboid nke Rivers State na Imo State, Nigeria
Àtụ Languages of NigeriaAsusu nke NaijiriaÀtụ Volta-Niger languagesAsụsụ Vota Naigeria
Ekpeye (Ekpe-yeh) bụ ndị a na-ahụtakarị
dịka òtù ntà maọbụ obere òtù ndị Igbo na Steeti Rivers, Naịjiria
Ha na-asụ asụsụ Ekpeye
Ndị Ekpeye si na Anioma dị na Steeti Delta, Egbema dị na Steeti Imo, na Igbanke bụ obodo ndị Igbo dị na Steeti Edo ugbua
Mpaghara ọdịnala ha dị na mpaghara ebe mmanụ bara ụba, ma, ndị Ekpeye emeela mkpesa banyere àmụmà ọchịchị Naijiria dịka o siri metụta enyeghị ego zuru òkè maka mbibi gburugburu ebe obibi ha
Ya bụ ịtụ mgbere mmanụ emebiela nkesà akụnụba
Na nsonso a, e guzobere òtù a maara dịka 'Movement for the Survival and Advancement of Ekpeye Ethnic Nationality' iji guzogide mgbanwe na-eyi omenaala Ekpeye égwù
Ndị Ekpeye na-asụ asụsụ Ekpeye
Ekpo bụ mmanwụ ha na-eme na Akwa Ibom na Arochwukwu
Ekpo Okpo Eyo (8 Julaị 1931 - 28 Mee 2011) bụ onye ọkà mmụta Naijiria nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na nkà mmụta ihe ọkpụ nke Naịjirịa

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na interface nke archeology, anthropology, na akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọtụtụ afọ na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti nakwa nke mba nke ihe ochie na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na Nigeria
A kọwara ya dịka 'doyen na ụlọ ọrụ na omenala Naịjirịa' na 'ogidi ákátákpó [] nke ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie Naịjirịa'

Ịbụ onye sitere na Cross River State na mgbe ọ kwagara Lagos, Eyo zutere Surveyor of Antiquities na Nigeria, Kenneth Murray, onye gbara ya ume ịga gụọ akwụkwọ na mba ọzọ Eyo gụrụ archeology na anthropology na Mahadum Cambridge (BA) nakwa archeology na Mahadum London (MA)
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ nwetara PhD na Mahadum nke Ibadan
Site n'afọ1968 ruo 1979, Eyo bụ onye nduzi nke Federal Department of Antiquities, ma mesịa, ruo n'afọ 1986, onye nduzi nke National Commission for Museums and Monuments
N'ọkwa ndị a, ọ lekọtara mgbanwe nke ọrụ archeological n'ala Naịjirịa, nke na-eduga n'ịtụleghachi ọdịbendị prehistoric dịka Nok, Owo, maọbụ Ife
Ọ kwagara na Mahadum nke Maryland, College Park, ebe ọ bụ Ọkankuzi nke nka Afrịka na nkà mmụta ihe ochie

Ná mbido afọ 1980, Eyo haziri ihe ngosi mba ụwa na 'Treasures of Ancient Nigeria', na-egosi na nke mbụ ya ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke nkà mmụta ihe ochie nke Naijiria nye ndị America na ndị Europe na-ege ntị, nke e gosipụtara na Detroit, San Francisco, New York, Washington DC, Calgary, Atlanta, Los Angeles, Philadelphia, na London
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke PanAfrican Archaeological Association site n'afọ 1983 ruo afọ 1995
Ekpo (Ghost) bụ ụdị nka ọdịbendị nke sitere na ndị Efik, Ibibio na Annang na Cross River / Akwa Ibom na Southern Niajịrịa
Mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu nabatakwara omume ahụ, ya bụ Arochukwu na Ohafia (Abia steeti) n'oge mgbasawanye nke Aro-Kingdom

Ekpo otu ihe ahụ pụtara dị ka Ekpe, Okpo-owo ma ọ bụ Akpo-owo dị ka ndị Efik, Ibibio na Annang na-akpọ ya na-akọwa ya dị ka mmadụ na-adịghị ndụ ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ obi nwụrụ anwụ nke na-abịa n'ala nke ndị dị ndụ
Na Akwa Ibom Ekpo Masquerades na-eme ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ obodo ya niile karịsịa n'oge mmeme ya na Ikot Ekpene, Etim Ekpo, Oruk Anam na Abak yana Eket na ebe ndị ọzọ n'ala Ibibio

N'ihi ọbịbịa nke Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na mmepeanya nke oge a, a naghịzi ele Ekpo Masquerade anya dị ka mkpụrụ obi nwụrụ anwụ nke na-alaghachi n'ala nke ndị dị ndụ, kama a maara ya ugbu a dị ka uwe ụmụ mmadụ dị ndụ na-eyi ma a na-ewere ya dị ka akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọdịbendị na ihe nketa nke ndị mmadụ
Ekrejegbe bu obodo da na Ughelli South Local Government Area of Delta State, Naigeria
Obodo a nwere okporo ama a na-akpo Ekrogbe Quarters
Georgina Chloe Eku Edewor-Thorley, nke a makwaara dị ka Eku Edewor (amụrụ 18 Disemba 1986), bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri Britain-Nigeria onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo na ihe nlere anya
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọbịa nke mmemme onyonyo ntụrụndụ 53 Extra on Africa Magic
A mụrụ Edewor n'ụlọọgwụ Portland dị na Lọndọn, ya na ejima ya bụ Kessiana
Nne ya bụ Juliana Edewor, onye na- emezi ime ụlọ , onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, na onye na-anakọta ihe osise sitere na steeti Delta
Nna ya, Hugh Thorley, bụ British rurụ ọrụ na ihe oriri na ọñụñụ ulo mmepụta lọjistik
Nne na nna Edewor gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị obere ma ha abụọ lụọkwa ọzọ
Di nne ya nwụrụ anwụ, Peter Thomas, bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọka iwu si Legọs
N'ebe nne ya, ọ bụ nwa nwa nke ndị otu usoro ọchịchị eze Naijiria
A zụlitere Edewor na Naijiria ma United Kingdom
O biri na Lagos ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, na-agụ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na St
Saviour's School na Grange School
Eku wee laghachi United Kingdom, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Benenden School for Girls
Ya na ezinụlọ ya na-eme njem ugboro ugboro, na-eme ekeresimesi n'Eku, obodo nna ya dị na Delta State, na oge okpomọkụ na America, Europe, na mba Africa ndị ọzọ
Edewor gara Mahadum Warwick na Coventry, England
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'asụsụ Bekee na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ na 2008
Ọ gụchara ihe ọmụmụ ọnwa atọ nke ọma na ime ihe nkiri na New York Film Academy na 2009
Ihe ngosi onyonyo izizi Edewor bụ n’afọ 2006, mgbe ọ gbara asọmpi na ihe ngosi mere eme Britain's Next Top Model n'okpuru aha 'Georgina Edewor-Thorley'
Ọ pụtara na mmepụta ihe nkiri mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Warwick na New York Film Academy
Ọrụ mbụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ bụ onye na-nyere aka na-emepụta ihe nkiri, ọ nyere onye mmepụta Damian Jones aka
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya DJ Films site na Septemba 2008 ruo Ọktoba 2009
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri 2010 Sex & Drugs & Rock & Roll dị ka 'Party Girl'

N'afọ 2010, mgbe di nne ya nwụrụ, Edewor laghachiri na Naijiria ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nne ya, Chardonnay Restaurant and Bar, ka nne ya nwee ike ilekwasị anya n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye mmepụta ime ụlọ
Ọlọghachiri na ọnwa ise, ọ gara mgbakọ mepere emepe maka onye na-eme ihe ngosi na 53 Extra (nke bụbu Studio 53 Extra ), ihe nkiri ntụrụndụM-NET mepụtara ma na-agbasa na ọwa Africa Magic DStv
53 Extra bụ ntụgharị akwụkwọ akụkọ f Africa Magic show Studio 53, nke akpọrọ aha maka mba 53 dị na African Union
53 Extra gosiri egwu, ihe nkiri, ejiji, mmemme kapeeti uhie na ozi gbasara ndị ama ama na ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ si n'ofe kọntinent Africa
Ọ na-ekewa ọtụtụ oge ya n'etiti London, Lagos na New York City, mana ọ na-agakwa ọtụtụ njem n'ime Africa
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ihe nkiri kacha mma na mmekọrịta Africa na ihe nrite ndị n'ime ihe nkiri Ghana nke 2014
Ekua Holmes (amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi, onye na-ese akwụkwọ ụmụaka, na ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara nka
Ụzọ isi Holmes si eme ihe osise bụ ngwakọta mgbasa ozi, site na itinye akwụkwọ akụkọ, foto, ákwà, na ihe ndị ọzọ iji mepụta ihe ndị màrà mma
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ndị a na-echetara ya ógè ọ bụ nwata na mpaghara Washington Park nke Roxbury na Boston, MA
A mụrụ Ekua Holmes na Roxbury, Massachusetts na 1955
Holmes nwèrè BFA na Photography site na Massachusetts College of Art and Design
Dika ónyé na-ese ihe na-eto eto, Holmes chọpụtara ike nke ihe ndị a chọtara, nke na-enweta njirimara ha dị ka nka site na ebe yana akụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ihe ndị ahụ
Ọ na-eji akwụkwọ akụkọ, magazin, stampụ ochie, na ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-ejikarị ihe ndị a emepụta ụkpụrụ
Nwatakịrị, nkekọ ezinụlọ, ncheta, na ntachi obi bụ isiokwu a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime collages Holmes na-echetara ọrụ nkè ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na ndị Afrịka America dịka Romare Bearden, Jacob Lawrence, na Njideka Akunyili
Dị ka ndị omenkà ndị a, ọrụ ya na-egosipụta mkpebi ya màkà ihe oyiyi na nnọchiteanya Black
Holmes emeela ọtụtụ akwụkwọ foto ụmụaka, na-enweta onyinye màkà ọtụtụ
N'afọ 2013, e nyere Holmes onyinye NAACP Image Award
Voice of Freedom meriri Caldecott Honor, Robert F
Sibert Honor, John Steptoe New Talent Illustrator Award, na Boston Globe-Horn Book Nonfiction Honor
E nyere Holmes 2018 Coretta Scott King Illustrator Award màkà Out of Wonder na 2019 award màkà The Stuff of Stars
Holmes bụ ónyé natara 2013 Brother Thomas Fellowship site na The Boston Foundation
N'afọ 2013, a kpọrọ Holmes aha na Boston Art Commission, nke na-elekọta ọrụ nka ọha na eze na ihe onwunwe ọbọdọ

N'afọ 2015, o wụnyere ọrụ obodo màkà mmeghe na Institute of Contemporary Art Boston, nke nwéré nnukwu njikọ mmekọrịta na ihe nkiri nke Boston na-agbanwe agbanwe, nke e mere iji gbakwunye ihe ngosi otu ICA, mgbè kpakpando malitere ịda
Aha nna Ekubo bụ aha Naijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Ekundayo Adeyinka Adeyemi (28 Febụwarị 1937 - 25 Jenụwarị 2022) bụ onye Naijiria na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye agụmakwụkwọ nke bụ prọfesọ a ma ama nke Architecture na Mahadum Covenant
N'afọ 1975, Adeyemi nwetara prọfesọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, nkwalite nke mere ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ mbụ nke Architecture na Naijiria na Sub-Saharan Africa
A mụrụ ya nye nne na nna si Ekiti Steeti, Adeyemi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị anọ dị iche iche na steeti dị iche iche tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ ya na Ekiti Steeti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Christ's School Ado Ekiti, isi obodo steeti na 1956
N'afọ 1963, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'ihe owuwu ụlọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
N'afọ 1965, o nwetara nzere masta ya na Mahadum Columbia
Nke sochiri ya bu nzere masta ọzọ na atụmatụ obodo site na Mahadum New York na 1973

Ihe odide PhD ya bụ na Kaduna Capital Territory na Metropolitan Lagos An Analysis of Administrative and Institutional Framework for Urban land Planning and Development ma mechaa ya n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 1974
A na-ahụta Adeyemi dị ka prọfesọ mbụ nke architecture nke Naịjirịa, a na-akọkwa na ọ bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ mbụ nwetara ọkwa prọfesọ na architecture na Sub-Saharan Africa
Ekundayo bụ onye so n'ọtụtụ otu ndị ọkachamara nke gụnyere Nigerian Institute of Architects, African Union of Architects na American Institute of Planners
Ekundayo malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello n'afọ 1969, ebe ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba nke imepụta gburugburu ebe obibi n'afọ 1976
E mere ya prọfesọ na mahadum n'afọ 1975
N'afọ 1982, Ekundayo gara ezumike na Mahadum Sheffield dị ka prọfesọ nleta
N'afọ 1988, a họpụtara Ekundayo ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nke Federal University of Technology Akure
N'agbata afọ 1999 na 2002, a họpụtara ya dị ka Ag
Vice Chancellor nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ

N'afọ 2004, ọ lara ezumike nká wee bụrụ onye isi nke College of Science and Technology na prọfesọ a ma ama na Mahadum Covenant A na-ewerekwa ya dị ka nna nye ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ, o nyekwara aka guzobe ngalaba Architecture na mahadum ole na ole na Naịjirịa

N'ime nyocha nke afọ 2008 nke akpọrọ Meaning and Relevance in Nigerian Traditional Architecture The Dialectics of growth and Change, Adeyemi nwara idozi echiche na-ezighi ezi nke bu na ndị Afrịka bi na 'obodo ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ, ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ọhịa na-enweghị ekele maka ọdịdị dị na atụmatụ obodo' site n'inye nghọta banyere ihe mepụtara ụlọ ọdịnala oge ochie nke ụlọ n'ofe agbụrụ ndị isi na Naịjirịa, ebe ọ na-enye nghọta na echiche zuru oke banyere ụlọ ndị Africa nke oge ochie

Mpempe akwụkwọ nke afọ 2014 nke akpọrọ Characteristics of Early Ecclesiastical Architecture in Lagos State in Nigeria nke Adeyemi dere na Journal for Cultural and Design Studies kwuru na oge dị n'etiti mmalite afọ 1850 ruo ngwụsị afọ 1920 malitere nnukwu oge nhazi n'ụdị ụlọ ndị e mere na Nigeria
Nnyocha ahụ nyochara ụlọ ọrụ Ndị Kraịst ise kachasị mkpa nke e wuru n'oge ahụ, ebe ọ na-atụle ihe onwunwe ha dị iche iche
Nchọpụta sitere na mbipụta ahụ bụ na e mere ụlọ ndị ahụ na obere ntinye, echiche na nkọwa sitere n'aka ndị mba na usoro eji eme ihe agbanweela kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ site na ihe a na-eji taa
Adeyemi nwụrụ na 25 Jenụwarị 2022, mgbe ọ dị afọ 84

oyiyi nke ndị Ekuona bụ atụ

Ekuru bụ nri sitere n'aka ndị Yoruba na Naịjirịa
A na-ejikarị ahịhịa ahịhịhịa a pịrị apị akwadebe ya
Ọ dị ka moin-moin n'ihi na a na-eji peeled black-eyed peeled peeled peas ma ọ bụ, mgbe ụfọdụ, cowpeas
Otú ọ dị, n'adịghị ka moi-moi nke a na-agwakọta ya na ose na ihe ndị ọzọ tupu ọ na-esi ísì ụtọ, a na-ekpuchi Ekuru na akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ite tin (dị ka moi- moi) ma na-esi ya na mmiri
A na-enye ya na stew ose e siri esi ma mesịa jiri stew ose gbakọta ya
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na-eri nri na pudding ọka (Ogi ma ọ bụ Eko) a pụkwara inye ya na (Eba) Cassava Pudding ma ọ bụ Okro Soup
Nri a sitere n'aka ndị si South-Western Nigeria, ọkachasị ndị si Osun State
Ekuru pụtara n'ọtụtụ akụkọ ifo Yoruba, ebe a na-esi ya na mgbaaka na mgbalị iji gbochie ndị amoosu ọjọọ ịkwaga
N'ihi ọdịdị nri kpọrọ nkụ, enwere ike iji okwu ahụ bụ 'Ọ na-egbu m dị ka ekuru' kọwaa onye nleta na-agwụ ike
Ekwang (nke a makwaara dị ka 'Ekpang Nkukwo' na, 'Ekpang' na 'Ekwang Coco') bụ nri Cameroon na Naijiria nke sitere na ndị Bakweri, Bafaw Oroko, Cross River State na Akwa Ibom State
A na-eji édè ọhụrụ a na-ekpuchi na akwụkwọ édè eme ya
Ihe ndị ọzọ a na-etinye bụ azụ ọhụrụ maọbụ nke a na-ese anwụrụ ọkụ, anụ, mmanụ nkwụ, mfịrịya (crayfish )na ngwá nri ndị ọzọ ga-eme ka ọ na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ekwe bụ ngwa egwu ọdịnala ndị Igbo
Ekwe bụ ụdị ngwa égwu nwere oghere n'ime osisi a kpọpụtara akpọputa
Osisi eji eme ekwe na-abụkarị ogwe osisi
Ekwe na-abịa n'ụdị dị iche iche, nhazi ya na-esite na ebumnuche eji eme ya
Enwere ike iji ekwe mee emume omenala, ma ọ bụ were ya mee egwu
A na-ejikwa ekwe ezikorita ozi dị ka ụdị mkparịta ụka, nye ndị ọzọ nọ n'ebe dị anya n'oge gara aga
Ekwe na-enye uda dị iche iche ma n'oge emume ma n'oge mberede
Onye ana-kpo Ekwe nsu bu onye mmuo na echiche ndi Christian ma ndi umu Abraham nile, onye iro wo, ma Chineke wo
Okwu ochie nke sotelu 'Ekwensu'
E wetara n'echiche ndi christain na mbe chineke ndi christain kere uwa a, o bido na n'bido kere ana na mmiri, site ebe anwa were kere anu na ugwu nile
Ebe o kesiri ihe nile folu nwoke, o we gwa onwe ya, ka m' kere ihe yilu mu
Nya ka o jilu we kere nwoke, site na nkpo nwoke we kelu nwayi
mbe ekere chineke nile mefe si ka ekwensu bia so nwayi chi kere a na po eve we gwa ya, **nwayi, jelu na ugwu buta ezi echiche weta olili ugwu we rie**
Nwaye we zata ekwensu, gwa ya na chineke keta ya kpa iwu na onye okere a kwesighi site na ugwu bu ezi echiche ri oriri
Ekwensu we gwa nwayi na chineke tu ugha na ihe ge solu isite na ugwu echiche rie bu ihe oma
nke ndị Igbo n efe na -aru oru dịka Alusi ma ọ bụ Chukwu nke ihe nweta na mbe
Nkà na azụmahịa na mkparịta ụka, a na-akpọkarị ya maka nduzi n'ọnọdụ ike
Chi ahụ bụ ike nke ọgba aghara na Mgbanwe, yabụ n'akụkụ ya ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ike, a na-asọpụrụ dịka Chineke nke agha na Mmeri nke na-achị ndị mmụọ ọjọọ na ike ọgba aghara nke okike
A na-ahụta ya dị ka mmụọ ime ihe ike na-akpali ndị mmadụ ime ihe ike
Asi na ebu na obi ekwensu bu ihu na omezuru he ojoo n'ime uwa ibe ya bụ Death(onwu)
Onye ana-kpo Ekwe nsu bu onye mmuo na echiche ndi Christian ma ndi umu Abraham nile, onye iro wo, ma Chineke wo
Okwu ochie nke sotelu 'Ekwensu'
E wetara n'echiche ndi christain na mbe chineke ndi christain kere uwa a, o bido na n'bido kere ana na mmiri, site ebe anwa were kere anu na ugwu nile
Ebe o kesiri ihe nile folu nwoke, o we gwa onwe ya, ka m' kere ihe yilu mu
Nya ka o jilu we kere nwoke, site na nkpo nwoke we kelu nwayi
mbe ekere chineke nile mefe si ka ekwensu bia so nwayi chi kere a na po eve we gwa ya, **nwayi, jelu na ugwu buta ezi echiche weta olili ugwu we rie**
Nwaye we zata ekwensu, gwa ya na chineke keta ya kpa iwu na onye okere a kwesighi site na ugwu bu ezi echiche ri oriri
Ekwensu we gwa nwayi na chineke tu ugha na ihe ge solu isite na ugwu echiche rie bu ihe oma

Ụlọ mkpọrọ Ekwulobia bụ ụlọ mkpọrọ nchekwa etiti ewubere osote onye isi ala Alex Ekwueme nọ n'Oko Community dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Aguata na steeti Anambra
Ụlọ mkpọrọ nke bụ naanị akụrụngwa e nyere ndị Ekwulobia n'oge Shagari na mba nke abụọ, nwere ikike obibi nke ndị mkpọrọ iri asatọ na ise
Emeghere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2010 ma nwee ndị mkpọrọ iri abụo na ise na mbụ
Ikike ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ bụ mmadụ iri asatọ yana ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ nwere ihe dị ka ndị mkpọrọ narị abụo na anọ dị ka ngbe afọ 2019
E mekwara ka a mara na mmadụ otu narị, iri isii na ise debanyere aha dị ka ndị na-echere ikpe
N'ọnwa Juun 2015, a kọrọ na e buferela ndị Boko Haram irí anọ na asaa n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dịka onyeisiala Buhari nyere iwu

N'ịgbaso mkpesa ọha na eze sitere n'aka ndị obodo, ndị ahịa Anambra steeti, onye nnọchiteanya nke Aguata constituency na ndị otu obodo, ndị Boko Haram a na-enyo enyo bupụrụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'October, 2015
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, aka na-achị steeti Anambra ugbu a, bụ Gọvanọ Willie Obianọ nyere ndị mkpọrọ iri n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Ekwulobia, steeti mgbaghara n'oge emume Mass e mere n'ime ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ
Ekwusigo bụ lokal goomenti aria nke di n'obodo Anambara Steeti,South-Central Naijiria
Obodo ndi mejuputara ya bu Ozubulu,Oraifite,Ichi na Ihembosi
Nke a bụ ndepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na ime obodo Ekwusigo

el-Shennawi (Arabic الشناوي, nke a na-akpọkwa al-Shinnawi) bụ aha ezinụlọ na Arabic, mgbe mkpụrụ edemede anyanwụ sochiri ya, l na el na-ejikọta ya na ụdaume mbụ nke aha na-esonụ, na-akpata ụdaume okpukpu abụọ
El Anatsui ([ah-nah-ch-wee], amụrụ n'afọ 1944) bụ onye Ghana na-akpụ ihe ma bụrụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na Naịjirịa
Ọ dọọrọ uche mba ụwa maka 'ntinye aka ni'
Ntinye ndị a nwere ọtụtụ puku iberibe aluminum sitere na ụlọ ọrụ na-emegharị mmanya na-aba n'anya ma jiri waya ọla kọpa dụkọta ọnụ, nke a na-agbanwezi ka ọ bụrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbidi yiri ákwà
Ihe ndị dị otú ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ha yiri ka ha siri ike ma sie ike, nweere onwe ha ma na-agbanwe agbanwe, nke na-enyekarị aka na njikwa mgbe ọ na-etinye ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
A mụrụ El Anatsui na Anyako, na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana
Ọ bụ nwa nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ iri atọ na abụọ nke nna ya mụrụ, nne ya nwụrụ ebe nwanne nna ya zụlitere ya
Ahụmahụ mbụ ya na nka bụ site na eserese akwụkwọ ozi na bọọdụ nzu
Ọ nwetara ọzụzụ na College of Art, University of Science and Technology, na Kumasi na etiti Ghana
Ọrụ ya n'ihe ọkpụkpụ na ịkpụ osisi malitere dị ka ihe omume ntụrụndụ iji mee ka ọdịnala ndị o tolitere dị ndụ
Ọ malitere izi ihe na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka, n'afọ 1975, ma soro otu Nsukka
O were ọtụtụ afọ ịchọta ndị na-ese ihe nwere ike ịnọ n'ebe a ma ama na sekit zuru ụwa ọnụ mgbe ha na-ahọrọ ibi na mpụga obodo ukwu
William Kentridge emeela aha ya site na Johannesburg, El Anatsui emeriela ụwa mgbe ọ na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na obodo mahadum Naịjirịa nke Nsukka
Ọrụ Anatsui ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-eto, malite n'obodo ya nke Nsukka tupu ọ gaa ebe ndị dị ka Enugu na Lagos, ma mesịa gaa na mba ụwa
N'afọ 1990, Anatsui nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya dị mkpa na Studio Museum na Harlem, New York
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe mmadụ atọ a họpụtara na ihe ngosi nke 1990 'Contemporary African Artists Changing Traditions', nke agbatịkwuru ruo afọ ise

Anatsui egosipụtala ọrụ ya gburugburu ụwa, nke gụnyere, na Brooklyn Museum (2013); Clark Art Institute (2011); Rice University Art Gallery, Houston (2010); Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York (2008–09); National Museum of African Art, Smithsonian Institution, Washington, DC (2008); Fowler Museum na UCLA (2007); Venice Biennale (1990 na 2007); Hayward Gallery (2005); Liverpool Biennial (2002); National Museum of African Art (2001); Centre de Cultura Contemporània de Barcelona (2001); 8th Osaka Sculpture Triennale (1995); 5th Gwangju Biennale (2004); Arab Museum of Modern Art na Doha (2019); na Kunstmuseum Bern (2020)
N'afọ 1995, Anatsui mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na mpụga Afrịka na London
O kwupụtara isiokwu dị iche iche ma gosipụta otú e nwere ike isi gosipụta nka Afrịka n'ọtụtụ ụzọ ndị a na-ahụghị dị ka 'ụdị' Afrịka
Ọrụ ya jiri usoro echiche nke ndị na-ese ihe na Europe na America na-eji ma ọ dịtụghị na mba Afrịka
Anatsui gosipụtara ọrụ ya na de Young Museum na San Francisco n'afọ 2005
Nke a bụ oge mbụ ya 'na-apụta dị ka akụkụ nke nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na nnukwu ụlọ ngosi nka'
Nakwa n'afọ 2005, ihe ngosi ya na New York's Skoto Gallery, 'Danudo', bụ ihe ngosi mbụ nke mpempe ígwè ya na obodo America
N'ụlọ ihe nkiri a, Skoto Aghahowa gosipụtara mgbidi osisi Anatsui n'akụkụ eserese Sol LeWitt
Ihe ngosi a mere ka ọrụ karama ya pụta ìhè ka ọ na-enwetakwu nkwanye ùgwù na ndị nta akụkọ
A kpọrọ Anatsui na Venice Biennale n'afọ 2006 nakwa n'afọ 2007 ebe e nyere ya ọrụ ime tapestries ígwè abụọ kwụ ọtọ

N'oge mbipụta 2007, o gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Palazzo Fortuny nke nwere mgbidi e wuru ọhụrụ maka ya iji gosipụta ihe nkedo ígwè atọ akpọrọ Dusasa Ihe osise ọ bụla gosipụtara ọdịdị na agba dị iche iche nke gụnyere ọla edo, uhie, na oji
Ụzọ elu karama ahụ si adọba n'elu ihe niile a kwụgidere ya mere ka ọ dị nro nke mere ka ọ dị iche na ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị na gallery
Onye nlekọta nka nke Biennale, Robert Storr, kwuru na usoro onye na-ese ihe 'na-alaghachi n'ime usoro ihe niile n'oge agha gasịrị-ọ nwere ụdị nkwalite m na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ'
N'oge ihe ngosi Venetian a, Anatsui chọrọ ịmepụta ahụmịhe ọhụrụ maka ndị na-ekiri ya n'echiche
O kwenyere na 'ndụ mmadụ abụghị ihe a na-ebipụ ma kpọnwụọ
Ọ bụ ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe mgbe niile
' N'oge a, ọ malitere ịkọwa ọrụ ígwè ya dị ka ihe nkedo kama 'uwe'
Ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya n'afọ 2010, nke akpọrọ When I Last Wrote to You About Africa, bụ nke Museum for African Art haziri ma mepee ya na Royal Ontario Museum na Toronto, Ontario, Canada
O mechara gaa ebe dị iche iche na United States ruo afọ atọ, na-emechi na Mahadum Michigan Museum of Art
Nnukwu ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, nke akpọrọ Gravity & Grace Monumental Works nke El Anatsui, nwere mmalite ya na New York na Brooklyn Museum na 2013
Akron Art Museum haziri (ihe ngosi 2012), ihe ngosi ahụ mechara gaa na Des Moines Art Center (2013–14) na Bass Museum of Art na Miami (2014)
Nnyocha ọrụ ya, nke Okwui Enwezor na Chika Okeke-Agulu haziri, nke akpọrọ Triumphant Scale dọtara ìgwè mmadụ dị ụkwụụ mgbe ọ meghere na Maachị 2019 na Haus der Kunst nke Munich
Site n'ebe ahụ, ihe ngosi ahụ gara Arab Museum of Modern Art, na Doha, ma mesịa gaa Kunstmuseum Bern na 2020
A họpụtara Anatsui ka ọ bụrụ onye otu International Society for Education through Art (InSEA) kansụl mba ụwa na 1992 maka ọrụ ya na agụmakwụkwọ
Anatsui bụ onye otu Forum for African Arts n'afọ 2000
N'afọ ahụ, ọ ghọkwara onye otu Kọmitii Nhọrọ Mba Nile maka Dakar Biennale na Senegal
N'afọ 2001, ọ bụ onye otu na Civitella Ranieri Foundation na Italy
Anatsui ritere ihe nrite na asọmpi nka mba Ghana nke mbụ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na 1968
N'afọ sochirinụ, e nyere ya onyinye nke nwa akwụkwọ kacha mma nke afọ na College of Art na Kumasi, Ghana
N'afọ 1983, o ritere ọrụ maka nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ ọha na eze abụọ e ji simenti terrazzo mee na campus Nsukka
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà iri a kpọrọ na Zweites Symposium Nordesekkuste residency na Cuxhaven, West Germany, na 1984
N'afọ 1990, a kpọrọ Anatsui ka ọ gaa na 44th annual Venice Biennale show 5 Contemporary African Artists, ebe ọ natara nkwanye ùgwù
N'afọ ahụ, e tinyere ya na ihe nkiri American Nigerian Art-Kindred Spirits
N'afọ 2015, Venice Biennale nyere Anatsui ihe nrite Golden Lion for Lifetime Achievement
N'afọ 2017, e nyere Anatsui Praemium Imperiale, ọ bụ onye Ghana mbụ ritere ihe nrite nka mba ụwa a
Ihe nrite ndị ọzọ gụnyere
El Deif Ahmed, (Arabic, December 12, 1936 - April 6, 1970) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ọchị atọ Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah n'akụkụ George Sidhom na Samir Ghanem
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1936 na El Dakahleya, Ahmed gara Mansoura School For Boys
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Cairo iji debanye aha na Faculty of Arts na Mahadum Cairo, ebe ọ gụrụ Sociology na Philosophy
Ahmed nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya n'afọ 1960, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Master's na English Literature

Ezigbo nzute mbụ ya na aha ya bịara mgbe e mesịrị, mgbe o guzobere otu Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah, nke Samir Ghanem, George Sidhom na ya onwe ya mere ihe osise egwu dị iche iche, ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị, ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri
Ihe izizi nke ndị otu ahụ bụ Doctor Save Me, ihe ngosi dị mkpirikpi nke mere ka ha mara ụwa nke ama ama
Ndị otu ahụ gosipụtakwara ihe nkiri Ramadan nke mbụ na TV ma wepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ndị kachasị ewu ewu bụ Mirati Modeer Aam, Thalath Nesaa, Akher Shakawa, 30 Yom fel Segn na El Maganeen El Talata
Ahmed nwụrụ n'afọ 1970; otu nwa nwanyị (El Deif Rasha) hapụrụ ya
Ndị otu ya Ghanem na Sidhom nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah ruo n'afọ 1982

El-Hadj El Hachmi Guerouabi (January 6, 1938 na Boudouaou, Algeria July 17, 2006 na Zeralda, Algeria) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu Chaâbi na otu n'ime Grand Masters nke egwu Chaâb nke AlgiersA mụrụ ya na El Mouradia (Algiers) ma ọ toro na Bélouizdad Mmasị abụọ jupụtara obi ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata bọọlụ na egwu
N'ịbụ ezigbo onye na-agba bọọlụ, ọ gbara bọọlụ na La Redoute AC ruo n'afọ 1952
Ka ọ na-erule mgbe ahụ, ọ zụlitere mmasị pụrụ iche na egwu; ọkachasị egwu El Hadj M'Hamed El Anka, Hadj M 'rizek na Hssissen

Mmeri ya na asọmpi El Arbi Music-Hall nyeere ya aka isonye na Opera nke Algiers na 1953, ebe ọ na-etinye aka na egwu mana ọ rụkwara ọtụtụ ọrụ ihe nkiri gụnyere Haroun Errachid a ma amaMgbe nnwere onwe nke Algeria site n'ọchịchị France na 1962, Guerouabi hụrụ mwakpo nke egwu mba ọzọ, ọkachasị site na Europe na Egypt, dị ka ihe iyi egwu nye egwu ọdịnala Algeria

Ọ na-anwa ịdọta ndị na-eto eto na-ege ntị site na iwebata mgbanwe ndị dị mkpa n'ihe odide ya nke ga-emecha mee ka ọ bụrụ onye pụrụ iche na Master of ChaâbiGuerouabi gara n'ihu na ihe ọhụrụ ya wee ghọọ ihe ngosi nke egwu Algeria
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ n'oge dị iche iche site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ma ama na ndị ama ama, nke gbakwunyere iwu ewu ya na nkwanye ùgwù n'etiti ndị na-akwado Chaâbi
N'afọ 1987, Guerouabi gara njem ala nsọ na Mecca, wee nweta aha 'El-Hadj'
Ọ kwagara Paris (France) na ngwụcha afọ 1990 maka ọgwụgwọ nke ọrịa shuga siri ike, ebe ọ biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2006

N'agbanyeghị ọrịa ya, Guerouabi gara n'ihu na-emepụta egwu, na-agu egwu na ihe ngosi gburugburu ụwa ma na-agu egwu na agbamakwụkwọ, mana na Febụwarị afọ 2005, a wara ya ahụ nke mere ka e gbupụ ya ụkwụ ya na mkpebi ya ịhapụ egwu
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi ọchịchọ na-arịwanye elu site n'ala nna ya, o nyere egwu ikpeazụ ya na Algiers na July 4, 2005 n'ihu nnukwu ndị na-ege ntị
A nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ ọzọ na Julaị 2006, otu afọ kpọmkwem mgbe ọ pụtara n'ihu ọha ikpeazụ, mgbe ọ dara ọrịa obi nke furu ya ndụ
El Hachmi Guerouabi nwụrụ na Julaị 17, 2006 na Zeralda dị nso na Algiers ma hapụ ya nnukwu egwu, mmeghachi omume egwu mana nke kachasị mkpa bụ onyinye dị ịrịba ama na ụdị Chaâbi

El Hadj M'Hamed El Anka (Arabic), (May 20, 1907 na Algiers - November 23, 1978 na Algièrs) nke a makwaara dị ka Hadj Muhammed Al Anka, El-Hadj M' Hamed El Anka, a na-ewere ya dị ka nnukwu onye isi nke egwu oge ochie Andalusian na egwu chaâbi Algeria
A mụrụ ya na Mee 20, 1907, n'okpuru aha Ait Ouarab Mohamed Idir Halo, na 4 Rue Tombouctou na Casbah nke Algiers
Ezinụlọ ya, Ait Ouarab, sitere na Taguersift nke dị nso na Freha na Greater Kabylia; nna ya bụ Mohamed Ben Hadj Saîd, ebe nne ya bụ Fatma Bent Boudjemaâ
Nna ya dara n'ọrịa n'ụbọchị a mụrụ ya, nke mere ka ejiri nwanne nwoke nke nne ya dochie ya maka idebanye aha ọmụmụ ahụ, nke kpatara njehie na-idekọ aha ya
Nwanne nne ya gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka onye ọrụ ndebanye aha, site n'ikwu 'Ana Khalou' ('Abụ m nwanne nna ya' na Arabic), onye ọrụ ahụ wee dee 'Halo'
Ya mere ọ ghọrọ Halo Mohamed Idir site n'oge ahụ gaa n'ihu
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ atọ site na 1912 ruo 1918 Koranic (1912), Brahim Fatah (na Casbah) site na 1914 ruo 1917, na nke ọzọ na Bouzaréah ruo 1918
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji gaa ọrụ tupu afọ iri na otu ya

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, onye ndú ndị egwú Sheik Mustapha Nador chọpụtara mmasị ya na mmetụta ebumpụta ụwa nke ụda na ememme ndị otu ya na-akpọ egwu na ya, wee were ya dị ka Tardji (onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara) na ndị egwú ya
Sheik na ndị egwú kụziiri ya mandola, nke ghọrọ ngwá egwú kasị amasị El Anka
Mgbe Sheik Nador nwụsịrị na Mee 19, 1926, na Cherchell, El Anka weghaara nhazi nke ememme maka otu ahụ
Ndị egwú nke gụnyere Si Saîd Larbi (aha ezigbo ya bụ Birou), Omar Bébéo (Slimane Allane) na Mustapha Oulid El Meddah na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1927, ọ malitere isonye na nkuzi nke Sheik Sid AH Oulid Lakehal kụziiri, nke ọ gbasoro ruo n'afọ 1932
N'afọ 1928, e kpughere ya nye ọha na eze, site na idekọ diski irí abụọ na asaa (78 rpm) maka Columbia, onye mbụ na-ebipụta ya, ma sonye na mwepụta nke Radio PTT Algiers
N'August 5, 1931, Sheik Abderrahmane Saîdi nwụrụ, El Anka nyekwara aka mejupụta oghere ahụ
Ịwu ewụ ya, nke onye ọkpụkpọ ọhụrụ na redio kwadoro, toro; a kpọrọ ya otu oge ka ọ rụọ ọrụ maka Eze Morocco
Mgbe Columbia gasịrị, o mere diski iri (78 rpm) ọzọ na Algériaphone na 1932, na diski iri ọzọ 78 rpm na Polyphone
Mgbe o si Mecca lọta (nke o dere abụ 'El Houdja') na 1937, ọ gbanwere ndị egwú ya, wee gaa Algeria na France
Otu akụkụ nke ụda ya nke gaara agbanwe na 1932 sitere na mgbanwe nke ngwá egwú
1932 bụ afọ ya na onye luthier rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụta mandola buru ibu
Ọ chọpụtara na mandola nke ndị òtù egwú ji mee ihe dị oke elu ma ghara ịnwe oké olu
Ọ rịọrọ onye luthier ka o mee otu buru ibu, na mandole ahụ ga-aghọ ngwá ọrụ ya bụ isi
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, a kpọrọ El HadJ Muhammad El Anka ka ọ duzie egwu a ma ama na ENRS Algiers Radio nke nọchiri Radio PTT
Egwú a ma ama ọ kwalitere site na 1946 ghọrọ 'chaâbi'
N'afọ 1955, ọ malitere ịkụzi chaâbi dị ka prọfesọ na Academy nke Algiers
Ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya niile ghọrọ ndị sheiks n'oge ha, nke gụnyere Amar Lâachab, Hassen Said, na Rachid Souki

N'ozuzu, El Hadj El Anka dere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ egwu narị atọ na iri isii ( qaca' id ) ma mepụta ihe dịka ndekọ otu narị na iri atọ Ọrụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere 'Lahmam lirabitou', 'ltif Sebhan ellah ya' na 'Win saâdi win'
Ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 23, 1978, na Algiers, e wee lie ya na ili ozu El Kettar
Saadallah (1981)
El-Hadj M'hamed El-Anka maître et renovateur de la musique ' Chaâbi ' (in fr)

El Hedi ben Salem (ihe dịka n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na onye nduzi ihe nkiri German bụ Rainer Werner Fassbinder
A mụrụ Salem El Hedi ben Salem m'Barek Mohammed Mustafa n'otu obere obodo dị na Morocco n'olulu mmiri iji mee ezinụlọ Berber
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ lụrụ nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Ya na nwunye ya ga-emesị nwee ụmụ ise ma biri n'obodo dị nso na Ugwu Atlas
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1970, Salem hapụrụ nwunye ya na ụmụ ya wee kwaga Europe
Na mbido afọ 1971, Salem zutere onye nduzi Rainer Werner Fassbinder na ụlọ ịsa ahụ nwoke na nwoke na Paris ma ha abụọ malitere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya
Ya na Fassbinder kwagara mba Germany wee bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị na-eso onye nduzi
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọtụtụ obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri Fassbinder
Fassbinder mechara tinye Salem na ọrụ ndu na Ali Fear Eats the Soul (1974), ihe nkiri nke na-enyocha ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na obodo Germany mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, Salem gosipụtara onye Moroccan kwagara na Germany nke malitere mmekọrịta ya na nwanyị onye Germany meworo okenye onye ọ mechara lụọ
N'etiti afọ ndị 1970, Salem nọgidere na-apụta na ihe nkiri Fassbinderz na obere ọrụ nkwado
Ọrụ ikpeazụ ya na ihe nkiri bụ na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Fassbinderz Fox and His Friends, n'afọ 1975
A kọrọ na mmekọrịta Salem na Fassbinder bụ ọgba aghara
Ha lụrụ ọgụ ugboro ugboro n'ihi obere iwe Salem nke ghọrọ ihe ike mgbe ọ na-aṅụ mmanya
Mgbe Salem na Fassbinder bi na Germany, Fassbind mere ka Salem kwenye ịkpọta ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ndị bi na Morocco na nwunye ya Salem, ka ha na ha biri
N'ụzọ megidere ọchịchọ nne ha, Salem kpọtara ụmụ nwoke ahụ na mba Germany
Ndokwa ahụ adịteghị aka ebe ụmụ nwoke ahụ adịghị njikere maka ndụ na ọdịbendị dị iche ma na-enwekarị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ bụ ezie na Fassbinder weere ụmụ nwoke ahụ dịka nke ya, ma ya ma Salem enweghị ọrụ ịzụlite ụmụaka
Ha abụọ na-aṅụ mmanya ugboro ugboro, na-ahapụ ọgwụ ọjọọ ma na-ahapụrụ ụmụ okorobịa ahụ na ndị enyi dị iche iche
Otu n'ime ụmụ Salem laghachiri nne ya na mba Morocco ebe onye nke ọzọ gara n'ụlọ dị iche iche ma mesịa, ụlọ mmezigharị
N'afọ 1974, Fassbinder kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ahụ n'ihi ime ihe ike na ịṅụ mmanya Salem
Mgbe nkewa ahụ gasịrị, ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè nke Salem kara njọ

Onye nduzi Daniel Schmid, otu n'ime ezigbo ndị enyi Fassbinder, mechara gwa onye na-enyocha ihe nkiri Roger Ebert na obere oge mgbe nkewa ahụ gasịrị, Salem ṅụbigara mmanya ókè wee 'ga ebe dị na Berlin wee maa mmadụ atọ'
Salem laghachiri na Fassbinder wee gwa ya, 'Ị gaghị atụ egwu ọzọ'
Mgbe mma ahụ gasịrị, nke ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ha nwụrụ anwụ, Salem gbagara France site n'enyemaka nke Fassbinder na ndị enyi ya
Schmid mechara cheta na a ga-esi 'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na a gafere Salem na Germany' nakwa na Fassbinder bere ákwá oge niile ha na-achụpụ Salem na Berlin
Mgbe ọ nọ na France, e jidere Salem ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dị na Nîmes n'afọ 1977, Salem kwụgburu onwe ya
E debere akụkọ banyere ọnwụ Salem na Fassbinder ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ọ maghị banyere ọnwụ onye ọ hụrụ n'anya ruo obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya n'afọ 1982
Fassbinder raara ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya, Querelle (1982), nye Salem
El Molo bụ asụsụ nwere ike ịbụ nke na-adịghịzi adị nke sitere na alaka Cushitic nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic
Ọ bụ ndị El Molo na-asụ ya n'akụkụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ọdọ Mmiri Turkana, n'ebe ugwu Kenya
Aha ndị ọzọ El Molo bụ Dehes, Elmolo, Fura-Pawa, na Ldes
A na-eche na ọ kwụsịrị n'etiti narị afọ nke 20, mana a chọtara ndị na-ekwu okwu ole na ole na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 20
Otú ọ dị, ọ nwere ike ịbụ ugbu a na-adịghịzi adị n'ezie, ebe ndị ọkà okwu asatọ a hụrụ na nyocha e bipụtara na 1994 karịrị 50
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị El Molo agafeela n'asụsụ Samburu dị nso
El Molo enweghịkwa olumba a maara
Omenala ọnụ na-ahụ ndị El Molo dị ka mpụ nke ndị Arbore na South Ethiopia
Nke a dị ka akwadoro ya site na ịdị nso asụsụ El Molo na asụsụ Arbore
Asụsụ El Molo nke nwere ike ịbụ nke na-adịghịzi adị bụ nke alaka Cushitic nke nhazi Afro-Asiatic
Asụsụ Cushitic bụ naanị 3% nke ndị bi na ya maara na ọ na-asụ
Cushitic bụ otu n'ime ezinụlọ asụsụ kachasị ukwuu n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka
Ebe a na-asụ Cushitic sitere na North-East Sudan na ókèala Ijipt, na-agụnye Eritrea, Jibouti, Somalia, Ethiopia, akụkụ dị ukwuu nke Kenya, na mpaghara ụfọdụ nke Northern Tanzania
A na-akpọkwa ndị El Molo dị ka 'Dhes, Elmolo, Fura-Pawa, Ldes, na Ndorobo'
Enwere ọnụ ọgụgụ agbụrụ dị ihe dị ka 2,840 dịka ngụkọ 2009 siri dị na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ na-ebelata kwa afọ
Ebe asụsụ Kenya a dị na East na South Africa
Ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu sitere na agbụrụ isii Turkana, Samburu na Maasai (ndị na-asụ asụsụ Nilotic Eastern); Luo (Ndị na-asụ Nilotic Western); Rendille na ElMolo (ndị na-asụ Kushitiki)
Ndị mmadụ niile bụ ndị na-achị ehi, ewezuga El Molo bụ ndị ọkụ azụ̀
N'adịghị ka ndị agbata obi ha gbara ha gburugburu, ha anaghị adabere n'anụ ụlọ maka ibi ndụ
Azụ bụ isi nri ha
Na mgbe ụfọdụ, ha na-eri agụ iyi, nduru, na hippos
Enwere ndị na-asụ asụsụ ole na ole fọdụrụnụ, nke mere na El Molo (ọnụọgụ mmadụ) anaghị adịkarị na-asụ El Molo
(asụsụ)
Kama, ha na-eji “Samburu”, bụ́ nke a na-ewere ugbu a dị ka asụsụ bụ́ isi ha mgbe a gbanwere asụsụ ha
En-Naddāha (Egyptian Arabic النداهة 'onye ọkpọ oku') bụ akụkọ ifo ndị Ijipt nke mmụọ nwanyị yiri naiad nke na-akpọ ụmụ nwoke na Naịl, ebe ha were ike ịnwụ maọbụ milaa
A maara ya nke ọma n'ime ime obodo Ijipt, ma n'ime ala na elu Ijipti, n'ogologo Osimiri Naịl na ọwa mmiri Naịl mpaghara ọrụ ugbo nke Ijipta
A maghị mmalite nakwa kpọmkwem ebe n'Ijipt ebe akụkọ ahụ malitere
Ụmụaka na-egwuri egwu n'akụkụ osimiri ya mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ hapụrụ ha, ụmụ okorobịa ga na-ekwurịta okwu n'ebe ahụ nʼabalị
Ọ ghọwo ihe na-adịchaghị ewu ewu n'obodo ukwu ugbu a, ọ bụ ezie na ndị ntorobịa ka ma maka ya, a ka na'ahụkwa ya n'ime ime obodo Ijipt
El Torky ma ọ bụ El Torkey (Arabic) ma ọ bụ Torky (Arabic تركي) bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Elaeis guineensis bụ ụdị nkwụ a na-akpọkarị nkwụ mmanụ ma mgbe ụfọdụ, nkwụ mmanụ Afrịka ma ọ bụ abụba macaw
Ọ bụ isi mmalite nke mmanụ nkwụ

A mụrụ ya n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka, ọkachasị mpaghara dị n'etiti Angola na Gambia; aha ụdị, guineensis, na-ezo aka na aha maka mpaghara ahụ, Guinea, ọ bụghị mba nke oge a na-ebu aha ahụ ugbu a
A na-emekwa ụdị ahụ ugbu a na Madagascar, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Indonesia, Central America, Cambodia, West Indies, na ọtụtụ agwaetiti dị na Indian na Pacific Ocean
A na-ejikwa nkwụ mmanụ America a na-akpọ Elaeis oleifera na nkwụ yiri ya, Attalea maripa, emepụta mmanụ nkwụ
Mmanụ nkwụ nwere ike imepụta mmanụ karịa mpaghara ala ọ bụla, karịa ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-emepụta mmanụ (ihe dị ka okpukpu itoolu karịa soy na okpukpu 45 karịa rapeseed)
guineensis bụ monocotyledonous
Ogwe nkwụ ndị tozuru etozu nwere otu ogwe ma na-eto ruo mita 20 (66 ) n'ogologo
Akwụkwọ ya dị n'ogologo ma ruo mita 35
Osisi nkwụ na-eto eto na-amị ihe dị ka akwụkwọ iri ato (30) n'afọ
Nkwụ ndị e guzobere n'ime afọ 10 na-emepụta ihe dị ka akwụkwọ 20 n'afọ
A na-emepụta okooko osisi n'ìgwè; okooko osisi ọ bụla dị obere, nwere sepals atọ na petals atọ

Maka hekta ọ bụla nke nkwụ mmanụ, nke a na-ewepụta n'afọ niile, mmepụta kwa afọ na-eme ka tọn 20 nke mkpụrụ osisi na-amị 4,000 kilogram nke mmanụ nkwụ na 750 kg nke mkpụrụ mkpụrụ osisi na na-amịa 500 kg nke mmanụ osisi nkwụ dị elu, yana 600 kg nke nri kernel
A na-edozi nri ọka maka iji ya dị ka nri anụ ụlọ
Ogologo 1,800 megabase
Usoro izizi dị na 2013
Diploid, nke nwere ọnụọgụ diploid nke 2n = 32
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi n'Eshia dị oke ala
Osisi ndị na-agụnye ọrụ ugbo na Eshia sitere na naanị osisi anọ, nke onwe ha nwere ike ịbụ nsonaazụ nke otu nne na nna
N'adịghị ka ndị ikwu ndị ọzọ, nkwụ mmanụ anaghị emepụta alaka; mgbasa bụ site na ịgha mkpụrụ
A họrọla ọtụtụ ụdị na ụdị Elaeis guineensis nke nwere njirimara dị iche iche
Ndị a gụnyere
N'afọ 2013, a chọpụtara mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na-achịkwa ọkpụrụkpụ mkpokoro, na-eme ka o kwe omume ịchọpụta ọnọdụ tenera (DxP) mgbe nkwụ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
A na-ewepụta mmanụ site na mkpụrụ osisi (mmanụ nkwụ, mmanụ a na-eri eri) na kernel (mmanụ mkpụrụ nkwụ, nke a na-eji na nri na maka imepụta ncha)
Maka 100 kilogram ọ bụla nke mkpụrụ osisi, enwere ike iwepụta 22 kilogram nke mmanụ nkwụ na kwa 16 kilogram nke mmanụ mkpụrụ nkwụ
Nnukwu mmanụ nke nkwụ mmanụ (dị elu dị ka lita 7,250 kwa hekta kwa afọ) emeela ka ọ bụrụ ihe a na-ejikarị esi nri na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia na mpaghara okpomọkụ nke Africa

Ojiji ọ na-abawanye na ụlọ ọrụ nri azụmahịa n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke ụwa na-akwalite site na ọnụahịa ya dị ọnụ ala, nkwụsi ike oxidative dị elu nke ngwaahịa a nụchara anụcha, na ọkwa dị elu nke antioxidants
Akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị ndị dị mkpa na-ebipụta na nkwụ mmanụ na isiokwu ndị metụtara ya gụnyere
Mmetụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na gburugburu ebe obibi nke ịkụ nkwụ mmanụ bụ isiokwu na-ese okwu nke ukwuu
Mmanụ nkwụ bụ ihe ọkụkụ bara uru ma na-enye isi ọrụ
Ọ na-enye ọtụtụ obere ndị nwe ala ohere isonye na akụ na ụba ego ma na-akpatakarị mmelite nke akụrụngwa (ụlọ akwụkwọ, okporo ụzọ, nkwukọrịta, na ihe ndi ozo) n'ime mpaghara ahụ

Otú ọ dị, e nwere ikpe ebe ubi nkwụ mmanụ weghaara ala ọdịnala n'enweghị ụdị ndụmọdụ ma ọ bụ ụgwọ ọ bụla, na-eduga na esemokwu ọha na eze n'etiti ubi na ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ
