Àtụ Succession box
Àtụ S-end
Eline Johanne Frederikke Hansen (22 Ọktoba 1859 na 6 Jenụwarị 1919), bụ onye Danish na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye ndú udo
FtA mụrụ Hansen na 22 Ọktoba 1859 na Assens, nwa nwanyị nke Christian Jacob Hansen (1832-1880) na Johanne Margrethe Rasmussen (1822-1891)
Site n'afọ 1876 ruo afọ 1877 ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na N

Zahles privatlærerindekursus maka ndị na-elekọta ụlọ na Copenhagen; ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye nkuzi n'afọ 1883 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka otu na Aarhus Schule Pigeskole site n'afọ 1884 ruo afọ 1889, na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Copenhagen site n'afọ 1889 ruo afọ 1910
Hansen malitere inwe mmasị na nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, n'oge ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka nha nhata n'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na ndị nkuzi
Hansen ghọrọ onye ọsụ ụzọ na Denmark dị ka onye nyocha kichin ụlọ akwụkwọ, mgbe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ọrụ a na Norway na ego gọọmentị Danish ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka nke a na Copenhagen na 1897
N'afọ 1898, ọ rịọrọ gọọmentị ka ọ malite ọmụmụ mahadum ọkachamara maka ndị na-esi nri na kichin ụlọ akwụkwọ, nke e nyere ma mee n'afọ 1899
Ya onwe ya ghọrọ onye nkuzi na ọmụmụ a
Hansen bụ onye otu Copenhagen School Direction site n'afọ 1904 ruo afọ 1910 na onye isi oche nke Copenhagen Public School Teachers' Association site n'afọ 1905 ruo afọ 1909
N'afọ 1908, o jisiri ike bulie ụgwọ ọnwa maka ndị nkuzi nwanyị
Hansen bụ onye dị mkpa n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị Danish
N'afọ 1886, o guzobere ngalaba Århus nke otu ụmụ nwanyị Dansk Kvindesamfund (DK) ma mesịa bụrụ onye ogbugbo n'etiti ngalaba Århus na Copenhagen
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii etiti nke DK site n'afọ 18
893 ruo afọ 1903, ya na onye isi oche Jutta Bojsen-Møller ka a na-eto maka ichebe DK n'oge siri ike nke nkewa na òtù ụmụ nwanyị Danish
N'afọ 1899, o guzobere Dansk Kvinderaad, mgbe e mesịrị Danske Kvinders Nationalråd (DKN)
Sit'afọ na 1915 rafọ uo 1916, ọ haziri ngagharị iwe maka ndị inyom na-elekọta ụlọ dara ogbenye
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị na nzukọ International Woman Suffrage Alliance na Copenhage'afọ na 1906
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu iji mepụta ma debe njikọ dị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị Germany na Britain'afọ na 1915, ọ bụ onye nnọchiteanya na nzukọ udo ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa na The Hague
Mgbe ọ lọtara, ya na Thora Daugaard, Clara Tybjerg, Louise Wright na Eva Moltesen guzobere otu udo Danske Kvinders Fredskæde, mgbe e mesịrị Kvindernes Internationale Liga maka Fred og Frihed
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ọgụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na onye isi oche nke otu n'ime òtù ndị na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwoke na Denmark
N'afọ 1918, ntuli aka mbụ mgbe ụmụ nwanyị nwesịrị ikike ịtụ vootu, a họpụtara ya maka ndị omeiwu, mana a họpụtabeghị ya
Elinor Sisulu (née Batizat ; amuru ya na 9 Maachị 1958) bu onye odee na onye na-akwado South Africa
A mụrụ ya Elinor Batezat na Salisbury, Rhodesia (ugbu a Harare, Zimbabwe) nye Francis Batizat na Betty Stuhardt, onye bụ ada George Stuhardt
O tolitere na Bulawayo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Zimbabwe, na United Nations Institute for Economic Planning and Development na Dakar, Senegal, na International Institute of Social Studies na Hague
Mgbe ọ nọ na obodo Holland, ọ zutere Max Sisulu, onye ọ ga-emecha lụọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nyocha gbasara akụ na ụba maka Ministri na-ahụ maka ọrụ na Zimbabwe
Site n'afọ 1987 ruo afọ 1990, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Lusaka nke International Labour Organisation
Sisulu ya na ezinụlọ ya laghachiri na Johannesburg n'afọ 1991 ka njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ka onye ode akwụkwọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ site na 1991 ruo 1998
N'afọ 1994, o dere akwụkwọ ụmụaka bụ The Day Gogo Went to Vote maka ntuliaka onye kwuo uche ya nke mbụ e mere na South Africa

N'afọ 2002, o bipụtara akụkọ ndụ banyere nne na nna di ya, nke isiokwu ya bụ Walter na Albertina Sisulu In Our Lifetime, nke natara Noma Award for Publishing in Africa ma bụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ maka Sunday Times Alan Paton Non-Fiction Award
O bipụtakwara Ụdị Oké Mgbukpọ Dị Iche Echiche nke Onwe na HIV/AIDS
Sisulu nyere aka guzobe otu Crisis Coalition nke Zimbabwe wee rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Johannesburg ya
Ọ kwadola akụkọ maka ndị na-ahụ maka ntuli aka nọọrọ onwe ha nke South Africa na maka mmemme nri ụwa
Ọ haziri ọgbakọ maka Themba Lesizwe na Civil Society na Justice na Zimbabwe, nke e mere na Johannesburg na 2003
Sisulu dere okwu mmalite nye akwụkwọ Jestina Mukoko The Abduction and Trial of Jestina Mukoko The Fight for Human Rights na Zimbabwe

Ọ bụ onye isi oche maka Open Society Initiative for South Africa na National Arts Festival, onye nlekọta maka Heal Zimbabwe Trust na onye isi oche nke Book Development Foundation nke Center for the Book na Cape Town
Elisabeth Domitien (1925 26 Eprel, na afọ 2005) jere ozi dị ka praịm minista nke Central African Republic site na afo 1975 ruo na afọ 1976
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na naanị nwanyị na-ejide ọnọdụ ahụ
A mụrụ Domitien na Lobaye
Ezinụlọ ahụ nwere ubi, nna ya na-arụkwa ọrụ na post ọfịs mgbe nne ya bụ onye ọrụ ugbo
Domitien bụ nwa mbụ na naanị nwa nwanyị
Ọ natara naanị ntụziaka dị mfe n'ịgụ na ide ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik ma mụta isi nri na ịkwa akwa
Ọ na-eji ọtụtụ oge ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa ma nyere aka na-ere ngwaahịa ugbo
Otú ọ dị, ọ mụtara ịnagide ọnụ ọgụgụ ma guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo na nwanyị ọchụnta ego
O nwere àgwà siri ike ma na-eme ihe, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị obodo na onye ndu na-abụghị nke obodo
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, ọ banyere n'ọgụ nnwere onwe
Domitien ji okwu ya na Sangho mee ka ndị mmadụ gbakọọ aka, nyere aka jikọta ìgwè dị iche iche ma mepụta mmetụta nke njirimara mba
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi otu ụmụ nwanyị na nnwere onwe, Movement for the Social Evolution of Black Africa (MESAN)
Ya na Barthélémy Boganda, onye guzobere òtù ahụ, rụkọtara ọrụ, wee bụrụ onye isi oche nke pati ahụ na afọ 1953
Mba ahụ nweere onwe ya na afọ 1960 ma Domitien sooro onye isi ala mbụ nke Central African Republic, David Dacko, na onye isi ọchịagha, Jean-Bédel Bokassa rụkọọ ọrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma nye ndị isi ma ndị nkịtị, na-anwa ime ka ọdịmma dị iche iche dị n'otu ma melite ọnọdụ ndụ nke ndị mmadụ
Dacko chịrị n'ụzọ ọchịchị aka ike na mba ahụ ghọrọ steeti otu otu na MESAN dị ka naanị otu iwu
N'afọ 1965, Bokassa weghaara ọchịchị n'ọchịchị, wepụ iwu, gbasaa ndị omeiwu ma họpụta onwe ya dị ka onye isi nke pati, steeti na gọọmentị nwere ikike iwu na nke ndị isi
N'afọ 1972, Bokassa kwupụtara onwe ya onye isi ala ndụ ya niile ma mee Domitien osote onye isi oche nke pati ahụ
N'afọ 1973, ọ duziri nnọkọ mba mbụ nke ndị ọrụ ugbo Central Africa
Ọ bụ onye maara ihe ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike, rịọrọ ndị mmadụ arịrịọ ma jee ozi dị ka ike na-ejikọ Bokassa chọrọ
N'afọ 1974, o kwupụtara onwe ya dị ka marshal
O nwere kansụl nke ndị minista na-agbanwe mgbe niile ma na Jenụwarị 2, na afọ 1975 o guzobere gọọmentị ọhụrụ
N'ebe a, Bokassa webatara ọkwa praịm minista ma họpụta Elisabeth Domitien n'ọkwa ahụ
Ọ bụ Afọ Ụmụ nwanyị nke Mba Nile na Bokassa chọrọ ịmara onwe ya nke ọma na mba ụwa site n'ịhọpụta nwanyị n'ọkwa dị elu
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka praịm minista nke mba Afrịka
Domitien rụrụ ọrụ iji mee ka ego na ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị sie ike
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na CAR katọrọ ya maka nkwado o nyere Bokassa
N'echiche ya, ndị mmadụ kwesịrị ịgbaso onye ndú ha
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ chọrọ ka onye isi ala kwanyere ndị mmadụ ùgwù ma chebe ọdịmma ha
Ọ naghị atụ egwu ikwupụta echiche ya, ọbụnadị onye isi ala, ma wepụta ọtụtụ mmadụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ mgbe e jidere ha n'ebughị ụzọ kpee ha ikpe
Mmekọrịta ya na Bokassa dị njọ mgbe ọ chọrọ ịkpọsa onwe ya eze ukwu
Mgbe Domitien megidere atụmatụ ahụ, a chụpụrụ ya ozugbo ma chụpụ ndị kansụl ya (7 Eprel, na afọ 1976)
Mgbe a kwaturu Bokassa na Septemba, na afọ 1979, e jidere Domitien ma kpụpụ ya n'ụlọ ikpe maka ebubo nke ikpuchi mpụ nke Bokassa mere n'oge ọ bụ praịm minista
Ọ nọrọ obere oge n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ma kpee ya ikpe na afọ 1980, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a machibidoro ya ịlaghachi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 1981, ndị agha nwetara ikike ọzọ ma chịa afọ iri na abụọ
N'afọ 1993, gọọmentị ndị nkịtị nọchiri ya ma họpụta Ange-Félix Patassé dịka onye isi ala
Domitien natara ụgwọ maka mmeso na-ezighị ezi a kpughere ya
Ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye a ma ama, ma dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego, e lie ya na nsọpụrụ gọọmentị mgbe ọ nwụrụ na afọ 2005
Domitien lụrụ di ugboro abụọ; di mbụ ya bụ Jean Baka onye bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na ụlọ ọrụ osimiri ma na-agagharị n'etiti Bangui na Brazzaville
Ha nwere nwa nwanyị, Beatrice na afọ 1941, mana ha mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
Mgbe e mesịrị, Domitien lụrụ Maazị Ngouka-Langadiji onye bụ onye isi obodo ma na-elekọta ubi kọfị na mpaghara Mobaye n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke isi obodo
O nwere ọtụtụ ndị nwunye ma ọ kwagara mgbe ọ lụrụ Elisabeth
Ọ bi naanị ya na Bangui, di ya bịara ileta ya
Elisabeth Friederike Rotten (N'ụbọchị 15 Febụwarị 1882, Berlin - 2 Mee 1964) bụ onye Quaker na-eme udo na onye na-aga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ

Dị ka nwa nwanyị nke di na nwunye Switzerland Moritz na Luise Rotten, ọ gara 'höhere Mädchenschule Luisenschule' n'oge 1888 ruo afọ 1898, mgbe e mesịrị gụọ akwụkwọ na Victoria-Lyzeum Berlin site n'afọ 1904
Na Septemba 1906 ọ gara Reifeprüfung na Kaiserin Augusta-Gymnasium Charlottenburg
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ọmụmụ ya na nkà ihe ọmụma na asụsụ German na akwụkwọ na Heidelberg, Berlin, Marburg na Montpellier
Na Marburg, ọ zutere Hermann Lietz na Gustav Wyneken, nke dị mkpa maka mmepe nke echiche ya n'ọdịnihu
N'afọ 1913, o bipụtara edemede PhD ya n'okpuru isiokwu 'Goethes Urphänomen und die platonische Idee' (Goethe's 'Urphänomen' and the Platonic ideal) na Marburg
N'afọ 1913, ọ malitere ịkụzi na Mahadum Cambridge na akwụkwọ German
N'afọ 1914, ọ laghachiri Berlin wee rụọ ọrụ na 'Auskunfts- und Hilfsstelle für Deutsche im Ausland und Ausländer in Deutschland' ya na prọfesọ Friedrich Siegmund-Schultze
N'otu afọ ahụ, o guzobere 'Bund Neues Vaterland', mgbe e mesịrị 'German League for Human Rights'

N'afọ 1915, ọ gara njem dị ka onye nnọchi anya na 1st International Women's Congress na The Hague ma rụọ ọrụ maka ntọala nke 'Internationalen Frauenliga für Frieden und Freiheit' (International Women's League for Peace and Freedom')

N'afọ 1922, ya na Beatrice Ensor na Adolphe Ferrière guzobere New Education Fellowship, na-aghọ osote onyeisi oche ya maka mba ndị na-asụ German na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ asụsụ German, nke a mechara kpọọ Das Werdende Zeitalter

Site n'afọ 1922 ọ na-ejikọta ya na ugbo ụlọ akwụkwọ, Schulfarm Insel Scharfenberg, nke Wilhelm Blume malitere na Berlin ma bụrụ onye na-eleta Odenwaldschule nke onye na-eme mgbanwe agụmakwụkwọ Paul Geheeb guzobere n'afọ 1910
Elisabetta Tona (amuru ya na 22 Jenuarị 1984) bu onye agbachitere egwuregwu bọọlụ Italy nke gbara Florentia
Ọ na-enwebu mmekọrịta dị ogologo na Torres CF, ebe ọ meriri asọmpi Italy anọ, iko mba anọ na iko ụmụ nwanyị Italy abụọ na oge iri na abụọ
Ọ meriwokwa 2007 WPSL, na-egwu FC Indiana
Dị ka onye otu mba Italy ọ gbara na 2005 na 2009 UEFA Women's Championship
Ebe etiti na -enye iwu, ikike isi ike Tona na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye egwuregwu dị mkpa na-awakpo ndị otu ya
N'oge okpomọkụ 2003 Tona si na klọb mbụ ya ASD Fiammamonza bufee Torres Calcio Femminile
Tona mere mpụta mbụ ya maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Italy na June 2002, na 6–0 enyi na enyi meriri Yugoslavia
Ọ gbara asọmpi na UEFA Women's Euro 2005 na North West England wee nye ntaramahụhụ ntaramahụhụ na mmeri ndị Italy meriri 4-0 n'aka ndị mmeri afọ ọ bụla nke Germany
Na UEFA Women's Euro 2009 na Finland, Tona gbara n'egwuregwu anọ niile ka ndị Italy rutere na nkeji iri na ise
Ọ gbagoro okpu okpu megide Hungary n'oge asọmpi ntozu ya
Onye nchịkwa mba Antonio Cabrini aha ya bụ Tona na nhọrọ ya maka UEFA Women's Euro 2013 na Sweden, mana Federica Di Criscio nọchiri ya mgbe e merụrụ ya n'abalị nke asọmpi ahụ
Elisabetta Tona – FIFA competition record (archived)Àtụ Italy squad 2005 UEFA Women's European Championship
Elise Forrest Harleston (Ọnwa Febụwarị 8, afọ 1891- rụọ afọ 1970) bụ onye a maara dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-ese foto na South Carolina
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị isi ojii mbụ na-ese foto na United States
A mụrụ Elise Beatrice Forrest na Charleston, South Carolina, n'ọnwa Febụwarị 8, afọ 1891, n'aka Elvira Moorer na Augustus Forrest, onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego
Nne nne ya bụ Elishia bụ onye na-enweghị ụcha
Elise Beatrice Forrest ghọrọ Elise Forrest Harleston mgbe ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ihe na-aga nke ọma n'Afrịka-Amerịka Edwin Augustus Harleston, onye ji afọ itoolu tọọ ya
Elise na Edwin Augustus Harleston zutere na Charleston, South Carolina n'afọ 1913, mgbe Elise dị afọ 22
Elise na Edwin bụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Avery Normal Institute, ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye maka ndị ntorobịa ojii nke e guzobere n'afọ 1868
Elise gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Avery Normal Institute n'afọ 1910
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na South Carolina
Na mbido narị afọ nke 20, ọ megidere iwu maka ndị Afrịka Amerịka ịrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Charleston, ya mere Elise rụrụ ọrụ n'ime ime obodo South Carolina
Otú ọ dị, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ike gwụrụ ya n'ahụmahụ ahụ wee laghachi Charleston, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa na Union Millinery & Notion Company
N'oge ahụ, Edwin chọrọ ịkwalite ihe ọmụma ya banyere eserese, a kwadebekwara ya ịmụ akwụkwọ na mba ọzọ
Edwin nwere atụmatụ imeghe ụlọ ọrụ foto na eserese mgbe ọ lọtara, ya mere ọ gbara Elise ume ka ọ banye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ foto ka ha abụọ wee nwee ike ịlụ ma mepee ụlọ ọrụ ọnụ
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1919, Elise gara New York City wee debanye aha na E
Brunel School of Photography
N'ebe ahụ, Elise bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ ndị ọzọ si Afrịka-Amerịka, ọ bụkwa naanị nwanyị
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na E
Brunel School of Photography, Elise debanyere aha, na agbamume Edwin, na Tuskegee Institute na Alabama n'afọ 1921
N'ebe ahụ, o nwere ohere ịga ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na CM
Battey, onye bụ onye isi nke Ngalaba Foto
N'okpuru nkuzi ya, Elise ghọrọ akụkụ nke ndị na-ese ihe nke na-agbagha echiche agbụrụ nke ndị Afrịka Amerịka, ọrụ ya gosipụtara onyinyo nke 'New Negro'
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Edwin na Elise laghachiri Charleston
Ha lụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba 15, afọ 1920
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 1922, dị ka ha kwere nkwa, ha meghere Harleston Studio 118 Calhoun Street na Charleston
Ụlọ ọrụ ha dịgidere site n'afọ 1922 ruo afọ 1932
N'ebe ahụ, o mepụtara ma ree ọtụtụ foto nke ndị na-ere ahịa n'okporo ámá ojii nke Charleston
Edwin bụ onye na-ese ihe, Elise bụkwa onye na-ede foto
Dị ka Edwin bụ onye na-ese foto, Elise na-ese ihe osise ya mgbe niile, ọ ga-ese ihe site na foto ya, dị ka isiokwu nke ihe osise mmeri ya A Colored Grand Army Man
Nke a mere ka ndị ahịa ya chekwaa ọtụtụ awa nke ihe mgbu
N'agbanyeghị nke a, a na-enye Edwin otuto maka ọrụ ya karịa Elise maka onyinye ya na Harleston Studio
Ọ bụ ezie na Edwin na Elise enweghị ụmụ nke ha, ha zụlitere nwa nwanne Edwin, Edwina Augusta Harleston Whitlock
Edwina bụ nwa nwanyị nke Marie Isabella Forrest na Robert Othello Harleston, bụ ndị na-arịa ụkwara nta
Ha nabatakwara Doris
Aaron Douglas so Edwin rụkọọ ọrụ iji mepụta ihe osise ndị a na-egosi na Mahadum Fisk
Abụọ n'ime foto ojii na-acha ọcha nke Elise bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi mba ụwa n'afọ 1996, 'A History of Women Photographers'
E gosipụtara ha na Ọbá Akwụkwọ Ọha na New York
Nke a bụ oge mbụ a ga-egosi ọrụ Elise na mpụga South Carolina
Elise Rasoamampionona bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Madagascar
N'afọ 1964, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba ahụ, nke mere ya nwanyị mbụ so na ya
N'afọ 1970, ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na kansụl mgbe ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka ọdịmma ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Rasoamampionona sonyeere òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Social Democratic Party wee bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị òtù ahụ
Ka Stéphenson Rajaona nwụchara na Disemba afọ 1963, Rasoamampionona bụụrụ naanị onye zọrọ ọkwa onye nnọchiteanya nke mpaghara isii na ntuli aka mmadụ ole na ole emere na Jenụwarị afọ 1964

Mmadụ puku narị atọ na iri itoolu na asaa, narị itoolu na iri asatọ na ise n'ime mmadụ puku narị anọ na iri atọ na atọ n'ime ndị debanyere aha ha ịtụ vootu tụnyeere ya vootu, meziri ya ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ so na ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya ọzọ ịnọchite anya mpaghara nke ise na ntuli aka emere n'afọ 1965, wee bụrụ osote onye ndú nke òtù ndọrọndọrọ ahụ
N'afọ 1970, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị minista mbụ na Madagascar, mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka ọdịmma ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Nwa ya nwoke Elise Razaka mechara bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọkụ na ímipúta mmanụ ọnatarachi
Eliza Anna Grier (1864–1902) bụ dibịa Amerịka na nwaanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ nwere ikikere ịgwọ ọrịa na steeti Georgia nke Amerịka
Eliza Anna Grier (1864–1902) bụ dibịa Amerịka na nwaanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ nwere ikikere ịgwọ ọrịa na steeti Georgia nke Amerịka
A mụrụ Dr
Eliza Anna Grier na Mecklenburg County, North Carolina n'afọ otú pụkụ narị asatọ na iri isii na anọ nye Emily na George Washington Grier
Ọ bụ ezie na a mụrụ ya mgbe Emancipation Proclamation gasịrị, ọ bụ ohu n'ụzọ dị irè n'akụkụ ahụ nke North Carolina nke ndị agha Union na-anọghị

A tọhapụrụ ya na omume na njedebe nke agha ahụ (mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa ọhụrụ) ma mesịa kwaga Nashville, Tennessee iji mụọ nkuzi na Mahadum Fisk Iji nwee ike ịkwụ ụgwọ akwụkwọ ya, ọ na-agbanwe kwa afọ nke ịmụ ihe na ịrụ ọrụ; mgbe ọ debanyere aha n'afọ otú pụkụ narị asatọ na iri asatọ na anọ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ otú pụkụ narị asatọ na iri iteghete na otú

Grier degaara Woman's Medical College of Pennsylvania akwụkwọ n'afọ otú pụkụ narị asatọ na iri iteghete iji kọwaa na o nwere obere ego ma jụọ ma enyemaka 'a pụrụ inye maka ohu nweere onwe ya iji nweta enyemaka ọ bụla n'ime ọrụ dị elu'
A nabatara ya na kọleji n'afọ otú pụkụ narị asatọ na iri iteghete na atọ ma rụọ ọrụ ọzọ n'etiti oge ọmụmụ iji kwado onwe ya
Eliza rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ na-ahọpụta ogho iji kwụọ ụgwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike nke afọ ọzọ, were ya afọ asaa iji gụsịrị akwụkwọ

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ otú pụkụ narị asatọ na iri iteghete na asaa, ọ kwagara Atlanta, Georgia ma tinye akwụkwọ maka ikikere iji rụọ ọrụ ọgwụ na Fulton County, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwaanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ natara ikikere ahụike na steeti Georgia
Grier guzobere ọrụ onwe ya na Atlanta, ọkachamara na obstetrics na gynecology

E hotara ya ka ọ na-ekwu 'Mgbe m hụrụ ụmụ nwanyị nwere agba na-arụ ọrụ niile n'ọnọdụ nke accouchement [ịmụ nwa], na ego niile na-aga n'aka dọkịta ọcha nke na-ele anya, ajụrụ m onwe m ihe mere na agaghị m enweta ego ahụ n'onwe m
Maka nke a, eruola m
Agara m Philadelphia, m gụrụ ọgwụ nke ọma, nweta akara ugo mmụta m, ma laghachi Atlanta, ebe m biri ndụ m niile, iji rụọ ọrụ m
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị dọkịta ọcha kachasị mma n'obodo ahụ nabatara m, ma kwuo na ha ga-enye m ohere nhata na ọrụ ahụ
Nke ahụ bụ ihe niile m na-arịọ'
N'oge a, ọ gbakwunyere ego ya na ọrụ nkuzi
Ọ dara ọrịa n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na otú naanị afọ atọ ka ọ malitesịrị ọrụ ya, ọ nweghịkwa ike ịrụ ọrụ
O degaara Susan B
Anthony akwụkwọ ka ọ rịọ maka enyemaka maka nsogbu ego ya
Anthony anọghị n'ọnọdụ inyere ya aka n'ụzọ ego mana ọ kpọtụrụ Woman's Medical College n'aha ya
Ọ kwagara Albany, Georgia, ebe nwanne ya nwoke Richard Edgar Grier, bụkwa onye dibịa, rụrụ ọrụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na abụọ, naanị afọ ise ka ọ malitere ịgwọ ọrịa, e wee lie ya na Charlotte, North Carolina
Eliza Ann Otis (pseudonym, Susan Sunshine; Ọgọst 16, 1833 - Nọvemba 12, 1904) bụ onye America na-ede uri, odeakụkọ, na onye enyemaka
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa, onye mbipụta na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Los Angeles Times
Eliza ('Lizzie') Ann WetherbyÀtụ A mụrụ Sfn na Walpole, New Hampshire, Ọgọst 16, 1833
Ọ bụ ada Charles Thomas Wetherby (1807-1871), onye na-emepụta ajị anụ na onye ozi meghere Wetherby Academy na aha ya maka onwe ya; na Nancy Hyde Wetherby (1809-1849), nke ngwaahịa PuritanÀtụ Sfn
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke obodo ya na na Castleton Seminary (nke bụzi Mahadum Castleton), Vermont, bụ ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1856
Ezinụlọ ahụ ebuburu na Lowell, Ohio, na mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Otis sonyeere ndị mụrụ ya n'ebe ahụÀtụ Sfn
Ná mmalite, ọ hụrụ uri n’anya nke ukwuu, e dekwara ihe ndị mbụ o mere mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri
uri mbụ o bipụtara pụtara na Congregationalist mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ebe akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ mmepụta dị ịrịba ama maka onye ọgbọ ya
Na Septemba 11, 1859, na Lowell, Ohio, ọ lụrụ Harrison Gray Otis, onye na-amụ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye Ohio, mana n'oge ahụ, onye bi nwa oge na Louisville, Kentucky, bụ obodo nke Mr na Mrs
Otis wepụrụ obere oge ka ha lụchara
Na 1860, o chere maka agha obodo na-abịa ma baara onwe ya mba maka enweghị ike inye aka

Mgbe agha ahụ dara, di ahụ banyere Union Army dị ka onye nzuzo, jere ozi n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị n'oge agha ahụ, na-ekere òkè n'ọtụtụ ọrụ, merụrụ ahụ ugboro abụọ n'agha, nata nkwalite asaa, ma mee ya ugboro abụọ maka àgwà ọma na omume ọma
na-ebili n'ọkwa nke lieutenant-colonel site brevet
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ha biri na Marietta, Ohio, bụ́ di na-edezi otu obere akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ebe ahụ, bụ nke Oriakụ

Na 1867, ha wepụrụ na Washington, DC, ebe Col
Otis nọ n'ọrụ gọọmentị, ma ya na nwunye ya nọgidere na-enwe mmasị n'ịchụso akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Na 1876, ha wepụrụ na Santa Barbara, California, ebe Col
Otis duziri Santa Barbara Daily Press, na 1882 ha biri na Los Angeles na-adịgide adịgide
Na 1879, ọ nakweere ọkwá nke United States Treasury Agent na-elekọta Seal Islands nke Alaska, nke ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 1882
Oriakụ Otis nọrọ otu afọ ya na di ya na Saint Paul Island, wee laghachi na Santa Barbara
N'ịbụ onye wepụrụ mmasị ya na ndị nta akụkọ, Col
Otis zụtara òkè na Los Angeles Times
N'ikpeazụ, o jidere mmasị na-achịkwa, ma jee ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ Los Angeles Times

Otis jikwa ọkwa onyeisiala na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Times Mirror Company
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ Echoes from Elf-Land ( Los Angeles, 1890), mpịakọta nke amaokwu maka ụmụaka, nke e bipụtara na 1890
Isi akụkụ nke ihe odide ya, Otú ọ dị, bụ n'ụdị onyinye mgbe nile, site na ọtụtụ afọ, na ogidi nke Los Angeles Times
Ngalaba ya pụrụ iche, n'ime ndị kasị ewu ewu na akwụkwọ ahụ, bụ 'Nwanyị na Ụlọ' na 'Ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ agbọghọ anyị' Ọ bụ ezie na ọ masịrị ide abụ, dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ, ọ mara mma na amara
Ụdị ihe odide ya dị iche iche sitere na okike, nka na okpukperechi ruo ịhụ mba n'anya, ịhụnanya, agha, nkà mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze, na isiokwu ụmụaka
Ndị di ya chịkọtara, chịkọta ma dezie ya na 1905, ma bipụta ya n'otu nnukwu mpịakọta n'okpuru aha California, Where Sets the Sun
Mpịakọta ahụ nwere ihe odide ntụkwasị nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Memorial Chimes,' na-akọwa mgbịrịgba ndị enyi na ndị na-amasị ha rụrụ n'ili Hollywood, iji sọpụrụ nwunye ya

Eliza Myrie bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkírí nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Chicago, IL
Myrie na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, nka ntinye aka, nka ọha, na óbíbí akwụkwọ
Nna Myrie bụ onye na-atụ nkume
Myrie nwetara MFA ya na Mahadum Northwestern na BA ya na Williams College
Myrie bụ ónyé sonyere na The Skowhegan School na The Whitney Independent Study Program
Myrie guzobere Black Artists Retreat (2013-2016) na Theaster Gates, nke Rebuild Foundation kwadoro, nke kpọkọtara otu ndị na-ese ihe nkírí ojii n'èzí ụlọ ọrụ nka ọdịnala
N'oge oyi 2016, e nyere Myrie MacDowell fellowships
N'afọ 2017/2018, Myrie nwèrè Equal Justice Residency/Fellowship na Santa Fe Art Institute
Myrie bụ ónyé njikwa Wiki Project na Black Lunch Table
Myrie akụziwo na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na Williams College
Hon Elibeth Acuei bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan, onye isi ala ya Salva Kiir Mayardit họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ahụike na 2020 mgbe a kpọrọ ya aha n'ọkwa
Olushayo Olu onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ụwa na ndịda Sudan kpọrọ minista a na-asọpụrụ na 27 Eprel 2020
Ọ nabatara ndị ọkachamara ahụike nke China na South Sudan ma nata onyinye ahụike ọhụrụ maka South Sudan n'oge dị oke egwu nke ọgụ ụwa megide COVID-19
A chụpụrụ ya site na iwu onye isi ala nke Salva Kiir Mayardit mgbe a họpụtara ya ahụ na 2020 na mbido oge mgbanwe
[nkọwa dị mkpa] A nọchiri ya dị ka minista ahụike nke Awel Deng, onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya SPLA-IO na ụlọ omebe iwu udo
Dị ka Minista Ahụike Mba, Elizabeth Acuei Yor kwụsịtụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ Victoria Anib ma jiri Samson Paul Baba dochie ya n'emeghị ka a mara usoro nyocha ma ọ bụ ebumnuche maka ịkwụsị
Mgbe ọnwa atọ gasịrị, Minista Achuei kagburu nkwụsịtụ ahụ mgbe Onye isi ala Salva Kiir na osote onye isi ala mbụ Riek Machar rịọrọ minista ka ya na onye na-eto eto kpezie
Elizabeth Addo (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka Djurgårdens IF nke Swedish Damallsvenskan
Ọ bụkwa onyeisi ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Addo malitere ọrụ ya na Ghana, na-egwuri egwu maka Tesano Ladies FC
na 2003 ma mesịa bịanye aka na Athleta Ladies F-C nke a maara dị ka 'Ashaiman Ladies' nke dị na Ashaiman n'afọ 2007-2012
Ọ nọrọ oge ole na ole n'ebe ahụ ma mesịa sonye n'otu nnukwu Rivers Angels FC nke Naijiria site na 2012 ruo 2014
Ọrụ ya nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri 2012/2013 Nigerian Women Football League na 2013/2014 Nigerian Women Soccer League n'okpuru Rivers Angels FC
Manager Edwin Okon
Ụmụ nwanyị Port Harcourt, ji okpukpu abụọ buru ụzọ na nkeji nke 56 mgbe Addo gbara egwu mara mma na igbe 18 nke Amazon
Addo laghachiri Ghana na 2014 ma mesịa sonye na ŽFK Spartak Subotica na Serbia n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2015, Addo laghachiri Europe wee sonye na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ Hungary Ferencvárosi TC na Budapest Hungary
Ọ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke otu mbụ n'okpuru onye njikwa Balázs Dörnyei ma merie 2015/2016 Hungarian Női NB I league title na Hungarian Women's Cup na 2016
A na-ewere Addo dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu atọ kachasị elu
Ọ gbara egwuregwu 27 na league ma gbaa goolu 17 nyere ndị otu ya aka imeri n'asọmpi Női NB I League nke Hungary
Ọ gbara goolu na nkeji nke 89 megide onye na-asọmpi MTK nke tụgharịrị akara akara Ferencvárosi TC 1 意 1 MTK
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya nyeere klọb ya aka iru eru maka asọmpi ikpeazụ nke Hungarian FA Cup na penalties
Ọ gbara nkeji iri itoolu zuru ezu maka ndị otu ya iji merie Honved 5 z0 na ngwụcha
Addo gbara bọọlụ maka Club Ferencváros na 201516 UEFA Women's Champions League ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ n'oge otu
N'afọ 2016, Addo bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu atọ edepụtara maka 2015/2016 Női NB I Women Footballer of the Year award
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016, otu Kvarnsvedens IK nke Damallsvenskan League bịanyere aka na Addo onye sonyeere klọb ahụ n'efu

Addo abụwo onye na-adọrọ mmasị na Sweden Damallsvenskan league, Ruo ugbu a, ọ gbara egwuregwu 8 gbara goolu 5 maka Kvarnsvedens IK( Ọ gbara dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ etiti na egwuregwu 7 Damallsvenscan league ma gbaa 1, nyere goolu 2, mepụtara penalties 2 na egwuregwu ọ bụla ma gbaa goolu 4 na Sweden FA Cup
O nwere aha ya na Sweden Damallsvenskan Best XII nke ọnwa Septemba 2016
Addo bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta iji sonye na Boston Breakers na NWSL, agbanyeghị na Breakers kwụsịrị n'ihu oge 2018
Ọ bụ Seattle Reign họpụtara ya na Dispersal Draft na nhọpụta nke asatọ
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, Addo bịanyere aka na mgbazinye ego na Western Sydney Wanderers maka oge W-League 2018

N'ọnwa Eprel 2019, ndị otu Chinese Women's Super League Jiangsu Suning bịanyere aka na ya na nkwekọrịta otu afọ mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Seattle Reign mgbe nkwekọrịta ya kwụsịrị ebe ọ sonyeere onye otu ya, Tabitha Chawinga na klọb Swedish Kvarnsvedens
Oge ọ nọrọ na klọb ahụ kwụsịrị ngwa ngwa karịa ka ọ kwesịrị ịdị mwute n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 na 2020
Mgbe ọ nọ na klọb ahụ, ọ gbara egwuregwu iri na anọ, gbaa bọọlụ ugboro ise ma nye aka iri
N'ime obere oge ahụ na klọb ahụ, ọ meriri iko anọ, The Chinese Women's Super League, Women's FA Cup, FA Tournament na Women's super Cup
Addo bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke otu ahụ nke nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na AFC Women's Club Championship na oge izizi ya
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị otu afọ na Chinese Women's Super League Addo, ọ bịanyere aka na Apollon Ladies FC nke Cypriot n'afọ 2020
Addo mere nke mbụ ya maka Apollon Ladies FC nke Saịprọs na 4 Nọvemba 2020 na mmeri ha meriri Swansea Ladies na agba nke mbụ nke UEFA Women's Champions League
Na 18 Jenụwarị 2021, Addo laghachiri na United States mgbe ọ kwagara na klọb National Women's Soccer League North Carolina Courage na nkwekọrịta otu afọ, yana nhọrọ nke ịgbatị ọnwa 12
Addo bụ onye mba ụwa zuru oke maka Ghana kemgbe afọ 2007
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ sonyeere ndị otu mba na-erubeghị afọ iri na ise na 2007 FIFA U-14 Women's World Cup nke e mere na Switzerland ma duzie ndị otu ahụ ruo na ngwụcha na asọmpi ahụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche Ghana na 2008 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup nke e mere na New Zealand ma bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke otu ụmụ nwanyị U17 nke Ghana (Black Maidens) na 2010 2010 FIFA U-17 World Cup
Addo so n'òtù mba nke sonyere na 2010 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup nke e mere na Germany ma sọọ mpi na 2012 FIFA U-20 women's World cup nke e mere ne Japan
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị otu mba nke sonyere na 2014 African Women's Championship qualification
Ọ bụ otu n'ime Ghana Squared nke chere Cameroon ihu maka 2016 Rio Olympic Games qualifier na Accra Sports Stadium -Ghana Ọ gbara egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Germany na 22 Julaị 2016
12 Eprel 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Ghana iru eru maka 2016 Africa Women Cup of Nations

O duuru ndị otu Ghana dị ka onyeisi gaa n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na 2016 Africa Women Cup of Nations O meriri mmadụ abụọ n'ime ihe nrite egwuregwu ma gbaa goolu atọ na asọmpi ahụ iji mechie dị ka onye nke atọ kacha gbaa goolu na onye kacha gbaa gooli maka ndị otu Ghana
N'ihi ihe ndị ọ rụzuru na asọmpi ahụ, a kpọrọ ya aha na Team of the Tournament
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Ghana na 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations nke e mere na Ghana
N'ọnwa Machị 2020, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Ghana nke sonyere na 2020 Turkish Women's Cup nke bụ asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị a na-eme kwa afọ na Turkey
O duuru ndị otu ahụ gaa n'ọkwa nke abụọ n'òtù ha ka ha na-etinye nke atọ n'ozuzu na asọmpi iji merie ọla nchara na iko

Chief Elizabeth Adekogbe (1919 - 1968) bụ onye obodo Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị,onye ndú oke ụmụ nwanyị na onye ọchịchị omenala
Ọ bụbu onye isi ndi otu Women's Movement of Nigeria nke dị na Ibadan

N'afọ 1954, otu ahụ gbanwere aha ya zawa Council of Women of Nigeria, bụ nke sonyere Women's Improvement League n'afọ 1959 were bụrụ National Council of Women Societies, bụ ndị otu mgbagha na ndị otu na-edu ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Adekogbe n’ezinụlọ nke Ijebu-Ife n’afọ 1919
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St Agnes Catholic Training School nakwazị Yaba College of Technology
N’oge na-adịghị anya ọ banyere ọrụ obodo were bụrụ osote onye isi ndị na-enyocha ọnụahịa n’oge World War II
E hiwere otu Women's Movement na Ibadan n’afọ 1952

Ebumnuche otu a bụ ịdịnotu ụwa niile, ịnabata ụmụ nwanyị na Native Authority councils, nhọpụta nke ndị otu nọ na Western House of Assembly, ị debanye aha ọtụtụ ụmụ agbọghọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, mbelata ego isi nwanyị a na-akwụ na njikwa ike nnwekọta ndị ahịa Sịrịa na Lebanọn
Nzukọ a na-esonye na Action Group mgbe ụfọdụ

Kosiladị, naanị ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ole na ole ma ọ bụ efu na-etinye ụmụ nwanyị ndị ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị na ntụliaka gọọmentị etiti oge ahụ, n'agbanyeghị na ụmụ nwanyị tụnyere nnukwu òkè na ntuli aka n'oge ahụ
Otu ndị inyom dị iche iche a yiri naanị ihe e ji nweta vootu
N’afọ 1953, e nwere nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị n’Abeokuta
Nzukọ ahụ nwere nzukọ ndị isi ndị inyom niile dị na Naijiria
Otu onye ndu ọgbakọ ahụ, Funmilayo Ransome-Kuti, bụ onye nwere ihu ọma n'ebe National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroons (NCNC), kpọrọ ọgbakọ ahụ Federation of Nigerian Women Society
Kosiladị, e nwere ọgụ echiche dị n’etiti ụmụ nwaanyị abụọ a ma ama n’ọgbakọ ahụ Adekogbe na Kuti
E meriri Adekogbe, ọ hapụ ọgbakọ ahụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwadoro njikọ ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Action Group
Dika onye isi ndi Yoruba ndi nke ya, o jidere aha Iyalaje nke Ikija
Di ya bụ LAG Adekogbe bụ onye ọrụ bekee
Elizabeth Tygsona Alpha-Lavalie (5 Jenụwarị 1947 na 15 Disemba 2013) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sierra Leone
Ọ bụ onye otu Sierra Leone People's Party ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Sierra Leone maka Bo District, na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu site na 1996 ruo 2012
A mụrụ Alpha-Lavalie na Jenụwarị 5, 1947

Nna ya bụ Joseph Emman Henry Tucker, onye jere ozi dị ka onye otu Sierra Leone People's Party (SLPP) Member of Parliament maka Bo South, ma jee ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu site na 1961 ruo 1967
Nne ya bụ Vivat Edith Letitia Tucker, onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-amụ nwa na onye ọrụ ugbo
Alpha-Lavalie malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, sonye na SLPP ma kwado nna ya
Mgbe Siaka Stevens kwupụtara steeti otu pati ma bụrụ onye isi ala na 1971, a chụpụrụ SLPP n'okpuru ala
Alpha-Lavalie malitere ọrụ ya na 1968, na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ atọ maka Standard Chartered Bank na Sierra Leone, tupu ọ kwaga United Kingdom ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ụlọ akụ, na South West London College
N'afọ 1975, ọ laghachiri Sierra Leone, Standard Chartered wee were ya n'ọrụ ọzọ, n'oge ahụ otu n'ime ndị ụlọ akụ ole na ole a zụrụ nke ọma na mba ahụ
N'afọ 1987, ọ kwagara na National Development Bank, nọrọ na ha ruo n'afọ 1996
Alpha-Lavalie banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1996, na-asọ mpi ma merie mpaghara Bo South ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu Sierra Leone
A họpụtara ya ozugbo n'ọfịs, bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ahụike na Ọrụ Ọha site na 1996 ruo 1997 na Kọmitii Ego site na 1996 gaa 2002
Ọ nọgidere bụrụ osote ọkà okwu ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa
Elizabeth Alpha-Lavalie lụrụ Dr
Alpha Mohamed Lavalie, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke guzobere Kọmitii Nchebe nke Eastern Region mgbe nnupụisi ọchịchị Sierra Leone nke afọ 1992 gasịrị
Ọ nwụrụ na 15 Disemba 2013, mgbe ọ dị afọ 66, mgbe ọ nwesịrị otu ọnwa
Elizabeth Amolofo (amụrụ na 2 Septemba na afọ 1981) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ nke maara nke ọma na mita 200
Elizabeth Anyakoha (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ prọfesọ mbụ nke agụmakwụkwọ akụnaụba ụlọ na Naịjirịa
A maara Anyakoha maka ihe ịrịba ama ya n'ọhịa nke agụmakwụkwọ akụnaụba ụlọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 1979
Ọ nwetara MEd na PhD ya na 1982 na 1986, n'otu n'otu, na Curriculum Studies na Mahadum Naijiria dị na Nsukka
Anyakoha emepụtala ihe ọmụmụ na ihe nkuzi maka akụnaụba ụlọ na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ọrụ aka ndị ọzọ na ọkwa agụmakwụkwọ dị iche iche (primary, secondary na tertiary) na Naịjirịa
Anyakoha emebiela ihe ndabere n'ihe gbasara ndekọ ịbụ onye mbụ n'ihe niile ọ na-eme
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi nke Ngalaba nke Mmụta Ọzụzụ, Mahadum Naịjirịa
Anyakoha bụ onye guzobere Home Economics Journal, Home Economics Research Association of Nigeria (HERAN) na 2000 na Family and child Development Centre
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ikike ma n'ime obodo Mahadum na ndị otu ọha dị iche iche

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye a n'ahụ ihe na National University commission (NUC), Nigeria Education Research and Development Commission (NERDC), National Commission for Colleges of Education (NCCE), UNICEF, UNESCO, UNDP, Central Bank of NIgeria (CBN) na World Bank
Otu prọfesọ nke agụmakwụkwọ akụ na ụba ụlọ kwusiri ike na ọ dị mkpa ka gọọmentị mepụta ihe na akụnaụba ụlọ iji kwalite nkà ụmụ amaala iji mepụta ohere ọrụ
Elizabeth Anyanacho (amuru na ọnwa 9 Eprel nke afọ 1999) bu onye egwuregwu taekwondo nke Naijiria
O sonye na egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2019, wee nweta ihe nrite ọla na kilogram 67
Ọ ruru eru maka asọmpi Summer Summer 2020, n'agbanyeghị na o bu n'obi ịsọ mpi na Olympic ruo 2024
Ọ gaara abụ onye Naijiria mbụ ga-asọ mpi n'egwuregwu ya afọ iri na isii ma ọ bụrụ na ebigharịghị asọmpi Olympic
Onye asọmpi gara aga bụ Princess Dudu na 2004
Ọ meriri n'asọmpi Nigeria Open 2019, na Abuja, meriri Judith Usifoh
N'August 2020, egosipụtara ya na mmemme 'Ndị na-agbanwe egwuregwu' nke Malala Fund, usoro na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị 30 na-eme egwuregwu gburugburu ụwa bụ ndị na-emegide mgbakọ na n'èzí

Elizabeth Ativie bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka osote ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu nke Edo Steeti kemgbe ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2016
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu site n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2016, ruo ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2016
Elizabeth Ativie bụ nwaafọ Edo Steeti mana o toro n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ala Naịjirịa n'ihi ọnọdụ ọrụ nna ya bụ onye uwe ojii
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Health Education na nzere nast na Sociology and Anthropology
Elizabeth rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara nọọsụ na Edo State Civil Service ruo n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka Daịrektọ
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere n'afọ 1999
N'afọ 1999 ma n'afọ 2003, ọ zọrọ oche maka ụlọ ome iwu Edo Steeti mana ọ rịturu n'ọkwa ugboro abụọ ahụ maka otu n'ime ndị ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị n'otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya
Elizabeth zọrọ ma merie oche na State House na ntuli aka izugbe nke afọ 2007
Ụlọ ikpe mechara kagbuo ntuli aka ahụ
Kosiladị, mkpebi ya kwụrụ ụgwọ n'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ meriri oche ịnọchite anya mpaghara Uhunmwode na State House
Mgbe e nwepuchara Victor Edodor n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2016, Elizabeth ghọọrọ nwanyị izizi bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu Edo Steeti na-esote n'iyi e duru ya n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Mee, afọ 2016

N'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Julaị, ọ gbadara bụrụ osote ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu mgbe Onye ndu ọtụtụ ndị,bụ Folly Ogedengbe kpalitere mkpesa, onye kpọpụtara 'matters of urgent public importance, for a change in the leadership of the House'
Onye nọchiri ya bụ Justin Okonoboh
